verse_text: Ha' icham Abraham yeb naj rey David, ha' yichmam Comam Jesucristo. Hac ti' ye istxolal yichmam Comam haca' ti':
Icham Abraham, ha' icham ismam naj Isaac, naj Isaac ha' naj ismam naj Jacob, naj Jacob, ha' naj ismam naj Jud'a yeb huntek'anxa yuẍtaj.
Naj Jud'a, ha' naj ismam naj Fares yeb naj Zara, ha' xin ismi' ebnaj cawan̈ tu' ha' ton ix Tamar. Naj Fares ha' naj ismam naj Esrom, naj Esrom ha' naj ismam naj Aram.
Naj Aram, ha' naj ismam naj Aminadab, naj Aminadab, ha' naj ismam naj Naas'on, naj Naas'on, ha' naj ismam naj Salm'on.
Naj Salm'on, ha' naj ismam naj Booz, wal ismi' naj Booz, ha' ton ix Rahab. Naj Booz, ha' naj ismam naj Obed, wal ismi' naj Obed tu', ha' ton ix Rut. Naj Obed, ha' naj ismam naj Isa'i.
Naj Isa'i, ha' naj ismam naj rey David. Haxa naj David, ha' naj ismam naj Salom'on, ismi' naj Salom'on tu' xin, ha' ton ix yixaltic'a naj Ur'ias yet yalan̈tocanoj.
Wal naj Salom'on, ha' naj ismam naj Roboam, naj Roboam, ha' naj ismam naj Ab'ias, naj Ab'ias, ha' naj ismam naj Asa.
Naj Asa, ha' naj ismam naj Josafat, naj Josafat ha' naj ismam naj Joram, naj Joram, ha' naj ismam naj Uz'ias.
Naj Uz'ias, ha' naj ismam naj Jotam, naj Jotam, ha' naj ismam naj Acaz, naj Acaz ha' naj ismam naj Ezequ'ias.
Naj Ezequ'ias, ha' naj ismam naj Manas'es, naj Manas'es, ha' naj ismam naj Am'on, naj Am'on ha' naj ismam naj Jos'ias.
Naj Jos'ias, ha' naj ismam naj Jecon'ias yeb huntek'anxa yuẍtaj. Ha' yin̈ istiempohal naj Jecon'ias tu' ilaxto ebnaj Israel preso yul con̈ob Babilonia.
Hayet yelti ebnaj yalan̈ yip Babilonia tu' xin ha' naj Jecon'ias, ha' naj ismam naj Salatiel, naj Salatiel, ha' naj ismam naj Zorobabel.
Naj Zorobabel, ha' naj ismam naj Abiud, naj Abiud, ha' naj ismam naj Eliaquim, naj Eliaquim, ha' naj ismam naj Azor.
Naj Azor, ha' naj ismam naj Sadoc, naj Sadoc ha' naj ismam naj Aquim, haxa naj Aquim, ha' naj ismam naj Eliud.
Naj Eliud, ha' naj ismam naj Eleazar, naj Eleazar, ha' naj ismam naj Mat'an, haxa naj Mat'an, ha' naj ismam naj Jacob.
Naj Jacob, ha' naj ismam naj Jos'e, naj Jos'e tu' ha' naj yichamil ix Mar'ia. Ix Mar'ia tu' ha' ix ismi' Comam Jes'us, ha' ton Comam Cristo.

Wal xin ay can̈lahon̈wan̈ mame yin̈ istxolal yichmam Comam Jesucristo chiichiti yin̈ icham Abraham masanta yin̈ naj rey David. Tzujanilo yinta naj rey David tu' yichipaxti can̈lahon̈wan̈ mame istxolal yichmam Comam masanta yet yilaxto ebnaj Israel preso bey Babilonia. Tzujanxa yet yilaxto ebnaj Israel preso yul con̈ob Babilonia tu' yichipaxti can̈lahon̈wan̈xa ebnaj mame yin̈ istxolal yichmam Comam Jesucristo masanto yin̈ istiempohal yet ispitzc'a Comam.

Hac ti' ye istzoti'al yin̈ yet ispitzc'a Comam Jesucristo. Wal ix Mar'ia tak'webilxa yu ix ismohyi yeb naj Jos'e, yaja' yet maẍto chiyik' isba, ispitzc'ati' nich'an unin yin̈ ix yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Wal naj Jos'e waxan̈ca caw yijem naj tet isley naj Mois'es, yaja' mach isje isc'ul naj isk'ana' yin̈ ix Mar'ia tu', yoc yin̈ isnabal naj isbejnicano ix yin̈ ewantajil.

Hayet lan̈an yec' hune' tu' yin̈ isnabal naj, isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj yul iswayic; yalni naj 'angel tu' haca' ti': --Jos'e, hach titnajach yin̈ yuninal naj rey David, mach chinanon hac'ul hamohyi yeb ix Mar'ia, yuto ha' nich'an unin ijbilico yu ix yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Nich'an unin chipitzc'a tu', Jes'us chawaco isbihoj, yuto ha' naj chicolnilti yet con̈ob yalan̈ ismul, ẍi naj 'angel.
Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet yalcano Comam Dios tet hune' ischejab yet payat, yet istz'ibn̈encano haca' ti':
Ay hune' ix k'opo maẍto hunu winaj chik'le, yaja' chipitzc'ati nich'an winaj unin yin̈ ix, nich'an unin chipitzc'a tu' Emanuel chiyij isbi, ẍiayoj. Emanuel, ha' chaliloj ayco Comam Dios coxol.
Lahwi tu' yel iswayan̈ naj Jos'e, isyijen naj yin̈ tzet yal y'angel Comam Dios, ismohyi naj yeb ix Mar'ia.
Yaja' mach ishunba isba masanto yet ispitzc'a nich'an yunin ix. Ha' nich'an unin pitzc'a tu' xin, Jes'us yaco naj isbihoj.

Bey yul con̈ob Bel'en ayco yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea, ha' tu' pitzc'a nich'an Jes'us. Yet hune' tiempohal tu' ha' naj Herodes ayco isreyalo tx'otx' Judea. Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj caw ay ishelanil chicuyni yin̈ tzettaj ye tx'umel, ispeto ebnaj yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic. Yet yapni ebnaj bey con̈ob Jerusal'en,

isk'amben ebnaj: --¿Baytu'wal ay hune' naj nich'an xapitzc'ahi, naj chioc isreyalo anma Israel ti'? Jilan̈ yahilo hune' tx'umel yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic, ha' xin ak'ni cotxumulojan̈ tato xapitzc'a naj. Yuxin macon̈titan̈ jik'ayo cobahan̈ tet naj, ẍi ebnaj.
Yet yaben naj rey Herodes hune' tu', caw somchacan̈ yul iswi' naj yeb sunil anma ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en.
Yuxin yawte naj Herodes tu' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote Israel, yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es; isk'amben naj tet ebnaj: --¿Baytaxca tu' chipitzc'a naj Cristo? ẍi naj.
Istak'wi ebnaj tet naj: --Yul con̈ob Bel'en yul ismajul Judea chipitzc'a naj, yuto hac tu' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios yu hune' ischejab yet payat, bay chal haca' ti':

Con̈ob Bel'en, ha' caw nich'anch'an sata hunuxa con̈ob ay yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea, yaja' caw ec'balto yelapno ye sata huntek'an con̈ob tu', yuto ha' bey tu' chipitzc'a hune' naj yahaw. Ha' naj xin chioc tan̈eno con̈ob Israel, ẍiayoj, ẍi ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yawten naj rey Herodes ebnaj mago yin̈ ewantajil, yoc naj isk'ambeno tet ebnaj yin̈ tzet tiempohal isye isba hune' tx'umel tu' tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' xin ischejnito naj Herodes tu' ebnaj bey con̈ob Bel'en, yalni naj tet ebnaj: --Asiwe bey Bel'en tu', caw xin chek'ambe yin̈ tzet caw ye nich'an unin tu'. Lahwi yilcha naj heyu cat heyul heyalno wetan cat intopaxojan winayo inbahan tet naj, ẍi naj.
Lahwi yalni naj Herodes hune' tu' isto ebnaj. Wal hune' tx'umel yil ebnaj yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic babel sata ebnaj, yoc lin̈no bay ay nich'an Jes'us tu'.
Hayet yilni ebnaj hune' tx'umel tu' caw tzalacan̈ ebnaj.

Hayet yapni ebnaj xin yocto ebnaj yul n̈a. Yilni ebnaj nich'an nene' tu' yeb ismi', yay jahno ebnaj sata nich'an nene' tu', yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈. Lahwi tu' ishajni ebnaj isc'uwanbal, yak'ni ebnaj ch'en oro, yeb te' pom, yeb huntek'an an̈ caw xuk' sam chiyij mirra sabehal tet nich'an Jes'us tu'.
Yaja' xin hallax tet ebnaj yul iswayic tato matxa ch'ec' ebnaj yala' tet naj rey Herodes yin̈ nich'an Jes'us tu', yuxin nan behalxa bay to ebnaj yet ispaxto ebnaj bey iscon̈ob.

Haxa yet xapaxto ebnaj mago hulic'o ilno nich'an Jes'us, isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj Jos'e yul iswayic, yalni naj 'angel tu': --Ahan̈wano yin̈ an̈e, ito nich'an unin ti' yeb ismi' cat hato bey Egipto. Wal haweh bey tu' masanto haninan chiwalan tawet bak'in chachmeltzohi, yuto chati naj Herodes issayomal nich'an unin ti' cat ispotx'ni naj yalni, ẍi naj 'angel tet naj Jos'e.
Lahwi tu' yahwano naj Jos'e, yinito naj nich'an Jes'us tu', isto naj yin̈ isbel yeb ix Mar'ia bey Egipto yin̈ ak'balil.

Ha' bey tu' xin ehayo naj yeb ix masanto cam naj rey Herodes. Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet hune' ischejab yet payat yet istz'ibn̈encano naj haca' ti': "Bey Egipto chiwawteti Inc'aholan," ẍiayoj.

Hayet yilni naj rey Herodes tato matxa ec' ebnaj mago yala' tet naj yin̈ naj nich'an Jes'us, caw tit ishowal naj yuto etli ebnaj yin̈ naj yabe. Ischejni naj potx'laxo sunil niẍte winaj unin, nene' masanta niẍte yin̈ cab habil ay yul con̈ob Bel'en yeb huntek'anxa con̈ob ayco yin̈ ishoyanil, yuto hac tu' chielico istiempohal yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj mago tet naj.
Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Jerem'ias, hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chala:
Abelax hune' aw yul con̈ob Ram'a, caw ay ok'il yeb nimeta bisc'ulal. Ha' ton ix Raquel chiok' yin̈ej yunin, machi xin chisje ix chiak'lax isnimanbal isc'ul ix, yuto camnaxa ej yunin ix tu', ẍiayoj.
Haxa yet xacam naj rey Herodes, isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj Jos'e yul iswayic bey Egipto, yalni naj 'angel tu':
--Ahan̈wanoj cat hameltzo yeb nich'an unin ti' yeb ismi' bey hacon̈ob Israel, yuto xacam ebnaj ochen potx'no camo nich'an unin ti', ẍi naj 'angel.
Haxa yet yaben naj Jos'e hune' tu' yahwano naj, yinito naj naj nich'an Jes'us tu' yeb ismi', ispaxti naj sat tx'otx' Israel hunelxa.

Yaja' yabelo naj tato naj Arquelao, isc'ahol naj rey Herodes tu' oc reyalo selelo bey Judea, yuxin xiw naj yapni bey tu'. Yaja' xin hallax tet naj yul iswayic yu Comam Dios tato chito naj yul ismajul Galilea.

Yet yapni naj bey tu' yehayo naj yeb ix Mar'ia yeb naj nich'an Jes'us yul con̈ob Nazaret. Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chala tato nazareno chihallax yin̈ Comam Jes'us.
Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin apni naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma bey tx'otx' desierto, yul ismajul Judea.
Yalni naj tet anma apni bey tu': --Bejwecano hewatx'en istx'ojal, yuto yocxa Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ yahawo teyin̈, ẍi naj.

Ha' ton yin̈ naj Juan ti' bay yal naj Isa'ias, hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, yet istz'ibn̈encano naj haca' ti': Ay hune' naj chiawi yin̈ caw ip bey hune' tx'otx' desierto, chalni naj: "Watx'eweco heyanma yuto chihul Comam Dios Jahawil. Haca' chu istoholban̈elax hunu beh yet chihul hunu naj jahaw, hac tu' cheyute hayanma," ẍi naj, ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios.
Wal naj Juan tu', xil no' camello watx'ebilayo xilo isk'ap naj, tz'um no' xin ayco istx'ambalo naj. Ha' tzet chislo naj ha' ton no' niẍte nok' haca' no' lit' yeb no' cab ay xolaj telaj.
Hantan̈e xin anma yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yeb yul ismajul Judea, yebpaxo anma ayayo istila ha' niman Jord'an apni abeno tzet yal naj.
Yet chalnati anma ismul xin, cat yahcano ha' iswi' yu naj Juan yul ha' niman Jord'an.

Hayet yilni naj Juan tato tx'i'al ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo apni isc'atan̈ yu yah ha' iswi', yalni naj tet ebnaj: --Hex ti' caw haca'tan̈e heyic'al heba yeb no' laba, caw helanex hecolni heba. ¿Mac halni teyet ta yun̈e ch'ah ha' hewi' yuxin chexcolcha tet hune' isya'tajil chati Comam Dios?
Tato caw yeli xaheyacano sunilal istx'ojal, yilal heyenilo yu isc'ulal chewatx'e.

Tajca chetxum haca' ti': "Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jichmaman̈ ye icham Abraham, yuxin xacon̈colchahan̈ yalan̈ isya'tajil chati' Comam Dios, tajca quexchi. Wal xin chiwalan teyet, tato choche Comam Dios chu yanico Comam huntek'an ch'en ch'en ti' yuninalo icham Abraham heseleloj.

Cawilxa yeti hune' isya'tajil chati Comam Dios, lahan haca' yet yocxa ch'en eche yich xe' hunu te te' yu istz'oc'laxayo te'. Yuxin sunil te te' mach c'ulo issatni chitzoc'laxayo te' cat isk'ojlaxto te' yul k'a'.

Yin̈ caw yeli haninti'an han̈e ha ha' chiwak'an yahbalo ha' hewi' yun̈e isyenicanilo isba tato caw yeli xahebejcano istx'ojal. Yaj ay hune' naj tzujan yul wintajan, naj tu' chiyacan̈ naj ha' hewi', yaj yu isk'ak'al yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo. Ha' naj tu' caw ec'balcano yelapno ye naj insatajan, walinan xin caw matzet welapnojan chiwabehan, nitam int'un̈nihan isxan̈ab naj.

Naj chul tu' lahan naj haca' hunu naj chixunilo isk'al ixim trigo, nan chak' naj ixim sat, nan chak'paxo naj ixim yoj, wal ixim sat tu' chisc'ubato naj ixim yul isc'un̈a, haxa ixim yoj tu' xin chisk'ojto naj ixim xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal," ẍi naj Juan tu'.
Yet hune' tiempohal tu' el Comam Jes'us bey Galilea, isto Comam isti' ha' niman Jord'an isc'atan̈ naj Juan, yu yah ha' iswi' Comam yu naj.

Wal naj Juan tu' mach chisje naj yak'a'can̈ ha' iswi' Comam. Yalni naj tet Comam: --Machoj, wal xin ha' hawet hach yilal hawanican̈ ha' inwi'an, maẍtajach chachhul inc'atan̈an yu wanican̈an ha' hawi', ẍi naj.
Yaja' tak'wi Comam tet naj: --Mach chu haman̈c'on hune' ti', wal xin yilal coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, ẍi Comam. Hac tu' xin yu isyijen naj Juan yanican̈ ha' iswi' Comam Jes'us.
Yet lahwi yah ha' iswi' Comam tu', yahti Comam xol ha', yin̈n̈ena tu' ishajni isba satcan̈. Yilni Comam yayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈ haca' hunu no' cuwis.
Yabelax hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈, halni haca' ti': --Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan, caw xahan ay wuhan, caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj, ẍiaytij.
Lahwi tu' yilaxto Comam Jes'us yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo bey tx'otx' desierto yu yilwelax Comam yu naj matzwalil.
Caw xin yulbal cawina tz'ayic yeb cawina ak'bal mach wa' Comam, lahwi tu' isn̈ohchacan̈.
Yapni naj matzwalil yilweno Comam, yalni naj tet Comam: --Ta yeli Isc'ahol Dios hawehi, hal tet huntek'an ch'en ch'en ti' meltzojabico ch'en wahil, ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Wal xin tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios tato maẍn̈etaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin ay cok'inal, to yupaxo Istzoti' Comam, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Lahwi tu' yinito naj matzwalil Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, iscon̈ob Comam Dios, yinato naj Comam yin̈ iswi' yatut Comam bey tu',

yalni naj tet Comam: --Tato caw yeli Isc'ahol Dios hawehi k'ojayto haba bey ti', yuto tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Chak'ati Comam Dios y'angel chachistan̈e' yun̈e mach chaẍischayo ebnaj sat tx'otx', haxinwal mach chilahwi hawoj yin̈ ch'en ch'en, ẍiayoj, ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam Jes'us tet naj: --Tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Mach chinheyacojan yin̈ ilwebal yuto Heyahawil yeb heDiosal wehan," ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' yinito naj Comam yin̈ iswi' hune' witz caw nahat yecanocan̈, isyeni naj sunilej con̈ob ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb isk'alomal con̈ob tu' tet Comam.
Yalni naj tet Comam: --Sunil huntek'an chawil ti' chiwak'an tawet, yaj tato chaẍay jahno insatajan cat hawinayo haba wetan, ẍi naj tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam: --Ach matzwalil hitzan̈ilo inc'atan̈an yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Iweyo heba tet Comam Dios yuto Heyahawil yeb heDiosal ye Comam, han̈e tet Comam xin cheyije tzet chala," ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.
Yet yalni Comam Jes'us haca' tu' isbejnicano naj Comam, yapni huntek'an ebnaj 'angel colwal yin̈ Comam.
Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us tato alaxicto naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma yul preso, isto Comam yul ismajul Galilea.
Yaja' xin mach cancano Comam yul con̈ob Nazaret, wal xin to Comam yul con̈ob Capernaum, ha' tu' xin ehayo Comam. Hune' con̈ob tu' ayayo isti' ha' mar Galilea, tx'otx' chiyij Zabul'on yeb Neftal'i.
Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias, ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chala:
Tx'otx' Zabul'on yeb tx'otx' Neftal'i, tx'otx' ayic'to satac'to ha' Jord'an, tx'otx' ayayo isti' ha' mar, yul ismajul tx'otx' Galilea bay ay tx'i'al anma mach Israeloj.
Huntek'an anma tu' aytic'aco xol k'ejholo yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xaapni issajilk'inal tet. Huntek'an anma tu' iscambalxatic'a, yaja' wal tinan̈ xaapni issajilk'inal yak'lobal yanma, ẍiayoj.
Ha' bey tu' xin ichico Comam Jes'us yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios, chalni Comam: --Bejwecano hewatx'en istx'ojal yuto yocxa Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ Yahawo teyin̈, ẍi Comam.

Hayet lan̈an isbelwi Comam Jes'us isti' ha' lago Galilea, yapni Comam isc'atan̈ cawan̈ ebnaj ik'omati cay, lan̈an yanayto ebnaj ishac' chiinahti no' cay xol ha'. Ebnaj cawan̈ ti' yuẍta isba ebnaj, ha' ton naj Sim'on, naj chihallaxpaxo Pedro, yeb xin naj Andr'es.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Ocan̈we tzujno wintajan, wal tinan̈ haxa anma chexoc heyik'ahtij cat yoc yul ink'aban, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam haca' tu', isbejnicano ebnaj ishac', yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam.

Haniq'uixto chito Comam Jes'us xin yilnipaxo Comam cawan̈xa ebnaj yuẍta isba, ha' ton naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan, ebnaj isc'ahol icham Zebedeo. Ayahto ebnaj yul isbarco yeb ismam tu', lan̈an xin isbujni ebnaj ishac'. Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj tato chioc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' yanicano ebnaj isbarco yeb ismam, yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam.

Caw sunil yul ismajul Galilea ec' Comam Jes'us, iscuyni Comam anma yul hunun iscapilla ebnaj Israel, yalni Comam tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Yak'ni cawxo Comam anma yin̈ sunilal yabil ayco yin̈, yeb anma chiec'ya' yanma.

Caw xin pujnacan̈ isk'umal Comam yul ismajul Siria, chiniti anma macta ayco yabil yin̈. Ay mac ch'ec'ya' yanma yu yabil, ay mac ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈, aypaxo mac chilow yaxcamic yin̈, yeb aypaxo mac camnajilo isnimanil. Sunil huntek'an anma tu' yak' cawxo Comam.
Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam; ay anma ah Galilea, ay anma ah Dec'apolis, ay anma ah Jerusal'en yeb anma ah Judea, yebpaxo anma ay isk'axepic'to ha' niman Jord'an.
Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us tato caw hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈, yahto Comam yin̈ istzalanil hune' won̈an, yay tz'on̈no Comam, ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈.
Yoc Comam iscuyno ebnaj iscuywom tu', yichico Comam yalni haca' ti':
--Sak'al yet mac chitxumchalo yu ta mach chu iscolni isba ischuquil, yuxin yin̈n̈e Comam chicawxi isc'ul. Hune' mac tu' yet ay yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Sak'al yet mac chiyik' bisc'ulal yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e, yuto chiak'lax yak'lobal isc'ul yu Comam Dios.
Sak'al yet mac chewchotan̈e chute isba yuto chischah hune' tx'otx' haltebilcano yu Comam Dios.
Sak'al yet mac choche isc'ul iswatx'e' tzet chal Comam Dios yuto chij isba tzet choche.
Sak'al yet mac chitz'ay isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil, yuto hac tu' chu istz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈.
Sak'al yet mac sajxa ye yanma yul sat Comam Dios, yuto ha' anma tu' chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam.
Sak'al yet mac chisayni ak'anc'ulal yuto chal Comam Dios yuninaloj.
Sak'al yet mac caj chiillaxi yu chiswatx'e istoholal haca' choche Comam, yuto ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈.
Sak'al heyet yet chexbahlaxi yeb yet chexetalaxi, cat ishoblaxcan̈ lek'ti'al teyin̈ yuto tzujanex wintajan.

Caw ak'we tzalaho heyanma ta hac tu' chexutelaxi yuto ch'ak'lax ispaj selel teyet bey satcan̈. Yuto haca' heyilni isya'tajil ti', hac tu' yu yec'ya' yanma ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti', haca' atz'am atz'am, hac tu' heye yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. K'inalo ta chiel isc'achi'al atz'am matxa chu yoc isc'achi'al atz'am hunelxa, hac' tu' xin matxa tzet ch'ocnico atz'am, to chitirlaxtoj cat isxan̈laxic'o yu anma, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti' haca'paxo sajilk'inal heye yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. K'inalo ta ay hunu con̈ob yin̈ iswi' hunu witz, caw haban jilnilto nahat.
Yet chicotzujbanico k'a' yin̈ hunu cantil, mach chicon̈ohbaco hunu almuh yiban̈, wal xin chicot'un̈bacan̈ yun̈e ismujli yin̈ anma ayicto yul n̈a tu'.
Hacojab tu' xin istzejla hune' sajilk'inal ayxaco teyin̈ yin̈ sat anma, haxinwal chil anma isc'ulal chewatx'e. Hac tu' xin c'ul istzotel anma yin̈ Comam ay yul satcan̈, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --Tajca chetxumu ta yu intan̈tzenilojan isley naj Mois'es yeb cuybanile aycano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yuxin quinhulan, machoj, walxinto yun̈e wak'nihan ohtan̈elaxilo yin̈ tzet chaliloj yuxin quinhulan.

Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ta caw yilal yijni isba sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios. Yulbal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb satcan̈, machi hun tx'inano ayayo yin̈ ley mach ch'ec'to yet yijni isba.

Yuxin ha' mac mach chiyijen hunu chejbanile ayco yin̈ ley, waxan̈ca machi bin tzet chaliloj, machi xin chiscuypaxo yet anmahil isyijeni, ha' hune' mac tu' machi yelapno chuco xol mac chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Wal mac chiyijen xin cat iscuynipaxo yet anmahil isyijeni, ha' hune' mac tu' caw ay yelapno chuco xol anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Yuxin chiwalan teyet tato mach ec'balto c'ul cheyute heyijen yin̈ tzet halbilcano yu Comam Dios tu' sata ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ ley yeb ebnaj fariseo, mach chexoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax tet ebnaj jichmam haca' ti': "Mach chepotx'camo heyet anmahil, yuto ha' mac chipotx'ni hunu yet anmahil yilal yilaxto sata naj juez cat yoc yin̈ isya'tajil yu naj," ẍi.

Yaja' haninan chiwalan teyet, ha' mac chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios. Ha' mac chibuchwa yin̈ yet anmahil xin, ha' ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' yul con̈ob chiilni tzet chielicoj. Haxa mac chibahni yet anmahil cat yak'ni taco isc'ul, ha' hune' mac tu' ay ismay isto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal.
K'inalo tato yet lan̈an heyinito heyofrenda tet Comam Dios sat altar cat henanitij tato ay hemul tet hunu maca,
awecano heyofrenda tu' yich ismeẍahil bay chiak'lax xahanbal tu', cat heto heyanoco heba yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb hune' mac tu', tzujan tu' xin xaisje heyak'ni heyofrenda tu' tet Comam Dios.

Tato ay hunu mac chik'anni teyin̈ yu hunu istx'ojal chewatx'e, watx'eweyo hune' tu' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb hune' mac tu' yet yalan̈to maẍto chexto sata naj alcal. Yuto ta chexapni sata naj, chexyaco naj yul isk'ab ebnaj mayor, haxa ebnaj mayor tu' xin chexanicto yul preso.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, mach chexelti yul preso tu' ta mach tz'ajano cheyak' hemulta, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax haca' ti': "Mach chexixli," ẍi.
Yaja' haninti'an chiwalan teyet, mac xan̈etic'a chiilni hunu ix ix cat isnanico istx'ojal yin̈ ix cat yochenico ix, ha' hune' mac tu' xayanaco ismul yul sat Comam Dios.

K'inalo tato isbak' hesat yin̈ hewatx'k'ab chexak'ni ayc'ayoj yin̈ hunu istx'ojal, c'ulmi tato cheyilti hune' isbak' hesat tu' cat hek'ojnito nahat. Wal xin ec'bal c'ul tato ayto hunu tzet mach tz'ajano yin̈ henimanil sata ta tz'ajan sunil henimanil cat heyalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal.

K'inalo tato hewatx'k'ab chexak'ni ayc'ayo yin̈ hunu istx'ojal, c'ulmi ta chetzoq'uilto hune' hek'ab tu', cat hek'ojnito nahat. Wal xin ec'bal c'ul tato matxa hune' hek'ab satato tz'ajan henimanil cat heyalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hallaxpaxo yet payat haca' ti': "Ta ay hunu naj chispoh isba yeb yixal, yilal iswatx'icano yumal cat yak'nicano naj hune' hum tu' tet ix," ẍiayoj.

Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan, tato ay hunu naj chispoh isba yeb yixal, yaja' ta mach yuho issayni ix ismul yeb hunuxa winaj, hune' naj tu' lan̈an istubtento naj ix issaya' ismul yik'ni hunuxa yichamil. Ha' xin naj chiik'ni ix chispoh isba yeb yichamil tu', ha' hun naj chahpaxico ismul, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti', heyohtapaxoj tato hallax tet ebnaj jichmam haca' ti': "Ta cheyawte isbi Comam Dios yin̈ hunu tzet chetak'we teyin̈, yilal heyijen hune' tu'," ẍiayoj.

Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan teyet, mach cheyak' binaho isbi Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chetak'weco teyiban̈. Mach cheyak' binaho satcan̈ yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈, yuto ha' bey tu' tz'on̈an Comam Dios Jahawil.

Mach cheyak'paxo binaho tx'o tx'otx' yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈, yuto tx'o tx'otx' isbatxobal yoj Comam ye tx'otx'. Mach cheyak' binaho isbi con̈ob Jerusal'en yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈, yuto iscon̈ob Comam Dios Jahawil caw ay yelapno yehi.
Mach cheyak' binaho hewi' yin̈ tzet chetak'weco teyiban̈, yuto mach chu hesajn̈en maca hek'ejn̈en hunu xil hewi'.

Wal xin tato cheyal ho', yelojab cheyala, taca machoj ta quexchi, machojabi; yuto ta cheyak' binaho isbi huntek'an tu' yak'ni isba yin̈ tzet cheyala, wal xin yin̈ naj matzwalil chitit huntek'an tu', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallaxpaxo haca' ti': "Tato ay hunu mac chimak'ni poho isbak'sat hunu maca, mak'laxojabpaxo poho isbak'sat hune' mac tu'. Tato ay hunu mac chimak'nilti yeh hunu maca, mak'laxojabpaxilti yeh hune' mac tu'," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan, mach chu hepajtzen istx'ojal chiswatx'e hunu mac teyin̈. Wal xin tato ay mac chipak'nilto hecotx', meltzowepaxto k'axepxa tet.
Ta ay hunu mac chik'anni teyin̈ tet naj alcal, cat yinito hecamiẍ yalni, matzet cheyala ta chipaxto hechumpa.
Yeb xin ta ay hunu mac chalni teyet tato cheyijto yijatz yictajo legua, colwahan̈we yin̈, iweto yijatz tu' hunu legua.
Ta ay mac chik'anni hunu tzet ye tu' teyet, ak'we tet. Tato ay hunu mac chik'anni hunu tzet ye tu' c'amil teyet, colwahan̈we yin̈ hune' mac tu', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax haca' ti': "Xahan cheyil mac xahan chexilni. Mac ayco ishowal teyin̈ xin, ocojabpaxo hehowal yin̈," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan teyet, xahan cheyil mac ayco ishowal teyin̈. K'anwe isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ macta chexetani.

Ta cheyije haca' tu', hac tu' chu heyeniloj tato quexyuninal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈, yuto ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni aholo tz'ayic yiban̈ anma c'ul yeb yiban̈ anma tx'oj. Lahan chapaxayo Comam ha' n̈ab yiban̈ mac c'ul yeb yiban̈ mac tx'oj.

Wal xin tato han̈c'an̈e anma xahan chexilni, ha'n̈e xin xahan cheyilpaxoj, ¿mataxca chechah ispaj hune' tu' tet Comam Dios? Machoj, yuto hac tu' chute isbeybaln̈e ebnaj mulum, haca' ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal chito bey Roma.
Yeb xin tato han̈c'an̈e tet heyuẍtaj chextioẍli, ¿c'ulmi hune' tu'? Machoj. Wal xin ha' anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios hac tu' chisbeybaln̈e.
Tz'ajanojab chu hebeybaln̈e sunil isc'ulal, yuto Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ tz'ajan lahan yehi, ẍi Comam.

Yalni Comam Jes'us: --Caw nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet chewatx'e, machn̈ehojab yin̈ sat anma c'ul cheyute heba, yuto ta yun̈e heyillaxi yuxin chewatx'e isc'ulal, mach chechah ispaj selel tet Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈.

Yuxin yet chexcolwa yin̈ hunu meba', mach chepujbac'o haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal. Ebnaj tu' ch'ak' ebnaj issabehal yulaj capilla yeb yulaj calle, yun̈e yallax ebnaj c'ulal. Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet chihallax c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ ebnaj tu' lan̈an ischahnina ebnaj ispaj selel.
Wal hex ti' xin, hayet chexcolwa yin̈ anma meba' machi mac tet cheyala, nitam tet hunu heyamigo.
Wal xin yin̈ ewantajil cheyak' tet, haxinwal Comam ay yul satcan̈ chiilni tzet chawatx'e yin̈ ewantajil, cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hayet chextxahli tet Comam Dios, mach cheyute haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal. Ha' ebnaj tu' yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma, yuxin ton̈etic'a choche islin̈ba isba istxahli yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel, yebpaxo yin̈la istxiquin txon̈bal. Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet chitxahli ebnaj haca' tu' chischahnina ebnaj ispaj selel tet anma.

Walex hex ti', mach cheyute haca' tu'. Wal xin hayet chextxahli, chexocto yul heyatut cat hepeban ispultahil te', cat hetxahli tet Comam Dios, Comam chiaben tzet cheyala. Chil Comam sunil tzet cheyu yin̈ ewantajil cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet.

Hayet chextxahli, machojab chexoc hecayen̈e tzoti' matzet chaliloj haca' chute anma maẍto ohtan̈eho Comam Dios. Yuto chistxum ebnaj ta yu caw nimej chute ebnaj yoj istxah, caw chabe Comam Dios tzet chal ebnaj yalni.
Wal xin mach cheyute haca' tu', yuto Comam Dios yohtaxa tzet chiocnico heyu yalan̈to yet maẍto chek'an tet Comam.
Hayet chextxahli, hac ti' cheyute heyalni haca' ti': Hach Comam, hach coDios, ayach yul satcan̈, nimanojab yelapno habi yul sat anma.
Hulan̈ cat hawoc jahawilojan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yijab isba tzet chawoche sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' haca' chu yijni isba yul satcan̈.
Mamin, chicok'anan̈ tawet, ak' tzet chicolohan̈ hunun tz'ayic.
Ak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ istx'ojal chicowatx'ehan̈, haca' chu jak'ni nimanc'ulalan̈ yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal jin̈an̈.
Mach chon̈hachayojan̈ xol ilwebal, caw colon̈ilojan̈ yul isk'ab naj matzwalil, quexchi yin̈ hetxah, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Ta cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈, ha' Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ ch'ak'nipaxo nimanc'ulal teyin̈.
Yaj ta mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ heyet anmahil chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈, mach chak'paxo nimanc'ulal Comam Dios teyin̈, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hayet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios, mach bisc'ulalo cheyute hesat haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal, yuto ebnaj tu' caw bisc'ulal chute ebnaj sat yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma tato ayco ebnaj yin̈ yet mach chon̈wahi yu cotxahli tet Comam Dios. Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet chischahna ebnaj ispaj selel yet chiillax ebnaj yu anma tu'.
Walex ti' xin, yet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios, chetx'ahwe hesat cat hex'inito xil hewi',
yun̈e mach chalilo isba tato ayexico yin̈ yet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios. Wal xin han̈c'an̈e Comam ewan yehi, ha' chiilni tzet cheyu cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --Mach chetenba hek'alomal sat tx'o tx'otx' ti', yuto chioc no' ih yeta'toj, cat xin yocpaxo isk'uxewal. Macato chul ebnaj elk'om yin̈ cat yinito ebnaj.
Wal xin ha' hune' cheyute, tenbawe hek'alomal yul satcan̈ bay machi no' ih chietantoj, bay mach chiocpaxo isk'uxewal, yeb bay mach chiapni ebnaj elk'om yin̈.
Yuxin ha' bay ay hek'alomal ha' tu' cheyapaxico heyanma, ẍi Comam.
Isbak' cosat cantil yehico yin̈ conimanil, yuxin ta han̈c'an̈e isc'ulal choche yila' hesat tu', sunil henimanil ayco yin̈ sajilk'inal.
Yaja' ta yin̈n̈e istx'ojal ayco hemujlubal; sunil henimanil ayco yin̈ k'ejholo. Ta hune' issajilk'inal ayco teyin̈ tu' chimeltzoco yin̈ k'ejholohal, chexcancano xol k'ejholo, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --Machi hunu mac chu yoc chejabo tet cawan̈ patr'on, yuto ta chisyije naj tzet chal naj babel, chisman̈c'o naj tzet chal naj iscab. Yeb xin tato xahan chil naj naj babel, chisyah naj naj iscab. Hac tu' heye hex ti', mach chu heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios tato ec'bal cheyaco heyanma yin̈ k'alomal, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Yuxin chiwalan teyet, mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chelo, yeb yin̈ tzet chu yoc xil hek'ap yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Ta chak' Comam Dios cocawil, ¿ha' tom xin tzet chicolo mach chak' Comam, heyalni? Ta ha' Comam ak'n̈e conimanil, ¿ha' tom xil cok'ap mach chak' Comam?

Ilwec'anab no' ch'ic chiec' satcan̈, machi yawal no' chacoj, mach chihatx'wi no', machipaxo isc'un̈a no', yaja' xin chiak'lax tzet chislo no' yu Comam ay yul satcan̈. ¡Hajxamex to caw ec'bal heyelapno sata no'!
¿Aymi hunujex ti' yu caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yuxin chu heyanico hanic'oxa yak'bil hak'inal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'?
¿Tzet yin̈ xin caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc xil hek'ap? Ilwec'anab te' caj chich'ib xol k'ebtaj, mach chimunla te', mach chichemlipaxo te',
yaja' chiwalan teyet, naj rey Salom'on yet payat mach apni isk'aptzen isba naj haca' isc'ulch'anil te'.

Walca caw c'ulch'an jilni isxumaquil te' tinan̈, yaja' yet hecal cabe chin̈uslaxto te' yul horno. Ta chak' Comam isc'ulch'anil te' caj tu', ¿ha' tom xin xil hek'ap mach chak' Comam? Hex ti' caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios.
Yuxin mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul cheyalni haca' ti': ¿Baytaxca chitit tzet chicolo yeb xil cok'ap?
Yuto ha' anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios chianico huntek'an tu' yin̈ isc'ul. Yaja' wal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈, yohtaxa Comam tato chiocnico huntek'an tu' heyu.
Wal xin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hesaynilo Comam Dios babel cat heyijen tzet chala, walpaxo tzet chiocnico heyu yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xatic'a yak'a' Comam Dios teyet.
Mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu yec' heyu yet hecal, yuto yet hecal tu' nanto tzet cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet cheyu, yuto masan ay isya'tajil yetbi hunun tz'ayic, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Mach comono chexoc heyila' tzet ye hunu heyet anmahil, ha' xin wal mach chiocpaxo Comam Dios yila' tzet heyehi.
Yuto haca'tic'a chu heyilni tzet ye heyet anmahil, hac tu' chu quexyilnipaxo Comam. Wal xin haca'tic'a hemal cheyacoj yet cheyilni tzet yeco hunu heyet anmahil, ha'tic'a xin chexmalenpaxo yu Comam.

K'inalo tato ay hunu hawuẍtaj ayicto isk'al te' ch'im yul isbak'sat, wal hachpaxo xin patzab te' aypaxicto yul isbak' hasat. Ta mach chawilti te' patzab ayicto yul isbak' hasat tu', ¿hatoc'anab nich'an isk'alemal te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak'sat hawuẍta tu' chu hawiniltij? ¡Machoj!
¿Mataxca xin chu hawalni tet heyuẍta tu' haca' ti': "Wuẍtaj, wik'altijan hune' isk'al te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak' hasat," ta cachi? Wal hachpaxo xin k'atanicto hune' te' patzab yul isbak' hasat.
Tato hac tu' hawalni, ¡lek'ti'ach! Wal xin icanilti te' patzab ayicto yul isbak' hasat babel, lahwi tu' cat hawinilti isk'al te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak'sat hawuẍtaj.

Istzoti' Comam Dios lahan yeb huntek'an ch'en ch'en perla isbi, caw ay istohol. Yuxin mach chu jak'ni Istzoti' Comam tet hunu mac machi yelapno Comam yul sat, yuto lahan yeb metx tx'i' caw how, chitit lemna jin̈. Aypaxo mac haca' no' txitam, ton̈e chioc isxan̈a'to tzet ch'ak'lax tet, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --K'anwe tet Comam Dios cat yak'ni Comam teyet, saywej cat yilcha heyu, elojabico heyaw sat pulta cat ishajlax teyet.
Yuto ha' mac chik'anni chischah, ha' mac chisayni chiilcha yu. Ha' mac chielico yaw sat pulta chihajlax tet.
K'inalo tato chisk'an heyuninal tzet chislo teyet, ¿tom cheyak' hunu ch'en ch'en tet?
Maca tato chisk'an hunu no' cay isc'uxu', ¿tom cheyak' hunu no' laba tet?
Yaja' waxan̈ca caw tx'ojex heyohta heyak'ni isc'ulal tet heyuninal, hajxam xin Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈, ¿tom mach ch'ak' isc'ulal teyet, ta chek'ana?
Ta cheyoche c'ul chute isc'ul anma teyin̈, hex babel c'ul cheyute hec'ul yin̈ anma tu', yuto hac tu' yalni yin̈ ley yeb yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Wal ispultahil satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios, lahan haca' hunu pulta nich'anch'an sat, ha' tu' xin chexoctoj. Yuto hune' pulta yeb hune' beh caw nimajal sat, yul cambal chitohi. Caw xin niman anma chito yul hune' pulta yeb hune' beh tu'.
Wal hune' pulta yeb hune' beh nich'anch'an sat xin chon̈yito bay ay k'inale mach istan̈bal, yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac chiocto yul hune' pulta tu', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj lek'ti'wom chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios, yuto hayet chitzotel ebnaj teyet, caw c'ulch'an chute isc'ul ebnaj haca' no' me', yaja' wal yanma ebnaj xin lahan haca' no' oj chon̈c'uxnitoj.
Ixtan̈ hetxumilo tzet nabil yu ebnaj yuto ha' tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj chihalniloj. K'inalo te' uva tinan̈, ¿tom chak' te' sat te' tx'ix? Maca te' higo, ¿tom satpaxo te' tx'ix chak' te'? ¡Machoj!
Wal xin te' satnom te' c'ul, c'ul sat te' chak'a. Yaja' wal te' mach c'uluj xin machiswalil sat te' chak'a.
Te' satnom te' c'ul, ¿tom machiswalil sat te' chak'a? ¡Machoj! Yeb te te' machiswalil, ¿tom c'ul sat te' chak'a? ¡Machoj!

Yuxin ebnaj chal isba ischejabo Comam Dios, yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj ha' yin̈ chetxumiloj tzet nabil yu ebnaj. Haca' chu istzoc'laxcan̈ te te' mach c'ulo sat chak'a, chilahwi tu' xin cat isn̈uslaxto te' xol k'a k'a', hac tu' chiutelax huntek'an ebnaj tu', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Mach sunilo mac chihalni: "Mamin, Mamin," win̈an, chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, wal xin han̈e mac chiyijen tzet chal Inmaman ay yul satcan̈.

Hayet chiapni islahobal tz'ayic hantan̈e mac chihalni haca' ti': "Mamin, Mamin, han̈on̈ti'an̈ con̈ec'an̈ jala'an̈ hatzoti' tet anma. Jinipaxilojan̈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yin̈ habi, yeb xin tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule coyehan̈ tet anma," ẍi anma yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu'.
Yaja' chintak'wihan tet haca' ti': "Mach quexwohtajojan, hitzan̈welo yin̈ insatan. Hex ti' istx'ojaln̈etic'a hewatx'e," quinchin̈etic'ahan, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Mac chiaben Intzoti'an cat isyijeni, lahan yeb hune' naj caw ay yitz'atil iswi', yuto hayet yanican̈ naj yatut, yiban̈ ch'en ch'en yayto naj isxe'al te'.
Lahwi tu' xin istit hune' niman jak'ek' n̈ab, isnohcan̈ ha ha', ismak'nico isba ha' yin̈ te' n̈a tu', yaja' xin mach ayc'ay te', yuto caw c'ul yehayto xe' te' yiban̈ ch'en ch'en.
Yaja' wal mac chiaben Intzoti'an, machi xin chisyije tzet chala, lahan yeb hune' naj mach isnabal, yiban̈ arena yayo xe' yatut.
Lahwi tu', yak'ni hune' niman jak'ek' n̈ab, isch'ibcan̈ ha ha', ismak'nico isba ha' yin̈ te' yayc'ay te', yuchc'acanto te', ẍi Comam.
Hayet lahwi istzotel Comam Jes'us tu' xin, caw sunil anma c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul yaben iscuywa Comam,
yu caw ay yip Comam iscuywahi, mach haca'o chu iscuywa ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es.
Yet ispaxayti Comam Jes'us iswi' hune' won̈an tu', caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam.

Yelilo hune' naj yul beh, ayco hune' yabil chiyij lepra yin̈. Ishitzico naj isc'atan̈ Comam, yay jahno naj sata Comam, yalni naj: --Mamin, ta chawoche chu hawinilo hune' yabil ti' win̈an, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ naj, yalni Comam: --Ho', chiwochehan ta chiel hune' yabil ti' tawin̈, ẍi Comam. Yin̈n̈ena xin yel hune' yabil tu' yin̈ naj.

Lahwi tu', yalni Comam tet naj: --Machi mac tet chawalic'o hune' ti', wal xin as ye haba tet naj sacerdote, cat hawak'ni haxahanbal haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es, yun̈e yohtan̈encanilo anma tato xaelcano hune' yabil ti' tawin̈, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Hayet yoc apno Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Capernaum, yapni hune' naj capit'an romano isc'atan̈ Comam, isk'anni naj ta chak' cawxo Comam hune' ischejab naj.
Yalni naj tet Comam: --Mamin, ay hune' inchejaban caw ya'ay, mach chibili isnimanil, caw xin ch'ec'ya' yanma naj yu hune' yabil tu', ẍi naj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --C'ultic'a, chintohan wak'a' cawxojan naj, ẍi Comam.
Istak'wi naj capit'an tu' tet Comam: --Mamin, caw mach chu hawapni yul watutan chiwabehan yuto caw matzet welapnojan. Wal xin ton̈e chachtzotelnato yin̈ hacn̈e ti' cat iscawxican̈ inchejabtu'an.

Wohtajan hune' ti', yuto haninti'an ayinictojan yalan̈ ischejbanil ebnaj wahawan, aypaxo xin ebnaj soldado ayico yalan̈ wipan. Ta chiwalan tet hunu naj: "Asi' bey tu'," ta quinchiyan, cat isto naj. Taca chiwalan tet hunuxa naj: "Cata," ta quinchiyan, cat istit naj. Yebpaxo xin ta chiwalan tet hunuxa naj inchejaban: "Watx'e hune' tilah," ta quinchiyan, cat yoc naj iswatx'enoj, ẍi naj.

Hayet yaben Comam yalni naj haca' tu', caw c'ayilo isc'ul Comam, yalni Comam tet anma tzujanico yinta tu': --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, maẍto hunu mac chiwilan yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yul con̈ob Israel haca' hune' naj ti'.
Wal xin chiwalan teyet, chitit anma bay chiahilo tz'ayic, yeb bay chito tz'ayic cat iscutxbanico isba yeb naj Abraham, naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob sat ismeẍa Comam Dios bey satcan̈.
Ha' anma Israel yettic'a ay yoc sat hune' meẍa tu', yaj ay ebnaj chicancano yintajilo xol k'ejholo. Ha' bey tu' xin ch'oc ok'oj cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'tajil, ẍi Comam tet anma.

Lahwi tu' xin, yalni Comam tet naj capit'an: --Paxan̈to hawatut, yubojab haca' chawoche yuto maxawayto yul hawanma win̈an, ẍi Comam tet naj. Yin̈tic'a hune' orahil tu' xin cawxican̈ ischejab naj capit'an.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us yatut naj Pedro. Yet yapni Comam yilni tato hilanto ismi' yixal naj Pedro tu' sat tx'at yu hune' niman k'a'.
Yoc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab ixnam, yelna hune' k'a' tu' yin̈ ixnam, iscawxican̈ ixnam. Lahwi tu' yahwano ixnam, yoc ixnam iswatx'eno tzet chislo Comam.

Hayet lan̈anxa yay numnahi caw hantan̈e anma ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ ilaxto isc'atan̈ Comam. Caw xin hune'n̈ech'an tzoti' chal Comam cat yel ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma. Yak'nipaxo cawxo Comam anma ya'ay.

Yin̈ huntek'an iswatx'e Comam tu' yijcano isba tzet halbilcano yu naj Isa'ias, hune' ischejab Comam yet payat, yet yalni naj haca' ti': "Yiban̈ naj chitocano yabil ayco jin̈, cat xin yabenpaxo isya'il coseleloj," ẍi naj Isa'ias tu'.
Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us tato caw hantan̈e anma hoyanico yin̈, yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tato chiec'to ebnaj yeb Comam isk'axepic'to ha' lago.

Yaja' yet yalan̈to maẍto chito Comam yeb ebnaj, ishitzico hune' naj chicuywa yin̈ isley naj Mois'es isc'atan̈ Comam, yalni naj: --Mam cuywawom, chinoc tzujnojan tawintaj bajxan̈etu'wal chachtohi, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --No' wech ay isn̈ach'en no' bay chiwayi, yebpaxo no' ch'ic ay yatut no'. Yaja' Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, machi watutan bay chinxewninojan, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo hune'xa naj iscuywom Comam: --Mamin, chinoc tzujnojan tawintaj, yaj estam chawak' inhamanilan chito inmujcano inmaman babel, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Wal xin ocan̈ tzujno wintajan yuto ha' mac camom yul sat Comam Dios, ha' chimujni yet camomal, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yocto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul hune' te' barco.
Hayet lan̈an yec'to Comam yeb ebnaj yiban̈ ha ha' tu' xin, yichico yec' hune' niman jak'ek' caw how. Toxan̈e chitiẍla yah ha ha' tu' yin̈ te' barco, wal Comam Jes'us xin wayo chu yul te'.
Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu', yoc ebnaj yinolo iswayan̈ Comam, yalni ebnaj: --¡Mamin colon̈an̈, yuto lan̈an coto yich ha'! ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin caw chexxiwi? ¡Caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios! ẍi Comam tet ebnaj. Lahwi tu' xin yahwano Comam, iscachni Comam jak'ek' yeb ha ha'. Hac tu' yu islin̈ban isbili ha ha' tu' yeb jak'ek', ispaxtz'in̈nahi.
Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu', caw c'aycanilo isc'ul ebnaj, yalni ebnaj tet hunun: --¿Mac anmahil hune' ya' ti' yuxin chisyije jak'ek' yeb ha ha' tzet chal ya'? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.

Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom isk'axepic'to ha' lago bey hune' tx'otx' chiyij Gadara, yapni cawan̈ ebnaj ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ isc'atan̈ Comam; ispeto ebnaj yul camposanto. Ebnaj cawan̈ tu' caw chixiw anma tet ebnaj yuto caw aycano yip ebnaj. Caw xin machi hunu mac chiec' bay ay ebnaj tu'.
Yah yaw ebnaj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip: --¿Tzet hawoc jin̈an̈ hach Jes'us Isc'ahol Dios? ¿Tom chachhul hawak'a' ec'oya' janmahan̈ yalan̈to maẍto chiapni istiempohal? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Iscawilal tu', ay huntek'an no' txitam lan̈an istan̈elaxi,
yuxin isk'an ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil tu' tet Comam haca' ti': --Tato chon̈hawilojan̈ yin̈ ebnaj ti', chicok'anan̈ tawet, chejon̈tojan̈ yin̈ no' txitam tu' lah, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam: --C'ultic'a, asi'wej, ẍi Comam. Hac tu' xin yu yel ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu', istocano ebnaj yin̈ no' txitam. Lahwi tu' xin yelcan̈ no' txitam tu', isk'ojnito isba no' sat pahaw, yay apno no' xol ha ha', ishik'nito no' ha'.
Wal ebnaj tan̈em txitam xin elcan̈ ebnaj. Hayet yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob yalni ebnaj tet anma yin̈ tzet yu ebnaj cawan̈ bay aytic'aco ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil.
Yuxin sunil anma yul con̈ob tu' to ilno Comam. Hayet yapni anma isc'atan̈ Comam tu' xin, yoc anma isk'anno tet Comam tato chiel Comam yul ismajul istx'otx' ebnaj tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin yocto Comam Jes'us yul te' barco, ismeltzoti Comam isk'axepxac'ti ha' lago tu', yapni Comam yul iscon̈ob.

Yilaxto hune' naj mach chibili isnimanil isc'atan̈ Comam sat batxte'. Hayet yilni Comam xin tato caw ayco yanma ebnaj initi naj tu' yin̈ Comam, yalni Comam tet naj ya'ay tu': --Hach wet anmahil aco yip hawanma, tinan̈ chiak'laxcano nimanc'ulal yin̈ hamul, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, istxum haca' ti': "Hune' naj ti' caw tx'oj istzotel naj yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto chaco isba naj Diosal," ẍi ebnaj yul yet ischuquil.
Wal Comam xin, yohta tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj, yuxin yal Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin caw tx'oj chiec' yin̈ henabal?
¿Baytet subuta walnihan heyalni, tom "ch'ak'lax nimanc'ulal yin̈ hamul," mato "ahan̈wanoj cat hapaxtoj?".

Tinan̈ xin chinyehan heyila' tato Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ay wipan wak'nihan nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi Comam. Yalni Comam tet naj ya'ay tu': --Ahan̈wanoj, ican̈ habatxte' ti' cat hapaxto hawatut, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin yahwano naj, ispaxto naj yatut.
Hayet yilni anma hune' tu' caw xiwcanocan̈, yoc anma yak'no tzalaho isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto caw tx'i'al yip Comam isye tet anma.

Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us. Hayet yec'to Comam xin, yilni Comam hune' naj ik'omilo tohlabal, Mateo isbi. Tz'on̈anayo naj bay chiel ch'en tohlabal chialaxto bey Roma. Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj: --Ocan̈ tzujno wintajan incuywomojan, ẍi Comam. Hayet yaben naj hune' tu', yahwano naj, yoc tzujno naj yinta Comam.
Lahwi tu' yawtelax Comam wa'o yu naj yul yatut, yoc Comam sat meẍa yeb ebnaj iscuywom, yebpaxo xin huntek'anxa ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal, yeb huntek'an anma tx'oj isbeybal.
Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu', yalni ebnaj tet ebnaj iscuywom Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chiwa' naj hecuywawom ti' xol ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal, yeb xol ebnaj tx'oj isbeybal? ẍi ebnaj.
Hayet yaben Comam hune' tu' xin, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Ha' anma mach ya'o ay, matzet chiocnico naj an̈lom yu, to ha' anma ya'ay ha' chiocnico naj an̈lom yu.

Yuxin chiwalan teyet, saywe yul Yum Comam Dios cat hetxumni yin̈ bay chal haca' ti': "Ha' hune' chiwochehan ta chitz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil, maẍn̈etaj heyak'ni hexahanbal wetan," ẍiayoj. Mach hulnajojinan wawte'an anma chalni ta c'ul yecoj, ¡machoj! Walxinto yu anma chistxumu ta mulum, yuxin hulnajinan, yun̈e isbejnicano yanico ismul, ẍi Comam.

Yet hunel apni ebnaj ischejab naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us, isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yeb ebnaj fariseo caw chicoyijehan̈ hune' yet mach chon̈wa' cotxahli. Walpaxo ebnaj hacuywom xin, ¿tzet yin̈ xin mach chisyije ebnaj hune' tu'? ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --K'inalo tato ay hunu mohyilal tinan̈, aypaxo xin anma awtebil yin̈ mohyilal tu'. ¿Tom xin chioc anma tu' yijle wahil yet ayc'o naj mohyom tu'? ¡Machoj! Wal xin hato yet chiapni istiempohal yilaxilo naj mohyom tu' xol anma, catto yoc anma yin̈ yijlen wahil, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Mach chu yalaxico hunu k'ap k'ap ac'to isbujilo huno xilk'ape xilxa, yuto hayet chitx'ahlax k'ap, chimoq'ui k'ap ac' ayco isbujilo k'ap xilxa tu', cat xin istzilmocanto hune' xilk'ape tu'.

Hacpax tu' xin, mach chu yalaxayto ac' vino yul no' tz'um xilxa yuto chilin̈mo no' cat ismalto vino tu', cat yetaxpaxcanto no' tz'um tu'. Wal xin yul no' tz'um ac'to chialaxayto ac' vino, hac tu' xin mach chietaxto te' vino yeb no' tz'um, ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom naj Juan.

Hayet lan̈an yalni Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile tu', yapni hune' naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel isc'atan̈ Comam, yalni naj tet Comam: --Mamin, ay hune' nich'an incutz'inan lan̈anto iscamayoj, yaj ta chachto wintajan cat hawanayo hak'ab yiban̈ ix, chihulcan̈ isc'ul ix, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Lahwi tu' yah lin̈no Comam, isto yinta naj yeb ebnaj iscuywom.
Xol anma tzujan yinta Comam tu' xin, ay hune' ix ya'ay, cablahon̈ebxa habil mach chilin̈i yay istx'ahwobal ix. Yuxin hitzico ix isc'atan̈ Comam, ispitni ix isti' xil isk'ap Comam,
yuto istxum ix haca' ti': "Walca han̈e isti' xil isk'ap Comam chinpitan cat incawxocan̈an," ẍi ix.

Wal Comam xin, ismeltzo isba Comam, yoc t'an̈no Comam yin̈ ix, yalni Comam haca' ti': --Aco yip hawanma miyay. Macachcawxican̈ tinan̈ yuto maxawaco hawanma win̈an, ẍi Comam tet ix. Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin iscawxican̈ ix.

Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us bey yatut naj yahawil ebnaj Israel tu' xin, yilni Comam tato ayxac'o ebnaj chianico te' su' yin̈ ismujubal ix nich'an iscutz'in naj Jairo tu', yebpaxo xin wejanxan̈e anma yok'i.
Hayet yilni Comam hune' tu', yalni Comam tet anma: --Elan̈wetoj, ix nich'an ti' mach camnajo ix, ton̈e chiway ix, ẍi Comam. Wal anma tu' xin oc tzebo yin̈ tzet yal Comam.
Lahwi ischejni Comam eloti sunil anma yul n̈a, yocto Comam isc'atan̈ ix nich'an tu'. Yoc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab ix, yahwano ix.
Sunil anma ay yul ismajul hune' con̈ob tu', abenilo tzet yuhi.
Yet yel Comam bey tu', ay cawan̈ ebnaj mach chu yilni oc tzujno yinta Comam. Chi-xin-awito ebnaj tet Comam haca' ti': --Mamin, isc'ahol jichmam David, tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈, ẍi ebnaj.

Hayet yapni Comam yul n̈a, yocpaxto ebnaj yul n̈a yinta Comam, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Chimheyayto yul heyanma tato chu wak'ni hajlojan hesat? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj tet Comam: --Ho' Mamin, chijaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Yanico Comam isk'ab yin̈ isbak'sat ebnaj, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Yubojab haca' cheyoche yuto maxeyaco heyanma win̈an, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Hac tu' xin yu ishajlo isbak'sat ebnaj, yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj: --Tinan̈ xin, machi mac tet cheyalic'o hune' ti', ẍi Comam.
Yaja' haniq'uixto chito ebnaj, yichico ebnaj yalni tet anma yin̈ tzet yu ishajlo isbak'sat ebnaj.

Hayet caw lan̈an ispaxto ebnaj hajlo isbak'sat yu Comam Jes'us tu', yapni huntek'an ebnaj yak'nocano hune' naj isc'atan̈ Comam. Hune' naj tu' mach chu istzotel naj yuto ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj.

Hayet ischejnilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj, yichico naj istzoteli. Wal anma ilni hune' tu' xin caw c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul. Yalni anma haca' ti': --Maẍto hunelo chijil yuni yul con̈ob Israel haca' hune' ti', ẍi anma.
Wal ebnaj fariseo xin yal ebnaj haca' ti': --Hune' naj ti' ch'ilo naj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yu yip naj matzwalil, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.

Caw sunil yulajla con̈ob yeb yulajla aldea bay ec' Comam Jes'us, iscuyni Comam anma yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel yul hunu con̈ob tu'. Yalnic'o Comam yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yak'ni cawxo Comam anma tzijxan̈e yabilal ayco yin̈.
Hayet yilnico Comam yin̈ anma xin caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul yin̈ anma tu', yuto bejbilcanoj, mach chitxumcha yu tzet wal yuten isba. Haca' no' me' machi mac chitan̈eni, hac tu' ye anma.
Yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom: --Huntek'an anma ti' lahan haca' ixim trigo lan̈an isk'anbiloj. Caw hantan̈e munil, yaja' haywan̈n̈e ebnaj munlawom.
Yuxin k'anwe tet Comam Dios yahaw munil, haxinwal chati Comam ismunlawom xol anma, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu', iscutxbanico Comam Jes'us ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom, yak'ni Comam yip ebnaj yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma, yebpaxo xin yu yak'ni cawxo ebnaj anma ya'ay, yeb yu yinilo ebnaj tzettaj ya' yu anma.
Hac ti' xin isbi ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ischejab Comam haca' ti': Naj Sim'on chiyijpaxo Pedro, naj Andr'es yuẍta naj Sim'on, naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan, ebnaj cawan̈ ti' isc'ahol icham Zebedeo ye ebnaj.
Naj Felipe, naj Bartolom'e, naj Tom'as, naj Mateo, naj chitic'a inilo ch'en tohlabal chito bey Roma, naj Jacobo isc'ahol icham Alfeo, naj Tadeo.
Yebpaxo xin naj Sim'on, aytic'aco yin̈ hune' partido chiyij cananista, yeb naj Judas Iscariote, naj anico Comam yul isk'ab camical.

Ha' ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ti' ischejto Comam Jes'us, yalni Comam ischejbanil ebnaj haca' ti': --Mach chexec' yulaj iscon̈ob anma mach Israeloj, yebpaxo xin mach chexec' yulajla con̈ob ay yul ismajul Samaria.
Cachann̈e xol jet con̈ob Israel chextohi, yuto lahan anma haca' no' me' chic'ayic'oj.
Asi'we xin, cat heyalni tet anma tato Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ yocxa yahawo yin̈ anma.

Ak'we cawxo anma ya'ay, ta ay mac chicami cheyak' hulucan̈ isc'ul, ta ay mac ayco lepra yin̈ cheyak' cawxoj, cat heyinipaxilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma. Hune' heyip chiwak'ti'an matanil chechah, yuxin mach chek'an hetohol yet cheyak'ni cawxo anma.
Yin̈ hebel tu' xin matzet cheyitoj; mach cheyito hemelyu, nitam hunu centavo,
mach cheyipaxto hetz'ispa, yeb hehelbal, mach cheyipaxto ishelbal hexan̈ab, yebpaxo xin mach cheyik' hek'ojoch. Chiwalan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto naj munlawom chiak'lax tzet chislo naj yin̈ ismunil.
Hayet chexapni yul hunu con̈ob maca yul hunu aldea chesay mac c'ulch'an isc'ul, ha' tu' xin chexcani masanto yet chexmeltzohi.
Yet chexapni bey te' n̈a bay chexcancano tu', cheyal tet anma tu' haca' ti': "Ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol," quexchi.
Ta choche mac ay yul hune' n̈a tu' ak'anc'ulal, chiak'lax ak'anc'ulal tu' tet, taca mach choche xin, mach chiak'lax tet.
Yaja' tato mach chexchahlaxi, yeb xin mach chiabelax tzet cheyala, chexel yatut anma tu' maca yul hune' con̈ob tu', cat xin hetzicnilo pojoj yin̈ heyoj yun̈e heyeniloj tato matxa heyoc yin̈ anma tu'.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet chilni Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma tu', caw ec'balto isya'tajil chischah sata anma ay bey con̈ob Sodoma yeb con̈ob Gomorra, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom tu': --Chexinchejtojan xol anma haca' no' me' chito xol no' oj. Yuxin helan cheyute heba haca' no' laba, yaja' huncuentan̈e cheyute hec'ul haca' no' cuwis.
Caw cheyil heba, yuto chexilaxto sata ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' yul con̈ob. Chexmak'lax yulajla capilla.
Chexalaxico sata ebnaj gobernador, maca sat ebnaj nimeta yahaw, yuto ayexico yul ink'aban. Hac tu' chu quinheyak'nihan yohtan̈elo ebnaj, yeb tet anma mach Israeloj.
Hayet chexalaxico sata ebnaj yahaw tu', mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu hetzoteli, yuto ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni hehelanil hetzoteli.
Wal xin maẍtajex chextzoteli, to ha' Yesp'iritu Comam chitzotel teyin̈.

Yet chihul hune' tiempohal tu' ay ebnaj chianico yuẍta yul isk'ab camical, aypaxo ebnaj mame chianico isc'ahol yul isk'ab camical, aypaxo xin ebnaj c'ahole chianico howal yin̈ ismam cat ispotx'ni camo ebnaj ismam.
Sunil anma chichiwa isc'ul teyin̈ yuto ayexxaco yul ink'aban, yaja' wal mac chitecha yu masanto yet islahobal, chicolchahi.

Hayet chextzumbelaxilo yul hunu con̈ob, chexel bey tu' cat heto yul hunuxa con̈ob, yuto yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet; maẍtotic'a chilahwi heyec' yul sunil con̈ob Israel ti' cat wul lemnahan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios.
Machi hunu naj lan̈an iscuylaxi chipalc'onnacan̈ yiban̈ naj chicuyni tu', yeb xin machi hunu naj chejab chipalc'onnacan̈ yiban̈ ispatr'on.

Yaja' tato ay hunu naj chicuywi tu' chiapni yitz'atil iswi' haca' naj cuywawom tu', caw c'ul hune' tu', yeb xin tato ay hunu naj chejab chiapni islahann̈e isba yeb ispatr'on, c'ulpaxo hune' tu'. Ta chinhallaxan Beelzeb'u, naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil, hajexxampaxoj, ¿tzet mach hallaxo teyin̈? ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Mach chexxiw tet anma, yuto machi hunu tzet ye tu' ewan mach chiel yen̈el, yeb xin machi hunu tzet chihallax yin̈ ewantajil mach chiabchaloj.
Sunil tzet chiwalan teyet yin̈ ewantajil tinan̈, pujbawec'o tet anma. Yeb huntek'an ton̈e chinsahan yul hetxiquin, halwec'o yin̈ caw ip yulaj calle.

Mach chexxiw tet ebnaj chipotx'ni henimanil, yuto wal heyanma mach chik'oji ebnaj ispotx'ni. Wal xin han̈e tet Comam Dios bay wal hexiwi, yuto chu yanito Comam henimanil yeb heyanma xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal.
Chisje hetxumni yin̈ no' niẍte ch'ic tinan̈, cac'on̈ no' chitxon̈lax yin̈ centavo. Yaja' machi hunu no' chicami tato maẍtaj Comam ay yul satcan̈ chihalni.
Hajxam hex ti' to caw ec'bal heyelapno sata no' niẍte ch'ic tu', caw bisbil xil hewi' yin̈ hununtajil yu Comam. Yuxin chiwalan teyet, mach chexxiwi, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Ha' mac mach chitx'ixwi yalni yin̈ sat anma tato wetxahan yehi, haquintu'an mach chintx'ixwihan walnihan tet Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tato wetan yehi.
Yaja' wal mac chihalni yin̈ sat anma tato mach wetojan yehi, chiwalpaxojan yin̈ sat Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tato mach wetojan yehi, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Tajca chetxumu tato hulnajinan yu wanicojan ak'anc'ulal xol anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', machoj, walxinto yu yak'lencan̈ howal win̈an.
Quinhulan yu yak'nican̈ howal naj c'ahole yeb ismam, ix unine chioc ix howal yin̈ ismi', ix alibe chioc ix howal yin̈ ixnam alibe,
yuxin xoltic'a mac ayto yu isba chiah howal.
Mac ec'bal chaco yanma yin̈ ismam maca ismi' insatajan, mach istzano yoc wetojan, yeb xin ha' mac ec'bal ayco yanma yin̈ isc'ahol maca iscutz'in insatajan, mach istzano yoc yul ink'aban.
Ha' mac hinan yak'len isya'tajil win̈an, waxan̈ca chiak'lax camo yin̈ culus, ha' chu yoc wetojan.
Ha' mac ec'bal chisya'iln̈e isba insatajan, chic'aytoj, mach chik' isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Wal mac hinan iscam win̈an xin chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Ha' mac chexchahni, haninan chinischahan, ha' mac chinchahnihan chischah Mac an̈eintijan.

Ha' mac chichahni hunu ischejab Comam Dios, lahan ismatan chischah haca' ischejab Comam tu'. Mac chichahni hunu mac isc'ulaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e, lahan ispaj chischah yeb mac isc'ulaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e tu'.
Haxa mac chiak'ni hunu vaso chewala' tet hunu incuywoman, waxan̈ca caw comon jilni, yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, hune' mac tu' chischah ispaj selel tet Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us ischejbanil ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom, isto Comam cuywal; yec' Comam yalnoc'o Istzoti' Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob ayco yin̈ ishoyanil bay ay Comam.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' ayicto naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma yul preso. Yabe naj isk'umal yin̈ tzettaj chiswatx'e Comam Cristo. Ischejnito naj cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom
isk'ambeno tet Comam: --¿Ham hach ti' Cristo echmabil yul juhan̈, mato chijechmahan̈ yul hunuxa naj? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --As halwe tet naj Juan tu' yin̈ sunil tzet maxeyabe yeb yin̈ tzet maxeyila.

Halwe tet naj tato ha' mac maẍtic'a chu yilni hajlocanocan̈ sat, haxa mac maẍtic'a chu yeq'ui, belwican̈. Ha' mac ayco lepra yin̈ xin an̈chacanoj, ha' mac maẍtic'a chabe, hajlo istxiquin. Aypaxo camom hulcan̈ isc'ul, cat xin yallaxpaxo Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma machi bay chicawxi isc'ul.
¡Sak'al yet mac mach chicabcon yanma win̈an! quexchi, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Hayet lahwi ispaxto ebnaj xin, yichico Comam yalni tet anma yin̈ tzet yelapno ye naj Juan, yalni Comam haca' ti': --Nawetij tzet quexbey heyila' bey tx'otx' desierto, ¿tom ha' hune' te' ah ch'ec' k'elah yu jak'ek'?
¿Mato hunu naj caw nanxa yoc xil isk'ap ayco quexbey heyila'? ¡Machoj! Yuto ebnaj caw nanxa islow yehico xil isk'ap yuln̈e yatut ebnaj rey ay ebnaj.

¿Mac quexbey heyila'? Wal xin hune' ischejab Comam Dios quexbey heyila'. Yin̈ caw yeli hune' ischejab Comam Dios quexbey heyila' tu' caw ec'balto yelapno ye ismunil naj sata ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat.
Yin̈ naj Juan tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti': Haninan chinchejtojan inchejaban babel tasataj, yun̈e iswatx'en habeh yalan̈to maẍto chachapni, ẍiayoj.

Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, xol sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' machi hunu mac ec'bal yelapno yiban̈ naj Juan tu'. Yaja' wal mac chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios xin waxan̈ca caw comonn̈e yeq'ui, ec'bal sak'al yet sata naj Juan.

Yet taxtic'a yichiti naj Juan tu' yanican̈ ha' iswi' anma masanta tinan̈, yin̈ isya'tajil choc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yaja' han̈c'an̈e mac chihti yanma yin̈, ha' chitzujcha apno yu yoc yul isk'ab Comam.
Sunil tzet yal ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat yeb sunil tzet yal isley naj Mois'es yalan̈to maẍto chiichico ismunil naj Juan, ton̈e bina yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Ta cheyoche cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an, txumchaojabilo heyu tato ha' naj Juan tu', ha' naj haca' naj El'ias echmabil yul heyu.
Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj.
Anma ay yul hune' tiempohal ti', c'ul inlahbanan yeb niẍte unin chiay tz'on̈no yul txon̈bal cat issajchi, cat yahwi tet niẍte yet uninal, chalni:
"Naban̈e jeta cobahan̈ jok'tzenan̈ te' su', yuto mach quexcan̈alwi. Naban̈e jacojan̈ bit caw bisc'ulal yoqui, yuto mach quexok'paxoj," ẍi niẍte unin tu'.
Chiwalan hune' ti', yuto yet yul naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma mach wa' naj yeb anma, yuxin hallaxi tato ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj.

Haxa Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, chinwa'an yeb anma yuxin chihallax win̈an haca' ti': "Wal naj Jes'us ti' wa'on̈etic'a chu naj yeb uc'u vinon̈etic'a chu naj, yamigo isba naj yeb ebnaj tx'oj chiswatx'e yeb ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal ch'en chito bey Roma," ẍi anma win̈an. Yaja' wal anma ayco ishelanil Comam Dios yin̈ haban isyenilo isba yin̈ tzettaj isc'ulal chi-la-iswatx'e, ẍi Comam.

Yet hunel xin oc Comam Jes'us yala' istx'ojal huntek'an con̈ob bay caw tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule xaisye Comam, yuto anma ay yul huntek'an con̈ob tu' maẍtic'a chisna isba isbejnicano iswatx'en istx'ojal, yuxin yal Comam haca' ti':

--Hex ay yul con̈ob Coraz'in c'anch'anex, yeb hex ay yul con̈ob Betsaida, c'anch'anexpaxoj, yuto ta yul con̈ob Tiro yeb con̈ob Sid'on yelax huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiyelax texol ti', payxam isbejcano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal, yamahto anma tan̈ yin̈ iswi', yeb yamico anma xil isk'ap chiyenilo bisc'ulal.

Yaja' chiwalan teyet, yet chiapni istz'ayical bay chil Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma, caw ec'balto isya'tajil chischah huntek'an anma ti' sata anma ay yul con̈ob Tiro yeb anma ay yul con̈ob Sid'on.

Haxa hex ay yul con̈ob Capernaum, ham heyalni ta chexilaxcan̈ satcan̈, machoj; wal xin chexk'ojlaxayto xol camom. Yuto ta yul con̈ob Sodoma yelax huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiyelax texol ti', isbejmicano anma yanico ismul, aytomic'o hune' con̈ob tu' tinan̈.
Yuxin chiwalan teyet yet chilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma, caw ec'balto isya'tajil chechah sata anma ah Sodoma tu', ẍi Comam.

Hayet hune' tiempohal tu' txahli Comam Jes'us, yalni Comam: --Mamin, yahawil satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx', chiwak'an yuch'andios tawet yuto haweba huntek'an ti' tet ebnaj ay ishelanil yeb tet ebnaj ay iscuyu yul sat anma, hawak'ni yohtan̈elo anma matzet yohtaj.
Mamin, hac tu' chuhi yuto hac tu' el yin̈ hac'ul, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet anma: --Sunil tzet ye tu' ayco yul ink'aban yu Inmaman. Machi hunu mac ohtan̈einan hanin C'ahole inti'an, cachann̈e Inmaman ohtan̈einan. Machi hunu mac ohtan̈e Inmaman, cachann̈e haninan quinisc'aholti'an wohtajan, cat wak'nihan Inmamtu'an yohtan̈elo tet mac bay chiwochehan.
Maquex sic'omexxa yu hemunil yeb hex xatibayo heyu yalan̈ yalil heyijatz, titan̈we inc'atan̈an, yuto haninan chexwak' xewojan.
Ijwe hune' ijatz chiwak'an heyija'. Cuywan̈we wintajan haxinwal chixew heyanma, yuto haninti'an c'ulch'an inc'ulal yeb xin ay isnimanil inc'ulan.
Hune' ijatz chiwak'an heyija' ti' mach aloj, mach ya'tajo heyijenpaxoj, ẍi Comam tet anma.

Yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal ec'to Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul hune' nich'an beh xol ixim trigo. Caw xin xan̈ohcha ebnaj yuxin oc ebnaj yik'alo iswi' ixim trigo, ischilnilo ebnaj ixim isc'uxu'.

Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu', yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Ilc'anab tzet chu ebnaj hacuywom tilah, lan̈an yinilo ebnaj iswi' ixim trigo isc'uxu'. Yaja' xin caw txahul comunla yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal, ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios yin̈ tzet yak'le naj rey David yet caw chin̈ohcha naj yeb ebnaj tzujan yintaj?
Naj David tu' octo naj yul yatut Comam Dios iswahnito naj ixim pan haltebilxa tet Comam Dios, iswahnipaxo ebnaj tzujan yinta naj tu' ixim. Wal xin han̈c'an̈e ebnaj sacerdote chu iswahni ixim.

¿Tom maẍto cheyilpaxo yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yin̈ tzet yu ebnaj sacerdote ay yul yatut Comam Dios? Ebnaj sacerdote tu' mach chixew ebnaj yin̈ tz'ayic xewilal, yaja' mach chaco ebnaj ismul yul sat Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tu'.
Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet: Haninti'an ec'bal welapnojan sata yatut Comam Dios.

Tzettam sak'al tato chitxumchalo heyu bay chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ha' hune' chiwochehan tato chitz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil, maẍn̈etaj hen̈usni no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil wetan," ẍiayoj. Ta chetxum hune' ti' mach chimcheyala tato ay ismul ebnaj, wal xin mach ismul ebnaj yin̈ hune' ti'.
Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chu walnihan yin̈ tzet cheyu yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj fariseo tu'.
Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us, yocto Comam yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel,

ha' tu' xin ayicto hune' naj camnajilo hune' isk'ab. Yun̈e yoc ebnaj fariseo ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam, yuxin isk'ambe ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Chimyu jak'ni cawxo hunu anma ya'ay yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --K'inalo ta ay hunujex chitohc'ay hunu heme' yul hunu c'uh yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal, ¿mataxca mach chexto heyik'ahti no'?
Hajxam hunu anma, to ec'balto yelapno sata no' me' tu', yuxin chisje cowatx'en hunu tzet ye tu' c'ul yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet naj camnajilo hune' isk'ab tu': --Toholban̈elto hak'ab, ẍi Comam. Hayet istoholban̈enilto naj isk'ab tu', iswatx'icanilo.
Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu' yelti ebnaj yul capilla, yoc ebnaj islahti'n̈en isba yin̈ tzet chu yak'ni camo ebnaj Comam Jes'us.
Hayet yabenilo Comam Jes'us hune' tu', isto Comam. Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam; yak'ni cawxo Comam macta ya'ay.
Yalni Comam tet anma ta mach chispujbac'o yin̈ tzet iswatx'e Comam.
Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias, ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chal haca' ti':

Ha' naj ti' inchejaban sic'bilico wuhan, caw xahan ay wuhan, caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj. Chiwacojan Wesp'irituhan yin̈ naj cat ispujbanic'o naj tetej con̈ob mach Israelo yin̈ tzet chu isbeybaln̈en istoholal.
Machi mac yeb chiah howal yu naj, machi xin caw chiel yaw naj yin̈ caw ip, machipaxo chiel yaw naj yulaj calle.

Ay anma caw c'anch'an haca' te' ah k'ahnatoj, maca haca' te' tah ton̈e chimutz'mun xaj k'a' yin̈ hac tu' yehi. Yaja' ha' naj xin chicolwa yin̈; mach chislah naj yetantoj. Hac tu' chute naj masanta chioc sunil yalan̈ istoholal yu naj.
Sunilej con̈ob chicawxi isc'ul yin̈ naj, ẍiayoj.
Yilaxto hune' naj mach chu yilni yeb mach chu istzotel yu ischejab naj matzwalil tet Comam Jes'us, yak'ni cawxo Comam naj. Hac tu' xin yu ishajlo isbak'sat naj, istzotelpaxocan̈ naj.
Sunil anma ilni hune' tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul, yalni haca' ti': --¿Ham naj ti', titna yin̈ yuninal naj rey David echmabil yul ju? ẍi anma.

Yaja' hayet yaben ebnaj fariseo yalni anma hune' tu', yalni ebnaj: --Hune' naj ti' chilo naj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma, yaj yu ayco yip naj Beelzeb'u, naj yahawil ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj, ẍi ebnaj.

Wal Comam yohtaxa tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj, yuxin yal Comam: --K'inalo ta chispoh isba anma yul hunu niman con̈ob, hune' con̈ob tu' yin̈ an̈emi chipax yip. Maca ta hunu con̈ob maca hunu n̈ahil anma chispoh isba cat yanico howal yin̈ hunun, caw yin̈ an̈emi chitan̈iloj.
Hac tu' ye naj matzwalil, ta chaco naj howal yin̈ yet matzwalilal, yin̈tic'a naj chaco howal. ¿Tzet xin chu yik'ni yip naj yin̈ haca' tu'?

Hex ti' cheyala tato yu naj yahawil ebnaj matzwalil yuxin chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma. Ta hac tu', ¿mac xin chiak'ni yip ebnaj tzujan yin̈ hecuybanil yet chinilo ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma? Yuxin ha' ebnaj tu' chiyenilo teyet tato mach c'ulo tzet cheyal win̈an.
Yaja' ta yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma, ha' chalniloj tato ayxac'o yip Comam Dios texol.
K'inalo hunu naj yahaw n̈a caw ay yip, machi hunu mac chu yocto yul yatut naj cat yelk'anilto tzet ay naj. Yaja' ta chic'albalax naj, wal tu' chu yilaxilo tzet ay naj.
Ha' mac mach ayoco wetbihojan ayco ishowal win̈an. Ha' mac mach chicolwa yanico anma yul ink'aban, ha' istzumbenilo anma tu' ha' chu.

Yuxin chiwalan teyet, tzijxan̈e istx'ojal yeb ismul anma chacoj, ay nimanc'ulal yin̈ yu Comam Dios. Yaja' tato ay hunu mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo, hune' mac tu' matxa bak'inal ay nimanc'ulal yin̈.

Tato ay hunu mac tx'oj istzotel win̈an, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ayto nimanc'ulal yin̈. Wal mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo matxa nimanc'ulal yin̈, yin̈ hune' cotiempohal ti' yeb yin̈ hune' chihul cosataj, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --K'inalo hunu te te' c'ul, c'ul sat te' chak'a, wal te' machiswalil, mach c'ulo sat te' chak'a. Yuxin yin̈ sat te te' chicotxumu tzet te'al te'.
Hex ti' lahanex yeb no' laba, caw tx'ojex. ¿Tzet chu heyalni tzoti' c'ul tato tx'oj ayayto yul heyanma? Wal xin ha' tzet ayayto yul heyanma ha' chal heti'.
Ha' mac isc'ulal ayayto yul yanma, c'ul tzoti' chala, haxa' mac istx'ojal ayayto yul yanma, ha' istx'ojal chala.
Yaja' chiwalan teyet, yet chilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma, sunil mac chiilchahoti yin̈ tzettaj tzoti'al chielti yul isti', waxan̈ca comon tzoti'.
Hatatic'a haca' hetzoteli hac tu' chu yilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chexelicoj, ta ay hemul maca machi hemul yin̈ tzet cheyala, ẍi Comam.
Yet hunel tu', ay huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb ebnaj fariseo halni tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom chijochehan̈ chaye hunu c'aybalc'ule jila'an̈, ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Hex ayex yul hune' tiempohal ti' caw tx'ojexcanoj, caw man̈c'omex tet Comam Dios. Chek'an c'aybalc'ule heyila', hune' chiyenilo ishelanil yip Comam Dios. Yaja' hune'n̈e c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax heyila', ha' ton hune' haca' tzet yak'le hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat chiyij Jon'as, ha' chiak'lax heyila'.

Naj Jon'as tu' oxeb tz'ayic yeb oxeb ak'bal ayayto naj yul isc'ul hune' no' niman cay. Haca' yak'le naj tu', hac tu' chiwak'lehan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios. Oxeb tz'ayic yeb oxeb ak'bal chinmujihan yul tx'otx'.

Yet isbey naj Jon'as tu' yalno Istzoti' Comam Dios tet anma ay yul con̈ob N'inive isbejnicano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal. Wal tzet chiwalti'an ec'balto yelapno sata tzet yal naj Jon'as tu', yaja' mach chebejcano hetx'ojal. Yuxin hayet islahobal tz'ayic ha' hune' con̈obal anma ah N'inive tu' ha' chihalnilo hemul.

Hacpax tu' yu ix reina ay yul ismajul tx'otx' Sab'a, waxan̈ca caw nahat ay ix yaja' masan hul ix yabe yitz'atil iswi' naj rey Salom'on. Yaja' wal haninti'an ec'bal welapnojan sata naj rey Salom'on tu', yaja' mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chiwalan. Yuxin yet islahobal tz'ayic ha' caw ix reina tu' chihalnilo hemul, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --K'inalo ta ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil chiel yul yanma hunu anma. Lahwi yel naj tu' cat isto naj bey tx'otx' desierto issaya' bay chixewi, yaja' mach chiilcha bay chixew naj tu' yu.

Lahwi tu' cat yec' yin̈ isnabal naj haca' ti': "Etzan̈em c'ul inmeltzohan baytic'a ayinan," ẍi naj. Haxa yet chiapni naj xin cat yilni naj yanma hune' naj tu' haca' hunu n̈a machi yahaw, caw c'ul yecan̈ k'alem yul.

Hayet chilni naj hune' tu' xin cat isto naj yinoti hujwan̈xa yetbi caw ec'balto istx'ojal sataj, cat yocto ebnaj ehoyo yul yanma hune' naj tu'. Hune' naj bay chiocto ebnaj tu', caw ec'balto tx'oj chielico naj sata yet babelal. Haca' chak'le hune' naj tu' hac tu' chak'le huntek'an anma caw tx'oj ti' tinan̈, ẍi Comam.
Hayet lan̈an istzotel Comam tet anma tu' xin yapni ismi' Comam yeb ebnaj yuẍta Comam, iscancano isti' ispultahil te' n̈a bay ayicto Comam. Yaja' xin yoche ismi' Comam yeb ebnaj yuẍta tu' tzotelo tet.
Yuxin yal hune' naj tet Comam: --Mamin, ayc'o hami' yeb ebnaj hawuẍta istin̈a, choche ebnaj tzotelo tawet yalni, ẍi naj.
Yaja' tak'wi Comam tet naj: --¿Mac xin inmi'an yeb wuẍtatu'an hawalni? ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' isyenito Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom, yalni Comam: --Ha' huntek'an anma ti' ha' haca' inmi'an yeb haca' wuẍtajan.
Yuto ha' mac chiyijen tzet chal Inmaman ay yul satcan̈, ha' ton wuẍtajan, wanaban yeb inmi'an, ẍi Comam.
Yin̈tic'a hune' tz'ayic tu', elti Comam Jes'us yul n̈a, isto Comam isti' ha' lago, yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu'.
Yaja' caw tx'i'al anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam, yuxin ahto Comam yul hune' te' barco, yay tz'on̈noj, yichico Comam iscuywahi. Wal anma xin cancano isti' ha' lago tu'.
Caw tx'i'al yechel yaco Comam yet iscuyni Comam anma tu', yichico Comam yalni haca' ti': --Yet hunel ay hune' naj to txiho trigo.
Yet lan̈an istxihni naj ixim, ay ixim apni c'atna yul beh, yapni no' ch'ic issic'nocan̈ ixim.
Aypaxo ixim apni c'atna xolaj ch'en ch'en bay machi bin tx'o tx'otx'; caw xin pet ahilo ixim yuto mach nahato yehayto yich tx'otx'.
Yaja' haxa yet yahilo tz'ayic yet yik'nican̈ yip k'a' istajilo ixim yuto machi bay yayto isxe' ixim yu ch'en ch'en tu'.
Aypaxo ixim apni c'atna xol yin̈atil te' tx'ix, hayet isch'ibcan̈ ixim isch'ibpaxocan̈ te' tx'ix tu', hac tu' yu istz'onbayo ixim xol te'.

Walpaxo ixim hin̈at apni xol tx'o tx'otx' caw c'ul, caw sak'al yu isch'ibcan̈ ixim. Yet yak'ni ixim sat, ay ixim ak'ni cien yin̈ hunun iswi', aypaxo ixim sesenta, aypaxo ixim yak' treinta sat yin̈ hunun iswi'.
Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj, ẍi Comam tet anma.
Lahwi tu' ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us isc'atan̈, isk'amben ebnaj: --Mamin, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxin yet chacuyni anma yecheln̈e chawak'baln̈e tet? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam: --Teyetn̈e chak' Comam Dios heyohtan̈elo huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan yehi, yun̈e hetxumni yin̈ tzet chu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Walpaxo tet huntek'anxa anma xin mach ch'ak'lax yohtan̈eloj.
Yuto ha' mac chiyoche chiyohtan̈elo huntek'an ti' caw ec'naxa chiak'lax yohtan̈eloj, wal mac mach choche yohtan̈eloj, ha' nich'an etza chitxumcha yu chiilaxilo tet.
Yuxinto yecheln̈e chiwacojan yet chincuynihan anma. Wal xin waxan̈ca chiyila, yaja' mach chinachalo yu, waxan̈ca chabe yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu.

Yuto lan̈an yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ huntek'an anma ti' yu naj Isa'ias, ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chal haca' ti': Wal huntek'an anma ti' waxan̈ca chabe, yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu. Waxan̈ca chiyila, yaj mach chin'achalo yu.

Yuto huntek'an anma ti' caw nohna yanma yu ec'najil, haca'tan̈e majan istxiquin yuxin mach chabe. Haca'tan̈e mutz'an sat yuxin mach chila, hac tu' xin mach chistxum isba cat yanico isba yul ink'aban cat yan̈chahi, ẍiayoj.
Yaja' walex ti' sak'al heyet, yuto haban istxumchalo heyu yet cheyilni, yeb xin yet cheyabeni haban henaniloj.

Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, caw tx'i'al ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios, yeb tx'i'al mac c'ul isbeybal yet payat yoche' yila' huntek'an cheyil ti', yaja' mach yil ebnaj. Yochepaxo ebnaj yabe huntek'an cheyabe ti' yaja' mach yabe ebnaj, ẍi Comam.
Yalni Comam Jes'us: --Tinan̈ xin chiwalan teyet yin̈ tzet chal yelapno naj txihom trigo.
Ixim hin̈at ayc'ay yul beh, yechel yeco ixim yin̈ mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios, yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu. Lahwi tu' cat yul naj matzwalil yinolo Istzoti' Comam tu' yul yanma.
Haxa ixim hin̈at ayc'ay yiban̈ ch'en ch'en, yechel hune' tu' yin̈ anma chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios cat ischahni yul yanma yin̈ tzalahilal.
Yaja' machi caw yip yanma yin̈ yet Comam, yeb xin mach huneln̈eho chucanico yin̈ yanma, yuxin hayet chihul ilwebal yin̈ yu Istzoti' Comam, yin̈ an̈e chicabconcan̈ isc'ul cat ismeltzo yintaj.

Haxa ixim hin̈at apni c'atna xol yin̈atil te' tx'ix, yechel hune' tu' yin̈ mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios yaja' yu ec'balto chaco yanma yin̈ k'alomal yeb yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuxin chilo yanma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios. Ha' huntek'an anma tu' lahan haca' ixim trigo tz'onbayoj, machi sat yak'a.

Wal ixim hin̈at ayc'ay bay caw c'ul tx'o tx'otx' xin, yechel hune' tu' yin̈ anma chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios, caw c'ul istxumni cat ischahni yul yanma, lahan yeb ixim trigo caw niman sat yacoj. Ay mac haca' ixim trigo yak' cien sat yin̈ hunun iswi', aypaxo mac haca' ixim yak' sesenta, aypaxo xin mac haca' ixim yak' treinta yin̈ hunun iswi', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune' yechel haca' ti': --Hayet chioc Comam Dios yahawilo anma, lahan haca' chak'le hunu naj chitxihni ixim hin̈at trigo caw c'ul sat istx'otx'.
Yaja' yet ak'balil xin yet wayo chu naj, yapni hune' naj ayco ishowal yin̈ naj, istxihnayo naj yin̈atil te' ch'im haca' ixim trigo tu' xol ixim, isto naj.
Lahwi tu' isch'ibcan̈ ixim, haxa yet yoc iswi' ixim isyenilo isba te' ch'im tu' xol ixim.

Hayet yilni ebnaj munlawom hune' tu', isto ebnaj yalno tet naj yahaw munil haca' ti: "Mamin, caw c'ul ixim hin̈at trigo cachbey hatxihayoj, yaja' ¿tzet yin̈ xin caw ay te' ch'im ahilo xol ixim?" ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi naj: "Ham hunu mac ayco ishowal win̈an txihnayo yin̈atil te' ch'im xol ixim," ẍi naj. Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj ismunlawom naj tu': "Ta chisje hac'ul chon̈tohan̈ cohoc'ocan̈an̈ te' ch'im tu' xol ixim," ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni naj: "Machoj, yuto ta chehoc'can̈ te' ham hun ixim trigo chehoc'can̈ yinta te'.

Wal xin ch'ibojabna te' xol ixim, hatojab yet chiapni istempohal bay chic'uplaxcan̈ ixim cat yah te', cat walnihan tet ebnaj inmunlawoman tato chisc'upcan̈ ebnaj te' xol ixim cat isc'alnayo ebnaj te' yin̈ hunun yachan, lahwi tu' cat isn̈uslaxto te'. Wal ixim trigo tu' xin chic'ubalaxto ixim yul inc'un̈ahan," ẍi naj yahaw munil tu', ẍi Comam.

Yanipaxico Comam Jes'us yin̈atil te' mostaza yechelo yet iscuywahi, yalni Comam haca' ti': --Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan haca' nich'an yin̈atil te' mostaza chistz'un hunu naj sat istx'otx'.

Yin̈ caw yeli, te' hin̈at mostaza tu', ha' te' caw niẍch'an xol te' hin̈at, yaj haxa yet chiahilo te' cat isch'ibcan̈ te', ha' te' caw nimej chielico xol sunilej te' itah chitz'unlaxi. Te' mostaza tu' nimej chu te' yuxin chiapni no' ch'ic iswatx'e yatut xol isk'ab te', ẍi Comam.

Yanipaxico Comam Jes'us yan̈al ixim pan yechelo yet iscuywa tet anma, yalni Comam tet anma tu': --Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Lahan haca' nich'an yan̈al ixim pan chaco hunu ix ix xol oxeb mal ixim harina. Haxa yet chissomni ix ixim cat issipc'a ixim yu nich'an yan̈al chioqui, ẍi Comam.
Yet yak'ni Comam Jes'us Istzoti' Comam Dios iscuyu anma naba yecheln̈e bay tzotel Comam,

yun̈e yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chal haca' ti': Yecheln̈e chiwak'an tet anma yet chintzotelan. Chiwalan tet yin̈ huntek'an tzet ewan yehi yichitaxtic'a iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti, ẍiayoj.

Lahwi tu' istak'li Comam Jes'us tet anma chiaben tzet chal tu', yocto Comam yul n̈a yeb ebnaj iscuywom. Ishitzico ebnaj isc'atan̈ Comam isk'amben ebnaj yin̈ tzet chal yelapno te' ch'im ahilo xol ixim trigo.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin: --Naj txihom trigo yechel yeco naj win̈an, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios.

Ha' tx'o tx'otx' bay txihlaxayo ixim trigo, yechel anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye tx'otx'. Ha' ixim hin̈at c'ul, yechel anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios ye ixim. Haxa te' ch'im ch'ibcan̈ xol ixim trigo tu', yechel anma ayco yul isk'ab naj matzwalil ye te'.

Naj txihnayo te' hin̈at ch'im xol ixim trigo tu', yechel naj matzwalil ye naj. Yet chic'uplaxcan̈ ixim trigo tu' xin, yechel yin̈ yet chilahwi yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Haxa ebnaj chic'upni ixim trigo tu', yechel ebnaj 'angel ye ebnaj.
Haca' yet chiilaxilo te' ch'im xol ixim trigo cat isn̈uslaxto te', hac tu' chiutelax anma mach chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios yet chitan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti', chinchejtijan ebnaj 'angel iscutxbaco sunil mac ch'ak'ni ayc'ayo yet anmahil yeb mac istx'ojaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e,
cat yalaxto huntek'an mac tu' xol k'a k'a' bay ch'ok'i, cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'il.
Wal mac chiyijen tzet chal Comam Dios xin, chitzejla haca' tz'ayic yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈. Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan yeb hune' k'alomal caw ay istohol mujbil yul tx'o tx'otx' chiilcha yu hune' naj, lahwi tu' cat ismujnipaxo naj. Caw xin chitzala naj yin̈ hune' k'alomal tu' cat isto naj istxon̈noto sunil tzet aya yun̈e islok'ni naj hune' tx'otx' bay mujan hune' k'alomal tu', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Ha' anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan haca' hunu naj txon̈wom chiec' sayno huntek'an ch'en ch'en caw ay istohol chiyij perla.
Haxa yet chiilcha hunu ch'en yu naj, chito naj istxon̈o'to sunil tzet aya cat islok'ni naj hune' ch'en perla caw c'ul tu', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Chiwalpaxojan teyet, ha' anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan yeb hune' tx'an̈ hac' ik'omati cay chayto huntek'an ebnaj xol ha ha'. Yet chibejlaxayto tx'an̈ xol ha' caw tx'i'al no' cay chioc yul tx'an̈.

Haxa yet chinohilo tx'an̈ yu no' xin cat yilaxahti tx'an̈ xol ha', cat yay tz'on̈no ebnaj isti' ha', cat issic'nilo ebnaj no' c'ul cat yanayto ebnaj no' yul motx. Haxa no' mach c'uluj xin, chisk'ojto ebnaj no'.
Hac tu' chak'le anma yet chilahwi hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Chul ebnaj 'angel ispoholo anma tx'oj xol anma c'ul.
Ha' huntek'an anma tx'oj chialaxto xol k'a k'a', ha' bey tu' xin chiok' yin̈ cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'il, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' isk'amben Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom haca' ti': --¿Chimhetxum sunil huntek'an yechel chiwalti'an? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Ho' Mamin, ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam xin: --Ha' chalilo hune' ti', ta ay hunu naj cuywawom yin̈ ley chicuywa yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan haca' hunu naj mame yohta yocnico huntek'an tzet ye tu' ac' yu yeb huntek'an tzet ye tu' xilxa c'uwan yul isc'uwanbal, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi yalnicano Comam huntek'an cuybanile tu', isto Comam.

Yet yapni Comam yul iscon̈ob, iscuyni Comam anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel. Hayet yaben anma istzotel Comam, caw c'ayilo isc'ul, yuxin yal anma haca' ti': --¿Bay chitit ishelanil hune' naj ti', yeb bay chitit iscan̈il ye naj iswatx'en huntek'an c'aybalc'ule ti'?
Naj ti' isc'ahol naj hutx'um te' ye naj, yebpaxo yunin ix Mar'ia ye naj, yeb yuẍta isba naj yeb naj Jacobo, naj Jos'e, naj Sim'on yeb naj Judas.
Yebpaxo xin ebix yanab naj, coxol ti' ay ebix. ¿Baytaxca xin chitit ishelanil naj ti'? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yuxin machi cam isc'ul anma yaben tzet chal Comam. Yalni Comam tet anma tu': --Sunil bay xahan chiillax ischejab Comam Dios yu anma, yaja' wal yul iscon̈ob yeb yul yatut chiyahlaxi, ẍi Comam.
Wal Comam xin mach tx'i'alo c'aybalc'ule isye Comam yul iscon̈ob tu', yuto mach chayto anma yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
