Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' xin, yabelo naj rey Herodes, naj ayco gobernadoral bey Galilea, isbina Comam Jes'us.
Yuxin yal naj tet ebnaj chimunla yinta tu': --Hune' naj chibina tu', ham naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma itzitzbican̈, yuxin ay yip naj iswatx'en huntek'an c'aybalc'ule tu', ẍi naj.

Yal naj hune' tu' yuto ha' naj chejni tzablaxoyo naj Juan, isc'allaxayo naj yu ch'en cadena, yalaxicto naj yul preso yuto cachwa naj yin̈ naj Herodes tu' yet yik'nican̈ naj ix Herod'ias, yixal yuẍtaj, ha' ton naj Felipe.
Caw xin tx'i'al el yal naj Juan tu' tet naj Herodes haca' ti': --Mach c'ulo hawik'ni yixal hawuẍtaj, ẍi naj.
Wal naj Herodes tu' xin caw yoche naj ispotx'o' naj Juan, yaj xin xiw naj yuto sunil anma chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios ye naj.

Yet hunel xin, yec'tze naj Herodes hune' k'in̈ yuto tz'ajna naj yin̈ ishabilal, caw xin tx'i'al anma yawte naj. Yin̈ k'in̈ tu', can̈alwi ix yunin ix Herod'ias yin̈ sat naj Herodes yeb yin̈ sat sunil anma awtebil. Caw xin c'ulch'an yu iscan̈alwi ix yil naj,
yuxin yalte naj tet ix tato chak' naj tzijxan̈e tzet chisk'an ix.
Yalni ismi' ix tet tato chisk'an ix iswi' naj Juan; yuxin yal ix tet naj Herodes tu': --Ha' iswi' naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma chawak' wetan yul hunu plato, ẍi ix tet naj.
Hayet yaben naj Herodes hune' tu' yoc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul naj. Yaja' yu xayal naj yin̈ sat sunil anma tet ix tato chak' naj tzet chisk'an ix, yuxin yal naj ta chiak'lax tzet chisk'an ix tu'.
Ischejni naj yilaxolo iswi' naj Juan yul preso.
Hac tu' xin yu yilaxti iswi' naj yul hune' plato yak'lax tet ix, yinito ix tet ismi'.
Lahwi tu' xin, yapni ebnaj iscuywom naj Juan tu', yinito ebnaj isnimanil naj mujlaxoj. Tzujan tu' isbey ebnaj yalno tet Comam Jes'us.

Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us ta cam naj Juan yel Comam bey tu', yahto Comam yul hune' te' barco, yec' apno Comam isk'axepic'to ha' lago bay machi anma. Hayet yaben anma ay yulaj con̈ob xin tato to Comam, istopaxo anma yu yoj isti'la ha' bay chiapni Comam tu'.
Hayet yelti Comam yul te' barco tu' xin yilnitoj ta tenanxato anma yechmani. Istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma, yak'ni cawxo Comam anma ya'ay ilaxto bey tu'.

Haxa yet lan̈anxa isk'ejbayo xin, ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈, yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Mamin, mak'ejbi lah yebpaxo xin machi te' n̈a bey ti', yuxin c'ulmi hachejnito anma ti' yulaj wayan̈bal cocawilal ti' islok'o tzet chislo, ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Mach yilalo chipaxto anma ti', ak'we tzet chislo, ẍi Comam.
Istak'wi ebnaj tet Comam: --Mamin, caw han̈c'an̈e howeb ixim pan yeb cac'on̈ cay coxol ti', ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam: --Iweti ixim yeb no' cay tu' bey ti', ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' ischejni Comam anma cutxanico tu' tato chiay tz'on̈no sat chek'an. Yinican̈ Comam ixim howeb pan yeb no' cac'on̈ cay, yah t'an̈no Comam satcan̈, yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ ixim yeb yin̈ no'. Lahwi tu' isk'axponayo Comam ixim, yak'ni Comam ixim tet ebnaj iscuywom, yoc ebnaj yitxk'anoto ixim yin̈ anma.
Caw sunil anma wa'i hantatic'a caw yoche isc'ul, caw xin cablahon̈ebto motx nohcan̈ yin̈ ixim matxa lahwi yu anma.
Caw howeb mil ebnaj winaj wa'i, wal ebix ix yeb niẍte unin mach oc istz'ajo yin̈ hune' isbisil tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin, yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom ta ch'octo ebnaj yul hune' te' barco yu isbabito ebnaj isk'axepxac'to ha' lago tu'. Wal Comam cancano Comam tak'lo tet anma.
Hayet lahwi istak'licano Comam tet anma tu' xin, yahto Comam txahlo ischuquil istzalanil hune' witz. Ha' tu' xin ah ak'bal yin̈ Comam.
Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam nahatxa chito ebnaj yiban̈ ha' lago tu', yaj xin ay hune' niman jak'ek' chimak'nican̈ ha ha' sata te' barco tu'.
Haxa yet lan̈anxa issajbilo xin istzujcha ebnaj yu Comam, belwito Comam yiban̈ ha ha' tu'.
Hayet yilni ebnaj isbelwi Comam yiban̈ ha' isxiwcan̈ ebnaj, yah yaw ebnaj yu xiwquilal, yalni ebnaj: --¡Hune' ti' ispixan camom! ẍi ebnaj.
Yalnican̈ Comam: --Mach chexxiwi, haninan, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam: --Mamin, ta hach hune' tu', hala ta chinbelwihan yiban̈ ha ha' ti' cat wapnihan bay ayach tu', ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj xin: --C'ultic'a, titan̈, ẍi Comam. Hayet yaben naj Pedro hune' tu', yel naj yul te' barco, isto naj isc'atan̈ Comam, yichico naj isbel yiban̈ ha'.
Yaja' yet yilni naj isbili ha' tu' yu jak'ek' isxiwcan̈ naj, yichico naj isto xol ha', yah yaw naj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip: --Mamin, colinan, ẍi naj.
Yin̈ an̈e xin oc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab naj, yalni Comam tet naj: --Hach ti' caw mach ayoco hawanma win̈an. ¿Tzet yin̈ xin macabconcan̈ hac'ul? ẍi Comam.
Haxa yet yahto Comam yul te' barco yeb naj, islin̈i yec' jak'ek'.
Wal sunil ebnaj ayicto yul te' barco tu' xin ay jahno ebnaj sata Comam, yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --¡Yin̈ caw yeli hach ti' Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi! ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Hayet isk'axponic'to Comam Jes'us yiban̈ ha' lago tu' yeb ebnaj iscuywom, yapni Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Genesaret.
Haxa yet yohtan̈enilo anma Comam xin, ispujbalaxic'o isk'umal Comam sunil yul ismajul tx'otx' Genesaret tu'. Caw xin hantan̈e anma ya'ay ilaxto tet Comam.
Isk'anni anma tet Comam ta waxan̈ca han̈ech'an isti' xil isk'ap Comam chistzab anma ya'ay, yuxin sunil anma ya'ay tzabni isti' xil isk'ap Comam tu' cawxicanocan̈.
Yet hunel apni huntek'an ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ilwal yin̈ Comam Jes'us, ispeto ebnaj bey Jerusal'en. Isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam:
--¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach chisyije hacuywom ti' huntek'an chejbanile yet ebnaj jichmam? Yuto ebnaj hacuywom ti' mach chistx'ah ebnaj isk'ab yet chiwa' ebnaj, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Haquexpax tu', ¿tzet yin̈ xin cheman̈c'o ischejbanil Comam Dios cheyijento ischejbanil anma?
Yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti': "Ayojab yelapno hamam, hami' yul hasat. Mac chitz'acti'n̈en ismam maca ismi' yilal iscami," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' hex ti' cheyala tato mach yilalo iscolwa anma yin̈ ismam maca ismi' ta chiyal haca' ti': "Mam, mach chu incolwahan tawin̈ yuto ha' tzet ayinti'an yetxa Comam Dios ye wuhan," ta ẍi.
Ha' mac chihalni haca' tu' matxa yilalo iscolwa yin̈ ismam maca ismi', heyalni. Yaja' yin̈ haca' tu' cheman̈c'o ischejbanil Comam Dios yu heyijento ischejbanil anma.
Wal xin nabn̈e cheyal heba c'ulal. Teyin̈ bay yalcano naj Isa'ias, ischejab Comam Dios yet payat yet yalnicano haca' ti':
Huntek'an anma ti', isti'n̈e chinak'ni binahojan, yaja' wal yanma nahat yehilo win̈an.
Nabn̈e chala ta chiyo isba wetan, wal xin han̈c'an̈e ischejbanil ebnaj winaj chak' ebnaj iscuyu' yet anmahil, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Lahwi tu' yawtenti Comam anma isc'atan̈, yalni Comam tet anma tu': --Abewej cat hetxumni yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an.
Maẍtaj tzet chiocto yul isti' anma, ha' chietanto yul sat Comam Dios, walxinto ha' istx'ojal chiahti yul isti', ha' chietanto yul sat Comam, ẍi Comam.
Ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈, yalni ebnaj: --Mamin, ¿mamxatxumu tato yet maxawalni hune' ti' mach'iwacan̈ isc'ul ebnaj fariseo? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Sunil te te' maẍtaj Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tz'unn̈e chihoc'laxcan̈.

Wal xin yila'xam ebnaj, lahan ebnaj haca' anma mach chu yilni cat yocpaxo ebnaj yijbanpaxic'o anma mach chu yilni. K'inalo ta ay hunu naj mach chu yilni chixecnito hunuxa naj mach chu yilni, chisxecleto isba ebnaj iscawan̈il yul xab, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam haca' ti': --Mamin, hal jetan̈ tzet chalilo hune' maxawal tet ebnaj fariseo tu', ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam: --¿Tom ha' hunex machi maxetxumpaxo yin̈ tzet mawaltu'an?
¿Tom mach heyohtajoj ta sunil tzet chiocto yul isti' anma yul isc'ul chiapni, chilahwi tu' xin cat yel yin̈?
Yaja' ha' tzoti' chiahti yul isti' anma, yin̈ yanma chitita, ha' xin huntek'an tu' chietanto yul sat Comam Dios.
Yuto yul yanma anma chipitzc'ati sunil istx'ojal haca' potx'wal, ixloj, winajloj, elek', lek'ti'al, yeb buchwal.

Ha' ton huntek'an tu' chietanto anma yul sat Comam Dios, yaj wal hune' yet mach chicotx'ah cok'ab yet chon̈oc wa'oj, ischejbanil ebnaj winaj yehi, mach chetato janma yul sat Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Lahwi tu' xin isto Comam Jes'us yul ismajul tx'otx' Tiro yeb tx'otx' Sid'on.

Bey tu' ay hune' ix ix ah Cananea, mach Israeloj. Apni ix yila' Comam Jes'us, yalni ix yin̈ caw ip: --Mamin, hach yuninal isc'ahol naj David, tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an. Ay hune' nich'an wuninan caw chietalax yu ischejab naj matzwalil, caw xin chiec'ya' yanma ix yu naj, ẍi ix tet Comam.
Yaja' xin machi tak'wi Comam tet ix, yuxin hitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' isc'atan̈, yalni ebnaj: --Mamin, hal tet ix paxojabto ix haxinwal chisbej ix yel yaw jin̈, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam: --Tetn̈e anma Israel chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios, yuto lahan anma tu' haca' no' me' c'aynatoj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yaja' hitzico ix, yay jahno ix sata Comam, yalni ix: --Mamin, colwahan̈ nino win̈an, ẍi ix.
Yalni Comam tet ix: --Mach c'ulo ta ch'ilaxilo tzet chislo ebnaj uninale cat yak'lax tet metx tx'i', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo ix: --Ho' Mamin yeli, yaja' metx tx'i' tu' chi-tic'a-yican̈ metx isk'al isti' ebnaj uninale chiayc'ay yalan̈ meẍa yet chiwa' ebnaj, ẍi ix tet Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, yalni Comam tet ix: --Miyay, caw ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin yubojab haca' choche hac'ul, ẍi Comam. Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin iscawxican̈ nich'an yunin ix tu'.
Yel Comam Jes'us bey tu', isto Comam isti' ha' lago Galilea, ha' tu' xin ahto Comam yin̈ hune' won̈an, yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu'.

Caw xin hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam. Ay mac ik'n̈e anma ya'ay yeb ay mac ik'n̈e anma mach chu yeq'ui, yeb anma mach chu yilni, yeb anma tx'oj ye isk'ab, yeb anma mach chu istzoteli; yalaxayo sunil anma tu' yich yoj Comam. Sunil anma tu' xin cawxicanocan̈ yu Comam.

Hayet yilni anma hune' tu' caw c'aycanilo isc'ul yuto yak' tzotelo Comam anma maẍtic'a chu istzoteli, yebpaxo anma tx'oj ye isk'ab watx'icaniloj. Isbelwipaxocan̈ anma maẍtic'a chu yeq'ui, yeb anma maẍtic'a yu yilni hajlocanocan̈ issat yu Comam. Yu hune' tu' caw sunil anma yak' tzalaho isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios, isDiosal Israel.

Lahwi tu', yawtenti Comam ebnaj iscuywom isc'atan̈, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Caw chitz'ay inc'ulan yin̈ huntek'an anma ti' yuto isyoxebxa tz'ayic yehic'o inc'atan̈an, matxa xin tzet chislo. Mach chisje inc'ulan inchejatojan yatut yuto tato mach chiwa'i, chalotaxca ispaxilo yip yulaj beh, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam tet: --Mamin, caw tx'i'al anma lah, ¿baytu'wal xin chon̈tohan̈ jik'atijan̈ tzet chislo anma ti'? Yuto bay ayon̈ ti' machi te' n̈a, ẍi ebnaj.
Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Hayeb ixim pan coxol ti'? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Hujebch'an ixim yeb hayc'on̈ no' niẍte cay, ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni Comam tet anma tato chiay tz'on̈no sat tx'otx'.

Lahwi tu' xin yinican̈ Comam ixim hujeb pan yeb hayc'on̈ no' cay tu', yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios. Lahwi tu' isk'axponayo Comam ixim, yak'ni Comam ixim yeb no' cay tu' tet ebnaj iscuywom, yoc ebnaj yitxk'anto yin̈ anma.
Caw sunil anma wa'i hantatic'a yoche isc'ul, caw xin hujebto motx nohcan̈ yin̈ ixim matxa lahwi yu anma.
Xol sunil anma wa' tu' can̈eb mil isbisil ebnaj winaj, machi xin oc ebix ix yeb niẍte unin istz'ajo yin̈ hune' isbisil ti'.
Lahwi istak'licano Comam Jes'us tet anma, yahto Comam yul hune' te' barco, isto Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Magdala.

Ay huntek'an ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo apni ilno Comam Jes'us yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam. Yalni ebnaj tet Comam ta chisye hunu c'aybalc'ule chiyeniloj tato caw yeli ha' Comam Dios chejn̈eti Comam Jes'us.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ k'ejbiyalil yet cheyilni istz'ay moyan, cheyal haca' ti': "Wal tinan̈ yeloxa hajan, yuto lan̈an istz'ay moyan," quexchi.

Taca yet sac'ayal xin cheyal haca' ti': "Wal tinan̈ yocxa ha' n̈ab yuto caw k'ej moyan," quexchi. Hex ti' caw helanex hetxumni yin̈ tzet chute isba tiempo, ta chak' ha' n̈ab maca machoj. Yaja' wal yin̈ hune' tiempohal bay ayex ti', mach chitxumchalo heyu.

Anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti', caw tx'ojcanoj yeb caw mach yijemoj. Chisk'an c'aybalc'ule yila', yaja' hune'n̈ech'an c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax yila', haca' hune' isye Comam Dios yin̈ naj Jon'as, ẍi Comam Jes'us. Lahwi tu' yel Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj, isto Comam.
Yet yec' apno Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom isk'axepic'to ha' lago isnaniti ebnaj tato mach yito tzet chislo.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Cheyil heba tet yan̈al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj hune' tu', yichico ebnaj yalni tet hunun: --Chal Comam hune' ti' yumi machi majiti tzet chicolo, ẍi ebnaj.
Yet yabenilo Comam hune' tu', yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin cheyala ta machi hepan ik'bil heyu? Caw mach chicawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios.
¿Tom mach chinachalo heyu? yeb ¿tom matxa chitit yul hec'ul yin̈ ixim howeb pan yabe yin̈ howeb mil ebnaj winaj? Tijab yin̈ henabal hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma.
Yeb xin, ¿tom matxa chenati yin̈ ixim hujeb pan yabe yin̈ ebnaj can̈eb mil? Yeb xin, ¿tom matxa chenapaxtij hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma tu'?
¿Tzet yin̈ xin machi matxumchalo heyu tato maẍtaj yin̈ ixim pan mantzotelan yet mawalnihan teyet ta cheyil heba tet yan̈al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo? ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' istxumnilo ebnaj tato maẍtaj yin̈ yan̈al ixim pan tzotel Comam, to yin̈ cuybanile chak' ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo.

Yet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Cesarea yul ismajul Filipo, isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' haca' ti': --Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ¿mac anmahilinan yalni anma? ẍi Comam.

Istak'wi ebnaj: --Ay mac chalni ta hach ti' naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma, aypaxo mac chalni tato El'ias hach, aypaxo mac chalni tato hach ti' naj Jerem'ias, maca to hunuxa ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat, ẍi ebnaj.
Isk'ambenpaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Haxaca hex ti', ¿mac anmahilinan heyalni? ẍi Comam.
Istak'wi naj Sim'on Pedro: --Hach ti', Cristo hach, Isc'ahol Comam Dios itzitz, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Sim'on, isc'ahol naj Jon'as, caw sak'al hawet yuto hune' maxawal ti' mach anmaho chiyenilo tawet. Walxinto ha' Inmaman ay yul satcan̈, ha' chiak'ni hatxumu'.
Haquinpaxtu'an chiwalan tato Pedro chijcano habi. Yiban̈ hune' ch'en niman ch'en ti' chiwacan̈an wiglesiahan, machi xin chik'oji camical istan̈tzeniloj.

Chiwacanicojan lawe tawet yun̈e chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Ha' tzet mach t'in̈ano yeco yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' hawalni, mach t'in̈ano chucano yul satcan̈. Haxa tzet t'in̈an yeco sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' hawalni, hune' tu' t'in̈an chucano yul satcan̈, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi yalni Comam huntek'an tu' xin, yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tato machi bay chalic'o ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us ha' ton Cristo.

Ha' yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' ichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj iscuywom tato yilal yul isya'tajil yiban̈, yalni Comam haca' ti': --Caw yilal intohan bey Jerusal'en, cat xin yec'ya' wanmahan yu ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal con̈ob Israel, yeb yu ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es. Chinispotx'an ebnaj, yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa, ẍi Comam.

Hayet yaben naj Pedro hune' tu', yawtenilo naj Comam Jes'us, iscachwa naj yin̈ Comam haca' ti': --Mamin, ¡ha'ojab Comam Dios chachcolni yin̈ hune' isya'tajil tu'! Machojab chachyaco yul isk'ab, ẍi naj.

Ist'an̈xico Comam yin̈ naj, yalni Comam: --Ach matzwalil, elan̈ yin̈ insatan yuto chachoc quinhawak'a' ayc'ayojan, wal xin maẍtaj ha' tzet nabil yu Comam Dios chiec' yin̈ hanabal, walxinto haca' tzet chisna anma ha' chiec' yin̈ hanabal, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom: --Tato ay hunu mac choche chioc incuywomojan, caw matxahojab yeto isba ischuquil, yeb xin caw hinanojab yaben isya'tajil win̈an. Ta hinan yetan yanma haca' tu' ec'ojab tzujtzun wintajan.
Yuto ha' mac mach hinan iscam win̈an yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chisc'ayto isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Wal mac chishin isba iscam win̈an xin chischah isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e.
K'inalo ta ay hunu mac chik'oji ismajnilo sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yaj ta chisc'ayto isk'inal mach istan̈bal, ¿tzettaxca chischah hune' mac tu' selelo isk'inal chisc'ayto tu'?
Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinhulan yeb isk'ak'al yip Inmaman yeb ebnaj 'angel, cat wak'nihan ispaj selel tet hunun anma, hatatic'a tzet chiswatx'e.
Yin̈ caw yeli, chiwalan teyet, ay haywan̈ mac texol ti' maẍto chicami masanto chiyil wulan cat wocan Yahawoj, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Wajebxa tz'ayic xin, ishec'nilo isba Comam Jes'us xol anma yinito Comam naj Pedro, naj Jacobo yeb yuẍtaj, ha' ton naj Juan, yin̈ iswi' hune' witz caw nahat yecan̈.
Ha' bey tu' xin ishel isba yillax yin̈ Comam, caw toxan̈e chitzejtzon sat Comam haca' tz'ayic. Wal xil isk'ap Comam xin, caw sajhopon̈e elicoj.
Lan̈antotic'a xin yilni ebnaj naj El'ias yeb naj Mois'es, lan̈an istzotel ebnaj yeb Comam.

Yalnican̈ naj Pedro tet Comam Jes'us: --Mamin, caw c'ul ta wal je bey ti', ta chisje hac'ul chu cowatx'enan̈ oxebo niẍte pat; hunu hawet, hunu yet naj Mois'es, yeb hunu yet naj El'ias ti', ẍi naj Pedro.

Hayet lan̈an yalni naj Pedro hune' tu' xin, yayilo hune' moyan caw sajhopon̈e, yoc hoyno yin̈ ebnaj yeb Comam. Yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' hune' yul nuk'e xol moyan tu' yalni haca' ti': --Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan caw xahan ay wuhan, caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj; abewe tzet chal naj, ẍiayti xol moyan.
Hayet yaben ebnaj oxwan̈ iscuywom Comam hune' tu', caw xiwcan̈ ebnaj, yaycano xulno ebnaj sat tx'otx'.
Lahwi tu', ishitzico Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj, yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ ebnaj, yalni Comam: --Ahan̈wewanoj, mach chexxiwi, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yilniti ebnaj xin, matxa mac lin̈ancan̈ isc'atan̈ Comam.

Haxa yet lan̈an yayti Comam yin̈ iswi' hune' witz tu' yeb ebnaj iscuywom, yalni Comam: --Machi bay cheyal hune' maxeyil ti' masanto yet chinitzitzbican̈an xol camom, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chal ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tato yilal babel chul naj El'ias sata naj Cristo? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu': --Yeli hac tu', yilal yul naj El'ias tu' babel yun̈e isnani isba anma cat yoc yin̈ istoholal.

Yaja' chiwalan teyet tato xahul naj El'ias tu' yaja' mach txumchalo naj yu ebnaj, yuxin iswatx'e ebnaj baytet yal isc'ul yin̈ naj El'ias tu'. Hac tu' xin chinutelaxan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, chiec'ya' wanmahan yu ebnaj, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, istxumchalo yu ebnaj tato ha' yin̈ naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma tzotel Comam.
Yet yayilo Comam yeb iscuywom xol anma xin, ishitzico hune' naj isc'atan̈ Comam, yay jahno naj sata Comam, yalni naj tet Comam:
--Mamin, caw tz'ayojab hac'ul yin̈ inc'aholti'an yuto caw chilow hune' yaxcamic yin̈ naj, caw chiec'ya' yanma naj yu. Tx'i'alxa el chito naj yul k'a' yeb xol ha ha'.
Mawitijan naj tet ebnaj hacuywom ti', yaja' xin machi yu yak'ni cawxo ebnaj naj, ẍi naj tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam: --Hex ti', caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, caw tx'ojexcanoj. Caw nimanxa tiempo ayinic'ojan texol. ¿Hantatoc'anab tiempo chextecha wuhan? Caw ya'xa wanmahan heyu. Iweti naj bey ti', ẍi Comam.
Ischejnilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil ayco yin̈ naj tzeh tu'. Lan̈antotic'a xin iscawxilo naj.
Haxa yet ischuquilxan̈e Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom tu', isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --Mamin, ¿tzet yin̈ xin machi mayu jinilojan̈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj tzeh ti'? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Yuto hex ti' ayto mach chiapni heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios. Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet ta chicawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios waxan̈ca txann̈e yeco heyanma yin̈ Comam haca'n̈e hunu nich'an yin̈atil te' mostaza, chu heyalni tet hunu witz haca' ti': "Heq'uilo haba bey ti', asi' hunuxa bayah," ta quexchi, chisyije hune' witz tu' tzet cheyala. Sunil chu hewatx'eni ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios.
Yuto huntek'an ischejab naj matzwalil ti', machi el yin̈ anma ta mach chextxahli yeb heyak'len wahil hetxahli tet Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Hayet yec' Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul ismajul Galilea, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chin'alaxicojan yul isk'ab anma.
Chinak'lax camojan, yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic xin cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa, ẍi Comam. Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' caw occano bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma ebnaj.

Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey con̈ob Capernaum, yapni ebnaj chiinilo ch'en tohlabal yin̈ yatut Comam Dios isc'atan̈ naj Pedro. Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj: --¿Chimyak' naj chachcuyni istohlabal yin̈ yatut Comam Dios? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi naj Pedro: --Ho' chitohlawi ya', ẍi naj. Hayet yocto naj Pedro tu' yul n̈a ha' Comam babel k'amben tet naj: --Sim'on, ¿tzet chu hatxumni yin̈ hune' ti'? Mac tet chisk'an ebnaj yahaw con̈ob ch'en tohlabal, ¿ham tet yet con̈ob ebnaj, mato tet anma nan con̈obal? ẍi Comam.
Istak'wi naj Pedro: --Ha' anma nan con̈obal, ha' ch'ak'ni ch'en, ẍi naj. Yalni Comam: --Ta hac tu', ha' mac yuninaltic'a con̈ob yehi mach yilalo chak' ch'en.

Yaja' yun̈e mach ch'oc ishowal ebnaj jin̈, asi' isti' ha' lago cat hawanayto ch'en ik'omati cay xol ha'. Ha' xin yul isti' no' babel cay chiahti hawu ayicto hune' ch'en melyu c'uxan isk'oji istohlan hawet yeb wetan. Chawiti ch'en cat hato hawak'nocano ch'en tet ebnaj chichahni ch'en tohlabal tu', ẍi Comam tet naj Pedro.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', isk'ambe ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us tet haca' ti': --¿Mac ec'bal yelapno xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios? ẍi ebnaj.
Yawtenti Comam hune' nich'an unin yanico Comam xolbal ebnaj.
Yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, ta mach chehel hebeybal, yeb ta mach cheyiyo heba haca' nich'an unin ti', mach chu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Yuxin mac chiyiyo isba haca' nich'an unin ti', ha' ec'bal yelapno xol mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Yuxin ha' mac chichahni hunu nich'an unin yuto wetan yehi, haninan chinischahan, ẍi Comam Jes'us.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Ha' mac chiak'ni lectaho hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul ink'aban, c'ul isc'allaxico hunu niman isch'enal ch'en molino yet trigo yin̈ isnuk', cat isk'ojlaxayto xol ha' mar, sata ta chioc yak'a' ayc'ayo hunu maca.

Caw bisc'ulal yet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yuto hantan̈e tzet bay wal yayc'ayi. Wal tu' caw yeli, yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ayn̈etic'a yin̈ bay chayc'ay anma, yaja' xin c'anch'an mac chiak'ni ayc'ayo hunu maca.

Yuxin tato hek'ab maca heyoj chexak'ni ayc'ayo yin̈ istx'ojal, c'ulmi hetzoc'niltoj cat hek'ojnito nahat. Waxan̈ca matxa tz'ajano henimanil yet chechahni hek'inal mach istan̈bal ec'balto c'ul sata ta tz'ajan henimanil yet chexalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal.

Ta isbak' hesat chexak'ni ayc'ayo xin, c'ulmi heyiniltij cat hek'ojnito nahat, wal xin waxan̈ca hunxan̈e isbak' hesat ayicto yet chechahni hek'inal mach istan̈bal sak'almi heyet sata ta chexalaxto xol k'a k'a' yeb iscabil isbak' hesat, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Nann̈e heyu, tajca chehinc'uln̈e hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul ink'aban, chiwalan teyet, ebnaj 'angel chitan̈en ebnaj ti' ayco ebnaj yin̈ sat Inmaman yul satcan̈,
yuto Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, hulnajinan insaya'an mac c'aynatoj.
K'inalo ta ay hunu naj ay cien isme' cat xin isc'ayto hunu no', ¿mataxca xin mach chacano naj no' noventa y nueve, cat isto naj issayno no' c'aynato tu'?
Yaja' ta chiilcha no' yu naj xin, yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet tato ec'balto chitzala naj yin̈ no' c'aynatic'ato tu' sata yin̈ no' noventa y nueve mach c'aynahotoj.
Hac tu' Comam ay yul satcan̈, mach chisje isc'ul tato ay hunu mac uninto yul ink'aban chic'aytoj, ẍi Comam. Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us:
--Ta ay hunu hawuẍta chiwatx'en hunu istx'ojal tawin̈, as tzotelan̈ tet naj hachuquil, cat xin hacachni naj. Ta chabeto naj tzet chawala, yocxa ak'anc'ulal texol chal tu'.
Yaja' ta mach chabeto naj tzet chawala, awteti hunuj maca cawan̈o mac chito tawintaj, haxinwal chiwatx'icanayo tzet cheyal tu' yin̈ sat cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ testigo.

Yaja' ta mach chabeto naj yin̈ haca' tu', hal tet ebnaj juẍtaj. Taca mach chabeto naj tzet chal ebnaj juẍta tu' xin, haca' hunu mac mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios, hac tu' chucano naj yul hesat, maca haca' hunu ebnaj chiinilo ch'en tohlabal.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, sunil tzet chec'alba yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chic'albalaxpaxo yul satcan̈, yebpaxo tzet chepuhilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chipuhlaxpaxo yul satcan̈.
Chiwalpaxojan teyet: Tato ay cawan̈ojex hun chu hek'anni hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ hetxah tet Comam Dios yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiak'lax teyet yu Inmaman ay yul satcan̈.
Yuxin ha' bay chiscutxba isba cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ mac yu yinayo isba wetan, ayinicojan xolbal, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu', ishitzico naj Pedro isc'atan̈ Comam, isk'amben naj: --Mamin, ta ay hunu wuẍtajan chiyaco ismul wetan, ¿hayelmi chiwak' nimanc'ulalan yin̈, tom hujel mato hantaj? ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Mach chiwalan tawet tato hujeln̈e, walxinto hujel el chielto setenta chawak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ hawuẍtaj, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan haca' hune' naj rey ilni hanta isc'as ebnaj ismunlawom.
Hayet lan̈an yichico naj yilni hanta isc'as ebnaj tu', yilaxti hune' naj caw ismilalxa isc'as tet naj.
Yaja' hune' naj tu', mach chik'oji naj istohlan sunil isc'as tu'. Yuxin ischej naj rey tu' txon̈laxoto naj yeb yixal, yeb yuninal, yeb sunil tzet aya.

Wal naj ay isc'as tu' xin ay jahno naj sata naj rey, yoc naj yalno tet naj haca' ti': "Mamin, caw niman chawute hac'ul win̈an hayeboxa tz'ayic, chink'uyayojan ch'en cat wak'nihan sunil inc'astu'an tawet," ẍi naj.
Wal naj rey tu', caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul naj yin̈ naj, yak'ni tan̈o naj isc'as naj tu' sunil, isbejtzolax naj.

Haxa yet yelti naj sata naj rey tu', yilnayo naj hune' naj yet munlawomal, ay xin hanic' isc'as naj tet naj. Yoc yachno naj yin̈ isnuk' naj, etzaxan̈e xin majayto ishak'o naj yu naj, yalni naj tet naj: "Tinan̈ xin chawacanayo hac'as wetan," ẍi naj.
Wal naj ay isc'as tu' ay jahno naj yin̈ sat naj, yalni naj tet naj: "Mamin, niman chawute hac'ul, hawechman hayeboxa tz'ayic, chink'uyayojan ch'en cat wak'ni inc'astu'an tawet," ẍi naj.
Yaja' naj bay ay isc'as naj tu', mach yabeto naj tzet yal naj, walxinto yito naj naj tet naj alcal, yalaxicto naj yul preso masanto yak'cano naj sunil isc'as tu'.
C'uxan xin ay huntek'an ebnaj yet munlawomal naj ilni hune' tu', caw xin tac isc'ul ebnaj, yuxin to ebnaj yala' tet naj rey yin̈ tzet yu tu'.
Hayet yaben naj rey hune' tu', yanito naj yawtemal naj. Yalni naj tet naj: "Hach ti' caw mach hawalil, wak' nimanc'ulalan yin̈ hac'as yuto hak'an nimanc'ulal wetan.
Estam xin matz'ay hac'ul yin̈ hawet munlawomal tu' haca' mayu istz'ay inc'ulan tawin̈," ẍi naj.
Caw xin tit ishowal naj rey tu' yin̈ naj, ischejni naj yalaxocto naj tx'oj tu' yul preso masanto istohlacano naj sunil isc'as tu', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam haca' ti': --Hac tu' chute Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ teyin̈ tato mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ heyuẍta chaco ismul teyet, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile tu' xin, yel Comam yul ismajul Galilea, isto Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea isk'axepic'to ha' Jord'an.
Caw xin hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam, hac tu' xin yu yak'ni cawxo Comam anma ya'ay.

Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj fariseo apni isc'atan̈ Comam, yoc ebnaj yilweno Comam yun̈e yayc'ay yin̈ hunu ismul, isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --Mamin, ¿chimyu ispohni isba hunu naj yeb yixal waxan̈ca yu hunu comon tzet ye tu'? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala tato hayet iswatx'encano Comam Dios anma, iswatx'e Comam Dios naj winaj, iswatx'enpaxo Comam ix ix?
Yalni Comam Dios haca' ti': "Yuxin chacano naj winaj ismam yeb ismi' cat ishunbancano isba naj yeb yixal, hac tu' xin hunxan̈e anmahil chielcanico iscawan̈il, ẍicano Comam.
Yuxin matxa cawan̈o anmahil yehi, to hunxan̈e chielcanicoj. Yuxin ha' mac chishunba Comam Dios machi hunu mac chu ispohni," ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj fariseo tu' tet Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin yalcano naj Mois'es tato chu yak'lax te' hum yet pohlebahil tet ix ixale cat yalaxcano ix yu yichamil? ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Yu hetx'ojal yuxin yal naj Mois'es hune' tu' ta chu hepohlencano heba yeb heyixal. Wal yet yichebanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', mach haco tu' ye yu Comam Dios.
Yuxin chiwalan teyet, ha' mac chibejnicano yixal, yaja' ta mach taj yu issayni ix hunuxa winaj, cat ismohyipaxo naj yeb hunuxa ix, yin̈ haca' tu' chaco naj ismul yul sat Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam haca' ti': --Tato matxa chu copohni coba yeb jixal, c'ulmi mach chijik' jixal chal tu', ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Yaja' mach sunilo mac chiijcha yu yin̈ hune' cheyal ti', wal xin han̈c'an̈e mac yettic'a yehi.

Ay ebnaj maẍtic'a tz'ajano isnimanil yettic'a chipitzc'ahi, yuxin mach chu yik'ni ebnaj yixal. Aypaxo ebnaj yet anmahil chiuteni, yuxin mach chu yik'nipaxo ebnaj yixal. Aypaxo ebnaj xin yu ismunla yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yuxin machi yixal. Yuxin ha' mac chitecha yu, machojab chik' yixal, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, yilaxti haywan̈ niẍte unin isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us yu yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈, yebpaxo yu istxahli Comam yin̈. Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam xin, oc ebnaj iscacha' anma ik'n̈e niẍte unin tu'.

Yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj: --Mach checach istit niẍte unin ti' inc'atan̈an, yuto ha' mac chaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios haca' yeco yanma niẍte unin ti' yin̈ ismam ismi', ha' chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam ay yul satcan̈, ẍi Comam.
Yanayo Comam Jes'us isk'ab yiban̈ iswi' niẍte unin tu', lahwi tu' xin isto Comam.
Ay hune' naj tzeh apni isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us, isk'amben naj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, ¿tzet hunu c'ul inwatx'enan yun̈e inchahnihan k'inale mach istan̈bal? ẍi naj.

Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chak'ambe wetan yin̈ tzet ye tu' c'ul? Wal xin hune'n̈e mac c'ul. Yaj ta chawoche hachab hak'inal mach istan̈bal, yije chejbanile ak'bilcano yu naj Mois'es, ẍi Comam.

Isk'amben naj haca' ti': --¿Baytet xin huntek'an chejbanile chawal ti'? ẍi naj. Yalni Comam: --Mach chachpotx'wahi, mach chachixli yebpaxo mach chachelk'awi, yeb mach chahobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ hawet anmahil.
Yije tzet chal hamam, hami', yebpaxo xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil haca' haya'iln̈en haba, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Istak'wi naj tet Comam: --Sunil huntek'an chawal ti' yijebiltic'a wuhan yichitaxtic'a inch'ibcan̈an. ¿Tzet hunuxa wal inyijenan? ẍi naj.

Yalni Comam tet naj: --Yaja' ta chawoche chachoccano c'ulal, as txon̈to sunil tzet ayach, cat hapohnican̈ istohol yin̈ anma meba', haxinwal ay hak'alomal yul satcan̈. Lahwi tu' cat hawoccano tzujno wintajan, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben naj tzeh tu' yalni Comam haca' tu', ispaxto naj yin̈ bisc'ulal yuto caw k'alomcano naj sic'lebil.
Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, caw ya'ta yoc anma k'alom yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Chiwalpaxojan teyet, haca' hunu no' camello tinan̈, ¿tom subutaj yec'to no' yul isholanil hunu ch'en acuẍa? Hac tu' ye anma k'alom, caw ya'ta yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj, yalni ebnaj tet hunun: "Ta hac tu', ¿mactaxca chicolchahi?" ẍi ebnaj.
Yoc t'an̈no Comam yin̈ ebnaj, yalni Comam: --Hune' ti' mach chik'oji anma iswatx'eni, wal Comam Dios sunil tzet chu iswatx'en Comam, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam: --Mamin, han̈on̈ti'an̈ bejbilcano sunil tzet ayon̈an̈ yu joc tzujnojan̈ tawintaj, ¿yuxin tzet chicochahan̈ ispajoj? ẍi naj.

Yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet chiapni istiempohal yet chiac'bilo sunil tzet ye tu', Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinoc tz'on̈nojan yul incapilan caw c'ulch'ancanoj. Haxa hex chexec' tzujtzun wintati'an, chexoc tz'on̈no yul hunun hecapil, cat heyoc heyilni yin̈ tzet chielico cablahon̈eb majan ebnaj Israel.

Yuxin mac chisbejcano yatut wuhan maca yuẍtaj, yanab, maca ismam, maca ismi', maca yuninal, maca istx'otx'; huntek'an mac tu' caw ec'balto tx'i'al ispaj selel chiak'lax tet, yeb chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal.

Ha' mac caw ay yelapno ye tinan̈, yet chiapni hune' tiempohal tu', caw matxa yelapno chielicoj. Haxa mac machi yelapno ye tinan̈ chijute jilni, yet chiapni hune' tiempohal tu' caw aycano yelapno chielcanicoj, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom: --Anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios lahan haca' hunu naj yahaw munil to yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal issaya' isc'amte' chimunla xol te' uva.
Hayet yilcha huntek'an ebnaj yu naj, yalni naj tato hune' denario chak' naj yin̈ tz'ayic tet hunun ebnaj, lahwi tu' isto ebnaj munlaho xol yuva naj.
Yin̈mi ch'en balon̈eb yin̈ yet yalan̈ chuman isto naj yul txon̈bal, yilni naj huntek'anxa ebnaj mach ismunil.
Yalni naj tet ebnaj: "Ay munil inc'atan̈an, chexintohlahan haca'tic'a caw yehi," ẍi naj. Istopaxo ebnaj munil xol yuva naj.
Naj yahaw munil tu' elpaxto naj yin̈ chumanil, yeb yin̈ ch'en oxeb, hactic'apax tu' yute yalni naj tet huntek'anxa ebnaj ilcha yu.
Yin̈xa ch'en howeb xin, istopaxo naj txon̈bal hunelxa, yilni naj huntek'an ebnaj chiec' bey tu' mach ismunil. Isk'amben naj tet ebnaj: "¿Tzet yin̈ xin ton̈e chiec' tz'ayic teyiban̈ bey ti'?" ẍi naj.

Istak'wi ebnaj: "Mamin, to machi mac chiak'ni yet comunilan̈," ẍi ebnaj. Yalni naj tet ebnaj: "Ta chisje hec'ul asi'we munil wintajan, chexintohlahan haca' caw yehi," ẍi naj. Isto ebnaj munil yinta naj.

Haxa yin̈ k'ejbiyal xin, yalni naj yahaw munil tu' tet naj chiilni ismunil haca' ti': "Awte sunil ebnaj munlawom cat hatohlan ebnaj. Ebnaj maoc munil yin̈ islahobal, ha' ebnaj chatohla babel. Wal ebnaj caw sahab maichico ismunla xin, islahobal chatohla ebnaj," ẍi naj yahaw munil tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin yawtelax ebnaj oc munil yin̈ ch'en howeb, ha' ebnaj babel tohlalaxi, hune' denario ak'lax tet hunun ebnaj.
Haxa yet yawtelax ebnaj ichico munil yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal, ham yalni ebnaj tato ec'bal istohol ebnaj chiak'laxi, yaja' machoj, hune'n̈e denario ak'laxpaxo tet hunun ebnaj.
Hayet ischahni ebnaj istohol tu' yichico ebnaj isbuchwa yin̈ naj yahaw munil tu',

yalni ebnaj: "Ebnaj mahul yet islahobalxa ti' hunxan̈e hora mamunla ebnaj, ¿tzet yin̈ xin lahan cotoholan̈ maxawak' yeb ebnaj? Han̈on̈ti'an̈ ec'bal macon̈munlahan̈, yeb xin caw majak' janmahan̈ xol k'a'," ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi naj yahaw munil tu' tet hune' naj haca' ti': "Hach wet anmahil, mach chinetlihan tawin̈ yuto majala tato hune' denario chintohlahan hatz'ayic.
Wal xin mawak'an hatohol, paxan̈toj. Ta chiwochehan ta lahan chik' ebnaj lan̈oxa maoc munil yebex, mach hawoc yin̈ hune' tu'.
Haninti'an chu wak'nihan inmelyuhan tet mac bay chiwochehan, ¿mato chichiwa hac'ul yu c'ul inc'ulan?" ẍi naj yahaw munil tu'.
Yuxin ha' mac babel tinan̈, ha' chicancano yin̈ islahobal, wal mac islahobal ye tinan̈, ha' chioc yin̈ babel. Hantan̈e mac awtebil yu Comam Dios, yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac sic'bililoj, ẍi Comam.
Yet ayxaco Comam Jes'us yeb anma yin̈ isbel bey Jerusal'en, yawtenilo Comam ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom, yalni Comam tet ebnaj:

--Tinan̈ xin lan̈an coto bey Jerusal'en, yaja' Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, chin'alaxicojan yul isk'ab ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es cat isk'anni ebnaj camical wiban̈an.

Chilahwi tu' cat quinyanicojan ebnaj yul isk'ab ebnaj mach Israeloj, cat isbuchwa ebnaj win̈an, cat quinismak'nihan ebnaj. Chilahwi tu' cat quinyanican̈an ebnaj yin̈ te' culus, yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa, ẍi Comam.
Yet hune' tiempohal tu' apni ismi' ebnaj isc'ahol icham Zebedeo ilwal yin̈ Comam Jes'us. Tzujan xin ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yinta ismi', yay jahno ixnam sata Comam yuto ay hune' tzet choche ixnam isk'ana'.

Isk'amben Comam tet ixnam: --Miyay, ¿tzet chawoche hak'ana' wetan? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ixnam: --Mamin, yet chachoc Yahawoj chink'anan tawet tato cawan̈ wuninti'an chioc tac'atan̈. Hunu naj chioc tz'on̈no yin̈ hawatx'k'ab, hunuxa naj chioc tz'on̈no yin̈ hameck'ab, ẍi ixnam.
Istak'wi Comam: --Hex ti' mach heyohtajo tzet chek'ana. ¿Chimyu heyuc'ni hune' vaso ha ha' caw c'ah haca' hune' chiwuc'an? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Ho', chu juc'nihan̈, ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin: --Yeltoni chu heyuc'ni hune' vaso ha ha' caw c'ah chiwalti'an, yaja' wal haninti'an mach wetojan walnihan mac chiay tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban yeb yin̈ inmeck'aban, to han̈e Inmaman ohtan̈e mac tet chak'a, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben ebnaj lahon̈wan̈xa iscuywom Comam, caw tit ishowal ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu'.

Yet yilni Comam hune' tu', yawtenico Comam ebnaj isc'atan̈, yalni Comam: --Hex ti' caw heyohtaj tato ebnaj ayco yahawo con̈ob, ay yip ebnaj yiban̈ con̈ob tu'. Haxa ebnaj nime winaj yul con̈ob yahawxa chute isba ebnaj yin̈ anma.
Wal texol xin mach c'uluj tato hac tu' cheyute, wal xin ta ay hunu mac ec'bal yelapno ye chabe, ahojab chioc chejaboj.
Haxa mac choche ec'bal yelapno chuco texol xin, yak'abico isba chejaboj.

Hac tu' wehan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, mach hulnajojinan yu inchejnihan anma, walxinto haca' chejab wecojan xol anma, cat wak'ni camo inbahan hac tu' xin chu intohlanan ismul tx'i'al anma, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yel Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con̈ob Jeric'o, caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam.

Ay xin cawan̈ ebnaj mach chu yilni, tz'on̈anayo isti' beh. Hayet yaben ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us lan̈an yec'toj, yahwi ebnaj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip haca' ti': --Mamin, yuninal isc'ahol naj rey David, caw tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Yaja' xin oc anma iscacha' ebnaj yun̈e isbejni ebnaj yel yaw, yaj caw islahico ebnaj yahwi, yalnipaxo ebnaj: --Mamin, isc'ahol jichmam David, caw tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Yet yaben Comam Jes'us hune' tu' yoc lin̈noj, yawtenti Comam ebnaj isc'atan̈, isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet cheyoche chinwatx'ehan? ẍi Comam.
Istak'wi ebnaj: --Mamin, chijochehan̈ chawak' hajlo cosatan̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam yin̈ ebnaj; yanico Comam isk'ab yin̈ isbak'sat ebnaj, yin̈n̈ena tu' xin ishajlo issat ebnaj, yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam.
Hayet ayto yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Jerusal'en yapni Comam bey Betfag'e, iscawilal won̈an Olivo. Ischejnito Comam cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom,
yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Asi'we bey aldea cosatac'to ti', yet chexapno bey tu' cheyila' hune' no' mi'e burro xecan, ayco yunin no' isc'atan̈; chepuholo no' cat heyinoti no' wetan.
Yaja' ta ay tzet chihallax teyin̈ xin, cheyala' haca' ti': "Ay chiocnico no' yu Comam Jes'us, yaja' chon̈hulan̈ jak'a'paxojan̈ no'," quexchi, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat haca' ti':
Halwe tet anma ay yul con̈ob Si'on haca' ti': Ilwec'anabi, lan̈an yul hereyal texol, hune' heyahaw ti' caw c'ul isc'ul, ayahto yiban̈ hune' no' tzeh burro, yunin hune' no' mi'e burro ijtzom, ẍiayoj.
Isto ebnaj cawan̈ tu', isyijen ebnaj haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam.

Yet yapni ebnaj bey tu' ispuhnilo ebnaj no' mi'e burro tu', yiniti ebnaj no' yeb no' yunin tet Comam. Islitx'banahto ebnaj xil isk'ap isk'an̈o yichin̈ no' tzeh burro tu', lahwi tu' yahto Comam yiban̈ no'.
Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam, ay mac islebayo xil isk'ap yul beh. Aypaxo mac inilo xaj te te' yanayo yul beh bay chiec'to Comam tu'.

Sunil anma babelico sata Comam yeb tzujanico yintaj, ichico yawi yin̈ caw ip, chalni haca' ti': --¡Caw niman yelapno naj ti', ha' naj ti' titna yin̈ yuninal jichmam rey David! ¡Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ mac chihul coxol yu Comam Dios! ¡Jak'a'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios ay satcan̈! ẍi anma.
Hayet yapni Comam bey Jerusal'en, iswejchacan̈ anma sunil, isk'ambeni: --¿Mac anmahil hune' naj ti'? ẍi anma.
Istak'wi huntek'anxa ebnaj: --Ha' naj ti' Jes'us, ischejab Comam Dios ay bey Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea, ẍi ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' xin yocto Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios, istzumbenilti sunil anma chitxon̈wi yeb chilok'wi bey tu'. Iswacchancan̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj helom melyu, ispac'chanpaxocan̈ Comam isẍila ebnaj txon̈om palamuch.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ha' watutan yet txah yehi," ẍiayoj. Yaja' hex ti' haca' hunu isn̈ach'en elk'om, hac tu' ye heyu, ẍi Comam.
Hayet ayicto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yapni huntek'an ebnaj mach chu yilni yeb ebnaj tx'oj ye yoj; yak'ni cawxo Comam ebnaj.

Hayet yilni ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ ley huntek'an c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam tu' caw tit ishowal ebnaj; yeb yet yaben ebnaj yalni niẍte unin: "Jak'aweco ismay isc'ahol jichmam rey David," ẍi,

yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Chimhawabe tzet chal niẍte unin ti'? ẍi ebnaj. Istak'wi Comam: --Ho' chiwabehan, yaja' ¿tom maẍto bay cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti'?: Ha' niẍte unin yeb niẍte chi-to-txutxwi ha' chak'an bitn̈eno habi, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' yel Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, isto yul con̈ob Betania, bey tu' xin cancano Comam hune' ak'bal.
Haxa hunxa tz'ayic yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayalil, ismeltzo Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en. Yet ayco Comam yin̈ isbel tu' isn̈ohchacan̈.

Yilnito Comam hune' te' higuera isti' beh, isto Comam yich te', yilni Comam ta machi sat te', xajn̈e te' aycoj. Yalni Comam yin̈ te' haca' ti': --¡Matxa bak'inal chachsatni! ẍi Comam. Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin istajilo te'.
Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu', caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul ebnaj, isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Tzet mayu istajnalo te' yin̈ an̈e? ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, ta caw cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, machi xin chicabcon hec'ul, maẍn̈etaj hune' mayu yin̈ te' higuera ti' chisje hewatx'eni. Wal xin tato cheyal tet hune' witz ti': "Heq'uilo haba bey ti' cat hato hawanoyto haba xol ha' mar," ta quexchi, chiyij isba tzet cheyala.
Yuxin ta yin̈ sunil heyanma chextxahli tet Comam Dios yet chek'anni hunu tzet ye tu', chiak'lax teyet, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, yapni Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios. Hayet lan̈an iscuywa Comam xin ishitzico ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj Israel, isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Mac cachchejni hawatx'en huntek'an hawatx'e yet ewi? ¿Mac ak'ni hawip? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Haquintu'an ay hune' ink'ambebalan teyet, ta chepajtze wetan chiwalan mac ak'n̈e wipan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu'.

¿Mac chejniti naj Juan yanocan̈ ha' iswi' anma? ¿Tom Comam Dios mato ha' anma? ẍi Comam. Yichico ebnaj yallen tet hunun haca' ti': --Tato chijala' ta Comam Dios chejniti naj Juan tu', chimyala' naj jet: "¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet yal naj?" ẍim naj.
"Yaja' ta chijalpaxoj ta ha' anma chejn̈e naj, chon̈xiw jalni yuto sunil anma chianayto yul yanma tato naj Juan tu' ischejab Comam Dios ye naj," ẍi ebnaj.
Yuxin tak'wi ebnaj tet Comam: --Mach johtajojan̈, ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Haquintu'an mach chiwalan mac ak'n̈e wipan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj hunelxa: --¿Tzet cheyute heyalni yin̈ hune' chiwalti'an? Ay hune' naj mame ay cawan̈ isc'ahol; yalni naj tet naj babel haca' ti': "C'ahol, as munlahan̈ xol te' uva," ẍi naj.
Istak'wi naj: "¡Mach chintohan!" ẍi naj. Yaja' tzujanxa xin yoc yin̈ isnabal naj istohi.
Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo naj mame tu' tet naj iscab tato chitopaxo naj munil; istak'wi naj: "C'ultic'a mam chintohan," ẍi naj. Yaja' xin mach to naj.

¿Mac xin najil yijen tzet yal ismam yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu'? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Naj babel, ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal yeb ebix ix tx'oj ye iswi' ha' chioc babel yul isk'ab Comam Dios tesataj.

Yuto hulic'o naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma quexiscuyu' yin̈ isc'ulal, yaja' mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet yal naj. Wal ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal yeb ebix tx'oj ye iswi' yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj. Wal hex ti' xin, waxan̈ca caw heyil huntek'an tu' yaja' mach hehel hebeybal, yeb xin mach heyayto yul heyanma, ẍi Comam Jes'us.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj: --Abewe hune'xa yechel chiwalti'an: "Ay hune' naj yahaw munil tz'unni te' uva sat istx'otx', ispenayo naj istz'unub tu'. Iswatx'en naj bay chiyatz'lax yal te', iswatx'enpaxocan̈ naj hune' n̈a nimajal yucan̈ istel yun̈e istan̈elax hune' peyab tu'. Lahwi tu' xin, yanito naj istz'unub tu' comonal tet huntek'an ebnaj. Isto naj yul hune'xa con̈ob caw nahat.
Haxa yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax te' uva tu' xin, yanito naj huntek'an ischejab ischahno ismajul tet ebnaj munlawom tu'.
Hayet yapni ebnaj chejab tu' xin, yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo ebnaj, ismak'ni ebnaj hune' naj, hunxa naj mak'bil ispotx'ni ebnaj, haxa hunxa naj xin k'ojlaxcan̈ naj.
Haxa yin̈ iscayel ec'balxa ebnaj chejab yato naj yahaw munil, yaja' xin hactic'apax tu' utelax ebnaj yu ebnaj munlawom tu'.
Yin̈xa istzujanil xin, ha' caw isc'ahol naj yahaw munil tu' yatoj, istxumni naj haca' ti': `Wal tet naj inc'aholti'an chimisyije ebnaj,' ẍi naj.

Yaja' hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj c'ahole tu', yalni ebnaj tet hunun: `Ha' tet naj ti' chicancano hune' tx'o tx'otx' ti', wal tinan̈ copotx'owe camo naj haxinwal jetxa chuco hune' istx'otx' naj ti',' ẍi ebnaj.
Yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo naj, yilaxilto naj yintalto peyab tu' yu ebnaj, ispotx'ni ebnaj naj," ẍi Comam.
Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --Yet chihul naj yahaw munil tu', ¿tzettaxca chute naj ebnaj munlawom tu' cheyute heyalni? ẍi Comam.

Istak'wi ebnaj: --Matxa chitz'ay isc'ul naj ispotx'ni ebnaj munlawom tx'oj tu', cat yanito naj istz'unub tu' comonal tet huntek'anxa ebnaj munlawom tz'ajan chu yak'ni ismajul yet chiuxlax sat te' uva tu', ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam Jes'us: --¿Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti'?: Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en mach isje ebnaj watx'emcan̈ n̈a yak'aco yin̈ ismunil, ha' ch'en caw ec'balto c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a. Ha' Comam watx'en̈e hune' tu', caw xin chic'ay coc'ul jilni, ẍiayoj.
Yuxin chiwalan teyet ta nanxa con̈obal chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios heseleloj, yuto yijem anma tu' yak'ni ismajul yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e tet Comam.
Wal hune' ch'en ch'en tu', ta ay mac chiayc'ay yiban̈ ch'en hayebtam isk'ahilal chioqui. Yaja' ta ha' ch'en chiayc'ay yiban̈, chiquechmoto yalan̈ ch'en, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben ebnaj iswi'ehal ebnaj sacerdote, yeb ebnaj fariseo yalni Comam haca' tu', istxumni ebnaj tato yin̈ ebnaj yal Comam huntek'an yechel tu'.
Yuxin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam, yaja' xiw ebnaj tet anma yuto sunil anma chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios ye Comam Jes'us.
Yichipaxico Comam Jes'us yalni tet ebnaj, yanico Comam huntek'an yechel yin̈ cuybanile tu', yalni Comam haca' ti':
--Ha' anma awtebil yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, lahan haca' yak'le anma yin̈ hune' k'in̈ yec'tze hune' naj rey yet ismohyi isc'ahol.
Hayet c'ulxa ye sunil, yanito naj ischejab yik'ati ebnaj awtebil yin̈ hune' mohyilal tu'. Yaja' machi hunu ebnaj isjetij.

Lahwi tu' yanipaxto naj huntek'anxa ischejab, yalni naj tet ebnaj haca' ti': "Halwe tet anma awtebil tu' tato watx'ebilxa itah. Manchejan potx'laxo hayc'on̈ inwacaxan, yeb hunmajanxa no nok' caw bak'ich, watx'ebilxa sunil. `Asi'we yin̈ k'in̈ tu',' quexchi," ẍi naj rey.
Yaja' ebnaj awtebil tu', maẍtic'a cam isc'ul ebnaj istita. Hune' naj to ilno ismunil, hunxa naj xin to ilno istxon̈.
Haxa huntek'anxa ebnaj xin, oc ebnaj howal yin̈ ebnaj chejab tu', ispotx'lax ebnaj yu ebnaj.
Hayet yaben naj rey hune' tu' caw tit ishowal naj. Ischejni naj issoldado ispotx'no ebnaj potx'wawom tu', isn̈uslaxpaxilo iscon̈ob ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo naj rey tu' tet huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab: "Sunil tzet chiocnico yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti' watx'ebilxa sunil, yaja' ebnaj awtebil wuhan mach chisjeti ebnaj, yuxin mach istzano ebnaj yul yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti'.
Wal tinan̈ asi'we yulaj calle cat hechejniti sunil mac chiilcha heyu yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti'," ẍi naj.
Yet yaben ebnaj chejab hune' tu', isto ebnaj yulaj calle, yiniti ebnaj sunil anma chiec' bey tu'. Ay anma c'ul isbeybal, ay anma tx'oj isbeybal. Caw xin nohilo te' n̈a yu anma yin̈ hune' k'in̈ tu'.
Hayet yocto naj rey yilno anma cutxanxaco tu', yilni naj hune' naj mach ayoco xil isk'ap yet mohyilal.
Yalni naj rey tet naj: "¿Tzet mayu hawocti bey ti', machi xin xil hak'ap yet mohyilal aycoj?" ẍi naj. Yaja' xin maẍtic'a tak'wi naj.
Yalni naj rey tu' tet ebnaj ischejab: "C'albawe yoj hune' naj ti' yeb isk'ab naj cat heyanilto naj xol k'ejholo, ha' bey tu' xin chiok'o naj yin̈, cat isn̈etx'laho yeh naj," ẍi naj.
Wal xin chiwalan teyet, caw tx'i'al mac awtebil yu Comam Dios yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac chissiq'uilo Comam, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Lahwi tu' ishec'nilo isba ebnaj fariseo, islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu yak'ni ayc'ayo ebnaj Comam yin̈ hunu tzoti', cat yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam yalni.

Yuxin yato ebnaj haywan̈ ebnaj ayco yin̈ ispartido, yeb haywan̈ ebnaj ayco yin̈ ispartido naj Herodes isc'atan̈ Comam, yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam. Yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, caw johtajan̈ tato hach ti' isyelaln̈etic'a chawala, chacuynipaxo anma iswatx'en haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios. Machi xin comono chawabeto yin̈ tzet chal anma, yuto lahan yelapno anma yul hasat.
Yuxin, ¿tzet chawute hawalni yin̈ hune' ti': Ch'en tohlabal chiel jin̈ yu naj jahaw ay Roma, c'ulmi jak'ni ch'en mato machoj? ẍi ebnaj.
Yaja' wal Comam Jes'us pet istxumnalo Comam tzet nabil yu ebnaj. Yuxin yal Comam: --Hex cheyal heba c'ulal ti', ¿tzet yin̈ xin chesay yin̈ tzet chu wayc'ayan yul hek'ab?
Yewe hunu ch'en melyu cheyak' yin̈ hetohlabal tu' wila'an nan̈, ẍi Comam. Yak'ni ebnaj hune' ch'en denario tet Comam.
Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin̈ ch'en? ẍi Comam.

Istak'wi ebnaj: --Yechel sat naj jahaw ay bey Roma, yeb xin isbi naj ayco yin̈ ch'en, ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam xin: --Ak'we tet naj yahaw Roma, baytet yet naj yehi, cat heyak'ni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam hune' tu', caw c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj, isbejnicano ebnaj Comam.
Yin̈tic'a hune' tz'ayic tu', ay huntek'an ebnaj saduceo bey ilno Comam Jes'us. Ebnaj saduceo tu' mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma tato itzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa, yuxin isk'ambe ebnaj tet Comam:

--Mam cuywawom, halbilcano yin̈ isley naj Mois'es haca' ti': "Ta chicam yichamil hunu ix ix, machi xin yuninal naj yeb ix, yilal yik'ni ix yuẍta naj camna tu', yun̈e ay yuninal naj yeb ix cat yoc yuninalo naj camna tu'," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' yet hunel, coxolti'an̈ ay hujwan̈ ebnaj yuẍtan̈e isba. Naj babel mohyi yeb hune' ix yaja' cam naj, machi xin yuninal naj yeb yixal tu', yuxin mohyi naj iscab yeb ix.
Yaja' campaxo naj, hactic'apax tu' yu naj isyox, masanta apni yin̈ naj ishuj, sunil ebnaj ik'len ix.
Lahwi tu' iscampaxo ix.
Yuxin hayet chiitzitzbican̈ camom, ¿mac ebnaj hujwan̈ tu' chioc yichamilo ix yuto ishujwan̈il ebnaj mohyi yeb ix? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj saduceo tu': --Hex ti', maẍtaj ha' ye heyu, yuto mach heyohtajo tzet chal yul Yum Comam Dios, yeb mach heyohtajo yip Comam.
Wal xin hayet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom matxa chimohyi, yuto lahanxa chielico haca' ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈.
Yin̈ yet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom tu', ¿tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti'?:

"Haninti'an isDiosal naj Abraham, naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob," ẍiayoj. Yuxin waxan̈ca cam ebnaj yaja' mach cam ebnaj yin̈ huneln̈e. Yuto mach isDiosalo camom ye Comam Dios to isDiosal anma itzitz, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben anma huntek'an cuybanile yal Comam tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul.
Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tato matxa yu istak'wi ebnaj saduceo tet Comam Jes'us, iscutxbanico isba ebnaj.
Xol ebnaj tu' xin ayco hune' naj cuywawom yin̈ ley, ha' naj oc ilweno Comam, yalni naj:
--Mam cuywawom, ¿baytet chejbanile caw ec'bal yelapno xol chejbanile aycano yu naj Mois'es? ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Ochewe Comam Dios yin̈ sunil hec'ul, heyanma yeb henabal.
Ha' xin hune' chejbanile tu' ha' babel yeb ec'bal yelapno xol huntek'anxa.
Ha' hune'xa iscab xin, lahan haca' hune' babel, chal haca' ti': "Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil haca' hexahann̈en heba," ẍiayoj.
Hayet chicoyijen cabeb chejbanile ti', lan̈an coyijen huntek'anxa cuybanile ak'bilcano yu naj Mois'es, yeb tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Hayet cutxantoco ebnaj fariseo tu',
isk'amben Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet cheyute hetxumni yin̈ naj Cristo? ¿Mac yin̈ chitit naj heyalni? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Yin̈ naj rey David chitit naj, ẍi ebnaj.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Yaja' naj David tu', yal naj naj Cristo Yahawoj yet yak'lax yala' naj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet yalni naj haca' ti':
Yal Comam Dios tet Wahawilan: "Ayan̈ tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban masanto chiwacojan mac ayco ishowal tawin̈ yalan̈ hawoj," ẍi Comam, ẍi naj David.
¿Tzet yin̈ xin yal naj David tu' naj Cristo Yahawiloj tato yin̈ naj titna naj? ẍi Comam.
Machi hunu ebnaj yu istak'wi yin̈ tzet yal Comam. Ha'tic'a yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin matxatic'a hunu ebnaj hitzico isk'amben hunu tzet ye tu' tet Comam.
Lahwi tu' yalni Comam Jes'us tet anma yeb tet ebnaj iscuywom:
--Ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ ley, ha' ismunil ebnaj tu' ha' ton quexiscuyni yin̈ isley Mois'es.
Yuxin sunil tzet chal ebnaj teyet yijewej, yaja' mach chebeybaln̈eto tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj, yuto ha' tzet chal ebnaj mach chisbeybaln̈e ebnaj.
Ha' cuybanil chak' ebnaj tet anma, lahan haca' hunu ijatz caw al, machi mac chik'oji yinican̈. Wal ebnaj xin nitam hunu yiximal isk'ab ebnaj chishitzico yin̈.

C'ul yub ebnaj, caw yijem chute isba ebnaj, yaja' yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma. Caw nimej chute ebnaj sat no' tz'um bay tz'ibn̈ebilico Istzoti' Comam Dios cat yanico ebnaj no' yin̈ isk'ab, maca yin̈ ispalan̈. Chanipaxico ebnaj huntek'an xil isk'ap nimej ishojo isti'.
Yet chiawtelax ebnaj wa'o yin̈ k'in̈, ha' huntek'an tz'on̈obal caw ay yelapnoj ha' chismajilo ebnaj, hac tu' chutepaxo ebnaj yulaj capilla.
Hayet chiec'paxo ebnaj yulaj calle yochebal ebnaj caw c'ul chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj, yeb xin caw choche ebnaj yabe' tato chihallax cuywawomal yin̈ ebnaj.
Wal hex ti' xin, machojab cheyoche chihallax cuywawomal teyin̈, yuto hune'n̈e mac hecuywawom, wal xin heyuẍtan̈e heba.
Machi hunu mac cheyal hemamo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuto hune'n̈ech'an Hemam, ha' ton Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈.
Machojab cheyoche chihallax iswi'ehal teyin̈, yuto hune'n̈e mac iswi'ehal yeco teyin̈, ha' ton Comam Cristo.
Wal xin ha' mac ec'bal yelapno yehi, yak'abico isba chejabo texol.
Yuto ha' mac chican̈ isba, chiilaxayoj, wal mac chiyiyo isba xin, chiilaxcan̈.

Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal, ¡caw c'anch'anex! yuto checach yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Mach cheyaco heba, machi xin chej'epaxo chioc mac choche yak'aco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios.

Hex cuywawom hex ti' yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal, ¡caw c'anch'anex! yuto cheyilo yatut ebix hun ix, chilahwi tu' caw nimej cheyute yoj hetxah, haca'tan̈e mach istx'ojal chewatx'e. Wal xin caw ec'balto isya'tajil chiay teyiban̈.

Hex cuywawom yin̈ ley yeb xin hex fariseo hex ti' cheyal heba c'ulal. ¡Caw c'anch'anex! yuto sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb yiban̈ ha' mar chelahwilo heyeq'ui yun̈e hemontenico anma teyintaj. Ha' mac chimoncha heyu tu' xin chisomchacanto yul iswi' heyu, cayel ec'balto chischah isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' tesataj.

Hex ti' lahanex haca' hunu mac mach chu yilni, yaja' cheyaco heba ijbalomal. ¡Caw c'anch'anex! Cheyalnipax haca' ti': "Ta ay mac chiak'ni binaho yatut Comam Dios yet chistak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈, mach yilalo chisyije. Yaj ta isbi ch'en oro ayicto yul yatut Comam chak' binaho yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu', caw yilal isyijeni," quexchi.
¡Caw suc hex! Lahanex haca' anma mach chu yilni. ¿Baytet ec'bal yelapno yehi? ¿Tom ch'en oro mato yatut Comam Dios? Wal xin, yu yatut Comam Dios yuxin ay yelapno ye ch'en oro ayicto yul yatut tu'.

Cheyalnipaxoj: "Ta ay hunu mac chiak'ni binaho altar yet chistak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' yiban̈, mach yilalo chisyije. Yaja' ta isbi xahanbal ayahto yiban̈ altar tu' chak' binahoj, caw yilal chisyije," quexchi.
¡Caw lahanex yeb anma mutz'an sat! ¿Baytet caw ec'bal yelapno yehi? ¿Tom ha' xahanbal ayahto yiban̈ altar tu', mato ha' altar hune' chianico ismay xahanbal tu'?
Wal xin ha' mac chiak'ni binaho altar yin̈ tzet chala, ha' hun tzet ayahto yiban̈ altar tu' chak' binahoj.
Hacpax tu' mac chiak'ni binaho yatut Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chala, ha' hun Comam Dios ay bey tu' chak' binahoj.
Hacpax tu' mac chiak'ni binaho satcan̈ yin̈ tzet chala, ha' hun istz'on̈obal Comam Dios chiyak' binahoj, cat yak'nipaxo binaho Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal tu'.

Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal. ¡C'anch'anex! cheyak' isdiezmohal te' alawena, te' aniẍ, yeb te' comino, yaja' machi cam hec'ul heyijen chejbanile caw ay yelapno aycano yu Comam Dios; ha' ton hewatx'en istoholal, yeb istz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil, yeb xin heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, yeb heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam, ha' ton huntek'an ti' yilal heyijeni, machi xin chebejpaxo heyijen huntek'anxa tu'.
¡Hex ti' lahanex yeb anma mutz'an sat, yaja' cheyaco heba ijbalomal yin̈ hunuxa maca. Hex ti' caw cheyila tato machi hunu no' nich'an us chito xol heyitah, yaja' mach cheyabe hebik'nito no' camello!

Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal, ¡caw c'anch'anex! yuto caw c'ul cheyute hetx'ahni yinta hevaso yeb hesec', yaja' wal yul xin, nohnayto yu istz'ilal heyelek' yeb yu heyec'najil.
Hex fariseo hex ti', lahanex haca' hunu mac mutz'an issat. Wal xin tx'ahwe babel yul hevaso yeb hesec', haxinwal saj chielpaxico yintaj.

Hex cuywawom hex yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal. ¡Caw c'anch'anex! yuto lahanex haca' hunu pante'on caw c'ul yehico istxohal; caw c'ulch'an jilni, yaja' wal yul xin, nohna yu isbajil camom yeb tz'il.
Haca' huntek'an pante'on tu' haquex tu'. Han̈e yin̈ sat anma caw c'ul cheyute heba, wal heyanma xin nohna yu lek'ti'al yeb yu istx'ojal.

Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti', cheyal heba c'ulal. ¡Caw c'anch'anex! yuto checayen̈e hetzantencan̈ bay mujan ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios. Chetzantenpaxo bay mujan ebnaj c'ul iswatx'e,
cheyalni haca' ti': "Tato ayon̈ic'o yin̈ hune' tiempohal yet ispotx'lax ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yu ebnaj jichmam, mach chimjaco coba copotx'ni ebnaj," quexchi.
Hayet cheyalni haca' tu', hex caw ex cheyaliloj tato yin̈ yuninal ebnaj potx'ni camo ebnaj ischejab Comam tu' quextita.
¡Wal xin ha' tzet ichebilxa yu ebnaj heyichmam tu', lahwecanoj!
Hex ti', lahanex yeb no' laba yuto caw helanex yin̈ istx'ojal. ¿Tzettaxca chu hecolni heba tet isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal?

Chinchejtojan ischejab Comam Dios texol yeb mac itz'at iswi' yin̈ yet Comam, yeb ebnaj cuywawom. Yaja' xin ay ebnaj chepotx' yul hecapilla, ay ebnaj cheyacan̈ yin̈ culus, aypaxo ebnaj chemak' yul hecapilla, yeb xin ay ebnaj chetzumbec'o yul hunun con̈ob.

Teyiban̈ xin chititcano isya'tajil yu iscamical sunil ebnaj potx'bil; ebnaj c'ul tzet iswatx'e chiichiti yin̈ iscamical naj Abel masanta yin̈ iscamical naj Zacar'ias, isc'ahol icham Berequ'ias, potx'bil xolbal yatut Comam Dios yeb bay chiak'lax xahanbal.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, chititcano isya'tajil yiban̈ anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' yu iscamical ebnaj tu', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --¡Hex ah Jerusal'en ti' chepotx' camo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios, cat hek'ojni camo ebnaj ischejti Comam texol! ¡Tx'i'al el quexwawtecojan yul ink'aban, haca' chu yawtenico no' mi'e chiyo niẍte yunin yalan̈ isxic', yaja' machi heje!
Abewecano tzet chiwalti'an, hune' hecon̈ob ti' chebeja'canoj, chicancano man̈ anmahil.
Tinan̈ xin chiwalcanojan teyet tato matxa chinheyilan masanto yet cheyalni haca' ti': "¡Jak'awe tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ mac chul coxol yu Comam Dios!" quexchi, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu', yelti Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios. Hayet lan̈an yelti Comam tu' xin ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈, yichico ebnaj isyeni huntek'an te' n̈a yetbi isba yeb yatut Comam tu'.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, huntek'an cheyil ti' chiapni istz'ayical bay chiuchc'alaxtoj. Machi hunu ch'en ch'en latz'bil ti' chican yiban̈ yet ch'enal, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us yin̈ istzalanil won̈an Olivo, yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu', ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈. Hayet ischuquil ebnaj yeb Comam tu' isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --Mamin, hal jetan̈, ¿bak'in chu huntek'an maxawal tu', yeb baytet huntek'an yechel chisye isba yet toxa chaẍhuli yeb yin̈ yet chilahwi yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'? ẍi ebnaj.
Yichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj: --Caw cheyil heba, machojab mac chexak'ni subchahoj.
Yuto tx'i'al ebnaj chuli cat isbalnico ebnaj inbihan yin̈, cat yalni: "Haninti'an Cristo inan," ẍi ebnaj. Caw xin tx'i'al mac chisubcha yu ebnaj.
Cheyaben yichican̈ howal bey ti', yeb yul huntek'anxa con̈ob. Yaja' mach chexxiwi yuto yilal yul huntek'an tu', yaj maẍto istan̈balo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Chak'lecan̈ howal ej tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob yeb huntek'anxa tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob, cat yanipaxico howal hune' con̈ob yin̈ hune'xa con̈ob. Caw tx'i'al howal yeb yabil chuli, chulpaxo wahil yeb chixcab yul hunun con̈ob.
Yaja' yichebaniln̈e isya'ilal ye huntek'an tu'.
Hex ti', chexilaxto sata ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yu yak'lax ec'oya' heyanma, cat xin quexispotx'ni camo ebnaj. Sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chexcajni yuto tzujanex wintajan.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', tx'i'al mac chiyilo yanma yin̈ Comam Dios. Chioc ishowal anma yin̈ hunun, cat ishobnican̈ anma lek'ti'al yin̈ hunun.
Tx'i'al ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios, caw xin tx'i'al mac chisubcha yu ebnaj.
Caw chiahcan̈ anma iswatx'en istx'ojal, yuxin matxa xahano chil anma yet anmahil.
Ha' mac chitecha yu masanto yin̈ islahobal, ha' chicolchahi.
Yaja' wal Tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yilal ispujbalaxic'o yul hunun con̈ob yun̈e yohtan̈encanilo anma, lahwi tu' cat yul islahobal tz'ayic.
Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu hune' ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Daniel yin̈ hune' naj chihul etanoto yatut Comam Dios yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e naj. Mac chiilni hune' ti' istxumabiloj.
Yuxin maquex ayexic'o yul con̈ob Judea ti' yet chiyuni hune' tu' yilal heyelcan̈ cat heto iswi'la witz.
Ha' mac ayahto yiban̈ yac'alil yatut, matxa chiayti yik'alti hunu tzet ye tu' yul yatut, to beh yelcan̈.
Wal mac ayto xol ismunil xin, matxa chimeltzo yik'alti xil isk'ap yul yatut.
¡C'anch'an ebix ix ayxa tzet yehi, yeb ebix chi-to-txutxwi niẍte yunin yet chiyuni hune' tu'!
Yuxin k'anwe tet Comam Dios, haxinwal machojab yin̈ n̈abil chu hune' tu', machojabpaxo yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal chiyuhi.
Yuto hune' isya'tajil chul yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', caw nanxa islowi, maẍto hunelo chu yichitax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', matxa bak'inal chupaxoj yet chilahwi yec'canoj.
Yaja' tato mach chisc'otzba Comam Dios yoj hune' tiempo tu', machim hunu mac chicolchahi. Wal xin chisc'otzba Comam yu iscolni macta sic'bilxa yu.
Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet: "Ay naj Cristo bey ti', lah," maca "ay naj Cristo bey tu', lah," ta ẍi, mach cheyayto yul heyanma.

Yuto ay ebnaj chisbalico isba Cristohal, yeb ay ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios. Chisye ebnaj huntek'an yechel yeb c'aybalc'ule yun̈e issubcha anma yu ebnaj. Etza xin chisubchapaxo mac sic'bilxa yu Comam Dios yu ebnaj.
Wal xin, ayto chiwalnicanojan huntek'an ti' teyet.
Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet: "As ilwej, ay naj Cristo bey tx'otx' desierto," ta ẍi, mach chextohi. Maca ta chihallax teyet: "Ewan ye naj bey ti', lah," ta ẍi, mach cheyayto yul heyanma.
Yuto haca' jilni isjebla c'uh bay chiahilo tz'ayic, cat isjeplapaxo bay chito tz'ayic, hac tu' chu wulan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios.
Ha'tic'a bay ayayo isnimanil hunu camom, ha' tu' chiscutxba isba no' usmij, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Chin̈elahwi yec'to huntek'an nimeta isya'tajil tu', cat isk'ejholilo yoj tz'ayic, wal ixahaw matxa chimujli, cat istitc'ay tx'umel ay satcan̈, cat xin istzicobtan̈elax sunil tzet ay yip yul satcan̈.

Lahwi tu' cat isyenican̈ isba yechel wulbalan yul satcan̈, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios. Wal anma ay yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chixiwcan̈ cat yoc ok'oj yet chiyilni wulan xol moyan. Chinhulan yeb isk'ak'al wipan.

Hayet chiok' ch'en trompeta yin̈ caw ip, chinchejnicojan ebnaj 'angel iscutxbaco sunil macta sic'bilxa wuhan yul yiban̈k'inal. Caw xin sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal chiec' ebnaj iscutxbacan̈ anma sic'bilxa tu'.
Txumwec'anab yin̈ te' higuera, hayet chiyaxbilo ischon isk'ab te' cat yelilo niẍte xaj te', cheyohtan̈eloj ta toxa chioc ha' n̈ab.
Hacpax tu' xin yet cheyilni yijni isba sunil tzet chiwalti'an, cheyohtan̈eloj tato cawilxa wetijan, haca' hunu mac lin̈anxaco sat pulta.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, sunil huntek'an ti' chij isba yalan̈to maẍto chicam huntek'an anma ayic'o yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti'.
Ha' satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' chitan̈iloj, yaja' wal intzoti'an xin machi ec'to yet yijni isba tzet chala.
Yaja' wal yin̈ tzet tz'ayical yeb tzet orahil chinhultu'an, machi mac ohtan̈e, nitam ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈. Mach wohtapaxojan hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an, walxinto han̈c'an̈e Inmaman ohtan̈e.
Haca' yu anma yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e, hac tu' chu anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal yet chinhulan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios.
Yuto yet yalan̈to maẍto chihul ha' niman yaxn̈ab, caw matzet chal isc'ul anma yin̈ tzet yal naj No'e, caw xin han̈e wa'oj yeb ismohyi ayco yin̈ isc'ul masanto yet yocto naj No'e yul te' barco.

Hayet tona nahul ay anma tu', yul hune' niman yaxn̈ab yiban̈, istan̈ilo anma sunil. Haca' yu anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', hac tu' chu anma yet chinhul lemnahan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios.
K'inalo ta ay cawan̈o ebnaj winaj hune'n̈e chimunlahi yet chiyuni hune' tu', hune' naj chiilaxtoj, hune'xa naj xin chicancanoj.
Yeb xin ta ay cawan̈ ebix hune'n̈e lan̈an iscawni, hune' ix chiilaxtoj hune'xa ix chicancanoj.
Caw majwahan̈wej, yuto mach heyohtajo tzet tz'ayical chinhulan, hanin Heyahaw inti'an.
K'inalo ta yohta hunu naj yahaw n̈a tzet orahil chul hunu naj elk'om yin̈ ak'balil, chimyilo naj iswayan̈. Hac tu' xin mach chiocto naj elk'om tu' yelk'alti tzet ay naj.
Ha' quexpax tu' hex ti', helan cheyute heba, yuto yet matxa nano heyu cat wul lemnahan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --K'inalo ta ay hunu naj yahaw munil ay haywan̈o ischejab, ham naj yijem yeb caw helan chacano naj seleloj yu yak'ni tzet chislo ebnaj ismunlawom yet chic'ayayoj.
Sak'al yet naj chejab ta lan̈an isyijen naj tzet halbilcano tet yet chiapni naj yahaw tu'.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, naj yahaw munil tu' chaco naj naj yijem tu' yahawo yin̈ sunil tzet aya.
Yaja' ta mach c'uluj chute isba naj, cat yoc naj yalni haca' ti': "Ya' wahawtu'an, ¿bak'intam chul ya'?" ta ẍi naj.
Cat yoc naj ismak'ni ebnaj chejab tu', cat yoc naj wa'oj yeb xin uc'u xol ebnaj uc'um te'.
Haxa yet istz'ayical mach echmabilo yahaw naj tu' yu, hayet tohna nahul ay naj cat yul lemna yahaw naj tu'.
Hac tu' xin chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma naj yu naj yahaw tu', haca' yak'lax ec'oya' yanma huntek'an ebnaj chal isba c'ulal. Ha' tu' xin chiok' naj cat isn̈etx'la yeh naj yu isya'tajil, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Yet chioc Comam Dios Yahawo bey ti', lahan chak'le anma haca' yu lahon̈wan̈ ebix k'opo to yin̈ hune' mohyilal yin̈ ak'balil. Yito ebix iscantil, isto ebix chahwal yin̈ naj mohyom tu'.
Yaja' xin ay howan̈ ebix mach helanoj, wal howan̈xa ebix xin caw helan ebix.
Ebix mach helano tu', han̈e te' aceite ayayto yul iscantil ebix, han̈e te' yito ebix.
Wal ebix helan xin isnohtze ebix iscantil, yinipaxto ebix yak'bilxa yaceite yul islimeta.
Yaja' xin ec'to yorahil yulbal naj chimohyi tu', caw xin k'ahan yechman ebix, matxa chitecha wayan̈ yu ebix yuxin waycan̈ ebix sunil.
Haxa yin̈ chuman ak'bal, yaben ebix yallax haca' ti': "¡Ahan̈wewanoj! ¡Lan̈an yul naj chimohyi lah! Elan̈weti hechaba naj," ẍi.
Yet yaben ebix hune' tu' yahwano ebix, yanico ebix k'a' yin̈ iscantil.
Yalni ebix howan̈ mach helano tu' tet ebix helan haca' ti': "Ak'we nino heyaceite jetan̈ yuto lan̈an istan̈ilo k'a' yin̈ cocantilan̈ lah," ẍi ebix.

Istak'wi ebix helan tet ebix mach helano tu': "Mach chu jak'nihan̈ heyet, yuto ta chijak'an̈ hanic'o heyet mach chimchabe hanic' ti' teyin̈, mach chimchabepaxocan̈ jetan̈. Wal xin, c'ul ta chexto helok'o heyet," ẍi ebix.
Yet ayto ebix howan̈ lok'o aceite tu', yapni naj chimohyi. Wal ebix caw helan tu' octo ebix yinta naj yin̈ mohyilal tu', lahwi tu' xin ispebalaxcanilti te' pulta.
Hunepxatic'a xin yapni ebix howan̈ to lok'o aceite, yoc ebix awocto sat pulta, yalni ebix: "Mamin, Mamin, haj pulta jetan̈," ẍi ebix.
Istak'wilti naj mohyom tu' tet ebix: "¡Machoj! Yin̈ caw yel chiwalan, mach quexwohtajojan," ẍi naj.
Yuxin chiwalcanojan teyet, caw helan cheyute heba yuto mach heyohtajoj tzet tz'ayical yeb tzet orahil chinhulan, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Yet chul Comam Dios Yahawoj, lahan chak'le anma haca' yu ebnaj ischejab hune' naj yahaw munil. Oc yin̈ isnabal naj isto bey hune'xa nan con̈obal caw nahat, yaja' yet yalan̈to maẍto chito naj, yawten naj ebnaj ischejab yu yanicano naj ismelyu yul isk'ab ebnaj.

Tet hune' naj, howeb mil quetzal yacano naj yul isk'ab naj, wal tet hunxa naj xin, cab mil quetzal yacano naj, haxa tet hunxa naj xin mil quetzaln̈e yacano naj. Hatatic'a ishelanil hunun ebnaj, hac tu' yu yanicano naj ch'en tet ebnaj. Lahwi tu' isto naj.
Naj chejab chahnicano ch'en howeb mil quetzal, oc naj munil yeb ch'en, caw xin howebto mil ch'en yik' naj yiban̈ilo ch'en howeb mil tu'.
Hacpax tu' naj chahnicano ch'en cab mil, cab milto ch'en yik'paxo naj yiban̈ilo ch'en cab mil tu'.
Wal naj chahnicano ch'en hune' mil, ishol naj tx'o tx'otx' ismujni naj ch'en alaxcano tet yu naj yahaw tu'.
Yet caw nimanxa tiempo chielto xin, yul naj yahaw melyu tu', yawten naj ebnaj ischejab yu yilni naj hantaxa ismelyu.

Naj chahnicano ch'en howeb mil, ha' naj oc babel yin̈ sat naj yahaw melyu tu'. Yanicano naj ch'en howeb mil ak'lax tet yeb ch'en howeb mil yik' naj, yalni naj: "Mamin, howeb mil ch'en hawacano wetan, yaja' xin howebxa mil ch'en chiwik'an yiban̈ilo ch'en," ẍi naj.

Yalni naj yahaw melyu tu' tet naj: "Caw c'ul mayu hamunlahi, yeb caw yijem maxawute haba. Yu caw c'ul maxawute haba yin̈ hanic' wacanojan tawet, yuxinto caw hantan̈eto tzet chiwacanicojan yul hak'ab. Tinan̈ xin ocan̈, ak' tzalaho hac'ul inc'atan̈an," ẍi naj tet naj.
Lahwi tu' xin yapni naj chahnicano ch'en cab mil, yalni naj tet naj yahaw melyu tu': "Mamin, cab mil ch'en hawacano wetan, yaja' xin cabtopaxo mil ch'en wik'an yiban̈ilo ch'en," ẍi naj.

Yalni naj yahaw melyu tu' tet naj: "Caw c'ul mayu hamunlahi, yeb caw yijem maxawute haba. Yu caw c'ul hawute haba yin̈ hanic' wacanojan tawet, yuxin caw nimanto tzet chiwacanojan yul hak'ab. Wal tinan̈ ocan̈, ak' tzalaho hac'ul inc'atan̈an," ẍi naj.

Haxa yet yapni naj chahni ch'en hune' mil xin, yalni naj tet naj yahaw melyu tu': "Mamin, wohtajan tato hach ti' caw how hach, yuto chahatx' tzet ye tu' maẍtajach tz'unn̈e; chawinipaxocan̈ tzet ye tu' maẍtajach watx'en̈eloj.
Wal xin quinxiwan, yuxin inmujan hamelyu yalan̈ tx'otx', yaja' tinan̈ xin chiwak'canojan ch'en tawet," ẍi naj.

Yalni naj yahaw melyu tu' tet naj haca' ti': "Hach ti' caw mach c'ulo hamunlahi, caw isa hach. Ta hawohtaj tato chinhatx'can̈an tzet ye tu' maẍtajinan tz'unn̈e, yeb ta chiwican̈an tzet ye tu' maẍtajinan watx'en̈eloj,
estam hawacto inmelyuti'an yul banco. Hayet maquinhulti'an xin, manchahnihan ch'en yeb yal," ẍi naj tet ischejab tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin yalni naj tet ebnaj ischejab: "Iwelo ch'en mil quetzal tet naj cat heyak'ni ch'en tet naj ik'n̈e ch'en lahon̈eb mil.
Yuto ha' mac ay tzet aya chiak'lax yak'bil tet, hac tu' xin caw ec'balto tzet ay hune' mac tu'. Wal mac matzet ay xin, ha' nich'an ay yul isk'ab tu', chiilaxilo tet.
Hune' naj chejab matzet chiel yin̈ ti' hawelto naj xol k'ejholo, ha' bey tu' xin chiok' naj yin̈, cat isn̈etx'la yeh naj yu isya'tajil," ẍi naj yahaw tu', ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, chinhulan Yahawilo yeb isk'ak'al wipan, cat yulpaxo ebnaj 'angel wintajan, cat way tz'on̈nojan yul incapilan.
Wal anma ay yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chicutxico insatajan, cat inpohnihan xol, haca' chu ispohni naj tan̈em me', no' me' xol no' chiw.
No' me' tu' yin̈ iswatx'k'ab naj chaco no', wal no' chiw xin yin̈ ismeck'ab naj ch'oc no'.

Hanin Yahawil inti'an chiwalan tet anma ayco yin̈ inwatx'k'aban haca' ti': "Hex xahechah isc'ulal Inmaman, ocan̈we yul hune' ehobal watx'ebil teyet yu Inmaman. Hune' ti' watx'ebil yettax iswatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Yuto hayet inn̈ochahan, heyak'ni tzet chinlohan. Yet istaj inti'an heyak'ni ha' wuc'u'an, yet wec'an ink'ana'an bay chinwayan, heyak'ni bay quinwayan.
Yet lan̈anxa wel t'ilnojan, heyak'ni xil ink'apan; yet ya'ayinan, hebey quinhetuclenojan. Yet ayinictojan yul preso, hebey quinheyilnojan," quinchin̈etic'ahan tet anma tu'.
Ha' anma watx'en istoholal tu' xin, chisk'ambe wetan haca' ti': "Mamin, ¿bak'ini cachn̈ohcha tu' jak'nihan̈ tzet chalo? yeb ¿bak'ini taj hati' jak'nihan̈ ha' hawuc'u?
¿Bak'ini xin hak'an bay cachway jetan̈, jak'nihan̈ bay cachwayi? yeb ¿bak'ini matxa xil hak'ap, jak'nihan̈ xil hak'ap?
¿Bak'ini cachyabilnipaxoj, cobeyan̈ cachcotuclenojan̈, yeb yet hawocto yul preso, con̈beyan̈ cachjilnojan̈?" ẍi anma tu'.
Chiwalnihan tet haca' ti': "Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet hecolwa yin̈ hunu ebnaj wuẍtajan, waxan̈ca caw comon yeq'ui, win̈an hewatx'e sunil huntek'an tu'," quinchin̈etic'ahan tet.

Lahwi tu' xin chiwalnihan tet anma ayco yin̈ inmeck'aban: "Elan̈we yin̈ insatan hex tz'acti'n̈ebilexxa ti', asi'we xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal watx'ebilxa tet naj matzwalil yeb tet ebnaj ischejab naj.
Yuto yet inn̈ohchahan, maẍtic'a heyak' nino tzet inlohan, yet istaj inti'an, maẍtic'a heyak' nich'ano ha' wuc'u'an.

Yet wec'an ink'ana'an bay chinwayan, maẍtic'a heyak' bay quinwayan. Yet matxa xil ink'apan maẍtic'a heyak' hunu xil ink'apan. Yet ya'ayinan yeb yet ayinictojan yul preso, maẍtic'a quinhetuclehan," quinchin̈etic'ahan tet.

Yaja' chisk'ambe anma tu' wetan: "Mamin, ¿bak'ini cachn̈ohchahi, yeb istaj hati', cachec'paxo hak'ana' bay cachwayi, yeb yet matxa xil hak'ap, machi xin con̈colwahan̈ tawin̈? Yebpaxo, ¿bak'ini cachyabilni yeb hawocto yul preso? ¿Machi xin con̈colwapaxojan̈ tawin̈ hawalni?" ẍi anma tu'.

Yaja' chintak'wihan tet: "Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, yet mach quexcolwa yin̈ hunu ebnaj wuẍtajan, yeb ebix wanaban, waxan̈ca caw comonn̈e yeq'ui, win̈an mach quexcolwa tu'," quinchin̈etic'ahan tet.
Ha' huntek'an anma tu' xin, chitocano yin̈ isya'tajil yin̈ huneln̈e. Wal anma watx'en isc'ulal, chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us huntek'an tu' xin, yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom:
--Hex ti' heyohtaj tato cabexan̈e k'in̈ Pascua, yin̈ k'in̈ tu' xin chinalaxicojan yul isk'ab anma cat walaxcan̈an yin̈ culus, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Yin̈tic'a hune' tz'ayic tu' xin, ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj yul con̈ob tu', iscutxbaco isba ebnaj bey yatut naj Caif'as, naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote.
Islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj yin̈ tzet lek'ti'al chal ebnaj yin̈ Comam Jes'us, yun̈e istzabnayo ebnaj, cat yak'ni camo ebnaj Comam yalni.
Yalni ebnaj tet hunun: --Yaja' mach yin̈o k'in̈, haxinwal mach chiah bulna anma, ẍi ebnaj.
Yet ayxa Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Betania xin, isto Comam yatut naj Sim'on, naj aytic'aco yabil chiyij lepra yin̈.

Yet ayco Comam wa'o sat meẍa, yapni hune' ix ix isc'atan̈ Comam. Ik'bil hune' ch'en limeta yu ix, alabastro isbi, nohna ch'en yu hune' an̈ caw xuk' sam, yeb caw ay istohol. Isjobnayo ix yiban̈ iswi' Comam.
Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' istit ishowal ebnaj yin̈ ix, yalni ebnaj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin ton̈e chietalaxto hune' an̈ ti'?
Hune' an̈ ti' caw ay istohol, majaltam matxon̈laxtoj, cat ispohlaxcan̈ istohol yin̈ anma meba', ẍi ebnaj.
Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us hune' tu', yalni Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin cheyiti hehowal yin̈ ix? Hune' maswatx'e ix win̈ti'an, caw c'ul.
Anma meba' ayn̈etic'aco texol, walinan xin mach sunilbal tiempo ayinic'ojan texol.
Hune' ix ti' masjobayo ix hune' an̈ caw xuk' sam wiban̈an yun̈e c'ulxa ye innimanilan yet chinmujlaxan.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, bajxan̈etu'wal chihallax Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile chihallaxpaxo hune' maswatx'e ix ti', hac tu' xin chiak'lax binaho ix, ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom.
Naj Judas Iscariote, naj ayco istz'ajo ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom Comam Jes'us, to naj isc'atan̈ ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote,
yalni naj tet ebnaj: --¿Hanta cheyak' wetan, chiwacojan naj Jes'us yul hek'ab? ẍi naj. Yalten ebnaj treinta melyu naba plata tet naj.
Hac tu' xin yu yichico naj issayni yin̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj.

Haxa yet yayilo babel tz'ayic k'in̈ Pascua, yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan̈al, ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈, isk'amben ebnaj: --Mamin, ¿baytu'wal chawoche chicowatx'ehan̈ tzet chicolo yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua ti'? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam: --Asi'we yul con̈ob, yet chexapnoj cat heto bey yatut hune' naj, cat heyalno tet naj: "Macon̈ischejtijan̈ Comam cuywawom jalan̈ tawet tato hanic'xan̈e tiempohal ayc'o coxolan̈, yuxin ha' bey hawatut ti' chon̈hulan̈ jec'tzehan̈ k'in̈ Pascua ti' yeb Comam," quexchi, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu', isto ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us, isyijen ebnaj haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam. Yoc ebnaj iswatx'en tzet chilolax yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua.
Haxa yet yah ak'bal xin, yoc Comam wa'o sat meẍa yeb ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom tu'.
Yet lan̈an iswa' Comam yeb ebnaj tu', yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, ay hune' mac texol ti' chinanocojan yul isk'ab camical, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj hune' tu', caw oc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul ebnaj. Yoc ebnaj isk'ambeno tet Comam yin̈ hununtajil: --Mamin, ¿machmitajinan? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ hununtajil.
Istak'wi Comam: --Ha' hune' mac hune'n̈e chu wanaytojan ink'aban yul plato yebi ha' chinanocojan yul isk'ab camical.

Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, yilal wec'an yin̈ camical, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios. Yaja', ¡c'anch'an naj chinanicojan yul isk'ab camical! Ayxic'a mach pitzc'a naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi Comam.
Naj Judas naj chianico Comam yul isk'ab camical tu', isk'ambe naj: --Mam cuywawom, ¿tom haninan? ẍi naj. Istak'wi Comam: --Ho', hachtoni, ẍi Comam.

Yet lan̈an iswa' Comam, yinican̈ ixim pan, yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios, isk'axponayo Comam ixim. Lahwi tu' yak'ni Comam ixim tet ebnaj iscuywom; yalni Comam: --Wawej, hune' ti' yechel innimanilan yehi, ẍi Comam.
Yinipaxocan̈ Comam ch'en vaso, yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios. Lahwi tu' yak'ni Comam ch'en vaso tu' tet ebnaj, yalni Comam: --Uc'we hune' ti' hesunil,
yuto ha' hune' ti' yechel inchiq'uilan chimalto yu istan̈ ismul tx'i'al anma, yun̈e yijnicano isba istrato Comam Dios.
Chiwalpaxojan teyet tato matxa chiwuc'an yal te' uva masanto yet chioc Inmaman Yahawilal catto wuc'nihan yin̈ yac'tohal hunelxa, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Hayet lahwi isbitn̈encano ebnaj bit tet Comam Dios, isto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj bey won̈an Olivo.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu': --Yin̈ hune' ak'bal ti' chicabconocan̈ heyanma win̈an hesunil, yuto tz'ibn̈ebilcano haca' ti': "Chinpotx'an naj tan̈em me', cat ispujnacanto no' me' tu'," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' yet chinitzitzbican̈an xin, chinbabitojan tesata bey Galilea, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam: --Mamin, waxan̈ca sunil mac chicabconcan̈ isc'ul tawin̈, yaja' walinan, machoj, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan tawet, yin̈ hune' ak'bal ti' oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan yet chiok'ocan̈ no' icham chiyo, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Istak'wi naj Pedro: --Waxan̈ca chinak'lax camojan tawinta Mamin, yaja' mach chu walnihan ta mach cachwohtajojan, ẍi naj. Haca'tic'a yu yalni naj Pedro tu', hac tu' yu yalnipaxo ebnaj sunil.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey hune' peyab chiyij Getseman'i, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Canan̈wecano tz'on̈no bey ti', chintohan txahlo cosatato ti', ẍi Comam.
Yinito Comam naj Pedro yeb ebnaj cawan̈ isc'ahol icham Zebedeo yintaj. Yoc hune' niman bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma Comam, caw xin ya' yuco yin̈ yanma.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Caw chiwabehan isya'il isbisc'ulal camical yin̈ wanmahan. Canan̈wecano bey ti'; ¡iwelo hewayan̈ wintajan! ẍi Comam.
