Yalni Comam tet naj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chinhawalan c'ulal? Hune'n̈e mac c'ul, ha' ton Comam Dios.

Hawohtami huntek'an chejbanile chalni haca' ti': "Mach chachpotx'wahi, mach chachixli, mach chachelk'awi, mach chahobcan̈ tzoti' yin̈ hawet anmahil, mach chawaco lek'ti'al, yeb xin ayojab yelapno hamam, hami' yul hasat, ¿hawohtami huntek'an ti'?" ẍi Comam tet naj.
Istak'wi naj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, sunil huntek'an ti' chinyijehan yichitax inch'ibtijan, ẍi naj.

Ist'an̈xico Comam yin̈ naj yin̈ tzalahilal, yalni Comam: --Hunxan̈e tzet maẍto chayije; as txon̈to sunil tzet ayach cat hawitxk'anto istohol yin̈ anma meba', haxinwal ay hak'alomal satcan̈, lahwi tu' xin cat hawoc tzujno wintajan, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Hayet yaben naj hune' tu' caw tx'oj yuco yin̈ yanma naj yu bisc'ulal yuto caw k'alomcano naj sic'lebil, ispaxto naj.
Yec' t'an̈t'on Comam yin̈ ebnaj iscuywom, yalni Comam: --Tzet isya'tajil yoc anma k'alom yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul ebnaj iscuywom Comam yaben hune' tu', yuxinto yalpaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Hex xahan ay wuti'an, ha' anma chaco yanma yin̈ k'alomal caw ya'ta yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
K'inalo hunu no' camello tinan̈, ¿tom subuta yec'to no' yul isholanil hunu ch'en ac'uxa? Hac tu' ye anma k'alom, caw ya'ta yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu', caw ec'balto c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj, yalni ebnaj tet hunun: --Ta hac tu', ¿mactaxca chu iscolchahi? ẍi ebnaj.
Ist'an̈xico Comam yin̈ ebnaj, yalni Comam: --Yul sat anma caw ya'ta hune' tu', wal yul sat Comam Dios mach ya'tajoj, yuto machi hunu tzet ye tu' ti' mach chu iswatx'en Comam, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam: --Mamin, sunil tzet ayon̈an̈ bejbilcano juhan̈ yu joccano tzujnojan̈ tawintaj, ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet; macn̈etic'a chisbejcano yatut, yuẍtaj, ismam, ismi', yuninal maca istx'otx' yu yoc tzujno wintajan yeb yu Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile,

hune' mac tu' chiak'lax ispaj selel tet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; hoc'al el to chiak'lax ispaj selel yatut, yuẍtaj, yanab, ismi' yeb istx'otx', waxan̈ca xin chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma. Haxa yin̈ hune' tiempohal maẍto chihuli chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal.
Yuxin ha' mac caw ay yelapno ye tinan̈, matxa yelapno chielicoj, wal mac machi yelapno xin, ha' caw ec'bal yelapno chielcanicoj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom.

Hayet ayco Comam Jes'us yin̈ isbel bey Jerusal'en, babelico Comam sata ebnaj iscuywom, caw xin chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj, wal anma tzujanpaxico xin caw chixiwi. Yawtenilo Comam ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom ischuquil, yoc Comam yalno tet ebnaj yin̈ tzet chihul yiban̈.

Yalni Comam: --Tinan̈, lan̈an coto bey Jerusal'en, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti', chinalaxicojan yul isk'ab ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, chiscawxeco ebnaj camical wiban̈an cat quinyanicojan ebnaj yul isk'ab ebnaj mach Israeloj.

Haxa ebnaj tu' xin chioc tzebo win̈an, cat istzublico win̈an, cat xin quinismak'nihan ebnaj. Lahwi tu' cat quinyak'nicamojan ebnaj, yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic xin cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu'.

Hitzico naj Juan yeb naj Jacobo isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us, ebnaj isc'ahol icham Zebedeo, yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, ay hune' tzet chicok'anan̈ tawet, yaja' chijochehan̈ chawak' jetan̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Isk'amben Comam: --¿Tzet xin cheyoche? ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj: --Estam chaje chon̈oc tz'on̈nojan̈ tac'atan̈ yet chachoc Yahawil, hunujon̈an̈ yin̈ hawatx'k'ab, hunuxahon̈paxojan̈ yin̈ hameck'ab, ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam: --Hex ti', mach heyohtajo tzet chek'ana. ¿Chimyu heyuc'ni hune' vaso c'ahla ha', haca' chiak'lax wuc'u'an? yeb ¿tom chitecha hune' niman isya'tajil heyu haca' hune' bay chinec'ojan, haca' yahbal ha' cowi'? ẍi Comam.

Istak'wi ebnaj cawan̈ tu': --Ho', chitecha juhan̈, ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam: --Yeltoni chu heyuc'ni hune' c'ahla ha' chiwaltu'an, yeb chitecha isya'tajil heyu haca' hune' chihul wiban̈an, haca' yahbalo ha' cowi'.
Yaja' wal heyoc tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban yeb yin̈ inmeck'aban, mach chu walnihan teyet, wal xin watx'ebil tet mac yetxatic'a yehi, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Hayet yaben ebnaj lahon̈wan̈xa hune' tu', istit ishowal ebnaj yin̈ naj Juan yeb naj Jacobo.

Yawtenti Comam ebnaj sunil, yalni Comam: --Caw heyohta hex ti' tato ebnaj ayco yahawilo yin̈ tx'otx' nime con̈ob, caw yahawilxa chute isba ebnaj. Hacpax tu' ebnaj caw aycano yelapno yulaj con̈ob, caw ay yip ebnaj yiban̈ej anma.
Yaja' wal texol hex ti', mach haco tu' cheyute, wal xin tato ay hunujex cheyoche ay yelapno cheyuco xol ebnaj heyetbi, aweco heba chejaboj.
Yeb xin ta ay hunu mac choche chioc iswi'ehalo texol, yak'abico isba hechejaboj.

Yuto Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, mach hulnajojinan yu inchejnihan anma, walxinto yu wocan haca' chejab xol anma yeb yu wak'ni inbahan yin̈ camical yu iscolcha tx'i'al anma, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu'.

Lahwi tu' yapni Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jeric'o yeb ebnaj iscuywom. Hayet yel Comam yeb ebnaj bey tu' xin, caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam. Ay xin hune' naj mach chu yilni, tz'on̈anayo isti' beh k'ano melyu; Bartimeo isbi naj, isc'ahol naj Timeo ye naj.
Hayet yaben naj tato ha' Comam Jes'us ah Nazaret chiec'toj, yichico naj yahwi yin̈ caw ip, chalni naj: --Mam Jes'us, hach titnajach yin̈ yuninal naj rey David, caw tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an, ẍi naj.

Caw xin tx'i'al mac cachwa yin̈ naj yun̈e isbejni naj yel yaw, yaja' xin caw ec'balto ah yaw naj, yalnipaxo naj: --Mamin, hach titnajach yin̈ yuninal naj rey David, caw tz'ayojab nino hac'ul win̈an, ẍi naj.
Yoc lin̈no Comam, yalni haca' ti': --Awteweti naj, ẍi Comam. Yawtelaxti naj, yallax tet naj haca' ti': --Aco yip hawanma, ahan̈lin̈noj chachyawte Comam, ẍi anma tet naj.
Hayet yaben naj haca' tu', yah lin̈no naj yin̈ an̈e, isbejnicano naj hune' xil isk'ap hucanico yin̈, istit naj isc'atan̈ Comam.
Isk'amben Comam tet naj: --¿Tzet chawoche chinwatx'ehan? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi naj: --Mam cuywawom, chiwochehan chawak' hajlo insatan, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Hajlojab hasat yuto maxawaco hawanma win̈an, xaisje hapaxtoj, ẍi Comam tet naj. Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin ishajlo isbak'sat naj, yoc tzujno naj yinta Comam.
Hayet lan̈an yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey con̈ob Jerusal'en, yet ayco Comam yin̈ istzalanil won̈an Olivo, xolbal con̈ob Betfag'e yeb Betania, ischejni Comam cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom,
yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Asi'we bey aldea cosatac'to ti'. Hayet chexapno bey tu', cheyila' hune' no' burro xecan, maẍto hunu mac chiahto yiban̈ no'. Chepuhilo no' cat heyiniti no' wetan.
Ta ay mac chik'amben teyet: "¿Tzet yin̈ xin chepuhilo no'?" ta ẍi, cheyala: "To ay chiocnico no' yu Comam, yaja' pet chon̈hulan̈ jak'a'canojan̈ no'," quexchi, ẍi Comam.
Isto ebnaj cawan̈ tu', yilni ebnaj no' nich'an burro tu', xecan no' iscawilal hune' pulta, ispuhnilo ebnaj no'.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj lin̈anayo iscawilal tu' k'amben tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chepuhilo no'? ẍi ebnaj.
Haca'tic'a xin yu yalni Comam, hac tu' yu yalni ebnaj, matxa tzet yal huntek'an ebnaj tu'.
Lahwi tu' yinito ebnaj no' nich'an burro tet Comam. Yanahto ebnaj xil isk'ap yiban̈ no', lahwi tu' yahto Comam yiban̈ no'.
Caw hantan̈e anma islitx'bayo xil isk'ap yul beh sata Comam. Aypaxo mac inilo isk'ab te te' yanayo yul beh bay chiec'to Comam.
Yah yaw anma babelico sata Comam yeb anma tzujanico yinta Comam, yalni anma haca' ti': --¡Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ mac chul coxol ti', yuto chejbilti naj yu Comam Dios!
¡Jak'awe tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ Jahawil chioc reyal coxol selelo jichmam David! ¡Yuch'andios tet Comam Dios! ẍixan̈e anma tu'.
Yapni Comam Jes'us bey Jerusal'en, yocto Comam yul yatut Comam, yilni Comam tzet ye yul yatut Comam Dios. Lahwi tu' ismeltzo Comam yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Betania hunelxa yuto k'ejbixa.
Haxa yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin yel Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con̈ob Betania, ismeltzo Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en. Yet ayco Comam yin̈ isbel tu' isn̈ohchacan̈.

Nahatto ay Comam xin yilnito hune' te' higuera xaelilo xaj, isto Comam yilnoj tato ay sat te' aycoj, yaja' machi hunu sat te' ilcha yu Comam, wal xin xajn̈e te' aycoj yuto maẍto istiempohalo issatni te'.
Yuxin yal Comam yin̈ te': --Matxa bak'inal chilolax hunu hasat, ẍi Comam. Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam xin yabe ebnaj yalni Comam hune' tu'.

Lahwi tu', yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con̈ob Jerusal'en; yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios, istzumbenilti Comam sunil mac chitxon̈wi yeb mac chilok'wi bey tu'. Ispac'chancanocan̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj helom melyu yeb isẍila ebnaj txon̈om palamuch.
Machi xin isje Comam ta chiec'to anma yeb yijatz yul yamak'il yatut Comam Dios.

Yoc Comam yalno tet anma tu' haca' ti': --Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ha' watutan yet txah yehi, bay chul anma ay yul hunun tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob txahloj," ẍiayoj. Walex ti' xin haca' isn̈ach'en elk'om ye yatut Inmaman heyu, ẍi Comam.

Hayet yaben ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tzet iswatx'e Comam tu', yoc ebnaj issayni yin̈ tzet chu ispotx'ni ebnaj Comam, yaja' xiw ebnaj tet Comam yuto caw chitzala anma yaben cuybanile chal Comam.
Haxa yet lan̈anxa yay numna xin yel Comam yul con̈ob yeb ebnaj iscuywom.
Haxa yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic yin̈ sahab sac'ayal ismeltzopaxo Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam ta xatajilo te' higuera.
Isnaniti naj Pedro ta ha' te' istz'acti'n̈e Comam, yalni naj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, ilc'anabi, matajnalo te' higuera hatz'acti'n̈e, ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Aweco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios.

Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet; macn̈etic'a chihalni tet hune' witz ti': "Elan̈ bey ti', bejayto haba xol ha' mar," ta ẍi. Ta xin chayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal tu', mach chi-xin-chicabcon yanma, chij isba tzet chisk'ana.
Yuxin chiwalan teyet, sunil tzet chek'an yin̈ hetxah tet Comam Dios yilal heyanayto yul heyanma ta chak' Comam teyet; ta hac tu' chechah tzet chek'ana.
Yeb yet lan̈an hetxahli, yilal heyak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ mac ayco ishowal teyin̈, haxinwal chak'paxo nimanc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ hemul.
Yuto ta mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal, mach chak'paxo Hemam ay yul satcan̈ nimanc'ulal teyin̈, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu', yapni Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en hunelxa. Haxa yet lan̈an yec' Comam yul yatut Comam Dios xin yapni ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal con̈ob, isc'atan̈ Comam.
Isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Mac chachchejni hawatx'en huntek'an hawatx'e yet ewi? ¿Mac ak'n̈e hawip hawatx'en huntek'an tu'? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam: --Haquintu'an ay hune' ink'ambebalan teyet: ¿Mac an̈eti naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma, Comam Dios mato ha' anma? Ta chepajtze wetan chiwalpaxojan mac chejn̈eintijan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu', ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam haca' tu', yichico ebnaj yallen tet hunun: --Ta chijala ta Comam Dios an̈eti naj Juan tu', chimisk'ambe naj jet: "¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ naj?" ẍim naj jet.
¿Tom xin chijala'paxoj tato ha' anma chejn̈e naj Juan tu'? ẍi ebnaj. Yal ebnaj haca' tu' yu chixiw ebnaj tet anma yuto chal anma tato naj Juan tu' ischejab Comam Dios ye naj.
Yuxin tak'wi ebnaj tet Comam: --Mach johtajojan̈, ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam: --Haquinpaxtu'an mach chiwalan teyet mac ak'n̈e wipan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu', ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' yichico Comam Jes'us iscuyni anma, yanico Comam hune' yechel ti': --Ay hune' naj tz'unni te' uva sat istx'otx', ispenayo naj istz'unub tu'. Iswatx'enpaxo naj bay chiyatz'lax yal te'. Yanipaxocan̈ naj hune' n̈a nimajal istel bay chitan̈elax te' uva tu'. Lahwi tu' yanito naj istz'unub comonal tet huntek'an ebnaj munlawom, isto naj yin̈ hune' isbel caw nahat.
Haxa yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax te' uva tu' ischejnito naj hune' ischejab ischahno ismajul.
Yaja' yet yilni ebnaj munlawom yapni naj istzablaxayo naj, ismak'lax naj, ischejlaxtopaxo naj. Matzet xin yak' ebnaj tet naj.
Lahwi tu' yanipaxto naj yahaw munil tu' hunxa ischejab hunelxa, yaja' k'ojlaxcan̈ naj chejab tu' yu ebnaj. Caw xin how ebnaj yin̈ naj.

Yanipaxto naj yahaw munil tu' hune'xa ischejab, yaja' mak'bil iscam naj yu ebnaj. Caw xin tx'i'alto ebnaj chejab yato naj yahaw munil tu', yaja' ay ebnaj ismak' ebnaj, aypaxo ebnaj mak'bil iscam yu ebnaj.

Yaja' xin ayto hune'xa mac maẍto chato naj, ha' ton isc'ahol naj caw xahan ay yu. Haxa yin̈ islahobal xin yanito naj isc'ahol tu', istxumni naj haca' ti: "Wal tet naj inc'aholti'an etzan̈em chixiw ebnaj," ẍi naj.

Yaja' yet yapni naj c'ahole tu', yallen ebnaj munlawom tu' tet hunun: "Lan̈an yul naj c'ahole lah, ha' tet naj ti' chicancano hune' tx'otx' ti', wal tinan̈ copotx'owe camo naj, haxinwal jetxa chucanico hune' tx'o tx'otx' ti'," ẍi ebnaj.
Hac tu' yu istzabnayo ebnaj naj c'ahole tu', ispotx'ni ebnaj naj, yinilto ebnaj isnimanil naj yintalto peyab.

¿Tzet xin chiutelax ebnaj munlawom yu naj yahaw munil tu', heyalni? Wal xin ha' caw naj ch'apni, cat ispotx'ni camo naj ebnaj munlawom tu', cat xin yanito naj istz'unub tu' comonal tet huntek'anxa ebnaj.
¿Tom maẍto bay cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala?: Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en isk'ojilo ebnaj watx'emcan̈ n̈a, ha' ch'en caw ec'bal c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a.
Hune' tu', ha' Comam Dios watx'en̈e yuxin caw chic'ay coc'ul jilni, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.
Yet istxumnilo ebnaj yahawil con̈ob tato yin̈ ebnaj yal Comam hune' yechel tu', yoche ebnaj yak'acto Comam yul preso. Yaja' xiw ebnaj tet anma, yuxin isbejcano ebnaj Comam, ispaxto ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' ischejlaxto haywan̈ ebnaj fariseo yeb huntek'an ebnaj ayco yin̈ ispartido naj Herodes tzotelo tet Comam yun̈e yilni ebnaj ta ay bay chiayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu tzoti', cat yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam yalni.

Yapni ebnaj isc'atan̈ Comam, isk'amben ebnaj: --Mam cuywawom, caw johtajan̈ tato isyelaln̈etic'a tzet chawala, mach xin hawoc yin̈ tzet chal anma, yuto lahan yelapno anma sunil yul hasat. Chacuynipaxo anma isyijen yin̈ haca' choche Comam Dios, yuxin chicok'ambehan̈ tawet: ¿C'ulmi jak'ni cotohlabal tet naj jahaw ay bey Roma, mato machoj? ¿Chitom isje jak'ni ch'en, mato matxa? ẍi ebnaj.
Wal Comam xin yohtaxa tato tx'oj nabil yu ebnaj, yuxin yal Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chexoc quinheyilwe'an? Iweti hunu ch'en melyu tu' wila'an nan̈, ẍi Comam.

Isyeni ebnaj hune' ch'en melyu, hayet yilni Comam ch'en, isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin̈ ch'en? ẍi Comam. Istak'wi ebnaj: --Yechel sat naj jahaw ay Roma, yeb xin isbi naj ayco yin̈ ch'en, ẍi ebnaj.
Yuxin yal Comam: --Ta hac tu', ak'we tet naj jahaw baytet yet naj yehi, cat heyak'ni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi, ẍi Comam. Caw xin c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj yaben yin̈ tzet yal Comam.
Lahwi tu' yapni huntek'an ebnaj saduceo tzotelo tet Comam. Ebnaj saduceo tu' chal ebnaj tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom, yuxin isk'ambe ebnaj tet Comam:

--Mam cuywawom, tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es tato chicam yichamil hunu ix ix, mach xin yuninal naj yeb ix, yilal yik'ni ix yuẍta naj camom tu' haxinwal ay yuninal naj yuẍtaj naj tu' yeb ix, cat yoc yuninalo naj camom tu'.
Yet hunel, ay hujwan̈ ebnaj yuẍtan̈e isba. Naj babel mohyi naj, yaj cam naj, machi xin yuninal naj yeb yixal tu'.
Yuxin mohyi naj iscab yeb ix, yaja' campaxo naj, machipaxo xin yuninal naj yeb ix. Hactic'apax tu' yu naj yox.
Hac tu' yu yik'ni ebnaj ix ishujwan̈il, iscamto ebnaj, machi xin hunu yuninal ebnaj yeb ix; haxa yet islahobalxa xin iscampaxo ix.
Yuxin hayet chiitzitzbican̈ camom yet chiitzitzbican̈ ebnaj tu', ¿mactaxca ebnaj chioc yichamilo ix, yuto ishujwan̈il ebnaj mohyi yeb ix? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Hex ti' caw c'aynajextoj, yuto mach heyohtajo tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios, yeb xin mach heyohtapaxo hanta yip Comam.
Yet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa matxa chik' ebnaj winaj yixal, matxa chik'paxo ebix ix yichamil, yuto anma chiitzitzbican̈ lahanxa ch'elico haca' ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈.

¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyayto yul heyanma ta chiitzitzbican̈ camom? ¿Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es yin̈ tzet yu istzotel Comam tet naj xol hun hoban te' tx'ix ayco k'a' yin̈, yet yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti'?: "Haninti'an isDiosal naj Abraham, naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob," ẍi Comam.
¡Yuto Comam Dios mach isDiosalo camom yehi to isDiosal anma itzitz ye Comam! Yuxin hex ti' caw maẍtaj ha' heyecoj, caw mach chitxumcha hune' ti' heyu, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yet yaben hune' naj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tato caw c'ul yu ispajtzen Comam Jes'us isk'ambebal ebnaj saduceo, yoc naj isk'ambeno tet Comam haca' ti': --Mamin, xol sunil chejbanile ak'bilcano jet, ¿baytet ec'bal yelapno yehi? ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Ha' chejbanile ec'bal yilal yehi ha' hune' ti': "Abewe hex Israel, ha' Comam Dios ha' coDiosal, han̈c'an̈e Comam ha' Jahawil.
Ochewe Comam yin̈ sunil hec'ul, yin̈ sunil heyanma, yin̈ sunil henabal yeb yin̈ sunil heyip," ẍiayoj.
Walpaxo hune' iscab chejbanile chal haca' ti': "Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil, haca' chu heya'iln̈en heba," ẍiayoj. Matxa hunuxa chejbanil ec'bal yelapno ye sata huntek'an ti', ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben naj yalni Comam haca' tu', istak'wi naj: --Mam cuywawom, caw yel chawala, han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios Jahawil, ha' coDiosal, matxa hunuxa Dios.

Yuxin tato chijoche Comam Dios yin̈ sunil janma, yin̈ sunil conabal yeb yin̈ sunil jip, cat xin coxahann̈e jet anmahil haca' chu coya'iln̈en coba, ec'bal yilal yelapno ye sata ispotx'lax no nok' cat isn̈uslax tet Comam Dios, maca isn̈uslax hunuxa tzet ye tu' yin̈ xahanbalil, ẍi naj.

Hayet yaben Comam tato c'ul yu istak'wi naj, yalni Comam tet naj: --Hach ti' cawilxa haweco hawoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam. Matxa hunuxa mac k'amben hunuxa tzet ye tu' tet Comam yuto machi mac yihti yanma yin̈ isk'amben tet Comam.
Hunel yet lan̈an iscuywa Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios, isk'amben Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin chal ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tato yin̈ naj rey David chitit naj Cristo, naj echmabil yuli?

Yaja' ha' naj David tu' halni yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo haca' ti': Yal Comam Dios tet Wahawilan: "Ayan̈ tz'on̈an yin̈ inwatx'k'abti'an masanto chiwacojan ebnaj ayco ishowal tawin̈ yalan̈ hawoj," ẍi Comam, ẍi naj David.
Tato yin̈ naj David tu' titna naj Cristo, ¿tzet yin̈ xin yal naj David naj Cristo Yahawiloj? ẍi Comam. Caw hantan̈e anma iscutxbaco isba bey tu', caw xin sunil mac yoche yabe' yin̈ tzet chal Comam.

Yet lan̈an iscuywa Comam Jes'us, yalni haca' ti': --Caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, yuto ebnaj tu' caw choche ebnaj yak'aco huntek'an xilk'ape nimej ishojo istel, yeb yochebal ebnaj caw nanxa islow chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj yet chiec' ebnaj yulaj txon̈bal.
Chissaynipaxilo ebnaj huntek'an tz'on̈obal caw ay yelapno ye yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel yeb bay chiawtelax ebnaj wa'oj.

Chanipaxico ebnaj lek'ti'al chinilo ebnaj yatut ebix hunix, yaja' yun̈e mach isyelo isba istx'ojal chiswatx'e ebnaj tu' c'ul yub ebnaj, nimej chute ebnaj yoj istxah. Ebnaj tu' caw ec'bal niman isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ ebnaj yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Hunel, tz'on̈anayo Comam Jes'us iscawilal caẍa bay chayto anma yofrenda tet Comam Dios, yilni Comam yanayto anma tu' yofrenda. Caw tx'i'al ebnaj k'alom yayto yet, caw xin tx'i'al ch'en yayto ebnaj.
Lan̈antotic'a xin yapni hune' ix hunix caw meba', yanayto ix cabeb ch'en melyu niẍch'an sat yul caẍa tu'.
Yet yilni Comam hune' tu', yawten Comam ebnaj iscuywom, yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, hune' ix hunix ti' caw ec'bal mayak' ix sata sunil ebnaj mayak' yofrenda ti'.
Yuto ebnaj k'alom ti' isk'alxan̈e chayto ebnaj, wal ix ti' xin caw meba' ix, yaj c'uxan mayayto ix ismelyu chilok'ni tzet chiocnico yu, ẍi Comam.
Yet lan̈an yelti Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios, yalni hune' naj iscuywom Comam: --Mamin, ¡ilc'anab huntek'an ch'en ch'en yeb huntek'an nimeta n̈a ti' lah! ẍi naj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Huntek'an nimeta n̈a ti' chiuchc'alaxtoj, matxa hunu ch'en ch'en latz'bil ti' chican yiban̈ yet ch'enal, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yin̈ istzalanil won̈an Olivo ayco yetc'ulal satac'ti' yatut Comam Dios; yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu'. Isk'amben naj Pedro, naj Juan yeb naj Andr'es tet Comam yet ischuquilxan̈e:
--Mamin, hal jetan̈ bak'in chihul huntek'an chawal ti', ¿tzettaxca yechel chiyu yet chijni isba? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Caw cheyil heba, machojab mac chexak'ni subchahoj.
Yuto caw tx'i'al ebnaj chuli cat isbalnico ebnaj inbihan yin̈, cat yalni ebnaj haca' ti': "Haninti'an Cristo hinan," ẍi ebnaj. Caw xin tx'i'al mac chisubcha yu ebnaj.
Hayet cheyabeni ta ay howal hecawilal maca nahata, mach chexxiwi yuto yilal yuni huntek'an ti', cat iswejchacan̈ anma, yaja' maẍto istan̈balo hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Chak'lecan̈ howal ej tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob yeb huntek'anxa tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob, cat yanipaxico howal hune' con̈ob yin̈ hune'xa con̈ob. Caw xin tx'i'al bay chiec' chixcab yeb wahil, yaja' huntek'an tu' yichebaniln̈e isya'tajil.

Caw cheyil heba yuto chex'alaxico sata ebnaj yahaw con̈ob, cat hemak'lax yulaj capilla. Chexalaxpaxico sata ebnaj gobernador yeb sata ebnaj rey, yu ayexxaco yul ink'aban. Hac tu' xin chu quinheyalnilojan tet ebnaj.
Yet maẍto chitan̈ilo yul yiban̈k'inal ti', yilal ispujbalaxic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yulajla tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob.

Hayet chexalaxico sata ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tu', mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet cheyala; wal xin ha' tzet chihallax teyet yu Comam Dios ha' cheyala, yuto maẍtajex chextzoteli, to ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Ha' yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', ay ebnaj chaco yuẍta yul isk'ab camical, ay mame mi'e chaco yuninal yul isk'ab camical, aypaxo ebnaj uninale chiyaco howal yin̈ ismam yeb ismi' cat yak'ni camoj.
Caw sunil anma chioc ishowal teyin̈ yuto ayexico yul ink'aban, yaja' mac chitecha yu masanto yet islahobal, chicolchahi.

Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu hune' ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Daniel, tato yilal yul naj chietanto yatut Comam Dios yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e. Ha' mac chiilni hune' ti' txumchahojabilo yu. Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu', mac hex ayex bey Judea ti', chexelcan̈ cat heto iswi'la witz.
Mac ayahto yiban̈ yatut xin matxahojab chiayti yik'alti hunu tzet ye tu'.
Wal mac ayto xol ismunil, matxahojab chimeltzo yik'alti xil isk'ap yul yatut.
¡Caw c'anch'an ebix ix ayxa tzet yehi, yeb ebix chito txutxwi niẍte yunin yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu'!
K'anwe tet Comam Dios haxinwal maẍtaj yin̈ n̈abil chihul hune' tu'.

Yuto caw chiec'ya' yanma anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu'. Huntek'an isya'tajil tu' maẍto hunelo chuhi yichitax iswatx'en Comam Dios hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', matxa xin bak'inal chuhi yet chilahwi yunicanoj.
Ta mach chisc'otzba Comam Dios Jahawil yoj hune' tiempohal tu', machi hunu mac chicolchahi, wal xin chisc'otzba Comam yuto xahan ay yuninal Comam yu, huntek'an sic'bilxaloj.
Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet: "Ha' bey ti' ay naj Cristo lah," maca ta "Ha' bey tu' ay naj lah," ta ẍi, mach cheyayto yul heyanma.

Yuto caw tx'i'al ebnaj lek'ti'wom chisbalico isba Cristohal. Aypaxo ebnaj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios cat isyeni ebnaj c'aybalc'ule yeb yechel yip naj matzwalil yun̈e issubcha anma yu ebnaj. Etza xin chisubchapaxo ebnaj sic'bilxa yu Comam Dios yu ebnaj.
¡Caw cheyil heba xin! Yalan̈to chiwalnicanojan huntek'an ti' teyet, ẍi Comam.
Hayet chilahwi yec'cano huntek'an isya'tajil tu', chik'ejholilo yoj tz'ayic, matxa chimujlipaxo ixahaw,
cat istitc'ay ej tx'umel ay satcan̈, cat xin isbilipaxo sunil tzet ay yip ay yul satcan̈.
Lahwi tu' cat yillax wulan xol moyan, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios. Chinhulan yeb sunil isk'ak'al wipan,
cat inchejni w'angelan iscutxbanoco sunil mac sic'bilxalo wuhan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', sunil baytajtu'wal ay anma bay chiec' ebnaj.
Txumwec'anab yin̈ te' higuera: Yet chielilo ischon isk'ab te' cat yul xaj te', cheyohtan̈eloj ta toxa chioc ha' n̈ab.
Hac tu' ye huntek'an chiwalti'an. Hayet cheyilni yijni isba huntek'an tu', yilal heyohtan̈eni tato cawilxa yeti bay chinhulan.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet; sunil huntek'an ti' chiyu yalan̈to maẍto chicam huntek'an anma ti'.
Ha' satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' ti' chitan̈iloj, wal Intzoti'an xin mach chiec'to yet yijni isba tzet chala.

Yaja' wal yin̈ tzet tz'ayical yeb tzet orahil chinhulan machi hunu mac ohtan̈e nitam ebnaj 'angel ay yul satcan̈. Mach wohtapaxojan, Hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an; wal xin han̈c'an̈e Inmaman ohtan̈e.
Yuxin caw nann̈e heyu, majwan̈wej yuto mach heyohtajo tzet orahil chinhulan.

Lahan haca' yet chito hunu naj yahaw n̈a yin̈ hunu isbel caw nahat. Yalan̈to maẍto chito naj chalnicano naj tzettaj munilal chu hunun ischejab, cat yalnicano naj tet naj tan̈em pulta tato caw chil naj isti' pulta tu'.

Ebnaj chejab tu', mach yohtajo ebnaj bak'in chimeltzo naj yahaw n̈a, mach yohtajo ebnaj tato hayet yahbal ak'bal chul naj, maca yin̈ chuman ak'bal, maca yet chiok' no' chiyo, maca yet sahab sac'ayal. Haquexpax tu' mach heyohtajo bak'in chinhulan, yuxin majwahan̈wej,
tajca tona nahul ayex cat wul lemnahan.
Huntek'an ti', maẍn̈etaj teyet chiwalan, to chiwalpaxojan tet sunil anma. ¡Caw majwahan̈wej! ẍi Comam.

Yet cabexan̈e k'in̈ Pascua, yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan̈al chialaxicoj, yichico ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es issayni yin̈ tzet chu yayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu istx'ojal; yun̈e istzabnayo ebnaj cat ispotx'ni ebnaj Comam yalni.
Xol ebnaj tu' ay ebnaj halni: --Mach chicotzabayo naj yin̈ k'in̈ yuto ahta wejna anma sunil jin̈, ẍi ebnaj.

Yet ay Comam Jes'us bey con̈ob Betania, isto Comam bey yatut naj Sim'on, naj aytic'aco yabil lepra yin̈. Yet ayco Comam wa'o sat meẍa yapni hune' ix isc'atan̈ Comam, ik'bil hune' an̈ caw xuk' sam yu ix ayayto yul hune' ch'en limeta alabastro isbi. Nardo isbi hune' an̈ tu' caw ay istohol. Isc'utznilto ix isnuk' ch'en limeta tu', isjobnayo ix hune' an̈ caw xuk' sam tu' yiban̈ iswi' Comam.
Xol mac ayicto bey tu', ay huntek'an ebnaj tit ishowal, yalni ebnaj tet hunun: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin ton̈e chietalaxto hune' an̈ caw xuk' sam ti'?
Estam matxon̈laxtoj, ec'balmi oxeb ciento denario chiak'lax yin̈, cat ispohlaxcan̈ istohol yin̈ anma meba', ẍi ebnaj. Caw xin oc ebnaj buchwal yin̈ ix.
Yaja' xin yal Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin cheyak' heti' yin̈ ix? Mach checach ix yuto hune' maswatx'e ix win̈ti'an caw c'ul.
Ha' anma meba' ayn̈etic'aco texol yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, tzijxan̈e tiempohal chu hecolwa yin̈; wal inpaxojan xin mach sunilbal tiempo ayinic'ojan texol.
Ix ti', ha' tzet chik'oji ix iswatx'eni, ha' maswatx'e ix win̈an. Mayan̈tecano ix innimanilan yalan̈to maẍto chinmujlaxan.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet; bay-xan̈e-tu'wal chihallaxic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile, chihallaxpaxo hune' maswatx'e ix ti' win̈an, cat yak'lax binaho ix, ẍi Comam.
Wal naj Judas Iscariote, naj ayco istz'ajo ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom Comam Jes'us, to naj yila' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yun̈e yanico naj Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj.
Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' caw tzalacan̈ ebnaj, yalten ebnaj melyu tet naj. Yichico naj Judas tu' issayni yin̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj.

Haxa yayilo babel tz'ayic k'in̈ Pascua, yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan̈al chialaxicoj, yeb yet chipotx'lax no' me' xahanbalil; isk'amben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tet: --Mamin, ¿baytu'wal chawoche chicowatx'ehan̈ tzet chicolo yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua ti'? ẍi ebnaj.
Ischejnito Comam cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Asi'we yul con̈ob, hayet chexapno bey tu' cheyilno hune' naj ik'bil hune' tz'ahab ha' yu, chexoco tzujno yinta naj.
Ha' bay ch'apni naj xin chek'ambe tet naj yahaw n̈a tu': "¿Baytu'wal ay hune' cuarto bay chiwa' ya' cuywawom yeb iscuywom yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua?" quexchi.
Ha' naj xin chiyeno hune' cuarto caw nimajal teyet, ayco yin̈ iscab piso, caw c'ulxa yehi. Ha' bey tu' xin chewatx'e tzet chicolo, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu', isto ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, yilcha yu ebnaj haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam. Yoc ebnaj iswatx'eno tzet chilolax yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua tu'.
Haxa yet lan̈anxa yay numna xin yapni Comam yeb ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom yul hune' cuarto tu'.
Yet ayxaco Comam wa'o sat meẍa yeb ebnaj iscuywom xin, yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, ha' hune' mac chinanicojan yul isk'ab camical, ayco naj wa'o coxol ti', ẍi Comam.
Hayet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu', caw oc bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma ebnaj, yoc ebnaj isk'ambeno yin̈ hununtajil tet Comam: --Mamin, ¿tom haninan? ẍi hunun ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam: --Hune' mac texol hex cablahon̈wan̈ hex ti', naj chislabayto ispan yul insec'an, ha' naj chinanicojan yul isk'ab camical.

Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios yilal wec'an yin̈ camical haca' yalni yul Yum Comam, yaja' c'anch'an naj chinanicojan yul isk'ab camical. Ayxic'a mach pitzc'ana naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi Comam.

Hayet lan̈an iswa' Comam, yinican̈ ixim pan, yak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios, lahwi tu' isk'axponayo ixim, yak'ni Comam ixim tet ebnaj, yalni Comam: --Chahwej, cat hewahni. Hune' ti' yechel innimanilan yehi, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' yinipaxocan̈ Comam ch'en vaso, yak'nipaxo Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios. Lahwi tu' xin yak'ni Comam ch'en tet ebnaj iscuywom, caw xin sunil ebnaj uc'ni.
Yalni Comam: --Hune' ti' yechel inchiq'uilan chimalto yu isc'ulal yin̈ tx'i'al anma. Hac tu' chu yijni isba hune' ac' trato chak' Comam Dios teyet.
Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan; matxa chiwuc'an yal sat te' uva masanto chioc Comam Dios Yahawiloj, catto wuc'nihan yin̈ yac'tohal hunelxa, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi isbitnicano Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom, isto Comam yeb ebnaj bey won̈an Olivo,

yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ hune' ak'bal ti', caw hesunil cheyik'alo heyanma win̈an, yuto hac tu' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: "Chinpotx'camojan naj tan̈em me', cat issaj lemito no' me' tu'," ẍiayoj.
Yaja' yet chinitzitzbican̈an chinbabitojan bey Galilea tesataj, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam: --Mamin, waxan̈ca sunil mac chiinilo yanma tawin̈, walinan machoj, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Pedro, yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan tawet; yin̈tic'a hune' ak'bal ti', yalan̈to maẍto chiok' no' icham chiyo yin̈ iscayel, oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan, ẍi Comam.
Islahnico naj Pedro, yalni: --Waxan̈ca chinak'lax camojan tawintaj yaja' mach chiwalan ta mach cachwohtajojan, ẍi naj tet Comam. Sunil xin ebnaj iscuywom Comam halni haca' tu'.
Lahwi tu', isto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey hune' peyab chiyij Getseman'i, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Canan̈wecano tz'on̈no bey ti', chintohan txahloj, ẍi Comam.
Han̈e xin naj Pedro, naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan yito Comam. Caw yabe Comam isya'il bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Caw chiwabehan isya'il isbisc'ulal camical yin̈ wanmahan. Canan̈wecano bey ti', mach chexwayi, ẍi Comam.
Ishitzilo Comam hanic'xa sata ebnaj, yay jahno Comam, yay xulno sat tx'otx', yoc Comam isk'anni tet Comam Dios ta ay tzet chu yec'to hune' isya'tajil chul yiban̈ tu'.
Yalni Comam yin̈ istxah: --Mam, machi hunu tzet ye tu' ya'ta yul hasat. Colinan tet hune' isya'tajil chul wiban̈ti'an, yaja' mach haca' chiwochehan to haca'ojab tzet chal hac'ul, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, ismeltzo Comam bay cancano ebnaj oxwan̈, yalni Comam tet naj Pedro: --¿Tom wayo chawu? ¿Tom mach chu hawinilo hawayan̈ hunu orahil? ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj: Iwelo hewayan̈, txahlan̈wej, haxinwal mach chexayc'ay yul isk'ab istx'ojal, wal heyanma caw hinan isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, yaja' wal henimanil xin mach chitecha ilwebal yu, ẍi Comam.
Istopaxo Comam txahlo hunelxa, haca'tic'a tzet yal Comam yet babelal, hac tu' yute yalnipaxo yin̈ iscayel.
Haxa yet ismeltzopaxo Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj xin, wayan̈ chupaxo ebnaj, yuto mach chitecha naj wayan̈ yu ebnaj. Yuxin matxa chitxumcha yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu istak'wi tet Comam.

Haxa yet ismeltzo Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj yin̈xa yoxel isbeyc'o txahloj, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tom yexn̈eto hewayi yeb hexewi? ¡Yetzanxa! Wal xin Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti' maapni yorahil walaxicojan yul isk'ab anma mulum.
Ahan̈wewanoj, ton̈wej; lan̈an yul naj chinanicojan yul isk'ab camical, ẍi Comam.

Yet lan̈an istzotel Comam Jes'us tu', yapni naj Judas, naj ayco istz'ajo ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom Comam. Caw xin hantan̈e anma tzujan yinta naj. Ay mac ik'bil yespada, aypaxo mac ik'bil iste' yu. Chejbil ebnaj yu ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb yu ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, yeb yu ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal con̈ob.
Naj Judas chianico Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj tu' halbilxa tet ebnaj yu naj haca' ti': "Ha' naj chintz'oho'an isk'otx, ha' naj chetzabayoj, cat heyinito naj; mach xin chebejtzo naj," ẍi naj.
Yuxin apnin̈e naj, ishitzico naj isc'atan̈ Comam, yalni naj: --Mam cuywawom, ẍi naj. Istz'ohni naj isk'otx Comam,
yoc bulna ebnaj yin̈ Comam, istzabnayo ebnaj.
Yaja' ay hune' naj iscuywom Comam yihti yespada yul yatut, ispitnilto naj istxiquin ischejab naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj apni tzabnoyo tu': --¿Tom elk'ominan teyet yuxin ik'bil heyespada yeb hete' win̈an chexhul quinhetzabnoyojan?
Hunun tz'ayic inbeyan cuywal yul yatut Comam Dios texol, yaja' mach quinhetzabayojan. Wal tinan̈ yilal yuni hune' ti' yun̈e yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano win̈an yul Yum Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.
Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam, elcan̈ ebnaj sunil, yanicano ebnaj Comam ischuquil.
Ay xin hune' naj tzeh oc tzujno yinta Comam, han̈e hune' k'ap s'abana ayco xilo isk'ap naj.
Istzablaxayo naj yu ebnaj inito Comam, yaja' xin iscolilo isba naj, iscancano k'ap s'abana yul isk'ab ebnaj tu'; t'ilanxa naj yet yelcan̈ naj yin̈ an̈e.
Lahwi tu' yinito ebnaj Comam Jes'us sata naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote. Iscutxbanico isba ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es.
Wal naj Pedro nahat tzujan isto naj yinta Comam, yapni naj yamak'il yatut naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote tu', yoc tz'on̈no naj k'aẍno xol ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios.

Ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel, oc ebnaj issaya' hunu tzet chioc ismulo Comam yun̈e iscawxenico ebnaj camical yiban̈ Comam yalni, yaja' machi hunu ti' cawxico ismulo Comam.
Caw tx'i'al ebnaj hobnican̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ Comam, yaja' nanantan̈e tzet chal ebnaj.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj ah lin̈noj, yalni ebnaj lek'ti'al yin̈ Comam haca' ti':
--Jabehan̈ yalni naj: "Hune' yatut Comam Dios ti' chiwuchc'ayojan, oxebn̈e xin tz'ayic chiwacan̈an selel, yaja' mach anmaho chiwatx'encan̈," ẍi naj ti', ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yaja' maẍtic'a ocpaxo hune' tu' ismulo Comam.
Lahwi tu', yah lin̈no naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, yalni naj tet Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach chachtak'wi? ¿Tzet ye huntek'an chal ebnaj tawin̈ ti'? ẍi naj.
Yaja' xin maẍtic'a tak'wi Comam tet naj. Isk'ambenpaxo naj tet Comam: --¿Tom hach ti' Cristo, Isc'ahol Comam Dios, Comam chihallax c'ulal? ẍi naj.

Istak'wi Comam: --Ho', hanintonan. Hex ti' cheyila' woc tz'on̈nojan yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios caw aycano yip, cat heyilni wulpaxojan xol moyan yul satcan̈, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam.

Hayet yaben naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu', istzilnilo naj xil isk'ap yu isyenilo naj ta tx'oj chabe naj yin̈ tzet yal Comam. Lahwi tu', yalni naj: --Wal tinan̈ matxa yilalo chicok'an mac chihalni ismul naj ti'.
Hex caw hex maxeyabe istx'ojal istzotel naj yin̈ Comam Dios. ¿Tzet cheyute heyalni yin̈ naj? ẍi naj. Sunil xin ebnaj halni tato yilal iscam Comam.

Ay xin ebnaj tzublico yin̈ sat Comam, ismajchenpaxo ebnaj sat, ismak'nipaxo ebnaj, chisk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --Haliloj mac chachmak'ni, ẍi ebnaj. Hacpax tu' ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios ocpaxo ebnaj ispak'alto sat Comam.
Wal naj Pedro ayayto naj yamak'il te' n̈a tu' yet yapni ix ischejab naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote.
Hayet yilni ix isk'aẍni naj Pedro, yoccano t'an̈no ix yin̈ naj, yalni ix: --Hach ti' hawetbi haba yeb naj Jes'us, naj ah Nazaret, ẍi ix.
Istak'wi naj Pedro: --Tzimi chawal hach ti', mach wohtajojan naj chawal tu', ẍi naj. Lahwi tu' isto naj isti' hune' niman pulta, lan̈antotic'a xin yok'can̈ hune' no' icham chiyo.
Hayet yilnipaxo ix naj Pedro, yalni ix tet ebnaj ayayto bey tu': --Hune' naj ti' yetbi isba naj yeb naj Jes'us, ẍi ix.
Yaja' xin yalpaxo naj ta mach yohtajo naj Comam. Hunepixto xin yalni ebnaj ayayo bey tu': --Yin̈ caw yeli, hach ti' hawetbi haba yeb ebnaj chiec' yinta naj Jes'us, yuto ah Galilea hach, ẍi ebnaj.
Yaja' oc naj Pedro istz'acti'n̈e isba, yalni naj: --Caw chabe Comam Dios mach wohtajojan hune' naj cheyal ti', ẍi naj.

Lan̈antotic'a yalni naj haca' tu' yok'can̈ no' icham chiyo yin̈ iscayel. Hac tu' yu isnaniti naj Pedro yin̈ tzet yal Comam tet naj, yet yalni haca' ti': "Yalan̈to maẍto chiok' no' icham chiyo yin̈ iscayel, oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan," ẍi Comam. Hayet istit yul isc'ul naj yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu', yoc naj ok'oj.

Haxa yet issajbilo xin iscutxban isba ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal con̈ob yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti', isc'alnayo ebnaj Comam, yinito ebnaj Comam yin̈ sat naj Pilato.
Isk'amben naj Pilato tet Comam: --¿Tom yeli Yahawil anma Israel hawehi? ẍi naj. Istak'wi Comam: --Ho', yel haca' hawalni ti', ẍi Comam.
Yaja' wal ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote caw ayco ebnaj yalni tx'i'al tzet ye tu' ismulo Comam.
Yuxin isk'ambe naj Pilato tet Comam: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach chachtak'wi? ¿Tom mach chawabe hanta tzet chisbalcan̈ ebnaj hamuluj? ẍi naj.
Wal Comam xin mach tak'wi Comam, yuxin caw c'ayilo isc'ul naj Pilato tu'.
Yin̈ hunun k'in̈ Pascua chi-tic'a-isbejtzo naj Pilato hunun ebnaj presowom, yaja' mactic'a chal isc'ul anma ha' chibejtzolaxi.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj anico howal yin̈ naj yahaw con̈ob, aypaxo xin anma ispotx' ebnaj yuxin ayco ebnaj preso. Xol ebnaj presowom tu' ayco hune' naj, Barrab'as isbi.
Iscutxbanico isba anma, yoc anma isk'anno tet naj Pilato ta chisbejtzo naj hunu naj presowom haca'tic'a chute naj yin̈ hunun k'in̈ Pascua.
Istak'wi naj tet anma tu': --¿Chimisje hec'ul chinbejtzohan naj Yahawil Israel? ẍi naj.
Hac tu' yute yalni naj, yuto yohta naj ta ton̈e chichiwaco isc'ul ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' yin̈ Comam, yuxin yaco ebnaj Comam yul isk'ab naj.
Wal ebnaj yahaw ebnaj sacerdote oc ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet anma ta ha' naj Barrab'as chisbejtzo naj Pilato.
Isk'amben naj Pilato tet anma: --¿Tzet wal wutenan naj isreyal Israel ti', chal tu'? ẍi naj.
Istak'wi anma tu': --¡Camojab naj yin̈ culus! ẍixan̈e anma.
Isk'amben naj Pilato: --¿Tzet xin istx'ojal iswatx'e naj? ẍi naj. Yaja' ah wejna anma tu', yalni hunelxa: --¡Camojab naj yin̈ culus! ẍixan̈e anma.
Wal naj Pilato, yun̈e istzala isc'ul anma yin̈ naj yuxin isbejtzo naj naj Barrab'as. Ischejni naj hatelaxo Comam, yanico naj Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj soldado yu yalaxcan̈ Comam yin̈ culus.
Lahwi tu' yinilto ebnaj soldado Comam yamak'il palacio, iscutxbanpaxico ebnaj huntek'anxa ebnaj soldado.
Ishucbanico ebnaj hune' k'ap k'ap caj jilni yin̈ Comam. Isbak'onayo ebnaj hune' te' tx'ix, yanahto ebnaj coronahil yin̈ iswi' Comam.
Yichico ebnaj yahwi yalni yin̈ caw ip haca' ti': --¡Tzalajon̈we yin̈ naj yahawil anma Israel ti'! ẍi ebnaj.
Chismak'nipaxico ebnaj hune' te' ah yin̈ iswi' Comam, istzublipaxico ebnaj yin̈, yeb xin chiay jahno ebnaj sata Comam, cat yay xulno ebnaj sat tx'otx'.
Lahwi istzebicano ebnaj yin̈ Comam, yinilo ebnaj hune' k'ap k'ap ishucbaco yin̈ Comam, yanico ebnaj xil isk'ap Comam. Lahwi tu' yinito ebnaj Comam yin̈ culus.
Ay xin hune' naj ah Cirene, Sim'on isbi, ismam naj Alejandro yeb naj Rufo ye naj, ispeto xin naj munil. Hayet yec'to naj sata ebnaj ik'n̈e Comam tu', istzabnayo ebnaj naj, yinito naj isculus Comam.
Yinito ebnaj Comam bey hune' tx'otx' chiyij G'olgota, chaliloj Isbajil Wi'e.
Yak'ni ebnaj vino sombil yeb huntek'an te' telaj chiyij mirra yuc'u' Comam, yaja' mach isje Comam yuc'u'.
Lahwi tu' yanican̈ ebnaj Comam yin̈ culus, yoc ebnaj soldado yilweno isba yin̈ xil isk'ap Comam yun̈e yilni ebnaj mac chiinitoj.
Yin̈ ch'en balon̈eb yet yalan̈ chuman yanican̈ ebnaj Comam yin̈ culus.
Ispahnico ebnaj hune' nich'an ak'inte' ahto yiban̈ iswi' Comam yin̈ culus bay tz'ibn̈ebilicoj tzet yin̈ xin ak'lax camoj, ẍi haca' ti': "Ha' naj ti' Yahawil anma Israel," ẍicoj.
Ay xin cawan̈ ebnaj elk'om ah yin̈ culus yinta Comam, hune' naj ah yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam, hune'xa naj yin̈ ismeck'ab.
Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano bay chala: "Alaxico naj xol ebnaj caw tx'oj chiswatx'e," ẍiayoj.
Ha' xin anma chiec'to bay alaxcan̈ Comam yin̈ culus, chisbile iswi' cat isbuchwa yin̈ Comam, chalni haca' ti': --Hach ti' chawuchc'ayo yatut Comam Dios cat hawanican̈ selel yin̈ oxeb tz'ayic hawalni,
colilo haba yin̈ culus ti', cat hawaytij, ẍi ebnaj.
Hacpax tu' ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, oc ebnaj yala' tet hunun: --Tx'i'al mac iscol naj, wal naj xin mach chu iscolnilo isba naj.

Ta chiscolilo isba naj yin̈ culus ti' yin̈ cosat, wal tu' chimjayto yul janma ta ha' naj Cristo Yahawil Israel, ẍi ebnaj. Hacpax tu' ebnaj aycan̈ yin̈ culus yinta Comam tu', ocpaxo ebnaj buchwal yin̈ Comam.
Haxa yet yapni yin̈ chumanil isk'ejholilo sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yin̈xa ch'en oxeb yin̈ k'ejbiyal issajbilo hunelxa.
Yin̈ hune' orahil tu' ah yaw Comam, yalni yin̈ caw ip: --Eloi, Eloi, ¿lama sabactani? ẍi Comam. Ha' chal yelapnoj: Mamin, Mamin, ¿tzet yin̈ xin chinhanahuln̈etojan? ẍi Comam.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj ayayo bey tu' aben tzet yal Comam, yalni ebnaj: --Abewec'anab tzet chal naj, lan̈an yawten naj naj El'ias, ischejab Comam Dios, ẍi ebnaj.

Isto hune' naj yin̈ an̈e islabanayto hune' esponja xol te' pahla vino, yanico naj hune' esponja tu' yin̈ iswi' hune' te' ah, yanahto naj yin̈ isti' Comam yun̈e yuc'ni Comam. Yalni naj tet ebnaj ayco iscawilal tu': --Jila'wej ta chihul naj El'ias yik'alo naj yin̈ culus ti', ẍi naj.
Lahwi tu' yah yaw Comam yin̈ caw ip, iscamiloj.
Wal hune' k'ap niman k'ap aycan̈ yictabanil yatut Comam Dios, cab ayico k'ap. Ichiti istzilbanil k'ap yin̈ iswi' masanta ayilo yin̈ yojtabanil.
Hayet yilni naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj soldado tzet yuhi yet iscam Comam tu', yalni naj: --Caw yeltic'abani, Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye hune' naj ti', ẍi naj.
Ay xin huntek'an ebix ix nahat yehilo ilni iscam Comam. Xol ebix tu' ayco ix Mar'ia ah Magdala yeb ix Salom'e, yeb xin ix Mar'ia ismi' naj Jos'e yeb naj Jacobo, naj tzujan unin.
Huntek'an ebix tu' ec' tzujtzun yinta Comam, iscolwapaxo ebix yin̈ Comam yet yec' yul ismajul Galilea. Aypaxo haywan̈ ebix hun yu yapni yeb Comam bey Jerusal'en.
Ha' yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin chiswatx'ecano anma Israel yin̈ tzettaj chiocnico yu yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic, yuto hunxa tz'ayic tu', tz'ayic xewilal. Haxa yet lan̈anxa isk'ejbayoj xin,

isto naj Jos'e isk'anno isnimanil Comam tet naj Pilato; caw mach xiw naj isk'anni isnimanil Comam. Naj Jos'e tu' ah Arimatea naj, ayco naj xol ebnaj yahawil yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel, caw xin ay yelapno naj yul sat ebnaj. Echmabilpaxo yu naj yoc Comam Dios Yahawiloj.
Hayet yaben naj Pilato ta cam Comam, caw c'ayilo isc'ul naj, yawten naj naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj soldado, isk'amben naj ta yeli camnaxa Comam.
Hayet yalni naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj soldado ta xacam Comam, ischejni naj Pilato ta chiyiyti naj Jos'e tu' isnimanil Comam yin̈ culus.

Hayet yaben naj xin, isto naj islok'no hune' k'ap s'abana caw ay istohol, yinayti naj isnimanil Comam yin̈ te' culus, ispichnico naj hune' s'abana tu' yin̈ Comam; lahwi tu' isto naj yanocto isnimanil Comam yul hune' ch'en ch'en holbil. Yanicanico naj hune' ch'en ch'en ismajilo isti' bay alaxicto Comam tu'.
Wal ix Mar'ia Magdalena yeb ix Mar'ia ismi' naj Jos'e yil ebix bay alaxcanicto isnimanil Comam.
Haxa yet islahwi istz'ayical xewilal xin, islok'ni ix Mar'ia ah Magdala yeb ix Mar'ia ismi' naj Jacobo, yeb ix Salom'e huntek'an an̈ caw xuk' sam yu yanico ebix yin̈ isnimanil Comam.
Haxa yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal yin̈ babel tz'ayic yin̈ semana xin, isto ebix bay mujlax Comam; ha' caw yahilo tz'ayic yapni ebix bey tu'.
Yallen ebix tet hunun: --¿Mactaxca chiinilo ch'en ayco ismajilo isti' bay ayicto Comam? ẍi ebix.
Haxa yet yilniti ebix matxa ayoco hune' ch'en niman ch'en tu' ismajilo bay alaxicto isnimanil Comam.

Hayet yocto ebix yul ch'en xin, yilni ebix hune' naj tzeh tz'on̈anayo yin̈ cowatx'k'ab yulicto ch'en, caw sajhopon̈e xil isk'ap naj aycoj, caw xin nimajal istel yoj xil isk'ap naj tu'. Caw xiwcan̈ ebix yet yilni ebix naj.
Yalni naj tet ebix: --Mach chexxiwi, wohtajan tato Comam Jes'us ah Nazaret chesayic'oj, Comam alaxcan̈ yin̈ culus. Xaitzitzbican̈ Comam, matxa Comam bey ti'. Ilwec'anab bay alaxicti Comam.
As halwe tet ebnaj iscuywom Comam yeb tet naj Pedro tato chibabi apno Comam bey Galilea tesataj, ha' bey tu' xin cheyil yin̈ Comam haca'tic'a yu yalnicano teyet, ẍi naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yelti lemna ebix bey tu', isto ebix, toxan̈e xin chiluylun ebix yu xiwquilal. Machi mac tet xin yal ebix, yuto caw xiw ebix.
Hayet yitzitzbican̈ Comam yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayalil yin̈ babel tz'ayic yin̈ semana, ha' tet ix Mar'ia ah Magdala bay isye isba Comam babel, ix bay yilo Comam hujwan̈ ischejab naj matzwalil.
Lahwi tu', isto ix yalno tet ebnaj ec' tzujtzun yinta Comam ta isye isba Comam tet ix. Ha' ebnaj tu' caw bisc'ulal ye ebnaj yeb xin caw chiok' ebnaj.
Hayet yaben ebnaj ta itzitzbican̈ Comam yeb ta isye isba tet ix, caw mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma.
Tzujan tu' xin, isyenipaxo isba Comam tet cawan̈ iscuywom yet lan̈an isto bey hune' aldea; nan yu isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ebnaj.
Isto ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yalno tet huntek'anxa ebnaj iscuywom Comam, yaja' maẍtic'a yapaxayto ebnaj yul yanma.

Haxa yin̈ tzujanilxa xin isyeni isba Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj hunlahon̈wan̈ iscuywom yet ayco ebnaj wa'o sat meẍa, iscachlax ebnaj yu Comam yu chicabcon isc'ul ebnaj; mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj xailni ta xaitzitzbican̈ Comam.
Yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj: --Asi'we sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' cat heyalnic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile tet sunil anma.
Ha' mac chianayto yul yanma cat yahcano ha' iswi', chicolchahi, yaja' wal mac mach chianayto yul yanma, chiay isya'tajil yiban̈.
Ha' huntek'an c'aybalc'ule ti' chioc yechelo tet mac chianayto yul yanma, chiyilo ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yin̈ inbihan, cat istzotel ebnaj yin̈ nan abxubal.
Waxan̈ca chistzab ebnaj no' laba, waxan̈ca chiak'lax veneno yuc'u' ebnaj, matzet chu ebnaj. Hayet chanayo ebnaj isk'ab yiban̈ anma ya'ay, cat iscawxicanocan̈, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us sunil huntek'an tu' tet ebnaj iscuywom, yilaxto Comam satcan̈, yoc tz'on̈no Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios.

Lahwi tu' xin, isto ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' yalnoc'o Istzoti' Comam Dios sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal. Caw xin ayco Comam Dios yetbiho ebnaj, yeb caw chioc yip tzoti' chalic'o ebnaj tu' yu ej c'aybalc'ule yeb yu yechel yip Comam chisye ebnaj.

Tinan̈ xin, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet mam Te'ofilo, yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' xayu coxol ti'. Ha' ebnaj chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo tinan̈ yil ebnaj yin̈ tzet yu yichicoj, lahwi tu' xin con̈iscuynicanojan̈ ebnaj yin̈ sunil tzet xayu tu'. Caw xin tx'i'al mac xayaco yin̈ isc'ul istz'ibn̈encano tzet xayu tu'.
Haquinpaxtu'an mam Te'ofilo, lahwi ink'ambenan yin̈ nanc'ulal yin̈ sunil caw yichebanil, yoc yin̈ innabalan intz'ibn̈entojan sunil ti' yin̈ istxolal tawet.
Hac tu' xin caw c'ul chu hawohtan̈eniloj ta yel chal huntek'an xahacuy tu'.

Hayet ayco naj Herodes yahawilo tx'otx' Judea, ay hun majan ebnaj xol anma Israel ch'ak'ni xahanbal tet Comam Dios, chiyij isbi Ab'ias. Xol ebnaj tu' ayco hune' icham chiyij Zacar'ias, Elizabet isbi yixal icham. Yichmam ixnam ye icham Aar'on.
Caw c'ul isbeybal icham yeb yixal yul sat Comam Dios, yeb xin caw yijem iscawan̈il yin̈ sunil ischejbanil Comam. Yuxin machi mac chu yalni tato mach yijemo icham yeb yixal sata Comam.
Wal ixnam Elizabet tu' xin, maẍtic'a yunin, yuxin machi hunu yuninal icham yeb ixnam yet yichambicaniloj.
Ha' hunel xin, ayilo istiempohal bay oc icham Zacar'ias yin̈ ismunil yin̈ sacerdotehal yeb ebnaj yetbi yul yatut Comam.
Yilwen ebnaj mac yin̈ ch'oc isbi yocto isn̈usno pom yiban̈ ismeẍahil bay chin̈uslax pom yul yatut Comam haca'tic'a chute ebnaj. C'uxan xin yiban̈ icham Zacar'ias apni.
Yet lan̈an isn̈usni icham Zacar'ias pom tet Comam Dios yul yatut Comam tu', aycanilto sunil anma txahloj.
Hayet ayicto icham Zacar'ias isn̈usno pom tu', isyenican̈ isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet icham, yoc lin̈no yin̈ iswatx'k'ab ismeẍahil bay chin̈uslax pom tu'.
Yet yilni icham naj 'angel tu', isxiwcan̈ icham, isc'aycanilo isc'ul icham.
Yalni naj 'angel: --Mam Zacar'ias, mach chaẍxiwcan̈, caw mayabe Comam Dios tzet maxawal yin̈ hatxah. Yu hune' tu' xin, chiyila' hawixal Elizabet yin̈ hune' nich'an hac'ahol, Juan chawaco isbihoj.
Caw chitzala hac'ul yin̈, caw niman anma chitzalapaxocan̈ yet chiyaben ispitzc'a nich'an heyuninal tu'.
Hune' heyuninal chipitzc'a tu', caw aycano yelapno ch'elico yul sat Comam Dios. Maẍtic'a chuc'u' vino nitam hunuxa nan uq'uehal. Ayxaco Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ yet chipitzc'ahi.
Caw hanta ebnaj israelita chiswatx'e'co isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu hune' hac'ahol tu'.

Ha' naj Juan tu' chibabito sata Comam Jahawil. Haca' ishelanil yeb yip yanma naj El'ias ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, hac tu' ch'elico naj. Yu cuybanile chal naj chimeltzoco yanma ebnaj mame yeb ebix mi'e yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb yuninal. Yebpaxo anma man̈c'om chimeltzoco isnabal cat isyijenpaxo tzet chal Comam Dios. Hac tu' chu iswatx'en isba anma, cat ischahni Comam, ẍi naj 'angel tu'.
Istak'wican̈ icham Zacar'ias tu': --¿Tzet xin chu wanaytojan yul wanmahan hune' chawal ti'? Yuto haninti'an caw icham inxahan, caw xin ixnamxapaxo wixalan, ẍi icham.
Yalni naj 'angel tu': --Haninti'an Gabriel inan. Ha' Comam Dios maquinchejnitijan walnojan hune' chejbanile caw c'ul ti' tawet.

Wal tinan̈ xin, chimajicano hati'. Matxa chiyu hatzotel tinan̈ masanto yet chijni isba yapni istiempohal ispitzc'a nich'an hac'ahol, yuto machi maxawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet mawalti'an, ẍi naj 'angel tu' tet icham Zacar'ias.
Wal anma chi'echman yelilo icham Zacar'ias tu' xin, caw chic'ay isc'ul yuto caw ec' istiempo icham yul yatut Comam Dios.

Haxa yet yelilo icham xol anma, caw matxa chu istzotel icham. Isnanilo anma tato ay huno tzet isye Comam Dios tet icham. Caw toxan̈e chisye icham yechel yu isk'ab yin̈ tzet yelax tet, wal istzotel icham, matxa chuhi.
Hayet islahwi istiempohal ismunil icham yul yatut Comam Dios, ispaxto icham yatut.
Hayet isbelwi istz'ayical tu' xin ispitzc'ati hune' nich'an unin yin̈ ixnam Elizabet. Howeb ixahaw maẍtic'a bay elto ixnam yul yatut. Chistxumni ixnam haca' ti':
--Yu ishelanil Comam Dios yuxin hac ti' wehan, yun̈e mach chiel inpixanan yuto maẍtic'a huno wuninan, ẍi ixnam ischuquil.
Wajebxa ixahaw xin ischejniti Comam Dios naj 'angel Gabriel bey con̈ob Nazaret ayco yul ismajul Galilea.
Yapni naj isc'atan̈ hune' ix k'opo, Mar'ia isbi. Wal xin tak'webilxa mohyilal yu ix tet hune' naj, Jos'e isbi, yichmam naj ye naj rey David.
Hayet yoc apno naj 'angel yul n̈a bay ay ix, yalni naj tet ix: --Tzalahan̈ yuto ayco Comam Dios hawetbihoj. Caw niman isc'ulch'anil Comam tawin̈ yuto sic'bilachilo xol hawet ixal, ẍi naj.
Hayet yaben ix tzet yal naj tu' xin, isc'ayilo isc'ul ix, yichico ix istxumnilo haca' ti': --¿Tzet yelapno ye hune' ti'? ẍi ix.
Yalnipaxo naj 'angel tet ix: --Mar'ia, mach chachxiwcan̈, yuto xa'ilcha isc'ulal hawu yul sat Comam Dios.
Wal tinan̈ xin, chipitzc'ahoti hune' nich'an winaj unin tawin̈, haxa yet chipitzc'ahi Jes'us chawaco isbihoj.
Caw ay yelapno ch'elico naj, cat xin yalni anma ta Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye naj. Ha' Isc'ahol Comam Dios Jahawil tu' chi'oco reyalil, haca' yu yoc naj rey David, yichmam naj.
Ha' naj tu' chi'oc yahawilo anma Israel yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Machi bak'inal chilahwi hune' ismunil naj tu', ẍi naj.
Isk'amben ix Mar'ia tet naj: --¿Tzet chu yijno isba hune' chawal ti'? Haninti'an maẍto wichamilan, ẍi ix tet naj.

Yalni naj 'angel tu' tet ix: --Ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chi'ayolo tawiban̈, yebpaxo yip Comam Dios caw ay ismay chiayilo tawiban̈ haca' hunu moyan. Yuxin ha' hune' unin chipitzc'a tawin̈ tu', yet Dios yehi cat yallaxpaxoj ta Isc'ahol Comam.

Haca' ixnam Elizabet hanoh, caw ixnamxa ixnam, yaja' chiyila' ixnam yin̈ hune' nich'an yunin. Wal xin ohtabil tato maẍtic'a hunu unin xapitzc'ati yin̈ ixnam, yaj wal tinan̈ wajebxa ixahaw isc'ul ixnam.
Wal xin machi hunu tzet ye tu' mach chu iswatx'en Comam, ẍi naj 'angel tet ix.
Istak'wican̈ ix Mar'ia xin: --Haninti'an ischejab Comam Dios Jahawil wehan, yubojab haca' maxawal ti', ẍi ix. Lahwi tu' xin, ismeltzoto naj 'angel.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' xin, yin̈ hamataj to ix Mar'ia bey hune' con̈ob chewal tx'otx' yul ismajul Judea.
Yapni ix bey yatut icham Zacar'ias, isk'amben ix hanic' ye ixnam Elizabet.
Hayet yaben ixnam Elizabet istzotel ix Mar'ia tu', isbili nich'an unin ijbilico yu ixnam. Hac tu' yu yoccano ixnam yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Yuxinto yal ixnam haca' ti' yin̈ caw ip: --Hach ti' Mar'ia, caw niman isc'ulal Comam Dios chak' tawet sata sunil ebix jet ixal. Nimanpaxo isc'ulal Comam chak' tet hune' hawunin chipitzc'aho ti'.
¿Tzet caw yelapno wehan yuxin mahul ismi' Comam Wahawilan quinistucle'an?
Yet mawabenan hatzotelcan̈ mabili nich'an unin ti' win̈an yu tzalahilal.
Sak'al hawet yuto hawayto yul hawanma ta chij isba tzet yal Comam Dios, ẍi ixnam Elizabet.
Lahwi tu' xin, yalni ix Mar'ia: Caw chitzala wanmahan chiwalnihan c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios Jahawil, Comam caw aycano yip.
Caw chitzalacano wanmahan yin̈ Comam Dios Incolomalan.
Waxan̈ca mach nimano welapnojan, yaja' Comam Dios ch'anayo isc'ulal wiban̈an. Yuxin chiyala' anma yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ta caw sak'al wetan yu ayayo isc'ulal Comam wiban̈an.
Yuto ha' Comam Dios, caw aycano yip, ha' chiyenilo c'aybalc'ule win̈an. Caw niman yelapno isbi Comam, caw machi nich'ano istx'ojal ayco yin̈.
Sunilbal tiempo chitz'ay isc'ul Comam yin̈ sunil mac chixiw tet.
Isyelo Comam yip, yuchc'anto Comam sunil tzet iswatx'e ebnaj chal isba can̈yehal.
Xa'el ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yul iscapil yu Comam, haxa ebnaj chewchotan̈e chute isba, yican̈ Comam.
Xayak'noho Comam isc'ul ebnaj chin̈ohchahi, haxa ebnaj k'alom xin, occano ebnaj yin̈ man̈tzetal.
Xa'oc Comam jetbiho han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti', han̈on̈ ischejab Comam jehi, maẍtic'a to nahul yu Comam, istz'ay isc'ul jin̈.
Hac tu' yu yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj jichmam; tet icham Abraham, yeb xin tet huntek'anxa ebnaj ichmame titna yin̈ naj, ẍi ix Mar'ia.
Etza oxeb ixahaw beyic'o ix Mar'ia isc'atan̈ ixnam Elizabet, ismeltzoto ix bey yatut hunelxa.
Hayet yapni istiempohal, ispitzc'a nich'an iswinaj unin ixnam Elizabet tu',
yapni ebix ay iscawilal yatut ixnam yeb yic'al ixnam tzalaho yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yak' tet ixnam.
Yin̈xa iswaxajeb tz'ayic xin, yet yak'lax circuncidar nich'an tz'ul tu', yalni anma ta Zacar'ias chij isbi haca' isbi ismam.
Yalni ixnam mi'e tu' tet anma: --Machoj, Juan chiyij isbi naj, ẍi ixnam.
Yalni anma tet ixnam: --¿Tzet yuxin hac tu' cheyak' yija' isbi? Wal xol heyic'al machi hunu mac hac tu' isbi, ẍi anma.
Yuxin eq'ui'co isk'ab anma isk'amben tet icham Zacar'ias yin̈ tzet bi'ehal chiyak' yija' isc'ahol.
Isk'anni icham hune' nich'an ak'inte', istz'ibn̈enayo icham haca' ti': --Juan chiyij isbi hune' nich'an unin ti', ẍiayoj. Toxan̈e c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul sunil anma yet yabeni.
Lan̈antotic'a xin istzotelcan̈ icham Zacar'ias, yichi yalni icham c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios.
Isc'ayilo isc'ul sunil anma ayayo iscawilal yatut icham, ispujbalaxic'o hune' ti' bey sunil chewal tx'otx' yul ismajul Judea.
Sunil anma aben huntek'an ti' chi-la-isk'amben tet hunun: --¿Tzettaxca caw ch'eloco hune' nich'an unin ti'? ẍi anma. Hac tu' yute yalni anma yuto ayco Comam Dios yetbiho nich'an unin tu'.
Wal icham Zacar'ias, ismam hune' nich'an unin tu', oc icham yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo, yalni icham tzoti' haca' ti':
Hallaxojab tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam, Comam coDiosal han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti', yuto xahul Comam con̈iscolo' han̈on̈ iscon̈obon̈ ti'.
Yati Comam Dios hune' Cocolomal caw aycano yip, hune' Cocolomal ti' titna yin̈ yuninal jichmam rey David, naj ischejab Comam.
Hune' ti' halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet ebnaj ischejab sic'bililo yu yet payat:
Chon̈iscolilo Comam tet macta ayco ishowal jin̈ yeb xin macta chichiwa isc'ul jin̈.
Yalnipaxoj ta chitz'ay isc'ul Comam yin̈ ebnaj jichmam, yeb maẍtic'a chito nahul yu isyijen tzettic'a halbilcano tet ebnaj jichmam tu'.
Ha' hune' ti' halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet jichmam Abraham yetax payat.
Yal Comam ta chon̈iscolilo yul isk'ab ebnaj chichiwaco isc'ul jin̈, haxinwal mach chon̈xiw jak'ni cheja' coba tet Comam Dios.
C'ulojab chijute cobeybal sata Comam, han̈e'ojab yin̈ Comam ayco conabal sunilbal tiempo, ẍi icham.

Yalnipaxo icham Zacar'ias tu' yin̈ isc'ahol: Walach hach ti' c'ahol, chachoc ischejabo Comam Dios caw ay yip, yuto hach babel chaẍto sata Comam Jahawil. Yu hawatx'en isbeh Comam, ha' ton hacuyni yanico anma isnabal yin̈ Comam Dios.
Hach chawak'a yabe anma yin̈ tzet chu ischahni iscolbanil yet ch'ak'laxcano tan̈o ismul yu Comam.
Yu caw chitz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈, yuxin haca' yahilo tz'ayic, cat comujli yu, hac tu' chu yul hune' Cocolomal chejbilti yu Comam.
Yu yiniti issajilk'inal jet han̈on̈ ayico k'ejholo yin̈ janma, yeb han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab naj camical. Ha' xin chon̈ijban con̈yanico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios, ẍi icham Zacar'ias.

Wal hune' nich'an unin tu' xin, haca'tic'a isch'ib isnimanil, hacpax tu' isch'ib yitz'atil iswi' yin̈ Comam Dios. Haxa yet istzehbican̈ naj, isto naj bey hune' tx'otx' desierto, ha' tu' ehayo naj masanto apni istiempohal yak'ni yohtan̈elo isba naj tet con̈ob Israel.
Ha' yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', yalni naj Augusto C'esar, yahawil yeco yin̈ tx'otx' Roma, ta ch'ilaxcan̈ isbisil sunil anma ayco yalan̈ yip tx'otx' Roma.
Hayet yah hune' babel isbisil anma ti' ha' naj Cirenio ayco gobernadoral yul ismajul Siria.
Sunil anma to istz'unu' isbi baytajtu'wal con̈ob titna yic'al.
Yuxinto el naj Jos'e bey yul con̈ob Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea, isto naj bey Bel'en yul ismajul Judea, yuto ha' tu' pitzc'ana naj rey David, yichmam naj Jos'e tu'.
Yuxin to naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia, ix tak'webilxa ismohyi yeb naj, istz'unu' isbi bey con̈ob Bel'en. Wal ix Mar'ia tu', ayxa tzet ye ix.
Hayet ay naj yeb ix Mar'ia bey Bel'en, yayilo istz'ayical iswatx'i isc'ul ix.
Yuxin ha' ta bey tu' pitzc'a nich'an isbabel unin ix. Ispichnico ix istxow nich'an yunin tu', ishilbanayto ix yul ishucub no nok', yuto matxa hamanil yul waybal.
Bey iscawilal con̈ob Bel'en, ay huntek'an ebnaj tan̈en me'; chiwayn̈en isme' sat chek'an.
C'uxan xin isyecan̈ isba hune' 'angel tet ebnaj. Yaypaxo jopla isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios yiban̈ ebnaj, isxiwcanocan̈ ebnaj xin.
Yalni naj 'angel tet ebnaj: --Mach chexxiwi yuto ay hune' tzoti' caw c'ul chinhulan wala'an teyet. Ha' hune' chiwalti'an istzalabal hec'ul yeb istzalabal sunil anma.
Bey yul con̈ob Bel'en, iscon̈ob naj rey David, ha' tu' mapitzc'a hune' Hecolomal, ha' ton Comam Cristo, Comam Jahawil.
Ha' ti' ch'ak'no hetxumuloj, pichbilico istxow yin̈, hilanayto yul te' hucub bay chalaxayto istelaj no nok', ẍi naj tet ebnaj.
Lan̈antotic'a xin, isyenican̈ isba hun bulanxa ebnaj 'angel isc'atan̈ naj babel tu'. Istzabnico ebnaj isbitn̈en isbi Comam, chi-la-yalni ebnaj:
Jalawe c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈, ayojab ak'anc'ulal sat tx'o tx'otx' xol anma ochebil yu Comam Dios, ẍi ebnaj.
Hayet ispaxto ebnaj satcan̈, yichico ebnaj tan̈em me' yalni tet hunun: --Ton̈we bey Bel'en jila' hune' mayu tu', hune' mayak' Comam Dios Jahawil johtan̈elo ti', ẍile ebnaj tet hunun.
Yin̈ an̈e xin, to ebnaj yila'. Hayet yapni ebnaj xin, yilchayo ix Mar'ia yeb naj Jos'e, yeb nich'an nene' ayayto yul ishucub no nok'.
Yet yilnico ebnaj yin̈ nich'an nene' tu' xin, istzabloco yalni ebnaj tet sunil anma tzet hallax tet ebnaj yu naj 'angel yin̈ hune' nich'an nene' tu'.
Sunil anma aben huntek'an yal ebnaj tan̈em me' tu', caw c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul anma yabeni.
Wal ix Mar'ia xin, ton̈e isc'ubacano ix yul yanma yin̈ huntek'an tzet yal ebnaj, chi-la-ec' yin̈ isnabal ix yin̈ tzet caw yehi.

Wal ebnaj tan̈em me', hayet ispaxto ebnaj yichico ebnaj yanico ismay Comam Dios, yak'nipaxo ebnaj yuch'andiosal tet Comam yin̈ tzet yabe' ebnaj, yeb xin yu tzet bey ebnaj yila', yuto haca'tic'a yu yallax tet ebnaj hac tu' elicoj.

Hujebxa tz'ayic ispitzc'a nich'an Jes'us tu', yalaxico yechel isnimanil, hune' chiyij circuncisi'on. Jes'us yijcano isbi haca' yu yalnicano naj 'angel tet ix yet maẍto chipitzc'ati nich'an unin yin̈ ix.
Yet yayilo istz'ayical bay chisajn̈e isba ebix haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es, yinito naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia nich'an nene' tu' yelaxo tet Comam Dios bey Jerusal'en.
Isyije naj yeb ix haca' tu' yuto tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ha' niẍte winaj unin chibabel pitzc'ahi, chi'ak'lax tet Comam Dios Jahawil," ẍi yul Yum Comam.
Yinito naj yeb ix isxahanbal haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es bay chala: "Caw yilal yak'ni cac'on̈ no' palamuch maca cac'on̈ no' muc'," ẍiayoj.

Yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', ay hune' icham chiyij isbi Sime'on, caw c'ulcano isbeybal icham, han̈ech'an tet Comam Dios bay chiyiyo isba. Echmabiln̈etic'a yul Iscolomal con̈ob Israel yu icham. Ayco Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ ichmam.
Ha' ch'ak'ni nachaholo yu tato maẍto chicami masanto chiyilico yin̈ Comam Cristo, Comam chejbilti yu Comam Dios.

Ayxacto icham Sime'on tu' yul yatut Comam Dios yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet yapni naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia yeb nich'an Jes'us. Apni iscawan̈il yul yatut Comam tu' yu isyijen tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ ischejbanil ebnaj Israel yu Comam Dios.
Ischelnilo icham Sime'on nich'an nene' tu', yalni icham c'ulla tzoti' tet Comam Dios haca' ti': Mamin, hachejab wehan. Wal tinan̈ xin, xayu incaman
yuto mayij isba tzet halbilcano hawu wetan.
Yuto mawilicojan yu insatan yin̈ Cocolomalan̈ ti'.
Ha' hune' mac ti' chawacanico yin̈ sat sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Ha' xin ch'ak'no sajbolo yanma hanta anma mach Israeloj, cat xin isbinahocano con̈ob Israel yu Cocolomalan̈ ti', ẍi icham Sime'on tet Comam Dios.
Caw xin, c'aycan̈ isc'ul naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia yet yaben sunil tzoti' caw c'ul yal icham Sime'on yin̈ naj nene' tet Comam Dios.

Lahwi tu' xin, isk'annicano icham Sime'on isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios yiban̈. Yalni naj tet ix Mar'ia: --Naj nich'an ti' caw ixtan̈xa yehi ta caw hantan̈e anma Israel chic'ayo'to yanma yu naj, yaj caw ixtan̈xa yepaxo tato caw hantan̈e anma Israel chiswatx'e'paxo isbeybal yu naj. Ha' naj chiyenolo tzet chiyub iscolchaho anma xol istx'ojal, yaj xin caw ay anma chiyahno naj.

Hac tu' xin chu yixtan̈wicanilo tzet ch'ec' yul isnabal anma yeb tzet ch'ec' yul yanma anma. Walach hach ti', ch'ayolo hune' tz'ayic yet caw chi'oco bisc'ulal yin̈ hawanma yu naj nene' ti'. Haca' isya'il chispolto huno ch'en espada, hac tu' isya'il ch'elico hawanma, ẍicano icham Sime'on tet ix Mar'ia.

Bey yul yatut Comam Dios tu' xin, ha' tu' ayicto hune' ixnam chitzotel yu yip Comam Dios. Hune' ixnam tu', Ana isbi, iscutz'in naj Fanuel, titna yin̈ yuninal naj Aser. Yet k'opo ixnam yik'ni ixnam yichamil, yaj hujeb ch'an habil yik'le isba naj yeb ix, iscam naj.

Caw xin ochenta y cuatro habilxa iscancano ixnam hunixal. Tz'ayic ak'bal ayn̈etic'acto ixnam yul yatut Comam Dios yu istxahli yeb yu yinayo isba tet Comam. Caw xin chisyijepaxo ixnam hune' yet mach chon̈wa'i yu cotxahli tet Comam.

Yapni ixnam isc'atan̈ naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia, yak'ni ixnam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios. Lahwi tu' xin, istzabloco yalnic'o ixnam cuybanil yin̈ naj nene' tu' tet sunil anma ch'echman yul iscolbanil con̈ob Jerusal'en.
Hayet islahwi isyijencano naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia yin̈ tzet chal ischejbanil ebnaj Israel yu Comam Dios, ispaxto naj yeb ix bey iscon̈ob Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea.
Wal nich'an unin tu' xin, caw sak'al isch'ibi, caw ch'ocpaxo yip isnimanil yeb yitz'atil iswi'. Caw xin ayayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yiban̈.
Hunun habil isbeyc'o ismam ismi' nich'an Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios bey con̈ob Jerusal'en yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua.
Haxa yet istz'ajna naj nich'an Jes'us yin̈ iscablahon̈eb habil, isto naj yinta ismam yeb ismi' yin̈ k'in̈ haca' chu isbeyic'o anma yin̈ hunun habil.
Lahwin̈e k'in̈ tu' xin, ismeltzoto naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia. Wal naj nich'an Jes'us, cancano naj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en, yaja' mach yohtajo ismam naj yeb ismi' naj tato cancano naj.

Ha' yalni ismam naj yeb ismi' naj ta paxto naj xol anma ilom k'in̈. Hune' tz'ayicxa isbelwito ismam yeb ismi' naj, yoc ismam yeb ismi' naj issaynoyo naj xol yic'al yeb xol mac ohtan̈e nich'an Jes'us tu'.
Yaja' maẍtic'a ilcha naj, yuxin meltzoto naj Jos'e yeb ix Mar'ia saywal yin̈ naj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en.

Haxa yet yox tz'ayic xin, yilchati naj nich'an tu' yul yatut Comam Dios yu ismam yeb ismi'. Tz'on̈anicto naj xol ebnaj ichamta winaj caw yahawil yin̈ iscuyni anma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es. Caw ayco naj nich'an Jes'us tu' yaben tzet chal ebnaj, chisk'ambenpaxo naj tet ebnaj.
Wal xin, caw chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj chi'aben tzet chiyal naj nich'an Jes'us tu' yuto caw helan naj, yeb xin caw c'ul ispaj istzoti' ebnaj chiyak' naj.
Haxa yet yilcha naj yu ismam yeb ismi', caw c'ayilo isc'ul. Yalni ismi' naj tet: --Wunin, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxinto hac ti' chon̈hawutehan̈? Haninan yeb hamam caw bisc'ulal jehan̈ cachcosaynic'ojan̈, ẍi ix.
Istak'wican̈ naj nich'an Jes'us: --¿Tzet yin̈ nan bay chinhesayic'ojan? ¿Tom mach heyohtajo tato yul yatut Inmaman caw yilal incanan? ẍi naj tet ismi' tu'.
Wal xin machi txumchalo yu ismam yeb ismi' yin̈ tzet chalilo hune' yal naj tu'.

Lahwi tu' xin, ismeltzo naj yinta ismam yeb ismi' bey yul con̈ob Nazaret. Caw xin yijem naj tet ismam yeb tet ismi'. Ton̈e xin isc'uba ismi' naj yin̈ yanma yin̈ huntek'an tu', chistxumni ix yin̈ tzet yelapno yehi.
Wal naj nich'an Jes'us tu' xin, haca' isch'ib isnimanil, hac tu' isch'ibpaxo yitz'atil iswi' naj. Caw chitzala yanma Comam Dios yin̈ naj, caw chitzalapaxo anma yin̈ naj.

Ayxaco yin̈ isholan̈eb habil yoc naj Tiberio yahawilo Roma, walpaxo naj Poncio Pilato, ha' naj ayco gobernadoral yin̈ tx'otx' Judea, haxapaxo xin naj Herodes ayco gobernadoral yin̈ tx'otx' Galilea. Haxa yuẍta naj chiyij Felipe, ha' naj ayco gobernadoral yin̈ hune'xa tx'otx' chiyij Iturea yeb tx'otx' Traconite. Haxa naj Lisanias, ayco naj gobernadoral yin̈ tx'otx' Abilinia.

Wal naj An'as yeb naj Caif'as, ha' ebnaj ayco yahawilo yin̈ sacerdote Israel. Hayet hune' tiempohal tu' xin, naj Juan isc'ahol icham Zacar'ias, ay naj bey hune' tx'otx' desierto. Ha' tu' xin tzotel Comam Dios tet naj.

Yu tzet yal Comam Dios tet naj, yuxin to naj bey sunilej tx'otx' ayco istila ha' niman Jord'an. Yalni naj tet anma tato caw yilal isbejnicano sunil ismachiswalilal, cat yahcano ha' iswi'; hac tu' xin chu yak'nicano nimanc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ ismul anma tu'.

Hac ti' yu yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yu naj Isa'ias, ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chala: Ay hune' naj chiawi yin̈ caw ip bey hune' tx'otx' desierto, chihalni haca' ti': "Watx'eweco heyanma, yuto chihul Comam Dios Jahawil. Haca' chu istoholban̈elax hunu beh yet chihul huno naj yahaw, hac tu' cheyute heyanma.

Haca' isnohtzelax nimeta hocan, haca' isk'ajlaxayo nimeta witz yun̈e yac'albiloj, yeb xin iswon̈quiẍtajil. Haca' istoholban̈elaxico huntek'an beh c'otxquiltan̈e yeq'ui, haca' chu yac'aln̈elax huntek'an beh hopquiẍtan̈e,
hac tu' cheyute heyanma haxinwal chiillax yu sunil anma ta ay hune' Hecolomal chejbilti yu Comam Dios," ẍi naj, ẍiayoj.

Caw niman anma apni isc'atan̈ naj Juan tu' yu yah ha' iswi', yalni naj tet anma: --Walex hex ti', caw haca'tan̈e heyic'al heba yeb no' laba. ¿Mac chihalni teyet ta yu ch'ah ha' hewi' chexcolcha yalan̈ hune' niman isya'tajil chihul teyiban̈ yu ishowal Comam Dios?

Wal xin bejwecano istx'ojal, yeb xin caw yilal c'ul cheyute heba, hac tu' chu heyeniloj ta xahelcha henabal. Tajca chetxum haca' ti': "Yin̈ icham Abraham titnajon̈, yuxin xacon̈colchahan̈ yalan̈ isya'tajil chati Comam Dios," tajca quexchi. Wal xin chisje iswatx'enico Comam huntek'an ch'en ch'en ti' anmahil, cat xin yoc yuninalo icham Abraham heseleloj, ẍi naj Juan tu'.

Yalnipaxo naj Juan: --Ha' hune' niman isya'tajil lan̈an yul teyiban̈, lahan haca' huno te te' ayxaco ch'en eche yich xe' yu isk'ajlaxayoj. Yuto sunil te te' mach c'ulu sat chiyak'a, chitzoc'laxcan̈ te', cat yocto te' yul k'a', ẍi naj Juan tet anma tu'.
Istak'wi anma: --¿Tzet wal juten cobahan̈, chal tu'? ẍi anma tet naj Juan.
Yalni naj xin: --Ta ayex ay cabebo hecamiẍ, ak'we hunu tet hunu mac machi yet, yebpaxo xin haca' hex ay tzet chelo, ak'we nich'ano tet mac machi yet, ẍi naj tet anma.

Aypaxo xin haywan̈ ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal ch'en chito bey Roma, apni ebnaj isc'atan̈ naj Juan tu' yu yah ha' iswi'. Yoc ebnaj isk'ambeno haca' ti': --Mam cuywawom, ¿tzet wal juten cobahan̈ yun̈e cowatx'icojan̈ yul sat Comam Dios? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi naj Juan tu': --Hayet chexec' heyik'alo ch'en tohlabal yin̈ anma, haca'tic'a yalni ley, hac tu' cheyiloj, ẍi naj Juan tet ebnaj.

Yapnipaxo huntek'an ebnaj soldado isk'amben ebnaj: --Haxapaxo han̈on̈ti'an̈, ¿tzet wal juten cobahan̈? ẍi ebnaj. Istak'wi naj Juan tu' xin: --Mach chebalcan̈ tzoti' yiban̈ anma, mach cheyelk'alo tzettaj ay yul isk'ab anma. Tzalahojab hec'ul yin̈ hetohol ch'ak'laxi, ẍi naj Juan tu'.
Ha' anma apni abeno tu' xin, ichico isnanonico isc'ul yin̈ naj Juan c'uxan ta ha' naj chiyij Cristo echmabil yu ebnaj.

Yalni naj tet sunil anma: --Wal inti'an, yin̈ caw yeli cachann̈e chiwacan̈an ha' hewi', yaja' wintajan chihul hune' naj chiyacan̈ naj ha' hewi' yaj yu isk'ak'al yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo. Caw xin ec'balcano yip naj insatajan, yuxin caw mach chu wocan inpuhnolojan istx'an̈al isxan̈ab naj chiwabehan, ẍi naj Juan.

Yalnipaxo naj: --Naj chihul tu', lahan naj haca' huno naj chixunilo isk'al ixim trigo, nan chak'cano naj yoj ixim, haxa ixim sat xin chisc'ubato naj ixim yul isc'un̈a. Haxa ixim yoj trigo tu' xin, chisk'ojto naj ixim xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal, ẍi naj tet sunil anma tu'.
Caw tx'i'al cuybanil yak'cano naj Juan tet anma, hac tu' yu yalnic'o naj Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile.
Caw cachwa naj Juan yin̈ naj Herodes, ayco gobernadoral bey tu' yuto yik'can̈ naj ix Herod'ias, yixal yuẍtaj, ha' ton naj Felipe, yebpaxo xin yu sunil istx'ojal iswatx'e naj.
Yaja' maẍn̈etaj huntek'an istx'ojal iswatx'e naj Herodes ti', to yapaxicto naj naj Juan yul preso.
Hayet maẍto ch'octo naj Juan yul preso, yet yah ha' iswi' anma yu naj ahpaxo ha' iswi' Comam Jes'us yu naj. Hayet lan̈an istxahli Comam tu', ishajni isba satcan̈,

yayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈ Comam haca' hunu no' palamuch. Lan̈antotic'a xin yabelax hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈, yalni haca' ti': --Hach ti' hach Inc'aholan, caw xahan ayach wuhan. Caw chintzalahan tawin̈, ẍiaytij.

Lahon̈ebxa iscawinah habil Comam Jes'us yet yichico ismunla yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios. Isc'ahol naj Jos'e ye Comam chute yalni anma. Hac ti' caw ye istxolal yichmam Comam haca' ti': naj Jos'e, naj El'i,
naj Matat, naj Lev'i, naj Melqui, naj Jana, naj Jos'e,
naj Matat'ias, naj Am'os, naj Nahum, naj Esli, naj Nagai,
naj Maat, naj Matat'ias, naj Semei, naj Jos'e, naj Jud'a,
naj Joana, naj Resa, naj Zorobabel, naj Salatiel, naj Neri,
naj Melqui, naj Ad'i, naj Cosam, naj Elmodam, naj Er,
naj Josu'e, naj Eliezer, naj Jorim, naj Matat,
naj Lev'i, naj Sime'on, naj Jud'a, naj Jos'e, naj Jon'an, naj Eliaquim,
naj Melea, naj Main'an, naj Matata, naj Nat'an,
naj David, naj Isa'i, naj Obed, naj Booz, naj Salom'on, naj Naas'on,
naj Aminadab, naj Admin, naj Aram, naj Esrom, naj Fares, naj Jud'a,
naj Jacob, naj Isaac, icham Abraham, naj Tar'e, naj Nacor,
naj Serug, naj Ragau, naj Peleg, naj Heber, naj Sala,
naj Cain'an, naj Arfaxad, naj Sem, naj No'e, naj Lamec,
naj Matusal'en, naj Enoc, naj Jared, naj Mahalaleel, naj Cain'an,
naj En'os, naj Set, naj Ad'an. Ha' naj Ad'an tu' xin, Comam Dios watx'en̈e naj.
Lahwi yah ha' iswi' Comam Jes'us, yel Comam isti' ha' niman Jord'an. Ayco Comam yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet isto Comam bey hune' tx'otx' desierto.
Ha' tu' ehayo Comam cawina tz'ayic, maẍtic'a xin wa'i. Lahwi tu' xin yoc naj matzwalil yilweno Comam yun̈e yanico ismul yuto caw xan̈ohcha Comam.
Yalni naj matzwalil tet Comam: --Tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi, hal tet hune' ch'en ch'en ti' meltzojabico ch'en wahil, ẍi naj.
Istak'wican̈ Comam tet naj matzwalil tu' xin: --Yul Yum Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj: "Maẍn̈etaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin ay cok'inal, to yupaxo Istzoti' Comam," ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yilaxto Comam yu naj matzwalil bay caw nahat yecanocan̈, lembiln̈e xin isyeni naj sunilej tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb isk'alomal tx'otx' tet Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin yalni naj matzwalil tet Comam: --Chachwak'acojan yahawo sunil huntek'an tx'otx' con̈ob ti' yeb yin̈ isk'alomal. Ha' huntek'an ti' ak'bilico yul ink'aban, yuxin chisje wak'nihan tet mac bay choche inc'ulan.
Ta chachay jahno insatajan, cat hawinayo haba wetan, chiwak'a'an sunil huntek'an ti' tawet, cat yoccano hawu, ẍi naj matzwalil tet Comam.

Istak'wican̈ Comam Jes'us tet naj matzwalil tu': --Chal Comam Dios yul Yum haca' ti': "Han̈ech'an wetan chu heyinayo heba, yuto heyahawil yeb heDiosalpaxo wehan, yeb han̈ech'an wetan cheyije," ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yilaxto Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yu naj matzwalil. Yinahto naj Comam yin̈ iswi' yatut Comam Dios, yalni naj: Ta caw yeli Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi, k'ojayto haba bey ti',
yuto chal Comam Dios yul Yum: Chiwak'a'tojan ebnaj 'angel cachistan̈e',
yun̈e mach chachischayo ebnaj sat tx'otx' yun̈e mach chilahwi hawoj yin̈ ch'en ch'en, ẍiayoj, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Istak'wican̈ Comam tet naj: --Yaj halbilpaxo yul Yum Comam Dios: Mach chinheyacojan yin̈ ilwebal yuto heyahawil wehan, yeb xin heDiosal wepaxojan, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.
Yet yilni naj matzwalil ta matxa hunuxa tzet bay chu issubcha Comam Jes'us yu naj, isbejnicano naj Comam hanic' tiempohal.
Lahwi tu' xin ismeltzopaxto Comam Jes'us bey Galilea, ayco Comam yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo. Sunil yul ismajul Galilea tu' pujnacan̈ yabelaxilo Comam.
Iscuyni Comam anma yul hunun con̈ob yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel, caw sunil anma halni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us bey con̈ob Nazaret bay ch'ibcan̈. Hayet istz'ayical xewilal yocto Comam yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel haca'tic'a chu isbey Comam yin̈ hunun tz'ayic xewilal. Yah lin̈no Comam bay ch'oc lin̈no ebnaj ijbalon̈ ch'ilni Yum Comam Dios.
Yak'lax te' hum tet Comam, te' hum tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias, hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat. Isholnito Comam te' xin, yilchalo yu Comam bay chal haca' ti':

Ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios Jahawil win̈an, sic'bil incan̈an yu walnihan tzoti' c'ul tet anma matzet ayco yipo yanma. Ak'bilintijan yu Comam yu walnihan colbanile tet macta ayicto yul preso, yeb yu wak'nipaxojan issajilk'inal yila' macta mach chu yilni, yeb yu inbejtzonan mac ayco yalan̈ isya'tajil.
Quinyatijan wala'an ta ch'ayilo istiempohal iscolnilo Comam Dios iscon̈ob, ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, ischulnipaxcanayo Comam Jes'us te' hum tu', yak'ni Comam te' tet naj ay ismunil yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel tu', yay tz'on̈no Comam. Sunil anma ayicto bey tu', occano t'an̈no yin̈ Comam.
Yichico Comam yalnilo tet anma haca' ti': --Ha' yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti', yin̈ hesat mayijcano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ te' hum ti', ẍi Comam.

Wal xin sunil anma caw c'ul istzotel yin̈ Comam Jes'us. Caw c'ayilo isc'ul yuto c'ulch'an istzoteli. Yichico anma yalni tet hunun: --¡Yaj isc'ahol naj Jos'e ye naj ti'! ¿Tzet xin chu yalni naj haca' ti? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.

Yuxin yal Comam tet anma: --Hex ti', ¿chimheyala' wetan yin̈ hune' tzoti' chal anma?: "Hach an̈tem anma, an̈tecano haba," ẍi. Chimheyalpaxoj: "Jabehan̈ tzettaj ye tu' hawatx'e bey Capernaum, yuxin watx'e hune' tu' yul hacon̈ob ti'," quexchimi wetan, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, machi huno ischejab Comam Dios xahan chi'illax yu yet con̈ob.

Naweti yin̈ istiempohal naj El'ias, ischejab Comam Dios payat. Caw yicta yox habil machi yak' n̈ab, yuxin hul hune' niman wahil yiban̈ anma sunil. Yet hune' tiempohal tu', tzetc'a ebix hunix jet Israelal,
yaj maẍtaj yin̈ ebix tu' alaxti naj El'ias colwal yu Comam wal xin han̈ech'an yin̈ hune' ix mach Israeloj, hune' ix ay bey con̈ob Sarepta yul ismajul Sid'on.

Nawepaxti yin̈ hune'xa ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Eliseo. Yin̈ istiempohal naj, tzetc'a jet con̈ob Israel tzabchati yu hune' yabil chiyij lepra; yaj machi hunu ebnaj tu' yak' cawxo naj Eliseo. Han̈ech'an hune' naj mach Israeloj chiyij Naam'an ay yul ismajul Siria, han̈ech'an naj tu' yak' cawxo naj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Hayet yaben ebnaj ayicto yul capilla tu' yin̈ tzet yal Comam, caw tit ishowal ebnaj.
Yah lin̈no ebnaj, yoc tzabno ebnaj yin̈ Comam, yinito ebnaj Comam yin̈ istxam con̈ob yin̈ iswi' hune' witz bay ayco con̈ob tu' yu istennicanto ebnaj Comam sat hune' pahaw yalni.
Yaj wal Comam Jes'us palan̈ yec'to Comam xolbal ebnaj, isto Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Capernaum yul ismajul Galilea. Iscuyni Comam anma yin̈ hunun tz'ayic xewilal yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel.
Caw xin chic'ay isc'ul anma yaben iscuywa Comam, yuto caw haban isyenilo isba ta caw ak'bil yip yu Comam Dios.
Yul capilla tu' ayicto hune' naj ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈, yah yaw naj yin̈ caw ip, yalni naj tet Comam:
--¿Tzet hawoc jin̈an̈ ach Jes'us ah Nazaret? ¿Tom chaẍhul con̈hatan̈tzelojan̈ hawalni? Wohtajan mac anmahilach hach ti', machi nino istx'ojal ayco tawin̈, ẍi naj tet Comam.

Iscachwa Comam yin̈ ischejab naj matzwalil tu': --¡Cach hati', elan̈ yin̈ naj! ẍi Comam. Lahwi tu' xin, isk'ojlaxayo naj sat tx'otx' yu ischejab naj matzwalil sata sunil anma. Yel ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj, yaj machi islahwilal naj oqui yet isk'ojlaxayo naj.

Caw c'ayilo isc'ul sunil anma yilni, yalob tan̈en anma tet hunun: --¿Tzet tzoti'al mayal naj ti'? ¡Caw aycano yip istzoti' naj! ¡Caw chiyijelax tzet chal naj, yet chalni naj ta ch'el ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma, yin̈ an̈e ch'el ebnaj! ẍi anma yin̈ Comam.
Sunil yul ismajul hune' con̈ob tu' yeb ej ishoyanil, pujnac'o isbi ta ay yip Comam.
Hayet yelti Comam Jes'us yul capilla tu', isto Comam yatut naj Sim'on. Caw ay k'a' yin̈ ismi' yixal naj, yuxin k'anlax tet Comam ta chak' cawxo Comam ixnam.
Ishitzico Comam isc'atan̈ ixnam, yinilo Comam hune' k'a' tu' yin̈ ixnam, iscawxican̈ ixnam. Hunepixto xin yahwano ixnam, iswatx'en ixnam tzet chislo Comam yeb iscuywom.
Hayet lan̈an isto tz'ayic xin, sunil anma beyc'o yak'a'cano isyawub tet Comam, tzitamlah yabilal ayco yin̈. Hayet chanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ anma ya'ay tu', cat iscawxicanocan̈.

Tzetc'a anma ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ cawxican̈, toxan̈e ch'el yaw ebnaj yet ch'elcano ebnaj yin̈ anma, chalni ebnaj haca' ti': --Hach ti', Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi, ẍi ebnaj. Yaj cachlax ebnaj yu Comam. Machi chahlax tzotelo ebnaj yuto yohta ebnaj ta ha' Comam Jes'us tu', ha' ton Comam Cristo, echmabil yul yu ebnaj Israel.

Hayet issajbilo hunxa tz'ayic xin, isto Comam Jes'us istxam con̈ob bay machi anma ch'eq'ui. Istopaxo anma saywal yin̈ Comam. Hayet yapni anma bay ay Comam tu' xin, yelico yaw anma yin̈ Comam ta mach chito Comam hunuxa con̈ob.
Yalni Comam tet anma: --Yilal wec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul huntek'anxa con̈ob, yu hune' tu' yuxin Ak'bilintijan, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' yu yec' Comam iscuyno anma yulajla con̈ob yul hunun iscapilla ebnaj Israel.
Hayet hunel, yet isto Comam Jes'us isti' ha' lago Genesaret, tzetc'a anma iscutxba isba isc'atan̈ Comam bey tu'. Caw iswitz'ayo isba anma isc'atan̈ Comam yuto yoche anma yabe' Istzoti' Comam Dios.
Yilnito Comam cabeb te' barco isti' ha' tu'. Machi mac ayicto yul te' yuto lan̈an istx'ahni ebnaj yahaw te' ishac' chiinahti no' cay.

Yahto Comam yul isbarco naj Sim'on, yalni Comam tet naj tato chishitzto naj hanic'oxa te' yiban̈ ha'. Lahwi tu' xin, yay tz'on̈no Comam yul te', yichico Comam iscuywac'ti yin̈ anma ayayo isti' ha' tu'.
Hayet lahwi iscuywa Comam yin̈ anma xin, yalni Comam tet naj Sim'on: --Hitzweto te' bay caw nahat yehayto yich ha'. Ha' bey tu' cheyak'ayto hehac' ik'omati cay, ẍi Comam tet naj.
