Yet yalan̈tocano tu', caw maẍto wohtajojan naj, yaj Comam Dios chejn̈eintijan wanocan̈an ha' iswi' anma ti', ha' Comam chalni wetan: "Ha' hune' mac chawil yay Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈, ha' ton hune' tu' chiak'ni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet anma," ẍi Comam Dios wetan.
Caw ilbilxa wuhan, yuxin chiwalic'ojan tato caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye naj ti', ẍi naj Juan.
Yet hune'xa tz'ayical xin, aypaxic'o naj Juan bey tu' yeb cawan̈xa ebnaj iscuywom isc'atan̈.
Hayet yilni naj Juan yec'to Comam Jes'us, yalni naj tet ebnaj cawan̈ tu': --Ilwec'anabi lah, ha' naj tu' ak'bil jet coxahanbalo yu Comam Dios haca' chiyu yoc no' me' xahanbalil ju, ẍi naj Juan tu'.
Hayet yaben ebnaj cawan̈ tu' tzet yal naj Juan, isto ebnaj yinta Comam Jes'us.

Ist'an̈xito Comam Jes'us yintaj, yilni Comam tato tzujan ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yinta Comam. Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet chesaya? ẍi Comam. --Rab'i, ¿baytu'wal ayach? ẍi ebnaj. (Hune' tzoti' rab'i, cuywawom chaliloj.)
Istak'wi Comam xin: --Catawej cat heyilni, ẍi Comam. Hac tu' yu isto ebnaj yilno baytu'wal ay Comam. Iscancano ebnaj hune' ak'bal tu' yuto k'ejbixa.
Ebnaj cawan̈ aben tzet yal naj Juan occano tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam. Hune' naj Andr'es isbi, yuẍta isba naj yeb naj Sim'on Pedro.
Yet lahwi istzotel naj Andr'es tu' yeb Comam Jes'us, yin̈ hamataj to naj saywal yin̈ yuẍtaj, yalni naj tet naj: --Caw machahloyo Comam Mes'ias juhan̈, ẍi naj.

Hac tu' xin yu yijbanto naj Andr'es tu' naj Sim'on isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us. Yoc t'an̈no Comam yin̈ naj Sim'on tu', yalni Comam tet naj: --Sim'on, isc'ahol naj Jon'as, wal tinan̈ Cefas chioccano habihoj, ẍi Comam tet naj. (Yin̈ hune' yabxubal ebnaj tu', hune' bihe Cefas chal yelapnoj Pedro.)
Yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin yoc yin̈ isnabal Comam Jes'us isto bey yulaj ismajul tx'otx' Galilea. Ischahni isba Comam yeb naj Felipe, yalni Comam tet naj: --Ocan̈ tzujno wintajan, ẍi Comam.
Caw xin yet con̈ob isba naj Felipe tu' yeb naj Andr'es yebpaxo naj Sim'on Pedro; ah con̈ob Betsaida ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' xin, isto naj Felipe saywal yin̈ naj Natanael. Yet ischahlo naj Natanael tu' yu naj, yalni naj tet naj: --Machahlo Comam tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Hum yet ley ak'bilcano yu naj Mois'es, yeb tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat; ha' naj Jes'us ah Nazaret, isc'ahol naj Jos'e, ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni naj Natanael tu': --¿Tom xin ay hunu mac c'ul chielti xol ebnaj ay bey con̈ob Nazaret tu'? ẍi naj. Istak'wi naj Felipe xin: --Ton̈c'anab jila' cat hawilni, ẍi naj.
Yet yilnito Comam Jes'us yapni naj Natanael isc'atan̈ tu' xin, yalni Comam: --Ha' hune' naj lan̈an yul ti', caw Israel naj yul sat Comam Dios, caw machi nino lek'ti'al ayco yin̈ naj, ẍi Comam.
Isk'amben naj Natanael tet Comam: --¿Tzet xin chu quinhawohtan̈enilojan? ẍi naj. Yalni Comam tet naj: --Macachwilan yet maẍto chachyawte naj Felipe ti', yet ayach yich te' higuera, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Istak'wi naj Natanael tu': --Mam cuywawom, yin̈ caw yeli hach ti' Isc'ahol Comam Dios, Yahawil con̈ob Israel hawehi, ẍican̈ naj tet Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam tet naj: --Chawayto yul hawanma win̈an yuto mawalan ta macachwilan yich te' higuera, wal xin caw ec'nato c'aybalc'ule chito hawila' sata ti', ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam haca' ti': --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, cheyila' ishajni isba satcan̈, cat heyilni yahtoj yeb yayilo ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios wiban̈an Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, ẍi Comam Jes'us.
Haxa yet yoxihalxa xin, yoc hune' mohyilal bey yul con̈ob Can'a ay yul ismajul Galilea. Ayco ismi' Comam Jes'us xol hune' mohyilal tu'.
Awtebilpaxo Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yin̈ hune' k'in̈ tu'.
Yaja' xin lahwilo isvino ebnaj ay ismohyilal tu', yuxin yal ismi' Comam tet: --Caw malahwi isvino ebnaj, ẍi ismi' Comam.
Istak'wi Comam xin: --¿Tzet yin̈ wetan chawal hune' ti', mi'? Wal xin maẍto chiapni istiempohal inyenilo wipan tet anma, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, yalni ismi' Comam tet ebnaj chejab yin̈ k'in̈ tu': --Yijewe hewatx'en sunil tzet chal naj teyet, ẍi ismi' Comam.

Ha' bey tu' xin ayayo wajeb nimeta ch'en moc tz'ahab. Aymi oxebo maca can̈ebo nimeta tz'ahab ha' chiayto yul hunun. Yul huntek'an moc tu' chiayto ha ha' chiocnico yu ebnaj Israel istx'ahni isk'ab haca' yalni ischejbanil ebnaj.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj chejab yin̈ k'in̈ tu': --Nohtzewe huntek'an moc ti' yu ha ha', ẍi Comam tet ebnaj. Hac tu' xin yu yoc ebnaj isnohtzenoj.
Yet nohnaxa huntek'an ch'en moc tu' xin, yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Iwelti ha' yul moc tu' tinan̈, cat xin heyinito tet naj chi'ilni yoc anma sat meẍa, ẍi Comam. Hac tu' yute ebnaj.

Yablen naj chi'ilni yoc anma sat meẍa tu' ha ha' oc vinohal, caw xin mach yohtajo naj baytu'wal caw istitico huntek'anxa vino tu'. Wal ebnaj chejab tu' xin, yohta ebnaj tzet yehi, yuto ha' ebnaj inilti ha ha' yul ch'en moc tu'. Hayet yablen naj chi'ilni yoc anma sat meẍa, hune' vino tu', yawten naj naj mohyom tu',

yalni naj tet naj: --Ha' chute anma, to babel chi'alaxic'o vino caw c'ul tet anma awtebil, yet chilahwi yuc'ni anma te' vino caw c'ul tu', cat xin yalaxic'o huntek'an mach lahano isc'ulal. Wal hach ti' yin̈xa islahobal chawak' vino caw c'ul, ẍi naj.

Ha' xin bey yul con̈ob Can'a ayco yul ismajul Galilea, ha' bey tu' isye Comam Jes'us babel c'aybalc'ule. Hac tu' yu isyeni Comam ishelanil yip, wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam xin, caw yacanayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam bey yul con̈ob Capernaum; istopaxo ismi' Comam yeb yuẍta Comam, yebpaxo xin ebnaj chicuywi yintaj. Ha' tu' xin ehayo hayeb tz'ayical.
Yet toxa chi'ayilo k'in̈ Pascua, isk'in̈ anma Israel, isto Comam Jes'us bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en.
Yet yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios, yilni Comam tato ayicto ebnaj txon̈om wacax, yeb ebnaj txon̈om me', yeb ebnaj txon̈om palamuch. Aypaxo xin ebnaj helom melyu tz'on̈anicto bey tu'.

Hayet yilni Comam hune' tu', iswatx'enayo Comam hune' tz'um yin̈ huntek'an lasu, yoc Comam istzumbenilti ebnaj txon̈om wacax yeb ebnaj txon̈om me'. Istiẍnipaxcanto Comam ismelyu ebnaj helom melyu. Ispac'chancanocan̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj.
Yalni xin Comam tet ebnaj txon̈om palamuch haca' ti': --Iwelto huntek'an no' ch'ic ti' bey ti', mach chu heyak'aco yatut Inmaman txon̈balil, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Hac tu' xin, yu isnaniti ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam Jes'us tzoti' tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Hum yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, bay chal haca' ti': "Yu caw xahan ay hawatut wuhan, yuxin caw ya' chuco yin̈ wanmahan," ẍiayoj.
Isk'amben xin ebnaj yahawil Israel tet Comam: --¿Tzet hunu chawak' yechelo jetan̈ yun̈e johtan̈enilojan̈ tato ay hawip hawatx'en huntek'an ti'? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Uchc'aweyo hune' yatut Comam Dios ti', cat xin wahnican̈an selel yin̈ oxeb tz'ayic, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yalni xin ebnaj yahawil yin̈ anma Israel tu' tet Comam: --Hune' yatut Comam Dios ti', caw cuarenta y seis habil yitoj yet yahi. ¿Caw xin oxebn̈ech'an tz'ayic chawutecan̈ selel hawalni? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yaj caw maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj baytet hune' n̈a bay chitzotel Comam tu', ton̈ca xin ha' Comam bay chitzoteli.

Yuxin hayet yitzitzbican̈ Comam xol anma camom, isnaniti ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tato halbilcano hune' tu' yu Comam. Yanayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Hum yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, yeb yin̈ tzet yal Comam Jes'us.
Yet ayc'o Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua, caw hantan̈e anma chahnayto Comam yul yanma yu c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam bey tu'.
Yaja' machi cawxi isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma, yuto caw yohta Comam anma sunil.
Mach yechelto ay mac chihalni tet Comam tzet ye anma, yuto caw yohta Comam tzet ye yanma hunun anma.
Xol ebnaj fariseo ay hune' naj, Nicodemo isbi, caw niman yelapno naj xol ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel.

Yet ak'balil xin, apni naj yila' Comam Jes'us, yalni naj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, caw johtajan̈ tato ha' Comam Dios an̈e hachti con̈hacuyu'an̈, yuto machi mac chiyu iswatx'en c'aybalc'ule haca' chawatx'e ti' ta mach ayoco Comam Dios yetbihoj, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan tawet, macn̈etic'a mach chipitzc'a yin̈ iscayelal mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Isk'amben naj Nicodemo tu' xin: --¿Tzettaxca chu ispitzc'a hunu anma yin̈ iscayelal tato ichamxa? ¿Tom chito yu ismeltzoco yin̈ ismi' hunelxa cat xin ispitzc'a, hawalni? ẍi naj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet naj: --Caw yel chiwalcanojan tawet, macn̈etic'a mach chipitzc'a yu ha ha' yeb xin yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios, caw mach chiyu yoc yul isk'ab Comam.
Hayet chon̈pitzc'a yin̈ comi', yeli ay hune' isk'inal conimanil chabil ju tet comi', yaj caw yilal copitzc'a yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yun̈e cochahni isk'inal Esp'iritu Santo jin̈.
Mach chic'ay hac'ul yuto chiwalan tawet ta yilal chipitzc'a sunil anma yin̈ iscayelal.

Haca'tic'a jak'ek' tinan̈, caw ton̈e chijabe yeq'ui, yaj caw mach johtajoj baytu'wal chi-caw-istita, caw mach johtajopaxoj baytu'wal chi-caw-istopaxicoj. Hac ton tu' xin yet anma chipitzc'a yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios, yin̈ yesalil chipitzc'ahi, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Isk'amben naj hunelxa tet Comam: --¿Tzet xin chu yijni isba hune' tu'? ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Hach ti', caw cuywawom hawehico xol ebnaj Israel, yaj ¿tzet yin̈ caw mach hawohtajo hune' ti'?
Yin̈ caw yeli ha' tzet ohtabil juhan̈ ha' chijalan̈, cat jalnipaxojan̈ tzet ilbil juhan̈. Walex caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chijalan̈.

Yet chiwalnihan teyet tzet yelapno ye tzettaj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma, hajxam ta chiwalan teyet yin̈ tzettaj ay yul satcan̈ chal tu', caw maẍtic'am cheyapaxayto yul heyanma.
Wal xin, caw maẍto hunu mac xabeyahto yul satcan̈ tu', hachcachann̈e Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, titnajinan yul satcan̈.

Haca' yu yanican̈ naj Mois'es hune' yechel no' laba yin̈ te te' bey tx'otx' desierto, caw yilal hac tu' chiyu wahlaxcan̈an yin̈ te' culus, yuxinto macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma, mach chic'aytoj, wal xin chischah hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal.

Wal xin, caw xahancano ay anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios, yuto yati Comam hunpilan Isc'ahol coxol, yuxinto macn̈etic'a chichahni yul yanma, mach chic'aytoj, to caw chischah hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal.
Haninti'an caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios wehan. Ak'bilintijan yu Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', maẍtaj yu wulan wanocojan isya'tajil yiban̈ anma, machoj, to yu incolnihan yalan̈ ismul.

Macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma, mach chiay isya'tajil yiban̈, wal mac mach chinchahnihan yul yanma xin caw chitocano ismul yiban̈ yuto mach chayto yul yanma win̈an, haninn̈ech'an Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an.

Hulnajinan bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e wanicojan anma xol issajilk'inal, yaj xin caw ay anma mach chiocheni. Hacn̈e tu' xin caw chicawxico ismul yiban̈ yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e anma tu', yuto yet k'ejholo yehi.
Sunil huntek'an anma chiwatx'en ismachiswalilal, mach chiyoche hune' issajilk'inal ti'. Mach chisjepaxti xol, yuto mach chiyoche isc'ul tato ch'el yen̈el sunil istx'ojal chi-la-iswatx'e.

Yaja' wal mac chiyijen cuybanile ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios xin, chaco isba xol issajilk'inal yun̈e yiẍtan̈wiloj ta ha' tzet chiswatx'e, lahan haca' tzet choche Comam Dios, ẍi Comam tet naj Nicodemo tu'.
Lahwi tu', isto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey yul ismajul Judea. Ha' tu' xin ehayo Comam hanic' tiempohal yeb ebnaj; chiyanican̈ ebnaj ha' iswi' anma.
Wal naj Juan xin, ayco naj yanican̈ ha' iswi' anma bey En'on iscawilal Salim, yuto caw tx'i'al ha ha' bey tu'. Ha' tu' xin chiapni anma isc'atan̈ naj yu yahcano ha' iswi'.
Yu huntek'an ti' yet maẍto chialaxico naj preso.
Yet hunel tu' xin, oc ebnaj chicuywi yinta naj Juan isteyele isba yeb hune' naj israelita yin̈ tzet chiyu cosajn̈en coba yin̈ isbeybal Comam Dios.

Isto ebnaj yalno tet naj Juan: --Mam cuywawom, naj ayco tac'atan̈ yet ayach bey ha' niman Jord'an, naj hawal jetan̈, lan̈an yahnican̈ naj ha' iswi' anma. Caw xin hantan̈e anma chioccano tzujno yinta naj, ẍi ebnaj tet naj Juan.
Istak'wi naj Juan tet ebnaj: --Caw machi hunu mac chiwatx'en hune' munil ti' tato maẍtaj Comam Dios chiak'ni tet.
Walex hex ti', xaheyabe tzet walan teyet tato maẍtajinan Cristo hinan. Wal xin caw babel quinchejlaxtijan yalan̈to yet maẍto chihul Comam Cristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

K'inalo ta ay hunu mohyilal tinan̈, ha' naj chimohyi tu', ha' naj chi'ik'ni ix ix, wal naj yamigo naj ayco isc'atan̈, chitzala naj yaben istzotel naj chimohyi tu'. Hac tu' xin istzala wanmahan wabenan yapni anma isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us.
Yuxin caw yilal niẍtejal yoccano yip ismunil Comam, walinan xin, niẍtejal islahwipaxcano wetti'an, ẍi naj Juan tet ebnaj chicuywi yintaj.

Ha' Comam tit yul satcan̈, ha' caw ec'bal jiban̈ cosunil. Wal han̈on̈ ti' yet sat tx'otx'al jehi, yuxin han̈e tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ha' chijala. Wal hune' Mac ec'bal cosataj, ha' ton Comam ispeto yul satcan̈.
Yuxin ha' tzet ilbil yu, yeb xin tzet abebil yu, ha' chiyala, yaj xin machi mac chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chiyala.
Yaj tato ay mac chichahni tzet chal Comam tu' yul yanma, hune' mac tu' chaco isba yalniloj ta ha' tzet chal Comam Dios caw yeli.
Hune' Comam ak'bilti yu Comam Dios, ha' Istzoti' Comam Dios chalic'oj, yuto caw nohnan̈etic'aco Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ yu Comam Dios.
Caw xahan ay Isc'ahol Comam Dios tu' yu, yuxinto caw yaco Comam Dios Mame sunil tzettaj ye tu' yul isk'ab Isc'ahol tu'.

Hac tu' xin, macxan̈etic'a chichahni Isc'ahol Comam yul yanma, chischah hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal, yaj wal mac mach chichahni Comam yul yanma xin, caw mach chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal, to ha' isya'tajil chischah yu Comam.
Yaben ebnaj fariseo ta chiyapaxocan̈ Comam Jes'us ha' iswi' anma yeb xin ta caw ec'naxa anma tzujan yinta Comam satapaxo naj Juan;
(Waxan̈ca maẍtaj caw Comam chianican̈ ha' iswi' anma tu', wal xin ha' ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam, ha' ebnaj chianican̈ ha' iswi' anma.)
Hayet yabenilo Comam Jes'us ta yabe ebnaj fariseo hune' tu', yel Comam yul ismajul Judea, ismeltzoto bey yul ismajul Galilea,
yaja' xin, caw yilal yec' Comam yul ismajul Samaria.
Yapni Comam bey hune' con̈ob chiyij Sicar ayco yul ismajul Samaria tu', iscawilal hune' tx'o tx'otx' ak'bilcano yet payat yu naj Jacob tet isc'ahol, ha' ton naj Jos'e.
Ha' bey tu' xin, ay hune' c'uh watx'ebil yu naj Jacob. Caw xin xasiqui Comam isbelwi, yuxin oc tz'on̈no Comam isti' hune' c'uh tu' yet lan̈anxa yoc chuman.

Wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tu' xin, to ebnaj yul con̈ob islok'o tzet chilolaxi. Hayet ayto ebnaj lok'wo tu' xin, yapni hune' ix ah Samaria ik'oti ha' yul hune' c'uh tu', yalni Comam tet ix: --Ak' nino hawa' tu' wuc'u'an, ẍi Comam.

Istak'wi ix tet Comam: --Walach hach ti', caw ah con̈ob Israel hach, ¿tom caw mach hawohtajoj tato ah con̈ob Samaria inan? ¿Tzet yin̈ chak'anpaxo ha ha' hawuc'u wetan? ẍi ix tet Comam. (Yal ix haca' tu', yuto ha' anma Israel mach chischahle tzotelo isba yeb anma ah Samaria.)

Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ix xin: --K'inalo ta hawohta hune' mac chik'anni ha' tawet ti', yeb xin ta hawohta isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios chiyak' jet, chimhak'anpaxo hawa' wetan, catmi wak'nihan ha' chiak'ni k'inale machi istan̈bal tawet, ẍi Comam tet ix.
Yalnipaxo ix tet Comam: --Mamin, caw nahat yehayto ha' yul c'uh lah, caw xin machi hanet chiinahti ha'. ¿Bay xin chaẍto hawik'ati ha' chiak'ni k'inale chawak' wettu'an hawalni?

Naj Jacob, jichmam yettax payat tiempo, ha' naj an̈ecano hune' c'uh ti' jetan̈. Ha ha' yul hune' c'uh ti' xin yuc' naj yeb sunil yuninal, yebpaxo sunil isnok'. ¿Tom xin caw ec'bal hachto satapaxo naj Jacob tu'? ẍi ix tet Comam.
Istak'wican̈ Comam tet ix: --Sunil mac chiuc'ni hune' ha ha' ti' chititpaxo istajinti'al hunelxa.

Wal mac chiuc'ni ha ha' chiwak'ti'an xin, matxa bak'in chitaj isti', yuto hune' ha ha' chiwak'ti'an lahan haca' hunu isnuk' ha ha' chiahilo toptoni cat isbelwi, ha' chak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal tet, ẍi Comam tet ix.
Yalni ix tet Comam xin: --Mamin, ak' hune' ha' chawal ti' wuc'u'an haxinwal matxa chitaj inti'an, matxa chinhulan ik'o ha' bey ti', ẍi ix tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet ix: --As awteti hawichamil cat heyul bey ti', ẍi Comam tet ix.
--Machi wichamilan, ẍi ix tet Comam. Yalni Comam tet ix: --Caw yel chawala, machi hawichamil.
Yaj howan̈xa ebnaj chawik'le, walpaxo naj ik'bil hawu tinan̈ xin, mach hawichamilo naj. Yuxin caw yel chawala, machi hawichamil, ẍi Comam tet ix.
Hayet yaben ix hune' tu' xin, yalni ix tet Comam. --Mamin, wal tinan̈, caw chitxumchalo wuhan tato caw ischejab Comam Dios hawehi.

Ebnaj jichmaman̈, ha' ti' hulic'o ebnaj iswi' hune' witz ti' yik'ayo isba tet Comam Dios, walexpaxo israelita hex ti', caw cheyala ta cachann̈ech'an yul con̈ob Jerusal'en chiyu coto jinoyo coba tet Comam Dios, ẍi ix tet Comam.

Yalni Comam tet ix: --Hach ix ach ti', ayto sunil tzet chiwalti'an yul hawanma. Chiapni hune' istiempohal yet matxa chexhul heyik'ayo heba tet Comam Dios bey hune' witz ti', yeb matxa yilalo chextopaxo bey Jerusal'en.

Hex ah con̈ob Samaria hex ti', cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios heyalni, yaj xin mach heyohtajo Comam, walon̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ xin, johtajan̈ Comam Dios bay chijiyo cobahan̈, yuto coxolan̈ chiel Iscolomal anma.

Wal xin lan̈an yapni istiempohal, ha' ton tinan̈, yet chiyinayo isba anma yin̈ istoholal. Caw xin ch'iyo isba tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil yanma yeb xin yin̈ caw isyelal, yuto hac tu' choche isc'ul Comam ta chiyiyo isba anma tet.
Wal Comam Dios, caw Esp'iritu ye Comam, yuxin macn̈etic'a chiyiyo isba tet Comam, caw yilal chiyiyo isba yin̈ sunil yanma yeb xin yin̈ caw isyelal, ẍi Comam tet ix.

Yalni ix tet Comam: --Caw wohtajan tato chul hune' naj Mes'ias, ha' ton Comam Cristo Cocolomal, yu Comam Dios. Hayet chihul naj tu' xin, ha' naj chi-cam-halni yin̈ tzet caw yelapno ye sunil, ẍi ix tet Comam.
Yalni Comam xin: --Hanintonan hune' chawal ti', hune' lan̈an istzotel tawet ti', ẍi Comam tet ix.

Hayet lan̈an istzotel Comam tu' xin, yapni ebnaj iscuywom. Caw c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj yilni istzotel Comam yeb hune' ix ix tu'. Wal xin caw machi hunu ebnaj k'ambeni tzet yin̈ xin tzotel Comam yeb ix, yeb xin tzet chal Comam yeb ix.
Lahwi tu' xin, isbejnicano ix istz'ahab isti' c'uh tu', isto ix yalno tet anma yul iscon̈ob haca' ti':
--Catawej, ton̈we jila' hune' mac mahalni wetan yin̈ sunil tzet wehicojan. ¿C'uxan tato ha' naj tu' Cristo? ẍi ix.
Hayet yaben anma hune' tu', istit anma yilno Comam.
Yet maẍto chiapni anma isc'atan̈ Comam, yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam: --Mam cuywawom, wa'an̈, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Ay hune' tzet chinlohan caw mach heyohtajoj, ẍi Comam.
Yoc ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' yalno tet hunun haca' ti': --¿Toc'anab xin ay mac mahulic'o ak'no tzet chislo Comam ti'? ẍi ebnaj.

Yalni Comam xin: --Wal xin, ha' tzet choche Comam chejn̈eintijan, ha' chiwochehan chinwatx'ehan, cat xin inlahnihan ismunil ak'bilcano yul ink'aban. Yuxin hayet chinwatx'enan ismunil ti', caw lahan yeb haca' yet lan̈an inwa'an.

Hex ti' cheyala ta can̈ebto ixahaw bay chic'uplaxcan̈ ixim trigo. Caw hactic'am tu', yaj chiwalan teyet: ¡T'an̈xan̈wetoj lah, naweloj! Caw maayilo istiempohal iscutxbalaxico anma wetan, haca' chiyu iscutxbalax ixim trigo yet chik'anbilo ixim.

Ha' naj chic'upnican̈ ixim trigo chischah naj istohol, yechel naj ye naj chiinito anma isc'atan̈ Comam yu ischahni isk'inal chiyak' Comam. Yuxin naj chitz'unni ixim yeb naj chic'upnican̈ ixim, lahan istzala isc'ul ebnaj iscawan̈il.
Haca' yalni anma chijabe: "Nan naj chitxihni ixim trigo, nanxapaxo naj chic'upnican̈ ixim," ẍi.
Yuxin chexinchejtojan xol anma, haca' ebnaj chic'upnican̈ ixim trigo tu', nan ebnaj babel munlanahi haca' yin̈ istxihnayo ixim, hex ti' xin caw toxan̈e chexec' hec'upu'can̈ ixim, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Caw tx'i'al anma yul hune' con̈ob ay yul ismajul Samaria tu' chahnicano Comam yul yanma yuto caw wiyom yalni ix haca' ti': "Mayalilo naj wetan yin̈ sunil tzet xale inwatx'ehan," ẍi ix.
Yuxin hayet yapni anma tu' isc'atan̈ Comam, yalni anma tet Comam tato chicancano Comam yul con̈ob tu'. Hac tu' xin yu iscancano Comam cab tz'ayical bey tu'.
Caw xin hantan̈eto anma chahnicano Comam yul yanma yet yaben iscuywacanto Comam.

Yalni anma tet ix tzotel tet Comam haca' ti': --Wal tinan̈, caw chijaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈, yaj maẍn̈etaj yu tzet maxawal jetan̈, to yu han̈-caw-on̈an̈ majabehan̈ tzet chal Comam, yuxinto caw johtajan̈ ta ha' Comam ti' Cristo, ha' Cocolomal cosunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi anma tet ix.
Yet islahwi cab tz'ayic yec' Comam Jes'us bey ismajul Samaria tu' xin, isto Comam bey yul ismajul Galilea.
Caw xin halbilxatic'a yu Comam tu' tato caw machi hunu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios xahan chiillax yul iscon̈ob.
Hayet yapni Comam bey Galilea tu' xin, caw c'ul yu ischahlax Comam yu anma, yuto yil anma tzettaj iswatx'e Comam yet yec' k'in̈ Pascua bey Jerusal'en, yet isbeyc'o anma yin̈ k'in̈.

Yapni Comam Jes'us bey yul con̈ob Can'a bay elico ha ha' vinohal yu Comam. Ha' bey yul con̈ob Capernaum xin, ay hune' naj niman yelapno ismunil chimunla yinta naj rey, ay xin hune' isc'ahol naj caw tx'oj ye isc'ul yu yabil.

Yet yaben naj tato tit Comam Jes'us bey Judea yapni bey ismajul Galilea tu', isto naj yilno Comam. Isk'anni naj tet Comam tato chito Comam yila' hune' isc'ahol naj caw how yehico yabil yin̈, lan̈anxa iscami.
Yalni xin Comam tet naj haca' ti': --Wal hex ti', tato mach cheyil sunil wipan yeb ej c'aybalc'ule chinwatx'ehan, caw maẍtic'am chinhechahan yul heyanma, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj tet Comam: --Mamin, ton̈ yin̈ an̈e yak' isba maẍto chicam inc'aholan, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Paxan̈to hawatut, cawxa naj hac'ahol, ẍi Comam tet naj. Hac tu' yu yanayto naj yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal Comam, ispaxto naj yatut.
Yet ayco naj yin̈ isbel bey con̈ob Capernaum tu', yapni huntek'an ebnaj ismunlawom naj chahwal yin̈ yul beh, yalni ebnaj tet naj: --Cawxa naj hac'ahol, ẍi ebnaj tet naj.
Isk'ambenilo naj mame tu' tet ebnaj ismunlawom: --¿Hanic' mawatx'ilo isc'ul inc'aholtu'an? ẍi naj. Yalni ebnaj: --Ewitax yin̈ ch'en hujeb yel k'a' yin̈ naj, ẍi ebnaj.

Istxumni naj mame tu' ta haca'tic'a orahil chal ebnaj ismunlawom naj tu', hac tu' orahil yet yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj haca' ti': "Cawxa naj hac'ahol tu' tinan̈," ẍi Comam. Hac tu' xin yu ischahnicano naj Comam Jes'us yul yanma yeb sunil mac ay bey yul yatut naj tu'.
Ha' hune' c'aybalc'ule ti' iswatx'e Comam yul ismajul Galilea lahwi isbey Comam yin̈ k'in̈ bey Judea. Ha' xin iscab c'aybalc'ule ti' iswatx'e Comam.
Lahwi tu' xin, istopaxo Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yin̈ hune' isk'in̈ anma Israel chiec' yul con̈ob tu'.

Bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' xin, iscawilal ispultahil bay ch'octo no' me', ha' tu' ay hune' ha ha' ton̈e etxan. Yul abxubal hebreo Betesda isbi hune' ha' tu'. Isti'la ha' tu' xin, aycan̈ howeb n̈a machi yich.

Caw xin tx'i'al anma ya'ay hilanejayo yul huntek'an n̈a tu'. Ay mac mach chu yilni, ay xin mac mach chu yeq'ui, aypaxo mac mach chibili isnimanil. Huntek'an anma ya'ay tu' ayco yechman isbilican̈ ha',
yuto caw yin̈n̈e istiempohal chihulayti hune' naj 'angel isbile ha', macn̈etic'a babel chiayto yet chibilican̈ ha' xin, ha' chian̈chahi, cat yel tzettaj yabilal ayco yin̈.
Xol anma ya'ay tu' ayayo hune' naj treinta y ocho habilxa yoc yabil yin̈.
Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us ta hilanayo naj bey tu', istxumnilo Comam tato caw payxa ichico naj, yalni Comam tet naj: --¿Chimhawoche chaẍan̈chahi? ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj tet Comam haca' ti': --Mamin, caw machi hunu mac chinanaytojan xol ha' ti' yet chibilican̈ ha'. Hayet chinaytojan xol ha' walnihan, nan mac chibabayto insatajan, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet naj xin: --Ahan̈wanoj, ican̈ hawaybal ti', cat hatohi, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Yin̈n̈ena tu' iscawxican̈ naj, yoc naj yinocan̈ iswaybal, isto naj xin. Hayet yan̈chacano naj tu', c'uxan istz'ayical xewilal,
yuxinto yal ebnaj yahawil yin̈ con̈ob Israel tet naj haca' ti': --Wal tinan̈, caw istz'ayical xewilal, caw mach chu hawijnic'o hawaybal ti', ẍi ebnaj tet naj.
Istak'wican̈ naj cawxican̈ tu': --Ha' mac maquinak'ni cawxojan, ha' mahalni wetan haca' ti': "Ican̈ hawaybal, cat xin hatohi," ẍi wetan, ẍi naj tet naj yahawil tu'.
Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj: --¿Mac xin najil mahalni tawet, ta chawican̈ hawaybal cat xin hatohi? ẍi ebnaj.
Wal xin caw mach yohtajo naj mac ak'ni cawxo tu', yuto caw hantan̈e anma bey tu', caw xin pet c'aycan̈ Comam Jes'us xol anma.

Lahwi tu' xin, ischahnayo Comam Jes'us naj yul yatut Comam Dios, yalni Comam tet naj: --Wal tinan̈, caw macachcawxiloj. Matxa chawaco yak'bil hamul haxinwal matxa hunuxa isya'tajil caw tx'oj chul tawiban̈, ẍi Comam tet naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto naj yalno tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ con̈ob Israel tato ha' Comam Jes'us ak'ni cawxo naj.
Hac tu' xin, yu yoccano ebnaj yanoco ishowal yin̈ Comam isyayil yak' cawxo Comam hune' naj yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal.
Yalni Comam Jes'us xin: --Inmaman, maẍtic'a chisbej ismunlahi, yuxin haquintu'an, maẍtic'a chinbejcanojan inmunlahan, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' xin, caw yacanico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' yin̈ isc'ul yak'ni camo Comam Jes'us, yuto mach isyije Comam hune' tz'ayic xewilal.

Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalcanojan teyet, caw Isc'ahol Dios wehan, yuxin ha' huntek'an chinwatx'eti'an caw mach wetojan inchuquilan. Ha' tzet chak' Inmaman inwatx'ehan, ha' chiwuhan, yuxinto sunil tzet chiswatx'e Inmamtu'an, caw chiyupaxo wuhan.

Wal haninti'an, Isc'ahol Dios wehan, caw xin xahan ayinan yu Inmamtu'an. Sunil tzet chinwatx'ehan Inmamtu'an chiyeni wetan. Ayto xin huntek'an tzet caw ay yelapno chisye Inmamtu'an wetan cat inwatx'enan, hac tu' xin chic'ay hec'ul heyilni.
Wal Inmamtu'an chiyu yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ camom, cat xin yak'nipaxo isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Haquinpaxtu'an chiwak'an k'inale tet mac bay choche inc'ulan chiwak'an.
Machi hunu anma chiyil Inmaman yin̈ tzet chielicoj, walxinto haninan ak'bil wipan yu Inmaman yu wilnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma.

Caw yul ink'aban ayco huntek'an ti' yu Inmaman yun̈e lahann̈e ch'oc inmayan yeb Inmaman. Yaj tato ay anma machi welapnojan yul sat, caw machipaxo yelapno Inmaman yul sat chal tu', yuto Inmamtu'an chejn̈eintijan.

Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, macn̈etic'a ch'aben tzet chiwalti'an, cat yanayto yul yanma yin̈ Inmaman chejn̈eintijan, chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Hac tu' xin mach chicawxico ismul yiban̈, caw wiyom yel yul isk'ab naj camical, cat ischahnicano isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e.

Wal hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios weti'an, caw chiwalcanojan teyet tato chihul istiempohal, ha' ton tinan̈ yet chaben anma camom wawihan; ha' mac chiaben tzet chiwalti'an xin chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal.
Wal Inmaman, ha'tic'a ik'n̈e isk'inal, haquinpaxtu'an win̈an ayco ink'inalan yu Inmaman. Haca' chu yak'ni Inmaman isk'inal anma, hac tu' chu wak'nipaxojan.
Chak'nipaxo Inmaman wipan yul ink'aban wilnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma, ta c'ul maca tx'oj tzet chiswatx'e. Ay hune' wipti'an yuto Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Inmaman.
Caw mach cheyak' c'ayo hec'ul yin̈ huntek'an tzet chiwalcanojan teyet ti'. Wal xin caw chiapni istiempohal yet chaben sunil anma camomxa yul innuk'an, cat xin yitzitzbican̈.

Macn̈etic'a c'ul tzet iswatx'e yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chiitzitzbican̈ cat ischahni hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal, walpaxo anma caw istx'ojaln̈etic'a hulic'o iswatx'e yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chiitzitzbican̈ cat xin ischahni isya'tajil, ẍicano Comam Jes'us.

Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ con̈ob Israel: --Wal haninti'an, caw machi hunu ti' chinwatx'ehan yul wetan inchuquilan. Haca' halbil wetan yu Inmaman hac tu' chu wilnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma, yaja' chiwilan yin̈ tzet chielico yin̈ caw istoholal. Yuxin ha' tzet chal isc'ul Inmaman an̈eintijan, ha' chinwatx'ehan, maẍtaj tzet chiwochehan.
Tato han-caw-inan chinocan tzotelo yin̈ sunil tzet chinwatx'ehan, caw matzet chalilo chal tu'.
Yaja' ay hune' mac caw chak' isba istzotel win̈an, caw xin wohtajan ta sunil tzet chala caw yeli.
Yet hechejnito hechejab tet naj Juan hek'ambeno tzet caw yelapno ye naj, caw isyelal yal naj teyet.
Yaj maẍtaj yu wik'ni wipan yin̈ tzet chal anma yuxin chiwalan hune' ti' teyet, machoj, walxinto yu hecolchahi.
Naj Juan tu', caw lahan naj haca' hunu cantil ayco k'a' yin̈, nahat chimujli isk'ak'al. Caw hac tu' yu yulic'o naj, yuxintic'a quextzalacan̈ yu naj hanic' tiempohal.
Yaja' ay hune' tzet caw ec'bal yelapno ye sata tzet yal naj Juan tu' win̈an, sunilej c'aybalc'ule yak' Inmaman inwatx'ehan, ha' chitzotel win̈an. Ha' xin chiyeniloj tato ha' Inmaman quinanitijan.
Ha' Inmaman an̈eintijan ha' chitzotel win̈an, walex hex ti' caw maẍto bay cheyabe istzoteli, caw maẍto chetxumilo mac caw Inmaman.
Caw maẍto Istzoti' Inmamtu'an yul heyanma, yuto mach cheyayto yul heyanma win̈an, wal xin ha' Comam Dios an̈eintijan.

Hex ti' caw cheyil hecuyni Istzoti' Comam Dios, yuto ch'ec' yin̈ henabal ta yin̈ tu' chiilchalo hek'inal mach istan̈bal. Yaja' waxan̈ca Istzoti' Comam Dios tu' chitzotel win̈an, yaja' mach chisje hec'ul chexoc tzujno wintajan yun̈e hechahni hek'inal mach istan̈bal chiwak'ti'an.
Maẍtaj yu yalaxico inmayan yu anma yuxin chiwalan huntek'an tzoti' ti'.
Wal haca' quexwilniti'an, caw mach cheyoche Comam Dios.
Haninti'an caw chejbilintijan yu Inmaman, yaj caw mach cheyabe tzet chiwalan. Wal tato hunuxa naj comon anma chihul yeb yet, wal tu' caw sak'al heyijen sunil tzet chal naj.
¿Tzettic'a chu heyanayto yul heyanma tato hemay cheyaco hununex, wal helanil chitit tet Comam Dios, caw mach chicam hec'ul hesayniloj?
Tajca cheyala tato haninti'an chinocan ak'oc'ule yin̈ hemul tet Inmaman, walxinto ha' caw naj Mois'es chioc ak'oc'ule teyin̈, naj bay chicawxi hec'ul.
Wal xin tato cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es, chimheyapaxayto yul heyanma win̈an, yuto win̈an chitzotel huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj.
Yaja' tato mach cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano win̈an yu naj tu', tzic'anab chiyu heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ sunil tzet chiwalti'an, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' xin, isto Comam Jes'us isk'axepic'to ha' lago Galilea, chiyijpaxo Tiberias.
Caw xin hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam, yuto yil anma tu' iswatx'en Comam c'aybalc'ule yet iscawxi anma ya'ay yu Comam.
Isto Comam Jes'us iswi' hune' won̈an yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj, yay tz'on̈no Comam yeb ebnaj bey tu'.
Toxa xin chiichico k'in̈ Pascua, isk'in̈ ebnaj Israel.
Yet yilni Comam xin ta caw hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈, yalni Comam tet naj Felipe: --¿Baytu'wal chicolok' tzet chislo sunil anma ti'? ẍi Comam tet naj.
Yal Comam hune' ti' yun̈e yaben Comam tzet chiyute yalni naj Felipe. Wal Comam xin, caw yohtaxa tzet chiyu yak'ni wa'o sunil anma tu'.
Istak'wi naj: --Waxan̈ca ay cabo ciento denario comelyu chilok'ni tzet chilolaxi, caw maẍtic'am chabe yik'ni anma hunta tx'inano yet, ẍi naj tet Comam.
Ay xin hune' naj chicuywi yinta Comam tu', yuẍta isba yeb naj Sim'on Pedro, Andr'es isbi. Ha' naj halni:
--Ay hune' naj nich'an coxol ti', ay cac'on̈ no' cay ik'bil yu naj yeb xin howeb ixim pan cebada, yaja' ¿tzet chak' hanic' ti' yin̈ sunil anma? ẍi naj tet Comam.

Yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu': --Halwe tet sunil anma ayojab tz'on̈noj, ẍi Comam. Caw xin chek'anla sat tx'otx' bey tu', yuxin hacn̈e tu' yu yay tz'on̈no anma sunil. Aymi howebo mil isbisil ebnaj winaj.

Yinican̈ Comam ixim pan tu'. Yet lahwi yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal yin̈ ixim tet Comam Dios, yitxk'anto Comam ixim yin̈ anma tz'on̈an tu'. Hactic'apax tu' yute Comam yin̈ no' cay, yak' Comam hantatic'a caw choche anma.
Hayet lahwi isnohcano isc'ul anma tu' xin, yalni Comam tet ebnaj chicuywi yintaj: --Cutxbaweyo sunil ixim matxa malahwi yu anma ti', haxinwal machi ixim chietaxtoj, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' xin yu iscutxbanico ebnaj ixim, caw xin cablahon̈ebto motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma tu' yin̈ ixim howeb pan cebada.

Yet yilni anma hune' c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam Jes'us tu', yalni anma haca' ti': --Yin̈ caw yeli, ha' hune' naj ti' ischejab Comam Dios halbilcanoj tato chihul coxol bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi anma.
Isnanilo Comam Jes'us tato ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal anma yinito Comam cat yanico anma Comam yahawiloj, yuxinto el Comam xol anma, isto Comam iswi' won̈an ischuquil.
Yet yay numnahi yapni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us isti' ha' lago.
Lahwi tu' xin yocto ebnaj yul hune' te' barco yun̈e yec' apno ebnaj isk'axepxac'to ha' lago cat yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Capernaum. Caw xaay numnahi, maẍtotic'a xin chiapni Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj.
Yet bel chu isbarco ebnaj yiban̈ ha' tu', istzabnico yec' hune' niman jak'ek'. Caw nahat chi'ah ha' isbilen jak'ek'.

Ayxam xin yictajo iscab legua chito isbarco ebnaj yiban̈ ha' lago tu', yilni ebnaj Comam Jes'us belwo chu yiban̈ ha'. Lan̈an xin ishitzico Comam isc'atan̈ te' barco bay ayicto ebnaj tu', isxiwcan̈ ebnaj.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Haninan, mach chexxiwcan̈, ẍi Comam.
Yuxinto caw tzalacan̈ ebnaj ischahnicto ebnaj Comam yul barco tu' isc'atan̈. Hunepixto xin, yapni ebnaj isk'axepic'to ha' bay nabilto yu yapni.

Haxa yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic xin, yet aytoc'o anma sunil isti' ha' lago tu', isnaniti anma tato xato ebnaj iscuywom Comam yul hune' te' barco ayayo bey tu', han̈e xin te' ayayoj. Isnanipaxti anma ta machi to Comam yinta ebnaj.
Ay xin huntek'an te' barco ispeto yul con̈ob Tiberias apni iscawilal bay iswah anma ixim pan yet yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal yin̈ ixim tet Comam Dios.
Yet yilni anma tato matxa Comam Jes'us bey tu' yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj, yocto anma yul huntek'an te' barco apni bey tu', isto anma saywal yin̈ Comam k'axepxac'to ha' bey yul con̈ob Capernaum.
Yet yec' apno anma isk'axepic'to ha' lago tu' yilcha Comam yu anma. Isk'amben anma tu' tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, ¿hanic' hawul bey ti'? ẍi anma tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam tet anma: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, walex hex ti', chinhesayilojan yuto caw noh hec'ul yu ixim pan wak'an hewab. Maẍtaj yu matxumchalo heyu yin̈ tzet chal yelapno ye hune' c'aybalc'ule inwatx'etu'an, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Maẍn̈etaj tzet chelo cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul hesayniloj yuto hune' tu' chilahwi. Wal xin ay hune'xa haca' tzet chicolo mach chitan̈iloj, ha' hune' tu' chiak'ni hek'inal mach istan̈bal. Ha' hune' tu' wal heyanico yin̈ heyanma hesayniloj. Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Inmaman, haninan chiwak'an hune' itah, ha' ton k'inale mach istan̈bal, yuto xaisyelo Comam Dios tato haninan sic'bilintijan yu, ẍi Comam Jes'us tet anma.
Isk'amben anma tet Comam: --¿Tzet xin wal juten cobahan̈ yun̈e cowatx'enan̈ sunil tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios? ẍi anma.
Istak'wi Comam: --Ha' hune' chiyoche Comam Dios to cheyayto yul heyanma win̈an, yuto ha' Comam chejn̈eintijan, ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo anma tet Comam: --¿Tzet xin hunu c'aybalc'ulehal chaye jila'an̈, yun̈e cachcochahnihan̈ yul janmahan̈? ¿Tzet hunu chawatx'e?

Ebnaj jichmaman̈ yet payat, ay hune' c'aybalc'ule ilbil yu ebnaj yet isloni ebnaj man'a bey tx'otx' desierto. Haca' yalni Istzoti' Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti': "Yati Comam Dios hune' itah satcan̈ islob sunil anma," ẍiayoj, ẍi anma tet Comam.

Yalni Comam tet anma: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, maẍtaj naj Mois'es ak'n̈e hune' itah satcan̈il tu' tet ebnaj jichmam yet payat tiempo tu'. Wal xin itah tit yul satcan̈ tu' yechel yin̈ hune' wah caw yeli chak' Inmaman teyet.
Hune' wah chak' Comam ti', yul satcan̈ titnaj, ha' xin chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal tet anma, ẍi Comam.
Yalni anma tet Comam: --Mamin, ak' hune' wah tu' jetan̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ẍi anma.

Yalni Comam tet anma: --Hanintonan hune' wah tu', yuto chiwak'an k'inale mach istan̈bal. Macn̈etic'a chaco isba yul ink'aban, matxa bak'inal chin̈ohchahi, yeb xin macn̈etic'a chianayto yul yanma win̈an, matxa bak'inal chitajpaxo isti'.
Caw xatic'a walan teyet, waxan̈ca caw cheyilico win̈an, yaja' caw mach cheyaco heba yul ink'aban.
Wal xin, sunil mac chahti Inmaman wetan, chul yul ink'aban, yuxin mac chihul yul ink'abtu'an caw chinchahan, mach chinman̈c'otojan.
Wal haninti'an, quintitan yul satcan̈, yaj maẍtaj yu inwatx'enan tzet chal inc'ulan, wal xin titnajinan yun̈e inwatx'enan tzet chal isc'ul Inmaman chejn̈eintijan.
Ha' tzet choche isc'ul Comam chejn̈eintijan yin̈ sunil macta chiyaco yul ink'aban, ta machi hunu mac chic'ayto wuhan, to chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an yet chiapni islahobal tz'ayic.

Ha' choche isc'ul Inmaman, to ha' mac chinilnihan ta haninan Isc'ahol Dios wehan, cat yanayto yul yanma win̈an, chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Haxa yet chiapni islahobal tz'ayic, cat wak'ni itzitzbocan̈an xol camom, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel yin̈ tzet chal Comam tu', yoc ebnaj buchwal yin̈ Comam yuto yal Comam haca' ti': "Haninti'an hune' wah titna yul satcan̈," ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --¿Tom maẍtaj naj ti' naj Jes'us, isc'ahol naj Jos'e? Caw johta mac ismam naj yeb ismi' naj. ¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chal naj tato yul satcan̈ titna naj? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Bejwe hetzotel win̈an.
Caw machi hunu mac chihul yul ink'aban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan, Comam an̈eintijan. Haninan xin chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an yet islahobal tz'ayic.

Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat haca' ti': "Sunil mac chicuylax yu Comam Dios," ẍiayoj. Yuxin sunil mac chiaben tzet chal Comam Dios tu', chitxumchalo yu yin̈ tzet chala, ha' xin chihul yul ink'aban.
Caw maẍto hunu mac iln̈e yin̈ Comam Dios Mame hachcachann̈e inan, yuto yul satcan̈ titnajinan, yuxinto caw wohtajan Comam.
Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma, caw chischah hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal.
Haninti'an ha' ton hune' wah chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal.
Ha' ebnaj heyichmam yet payat tu', iswah ebnaj huntek'an man'a bey tx'otx' desierto, yaj xin sunil ebnaj xa-le-camtoj.
Yaja' mac chiwahni hune' wah titna yul satcan̈, chiwalti'an xin, machi bak'inal chicami.

Hanintonan hune' wah itzitz titna yul satcan̈, yuxin macn̈etic'a chiwahni hune' wah ti', caw itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Ha' hune' wah chiwak'ti'an, ha' ton innimanilan chiwak'an yun̈e ischahni anma isk'inal, ẍi Comam Jes'us tet anma.
Hayet yaben anma Israel huntek'an ti', istzabnico anma isteyelen isba yin̈ tzet yal Comam. Le-yalni anma haca' ti': --¿Tzet chu yak'ni naj ti' isnimanil coc'uxu'? ẍi anma tet hunun.

Yalni Comam xin: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, haca' tato mach chec'ux innimanilti'an, Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, yeb xin haca' ta mach cheyuc' inchiq'uilan, mach chechah hek'inal mach istan̈bal.
Yuxin macn̈etic'a chic'uxni innimanilti'an, cat yuc'ni inchiq'uilti'an, caw chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Hayet islahobal tz'ayic xin chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an xol anma camom.
Yuto innimanilti'an lahan haca' wah, ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal, hacpax tu' xin inchiq'uilan haca' tzet chiuc'laxi.
Macn̈etic'a chic'uxni innimanilan cat xin yuc'ni inchiq'uilan, caw hunxan̈e chiwucanojan yebi.
Comam Dios caw itzitz yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ha' Comam tu' quinchejnitijan, yuxin itzitz inn̈etic'apaxojan. Hac ton tu' xin, mac chic'uxni innimanilti'an, caw itzitzn̈etic'apaxo wuhan.

Hanintonan, hune' wah titna yul satcan̈, yaj mach haca'o man'a islo ebnaj jichmam, yuto waxan̈ca islo ebnaj huntek'an man'a tu', yaj cam ebnaj. Wal mac chiwahni hune' wah chiwalti'an xin, caw ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal, ẍi Comam.
Sunil huntek'an ti' yak' Comam Jes'us iscuyu' anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel bey yul con̈ob Capernaum.
Yet yaben anma chicuywi yinta Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile yak' Comam tu', tx'i'al ebnaj halni tet hunun: --Caw ya'ta cochahni huntek'an chal naj ti'. ¿Mactaxca chik'oji isyijeni? ẍi ebnaj.
Wal Comam xin, caw yohtaxa tzettaj chal ebnaj tu', yuxin yal Comam haca' ti': --¿Tom caw chicabconcan̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an?
Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti', tato cheyil inmeltzohan yul satcan̈ bay titnajinan, ¿tzixam chi-la-heyala'?

Ha' Yesp'iritu Comam Dios ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal, wal conimanil matzet chak'a. Huntek'an cuybanile xawalan teyet tu', yin̈ caw yeli yet Esp'iritu yehi, ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal.

Yaja' ayexto hex ti', maẍto cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an, ẍi Comam. Yal Comam haca' tu' yuto caw yohtaxa Comam yet caw yalan̈tocanoj macta mach chianayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam. Caw xin yohtaxapaxo Comam mac chianico yul isk'ab ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈.
Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam haca' ti': --Caw chiwalan teyet tato caw machi hunu mac chaco isba yul ink'aban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben anma tzet yal Comam tu' xin, tx'i'al anma bejnicano yec' yinta Comam.
Yuxinto isk'ambe Comam tet ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom: --Haxa hex ti', ¿chimheyoche chextopaxoj? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Istak'wi naj Sim'on Pedro, tet Comam: --Mamin, macc'anab yinta chon̈oc tzujnojan̈, yuto han̈c'an̈e hatzoti' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal.
Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈, caw xajaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ tawin̈. Caw xin johtajan̈ tato ach ti' Cristo hach, Isc'ahol Comam Dios caw itzitz, ẍi naj Pedro tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Wal xin quexinsayilojan hecablahon̈wan̈il, yaj ay hune' hex ti' ayayto naj matzwalil yul yanma, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yet yalni Comam haca' tu', yin̈ naj Judas, isc'ahol naj Sim'on Iscariote yal Comam. Yuto waxan̈ca ayco naj yetbiho ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈, yaj xin ha' naj anico Comam yul isk'ab camical.
Lahwi tu' xin, istzabnico Comam Jes'us yec' yul ismajul Galilea. Matxa isje isc'ul Comam ehoyo yul ismajul Judea yuto caw chiyoche ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel yak'a' camo Comam.
Toxa xin chiichico hune' k'in̈ Poy telaj isbi, hune' isk'in̈ anma Israel,
yalni ebnaj yuẍta Comam tu' tet: --Mach chaẍcan bey ti', wal xin asi' bey Judea bay caw ay anma chicuywi tawintaj, haxinwal chil anma c'aybalc'ule chi-la-hawatx'e ti'.
Yuto ta ay hunu mac choche chiohtan̈elaxi mach chiswatx'e hunu tzet ye tu' bay ewan, yuxin yilal hayeni sunil c'aybalc'ule chi-la-hawatx'e ti' yin̈ sat anma, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Hac tu' yute yalni ebnaj yuto mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj haca' ti': --Maẍto chiapni istz'ayical inyenilo inbahan tet anma, wal hex ti', tzijxan̈e tz'ayical c'ul heyenilo heba.
Anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach chexisyaha, walinan xin caw caj chinillaxan, yuto chiwalan tato caw machiswalil sunil tzet chiswatx'e anma.
Asi'we hex ti' yin̈ k'in̈ tu', walinan mach chintohan, yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal inyenilo inbahan tet anma, ẍi Comam.
Yet lahwi yalni Comam huntek'an ti' tet ebnaj xin, iscancano Comam bey Galilea.
Yet xato ebnaj yuẍta Comam Jes'us tu' yin̈ k'in̈ istopaxo Comam, yaj yin̈ ewantajil.
Caw xin chissayic'o ebnaj iswi'ehal ebnaj Israel tu' Comam Jes'us yin̈ k'in̈ tu', chalni ebnaj: --¿Baytaxca tu' ay hune' naj winaj tu'? ẍi ebnaj.
Caw xin nanantaxan̈e chal anma yin̈ Comam, ay anma chalni: "Caw c'ulcano hune' naj tu'," ẍi. Aypaxo anma chihalni: "Caw machiswalil hune' naj tu', caw ton̈e chiyak' subchaho naj anma," ẍipaxoj.
Yaja' xin caw ewanta chitzotel anma tu' yuto caw chixiw anma tet ebnaj yahawil yin̈ anma Israel.
Hayet caw niman k'in̈ tu', yocto Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios, istzabnico Comam iscuyni anma.
Caw xin chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj Israel tu' yaben tzet chal Comam. Chi-la-yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --¿Tzet chute hune' naj ti' yohtan̈enilo sunil huntek'an ti'? Yaj mach cuywina naj, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Istak'wican̈ Comam tet ebnaj: --Ha' cuybanile chiwalan teyet ti' mach wetojan inchuquilan, yet Comam chejn̈eintijan.
Tato ay mac chiyoche chisyije tzet chal Comam Dios, caw yilal istxumniloj tato yet Comam ye cuybanile ti'. Yohtapaxoj ta maẍtaj yul inwi'an inchuquilan chiwitijan cat xin walnihan teyet.

Macn̈etic'a yul iswi' chiyiti tzet chiyak' iscuyu' anma, chiyute hune' tu' yun̈e yoc iswinajil sata anma. Wal hanin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios, ha' yalaxico ismay Comam yu anma ha' chinsayan, yuxin caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalti'an, caw machi lek'ti'al yin̈.
Caw ak'bil isley Comam Dios teyet yu naj Mois'es, yaja' machi hunujex cheyije tzet chal hune' ley tu'. ¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chinhepotx'an heyalni? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Istak'wi ebnaj xin, yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Etzan̈em ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ayco tawin̈. ¿Mac chachak'ni camo hawalni? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Yu hune' c'aybalc'ule inwatx'ehan yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal caw hesunil chic'ayilo hec'ul yin̈.

Hatax ebnaj heyichmam ichencanocan̈ hune' circuncisi'on, ha' xin naj Mois'es chihalni tato caw yilal isyijelaxi. Yuxinto waxan̈ca yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal, cheyak' circuncidar niẍte unin winaj semanahil ixto ispitzc'ahi.

Walex hex ti', istz'ayicalojab xewilal masan cheyak' circuncidar niẍte unin yun̈e mach cheman̈c'o isley naj Mois'es heyalni. Tato caw hac tu' cheyute, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxinto caw chichiwa hec'ul win̈an yuto yet istz'ayical xewilal wak'ni cawxojan hune' naj?
Mach ton̈eho chexoc heyila' yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e anma. Tato cheyoche chexoc heyila' tzet yehi, ilwe yin̈ caw istoholal, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj ah Jerusal'en halni haca' ti': --¿Machmi taj naj ti' chal ebnaj ispotx'o'?
Caw yin̈ sat anma lan̈an istzotel naj lah, yaj machi hunu mac chicachni naj istzoteli. ¿Mato xayayto ebnaj jahawil ti' yul yanma tato ha' naj ti' Cristo?
Yet chul Comam Cristo tu', machi hunu mac ohtan̈e baytu'wal chi-caw-istiticoj. Wal naj ti' xin caw johtaj baytu'wal titnaco naj, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.

Yet yaben Comam yalni ebnaj haca' tu', ha' ton yet lan̈an iscuywa Comam yul yatut Comam Dios, yalni Comam yin̈ caw ip: --Caw quinheyohtajan heyalni, yeb xin heyohtaj baytu'wal titnaj inpaxojan. Yaja' caw maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan, wal xin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios, Comam caw isyelaln̈etic'a chala, yaj mach heyohtajo Comam.
Wal inti'an caw wohtajan Comam tu', yuto yin̈ Comam titnajinan, ha' quinanitijan, ẍi Comam.
Yet lan̈an yalni Comam hune' tu' xin, ay huntek'an ebnaj yoche inoto Comam yul te', yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam, yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal bay chicami.

Caw xin hantan̈e mac chanayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam, chi-la-yalni haca' ti': --Yet chihul Comam Cristo tu', ¿tom caw ec'balto c'aybalc'ule chisye sata sunil tzet chisye naj ti' jet? ẍi anma yin̈ Comam.

Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tzet yal anma yin̈ Comam Jes'us tu', iscutxbanayo isba ebnaj yeb xin ebnaj yahawil sacerdote, ischejnito ebnaj ebnaj mayor chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios yu istzabnayo ebnaj Comam, cat yanicto Comam yul preso.
Yalni Comam haca' ti': --Hanic'xan̈ech'an tiempohal ayinic'ojan texol, cat xin inpaxtojan isc'atan̈ Comam chejn̈eintijan.
Hex ti' chexoc saywal win̈an, yaj matxa chinilchahan heyu, yuto mach chu heyapni bay chinapnitu'an, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yichico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' isk'amben tet hunun haca' ti': --¿Baytaxca tu' chito naj ti', yuxin chal naj tato matxa chiilcha naj ju? Ay ebnaj jet con̈ob pujanto xol ebnaj griego, ¿ham tu' chito naj cuywal xol ebnaj, cat yoc naj iscuyno ebnaj griego tu' yalni?
¿Tzet caw chalilo hune' chal naj ti': "Chinhesaya'an, yaj matxa chinilchahojan heyu, yuxinto mach chiyu heyapni bay chinapnitu'an?" ẍi naj, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.

Ha' islahobal tz'ayic k'in̈ tu', ha' caw ay yelapno ye yul sat anma Israel. Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin, ah lin̈no Comam Jes'us, yalni Comam yin̈ caw ip haca' ti': --Maquex chitaj heti' titan̈we inc'atan̈an, cat heyuc'ni hune' ha ha' chiwak'an.

Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: "Ha' mac chianayto yul yanma win̈an, haca' chiyu ispitzc'a isnuk' ha ha' chiel yojomal, hac tu' chiyu ispitzc'a isnuk' ha' yet k'inale yul yanma," ẍiayoj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yal Comam Jes'us hune' ti' yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo chischah macta chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam. Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin, maẍto chiayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo isyayil maẍto chiilaxto Comam yul satcan̈.
Yet yaben anma cutxanico tu' yin̈ tzet yal Comam Jes'us, ay anma halni haca' ti': --Yin̈ caw yeli, ha' naj ti' ischejab Comam Dios halbilcanoj ta chuli, ẍi.
Aypaxo mac halni haca' ti': --Ha' ton naj ti' Cristo, echmabil yul ju, ẍi. Aypaxo hune'xa majan anma halni: --Naj Cristo tu', ¿tom Galilea chitit naj heyalni?
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato ha' bey yul con̈ob Bel'en, yul iscon̈ob naj rey David chipitzc'a naj Cristo tu', yuto yuninal yuninal naj rey David ye naj, ẍi hunmajanxa anma.
Hac tu' yu ispohnito isba anma yu Comam.
Aypaxo ebnaj xin etza inito Comam yul preso, yaj machi hunu mac yaco isk'ab yin̈ Comam.
Haxa yet ismeltzo ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios isc'atan̈ ebnaj fariseo, isk'amben ebnaj tet ebnaj: --¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto machi maxeyiti naj Jes'us tu'? ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios tu' haca' ti': --Caw machi hunu mac caw helan istzotel haca' istzotel naj, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yalni xin ebnaj fariseo tu' tet ebnaj: --¿Tom ha' hunex cheyak' subchaho heba tet hune' naj tu'?
¿Tom ay hunu ebnaj yahawil chianayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj, maca hunujon̈an̈ han̈on̈ fariseo on̈ti'an̈?
Han̈c'an̈e huntek'an anma caw mach yohtajo isley naj Mois'es, ha' chisubcha yu naj, yaja' xin chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ huntek'an anma tu' yu Comam Dios, ẍi ebnaj.
Ay xin hune' naj fariseo Nicodemo isbi, naj beyc'o tzotelo tet Comam yin̈ hune' ak'balil, ha' naj xin halni tet ebnaj yetbi tu':
--Ha' chiyute yalni coley tato mach chu iscawxico ismul hunu naj yiban̈ yalan̈to maẍto chijabe tzet chal naj, yun̈e johtan̈eniloj tzet iswatx'e naj, ẍi naj Nicodemo tu'.
Yuxinto yal ebnaj yetbi naj tu' tet: --¿Tom ah Galilea hachpaxoj? Wal xin say yul Istzoti' Comam Dios cat hawilni tato ay hunu ischejab Comam Dios chitit bey Galilea tu', ẍi ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' xin, ispaxto ebnaj yatut.
Wal Comam Jes'us xin to Comam bey hune' won̈an, Olivo isbi.

Yin̈ hune'xa tz'ayical xin, yapni Comam hunelxa yul yatut Comam Dios yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal. Caw xin hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam. Lahwi tu' xin, yay tz'on̈no Comam istzabnico iscuyni anma tu'.

Hunepixto xin yiniti ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es hune' ix ix tet Comam. Caw c'uxan ischahlo ix yin̈ ismul yu ebnaj. Yalaxico ix xol anma cutxanico isc'atan̈ Comam tu'.
Yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Mam cuywawom, machahlo hune' ix ti' juhan̈ isc'atan̈ iswinaj.
Wal xin, chal isley naj Mois'es tato ebix ix tx'oj ye iswi' haca' hune' ix ti', yilal isk'ojlax camo ebix, yaja' ¿tzimi chawute hawalnipaxo hach ti'? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yal ebnaj haca' tu' yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam, yeb yun̈e yayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu istx'ojal, cat xin yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam, chute yalni.

Yaj xin ton̈e ay c'on̈no Comam, istzabnico istz'ibli sat tx'otx' yu yiximal isk'ab. Ayn̈etic'aco xin ebnaj isk'amben tet Comam tzet caw chielcanico ix, yuxinto ah t'an̈no Comam, yalni haca' ti': --Macn̈etic'a caw machi nich'ano ismul texol, ha'ojab babel ch'ak'ni ch'en k'ojbal yin̈ ix, ẍi Comam.
Lahwi tu' yaypaxo c'on̈no Comam, istzabnico istz'ibli sat tx'otx' hunelxa.

Yet yaben ebnaj tzet yal Comam tu', istxumni isba yanma ebnaj ta machi hunu ebnaj c'ul, yuxin hununtajil yu yel ebnaj isc'atan̈ Comam. Babel el ebnaj ec'na ichamtaxa, lahwi tu' istopaxo ebnaj tzehtaj. Hac tu' yu iscancano Comam ischuquil yeb ix tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin, yah lin̈no Comam, isk'amben Comam tet ix: --Ix, ¿baytu'wal ay ebnaj chiak'wi c'ule tawin̈? ¿Tom caw machi hunu ebnaj macachk'ojnican̈ yu ch'en ch'en? ẍi Comam tet ix.
--Macho Mamin, machi hunu maca, ẍi ix tet Comam. --Haquinpaxtu'an, mach chiwalan ta chaẍk'ojlax camo yu hamul. Asi' xin, matxa chawaco hamul hunelxa, ẍi Comam tet ix.

Yalnipaxo Comam tet anma hunelxa: --Wal haninti'an, caw haca' issajilk'inal wehayojan xol anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Macn̈etic'a ch'oc tzujno wintajan chiwak'an issajilk'inal yul yanma. Yu hune' issajilk'inal ti' xin, chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Matxa xin chiec' xol k'ejholo, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj fariseo xin: --Caw matzet chalilo tzet chawal ti', yuto hach ti', hach caw chachtzotel tawin̈, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.

Istak'wi Comam: --Waxan̈ca caw han-caw-inan chiwalan yin̈ tzet wehan, yaj caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalan. Yuto haninti'an wohtajan baytu'wal titnajinan, caw wohtapaxojan baytu'wal chi-caw-intocojan. Walex hex ti', caw mach heyohtajo baytu'wal titnajinan, yeb baytu'wal chintopaxojan.
Walex hex ti', caw comonn̈etic'a chexoc heyila' tzet ye anma, yaj walinan mach ton̈etic'aho chinocan wila'an tzet chielico anma.

Yaja' yet chiwilnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma, chiwilan yin̈ caw istoholal, yuto mach inchuquilojan chiwilan tzet chielico anma, to ha' hun Inmaman an̈eintijan, ha' chiilni tzet chielico anma wintajan.
Chal hecuybanil tato ay cawan̈o testigo lahan yalni yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu', caw yel hune' tu' chal tu'.
Ilwec'anab xin, ay cawan̈ mac chak' testigohal. Caw testigo wehicojan win̈an, yeb xin Inmaman an̈eintijan ha' chitzotel win̈an, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' xin isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Baytu'wal ay hamam tu' xin? ẍi ebnaj. Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Hex ti', mach quinheyohtajojan, caw xin mach heyohtajo Inmamtu'an. K'inalo tato quinheyohtajan, heyohtapaxo Inmaman, ẍi Comam.

Hayet iscuywa Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios yalnicano Comam huntek'an ti', iscawilal bay chibey anma yak'a'cano yofrenda. Yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam, yuto maẍto chiapni istz'ayical bay chicami.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hunelxa: --Haninti'an chintohan, wal xin chinhesaya'cojan yaja' mach chinilchahan heyu, yuto mach chu heto bay chintotu'an. Walex hex ti' yin̈ hemul chexcamcantoj, ẍi Comam.
Yuxin yal ebnaj yahawil yin̈ con̈ob Israel: --¿Tom xin chispotx' isba naj, yuxinto chal naj tato caw mach chu japni bay chiapni naj tu'? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Walex hex ti', caw yet sat tx'otx'al heyehi, wal inti'an yet satcan̈ wehan, caw yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' heyehi, wal inpaxojan mach yeto sat yiban̈k'inal ti' wehan.
Yuxinto caw chiwalan teyet tato yin̈ hemul chexcami, yuto mach chechayto yul heyanma tato haninan hune' haca' chiwute walnihan teyet, yuxinto caw yin̈ hemul chexcamtoj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj tet Comam: --¿Mac hach anmahil chal tu'? ẍi ebnaj. Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Halbilxatic'a teyet wuhan yet yalan̈tocanoj mac anmahilinan.

Caw hantan̈e tzet chiwalan teyin̈ yet chiwilnihan yin̈ tzet chexelicoj. Yaj Comam an̈eintijan texol ti', caw yin̈ isyelal chitzoteli. Yuxinto ha' tzet halbil wetan yu, ha' chiwalpaxojan tet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi Comam.
Yaj xin caw maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj tato ha' Comam Dios chal Comam.

Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj: --Hayet chinheyanican̈an yin̈ te' culus, ha' to tu' chitxumchalo heyu tato Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios, cat xin heyohtan̈eniloj tato mach wetojan inchuquilan sunil tzet chiwalti'an. Wal xin ha' tzet chal Inmaman wetan, ha' chiwalan.
Ha' Comam an̈eintijan, ha' ayco wetbihojan. Caw mach chinisbejcanojan inchuquilan, yuto han̈c'an̈e tzet choche isc'ul chinwatx'ehan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yet yalni Comam huntek'an tu', caw hantan̈e anma chahni Comam yul yanma.
Yalni Comam Jes'us tet anma Israel chahni Comam yul yanma: --Tato caw huneln̈e cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan, yin̈ caw yeli incuywoman heyehi.
Hac tu' xin chu heyohtan̈enilo isyelal; ha' isyelal tu' xin, ha' chexcolnicanoj, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj tet Comam: --Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jichmaman̈ ye icham Abraham, caw machi hunelo con̈txon̈laxan̈ tet anma. ¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawala "chexcolchacanoj?" cachi, ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, mac caw mach chisbejcano yanico ismul, caw txon̈bil isba tet mule.

K'inalo hunu naj txon̈bil chejabo tet huno yahaw tinan̈, mach chiyu yoc naj yetbiho yuninal naj yahawil tu' yin̈ huneln̈e. Wal haca' naj c'ahole xin, caw yetbitic'a isba naj yeb ismam yeb ismi' yeb ej yuẍtaj.
Yuxin tato haninan chexincolilojan yin̈ hemul, yin̈ caw yeli chexcolchacanoj yuto caw Isc'ahol Dios wehan.
Caw wohtajan tato heyichmam icham Abraham, yaj caw cheyoche quinhepotx'o'an, yuto mach cheyoche heyabe' cuybanile chiwak'ti'an.
Ha' tzet wilan bey Inmamtu'an, ha' chiwalan teyet, walex hex ti' caw nan hemam, yuxinto ha' tzet chal hemam tu' ha' chewatx'e, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Istak'wipaxo ebnaj: --Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈, comaman̈ jichmam Abraham, ẍi ebnaj. Istak'wi Comam: --Tato caw yel cheyala hemam ye icham Abraham tu', ham tzet iswatx'e icham, ha' chewatx'e.
Wal xin waxan̈ca ha' caw isyelal halbil wetan yu Comam Dios ha' chiwalan teyet, yaj caw cheyoche quinheyak'a' camojan. Wal icham Abraham cheyal ti', machi hunelo yute isba icham haca' hex ti'.
Ha'tic'a tzet chiswatx'e hemam, ha' cheyupaxoj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj. Yuxinto yal ebnaj: --Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈, mach matn̈ebilon̈an̈, wal xin hune'ch'an comaman̈, ha' ton Comam Dios, ẍi ebnaj.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Tato yeli hemam Comam Dios tu', xahanmi chinheyilan, yuto ha' bay ay Comam Dios titnajinan yet wulan bey ti', Maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan, ha' Comam Dios chejn̈eintijan.
¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach chitxumchalo tzet chiwalti'an heyu?

Walex hex ti', ha' naj matzwalil, ha' naj caw hemam, yuto hatzet choche isc'ul naj, ha' caw choche hec'ul hewatx'e'. Naj matzwalil tu', caw potx'om anma naj yichtaxtic'a yul naj sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Caw maẍtic'a isyelal yin̈ naj, yuxin sunil tzet chiahti yul isti' naj mach yeloj. Hayet chanico naj lek'ti'al, ha' tzet ye naj ha' chal naj, yuto caw lek'ti' naj; caw ismam lek'ti'wom naj.
Wal haninti'an, ha' caw isyelal chiwalan, yuxinto caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma tzet chiwalti'an.
¿Mac hunujex ti' tinan̈ chiyu heyalnico yin̈ insatan tato ay inmulan? Wal xin, caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalti'an, yaj ¿tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyayto yul heyanma?
Ha' mac yet Comam Dios yehi, caw choche yabe' Istzoti' Comam. Walex hex ti' xin, mach yeto Comam Dios heyehi, yuxinto mach chiyoche hec'ul heyabe' Istzoti' Comam, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yalni ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ anma Israel tu' tet Comam Jes'us: --Ha' ye juhan̈ chijalnihan̈ ta ah Samaria hach, yeb ta ayco hune' ischejab naj matzwalil tawin̈, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Istak'wi Comam Jes'us xin: --Machoj, machi huno ischejab naj matzwalil ayco win̈an, walxinto ha' wanicojan ismay Inmaman ha' chiwuhan, walex hex ti' chinhehincaniltojan.
Wal haninti'an, maẍtaj yalaxico inmayan chinsayan; waxan̈ca ay hune' Mac chianico inmayan, ha' hune' tu' xin chihalnoj Mac caw yel chala.
Yin̈ caw isyela chiwalan teyet, macn̈etic'a chiyijen tzet chiwalti'an, machi bak'inal chicami, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Yalni ebnaj: --Wal xin caw yel chijalan̈ tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil tawin̈. Icham Abraham yebpaxo xin ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payxa, sunil ebnaj camnatoj. Wal chawute hawalnipaxo xin: "Macn̈etic'a chiyijen tzet chiwalan maẍtic'a chicamtoj," cachi. ¿Tom caw ec'bal hach to sata jichmam Abraham tu'an̈ yeb sunil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat tiempo tu'? ¿Tzet yelapno hawe hawalni? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam tet ebnaj: --Tato han-caw-inan chiwican̈ inbahan, caw matzet chalilo hune' tu', yaj wal xin ha' caw Inmaman chianico inmayan. Ha' Inmamtu'an xin, ha' cheyal heDiosaloj.

Yaj hex ti', mach heyohtajo Inmamtu'an, walinan, caw wohtajan. Yaj tato chiwalan ta mach wohtajojan Inmamtu'an, lahanmi inlek'ti'alan yeb hex chal tu'. Wal xin caw chiwalan caw wohtajan Inmaman, yuxinto sunil tzet chal Inmaman wetan chinyijehan.
Icham heyichmam Abraham tu', caw tzala isc'ul icham yet yabeni ta chinhulan. Hayet isyelax tet icham xin, caw tzalacanocan̈ isc'ul icham sic'lebil, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj tu'.
Yalnipaxo ebnaj tet Comam: --Hach ti', maẍto hach yin̈ cincuenta habil, cat xin hawalni ta hawil icham Abraham tu':
Yalni Comam: --Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, yettax yalan̈to maẍto chipitzc'a icham Abraham tu', ay inxatic'ahan, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' xin, yu yinican̈ ebnaj ch'en ch'en yun̈e isk'ojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni. Yaj yebato isba Comam tet ebnaj, yelti Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tu'.
Yet yec' Comam Jes'us yin̈ isbel hunel, yilni Comam hune' naj caw maẍtic'a chu yilni yettaxtic'a ispitzc'ahi.
Isk'amben ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tu': --Mam cuywawom, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxin mutz'an sat hune' naj ti' yet ispitzc'a naj? ¿Tom yu ismul ismam naj mato yu ismul naj? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam xin: --Maẍtaj yu ismul ismam naj yeb ismi' naj, maẍtajpaxo yu ismul naj yuxinto hac tu' ye naj. Wal xin Comam Dios caw choche isc'ul chisyelo yip yin̈ naj, yuxinto hac tu' ye naj.
Caw yilal inwatx'enan ismunil Comam an̈eintijan yak' isba tz'ayical to yuc'a' chiah ak'bal yet matxa chu comunlahi.
Yak' isba ay intoc'ojan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw haca' issajilk'inal wehayojan xol sunil anma, ẍi Comam.
Yet lahwi istzotel Comam xin, istzublayo Comam sat tx'otx', issomni Comam nich'an tz'otz'ew yu isk'ab, lahwi tu' xin ismasnico Comam yin̈ isbak'sat naj mutz'an sat tu'.

Yalni Comam tet naj: --Asi' bey ha' Silo'e, hune' ha' etxan, cat xin hatx'ahnilo hasat, ẍi Comam tet naj. (Silo'e chiyal yelapnoj Ak'biltij.) Hac tu' xin yu isto naj bey ha' Silo'e tu', istx'ahni naj sat xol ha'. Haxa yet ispaxti naj xin, xayu yilni naj.
Yuxin ha' anma ayayo yatut iscawilal naj yeb huntek'anxa anma ohtan̈e naj, yal haca' ti': --¿Cochan ha' naj ti' chiec' tz'on̈la k'ano melyu? ẍi anma tu' yin̈ naj.
Ay mac xin halni: --Ho', ha' naj ti', ẍi anma. Aypaxo mac halni: --Machoj, maẍtaj naj, yaj etza hac ti' jilni naj, ẍipaxoj. Wal naj xin yal naj: --Ho', hanin-ton-an, ẍi naj.
Yoc anma isk'ambeno tet naj: --¿Tzet xin mayu ishajlo hasat? ẍi anma.

Yalni naj xin: --Hune' ya', Jes'us isbi, ha' ya' somni nich'an tz'otz'ew, ismasnico ya' yin̈ insatan. Lahwi tu' xin, yalni ya' wetan: "Asi' bey ha' Silo'e, cat hatx'ahnilo hasat xol ha'," ẍi ya' wetan. Hac tu' yu intohan intx'ahnolojan insatti'an; lahwi tu' xin ishajlo insatan, ẍi naj.
Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj: --¿Baytu'wal xin ay naj tinan̈? ẍi ebnaj. --Caw mach wohtajojan, ẍi naj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yilaxto naj mutz'antic'a sat tu' tet ebnaj fariseo.
Yet iswatx'en Comam nich'an tz'otz'ew yun̈e ishajlo sat naj tu', caw c'uxan istz'ayical xewilal.

Yuxinto ocpaxo ebnaj fariseo tu' isk'ambe' tet naj hunelxa: --¿Tzet yu ishajlo hasat ti'? ẍi ebnaj tet naj. Istak'wi naj: --Ya' Jes'us masnico nich'an tz'otz'ew yin̈ insatan, lahwi tu' xin intohan intx'ahnolojan; hac tu' xin yu ishajlo insatan, ẍi naj.

Ay xin ebnaj fariseo halni: --Hune' naj tu', caw mach yeto Comam Dios ye naj yuto mach chisyije naj istz'ayical xewilal, ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam. Yaj ay ebnaj halnipaxoj: --Ya' Jes'us tu', mach mulumo ya'. Wal xin tato mulum ya', ¿tom chiyu isyeni ya' hunu c'aybalc'ule haca' chisye ti'? ẍi ebnaj.

Yocpaxo ebnaj fariseo isk'ambeno tet naj maẍtic'a chiyu yilni tu': --Haxa hach ti', ¿tzet chawute hawalni yin̈ naj ak'ni hajlo hasat ti'? ẍi ebnaj. Yalni naj haca' ti': --Ha' hune' chiwute walnihan, to caw ischejab Comam Dios ye ya', ẍipaxo naj tet ebnaj.

Yaj caw maẍtic'a yaco ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' yin̈ isc'ul tato hajlo sat hune' naj tu' yu Comam. Ha' yute isnani ebnaj to caw c'ultic'a ye sat naj, yuxinto awtelax ismam naj yeb ismi' naj yu ebnaj.
Isk'amben ebnaj tet ismam naj yeb ismi' naj haca' ti': --¿Ham naj ti', heyuninal cheyala tato caw maẍtic'a chu yilni yet ispitzc'ahi? ¿Tzet yu ishajlo sat naj? ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wi ismam naj yeb ismi' naj: --Caw yeli juninalan̈ naj, caw yelpaxoj maẍtic'a chiyu yilni naj yet ispitzc'a naj.

Yaj caw mach johtajojan̈ tzet yu ishajlo sat naj, yeb xin mach johtapaxojan̈ mac ak'ni hajloho sat naj. ¡K'ambewe tet naj yuto ichamxa naj, chiyu yalni naj teyet! ẍi ismam naj yeb ismi' naj tet ebnaj tu'.

Wal xin, hac tu' yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismi' naj yuto caw chixiw tet ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ con̈ob Israel, yuto halbil yu ebnaj haca' ti': "Macn̈etic'a chihalni tato ha' naj Jes'us ti' Cristo, matxa chicochacti yul capilla ti'," ẍi ebnaj.
Yuxinto hac tu' yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismi' naj: "K'ambewe tet naj, ichamxa naj, xayu yalni naj teyet," ẍi.

Lahwi tu' xin, yawtenpaxti ebnaj naj hajlo sat tu' hunelxa, isk'amben ebnaj tet naj: --Caw chabe Comam Dios caw halilo isyelal jetan̈, wal xin caw johtajan̈ ta caw mulum hune' naj chawal ti', ẍi ebnaj tet naj.

Yalni naj xin: --Haninti'an, caw mach wohtajojan tato mulum ya' maca machoj, yuxin mach chiyu walnihan teyet; hachcachann̈e wohtajan to maẍtic'a chiyu wilnihan yet yalan̈tocanoj, wal tinan̈ xin xayu wilnihan, ẍi naj tet ebnaj.
Isk'amben ebnaj hunelxa: --¿Tzet caw caẍyute naj? ¿Tzet caw yu ishajlo hasat ti' yu naj? ẍi ebnaj.
Yalni naj xin: --Caw mawalan teyet, yaj to caw mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul. ¿Tzet yin̈ xin cheyoche chiwalan teyet hunelxa? ¿Mato cheyoche chexocpaxo cuywo yinta ya'? ẍi naj tet ebnaj.
Yet yalni naj haca' tu', istzabnico ebnaj isbahni naj, yalni ebnaj tet naj: --Hach ti', ayachxaco yinta naj, wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta iscuybanil naj Mois'es tzujanon̈an̈.
Walon̈ti'an̈ caw johtajan̈ tato ha' caw Comam Dios anicano cuybanile tet naj Mois'es tu'. Wal naj chawal ti', caw mach johtajojan̈ baytu'wal titnaco naj, ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wican̈ naj tet ebnaj xin: --Caw chic'ay inc'ulan yuto cheyala tato mach heyohtajo bay titnaco ya', yaja' caw cheyila hajlo insatan yu ya'.
Caw johtaj tato mach chabe Comam Dios tzet chisk'an anma mulum, hachcachann̈e anma caw ayco yanma yin̈ Comam, cat yinayo isba tet, hachcachann̈e huntek'an anma tu' chak' Comam ispaj tzet chisk'ana'.
Wal xin, caw maẍto bay chijabe isk'umal tato ay huno mac chiyu yak'ni hajloho sat hunu anma maẍtic'a chiyu yilni yettaxtic'a ispitzc'ahi.
Tato maẍtaj Comam Dios an̈eti ya' ti', caw machim nino tzet chiyu iswatx'en ya', ẍi naj tet ebnaj.
Istak'wi ebnaj tet naj: --Walach hach ti', caw mulumach yettaxtic'a hapitzc'ahi. ¿Tom chaẍoc con̈hacuyu'an̈ hawalni? ẍi ebnaj tet naj, hac tu' yu istennilti ebnaj naj tu' yul capilla.

Yabe Comam Jes'us tato tenlaxilti naj hajlo sat tu' yul capilla, haxa yet ischahloyo naj yu Comam, yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti': --¿Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin̈ Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios? ẍi Comam tet naj.
Isk'amben naj tet Comam: --Mamin, ¿mac hune' chawal tu'? Hal wetan cat xin wanico wanmahan yin̈, ẍi naj.
Yalni Comam tet naj: --Caw xahawil yin̈; Hanintonan hune' mac bay lan̈an hatzotel ti', ẍi Comam tet naj.
Yet yaben naj haca' tu', yay jahno naj yin̈ sat Comam, yalni naj: --Caw chiwaco wanmahan tawin̈ Mam, ẍi naj.

Yalni Comam tet naj: --Wal haninti'an, hulnajinan bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e wilnihan tzettaj chi'elico anma, yuto ay anma ti' caw mach chiyu yilni, yaj xin haninan chiwak' hajlohojan sat. Aypaxo anma caw c'ul yilni, yaj chimutz'icano sat wuhan yun̈e matxa chiyu yilni, ẍi Comam.
Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj fariseo ayco isc'atan̈ Comam, yet yaben ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu', yalni ebnaj: --¿Tom xin ha' hunon̈an̈ mach chiyu jilnihan̈ hawalni? ẍi ebnaj.

Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj: --K'inalo tato mach chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios yehi, caw machim hemul. Yaj cheyala tato caw chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios, yaj mach cheyijepaxoj, yuxinto caw ay hemul, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --K'inaloj ta ay hunu ispeyabil no' me', cat yocto hunu naj yul, nan bay xin chisholicto isba naj; yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet, caw elk'om hune' naj tu'.
Wal naj chi'octo yul ispultahil ispeyab no' tu', ha' ton naj tu' chitan̈en no'.

Ha' naj chiwayn̈en no' xin chishaj naj ispultahil ispeyabil no' tet naj, cat yocto naj isc'atan̈ no'. Caw sunil no' k'ayna yaben yul isnuk' naj. Caw hununtajil yawtenilti naj no', yuto ay isbi hunun no' yu naj, hac tu' xin chiyu ishajnilti naj no'.
Yet chilahwi yinilti naj isme' tu', cat xin isbabi naj sata no', cat yoc tzujno no' yinta naj, yuto caw yohta no' yul isnuk' naj.
Yaja' wal ta hunu naj comon, mach ch'oc tzujno no' yinta naj; chixiwilo no' tet naj yuto mach k'aynajo no' yaben yul isnuk' naj, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Yal Comam hune' yechel ti' tet ebnaj, yaj maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj tzet caw yelapno yehi.
Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet, haninti'an haca' ispultahil ispeyab no' me', caw hac tu' wehan.

Yet yalan̈to yet maẍto chinhulan, ay ebnaj hulic'o yanico isba ebnaj hecolomaloj. Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' xin, caw lahan ebnaj haca' hunu naj elk'om chiocto yul ispeyabil no' me' tu', yaj wal anma caw yettic'a Comam Dios ye xin, caw maẍtic'a ishajba istxiquin yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj.

Haninti'an, lahaninan haca' ispultahil ispeyabil no' me', macn̈etic'a chiocto yul hune' peyab ti' chicolchahi. Haca'tic'a hunu no' me' chielti lowoj cat yapnipaxo yul ispeyab, hac tu' xin ye huntek'an mac tu'.

Ay ebnaj haca' elk'om chiyu yuli, ton̈e chihul elek' yeb xin yak'ni camo anma. Yaj walinan, hulnajinan wak'a'an k'inale mach istan̈bal tet anma chiyaco isba yul ink'aban. Huntek'an anma tu', caw niman chiyu ischahni isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios.
Wal haninti'an, caw lahaninan haca' hunu naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul. Hune' naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul tu', caw hinan yanma naj yak'ni camo isba yin̈ isme'.

Wal tato ton̈e chitohlalax hunu naj chitan̈en no' me' tu', maẍtaj xin naj yahaw no' tu' chitan̈eni. Hayet chiyilni naj yapni no' oj, chisbejcano naj no' cat yelcan̈ naj, yuto mach yeto naj no', cat yoc no' oj tu' istzabnayo no', cat xin ispujnacan̈ no' sunil.
Chielcan̈ naj chitan̈en no', yuto yin̈n̈e istohol naj ayco yanma. Caw mach chicam isc'ul naj yin̈ no' yuto mach yeto naj no'.

Wal haninti'an, caw lahaninan yeb naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul, haxa mac chaco isba yul ink'aban lahan haca' no' me'. Caw ohtabilinan yu Inmaman, wohtapaxojan Inmamtu'an, hac tu' xin wepaxojan yeb macta chaco isba yul ink'aban, caw johta cobahan̈ yebi. Yin̈ ton huntek'an mac tu' chiwak' camo inbahan.
Aypaxo huntek'an anma chinchahnihan yul yanma, ton̈e xin caw mach jet con̈oboj. Caw yilal winitijan cat xin yoc isyijeno cuybanile chiwalti'an, caw xin hunxan̈e chucanoj yeb hunxan̈e mac chitan̈eni.
Caw xahan ayinan yu Inmaman yu caw chiwak' camo inbahan yin̈ anma, yaj chinchahpaxojan ink'inalan hunelxa.

Chiwak' camo inbahan yuto hac tu' chiel yin̈ inc'ulal. Wal xin, caw machi hunu mac chiyu quinispotx'ni camojan tato mach chisje inc'ulan. Caw machi hunu mac chincachnihan wak'ni inbahan yin̈ camical, aypaxo wipan inchahnihan ink'inalan hunelxa, yuto hac tu' inchejbanilan yu Inmaman, ẍi Comam.
Yet yaben anma Israel yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu', ispohnipaxto isba hunelxa.
Ay hun majan anma halni: --¿Tzet yuxin cheyabeto tzet chal naj ti'? Wal hune' naj ti', caw chabil locohal yu naj, ayco hune' ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj, ẍi ebnaj.

Ay hunxa majan anma halnipaxoj haca' ti': --Tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj, ¿tom hac tu' istzotelo naj? Yalnipaxo ebnaj: --¿Tom chu yu hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ishajni sat hunu naj caw maẍtic'a chiyu yilni? ẍi ebnaj.
Yin̈ istiempohal n̈abil chiec'tzelax isk'in̈ Yatut Comam Dios bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en.
Yet lan̈an yec' Comam Jes'us isti' yatut Comam Dios tu', hune' chiyij Yamak'il naj rey Salom'on,

yoc hoyno ebnaj Israel yin̈ Comam, yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --¿Caw bak'in chon̈hawilojan̈ yin̈ hune' cabc'ulal ti'? ¿Mac caw anmahilach? Yin̈ caw yeli, tato hach ti' Cristo hach, caw mak'bil hawalnilo jetan̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Istak'wican̈ Comam tet ebnaj: --Caw xawalan teyet, yaj caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma. Sunil c'aybalc'ule chinwatx'ehan yu yip Inmaman, ha' caw chiyeniloj mac anmahilinan.
Walex hex ti', caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma, yuto caw maẍtic'a wetojan heyehi haca' walnihan yalan̈tocanoj.
Macta caw wetan yehi, caw chishajba istxiquin yin̈ tzet chiwalan; caw xin wohtapaxojan hune' mac tu'. Haca'tic'a chiyu yoc tzujno no' me' yinta istan̈emal, hacpax tu' chiyu yoc tzujno wintajan.
Wal xin, hanan chiwak'an isk'inal mach istan̈bal, machi bak'inal chicami, machi hunu mac xin chiyu yinilo yul ink'aban.
Wal xin ha' Inmaman, caw ec'balcano sata sunil maca, ha' ak'n̈e anma ti' wetan. Caw machi hunu mac chiyu yinilo huntek'an ti' yul isk'ab Inmamtu'an.
Haninti'an yeb Inmaman, caw hune'n̈e jehan̈, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' yu istzabnipaxico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' issic'nican̈ isch'en yun̈e isk'ojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni.
Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj: --Yu ishelanil Inmaman, yuxin caw hantan̈e tzet caw c'ul chinwatx'ehan texol. ¿Baytet yin̈ yuxin chinhek'oj camojan heyalni? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.

Istak'wi ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel tu': --Mach chaẍcok'ojcan̈an̈ yu hunu isc'ulal chawatx'e, wal xin yu chachbuchwa yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto hach ti' caw comon anma hach, yaj chawalico haba Diosal, ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam Jes'us: --Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yet payat ak'bilcano teyet, chal haca' ti': "Haninan chiwalan tato dios hex," ẍicanoj.
Caw xin mach chiyu coman̈c'on tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj, yuto caw Comam Dios tu' haln̈ecanoj diosal yin̈ mac bay ak'bilcano Istzoti'.
Ha' Comam Dios an̈eintijan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yaja' ¿tzet yin̈ xin cheyalpaxoj tato buchwal chiwuhan yin̈ Comam Dios yet chiwalnihan tato caw Isc'ahol Dios wehan?
Tato mach chinyijehan chejbanile ak'bil wetan yu Inmaman, mach cheyayto yul heyanma win̈an.

Wal xin hatzet chal Inmaman, ha' chinwatx'ehan. Waxan̈ca caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma, chahwe yul heyanma tzet chinwatx'eti'an. Hac tu' xin chiyu heyohtan̈eniloj tato caw ayco Comam Dios wetbihojan, ayinpaxicojan yin̈ Comam, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Caw xin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam, yaj iscolilo isba Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' xin, istopaxo Comam k'axepxac'to ha' niman Jord'an, bay ah ha' iswi' anma yu naj Juan yet yalan̈tocanoj, ha' bey tu' xin cancano Comam.
Caw hantan̈e anma apni ilno Comam bey tu', yalni haca' ti': --Yin̈ caw yeli waxan̈ca machi hunu c'aybalc'ule isye ya' Juan jet, yaj sunil tzet yalcano ya' yin̈ ya' Jes'us ti' caw yeli, ẍi anma tu'.
Caw xin hantan̈e anma anayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us bey tu'.

Bey con̈ob Betania ay hune' naj chiyij L'azaro ya'bi ay, ha' bey tu' xin aypaxo cawan̈ yanab naj, Mar'ia isbi hune' ix, hune'xa ix xin Marta isbi. Ix Mar'ia tu', ha' ix anico aceite caw xuk' sam yin̈ yoj Comam Jes'us, lahwi tu', issuni tajo ix yoj Comam yu xil iswi'.
Ebix cawan̈ yanab naj L'azaro tu' xin, yato ebix tzoti' tet Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --Mamin, caw tx'oj ye isc'ul conohan̈, naj caw xahan ay hawu, ẍito ebix tet Comam.

Yet yaben Comam hune' chejbanil tu', yalni Comam: --Hune' yabil tu', mach chitan̈cano yin̈ camical. Wal xin ha' chiyenilo yip Comam Dios, ha' xin bay chiixtan̈wipaxilo wipan, hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an, ẍi Comam.
Waxan̈ca caw xahan ay ix Marta yeb ix Mar'ia yeb naj L'azaro yu Comam Jes'us, yaj yet yallaxi tato caw ya'ay naj L'azaro tu', caw cabto tz'ayic ec' Comam bey tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom: --Ton̈wepaxo ismajul Judea hunelxa, ẍi Comam.
Yalni xin ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' tet: --Mamin, caw tolto yoche ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel cachisk'ojo' camoj. ¿Tom xin chaẍtopaxo hunelxa hawalni? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yalni Comam tet ebnaj: --Caw johtaj tato caw cablahon̈eb hora ik'bil yu hune' tz'ayic, yuxin tato tz'ayical chon̈belwi, mach comono chon̈txak'mohi, yuto sajk'inal.
Yaj tato xol k'ejholo chon̈ec' xin, wal tu' chon̈txak'mohi yuto mach sajk'inal, ẍi Comam tet ebnaj.
Lahwi tu' xin, yalni Comam: --Caw mawaycan̈ jamigo L'azaro, wal tinan̈ xin chintohan wik'alojan iswayan̈ naj, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us tu': --Mamin, yaj tato wayan̈ chu naj, chicawxocan̈ naj chal tu', ẍi ebnaj tet Comam.
Yaja' xin yin̈ iscamical naj L'azaro yal Comam, wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tu' xin, ton̈e chiway naj, yalni Comam, chute yalni ebnaj.
Yuxinto caw yal Comam yin̈ caw haban tet ebnaj: --Naj L'azaro macam naj,
yaj caw chintzalahan yuto machijinan yet iscam naj, yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ yun̈e caw heyanico heyanma win̈an. Ton̈we jila' naj, ẍi Comam.
Yalni naj Tom'as, naj chihallax tioẍ uninal, tet huntek'anxa ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam: --Ton̈we yinta Comam haxinwal hun cocam yebi, ẍi naj.
Yet yapni Comam Jes'us bey tu' xin, yaben Comam tato can̈ebxa tz'ayic ismuji naj L'azaro tu'.
Ha' con̈ob Betania tu', ayn̈em yictajo legua yehilo yin̈ con̈ob Jerusal'en.
Yuxinto caw tx'i'al anma ah Jerusal'en beyc'o yak'a isnimanbal isc'ul ix Marta yeb ix Mar'ia yu iscamical isnoh tu'.
Hayet yaben ix Marta tato lan̈an yapni Comam Jes'us bey tu', istit ix ischahno Comam, wal ix Mar'ia xin cancano ix yul n̈a.
Yalni ix Marta tu' tet Comam yet ischahni isba ix yebi: --Mamin, tato ayachic'o bey ti', caw machim cam innohan.
Yaj xin caw wohtajan tato sunil tzet chak'an tet Comam Dios chiyak' Comam tawet, ẍi ix.
Istak'wi Comam tet ix: --Wal hanoh tu', chiitzitzbocan̈, ẍi Comam.
Yalni ix: --Ho' Mamin, caw wohtajan tato chiitzitzbican̈ innohtu'an yet chiitzitzbican̈ sunil anma yet islahobal tz'ayic, ẍi ix tet Comam.
Yalni Comam xin: --Haninti'an chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an anma camnaxa, yeb xin haninan chiwak'an isk'inal mach istan̈bal. Yuxinto macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma, waxan̈ca chicami chiitzitzbican̈.
Yebpaxo xin sunil anma itzitzto chinchahnihan yul yanma, mach chicam yin̈ huneln̈e. ¿Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan? ẍi Comam tet ix.
Ho' Mamin, caw chiwaytojan yul wanmahan tato hach ti' Cristo hach. Caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi, halbilcanoj ta chachhul yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi ix Marta tu' tet Comam.
Lahwi yalni ix Marta haca' tu', isto ix yawtenoti isnoh, yalni ix tet ix yin̈ ewantajil: --Ayc'o Comam cuywawom bey ti', chachyawte Comam, ẍi ix tet ix Mar'ia.
Yaben̈e ix Mar'ia tzet yal isnoh tu' xin, yah lemna ix, isto ix yilno Comam.
Maẍto xin chiapni Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob, ha' bay ischah isba ix Marta yeb Comam, ha' to tu' xin ay Comam yet yapni ix Mar'ia.
Wal anma ah Judea ayco yak'ni isnimanbal isc'ul ebix yet yilni anma yah lemna ix Mar'ia tu' isto ix, yoc tzujno anma yinta ix yuto istxum anma tato chito ix ok'o bay mujan isnoh tu'.
Yet yapni ix Mar'ia isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us xin, yay jahno ix yich yoj Comam, yalni ix haca' ti': --Mamin, tato ayachic'o bey ti', machim cam conohti'an̈, ẍi ix tet Comam.
Yet yilni Comam Jes'us yok'can̈ ix Mar'ia yeb anma ah Judea tzujan yinta ix tu', yoc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam, istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam.
Isk'amben Comam xin: --¿Baytu'wal mujan naj heyu? ẍi Comam. --Mamin, ton̈ jila', ẍi ix Mar'ia yeb anma tu'.
Yok'can̈ Comam xin.
Yet yilni anma ah Judea yok'can̈ Comam, yalni haca' ti': --Caw yeli xahan ay naj yu ya', ẍi anma.
Aypaxo hunmajanxa anma halni: --Ha' ya' ti' ak'ni hajloho sat naj mutz'an sat, ¿tom xin mach an̈cha naj L'azaro ti' yu ya'? Hac tu' xin machim cam naj, ẍi anma.
Caw ec'na oc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yapni bay ayicto naj L'azaro tu'. Ha' hune' bay mujan naj tu', n̈ach'en yehi, ayco hune' ch'en niman ch'en ismajiloj.
Yalni Comam Jes'us xin: --Iwelo ismajil ch'en, ẍi Comam. Yalni ix Marta, yanab naj L'azaro tu': --Mamin, con̈itax cam naj tinan̈, caw ayxam sam naj, ẍi ix.
Istak'wi Comam Jes'us: --¿Tom machi mawalan tawet xin tato chawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan, caw chawila' ishelanil yip Comam Dios? ẍi Comam tet ix.
Lahwi tu' xin, yilaxilo ismajil ch'en bay mujan naj tu', ist'an̈xican̈ Comam Jes'us satcan̈, yalni haca' ti': --Mamin, caw chiwak'an yuch'andios tawet yu maxawabe tzet mawalan.
Wohtajan Mam ta sunilbal tiempo chawabe tzet chiwalan, yaj xin chiwalan hunel ti' tawet yu sunil anma cutxanico ti', yun̈e yanayto yul yanma ta hach ti' an̈eintijan, ẍi Comam tu'.
Yet lahwi yalni Comam hune' ti' xin, yah yaw Comam yin̈ caw ip: --L'azaro, elan̈tij, ẍi Comam.
Hac tu' xin yu yelti naj L'azaro tu', bec'bilico k'ap yin̈ isnimanil naj, pichbilpaxto sat naj yu hune' k'ap. Yalni Comam xin: --Holwelo k'ap yin̈ naj, cat isto naj, ẍi Comam.
Anma ah Judea apni ilwal yin̈ ix Mar'ia, caw yilpaxo tzet iswatx'e Comam Jes'us bey tu', yuxinto caw hantan̈e anma anayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
Aypaxo huntek'an ebnaj to halno tet ebnaj fariseo yin̈ tzet iswatx'e Comam.

Hac tu' xin yu yoc ebnaj fariseo islahti'n̈en isba yeb ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb xin ebnaj yahaw con̈ob. Yalni ebnaj: --¿Tzet wal juten tinan̈, hune' naj tu' caw tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule chisyecano naj?

Tato ton̈e chijila chislahnico naj, caw sunil jet con̈ob ti' chak'ayto yul yanma yin̈ naj. Hac tu' xin chiyu yulo ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Roma, cat xin yuchc'anayo ebnaj yatut Comam Dios, cat xin yetanto ebnaj cocon̈ob ti', ẍi ebnaj tet hunun.
Ay xin hune' naj, Caif'as isbi, iswi'ehal yehico naj yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yin̈ hune' habil tu'. Ha' naj halni: --Hex ti' caw matzet heyohtaj.
Caw mach chitxumchalo heyu tato ec'bal c'ul iscam naj ti' selelo sunil anma, hac tu' xin matxa chitan̈ilo cocon̈ob ti' chal tu', ẍi naj.

Wal xin mach yal naj Caif'as hune' tu' yul yet ischuquil, yuto ha' naj yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote hune' habil tu', yuxinto ha' Comam Dios ak'ni yala' naj tato chicam Comam Jes'us selelo sunil anma ah Israel.
