Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam: "Tato chin̈ohcha hunu mac ayco ishowal tawin̈, ak' tzet chislo. Taca chitaj isti' xin, ak'paxo ha' yuc'u', haxinwal chitac isc'ul cat istx'ixwican̈," ẍiayoj.
Machojab chik'oji istx'ojal teyin̈, wal xin ha'ojab isc'ulal chewatx'e, haxinwal chexk'oji yin̈ istx'ojal.
Yijemojab cheyute heba yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj alcal, yuto machmi ebnaj alcal tato maẍtaj Comam Dios an̈eco ebnaj yin̈ hune' munil tu', wal xin ha' Comam an̈eco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil.
Yuxin ha' mac chiman̈c'on yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj, chisman̈c'o yin̈ tzet ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios. Ha' mac man̈c'om tu' xin chialaxayo isya'tajil yiban̈.

Ebnaj alcal tu', mach ayoco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yu yak'ni xiwo ebnaj anma chiwatx'en isc'ulal, walxinto yu yanayo ebnaj isya'tajil yiban̈ mac tx'oj chiswatx'e. Yuxin ta mach cheyoche chexak'lax xiwoj, watx'ewe istoholal, hac tu' xin chitzala ebnaj teyin̈.

Yuto ebnaj alcal ayco ebnaj isyijen hune' munil ak'bil yu Comam tu' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈, yaja' ta istx'ojal chewatx'e xin yilaltic'a hexiwi, yuto ak'bil ismunil ebnaj yanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ anma tx'oj chiswatx'e. Yu yanayo ebnaj isya'tajil yiban̈ anma man̈c'om, yuxin ayco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yu Comam.
Yuxin yilal heyijen yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj, maẍn̈etaj yu chexxiw yay isya'tajil teyiban̈, walxinto yu hac tu' choche Comam tato chicoyije.
Yuxin yilal heyak'ni hetohlabal yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' munil tu' tet ebnaj, ha' xin lan̈an isyijen ebnaj.

Hayet chik'anlax ch'en tohlabal, yilal heyak'ni ch'en, yeb xin chetohlawe heyornato maca hunu licencia haca' yalni ley. Ha' mac ay yet isyijelax tzet chala, yilal heyijen tet; haxa mac ay yelapnoj, ayojab yelapno yul hesat. Ha' mac yilal yalaxico ismay, yilal heyanico ismay.
Machojab hec'as tet hunu maca, wal xin ha'ojab hexahann̈en heba han̈e'ojab chioc hec'asoj, yuto ha' mac chixahann̈e yet anmahil lan̈an isyijen ischejbanil Comam.

Yuto chal ischejbanil Comam Dios: "Mach chaẍixli mach chaẍwinajli, mach chaẍpotx'wahi, mach chaẍelk'awi, mach chahobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ hawet anmahil," ẍi. Huntek'an chejbanil ti' yeb huntek'anxa, hune'xan̈e chielicoj chalni haca' ti': "Xahan chawil hawet anmahil haca' haya'iln̈en haba," ẍi.
Ha' mac xahan ay yet anmahil yu, mach istx'ojal chiswatx'e yin̈ yet anmahil tu', yuto hayet chisxahann̈e yet anmahil, tz'ajan lahan chisyije ischejbanil Comam.
Yuxin caw txumwe yin̈ hune' tiempo bay ayon̈ ti', istiempohalxa jinilo cowayan̈, yuto tinan̈ cawilxa yeti cocolbanil sata yet janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam.

Tinan̈ xin cawilxa yeti tiempo, lahan haca' yet xaec'to ak'bal, lan̈anxa issajbiloj. Yuxin cobeja'wecano sunil istx'ojal yet k'ejholo, cat cowatx'en coba jec' yin̈ issajilk'inal yet Comam, haca' chu iswatx'en isba naj soldado, yet chanic'o naj huntek'an xilk'ape yet howal.

Cowatx'ewe istoholal haca' tzet chiwatx'elax yet tz'ayical. Machojab chon̈ec' yin̈ uc'u te', machojab chon̈ec'paxo yin̈ pek'al maca yin̈ ixloj. Machojab chicok'aytzeco istx'ojal jin̈, machojab chijak'le howal coxol maca ischiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈.
Haca'ojab hunu naj soldado chiswatx'e isba chanic'o huntek'an xilk'ape yet howal yin̈, hacojab tu' cowatx'en coba yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo, machojab chijak' yub istx'ojal tzet choche conimanil.
Chahwe mac maẍto yip yanma yin̈ Comam texol. Mach chebuch heba yebi.
Yuto ay mac yohtaj tato chu coloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta chito cabcon yanma isloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', yuxin itahn̈e chislo.

Wal xin ha' mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' machojab chisyah mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu'. Haxa mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', machojab chal isk'umal mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu', yuto ha' hune' mac tu' chabilxa Comam yu.

K'inalo tinan̈ ta ay hunu naj chimunla yinta ispatr'on, ¿tom ay joc jalni isk'umal naj munlawom tu'? ¡Machoj! Wal xin han̈c'an̈e naj ispatr'on naj tu' chalni ta c'ul naj maca machoj. Hac tu' je yul sat Comam Dios, c'ul chon̈elicoj yuto ay yip Comam con̈iswatx'enico yin̈ isc'ulal.
Aypaxo xin mac ti' chalni tato ay tz'ayic ec'bal yelapno yiban̈ hunuxa tz'ayic, aypaxo mac chalni tato lahann̈e yelapno sunil tz'ayic; wal xin t'in̈anojab jecoj yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e.

Yuxin ha' mac chiyijen hunu tz'ayic ha' tet Comam chisyije, hacpax tu' mac mach chiyijen hunu tz'ayic, yu Comam yuxin mach chisyije. Hacpax tu' xin mac chiloni sunil tzet ye tu', yu yanico ismay Comam yuxin chislo, chak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chislo. Hacpax tu' mac mach chiloni sunil tzet ye tu', yu yanico ismay Comam yuxin mach chislo, chak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal tet Comam.
Yulbal yet itzitzon̈, mach jeto coba cochuquil, hacpax tu' yet chon̈cami mach jeto coba.
Ta itzitzon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' to yu coyijen tzet chal Comam; taca chon̈cam xin yettic'apaxo Comam jehi. Yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzon̈ maca chon̈cami, yet Comam jehi.
Yuxin cam Comam Jesucristo, yitzitzibican̈ hunelxa yu yoc Comam Yahawil yin̈ anma camom yeb anma itzitz.
Yuxin mach chu jalni isk'umal maca coyahni hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab, yuto cosunil chon̈oc sata Comam cat yilni Comam yin̈ tzet chon̈elicoj.
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios: Hanin yahaw inti'an, chiwak' binaho inbihan yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an tato sunil anma chihul insatajan, yeb sunil mac yilal yalni yu isti' ta haninn̈ech'anan Dios hinan, ẍiayoj.
Yuxin sunilon̈ chon̈oc sata Comam Dios cat jalni yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e hununon̈.
Yuxin mach chu heyalni hek'umal hununex, wal xin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal, haxinwal machi hunu mac cheyak' ayc'ayoj, cat issomchacanto isnabal heyu.

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tato machi hunu tzet chilolax ti' ayco istx'ojal yin̈, caw t'in̈an wehan yin̈ hune' ti' yuto yuninalxa Comam Jesucristo wehan. Yaja' tato ay hunu mac chitxumni tato ayco istx'ojal yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu', tx'oj isloni chal tu'.

Yuxin ta yu tzet chelo cheyak' taco isc'ul hunu ebnaj juẍtaj, ha' chal yelapno tu' mach xahano cheyil heba. ¡Machojab taj yu tzet chelo cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu maca, yuto ha' hune' mac tu' bay yak' camo isba Comam Jes'us!
Machojab cheyak' yub anma istzotel teyin̈ yu tzet chewatx'e.
Han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios mach chiyoc yin̈ tzet chicolo maca tzet chijuc'u, wal xin ha' jec' yin̈ istoholal, yeb jec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, yeb yin̈ tzalahilal yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Ha' mac chiyijen tet Comam Cristo haca' tu', chitzala Comam Dios yin̈, caw c'ulpaxo hune' mac tu' yul sat anma.
Yuxin colahaweco cowatx'en tzet chon̈anico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, hac tu' chu cocolwa jin̈ hununon̈ yin̈ coch'ib yin̈ yet Comam.

Machojab cheyak' etaxoto ismunil Comam Dios yu tzet chelo. Yin̈ caw isyelal sunil tzet chilolaxi mach istx'ojal ayco yin̈. Ha' istx'ojal, ha' coloni hunu tzet ye tu' chiak'ni cabconocan̈ yanma hunu mac yin̈ Comam.
Ec'balto c'ul ta mach chicoc'ux no' chibe maca juc'ni vino maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' sata jak'ni ayc'ayo hunuxa juẍtaj.
Ha' tzet cheyayto yul heyanma, t'in̈anojab heye yin̈ yul sat Comam Dios. ¡Sak'al yet mac mach chicabcon isc'ul yin̈ tzet chiswatxe'!
Yaja' wal mac chicabcon yanma isloni hunu tzet ye tu', hayet chisloni chaco ismul, yuto mach yin̈ sunilo yanma chisloni. Yuxin ta mach t'in̈ano jeco yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e, chijaco comul.
Han̈on̈ ayxa yip janma yin̈ Comam machojabn̈etaj han̈on̈ chijaco coba yin̈ coc'ul, wal xin yilal cocolwa yin̈ mac maẍto caw t'in̈ano yecoj.
Hununon̈ ti' ha'ojab isc'ulal chicowatx'e yin̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, hac tu' xin chitzala isc'ul yin̈ Comam yeb yun̈e yik'ni yip yanma yin̈ yet Comam.
Haca' Comam Jesucristo, maẍtaj tzet yoche Comam iswatx'e, walxinto yij isba yin̈ Comam tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj bay chala: "Hayet habuchlaxi, haninan wabenan isya'il," ẍiayoj.
Sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios yet payat, cocuybanil yu istz'ibn̈elaxcanoj, chak'ni isnimanil coc'ul yeb yak'lobal janma, yun̈e janico Comam yipo janma.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios, Comam chiak'ni isnimanil coc'ul yeb yak'lobal janma chicolwa teyin̈, haxinwal hunxan̈e tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal haca' Comam Jesucristo.
Hac tu' xin hunxan̈e cheyute heba cat hebitn̈en isbi Comam Dios, Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.
Yuxin macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chahwe texol, haca' yu quexischahni Comam Cristo yu heyanico ismay Comam Dios.

Chiwalan hune' ti' teyet tato hul Comam Jesucristo yak'aco isba ischejabo anma Israel, yun̈e yijni isba tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios tet jichmaman̈. Hac tu' yu isyenipaxilo Comam Cristo tato caw chij isba tzet chalte Comam Dios.

Yeb xin hulpaxo Comam Cristo, yun̈e yanipaxico anma mach Israelo ismay Comam Dios yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala: Yuxin chiwalan c'ulla tzoti' tawin̈ yu yoc hamay yulaj con̈ob yu anma mach Israeloj, cat inbitn̈enan habi, ẍiayoj.
Ay hune' bay chalpaxo yul Yum Comam Dios: Tzalahan̈we hex mach Israelo hex ti' yinta iscon̈ob Comam Dios, ẍiayoj.
Ay hune'xa bay chalpaxoj: Sunil nimeta con̈ob yeb niẍte con̈ob bay ay anma mach Israeloj, bitn̈elaxojab Comam Dios yu, ẍi.
Tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayo yu naj Isa'ias: Chipitzc'a hune' naj chitit yin̈ yuninal naj Isa'i, cat yoc yahawo yin̈ anma mach Israeloj. Yin̈ naj xin chicawxi isc'ul anma tu', ẍi.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios, Comam ch'ak'ni iscawxobal janma, ha' ch'ak'ni tzalahilal yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet, hex cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam; cat cam yak'nipaxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo iscawxobal hec'ul.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab caw wohtajan sic'lebil ta caw c'ulch'an hec'ul teyin̈ hununex, yeb xin caw aypaxo hehelanil, caw xin heyohtapaxo hecuyni heba hununex.

Yaja' yin̈ hune' carta ti' ay huntek'an tzet ye tu' ayayo wuhan chiwaltojan teyet yin̈ sunil wanmahan yun̈e mach chenahuln̈etoj. Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul.

Ischejab Comam Jesucristo wecojan xol anma mach Israeloj, ha' inmunilan xin ha' ton walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile chalte Comam Dios, yun̈e yaltelax anma mach Israelo tet Comam haca' hunu xahanbal caw chitzala Comam yin̈, sajn̈ebilxa yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Wal xin yu caw ayinxacojan yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yuxin caw chintzalahan yin̈ inmunilan ak'bil yu Comam Dios.

Mach chu walnihan yin̈ tzet chu ismunla hunuxa mac yin̈ ismunil Comam, to han̈c'an̈e yin̈ tzet chu quinisk'annihan Comam Cristo yin̈ inmunilan chiiniti anma mach Israelo yin̈ isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, han̈e chiwalan. Hune' ti' yij isba yin̈ tzet walan yeb yin̈ tzet inwatx'ehan,

yeb yu yip tzettaj inyehan, yeb yu yip c'aybalc'ule, yeb yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo; hac tu' yu inyijenan yin̈ caw c'ul walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo. Hata bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en quinichicojan walnic'ojan; caw sunil bay quinec'an wala'c'ojan masanta quinapnihan yul ismajul tx'otx' Iliria.
Hac tu' yu wanico yin̈ inc'ulan winitojan Tzoti' yet colbanile bay maẍtotic'a chiabelax isbina isbi Comam Jesucristo, yun̈e machi hunu mac chihalni ta toxan̈e quinec'an inlaha'an munil tzabilxacoj.
Yul Yum Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj: Chiyila' anma hune' mac maẍtotic'a bay chiabelax isk'umal. Mac maẍtotic'a bay chabe istzoti'al chitxumchalo yu, ẍiayoj.
Yuxin maẍtotic'a chu intohan quexwila'an, waxan̈ca xin tx'i'alxa el chiwochehan intohan.
Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xalahwi inmunilan yul huntek'an con̈ob ti'. Caw tx'i'alxa habil yichi wochenan intohan quexwilnojan.
Yuxin hayet chintohan yin̈ inbelan bey Espa~na cat wec'an quexwilnojan, lahwi istzala wanmahan quexwilnihan yin̈ hayebo tz'ayic xin, chiwochehan tato chexcolwa win̈an inlahnihan inbeltu'an.
Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin chintohan bey Jerusal'en wak'a'canojan hanic' ch'en melyu chicolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en tu'.
Yuto ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab ay bey Macedonia yeb ay bey Acaya ti', el yin̈ isc'ul iscutxbanayo hanic' ch'en melyu, cat yilaxto ch'en tet anma meba' ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey Jerusal'en.

Caw el yin̈ yanma ebnaj iscutxbanayo ch'en; hune' ti' caw c'ul yuto haca'tic'a yu yak'ni ebnaj juẍta Israel isc'ulal Comam tet ebnaj mach Israeloj, hac tu' xin chu ispajtzen ebnaj yin̈ tzet ay tet ebnaj juẍta Israel tu'.
Yuxin chito yijcano isba hune' inchejbanilti'an intohan wak'nocanojan ch'en melyu chicolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍta tu', lahwi tu' cat wec'an quexwilnojan yet chintohan bey Espa~na.
Ayco yin̈ wanmahan ta hayet chinec'an texol, tx'i'al isc'ulal Comam Cristo chiyak'cano jet.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw chink'anan teyet yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo yeb yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul hecolwa hetxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios.
K'anwe tet Comam Dios, haxinwal chiniscolan Comam tet ebnaj ah Judea mach chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam, yebpaxo xin yun̈e c'ul chu ischahni ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en hune' colwal chiwitoti'an.
K'anwepaxo tet Comam haxinwal ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam chinapnihan quexwila'an cat inxewninojan texol yin̈ tzalahilal.
Ha'ojab Comam yahaw ak'anc'ulal chioc heyetbihoj. ¡Hacojab tu'!
Caw chintak'etojan janab Febe teyet. Ix janab ti' diaconisa ix, caw munla ix xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey con̈ob Cencrea.

Caw c'ulojab chu hechahni ix yuto janab ix yin̈ Comam, chahwe ix haca' chu cochahni hunu mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Colwahan̈we yin̈ tzet chiocnico yu ix yuto caw tx'i'al mac bay colwa ix, colwapaxo ix win̈an.
Halwe tet janab Priscila yeb tet juẍta Aquila ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil, caw wet munlawomal inbahan yeb ix yebpaxo xin naj juẍta tu' yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo.

Ix janab Priscila yeb juẍta Aquila tu', caw ishin isba iscam yu quiniscolnihan, maẍn̈etajinan xin chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet naj yeb tet ix, to ha' hunpaxo sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Dios mach Israeloj ay yul hunun con̈ob chiak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal.

Halwepaxo tet sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chiscutxba isba yul yatut janab yeb juẍta tu' ta chil isba. Halwepaxo tet juẍta Epeneto tato chil isba, naj juẍta tu' caw xahan ay naj wuhan. Ha' naj babel yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul ismajul Asia.
Halwepaxo tet ix janab Mar'ia ta chil isba ix, ix janab tu' caw xamunla ix texol.

Halwepaxo tet ebnaj wet con̈oban, naj juẍta Andr'onico yeb juẍta Junias ta chil isba ebnaj. Ebnaj cawan̈ tu' hun yu wocan preso yeb ebnaj, caw xin ay yelapno ebnaj yul sat ebnaj ischejab Comam, babel xin yaco isba ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios insatajan.
Halwe tet juẍta Amplias tato chil isba naj, caw xahan ay naj wuhan yin̈ isbi Comam,
Halwe tet juẍta Urbano ta chil isba, naj juẍta tu' caw munla naj jintajan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam, cat heyalnipaxo tet juẍta Estaquis ta chilpaxo isba, caw xahan ay naj wuhan.

Halwe tet naj juẍta Apeles ta chil isba, naj juẍta tu' caw xaec' ilwebal yiban̈ naj yu ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam. Halwepaxo tet naj juẍta Arist'obulo yebpaxo tet sunil mac ay bey yatut naj ta chil isba.

Halwepaxo tet naj wet con̈oban, naj juẍta Herodi'on ta chil isba. Halwepaxo tet juẍta Narciso yebpaxo tet sunil mac ay bey yatut naj ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil, yuto xayayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.

Halwepaxo tet janab Trifena yeb janab Trifosa ta chil isba. Ebix janab tu' caw chimunla ebix yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, cat heyalnipaxo tet ix janab P'ersida, ix caw xahan ay wuhan, ta chil isba ix. Ix janab tu' caw munlapaxo ix yin̈ ismunil Comam.
Halwepaxo tet juẍta Rufo ta chil isba, naj juẍta tu' caw sic'bililo naj yu Comam. Halwepaxo tet ismi' juẍta tu' ta chil isba, janab tu' haca' inmi'an yepaxo ix.
Halwe tet juẍta As'incrito yeb juẍta Flegonte yeb juẍta Hermes yeb juẍta Patrobas yeb juẍta Hermas ta chil isba ebnaj yin̈ iscawil; yebpaxo ebnaj juẍta ay isc'atan̈ ebnaj.
Halwe tet juẍta Fil'ologo yeb janab Julia yeb tet juẍta Nereo, yeb tet yanab naj, yeb tet janab Olimpas, ta chil isba yebpaxo tet sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ay isc'atan̈ ebnaj.
K'ambele hanic' heye hununex yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ caw tzalahilal. Chalnipaxto sunil yuninal Comam Dios ay yul hunun con̈ob ay bey ti' ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj choche yak'aco pohlebahil texol, yeb choche quexyak'a ayc'ayoj. Ha' huntek'an chu ebnaj tu' mach chischah isba yeb cuybanile chabilxa heyu. Huntek'an ebnaj tu' mach chechah ebnaj texol.
Yuto maẍtaj tet Comam Jesucristo chisyije ebnaj, walxinto ha' tzet choche isc'ul ebnaj ha' chissayic'oj. Caw c'ulch'an chute istzotel ebnaj yun̈e yak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma mach caw yitz'atil iswi'.
Caw sunil mac ohtan̈e tato caw yijemex, yuxin caw chintzalahan teyin̈. Chiwochehan ta helan cheyute heba yin̈ isc'ulal, maẍtaj yin̈ istx'ojal.
Ha' Comam Dios yahaw ak'anc'ulal, chicolwa teyin̈ hek'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil yin̈ an̈e, cat iscan naj yalan̈ heyoj. Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chianayo isc'ulal teyiban̈.

Chalto naj juẍta Timoteo ta cheyil heba, naj juẍta ti' caw wet munlawomalan naj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios. Chalnipaxto juẍta Lucio yeb juẍta Jas'on yeb juẍta Sos'ipater ta cheyil heba; ebnaj juẍta ti' wet con̈ob inbahan ye ebnaj.
Haquinpaxtu'an hanin Tercio inti'an, chink'ambepaxtojan hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil, yin̈ yet Comam. Haninan lan̈an intz'ibn̈entojan hune' carta ti' yu naj Pablo.

Chalnipaxto juẍta Gayo ta cheyil heba, yul yatut juẍta ti' ayon̈an̈. Ha' bey ti' xin chicocutxbapaxo cobahan̈ yin̈ culto yeb sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo. Chalnipaxto naj juẍta Erasto ta cheyil heba, naj juẍta ti' tesorero naj yul con̈ob ti'. Chalnipaxto juẍta Cuarto ta cheyil heba.
Yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈. ¡Hacojab tu'!

K'anweco ismay Comam Dios, Comam chu quexislin̈ban haca' yalni Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile walic'ojan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Hune' cuybanile ti' ewantic'a yehi yettaxtic'a maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios.

Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xayak' Comam ohtan̈elaxoj yu tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payat, haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam, Comam ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ewantic'a ye ti', xaak'lax yohtan̈elo sunil anma yun̈e yanayto yul yanma cat isyijeni.
Yu tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo yuxin alaxojabico ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, Comam hune'n̈ech'an yeb caw ay ishelanil. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an, awtebilinan wocan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo, yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios. Ha' hun juẍta S'ostenes chitz'ibn̈ento hune' carta ti' wintajan teyet, hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul con̈ob Corinto. Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Awtebilexpaxo yu heyoc iscon̈obo Comam, yeb sunil mac bayxan̈etu'wal aya chiawten isbi Comam Jesucristo yin̈, Comam Jahawil yeb yahawilpaxo ebnaj tu'.
Yak'ab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet, yeb ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma.
Maẍtic'a chinbejan wak'nihan yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul xayayo teyiban̈ yu Comam Jesucristo.
Yu hune'n̈e heye yeb Comam Jesucristo, yuxin xayaco Comam Dios sunil isc'ulch'anil yin̈ heyanma, hehelanil hetzoteli, yeb yitz'atil hewi'.
Yuxin sunil tzet halbil teyet yin̈ Comam Jesucristo caw lan̈an isyenilo isba teyin̈.
Tinan̈ xin machi hunu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios matzet teyin̈ yulbal ayexic'o heyechman istz'ayical bay chul Comam Jesucristo.
Ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni heyip helin̈ban heba masanto yet chihul islahobal tz'ayic, haxinwal machi istx'ojal chiilcha teyin̈ yet chul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.
Sunil tzet chalte Comam Dios masan caw chij isba, ha' xin Comam quexawtenico yul isk'ab Isc'ahol, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwaltojan teyet, hunxan̈ehojab cheyute henabal, mach comono chepohleto heba. Wal xin ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol, hunxan̈ehojab tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal yeb yul heyanma.
Chiwaltojan hune' ti' teyet, hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, yuto xawabehan hek'umal tato ay howal texol bey tu', hac tu' yalni yuninal juẍta Clo'e wetan.

Tolab ayex cheyal haca' ti': "Han̈on̈ti'an̈, yinta juẍta Pablo ayon̈icojan̈," yeb ayex cheyalpaxoj: "Yinta juẍta Apolos ayon̈icojan̈." Ayexpaxo xin cheyala: "Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Pedro ayon̈icojan̈," quexchi. Tolab ayex cheyalpaxoj: "Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yet Comam Jesucristo jehan̈," quexchi.
¿Tom pohbilayo Comam Cristo heyalni? ¿Tom haninan quinalaxcan̈an yin̈ culus yu hecolchahi? yeb ¿tom yin̈ inbihan alaxcan̈ ha' hewi' xin?
Wal xin chiwak'an yuch'andios tet Comam Dios yuto machi hunujex ti' wacan̈an ha' hewi', cachann̈e juẍta Crispo yeb juẍta Gayo,
yuxin mach chu heyalni ta yin̈ inbihan alaxcan̈ ha' hewi'.
Wapaxocan̈an ha' iswi' yuninal juẍta Est'efanas, matxa hunuxa mac ahna ha' iswi' wuhan.

Mach chejbilojinan wanican̈an ha' iswi' anma yu Comam Cristo, walxinto ha' inchejbanilan ha' walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile. Yaja' machi bay quintzotelan yin̈ nimeta tzoti' teyet yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈, wal xin han̈e iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ culus, ha' walic'ojan.
Hune' cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus, sucal ye yul sat anma chic'aytoj. Wal yul cosat han̈on̈ xacon̈colcha xin, hune' cuybanile yet colbanile ti' yip Comam Dios yehi.
Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios: Chintan̈tzelojan ishelanil anma ay ishelanil sat yiban̈k'inal ti', cat intan̈tzenpaxilojan isnabal anma ay yitz'atil iswi', ẍiayoj.
¿Tzet xin tan̈cano ebnaj ay ishelanil yeb ebnaj cuywawom, yeb ebnaj caw helan istzotel yin̈ hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'? Wal xin xaismeltzoco Comam ishelanil anma tu' yin̈ sucal.

Yu ishelanil Comam Dios yuxin el yin̈ isc'ul tato maẍtaj yu ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuxin chiohtan̈elaxilo Comam, wal xin el yin̈ isc'ul Comam ta yu Istzoti' chijalic'ojan̈, ha' chicolni anma chianayto yul yanma, waxan̈ca ay mac chalni tato sucalil ye hune' Tzoti' ti'.
Anma Israel, ha' c'aybalc'ule choche anma yila', wal ebnaj griego xin, ha' ishelanil anma choche ebnaj yabe'.
Yaja' wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ ha' Comam Cristo alaxcan̈ yin̈ culus, ha' chijalic'ojan̈. Yul sat anma Israel caw tx'oj hune' tu', walpaxo yul sat anma mach Israelo xin sucal yehi.
Wal han̈on̈ awtebilon̈xa yu Comam Dios ti' xin, waxan̈ca Israel maca mach Israeloj johtaj tato yip yeb ishelanil Comam Dios ayco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Huntek'an sucal ye yin̈ Comam Dios yalni anma, ha' ec'bal yelapno sata ishelanil anma. Haxa huntek'an machi yip yin̈ Comam Dios yalni anma xin, ha' caw ec'bal yip sata yip anma.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, chimheyil texol hex awtebilhexxa yu Comam Dios tato caw haywan̈exch'an ay hehelanil haca' ishelanil anma. Haywan̈exch'anpaxo yahaw hex, haca' ebnaj iswi'ehal con̈ob, yeb haywan̈exch'anpaxo hex yic'al anma aycano yelapnoj heyehi.

Yuxin ha' mac machi nich'ano tzet yohta yul sat anma, ha' issic'can̈ Comam Dios yuninaloj yun̈e yel istx'ixobal mac caw ay ishelanil. Issic'nipaxocan̈ Comam mac machi yelapnoj yun̈e yel istx'ixobal mac caw ay yelapno yehi.
Issic'can̈ Comam anma yahbil yeb anma machi yelapno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e matxa yelapno chielcanico mac caw ay yelapno chabe.
Hac tu' xin machi mac chu yalni isba can̈yehal yul sat Comam Dios.

Ha' Comam con̈hunbancano yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, yak'nipaxo Comam ishelanil Comam Cristo cohelaniloj. Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, yeb yetxa Comam jehi, yupaxo Comam Cristo tu' yuxin colbilon̈xa.
Hac tu' chu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: "Tato ay hunu mac choche yik'a'can̈ isba, ha'ojab Comam Cristo chican̈," ẍiayoj.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, yet quinbeyan walnojan Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jesucristo texol, maẍtaj ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb huntek'an nimeta tzoti' caw nanxa yoc walan teyet.
Yet wec'an texol tu' machi hunuxa tzet ye tu' woche wala'an teyet han̈c'an̈e cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus.
Yet wec'an texol tu' quinnanonan, inluylunpaxocan̈an yu xiwquilal.
Hayet walnihan Istzoti' Comam Dios teyet, mach quexinmontehan yu ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', walxinto ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeb yip Comam Dios, ha' anayto yul heyanma.
Hac tu' xin maẍtaj yu ishelanil ebnaj winaj yuxin heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, walxinto yu yip Comam.

Yaja' wal tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ebnaj ayxa isnabal yin̈ yet Comam, chon̈tzotelan̈ yin̈ hune' helanilehal tet ebnaj, yaja' maẍtaj helanilehal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Machcatajpaxo ishelanil ebnaj jahaw sat tx'otx'al ti', yuto ebnaj tu' chitan̈ilo ebnaj.

Hune' chiwalti'an, ha' ton hune' ishelanil Comam Dios ewan yehi, yun̈e caw c'ul chon̈elcanico yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam. Hune' ti' nabiltic'a yu Comam yet yalan̈to maẍto chiwatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Hune' ti' maẍtic'a txumcha yu ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuto ta istxum ebnaj machim yacan̈ ebnaj Comam yin̈ culus, Comam caw aycano yelapno yehi.

Wal xin tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Ay huntek'an tzet watx'ebilxa yu Comam Dios tet mac chiochen Comam. Hune' tu' maẍto hunu mac xailni, yeb xaabeni, maẍtopaxo mac xaec' isnabal yin̈, ẍiayoj.
Huntek'an tzet ye tu' ti' xayak' Comam johtan̈elo yu Yesp'iritu, ha' Yesp'iritu Comam tu' ohtan̈e sunil, yohtapaxo huntek'an tzet ye tu' yet Comam Dios ya'ta cotxumni.
Haca' hunu mac tinan̈, mach yohtajo tzet ayayto yul yanma hunuxa yet anmahil, wal xin cachann̈e yanma hune' mac tu' ohtan̈e. Hac tu' ye Comam Dios, han̈c'an̈e Yesp'iritu Comam ohtan̈e tzet nabil yu.
Walon̈ ti' xin maẍtaj yesp'iritu yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chabil ju, to ha' hune' Esp'iritu chitit yin̈ Comam Dios. Hac tu' xin chu cotxumni huntek'an isc'ulal chak' Comam jet.

Maẍtaj tzoti' johtajan̈ yu cohelanilan̈ chijalan̈, machoj, walxinto ha' Tzoti' chak' Comam Esp'iritu jetan̈ ha' chijalan̈. Hac tu' xin chu jalnilojan̈ yin̈ haban huntek'an yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet anma ayxaco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈.

Ha' mac maẍto Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈, mach chischah yabe' huntek'an tzet ye tu' yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo, yuto sucal ye yul sat, mach chitxumchapaxo yu, yuto huntek'an ti' han̈c'an̈e Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni cotxumuloj.
Wal mac ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ xin, haban istxumni sunil ej tzet ye tu', ta c'ul maca machoj. Yaja' wal comon anma xin, mach chik'oji istxumni tzet ye mac ayco Yesp'iritu Comam yin̈.

Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': ¿Mac hunu chu isnanilo yin̈ tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal Comam Dios? Yeb xin ¿mac hunu chiak'ni istz'ajanbal isc'ul Comam? ẍiayoj. Wal han̈on̈ ti' xin, ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni johtan̈elo isnabal Comam Jesucristo.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hayet quinec'an texol, mach quintzotelan teyet haca' tet mac caw yijem tet Comam Esp'iritu Santo. Wal xin quintzotelan teyet haca' tet anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb haca' mac uninto yin̈ yet Comam Dios.
Yuxin yet incuywahan texol caw comonn̈e yu intzotelan teyet, yuto haca'to ye niẍte unin chito txutxwi, maẍto chu yak'lax itah tet, hac tu' heyehi. Hac to tu' heyepaxo tinan̈,

yuto haca' istxumni anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', hac to tu' hetxumni, yuto chichiwaco hec'ul teyin̈ hununex, ay howal texol yeb pohlebahil. Chal yelapno tu' to ha' tzet chal heyanma ha' cheyije. Chebeybaln̈enpaxo haca' tzet chiswatx'e anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam.

Yuto texol hex ti' ayex cheyala: "Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Pablo ayon̈icojan̈." Ayex cheyalpaxoj: "Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Apolos ayon̈icojan̈," quexchi. Yet cheyalni haca' tu' to haca'to anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', hac tu' hetxumni.

¿Tzet yelapno wehan hanin Pablo inti'an? yeb ¿tzet yelapno ye juẍta Apolos tu'? Wal xin ischejabn̈e Comam Dios jehan̈, chejbilon̈icojan̈ texol yu Comam yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Ha' munil yacanico Comam yul cok'aban̈ hununon̈an̈ ha' chicowatx'ehan̈.

Yet wec'an texol haca'tan̈e haninan intz'uncanayojan hunu te te' texol. Haxa yet yec' naj Apolos texol xin haca'tan̈e ha' naj ec' hayenoj. Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli, ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni ch'ibo hune' tz'unub tu'.
Yuxin ha' naj chitz'unni yeb naj chihayeni machi yelapno ebnaj, cachann̈e Comam Dios caw aycano yelapno yehi yuto ha' Comam chiak'ni ch'ibo hune' tz'unub tu'.
Yuxin naj chitz'unni hunu tzet ye tu' yeb naj chihayeni lahan ismunil ebnaj, chischah ebnaj ispaj selel ismunil tu' tet Comam Dios hatatic'a hanta munil chiswatx'e hunun ebnaj.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jet munlawomal cobahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, wal hex ti' xin haca' istz'unub Comam Dios heyehi. Lahanexpaxo haca' hunu n̈a lan̈an iswatx'encan̈ Comam Dios.

Haxa haninti'an xin, lahaninan haca' hunu naj ijbalom yin̈ watx'e n̈a yu isc'ulal Comam Dios. Hacojtam haninan wayojan isxe'al hune' n̈a tu', nanxa hune' naj xin chianican̈ isloc'al. Yaja' hunun mac chimunla yin̈ hune' n̈a tu' yilal cam chil yin̈ tzet chu ismunlahi.
Wal xin machi hunuxa mac chu yanayo hunuxa isxe'al n̈a yiban̈ hune' ayxayo tu', yuto ha' hune' ayxayo tu' ha' ton Comam Jesucristo.
Yiban̈ hune' xe'al n̈a tu' xin, ay mac chianico ch'en oro, maca ch'en plata, maca ch'en ch'en caw c'ulch'an jilni isxialoj. Aypaxo mac chianico te te', maca te' ch'im, maca xaj wale' yichoj.
Yaja' yet islahobal tz'ayic yet chiilax tzet chielico anma, cat yilwelax comunil hununon̈ xol k'a k'a', yun̈e yillaxi ta c'ul maca mach c'ulo tzet chicowatx'e.
Yuxin ha' mac caw c'ul ismunil iswatx'e, lahan yeb hunu n̈a machi tz'ato yu k'a k'a'. Ha' mac haca' tu' chischah ispaj selel ismunil.

Yaja' wal mac mach c'ulo ismunil chiswatx'e, chitz'ato ismunil tu' xol k'a k'a', chic'aywa hune' mac tu' yin̈ ismunil. Waxan̈ca xin chicolchahi, yaja' haca'xan̈e iscollaxilti hunu anma xol k'a k'a', hac tu' chu iscolchahi.
¿Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato yatut Comam Dios heyehi yeb ayco Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyin̈?
Yuxin mac chitan̈tzenilo hune' yatut Comam tu', chistan̈tzelo Comam, yuto han̈c'an̈e Comam ay yet hune' n̈a tu'. Hune' yatut Comam Dios chiwalti'an, ha' ton ex hex ti'.
Mach cheyute heba sucal, tato ay hunu mac texol caw helan yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chabe, yuteojab isba haca' hunu mac matzet yohtaj haxinwal caw helan chielcanicoj.

Yuto ha' ishelanil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw matzet chalilo yul sat Comam Dios. Hac tu' yalni Istzoti' Comam bay chal haca' ti': "Ha' mac caw ay ishelanil yalni, yin̈tic'a ishelanil tu' chitzabchati yu Comam," ẍiayoj.
Chalnipaxoj: "Yohta Comam Dios tato matzet chal yelapno yitz'atil iswi' anma caw helan yalni," ẍiayoj.
Yuxin mach chub helolo'n̈en heba yu tzujanex yinta hunu maca, yuto sunil ak'bilxa teyet yu Comam Dios.

Haca' hanin Pablo inti'an yeb juẍta Apolos, yeb juẍta Pedro, ha' Comam Dios con̈anicojan̈ chejabo texol, haca'ojtam heyet jehan̈. Haca'paxo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb k'inale, yeb camical, yeb tzet ay tinan̈, yeb tzettaj chitohuli, heyet ye sunil tu'.
Haxa hex ti' xin, yet Comam Cristo heyehi, Comam Cristo tu' xin yet Comam Dios yehi.
Caw c'ul tato mach jin̈ojan̈ cheyaco heyanma, yuto ischejabn̈e Comam Jesucristo jehan̈. Ak'bil cochejbanilan̈ jak'nihan̈ ohtan̈elaxo huntek'an tzet ewan ye yu Comam Dios.
Yuxin ha' mac bay chiak'lax hunu chejbanile yilal yijem chute isba.
Wal inti'an xin, machi wocan yin̈ ta chexoc heyila' yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan, maca hunuxa mac chioc ilnoj. Haquintu'an mach chinocan wila'an yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan.
Walca xin machi hunu istx'ojal chinwatx'ehan, yaja' maẍtaj yu hune' tu' yuxin chiwalan tato c'ulinxahan, walxinto han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios Yahawil chu yalni yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan.

Yuxin mach chexoc heyala' tinan̈ yin̈ tzet heye hununex. Wal xin echmawe yul Comam Dios Jahawil, cat isyenilo Comam yin̈ caw haban tzet ewan yehi, cat yak'ni Comam ohtan̈elaxolo tzet ayayto yul yanma hunun anma. Chak'ni Comam istzalabal coc'ul hatatic'a hanta tzet chicowatx'e.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, chiwalan huntek'an ti' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈. Ilweto inbeybalan, yeb isbeybal juẍta Apolos, yuto chijaco cobahan̈ yecheloj yun̈e hebeybaln̈en cobeybalan̈. Ha' huntek'an tzet chicowatx'eti'an̈, ha' chioc yecheloj yun̈e mach chexpalc'on yiban̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj. Yebpaxo yun̈e mach chelolo'n̈e heba heyanico iswinajil hunuxa maca, cat heyintan̈encanilto hunuxa maca.
Mach chu cololo'n̈en coba walca c'ulon̈ sata hunuxa maca, yuto sunil tzet chisje cowatx'eni ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni jet. Yuxin mach chu jinican̈ coba yu huntek'an tu', to ha' Comam chiak'ni jet.

Walex hex ti', cochn̈e caw k'alomexxa, yuto sunil tzet cheyoche ay teyet. Caw xin haca'xapaxo rey heye heyalni, matxa tzet chon̈ocan̈ heyu. Yaja' tzettam sak'al ta reyex, wal tu' ayon̈micojan̈ teyintaj.

Chintxuman haninti'an tato han̈on̈ ischejabon̈ Comam Dios ti'an̈, con̈yacojan̈ Comam yin̈ sat anma haca' hunu mac caw islahobalxa yehi, haca' hunu mac chipotx'lax yila' anma. Haca' hunu tzet ye tu' ton̈e chimatz'elaxi, hac tu' jehan̈ yul sat anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb yul sat ebnaj 'angel.

Hanon̈ti'an̈ chon̈hallaxan̈ sucal yu chijalic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo. Walex hex ti' xin caw helanex yin̈ Comam Jesucristo heyalni. Han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw machi jipan̈, walex xin caw aycano heyip. Caw matzet jelapnojan̈ yul hesat, walex xin caw aycano heyelapnoj.
Tinan̈ xin yexn̈e jijlenan̈ wahil yeb tajinti'al, yeb man̈xilk'apehal. Chon̈mak'laxpaxojan̈ yu anma, yeb machi jatutan̈.
Caw xin chon̈siquihan̈ comunlahan̈, yuto yin̈ cok'aban̈ caw coc'ulan̈. Hayet chon̈bahlaxan̈ yu anma ha' isc'ulal Comam chijalan̈ tet. Ay bay chiec'ya' janmahan̈ yu anma, yaja' chijak' techahojan̈.

Caw tx'oj istzotel anma jetan̈, wal han̈on̈an̈ xin caw ak'anc'ulal chu cotzotelan̈ tet. Hactic'apax tu' tinan̈, haca' isk'alemal yeb isyahbenal tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal, hac tu' jehan̈ yul sat anma.
Maẍtaj yu quexwak'ni tx'ixwojan yuxin chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet. Walxinto yu wak'nihan hecuybanil, haca'ojtam caw wuninalan heyehi yuto caw xahan ayex wuhan.

Waxan̈ca ay lahon̈ebo mil mac chexcuyni yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo, yaja' haca'tan̈e hune'n̈e hemam. Haninti'an haca' hemam wehan, yuto haninan babel walan Tzoti' yet colbanile teyet, hac tu' xin yu hechahni Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma.
Yuxin caw chiwalan teyet beybaln̈ewe haca' inbeybalan.

Tinan̈ xin chinchejtojan juẍta Timoteo texol. Ha' naj ti', haca' inc'aholan ye naj, caw xahan ay naj wuhan yeb caw yijem naj tet Comam Dios Jahawil. Ha' naj chinaniti inbeybalan teyet yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, haca'tic'a chu incuywahan xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob bay chinec'an.
Ay mac texol tu' caw chican̈ isba, ham yalni tato matxa chinapnihan quexwila'an.
Wal xin ta ẍi Comam ayxatic'aco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan quexwilnojan yin̈ an̈e. Hato tu' chiwilan tato caw yeli helan huntek'an ebnaj lolo' tu', maca ton̈e chitzotel ebnaj xin.
Yuto maẍtaj yu tzet chijala chiixtan̈wiloj tato ayon̈xa yul isk'ab Comam Dios, walxinto yu chisyelo yip Comam jin̈.
Wal tinan̈ xin, ¿tzet cheyoche chinto wuban texol? ¿Tom cheyoche chintohan quexinhate'an yu hetx'ojal? mato ¿cheyoche ta c'ulch'an chiwute inc'ulan teyin̈?
Xahul isk'umal wetan tato ay hune' naj texol tu' yik'can̈ iscab mi', hune' mule tu' caw nanxa islowi. Xol anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios, machi bay chijabe yuni haca' tu'.
Yaja' wal hex ti' xin, caw can̈heye cheyabe, estam chioc nino bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yu hune' tu'. Naj uten hune' istx'ojal tu' caw yilal heyinilo naj texol.
Wal haninti'an waxan̈ca machijinan texol, yaj haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol. Yuxin yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwalan yin̈ tzet chielico naj.
Yet checutxban heba hewatx'en hune' tu', haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol yu yip Comam Jesucristo.
Wal hune' naj yaco ismul tu' awecanto naj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil yun̈e isc'aytzelaxilo isnimanil naj, cat iscolchacano yanma naj yet chihul Comam Jesucristo.
Hex ti' mach c'uloj ta cheyican̈ heba yu hune' istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tu' texol. ¿Tom mach cheyohtajo xin tato hanic'n̈e yan̈al ixim pan chioc xol ixim harina, caw xin sunil ixim chisipc'a yu?

Wal xin bejwecano sunil istx'ojal chexetantoj. Hac tu' xin lahanxa chexelico haca' ixim pan lan̈anto iswatx'i, machi yan̈al aycoj, chiwahlax yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua. Haquexojab tu' yul sat Comam Dios, yuto ha' Comam yaco isba xahanbalil iscam yu comul, haca' chu ispotx'ni ebnaj Israel no' me' isxahanbalo yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua.
Yuxin conabaweti iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ istoholal yeb isyelal; wal xin sunil istx'ojal yeb mule lahan haca' yan̈al pan.
Yin̈ hune' incartahan watojan teyet waltojan tato mach chu hehunban heba yeb mac chito ixli maca chito winajli.

Yaja' machi waltojan tato matxa chehunba heba yeb anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios, machoj, yuto ha' anma tu' chito ixli maca chiwinajli, maca chito yocheco tzet ay yet anmahil, chielk'awi, chito ay jahno sata tioẍ. K'inalo tato ha' anma tu' chiwalan, caw yilalmi chexel yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', chal tu'.

Wal xin ha' huntek'an anma chiwaltojan teyet ti' ha' ton mac chihalni ta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam, yaja' xin chito ixli maca chito winajli yeb chito yocheco tzet ay yul isk'ab hunu yet anmahil, yeb chito ay jahno sata tioẍ, yeb chito bahwahi yeb chito uq'ui, yeb chito elk'awi. Huntek'an mac haca' tu' mach chu hehunban heba yebi, nitam heyay tz'on̈no wa'o yebi.

Haninti'an mach chu walnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, wal xin cachann̈e Comam chu yalni tzet chielicoj. Yaja' walex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam, chu heyilni yin̈ tzet chielico hunu mac texol. Yuxin hune' naj issay ismul tu' iwelo naj texol.
Hayet ay howal texol, ¿tzet yin̈ yuxin ha' tet ebnaj alcal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chextohi yu iswatx'enayo ebnaj hune' howal tu'? ¿Tzet yin̈ xin maẍtaj tet yuninal Comam Dios chextohi?

¿Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam ti', han̈on̈ chon̈oc jila' yin̈ tzet chielico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'? Yuxin tato chon̈oc jila' yin̈ tzet chielico anma yet bak'in, ¿ha' tom xin niẍte howal ch'ah texol, mach chu hewatx'enayoj?
¿Tom xin maẍto heyohtajopaxoj tato han̈on̈ ti' chon̈oc jila'paxo yin̈ tzet chielico ebnaj 'angel yet bak'in? Hajxam tzet ye tu' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ¿tom mach chu cowatx'enayo heyalni?
Yuxin yet ay howal ch'ah texol, ¿tzet yin̈ xin sata ebnaj machi yoc yin̈ yuninal Comam Dios chexto hewatx'eyoj?
Chiwaltojan hune' ti' teyet yun̈e hetx'ixwican̈. ¿Tom machi hunu mac texol chu iswatx'enayo howal ch'ah xol ebnaj juẍtaj tu'?
Wal xin mach ton̈e cheyak'le howal, to chek'anlepaxo teyin̈ sata ebnaj alcal, ebnaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Hayet cheyak'ni howal teyin̈ hununex caw tx'oj hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios. ¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyak' techahoj tato ay hunu mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈? ¿Tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal tato ay hunu mac chielk'anilo hunu tzet ye tu' teyet?
Walxinto hextic'a chewatx'e tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj, cat heyelk'awipaxo yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj.

¿Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios? Wal xin mach cheyak' subchaho heba, yuto mac chiixli yeb mac chiwinajli, yeb mac chisjahba isba sata tioẍ, yeb mac ay yixal cat issayni hunuxa ix, yeb mac ay yichamil cat issayni hunuxa winaj, yeb ebnaj winaj chi-la-uten mule yeb yet winajil, yeb xin mac elk'om, yeb mac pek' melyu, yeb mac uc'um te', yeb mac hobomcan̈ tzoti' yin̈ yet anmahil, yeb mac chiik'ni ismelyu yin̈ lek'ti'al, mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Ayex ti' hac tu' heyeco yet yalan̈tocanoj, yaja' wal tinan̈ sajxa ye heyanma yeb yetxa Comam Dios heyehi. Xaquexoc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo, yeb yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios.

Ay mac chihalni, tato chisje cowatx'en sunil tzet chal coc'ul, caw yeli yaja' matxa jeto ye cowatx'en sunil tzet ye tu'. Haninti'an chisje inwatx'enan sunil tzet chal inc'ulal, yaja' mach chiwak'an hamanil tet huntek'an tu' yun̈e mach chioc quinyijba'an yin̈ tzet chala.

Aypaxo mac chalni haca' ti': "Ha' tzet chicolo yet coc'ul yehi, ha' coc'ul tu' xin yet tzet chicolo yehi," ẍi. Yeli hac ton tu' yehi, yaja' tzet chicolo tu' yeb coc'ul tu' chiapni istz'ayical bay chitan̈ilo yu Comam Dios. Wal conimanil xin mach yeto ixloj maca winajlo yehi. Walxinto yetxa Comam Jesucristo Jahawil ye conimanil ti', yetxapaxo conimanil ye Comam.
Haca' yu yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo Jahawil xol camom, hac tu' chu con̈yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam yu yip.
¿Tom mach heyohtajoj tato hune' conimanil ti' caw yetbixa isba yeb isnimanil Comam Jesucristo? ¿Tom xin chu jinito isnimanil Comam tu' cat cohunban yeb isnimanil hunu ix ix tx'oj ye iswi'? ¡Machoj!

¿Tom mach heyohtajo xin, tato yet chishunban isnimanil hunu naj yeb hunu ix ix tx'oj ye iswi', hunxan̈e anmahil chucano naj yeb ix? Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Hunxan̈e anmahil chucano iscawan̈il," ẍiayoj.
Hayet chijanico coba yul isk'ab Comam Dios hunxan̈e chijucano yeb Comam.

Wal xin nann̈e heyu, machojab cheyak' hamanil tet ixloj maca winajloj. Tzijxan̈e istx'ojal chaco hunu mac maẍtaj isnimanil chetatoj, yaja' wal mac chiixli maca chiwinajli, caw ha' yin̈ isnimanil chaco ismul.
¿Tom mach heyohtajo xin, tato yatutxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo ye henimanil, Comam ak'bil teyet yu Comam Dios yun̈e yeh yul heyanma? Yuxin matxa heyeto heba hechuquil.
Wal xin lok'bilexxa yu Comam Dios, yuxin watx'ewe isc'ulal yin̈ henimanil, haxinwal chioc ismay Comam Dios heyu.
Tinan̈ xin chiwatojan ispaj huntek'an hek'ambebal heyati yul hecarta wetan. C'ul tato mach chik' ebnaj winaj yixal.
Yaja' yun̈e mach chiayc'ay ebnaj maca ebix ix yin̈ mule, yuxin yilal yik'ni ebnaj yixal, yeb yik'nipaxo ebix ix yichamil.
Naj ichamile yilal yochen naj yixal, hacpax tu' ix ixale yilal yochen ix yichamil.
Yuto ix ixale matxa yeto isba ix ischuquil, walxinto yetxa yichamil ix yehi. Hacpax tu' naj ichamile, matxa yeto isba naj ischuquil, to yetxa yixal naj yehi.

Yuxin mach chu heman̈c'on heyochelen heba hununex, cachan tato lahti'xa ye heyu heman̈c'on heba teyet hununex yin̈ hayebo tz'ayic yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil heyanma. Yaja' xin yilal hehunbanpaxo heba hunelxa, yuto c'uxantaxca mach chitecha heyu yin̈ tzet choche henimanil, cat yoc naj matzwalil quexyilwenoj cat heyayc'ayi cat heyanico hemul.
Huntek'an chiwaltoti'an mach caw chejbanile chucanicoj, wal xin ton̈e chiwaltojan teyet yu heyilni tato chu heyijeni.
Wal inti'an, ay wala'an sunil mac chican haca' weti'an, yaja' nananta conabal hununon̈ yu Comam Dios. Yuto ay mac mach choche chik' yixal, aypaxo mac mach ch'ec' yu tato mach chik' yixal.
Chiwalan tet mac maẍto chimohyi, yeb tet ebix camnaxa yichamil, c'ul tato mach chik' yetbi haca' weti'an.
Yaja' ta ay mac mach chitecha yu ye ischuquil chabe, yilal ismohyi sata ton̈e choche chiec' ixloj maca winajloj.
Yaja' wal tet mac mohyinaxa xin, chiwak'an huntek'an chejbanile tet, huntek'an chejbanile ti' mach wetojan, to yet Comam Dios yehi. Hex ixale mach chepohle heba yeb heyichamil.

Yaja' tato ay hunu ix ix chispohle isba yeb yichamil, matxa chu yik'ni ix hunuxa winaj, cachann̈e yeb yichamil ix tu' chisje ishunban isba hunelxa. Hacpax tu' naj ichamile, mach chu ispohni isba naj yeb yixal.

Wal tet hunmajanxa xin chiwaltojan huntek'an ti', yaja' mach ischejbanilo Comam Dios, to haninan chiwaltojan: Tato ay hunu naj juẍtaj maẍto chaco isba yixal yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yaja' tato chitzala isc'ul ix isc'atan̈ naj, hune' naj juẍta tu', mach chu ispohni isba naj yeb ix.
Yeb xin tato ay hunu ix janab, maẍto chaco isba yichamil yul isk'ab Comam yaja' chitzala isc'ul naj yeb ix, mach chu ispohni isba ix yeb naj.

Yuto waxan̈ca maẍto ayoco yichamil ix yul isk'ab Comam, yaja' hacojtam yetxa Comam Dios ye naj, yuto hun ye naj yeb hune' ix ix ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Hacpax tu' ix maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam, hacojtam yetxa Comam Dios ye ix, yuto hun ye ix yeb hune' naj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. K'inalo ta maẍto yeto Comam ye iscawan̈il lahanmi chielico yuninal haca' yuninal anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, walxinto haca'xa yuninal Comam Dios yehi.

Yaja' ta naj ichamile maca ix ixale maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam tu', choche ispohle isba yeb yetbi, ispohab isba. Yin̈ haca' tu' chicancano naj juẍtaj maca ix janab tu' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, yuto choche Comam Dios tato chexec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal.

Yuto hach ixale hach ti' maẍto hawohtajoj tato chicolcha hawichamil tu' yu isc'ulal chabeybaln̈e, maca hach ichamile hach ti' maẍto hawohtajoj tato chicolcha hawixal tu' yu isc'ulal chabeybaln̈e, wal xin c'ul ta mach chepohle heba.
Wal hununon̈ xin, haca'tic'a jehi yet con̈yawten Comam Dios, hac tu' chu coyijen yin̈ tzet xayak' Comam jet. Hac tu' chejbanil wak'an tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul hunun con̈ob.

Tato ay hunujex ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ henimanil yet quexyawten Comam, machojab cheyeba hune' circuncisi'on tu'. Maca tato maẍto circuncisi'on teyin̈ yet quexyawten Comam, matxa yilalo cheyak' circuncidar heba.
Yuto ha' hune' caw yilal yehi ha' heyijen ischejbanil Comam Dios, machi yoc yin̈ ta ayxaco circuncisi'on teyin̈ maca machoj.
Haca'ojab heye yet quexyawten Comam Dios yuninaloj, hacojab tu' cheyucanoj.
Tato ay hunu mac ayicto yalan̈ yip hunu maca yet yawtelax yu Comam, machojab chitac isc'ul yin̈ hune' tu', yaja' tato ay tzet chu yelti yalan̈ yip hune' mac tu' caw c'ultopaxoj.

Ha' mac ayicto yalan̈ yip hunu maca yet yawtelax yu Comam, tinan̈ xin yetxa isba ischuquil yin̈ isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios. Hacpax tu' xin mac mach chejabo yehi yet yawtelax yu Comam, tinan̈ xin ischejabxa Comam yehi.
Wal xin caw ay istohol ak'bilex yu Comam, yuxin mach cheyacto heba yalan̈ yip hunuxa maca.
Tinan̈ xin, hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, ha' yul sat Comam Dios c'ul cocancano haca'tic'a jehi yet con̈yawten Comam Dios yuninaloj.

Wal mac maẍto mohyinajoj machi chejbanile yak'cano Comam wetan yin̈, wal huntek'an chiwaltoti'an xin yul wetan chiwitijan, yaja' yilal caw ay yelapno yul hesat, yuto yu isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an yuxin yak' hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ incuywahan.
Yul wetan, tato ay hunu naj maẍto yixal, c'ul ta mach chik' naj yixal, yuto huntek'an tiempo bay ayon̈ tinan̈ caw ya'taxa.
Ha' mac ayxa yixal, machojab chispoh isba yeb yixal. Ha' mac maẍto yixal, c'ul ta mach chisay yixal.

Tato ayex chexmohyi, mach muleho hune' tu'; taca hunu ix k'opo chimohyi xin, mach tx'ojopaxo hune' tu'. Yaja' wal mac chimohyi caw ay isya'tajil chila. Ay wala'an mach chak'le huntek'an isya'tajil tu'.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, ha' chalilo huntek'an chiwaltoti'an to hanic'xan̈e tiempo ayon̈ic'oj, yuxin hex ay heyixal, machojabn̈etaj yin̈ heyixal cheyaco henabal, wal xin yilal heyak'ni hamanil yin̈ yet Comam.

Haxa mac bisc'ulal ye xin, haca'ojtam ayco yin̈ tzalahilal, haxa mac ayco yin̈ tzalahilal xin, haca'ojtam ayco yin̈ bisc'ulal. Ha' mac chilok'ni hunu tzet ye tu' haca'ojtam mach yeto tzet chislok' tu'.
Haxa mac chiocnico tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu, haca'ojtam mach lan̈an yocheni yuto hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chitan̈iloj.
Ay wala'an matzet cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul. Yet maẍto chik' yixal hunu naj tzeh, yin̈n̈e yet Comam ayco yanma naj, han̈e tzet chal Comam ha' chisyije naj.
Wal hunu naj ayxa yixal xin, haxa yin̈ tzet ye tu' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ha' chaco yin̈ isc'ul, yeb yu iswatx'en naj yin̈ tzet choche isc'ul yixal, hac tu' xin cabxa chielico isnabal naj.

Hacpax tu' ebix k'opo maẍto chimohyi yeb ebix maẍtic'a yichamil, ha' yin̈ yet Comam bay ayco yanma ebix yeb sunil isnabal. Wal ebix ay yichamil xin, ha' tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb tzet choche yichamil, ha' ayco yin̈ isc'ul ebix iswatx'eni.
Chiwalan huntek'an ti', yaja' maẍtaj yu quexincachnihan, to yu isc'ulalo teyin̈, yeb yu hebeybaln̈en haca' choche Comam Dios, cat hemunla yin̈ ismunil Comam yin̈ sunil heyanma.
Ta ay hunu naj juẍta choche chimohyi yeb hunu ix janab yuto istiempohalxa yik'ni yixal, chisje ismohyi, mach tx'ojo hune' tu'.
Yaja' xin ta ay hunu mac mach chisje isc'ul chik' yixal, chi-xin-ist'in̈baco yin̈ yanma yec' yu ischuquil, k'ac'ul ta mach chimohyi.
Yuxin ta chimohyi hune' mac tu', c'ul, yaja' ta mach chimohyi xin, ec'bal c'ultopaxoj.

Yet itzitzto yichamil hunu ix ix, aytocto ix yalan̈ ischejbanil yichamil. Yaja' ta chicam naj xin caw yetxa isba ix ischuquil, xaisje ismohyi ix yeb mac bay chal isc'ul, yaja' tan̈e yeb hunu mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.
Yaja' wal intxumnihan, ec'balto sak'al yet ix ta mach chik' yichamil ix. Hac tu' chiwute walnihan yuto ha' hun Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco wetbiojan, ha' chak'ni wala'an.

Wal tinan̈ xin, chiwaltojan teyet yin̈ huntek'an itah chihaltelax tet ej tioẍ. Caw yel haca' yallaxi. "Caw ay cohelanil cosunil," ẍi. Yaja' cohelanil tu' ay ismay jinican̈ coba yu. Wal ta xahan chijil coba hununon̈, chon̈ch'ib yin̈ yet Comam haca' tu'.
Tato ay hunu mac caw ay isnabal chute istxumni, maẍto isnabal hune' mac tu' yin̈ haca' caw yelapno yehi.
Wal mac ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, caw ohtabil yu Comam.

Wal yin̈ islolax huntek'an itah chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tet ej tioẍ, caw matzet chaliloj yuto huntek'an tioẍ tu' caw johtaj tato caw matzet chal yelapno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuto hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios.
Yaja' waxan̈ca xin ay mac chihalni ta ay tx'i'al dios satcan̈, yeb yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ta hac tu' tx'i'al dios, yeb tx'i'al yahaw yul sat ebnaj.

Yaja' wal han̈on̈ ti', hune'n̈ech'an coDiosal, ha' ton Comam Dios mame. Ha' Comam tu' yichebanil sunil tzet ye tu', yetpaxo Comam je han̈on̈ ti'. Hune'n̈ech'anpaxo Jahawil, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo. Yu Comam tu', yuxin ay sunil tzet ye tu', yeb yu Comam yuxin ayon̈.

Yaja' mach sunilo ebnaj juẍta chinachalo hune' ti' yu. Yuto ay ebnaj chi-tic'a-yiyo isba tet tioẍ yet yalan̈tocanoj, yuxin yet chisc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe haltebilxa yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ tu', chito cabcon isc'ul, chistxumni ebnaj ta ch'etaxto ebnaj yu.
Yaja' maẍtaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, maẍtaj yu chicolo huntek'an itah tu' yuxin chon̈c'ulbiloj, maca yu mach chicolo yuxin chon̈can tx'ojal.
Caw cheyil heba, tajca yu chisje heloni yuxin cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin̈ yet Comam.

Tajca yu heyohtaxa ta mach txahulo heloni huntek'an itah tu', yuxin chexay tz'on̈no wa'o yul yatut tioẍ, yaja' ta ay ebnaj juẍta chexilni yin̈ haca' tu', mach ismunil hex cawex cheyijba ebnaj isloni huntek'an itah haltebil tet tioẍ tu'.
Ta hac tu' cheyute, cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin̈ yet Comam, wal xin ha' yin̈ hune' mac tu' campaxo Comam Jes'us.
Yuxin tato heyu yuxin chietaxto isnabal hunu heyuẍta maẍto yip yin̈ Comam, cheyaco hemul yin̈ haca' tu' yul sat Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin ta yun̈e inc'uxnihan no' chibe yuxin chiwak' ayc'ayojan hunu wuẍtajan, k'ac'ul tom mach chinc'uxan no' chibe tu', haxinwal machi hunu mac chaco ismul wuhan.

Yin̈ caw yeli haninti'an ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan yuto wilpaxojan Comam, yuxin lahan welapnojan haca' ebnaj ischejab Comam. Hex ti' xin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, yaja' yu inmunilan texol.

Waxan̈ca ay mac chalni tato mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan, yaja' wal hex ti' xin caw heyohtaj tato ischejab Comam wehan, yuto yu inmunilan texol yuxin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Ha' chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam wehan.
Hac ti' chu inpajtzenan tet ebnaj chitzotel win̈an.
Haninti'an ay wocan yin̈ inchahnihan tzet chinlohan yin̈ inmunilan texol.
K'inalo ta ay hunu ix janab chioc wixalojan tinan̈, ¿tom mach chu winic'ojan ix wintajan haca' chu naj Pedro yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesucristo, yeb ebnaj yuẍta Comam?
¿Tom haninxan̈ehan yeb naj Bernab'e mach chiak'lax tzet chiocnico juhan̈ yet chon̈munlahan̈ yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios?

Haca' ebnaj soldado tinan̈, ¿tom yin̈ ebnaj ayco tzet chiocnico yu? Haca'paxo hunu naj chitz'unni te' uva, ¿tom mach chislo naj hunu sat te' xin? Haca'paxo hunu naj tan̈em wacax, ¿tom mach chuc' naj yal yim no'?
Tajca chetxumu tato haninn̈ehan chiwalan hune' ti', wal xin hac tu' yalnipaxo yin̈ isley naj Mois'es.
Yin̈ ley tu' tz'ibn̈ebilcano haca' ti': "Mach cheyaco tz'ispa yin̈ isti' no' wacax yet chixan̈wi trigo no'," ẍiayoj. Yaja' maẍtaj no' wacax ayco yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yalni hune' tu'.

Wal xin han̈on̈ ayon̈ico yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yalni hune' tu'. Yuxin haca' naj t'ocom tx'otx' yeb naj chixan̈nilti ixim trigo, ha' ismunil ebnaj tu' ayco yipo yanma, yuto yin̈ ismunil ebnaj tu' chiel tzet chislo.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ cotz'unan̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios texol, yuxin mach tx'ojoj ta cheyak' hanic' tzet chiocnico juhan̈.

Ta ha' hunmajanxa ebnaj chiec' texol cheyak' tzet chiocnico yu, hajon̈xaman̈ ay yilal cochahni jetan̈. Yaja' xin machi hunelo cok'anan̈ teyet, caw ton̈e jijlenan̈ yun̈e mach chioc lin̈no jalnic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo.

Hex ti' heyohtaj tato ebnaj chimunla yul yatut Comam Dios, ha' tzet chihaltelax tet Comam yul yatut tu', ha' chiak'ni ec'o yu ebnaj. Ha' chal yelapno tu', to naj sacerdote chianico xahanbal tet Comam Dios, ay yoc naj yin̈ tzet lan̈an yalten tu'.
Hac ton tu' ye ebnaj chimunla yin̈ yalnic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile, halbilcano yu Comam Dios tato yilal yak'lax tzet chiocnico yu ebnaj yin̈ hune' munil bay chimunlaco tu'.

Wal haninti'an xin, machi hunelo ink'anan teyet yin̈ tzet ocnico wuhan waxan̈ca xin caw yilal inchahnihan. Yaja' maẍtaj yu heyak'ni yuxin chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet, wal xin ay hune' intzalahilalan yuto machi hunu tzet ye tu' ink'anan teyet. K'ac'ulmi chincaman satapax ink'annihan hunu tzet ye tu' teyet.
Haninti'an mach chinlolo'n̈e inbahan yu chiwalic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma, yuto chejbilinan walnic'ojan. Caw c'anch'aninan ta mach chiwalan Tzoti' yet colbanile.
K'inalo ta yul wetan chiwitijan wec'an walnoc'ojan, caw yilalmi inchahnipaxojan intoholan. Wal xin chiwalic'ojan yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an.
Wal xin, ha' hune' ispaj yet chinec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile ha' ton tzalahilal. Machi intoholan chink'anan, waxan̈ca yet ay ink'annihan intoholan yin̈ inmuniltu'an yu yec' wuhan.
Mach ayinicojan yalan̈ yip hunu maca, yaja' xawaco inbahan haca' chejab tet sunil anma, yun̈e caw tx'i'al anma chioccano yul isk'ab Comam wuhan.

Yet chinec'an xol ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan, haca' isbeybal ebnaj tu' hac tu' chiwute inbeybalan, yun̈e yoc haywan̈o ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam, cat yelcanti ebnaj yalan̈ ley, yuxin haca'tan̈e chiwacto inbahan yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es. Yaja' yin̈ caw isyelal mach ayinoctojan yalan̈ ley tu'.

Hacpax tu' yet chinec'an xol anma mach Israeloj, anma mach ayocto yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es, haca' isbeybal ebnaj tu' hac tu' chiwutepaxo inbahan, yun̈e yoc haywan̈o ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam. Yaja' yin̈ caw isyelal yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam Dios ayinictojan, yuto yijeminan yin̈ ischejbanil Comam Jesucristo.

Haxa yet ayinicojan xol ebnaj maẍto bin yip yin̈ yet Comam xin, haca'tan̈e hunu mac machi yip, hac tu' chiwute inbahan, yun̈e caw yik'ni yip yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam. Wal xin wute inbahan haca' anma tu', yun̈e ischahnicano iscolbanil haywan̈o anma tu'.
Yu cuybanile yet colbanile, yuxin hac tu' wute inbahan, yun̈e ha' huninan chinchahan isc'ulal yu.

Haca' yin̈ hunu an̈e tinan̈, tx'i'al mac chak' an̈e, yaja' hune'n̈e mac chiik'wahi. Tinan̈ xin, haca' chu ebnaj ch'ak'ni an̈e tu', hacojab tu' cheyute heba yin̈ yet Comam, haxinwal chechah ispaj selel.

Sunil ebnaj chak' an̈e, yet chiscuyni isba ebnaj caw cam chil ebnaj ta machi hunu tzet ye tu' chietanto isnimanil ebnaj yun̈e yik'ni ebnaj ismatan yet chiyak'ni ebnaj an̈e. Yaja' hune' matan chik' ebnaj tu' pet chietaxtoj, wal hune' matan chijik' han̈on̈ ti' yin̈ ismunil Comam, machi bak'in chietaxtoj.

Haca' naj chak' an̈e tu' chak' yanma naj yapni bay chiak'lax ismatan, hac tu' wehan haninti'an. Haca'paxo ebnaj chialaxico yak'leno howal haquintu'an, mach nabn̈eho chielto ink'aban. Wal xin yin̈ caw sunil wanmahan chinmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios.

Caw chincachan innimanilan, chiwanicojan isyijeno yin̈ tzet chiwochehan, yuto c'uxantaxca lahwi wawtenan anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios, haxa taxca chielicoj matxa chinchahan ispaj selel tzet tzumbebil wuti'an.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chiwochehan mach chenahuln̈eto yin̈ tzet yak'le ebnaj jichmam yet yijbalaxic'o ebnaj yu naj Mois'es yet payat. Sunil ebnaj belwi yalan̈ hune' moyan, yeb xin sunil ebnaj ec'paxto yictabal ha' Mar Rojo.
Haca'tan̈e ahcano ha' iswi' anma ishunicanico ebnaj yinta naj Mois'es yu hune' moyan tu', yeb yet yec'to ebnaj yictabal ha' mar tu', haca'tan̈e ahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj.
Islonipaxo ebnaj huntek'an tzet chilolax yati Comam Dios yul satcan̈.

Yebpaxo xin sunil ebnaj uc'ni ha ha' yak' Comam Dios elti yin̈ isc'ul hune' ch'en ch'en. Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en tu' yechel Comam Jesucristo ye ch'en, ha' hun Comam tzujan yinta ebnaj jichmam yin̈ isbel.

Waxan̈ca yak' Comam Dios huntek'an tu' tet ebnaj, yaja' ay ebnaj mach isyije yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios, yuxin caw tx'i'al ebnaj cami, iscancano pac'no isnimanil ebnaj sat tx'otx' desierto yin̈ isbel tu'.
Sunil huntek'an yu ebnaj tu' cocuybanil yucanoj yun̈e matxa chijocheco istx'ojal haca' yu ebnaj.

Mach cheyiyo heba tetej tioẍ haca' yu tx'i'al ebnaj tu', haca' yecano istzoti'al ebnaj yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ay tz'on̈no ebnaj, yoc ebnaj wa'oj yeb uc'uj. Lahwi tu' xin yah bulna ebnaj, yoc ebnaj can̈alwoj, yak'ni ebnaj tzet chal isc'ul," ẍiayoj.
Machojab chexixli haca' yu tx'i'al ebnaj tu'. Yu hune' tu' yuxin tan̈ilo veintitr'es mil ebnaj yin̈ hune' tz'ayic.
Machojabpaxo xin cheyaco Comam Jesucristo yin̈ ilwebal, haca' yu anma tu'. Yu hune' tu' yuxin caw tx'i'al mac chilax yu no' laba, iscamiloj.
Machojab chexbuchwa yin̈ Comam Dios haca' yu anma tu'. Yu hune' tu' yuxin tx'i'al mac cam yu naj 'angel ak'om camo anma.
Sunil huntek'an tzet yu ebnaj jichmam tu', cuybanile yecano jin̈ tinan̈, tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayoj yun̈e johtan̈eni ta mach chu cowatx'en istx'ojal, han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic ti'.
Yuxin ha' mac caw c'ul yeco chabe, yilal caw cam chil isba haxinwal mach chiayc'ayi.

Tzijxan̈e ilwebal chi-la-ay jiban̈, lahan haca' ilwebal chiay yiban̈ sunil anma. Yaja' chicawxi coc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios tato mach chischayo Comam hunu ilwebal jiban̈ mach chitecha ju. Wal xin, hayet chiapni ilwebal jin̈, ha' Comam chiyeni jet tzet chu cocolcha tet ilwebal tu', hac tu' xin chu istecha ju.
Tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, mach cheyiyo heba tet ej tioẍ.
Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto caw helanexxa, chisje heyoc heyilnoj ta c'ul huntek'an chiwaltoti'an.

Yet chijec'tzen santa cena chijak'ni yuch'andiosal yin̈ tzet ayayto yul ch'en vaso cat juc'ni, ha' chiyeniloj tato hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo yu ischiq'uil. Haxa yet chicok'axponayo ixim pan cat cowahni ixim, ha' ch'ak'ni conaba' tato hunxan̈e chon̈elcanico yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Waxan̈ca caw tx'i'alon̈, yaja' hune'n̈e ha' ixim pan chicowah cosunil, ha' chiyeniloj tato hunxan̈e nimanile je cosunil.
Naweti yin̈ con̈ob Israel, hayet chisc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tet Comam Dios, hunxan̈e chucano ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Yaj mach lan̈ano walnihan tato ay yip tioẍ, yeb ta ay tzet chal yelapno no' chibe chihaltelax tet.

Ha' chalilo hune' chiwalti'an, to hayet chak'ni ebnaj mach Israelo isxahanbal, maẍtaj tet Comam Dios chalte ebnaj isxahanbal tu', walxinto ha' tet ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil chalte ebnaj isxahanbal. Ha' hune' ti' machojab cheyaco heba yetbiho ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil.

Mach chu juc'ni tzet ay yul isvaso Comam Dios cat juc'nipaxo tzet ay yul isvaso ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil. Mach chu jocpaxo tz'on̈no wa'o sat ismeẍa Comam Dios, chilahwi tu' cat jocpaxo tz'on̈no wa'o sat ismeẍa ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil.
Wal xin machojab chicowatx'e huntek'an tu', haxinwal mach chijak'tij ishowal Comam jin̈ yuto mach ec'balo jip yiban̈ Comam.

Ay mac chihalni: "Chisje cowatx'en sunil tzet chal janma," ẍi. Caw yeli, yaja' han̈on̈ ti' matxa jeto ay cowatx'en huntek'an tu'. Chu cowatx'en sunil tzet chal coc'ul, yaja' mach sunilo chicolwa jin̈ con̈yak'ni ch'ibo yin̈ yet Comam Dios.
Machojabn̈etaj isc'ulal jet chicosayic'oj, wal xin caw yilal janico conabal yin̈ isc'ulalo yin̈ jet anmahil.
Sunil no' chibe chitxon̈lax yul txon̈bal chibe chu hec'uxni no', mach yilalo chek'ambe tzet ye no' haxinwal mach chicabcon heyanma hec'uxni no'.
Yuto hune' yul yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb sunil tzet ayayo sat, yet Comam Dios yehi.

Tato chexawtelax wa'o yu hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam, chu hetohi. Ta chisje hec'ul, chu hec'uxni no' chibe chialaxayo yin̈ hesat. Mach chek'ambe tzet ye no' haxinwal mach chicabconcan̈ heyanma yet chec'uxni no'.
Yaja' ta ay mac chalni haca' ti': "No' chibe ti' xaak'lax no' yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ," ta ẍi, mach chec'ux no', yu isc'ulalo yin̈ hune' mac chalni tu'.

Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' yun̈e mach chietaxto isnabal hune' mac maẍto yip isnabal tu', maẍtaj yu henabal hex ti'. Yaja' ayexmi chetxum haca' ti': "¿Tzet yin̈ yuxin chincach inbahan inc'uxnihan no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tu' yu anma chinanon isc'ul isc'uxni no'?
Ta chiwak'an yuch'andiosal yin̈ no' chibe chinc'uxtu'an, matxa mac chu yoc buchwal yin̈ hune' tu'," quexchimi.
Wal xin chiwalan teyet, ta ay hunu tzet ye tu' chelo yeb cheyuc'u, maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' cheyu, ha'ojab ismay Comam Dios cheyaco yin̈ tzet chewatx'e tu'.
Wal xin machojab cheyetato isnabal ebnaj Israel maca ebnaj mach Israeloj, maca macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yu tzet chewatx'e.
Haca' haninti'an, caw chiwak' wanmahan inwatx'enan isc'ulal sata anma, maẍtaj isc'ulal wetan chinsayic'ojan, to isc'ulal yet anma, yun̈e istzujcha apno iscolbanil anma yu.
Ocan̈we tzujno yin̈ inbeybalti'an, haca' chiwute inbeybaln̈ehan isbeybal Comam Jesucristo.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw chintzalahan teyin̈, yuto yin̈ sunil tzet chewatx'e chinhenatijan, yebpaxo caw ayexico heyijen huntek'an cuybanile wak'an teyet.

Chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj ta Comam Jesucristo, ha' caw ayco iswi'ehalo ebnaj winaj. Haxa naj ichamile xin, iswi'ehal yeco naj yin̈ yixal, haca'paxo Comam Dios iswi'ehal yeco Comam yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Tato chaco ebnaj winaj yen̈el iswi' yet chitxahli ebnaj, maca yet chalni ebnaj tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, yin̈ haca' tu' chiyilo ebnaj ispixan Comam Jesucristo, Comam ayco iswi'ehalo yin̈ ebnaj.

Haca'paxo ebix ix, ta ay hunu ix mach chahto yen̈el iswi' yet chitxahli, maca yet chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, yin̈ haca' tu', ha'tic'a ix chiinilo ispixan yichamil, naj ayco iswi'ehalo yin̈ ix. Lahan chalilo haca'tan̈e xayak' elo ix xil iswi'.
Yuxin ta ay hunu ebix ix, mach chahto yen̈el iswi', c'ulmi yak'ni ebix elo xil iswi', yaja' ta tx'ixobal hune' tu' chabe ebix xin, yak'abahto ebix yen̈el iswi'.
Wal han̈on̈ winajon̈ ti' xin, mach c'uloj ta chijahto yen̈el cowi', yuto yechel Comam Dios jehi yeb han̈on̈ chicoyelo yip Comam Dios. Haxa ebix ix xin, ha' ebix chiyenilo yip ebnaj winaj.
Yuto yet iswatx'en Comam Dios naj winaj, mach yin̈o ix ix el naj yu Comam. Walxinto ha' ix ix tu' yin̈ naj winaj elna ix yu Comam.
Maẍtaj yu ix ix yuxin iswatx'e Comam Dios naj winaj, walxinto yu naj winaj yuxin iswatx'e Comam ix ix.
Yu hune' tu', yuxin yilal yanahto ebix ix yen̈el iswi' yu isyenilo ebix tato ayicto ebix yalan̈ ischejbanil yichamil, yuto t'an̈anico ebnaj 'angel jin̈.
Yaja' walxa yin̈ Comam Dios, machim naj winaj ta machi ix ix, machimpaxo ix ix ta machi naj winaj.
Caw yeli, yin̈ naj babel winaj elna ix babel ix. Walxa tinan̈ xin, yin̈xa ix ix chipitzc'a naj winaj. Yaja' sunil tu' yu Comam Dios yuxin hac tu' yehi.
Yuxin txumwej ta c'ul istxahli hunu ix ix yet machi yen̈el iswi' ix chahtoj.
Caw johtaj tato caw tx'ixobal yak'ni ch'ibo ebnaj winaj xil iswi'.
Yaja' wal ebix ix xin, caw istzan ebix yak'ni ch'ibo xil iswi', yuto xil iswi' ebix tu' haca' yen̈el iswi' ebix yecoj.

Tato ay mac chioc tzotelo yiban̈ilo hune' ti', yohtan̈eojabiloj tato han̈on̈ti'an̈ yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob, mach chichahlax txahlo hunu ix ix ta machi yen̈el iswi' ix chahtoj.
Yin̈ huntek'an chiwaltojan teyet ti', mach chintzalahan teyin̈, yuto hayet checutxbanico heba, caw machi nino isc'ulal chechah, wal xin caw ton̈e cheyetato heba.
Yin̈ babelal chiwaltojan teyet ta xawabehan ta hayet checutxban heba yin̈ culto tolab chepohle heba, yaja' yet chintxumnihan etzan̈em caw yel hune' tu'.
Yaja' etza caw yilal chepohle heba, yun̈e yixtan̈wiloj mac caw yel chala ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Wal xin yet checutxban heba, matxa taj santa cena cheyec'tze,
yuto yet chiapni yorahil hewa'i nanantaxan̈e hebabico heloni tzet chelo, yuxin ayex mach chinoh hec'ul, ayexpaxo xin chexuq'uicanocan̈.

¿Tom machi heyatut bay chexwa' xin? ¿Tzet yin̈ xin cheyilo ispixan mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, cat heyanicanico yin̈ tx'ixwilal mac matzet aya? ¿Chimquintzalahan yin̈ hune' hebeybal tu' heyalni? Wal xin caw mach chu intzalahan yin̈.
Hune' cuybanil chiwapaxtojan teyet ti', ha' tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chabilcano wuhan. Ha' yin̈ hune' ak'bal yet yalaxico Comam yul isk'ab camical, yican̈ Comam ixim pan,

lahwi yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal yin̈ ixim, isk'axponayo ixim, yalni Comam: "Chahwej cat hewahni, hune' ti' yechel innimanilan chiwak'an yin̈ camical yu hecolchahi. Hunta el yet cheyec'tzen hune' ti' chinhenanitijan," ẍicano Comam.

Lahwi tu' yinipaxocan̈ Comam ch'en vaso, yalni Comam: "Hune' ayayto yul vaso ti' yechel inchiq'uilan chimaltoj, ha' xin chit'in̈bancano hune' ac' trato chak' Comam Dios. Hunta el yet cheyuc'ni hune' ti' chinhenatijan," ẍi Comam.
Yuxin yet chicowahni ixim pan tu', yeb yet chijuc'ni tzet ayayto yul hune' vaso tu', ha' iscamical Comam Jesucristo chicoyeloj masanto yet chul Comam hunelxa.
Yuxin ta ay hunu mac matzet chal yelapno ixim pan tu' yul sat yet chiswahni, yeb yet chuc'ni tzet ayayto yul vaso tu', chaco ismul yin̈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo, yeb yin̈ ischiq'uil Comam.
Yuxin hayet yalan̈to maẍto chewah hune' pan tu' yeb heyuc'ni tzet ayayto yul hune' vaso tu', caw yilal hetxumni yin̈ tzet heyeco hununex.
Yuto ta chewah hune' pan tu' yeb ta cheyuc' hune' ayayto yul vaso tu', machi xin c'ulo heyecoj, yeb xin mach chena ta haca' isnimanil Comam yehi, yin̈ hac tu' chiay isya'tajil teyiban̈ yu Comam Dios.
Yu hune' tu', yuxin ay mac ya'ay texol, aypaxo mac tz'ontan̈e, yebpaxo xin ay mac xacami.
Wal xin ta chicotxum coba yin̈ tzet jeco hununon̈, machim chiay isya'tajil jiban̈ yu Comam Dios.
Yaja' ta mach chicotxum yin̈ tzet jeco yul sat Comam, chayo Comam isya'tajil jiban̈, yaja' yun̈e mach chon̈to yin̈ isya'tajil xol huntek'an anma c'aynatoj.
Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, yet checutxban heba hechahni santa cena tu', yilal cheyechmale heba hewahni.

Yaja' ta ay hunu mac caw xan̈ohchahi chisje iswa'cano bey yatut, haxinwal mach chayo Comam isya'tajil teyiban̈ yin̈ huntek'an tzet mach toholo chewatx'e tu'. Wal yin̈ huntek'anxa xin, yetto chinapnihan texol cat quexinwatx'enicojan yin̈.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chiwochehan cheyohtan̈elo yin̈ huntek'an comunil chiak'lax jet hununon̈ yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Caw heyohtaj ta yet maẍto chexoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, caw tzujanexto yinta huntek'an tioẍ mach chitzoteli.

Wal tinan̈ xin, chiwak'an heyohtan̈eloj tato ha' mac chalni haca' ti': "Yak'abti ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Jes'us," ta ẍi. Ha' mac chalni haca' tu', maẍtaj Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni yala'. Yaja' wal mac chalni haca' ti' xin: "Comam Jes'us ha' wahawilan," ta ẍi. Hune' mac tu' ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni yala'.
Han̈on̈ ti' nananta comunil hununon̈ yin̈ Comam, yaja' hune' mac chiak'ni jet, ha' ton Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Caw nananta comunil hununon̈, yaja' hune'n̈e mac bay chon̈munla cosunil, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo.
Nananta tzet chicowatx'e hununon̈, yaja' hune'n̈e Comam Dios chiak'ni huntek'an tu' jub.
Chisyelo Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato ayco yul janma hununon̈ chak'ni Comam isc'ulal jet, yu isc'ulalo yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab.
Yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yuxin ay ebnaj juẍta caw ay ishelanil istzoteli, aypaxo mac caw ay isnabal iscuywahi, yaja' yutic'apaxo Comam Esp'iritu.
Yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo tu', yuxinto ay ebnaj caw chicawxi isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios, aypaxo ebnaj chiak'lax yip yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yak'ni cawxo macta ya'ay.

Ay ebnaj chiak'lax yip isyeni c'aybalc'ule, aypaxo ebnaj chiak'lax ishelanil yalnic'o tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios. Aypaxo ebnaj xin chiak'lax ishelanil yohtan̈eniloj tato ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco yetbiho hunu maca, maca tato yesp'iritu naj matzwalil ayco yetbihoj. Ay ebnaj chak'paxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo ishelanil yalni nan abxubal, aypaxo xin ebnaj chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ishelanil istxumnilo huntek'an nan abxubale tu'.
Sunil huntek'an ti' ha'tic'a Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni cowatx'e' hununon̈, hatatic'a tzet choche Comam yak'a jet. Caw xin hunch'ann̈e Comam Esp'iritu.
Haca' conimanil ti', waxan̈ca caw tx'i'al yik'ni isba, yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal yehi. Hac tu' ye Comam Jesucristo.

Hactic'apax tu' je han̈on̈ ti', waxan̈ca Israel hon̈, maca mach Israelo hon̈, waxan̈ca chejabon̈, maca jet coba cochuquil, hune'n̈e Comam Esp'iritu Santo con̈hunbani, yuxin hune'xan̈e nimanilehal je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Ha'tic'a xin Comam Esp'iritu ak'lax yul janma hununon̈.
Haca' ye conimanil tinan̈, caw tx'i'al yik'ni isba, yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal.
K'inalo ta chu istzotel joj cat yalni: "Haninti'an mank'abehojan, yuxin machi wocan yin̈ hune' nimanile ti'," ta ẍi. Waxan̈ca chal haca' tu', yaja' yetbin̈etic'a isba yeb conimanil ti'.
Maca ta chal cotxiquin haca' ti': "Wal haninti'an manbak'satehojan, yuxin mach chiwocan yin̈ hune' nimanile ti'," ta ẍi. Waxan̈ca chal haca' tu', yaj caw yetbin̈etic'a isba yeb hune' conimanil ti'.
Ta bak'sate sunil conimanil ti', machim chu jabeni, yeb tato sunil conimanil ti' txiquinn̈e, machim chu coxuk'xen sam hunu tzet ye tu'.
Wal xin ha' Comam Dios watx'en̈e hunun yetbi conimanil ti', yanico Comam bay chal isc'ul.
K'inaloj tato lahanxan̈etic'a hunun yetbi conimanil matxam chu jalni baytet conimanil, chal tu'.
Yin̈ caw isyelal, waxan̈ca tx'i'al yik'ni isba, yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal yehi.
Isbak' cosat mach chu yalni tet cok'ab haca' ti': "Matzet chachocnico wuhan," mach ẍioj. Hacpax tu' cowi', mach chu yalni tet joj: "Matzet chachocnico wuhan," mach ẍioj.
Ay huntek'an yetbi conimanil ti' cochn̈e caw machi ismunil chijabe, yaja' ha' caw ec'na ch'ocnico ju.

Aypaxo yetbi conimanil ti', cochan matzet chal yelapnoj, yaja' ha' ec'bal chicoya'iln̈e. Haxa huntek'an yetbi conimanil mach c'ulch'ano jalni, ha' chijebatoj, hac tu' xin chu coyeniloj tato caw ay yelapno yehi.

Wal huntek'an yetbi conimanil c'ulch'an yillaxi mach yilalo chijaco yen̈el. Hac tu' yu iswatx'encano Comam Dios conimanil ti', yun̈e ha' huntek'an yetbi conimanil machi yelapno tu', ha' caw ay yelapnoj.
Yuxinto mach chu iscajlencan̈ isba ej yetbi conimanil, hayet to lahann̈e chisya'iln̈en isba hunun.
Ta ay hunu yetbi conimanil ti' chilahwi, sunil conimanil chiaben isya'il. Taca ay hunu yetbi conimanil chitzantelaxi, sunil conimanil chitzalahi.
Yuxin haca' isnimanil Comam Jesucristo je cosunil, hununon̈ ti' xin yetbixa isnimanil Comam tu' jehi.

Yuxin coxol han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam, ay comunil chak' Comam: babel ay mac ischejab Comam Dios yehi, iscab ay mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, yin̈ yox ay mac cuywawom, aypaxo mac chak' Comam Dios ishelanil isyeni ej c'aybalc'ule, aypaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil yak'ni cawxo macta ya'ay, aypaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil iscolwahi, aypaxo mac chi'ijbali, yeb xin ay mac chu yalni nan abxubal.
Yuxin mach sunilo mac ischejab Comam, mach sunilopaxo mac chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, mach sunilopaxo mac chicuywahi, yeb mach sunilo mac chu isyeni ej c'aybalc'ule.
Mach sunilopaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil yak'ni cawxo anma ya'ay, mach sunilo mac chihalni nan abxubal, yeb xin mach sunilo mac chitxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno nan abxubal tu'.
Yuxin hex ti', aweco yin̈ hec'ul hesayni huntek'an munil ec'balcano isc'ulal chak' Comam texol. Yaja' ayto hune'xa tzet caw ec'bal c'ul cowatx'eni, ha' bay chintzotelan yiban̈ilo teyet.

Waxan̈ca caw helanon̈ jalni yabxubal anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', maca yabxubal ebnaj 'angel, yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil, lahanon̈n̈e haca' hunu ch'en campana ton̈e chik'an̈i, yeb ch'en ch'en pak'an yehi ton̈e chitz'in̈xi.

Waxan̈ca chijal tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, waxan̈ca xin chicotxum huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan ye yu Comam, waxan̈ca johta sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb waxan̈ca chu cohec'nilo hunu witz yul yehobal yu ayco janma yin̈ Comam, yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil, yin̈ haca' tu' machi yelapno jehi.
Waxan̈ca xin chijitxk'ato tzet ayon̈ yin̈ anma meba', waxan̈ca xin chijak' tz'ajoto conimanil xol k'a k'a', yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil, nabn̈e hune' tu'.
Wal xin ta yeli xahan chijil jet anmahil, ay conimanc'ulal yin̈, chicoyelo isc'ulch'anil coc'ul tet, yeb mach chichiwa coc'ul yin̈, yeb mach chicololo'n̈e coba, yeb mach chijican̈ coba.
Machi xin chijilo istx'ixobal hunu jet anmahil, machn̈etaj jet chijaco yin̈ coc'ul, mach chitit cohowal, wal xin chiconahuln̈eto istx'ojal chiswatx'e jin̈.
Mach chon̈tzala yin̈ istx'ojal chiswatx'e hunu jet anmahil, walxinto ha' yin̈ isc'ulal chiswatx'e yin̈ chon̈tzalahi.
Yet xahan chijil jet anmahil tu' chijak' janma istecha sunil tzet chiswatx'e jin̈, chicawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet chala, ay conimanc'ulal jechmani, niman chijute coc'ul yin̈.

Ha' hune' coxahann̈en coba tu' mach bak'inal chitan̈i, wal jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios chiapni istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxi. Chiapnipaxo istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxpaxo nan abxubal, yeb matxa yilalo ay cohelanil.
Yuto cohelanil yeb jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios maẍto tz'ajanoj,
yuxin huntek'an tu' chilahwi ismunil yet chihul huntek'an tz'ajan yehi.

Yet nich'an intohan haca' istzotel niẍte unin, hac tu' intzotelan. Haca' istxumnipaxo niẍte unin, hac tu' intxumnipaxojan, haca'paxo isnabal niẍte unin, hac tu' innabalan. Wal tinan̈ xin icham anma inxahan, xawacanojan tzet ye tu' yet niẍte unin.

Tinan̈ maẍto chon̈k'oji cotxumnilo tzet ye tu' haca' caw yehi. Wal xin haca'tan̈e jilni cosat yul hunu ch'en espejo k'ejmutz'mun̈e, hac tu' je tinan̈. Yaja' chiapni istz'ayical bay chijil yin̈ caw haban, haca' con̈yohtan̈en Comam Dios.

Ay oxeb tzet ye tu' ti' mach chitan̈iloj, ha' ton janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, yeb iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ Comam, yebpaxo coxahann̈en jet anmahil. Yaja' hune' caw ec'bal yelapnoj xol oxeb ti', ha' ton coxahann̈en jet anmahil.
Machojab chebej hexahann̈en heyet anmahil, cat xin heyak'ni heyanma hesayni huntek'an munil chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet. Yaja' ha' hune' caw c'ul, ha' heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios.
Ha' mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal, ha' tet Comam Dios chitzoteli, maẍtaj tet anma, yu machi mac chitxumni yin̈ tzet chala. Yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yuxin chal tzoti' machi mac ohtan̈e.
Wal mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios xin, chich'ib ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin̈ yet Comam yu, cat yiptzelax yu, cat yak'nipaxo yak'lobal yanma.
Ha' mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal, han̈c'an̈e hune' mac tu' chich'ib yin̈ yet Comam, yaja' wal mac chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, chak' ch'ibo mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chiaben tzet chala.

Wochebalan tato hesunil cheyal nan abxubal, yaja' ha' hune' ec'bal chiwochehan to cheyalic'o tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios. Yuto ec'bal c'ul jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios sata jalni hunuxa nan abxubal, cachann̈e ta ay mac chalnilo tzet chal yelapno hune' nan abxubale tu', ta hac tu' xin chich'ib macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu.

Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, k'inalo tato chinapnihan quexwila'an cat intzotelan yin̈ nan abxubal teyet, machmi tzet cheyik' yin̈. Yaja' ta hunu tzet chak' Comam Dios johtan̈e, ha' chiwalan, maca helanile, maca ta chiwalan tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, maca hunuxa cuybanile; wal tu' chitxumchalo heyu.
K'inalo hunu te' su' maca hunu te' arpa, machim chicotxum tzet sonal chi'alaxico yin̈ te' ta mach watx'ebilo yul isnuk' te'.
Yeb xin ta ay hunu howal cat yok'tzelax ch'en trompeta yu iscutxico ebnaj soldado, yaja' ta mach habano yok' ch'en, machim chiscutxbaco isba ebnaj isto yin̈ howal.
Caw xin hacon̈mi tu', ta mach habano tzet chijala yet chon̈tzoteli, ¿tzettaxca chu istxumlaxilo tzet chijal tu'? Caw nabn̈em chon̈tzotel yin̈ haca' tu'.
Yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw tx'i'al abxubal, yaja' hunun abxubal tu' ay tzet chaliloj.
Yaja' ta mach wohtajojan yabxubal hunu mac chitzotel wetan, nan con̈obalinan yul sat hune' mac chitzotel tu', nanpaxo con̈obal naj yul insatan.
Caw wohtajan tato hex ti' caw cheyoche huntek'an munil chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet, yaja' ha' huntek'an ch'ak'ni ch'ibo mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ha' bay wal helahnicoj.
Yuxin tato ay mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal, caw yilal isk'anni ishelanil tet Comam Dios yun̈e chu yalnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapnoj.
Ta chintxahlihan yin̈ nan abxubal, yin̈ caw yeli han̈e wanmahan chitxahli, wal innabalan xin, mach chitxumcha yu yin̈ tzet chiwaltu'an.
Yuxin ¿tzet wal juten coba? Wal xin machn̈eojabtaj janma chitxahli, caw yilal cotxahlipaxo yeb conabal. Yebpaxo yet chon̈bitni, machn̈eojabtaj janma chibitni, wal xin caw yilal cobitni yeb conabal.

Ta ay hunujex cheyak' tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios yin̈ hunu nan abxubal, han̈e heyanma chitzalahi, wal mac chiaben tzet cheyal tu' xin, mach chu yalni: "Hacojab tu'" yuto mach chitxumcha yu tzet cheyala.
Yin̈ caw yeli lan̈an heyak'ni tzalaho heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yaja' mac chiaben tu', mach chik' yip yanma heyu.
Haninti'an chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yuto ec'balto chiwalan nan abxubal tesataj.
Yaja' yet chicocutxban coba yin̈ culto, wochebalan waxan̈ca howebn̈e tzoti' chiwalan, yaja' tan̈e chik' anma cuybanile yin̈, sata walnihan lahon̈eb mil tzoti' yin̈ abxubal mach chitxumcha heyu.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, machojab haca' istxumni niẍte unin, machojab haco tu' hetxumni. Wal xin haca'ojab istxumni icham anma hacojab tu' hetxumni, yaja' wal yin̈ istx'ojal, haca'ojab istxumni niẍte unin maẍto isnabal yin̈ istx'ojal, hacojab tu' cheyute heba.

Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: Chintzotelan tet hune' con̈ob tu' yin̈ nan abxubal, yeb anma nan con̈obal chihalni intzoti'an, yaja' maẍtic'a chabeto anma tzet chiwalan, ẍi Comam, ẍiayoj.

Yuxin huntek'an nan abxubale tu' yechel ye tet anma maẍto chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios, maẍtaj tet anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Wal tzoti' chihallax chitit tet Comam Dios xin, yechel ye tet anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.

K'inalo checutxba heba cat heyichico hesunil tzotelo yin̈ nan abxubal, cat yoc apno hunu comon anma maca hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam, maca hunu mac mach ohtan̈e hune' tu', chimistxum hune' mac tu' ta matxa tz'ajano ye yul hewi'.

Wal ta hesunil lan̈an heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios xin, yet chioc apno hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam, maca hunu mac mach yohtajo tzet cheyu tu', wal tu' chimistxum isba hune' mac mulum tu', cat isnani isba yu huntek'an tzet cheyal tu'.
Hac tu' xin chu yelcano yen̈el tzet c'uwan yul yanma hune' mac tu', cat yay jahnoj, cat yinayo isba tet Comam Dios, hac tu' xin chu yohtan̈en hune' mac tu' ta caw yeli ayco Comam Dios heyetbioj.

Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hayet checutxban heba yin̈ culto ayex chisje hebitni, ayexpaxo xin chisje hecuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios, maca heyalni tzet chak' Comam Dios heyohtan̈eloj. Ayexpaxo xin chu hetzotel yin̈ nan abxubal, ayex xin chu heyalni yin̈ tzet chal yelapno huntek'an abxubal tu'. Aweco huntek'an tu' yin̈ ismunil, yaja' yun̈e yik'ni yip heyanma yin̈ Comam.
Yet chextzotel yul nan abxubal, cawan̈, maca oxwan̈n̈e mac chitzoteli, yaja' yin̈ hununtajil, ayojab mac xin chalnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno huntek'an abxubal cheyal tu'.
Taca machi mac chitxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno xin, c'ulmi ta mach cheyala, wal xin ischuquilojab heyanma chitzotel tet Comam Dios.
Hacpax tu' xin yet chihallax tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, cawan̈ maca oxwan̈n̈e mac chitzoteli, wal ebnaj juẍta xin ton̈ehojab ch'oc tucno yaben yin̈ tzet caw yehi.
Yaja' ta ay hunu tzet chak' Comam Dios yohtan̈elo hunu mac tz'on̈anayo texol tu', hune' mac lan̈an istzotel tu' xin yilal istucban istzoteli, cat istzotel hune'xa mac tu'.
Hesunil chu heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, yaja' yin̈ hununtajil yun̈e ay cuybanil cheyik' yin̈, cat yanico yip heyanma.
Ha' mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, chisje iscachni isba yet ay mac lan̈an istzoteli,

yuto mach choche Comam Dios tato toxan̈e chon̈wejchahi yet chicocutxban coba, wal xin hununtajil cotzotel yin̈ ak'anc'ulal. Haca'tic'a ye ischejbanil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul hunun con̈ob,

ebix janab, mach chu yoc ebix tzotelo texol yet checutxban heba yin̈ culto, yuto mach ak'bil ischejbanil ebix istzoteli. Wal xin caw yijemojab chute isba ebix haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es yu Comam Dios.
Tato ay hunu tzet ye tu' choche ebix yohtan̈eloj, isk'ambehab ebix tet yichamil bey yatut, yuto mach c'uloj tato chitzotel ebix yet cutxanexicoj.
Tajca chetxumu tato teyet babel ak'lax Istzoti' Comam Dios, yeb tato hexn̈e chabilxa heyu.
