Tato ay hunu mac ischejab Comam Dios ye chabe, maca ta iptzebil yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo, yilal istxumni tato huntek'an cuybanile chintz'ibn̈etoti'an, ischejbanil Comam Dios yehi.
Yaja' tato machi yelapno huntek'an cuybanile ti' yul sat, machojabpaxo xin yelapno hune' mac tu' yul hesat.
Yuxin tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, ochewe heyala' tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios, yaja' mach checach yallaxpaxo nan abxubal.
Yaja' caw haca'ojab yehi, hac tu' chewatx'e yeb xin yin̈ istxolal.
Tinan̈ xin, hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chiwochehan chenati Tzoti' yet colbanile halbilcano teyet wuhan, hune' chabilxa heyu bay lin̈anex tinan̈.
Yuto yu hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile tu', yuxin colbilexxa, yaj tato mach lin̈anojex yin̈, chal yelapnoj tato mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ caw isyelal.
Ha' huntek'an cuybanile caw yilal yehi, ha' wak'an teyet, huntek'an chabilcano wuhan. Quexincuynihan tato cam Comam Jes'us yu comul, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios.
Lahwi tu' ismujlax Comam, yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic yitzitzbican̈ xol camom, haca'tic'a yalni yul Yum Comam Dios.
Isyeni isba Comam tet naj Pedro, isyenipaxo isba tet ebnaj ischejab.
Lahwi tu' xin, isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ec'bal howeb ciento ebnaj juẍtaj. Tx'i'al xin ebnaj aytoc'o tinan̈, ay xin ebnaj xacami.
Isyenipaxo isba Comam tet naj Jacobo, lahwi tu' xin isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ebnaj ischejab.
Haxa yin̈ istzujanilxa xin isyeni isba Comam wetan, yaja' haca' hunu nich'an unin pitzc'ana yalan̈to maẍto istiempohalo ispitzc'ahi, hac tu' wehan.

Yuxin caw matzet welapnojan xol ebnaj ischejab Comam chiwabehan, yuxin mach intzanojan yallax ischejab Comam Jesucristo win̈an, yuto wak' ec'ojan ya' yanma macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yet yalan̈tocanoj.

Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios, yuxin ayinicojan yin̈ hune' munil ti', yaja' mach nabn̈eho hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yak' wettu'an yuto ec'balto chinmunlahan sata ebnaj ischejab Comam. Yaja' maẍtaj yu wipan, walxinto ha' isc'ulch'anil Comam chicolwa win̈an.
Yaja' mach chiyoc yin̈ mac chihalnic'o cuybanile ti', ta haninan maca ebnaj ischejab Comam, ha' hune' caw yilal to ha' jalnic'ojan̈ cuybanile tu', hune' chabilxa yul heyanma.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ quexcocuyan̈ yin̈ yet yitzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo, yaja' ¿tzet yin̈ xin ayex cheyala tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom?
Ta mach chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa, machim itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Ta mach itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo machim tzet chal yelapno cuybanile jak'an̈ teyet, naban̈em chijaco janma yin̈ Comam.

Ta hac tu' lek'ti'on̈mi yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto chijala tato ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo. Machim yak' itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom.
Tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa, machmi itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Ta mach itzitzbican̈ Comam tu' xol camom, nabn̈em chijaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios, ayon̈tomico yin̈ comul.
Hacmipax tu' ebnaj chabilxa Comam Jesucristo yu yet iscami, c'aynamicanto ebnaj yin̈ huneln̈e.
Ta iscawxobal coc'ul yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuln̈e sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi, maẍtic'am nich'ano isc'ulal jet yin̈ haca' tu'.
Wal xin, yin̈ caw yeli itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom, haca' babel sat tz'unub chak'a, hac tu' yu isbabi yitzitzbican̈ cosataj.
Yu hune' naj, yuxin hul camical yiban̈ anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yaja' yu hune'xa naj xin, yuxin chiitzitzbican̈ anma yin̈ camical.
Haca'tic'a chu iscamto anma yu ismul naj Ad'an, hactic'apax tu' chu yulcan̈ isc'ul anma yu Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin yin̈ istxolal aycoj, ha' Comam Jesucristo ha' babel itzitzbican̈, haxa yet chul Comam yet iscayel cat yitzitzbican̈ macta yetxa Comam.

Lahwi tu' xin, cat yul islahobal tz'ayic bay chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj can̈yehi yeb ebnaj ayco yahawilo con̈ob, yeb ischejab naj matzwalil chiec' xol jak'ek' yeb yul yiban̈k'inal ti', catto yanico Comam sunil tzet ay yul isk'ab tet Comam Dios Mame.
Yaja' yet maẍto chaco Comam Jesucristo sunil ti' yul isk'ab Comam Dios ch'oc Comam Yahawiloj masanto yet chioc sunil mac ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam yalan̈ yoj.
Haxa hune' islahobal bay chik'oji Comam xin, ha' ton yin̈ naj camical ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam.

Tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj tato sunil tzet ye tu' chacto Comam Dios yalan̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo, yaja' wal Comam Dios mach chiocto yalan̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo, yuto ha' Comam Dios chianico sunil yalan̈ yoj Comam Cristo.

Yet chioccanto sunil yalan̈ yip Comam Jesucristo tu' xin, ha' caw Comam tu' chacto isba yalan̈ ischejbanil Ismam an̈eco sunil tzet ye tu' yul isk'ab, hac tu' xin haxan̈e Comam Dios Yahaw chucanico yin̈ sunil tzet ye tu'.
Yebpaxo hunxa, haca' anma chiah ha' iswi' selelo anma camnaxa, yaja' ta mach chulcan̈ isc'ul camom, ¿tzet yin̈ xin chiah ha' iswi' anma selelo anma camnaxa tu'?
Ta machi itzitzbican̈ camom, ¿tzet yin̈ xin chijak' janmahan̈ han̈on̈ ischejab Comam Dios on̈ti'an̈ jijlenan̈ isya'tajil chul jiban̈an̈ hunun tz'ayic?
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, haninti'an caw hunun tz'ayic inhinni inbahan incaman. Hune' ti' caw yeli haca' hune' tzalahilal chiwabehan teyin̈, yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo.

Haninti'an caw ec'ya' wanmahan bey Efeso haca'tan̈e wak'lenan howal yeb ej no' howla nok'. ¿Tzet xin chiwik'an yin̈ hune' tu' tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom? Ta hac tu', ha'mi ye yu anma chihalni haca' ti': "¡Wa'ojon̈we yin̈ caw c'ul, jak'awe tzet choche janma, yuto camomon̈xataxca yet hecal!" ẍi.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, mach cheyak' subchaho heba, cajxam yallaxi: "Ta chijetbin̈e coba yeb anma tx'oj isbeybal, niẍtejaln̈e cocuynito cowatx'en istx'ojal tu'," ẍi.
Nachaojabilo heyu yin̈ istx'ojal bay ayexicoj yeb matxa cheyaco hemul, yuto ayex maẍto heyohtajo Comam Dios. Chiwalan hune' ti' yun̈e hetx'ixwican̈.
Aymi mac chik'amben haca' ti': "¿Tzettaxca chu yitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa? yeb ¿tzettaxca jilni isnimanil yet chiitzitzbican̈?" ẍi.
Ha' mac chalni haca' tu' caw suc. K'inalo ta chicotz'un hunu ixim hin̈at, caw yilal isk'ato hune' hin̈at tu', haca'tan̈e chicam chijila, haxa yanma ixim xin chiahiloj.
Maẍtaj awalxa yehi chicotz'unni, walxinto ha' ixim hin̈at tu' chicotz'unu, maca ixim hin̈at trigo maca hunuxa nan hin̈atil.
Haxa Comam Dios xin chiak'ni aholo ixim hin̈at tu' haca' choche isc'ul, hatatic'a tzet hin̈atil chicotz'unu ha' xin chiahiloj.
Yuxin mach sunilo nimanile lahan, wal xin nantic'a isnimanil anma, nanpaxo isnimanil no nok' can̈eb yoj, nanpaxo isnimanil no' ch'ic, nanpaxo isnimanil no' cay.

Hacpax tu' xin, ay nimanile yet satcan̈ yehi, aypaxo nimanilehal yet sat tx'otx'al ti'. Yaja' xin nananta jilni isc'ulch'anil isnimanil tzettaj ye tu' ay satcan̈, yeb xin nan jilni isc'ulch'anil isnimanil tzettaj ye tu' ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti'.
Hacpax tu' tz'ayic, mach lahano isk'ak'al yeb ixahaw, mach lahanpaxo yeb tx'umel, hacpax tu' ej tx'umel mach lahano isk'ak'al hunun.
Hac tu' chu yitzitzbican̈ anma camom. Hune' nimanile chimujlaxi chietaxtoj, yaja' nanxa nimanile chu ispitzc'acan̈, matxa xin chietaxtoj.
Chimujlax hune' nimanile ayco istx'ojal yin̈, wal yet chiitzitzbican̈ xin, c'ulch'anxa jilni. Chimujlax hune' nimanile machi yip, haxa yet chiitzitzbican̈ caw ayxa yip.
Chimujlax hune' nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', haxa yet chiitzitzbican̈ xin, yetxa esp'iritu yehi. Ay nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', aypaxo nimanile yet esp'iritu.

Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Ha' naj Ad'an, naj babel winaj, anma yu iswatx'elax naj, ak'bil isk'inal naj," ẍiayoj. Haxa naj iscab Ad'an, yet satcan̈ ye naj, ha' naj chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal.
Wal xin babel hul tzet ye tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', tzujan tu' xin, yul tzet ye tu' yet esp'iritu.
Naj babel winaj, yin̈ tx'o tx'otx' watx'elax naj, yuxin yet tx'o tx'otx' ye naj. Wal naj iscab Ad'an yet satcan̈ ye naj.
Ha' nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', lahan haca' isnimanil naj watx'ebil yin̈ tx'o tx'otx', wal nimanile yet satcan̈ xin, lahan haca' isnimanil naj tit yul satcan̈.
Yulbal yet ayon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', lahan conimanil yeb naj babel winaj watx'ebil yin̈ tx'o tx'otx', wal yet bak'in xin, lahan chielico conimanil haca' naj yet satcan̈il yehi.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chiwalan teyet tato hune' conimanil ti', mach chu yapni isc'atan̈ Comam Dios, yuto chibe yeb baj; huntek'an chietaxto ti', mach chu yapni bay mach chietaxto tzet ye tu'.
Chiwochehan cheyohtan̈elo hune' tzet ye tu' ewan yehi: Mach cosunilo chon̈cami, yaja' xin cosunil chihellax conimanil,

yuto yin̈ caw lembil, haca'n̈e ismutz'la cosat, yet chiok' ch'en islahobal trompeta cat yitzitzbican̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xacami, matxa xin bak'inal chicami. Walon̈ itzitzon̈ ti' yet chiyuni hune' tu' chihellax conimanil.
Yuto hune' conimanil chietaxto ti', chihellax yin̈ hune' nimanile mach chietaxtoj. Hune' conimanil chicamto ti' chihellaxi, ha' hune' satcan̈il chi'ak'lax seleloj hune' matxa bak'in chitan̈iloj.

Hune' conimanil chietaxto ti' chiheli cat yoc yin̈ hune' nimanile machi etaxtoj. Chihellax conimanil chicamto ti' yin̈ hune' nimanile mach chicami. Hac tu' chu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: Chic'aytzelaxilo naj camical, ay hune' mac chik'oji yin̈ naj yin̈ huneln̈e.
Yuxin hach camical ¿baytu'wal ay hahelanil? ¿Baytu'wal ay hawip hapotx'wahi? ẍiayoj.
Ha' mule chon̈yak' camoj, wal isley Comam Dios xin ip yanico isya'tajil jiban̈.
¡Yaja' yuch'andios tet Comam Dios, yuto xacon̈k'oji yin̈ naj camical, yaj yu Comam Jesucristo!

Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, lin̈bawe heba, mach chexpax teyintaj. Hunun tz'ayicojab hex yin̈ yet Comam, munlahan̈we yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios sunilbal tiempo, yuto johtaj tato mach nabn̈eho chon̈munla yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.
Wal ch'en heyofrenda chicutxi texol, ch'en chialaxto tet mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, checutxbawe ch'en haca' yu walnihan tet ebnaj juẍta ay yul ismajul Galacia.

Hunun domingo yin̈ semana, yilal hepohnilo hanic'o ch'en melyu cheyik' yin̈ hemunil hununex, hatatic'a hanta chicolwa Comam teyin̈, cat hec'ubantoj, haxinwal yet chinapnihan matxa yilalo ch'ah ch'en texol.
Hato yet chinapnihan texol cat wanitojan mac saybilxa heyu, cat yinito ebnaj hunu carta yeb ch'en hecolwal tu' tet ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey Jerusal'en.
Yaja' ta han-caw-inan chintohan xin, yilaltic'a chitopaxo ebnaj wintajan.
Hayet chintohan yin̈ inbeltu'an yilal wec'an bey Macedonia, lahwi tu' xin cat wapnihan quexwilnojan bey Corinto tu'.
Etzan̈em chincanan hanic'o tiempohal tec'atan̈, maca xin ha' bey tu' ayinic'ojan chiec' n̈abil; ta hac tu' hexxa chexcolwa win̈an yin̈ inbelan yet chinelan texol.
Mach chiwochehan tato yin̈ an̈e chinec'an quexwila'an, wal xin chiwochehan chincanan hanic'o tiempohal texol, ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios.
Yaja' xin yilalto incanan bey Efeso ti' masanto yet chiec' k'in̈ pentecost'es.
Yuto caw chalte isba munil yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios chiwilan, yuxin chincanan waxan̈ca xin caw ay mac ayco ishowal win̈an.
Ta chiapni naj Timoteo tec'atan̈ xahan cheyil naj, haxinwal chitzala isc'ul naj texol, yuto chimunlapaxo naj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios haca' inti'an.
Tajca mach chicam hec'ul yin̈ naj, wal xin colwahan̈we yin̈ naj haxinwal chislah naj isbel yin̈ tzalahilal cat yul naj coc'atan̈an̈, yuto chijechmahan̈ naj yeb ebnaj juẍtaj.
Wal naj juẍta Apolos, walan tet naj tato chito naj yinta ebnaj to quexilnoj, yaja' machisjeto naj. Yettojab hunelxa chito naj yet ay ishamanil naj.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, caw majwahan̈wej, lin̈bawe heba yin̈ hune' bay ayxaco heyanma, caw mach chexxiwi, ak'we yip heyanma.
Sunilojab tzet chewatx'e, ayojab isc'ulch'anil hec'ul yin̈.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw heyohtaj tato naj juẍta Est'efanas yeb yuninal ha' babel yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey yul ismajul Acaya tu'. Caw xin huneln̈e yeco yanma naj iscolwa yin̈ mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.
Chiwochehan ta cheyije tet naj Est'efanas yeb yuninal tu', yeb tet sunil macta chicolwahi yeb chimunla yin̈ ismunil Comam.
Caw chintzalahan yuto hul naj Est'efanas yeb naj Fortunato yebpaxo naj Acaico bey ti', yuto yet chiwilnihan yin̈ ebnaj haca'ojtam hex chiwilicojan teyin̈.
Yin̈ caw yeli ebnaj ti' yak' tzalaho ebnaj inc'ulan, haca' yu yak'ni tzalaho ebnaj hec'ul. Ebnaj juẍta haca' ebnaj ti', ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat.

Ebnaj juẍta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunu con̈ob yul ismajul Asia ti', chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba. Hacpax tu' naj juẍta Aquila yeb ix janab Priscila yeb ebnaj juẍta chiscutxba isba yul yatut naj, chalpaxtoj ta cheyil heba.
Hacpax tu' ebnaj juẍta ay bey ti' chalpaxto ebnaj ta cheyil heba. Yeb xin k'ambewepaxo teyet yin̈ tzalahilal hanic' heye hununex.
Hanin Pablo inti'an han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈ehan yul carta ti' ta cheyil heba.
Ta ay hunu mac mach chiochen Comam Jesucristo, tijab isya'tajil yiban̈. Yin̈ sunil wanmahan chiwalnihan tet Comam: ¡Mam Jesucristo Jahawilan̈, hulan̈! quinchiyan.
Yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈.
Caw chitzala wanmahan teyin̈ hesunil, hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan, yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios. Haninan yeb naj juẍta Timoteo chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ hune' carta ti' teyet, hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul con̈ob Corinto, yeb tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul ismajul Acaya.
Yak'abayo Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo Jahawil isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈, yeb xin ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma.
Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam Dios, Ismam Comam Jesucristo, Comam Dios chitz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yeb chiak'ni yak'lobal janma.
Haca'ojab yak'ni Comam yak'lobal janma yin̈ ej isya'tajil chul jiban̈, hacojab tu' chu jak'ni yak'lobal yanma macta chiak'len isya'tajil yu isc'ulch'anil Comam yak' jet.
Yuto haca'tic'a chu islahnico jak'len nimeta isya'tajil yin̈ Comam Cristo, hactic'apax tu' chu islahnico Comam yak'ni yak'lobal janma.

Ta chiec'ya' janmahan̈ yaj yu hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma yeb yun̈e hecolchahi. Ta chak' Comam Dios yak'lobal janmahan̈ yun̈e hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma hex ti', hac tu' xin ay heyip heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ haca' huntek'an isya'tajil chijak'leti'an̈.

Chicawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios yuto chicolwa teyin̈ heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil ayayo teyiban̈, yuto johtajan̈ tato lan̈an heyak'len isya'tajil haca' jak'lehan̈, hac tu' chu hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma chitit tet Comam Dios.
Wuẍtaj, wanab, chijak'an̈ heyohtan̈eloj hanta isya'tajil jak'lehan̈ yul ismajul Asia. Ha' jalnihan̈ mach chitecha huntek'an isya'tajil tu' juhan̈, yuxin matxam chon̈colchahan̈ jalnihan̈.

Ha' jalnihan̈ to ha' bey tu' caw con̈caman̈. Ha' huntek'an isya'tajil tu' ha' ak'ni cotxumu'an̈ tato mach chu iscawxi coc'ulan̈ jin̈an̈, walxinto caw yin̈n̈e Comam Dios bay wal iscawxi coc'ul, Comam chiak'ni itzitzbocan̈ anma camom.
Wal xin ha' Comam con̈colnihan̈ yul isk'ab camical bay etza con̈caman̈, chi-xin-cawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam ta chicolwapaxo jin̈an̈ yin̈ isya'tajil chul cosatati'an̈.
Ta chexcolwa hetxahli jin̈an̈, yeb xin ta tx'i'al mac chitxahlipaxo jin̈an̈, tx'i'altic'apaxo mac chiak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam yin̈ isc'ulal chiyak' Comam jet.

Ay hune' tzet chiak'ni tzalaho coc'ulan̈ yuto janmahan̈ chalni tato c'ul cobeybalan̈ yin̈ sat sunil anma. Hacpax tu' yet jec'an̈ texol c'ul cobeybalan̈, yaja' maẍtaj yu istz'ajanil coc'ulan̈ yuxinto c'ul chijute cobahan̈, machoj, walxinto ha' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chicolwa jin̈an̈.
Yet chicotz'ibn̈entojan̈ cocartahan̈ teyet, han̈ech'an huntek'an chisje heyilni yeb huntek'an haban hetxumni, ha' chijayojan̈.
Ha' huntek'an lan̈an yichi hetxumni tu' wochebalan ta chetxumilo yin̈ caw c'ul, haxinwal yet chul Comam Jesucristo chextzala jin̈an̈, cat cotzalapaxojan̈ teyin̈.
Ha' huntek'an tu' ayco iscawxobalo inc'ulan, yuxin oc yin̈ innabalan tato babel chinec'an quexwila'an, haxinwal cayel chexwilan yin̈ inbelan yu hechahni isc'ulal Comam Dios.

Yuto yet chintohan yul ismajul Macedonia walnihan cat xin wec'an quexwilnojan babel, haxa yet chinmeltzohan xin cat wec'paxojan quexwilnojan hunelxa, hexxa xin chexcolwa win̈an yet chintohan bey tx'otx' Judea walnihan.

Yet intxumnihan hune' ti', ¿tom mach sunilo wanmahan walnihan heyalni? Tajca chetxumu ta chinetlihan teyin̈ haca' chute comon anma, yuto ta chiwalan ta chintohan quexwila'an, tzujan tu' xin mach chintopaxcan̈an, wal xin mach haco tu' intxumnihan.
Caw chil Comam Dios tato maẍto hunelo chiwalan teyet haca' ti': "Ho', c'ultic'a," quinchiyan, lan̈antotic'a xin cat walnihan "machoj."

Comam Jesucristo, Isc'ahol Comam Dios ha' walic'ojan texol, yeb naj juẍta Silvano, yeb naj juẍta Timoteo. Ha' Comam tu' machi bay yal Comam "c'ultic'a," tzujan tu' yalnipaxo Comam "machoj," yuto ha' Comam Cristo han̈c'an̈e isyelal ec' Comam yala'c'oj.
Wal xin ha' yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chijcano isba sunil tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios, yuxin yet chijanico ismay Comam Dios chijalni: "hacojab tu'" con̈chi.
Ha' xin Comam Dios con̈sic'nicaniloj, con̈yanico yin̈ ist'in̈anil, jetbin̈encano coba yeb Comam Jesucristo.

Ha' Comam Dios anico Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul janma, ha' xin chiyeniloj tato yeton̈xa Comam. Comam Esp'iritu Santo lahan haca' hunu sello, ha' chiyeniloj ta chicochah sunil huntek'an tzet xayalte Comam jet.
Caw yohta Comam Dios tato maẍto chintocojan bey Corinto tu' tec'atan̈ haca' nabil wuhan, yun̈e machi wak' tacojan hec'ul.

Matolo yu yahaw chiwute inbahan yin̈ tzet chu heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, machoj, yuto xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam yuxin lin̈anex yin̈ Comam. Walxinto chijochehan̈ chon̈colwahan̈ teyin̈, cat hechahni yak'bil tzalahilal yul heyanma.
Yuxin xaintxumilojan tato mach chintohan ilwal teyin̈ hunelxa, yun̈e machi cam chiwacojan bisc'ulal texol hununex.
Yuto ta chintohan wak'a'cojan bisc'ulal teyin̈, ¿mactaxca xin chu yak'ni tzalaho wanmahan? Wal xin mach chisje inc'ulan wak'acojan bisc'ulal texol, yuto caw hex cheyak' tzalahilal yul wanmahan.

Yuxin watojan incartahan teyet yun̈e mach cheyak' bisc'ulal wabe'an yet chinapnihan bay ayex tu'. Ha' heyet to tzalahilal cheyak' wabe'an. Wal xin t'in̈anxa wehan ta hesunil chextzalapaxoj, haca' hune' tzalahilal ayco yin̈ wanmati'an.

Hayet wanitojan hune' incartatu'an teyet, caw wik' bisc'ulalan, caw quinok'an heyu, yaj maẍtaj yu yoc bisc'ulal teyin̈ yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta tu', walxinto yun̈e heyilni tato xahan ayex wuhan.
Ay hune' mac anico bisc'ulal, yaja' maẍn̈etajinan wabehan hune' bisc'ulal tu', to hex heyabepaxo nich'an. "Nich'an" quinchiyan yuto mach chisje inc'ulan tato chich'ib isya'tajil naj tu' yiban̈.
Ha' texol tu' etza hesunil heyaco isya'tajil yiban̈ naj, yaja' c'uxanxa isya'tajil heyaco yiban̈ naj tu'.
Haxa tinan̈ xin, ak'we nimanc'ulal yin̈ naj, iptzewe naj haxinwal matxa chislahico bisc'ulal yin̈ naj.
Yuxin chiwalpaxtojan teyet ta chexahann̈e naj haca'tic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj.
Yu hune' tu', yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartatu'an teyet yun̈e wilnihan ta yijemex yin̈ tzet chiwalan teyet.

Ha' mac cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ yu hunu istx'ojal chiswatx'e, chiwak'paxo nimanc'ulalan yin̈, waxan̈ca mach wetojan yaco ismul, yaja' heyu yuxin chiwak'an nimanc'ulal, yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ sata Comam Jesucristo.
Hac tu' chijute haxinwal mach chik'oji naj matzwalil jin̈, yuto johtaxa tzet chu yoc naj etlo jin̈.
Hayet wapnihan bey con̈ob Troas yu walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, caw yak' isba munil wetan yin̈ yet Comam.
Yaj oc hanic' bisc'ulal yin̈ wanmahan, yuto machi ilcha juẍta Tito wuhan bey tu', yuxin quintak'licanojan tet ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey tu', intohan yul ismajul Macedonia.

Jak'a' yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yuto yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin sunilbal tiempo chon̈k'oji. Han̈on̈ xin chon̈isk'an Comam yu jak'ni ohtan̈elaxo Istzoti' tet anma. Ha' hune' Tzoti' tu' caw sunil bay chipujnatoj, haca' yec' isxuk'al sam hunu tzet ye tu' caw xuk' sam.
Han̈on̈ ti' haca' isxuk'al sam pom chiyeni isc'ulal Comam Cristo yin̈ sat Comam Dios, hac tu' jehi yet chon̈ec' jalno Istzoti' Comam tet anma chicolchahi yeb xin tet anma chic'aytoj.

Ha' mac chic'aytoj yahbeta sam hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yul sat yuto ayco yin̈ camical, walpaxo mac chicolcha xin, caw xuk' sam chabe yuto chischah isk'inal tet Comam. ¿Mactaxca xin chik'oji iswatx'en hune' munil ti'?

Yuto han̈on̈ti'an̈ maẍtaj yu jik'nihan̈ melyu yuxin chon̈ec'an̈ jala'c'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios haca' chute huntek'anxa ebnaj soman ye isnabal. Wal xin caw haca'tic'a caw ye yul sat Comam Dios, hac tu' chu jalnic'ojan̈, yuto ha' Comam ak'n̈e hune' comunilti'an̈, yeb hunxan̈e jehan̈ yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.

Yet chijalnihan̈ huntek'an ti' teyet, ¿chimhetxumu tato lan̈an jalni cobahan̈ c'ulal? Wal xin ¿tom chicoyehan̈ carta chon̈abenicojan̈ yul hek'ab? maca ¿chicok'anan̈ carta chexabenico yul cok'aban̈ haca' chute huntek'anxa ebnaj? ¡Machoj!
Wal xin hexn̈ech'an cocartahan̈, ha' xin chiocnico juhan̈. Hune' carta chexabenico tu' tz'ibn̈ebil yin̈ janmahan̈, hune' carta tu' sunil mac ohtan̈e yeb sunil mac chi'ilni.

Caw xin ixtan̈ yehi, yuto hex ti' haca' hunu carta tz'ibn̈ebil yu Comam Cristo hac tu' heyehi, han̈on̈ti'an̈ xin chijic'ojan̈ hune' carta tu'. Hune' carta tu' maẍtaj yu tinta tz'ibn̈ebil, to yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios itzitz. Machipaxotaj yin̈o ch'en ch'en tz'ibn̈ebilicoj, wal xin yin̈ heyanma tz'ibn̈ebilxacoj.
Yu Comam Cristo yuxin chicawxi coc'ul sata Comam Dios tato hac tu' ye huntek'an tu'.
Hayet chijalnihan̈ hune' ti' mach lan̈ano jalnihan̈ tato chisje cowatx'enan̈ hunu tzet ye tu' yul jetan̈ cochuquilan̈, wal xin sunil tzet chisje cowatx'enan̈, yaj yu Comam Dios chicolwa jin̈an̈.

Ha' Comam ak'ni jipan̈ jocan̈ chejabo yin̈ hune' ac' trato, maẍtaj yin̈ hune' ley tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj. Hune' iscab trato ti' chij isba yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios. Hune' isley naj Mois'es tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu' chon̈yito yin̈ camical, wal Yesp'iritu Comam Dios chak' cok'inal mach istan̈bal.

Hune' isley naj Mois'es tz'ibn̈ebilcanico yin̈ ch'en ch'en, caw ay isk'ak'al yip isjepla yet yuli, yuxin matxa yu isk'oji ismujlico ebnaj Israel yin̈ naj Mois'es yu istzejtzoni, yaja' yec'baniln̈e yehi. Yuxin ta ha' hune' ley chon̈ak'ni camoj caw xiwquilta yu yak'lax tet anma,
¡hajxampaxo xin hune' iscab trato chij isba yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo, ec'balto isc'ulch'anil chu yak'lax istzoti'al!
Ha' chal yelapno hune' chiwalti'an to ta caw ay ismay yu yak'lax istzoti'al hune' ley chon̈anico yin̈ camical, hajxam xin jaben isc'ulch'anil istzoti'al tzet chon̈anico c'ulal sata Comam Dios.
Yuto waxan̈ca caw ay yelapno hune' isley naj Mois'es yet yalan̈to tu', yaja' wal tinan̈ matxa yelapno ye yul sat hune'xa ti', yuto caw ec'bal isc'ulch'anil.
Ta caw niman yelapno ye hune' ley txann̈e istiempohal tu', hajxam xin hune' trato maẍtic'a istan̈bal, to caw ec'naxa isc'ulch'anil.
Ayco hune' ti' yipo janmahan̈, yuxin yin̈ sunil janmahan̈ chijalnic'ojan̈.
Mach chijutehan̈ haca' yute naj Mois'es, yuto yaco naj hune' k'ap k'ap yen̈elo sat yun̈e mach chil ebnaj Israel istan̈ilo ismujli hune' isk'ak'al yip Comam ayico yin̈ sat naj tu'.

Yaja' mach istxum ebnaj tato chitan̈ilo isk'ak'al hune' tu', yebpaxo xin tinan̈ yet chilni ebnaj Istzoti' Comam Dios bay ayayo hune' babel trato, haca' totic'a ayco hune' k'ap k'ap tu' yen̈elo isnabal ebnaj. Ha' xin mach chiak'ni istxumulo ebnaj tzet chala, yuto maẍto chiak'lax yohtan̈elo ebnaj tato yet yul Comam Cristo istan̈canilo babel trato tu'.
Yuxin hayet chiyilni ebnaj isley naj Mois'es tinan̈ haca'tan̈e aytoco k'ap k'ap yen̈elo isnabal ebnaj.
Yaja' yet chanico isba anma yul isk'ab Comam Cristo Jahawil, chiilaxilo hune' yen̈el isnabal haca' k'ap k'ap tu'.
Yuto ha' Comam Cristo Jahawil, Esp'iritu ye Comam, yuxin yet ayxaco Yesp'iritu Comam jin̈ habanxa cotxumni tzet chal Yum Comam Dios, matxa ayon̈octo yalan̈ yip hune' babel trato.

Yuxin matxa hune' haca' ismaj sate tu' yin̈ cosat cosunil. Wal tinan̈ xin lahanon̈xa haca' hunu ch'en espejo bay chi'illax isk'ak'al yip Comam, yuto ha' jin̈ chi'ilchalo isc'ulal Comam Cristo Jahawil. Yuxin lan̈an isch'ib conabal haca' isnabal Comam, yeb xin lan̈an istz'ajnalo isc'ulch'anil Comam jin̈. Hune' ti' chij isba jin̈ yu yip Comam Esp'iritu.
Mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin yaco Comam hune' munil ti' yul cok'aban̈.

Wal tinan̈ sunil tzet caw tx'ixobal chiswatx'e anma yin̈ ewantajil yahbilxacano juhan̈, machi mac chijak' subchahojan̈, mach chicosoman̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yeb comon tzoti'. Wal xin han̈e isyelal chijalan̈ sata anma yeb sata Comam Dios, hac tu' chu coyenilojan̈ tato hune' comunilti'an̈ ayco yin̈ istoholal.
Hayet chon̈ec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile, ay mac ti' mach chitxumchalo yu, ha' ton huntek'an mac tu' chic'aytoj.

Yaja' yu mach chayto yul yanma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam; yuxin ha' naj yahawil yin̈ hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ha' naj machi ak'ni yohtan̈elo anma yun̈e mach chu yilni istzejla isk'ak'al hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile, yet Comam Cristo caw aycano yip, Comam yechel Comam Dios.
Maẍtajon̈an̈ chijalic'o cobahan̈, walxinto ha' Comam Jesucristo chijalic'ojan̈ ta ha' Comam Jahawil. Wal han̈on̈an̈ xajaco cobahan̈ hechejaboj yuto chitzala janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam.
Ha'tic'a Comam Dios chejni ta chitzejla sajilk'inal xol k'ejholo, hapaxo Comam ak'ni sajilk'inal yul janma yun̈e johtan̈enilo isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios, hune' chitzejla yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo.
Haca' hunu k'alomal ayayto yul hunu tx'otx' xi, hac tu' ye Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ conimanil, yun̈e isyenilo isba ta ha' Istzoti' Comam caw aycano yip; yin̈ Comam Dios chitita, mach jetojan̈ yehi.
Yuxin waxan̈ca hoybilon̈an̈ yu isya'tajil, yaja' mach chon̈ayc'ayan̈ yul isk'ab. Ay tzet ye tu' chijaco yin̈ coc'ulan̈, yaja' mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ yu.
Chon̈cajlaxan̈, yaja' mach bejbilon̈canojan̈, chon̈mak'laxcan̈an̈, yaja' mach mak'bilo cotan̈ilojan̈ yin̈ huneln̈e.
Bajxan̈etu'wal chon̈tohan̈ ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical, haca' yak'le Comam Jesucristo, hac tu' chu isyenilo isba jin̈an̈ yin̈ tzettaj yak'le Comam.

Han̈on̈ti'an̈ waxan̈ca itzitzon̈an̈, yaja' ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical sunilbal tiempo yu chon̈munlahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Cristo. Hac tu' chu isyenilo isba tzettaj yak'le Comam yin̈ hune' conimanilan̈ cambehal ye ti'.
Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical yun̈e hechahnicano hek'inal tet Comam.
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Xawaytojan yul wanmahan yuxin quintzotelan," ẍi. Hac tu' jepaxojan̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈ xajaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin chon̈tzotelan̈.

Han̈on̈ti'an̈ johtajan̈ ta ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil, ha'tic'a Comam xin chon̈ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ yuto yeton̈xa Comam Jesucristo, hunxa xin chu con̈yinito Comam isc'atan̈.

Caw chijak'lehan̈ huntek'an isya'tajil ti' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈, yeb yun̈e tx'i'al mac chichahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios, haxinwal tx'i'al mac chiak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal tet Comam, hac tu' chu yoc ismay Comam.
Yu hune' tu', yuxin mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ waxan̈ca lan̈an ispax yip conimanilan̈, yaja' wal janmahan̈ xin hunun tz'ayic yoc yin̈ yac'tohal.

Sunilal isya'tajil chijilan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yin̈ an̈e chiec'toj yuto chiapni istiempohal bay chilahwi, yaja' wal isc'ulch'anil chak' Comam jet xin ec'bal niman yelapnoj, yeb xin mach istan̈bal.

Han̈on̈ti'an̈, maẍtaj yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' chijilico yin̈ bay chijaco conabalan̈. Wal xin yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' mach chijilico yin̈ ha' bay ayco conabalan̈, yuto sunil huntek'an chijilico yin̈, yin̈ an̈e chitan̈iloj. Wal huntek'an mach chijilico yin̈ ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.

Hune' conimanil ti', lahan haca' hune' nich'an leẍpat chietaxtoj. Yaja' johtaj ta ay hune' nimanile caw c'ul watx'ebil yu Comam Dios yul satcan̈, mach anmaho watx'en̈e, yeb xin machi bak'inal chitan̈iloj.
Yuxin hayet ayon̈toc'o yin̈ conimanil ti' caw ch'ah coc'ul, jochebal chiak'laxna hune' conimanil yet satcan̈ tu'.
Ha' hune' tu' chioc xilo cok'ap, yun̈e mach t'ilanojon̈ yet chon̈apni.

Hayet ayon̈toc'o yin̈ conimanil ti' caw chiah coc'ul chijak'len isya'tajil, ay jala' mach chon̈can t'ilnoj, mach chijoche ta ton̈e chiilaxilo hune' conimanil ti', walxinto chijoche ta chiak'lax hunxa conimanil ac', hac tu' xin chitan̈ilo hune' conimanil cambehal ye ti', cat cochahni hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal.
Yu hune' ti' yuxin con̈iswatx'e Comam Dios, yak'nipaxo Comam, Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet yu yak'ni johtan̈elo yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil tato chicochah hune' tu'.
Yuxin caw sunilbal tiempo chijaco hune' tu' yipo janma, johtaj tato yet ayon̈toco yin̈ hune' conimanil ti' machijon̈ isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yul satcan̈.
Tinan̈ maẍto chijil hune' tu', yaja' yulbal istiempohal ayon̈ yin̈ hune' conimanil ti' chijayto yul janma ta hac tu' yehi.
Yuxin caw ayco Comam Dios yipo janma, jochebal chicobejcano hune' conimanil ti' cat japni isc'atan̈ Comam.
Yuxin waxan̈ca ayon̈ic'ojan̈ yeb conimanilti'an̈, maca haxa isc'atan̈ Comam bey satcan̈, ha' tzet choche Comam Dios ha' ayco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ cowatx'enan̈ yun̈e istzala Comam jin̈an̈.
Caw cosunil chon̈oc sata Comam Jesucristo yul iscapil yun̈e cochahni ispaj yin̈ tzettaj chicowatx'e hununon̈ yet ayon̈ic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ta c'ul maca istx'ojal cowatx'e.

Walon̈ti'an̈, ha' tet Comam Dios Jahawil bay chon̈xiwan̈, yuxin ayco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ jalnihan̈ tet anma ta chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Caw ohtabil cobeybalan̈ yu Comam, haquexpax tu' hantam sak'al ta heyohtapaxo cobeybalan̈.

Mach lan̈ano jalnihan̈ tato caw c'ulon̈an̈ yul hesat. Wal xin jochebalan̈ tato chextzala jin̈an̈ yeb yun̈e c'ul hecolni heba hepajtzen tet ebnaj yin̈n̈e anma nime winaj chaco yanma, maẍtaj isc'ulal ayayto yul yanma anma bay chit'an̈xico ebnaj.
Walon̈ti'an̈, waxan̈ca chon̈hallaxan̈ locohal, yaja' yu comunlahan̈ yin̈ yet Comam Dios, yaja' ta man̈locohojan̈ cheyila yaj yu isc'ulalo teyin̈.

Wal xin sunil tzet chicowatx'ehan̈, ha' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo, ha' chiak'ni juban̈, yuto johtajan̈ tato ay hune' mac cam coselelo cosunil, yuxin camnajon̈xa yin̈ cobeybal yet yalan̈tocanoj.

Ju cosunil yuxin cam Comam Jesucristo yuxin han̈on̈ itzitzon̈ ti', matxahojab chon̈ec' yin̈ haca' tzet chal janma. Wal xin haca'ojab tzet chal isc'ul Comam Dios, hacojab tu' chicobeybaln̈e; yuto cam Comam, lahwi tu' yitzitzbipaxocan̈ yu yak'ni isc'ulal jet.

Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ matxa chon̈ocan̈ ak'oc'ule yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj, haca' chute anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Waxan̈ca yet yalan̈to hac tu' jute cobahan̈, con̈ocan̈ ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam Cristo, yaja' wal tinan̈ xin, matxa haco tu' conanihan̈ yin̈ Comam.
Yuxin ha' mac chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, ac' anmaxa ch'elicoj. Ha' tzet iswatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj chitan̈caniloj, haxa tzet chiswatx'e tinan̈ xin ac'toxa.

Sunil huntek'an chiwalti'an, ha' Comam Dios chiwatx'eni. Han̈ech'an yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin ayon̈ico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios. Ha' ak'n̈e comunilan̈ jalnic'ojan̈ tzet chu yoc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios.

Ha' chal yelapno hune' tu' to yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chioc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios, matxa xin chisnati Comam ismul. Ha' Comam ak'n̈ecano hune' munil ti' yul cok'aban̈ jalnic'ojan̈ yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios.
Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ ischejab Comam Cristo jehan̈ yuxin hacojtam ha' Comam Dios chiay sat teyet, yuxin yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chijalan̈ teyet ta chexoc yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios.
Machi nino istx'ojal Comam Jesucristo, yaja' yiban̈ Comam alaxcanto ismul sunil anma yu Comam Dios. Yuxin hayet chijanico coba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ chon̈colwahan̈ comunlahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, yuxin chi-elto-jawan̈ teyin̈ ta mach cheyintan̈ecanilto isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios.

Chal Comam Dios yul Yum haca' ti': Yin̈ istiempohal quinhawawtehan tawin̈, wabetojan tzet hawala; yin̈ istz'ayical hawoche hacolbanil quincolwahan tawin̈, ẍiayoj. Yuxin tinan̈ istiempohalxa heyawten Comam teyin̈, yeb xin istz'ayicalxa hechahni hecolbanil.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw c'ul chijute cobeybalan̈ yun̈e machi mac chijak' lectahojan̈, yuto mach chisje coc'ulan̈ tato ay mac chihalni isk'umal hune' comunilti'an̈.
Wal xin caw chicoyehan̈ yin̈ tzet chicowatx'ehan̈ ta caw yeli ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈, yuxin chijak' janmahan̈ jijlenan̈ isya'tajil chihul jiban̈an̈, yeb man̈tzetal, yebpaxo yec'ya' janmahan̈.
Ay bay caw con̈mak'laxan̈, ay bay xin con̈alaxicojan̈ preso, yeb xin ay bay ah wejna anma jin̈an̈, ay bay xin caw con̈ec'ya'an̈ comunlahan̈, aypaxo bay xin el cowayan̈an̈, ay bay jijlepaxojan̈ wahil.

Chicoyenipaxilojan̈ tato ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈ yu isc'ulal chicowatx'ehan̈, johtaxahan̈ baytet ist'in̈anil, yuxin chijak' nimanc'ulalan̈ yin̈ anma, c'ulch'an chijutepaxo coc'ulan̈ yuto ayco Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul janmahan̈, cat cotzalapaxojan̈ yin̈ jet anmahil.

Chicoyepaxilojan̈ tato ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈ yuto ha' cuybanile caw yel chijalan̈, yeb yu ayco yip Comam Dios jin̈an̈. Haca' hunu naj soldado chiscol isba yu ismunlabal cat yak'nipaxo naj howal yu ismunlabal tu'; hacon̈tu'an̈ yuto ha' istoholal chijalic'ojan̈.

Ay bay niman jelapnojan̈ yul sat anma, aypaxo bay xin chiilaxilo copixanan̈. Ay bay c'ul istzotel anma jin̈an̈, ay bay xin tx'oj istzotel anma jin̈an̈. Ay bay chon̈hallaxan̈ lek'ti'al, waxan̈ca xin ha' isyelal chijalan̈.
Ay bay challaxi tato mach con̈yohtajojan̈ anma, waxan̈ca xin caw ohtabilon̈an̈ yu. Camomon̈xahan̈ yalni anma, yaja' itzitzon̈an̈, chi'alaxpaxayo isya'tajil jiban̈an̈, yaja' mach chon̈caman̈.

Haca'tan̈e bisc'ulal jehan̈, yaja' wal xin tzalahilaln̈etic'a jehan̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Waxan̈ca caw meba'on̈an̈, yaja' tzetc'a mac k'alom yul sat Comam Dios juhan̈. Waxan̈ca machi nich'ano tzet ayon̈an̈, yaja' yul sat Comam Dios tz'ajan yeco sunil yul cok'aban̈.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hex ayex bey Corinto, caw chijaltojan̈ isyelal teyet yeb sunil tzet ay yin̈ janmahan̈.
Caw machi hunu tzet ye tu' chijebahan̈ teyet, wal hex ti' xin ay huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan ye jetan̈ heyu.
Haca' yay sat hunu naj mame tet isc'ahol, hac tu' yay insatan teyet, chink'annihan tato ha' caw isyelal ha' cheyal wetan, haca' chu walnitojan tzet ay yul wanmahan teyet.
Mach chu heyetbin̈en heba yeb anma maẍto chichahni Comam yul yanma, yuto ¿tom chu yetbin̈en isba isc'ulal yeb istx'ojal? Yeb xin ¿tom chu yetbin̈en isba sajilk'inal yeb k'ejholo? ¡Wal xin mach chuhi!
Yeb ¿tom chu islahban isnabal Comam Jesucristo yeb naj matzwalil? Yeb xin han̈on̈ xacochah Comam Jesucristo yul janma, ¿tom chu colahban conabal yeb mac maẍto chichahni Comam yul yanma? ¡Mach chuhi!

¿Tom ay yocbalto tioẍ yul yatut Comam Dios? ¡Machoj! Yuto han̈on̈ ti' yatut Comam Dios itzitz jehi, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: Haninti'an chinehayojan xol ebnaj cat xin wec'an yeb ebnaj, haninan xin chinocan isdiosaloj, cat yoc ebnaj incon̈obojan, ẍi Comam.
Yu hune' tu', yuxin yalpaxo Comam: Elan̈we xol ebnaj, pohilo heba yin̈ ebnaj. Mach chetzab huntek'an tzet ye tu' machiswalil, hac tu' xin chexinchahan inc'atan̈an.
Chinocan hemamoj, cat heyoc inc'aholojan yeb xin incutz'inojan, ẍi Comam Dios Jahawil, Comam chisje iswatx'en sunil tzet ye tu', ẍiayoj.

Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, ha' ton huntek'an xawalan teyet yaltecano Comam jet, yuxin yilal copohnilo coba xol sunil tzet ye tu' chietanto conimanil yeb janma. Xiwojon̈we tet Comam Dios, jak'acanico coba yin̈ huneln̈e yin̈ tzet choche Comam.
¡Aweyto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chijalan̈! Caw machi hunujex bay cowatx'ehan̈ huno istx'ojal. Machi hunujex etaxnato henabal juhan̈. Machipaxo hunujex quexjak' subchahojan̈.

Maẍtaj yu istac hec'ul yuxin chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet, wal xin haca'tic'a walnihan teyet yet yalan̈tocanoj, caw ayexic'o yin̈ wanmahan. Yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzinan maca lan̈anxa incaman hune'n̈etic'a ha' yeco wanmahan teyin̈.

Caw yin̈ sunil wanmahan chintzotelan teyet yeb xin caw chintzalahan teyin̈, waxan̈ca lan̈an wilnihan isya'tajil bey ti', yaj caw chik' yip wanmahan, yeb caw chioccano hune' niman tzalahilal yin̈ wanmahan chiwabehan.

Yettaxtic'a julan̈ bey ismajul Macedonia ti', maẍtic'a nino ak'anc'ulal chijilan̈. Bajxan̈etu'wal chon̈ec'an̈ ha' isya'tajil chichahlo juhan̈; ha' yichelax howal jin̈an̈ ha' chu anma; ha' istacbal coc'ulan̈ ha' ch'ak'laxi.
Yaj Comam Dios chiiptzen anma bisc'ulal yehi, ha' Comam ak'ni yak'lobal coc'ulan̈ yet yul naj Tito bey ti'.

Yaja' maẍn̈etaj yu hul naj yuxin chitzala coc'ulan̈, walxinto yu jabehan̈ ta heyak' yak'lobal isc'ul naj yet isbeyc'o naj texol, yeb yu cheyoche con̈heyila'an̈. Yalnipaxo naj ta caw bisc'ulal heyehi yin̈ tzet yu texol, yebpaxo ta ayinicojan yin̈ hec'ul. Hayet wabenan huntek'an tu' caw yik'cano yip tzalahilal yul wanmahan.
Caw tac inc'ulan yet wabenan ta oc bisc'ulal teyin̈ hayeb tz'ayic yet heyaben tzet yal te' carta watojan teyet, yaja' wal tinan̈ xin matxa chiwik' bisc'ulalan yin̈ hune' tu'.
Waxan̈ca heyik' bisc'ulal yaj chintzalahan yin̈ yuto hebisc'ulal tu' ha' ak'ni hetxumulo henani heba haca' choche Comam Dios. Machi xin nich'ano tzet etanto henabal yin̈ tzet yal te' carta tu'.

Tato chijik' bisc'ulal haca' choche Comam Dios, hune' bisc'ulal tu' chiak'ni cotxumuloj ta yilal conani coba cat xin cocolchacanoj. Ta hac tu' ye chal tu' machojab chitac coc'ul yu bisc'ulal. Ay hune'xa bisc'ulal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', hune' bisc'ulal tu' chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal.

Yaja' hex ti', xaheyik' bisc'ulal haca' choche Comam Dios, caw xin tx'i'alxa isc'ulal chak' teyet, yuto ha' anico yin̈ heyanma hewatx'enayo hune' isya'tajil yu texol tu', hac tu' yu hecolni heba. Istit hehowal, ischiwacan̈ hec'ul yu hune' tzet yu texol tu', yuxin caw tx'i'al el heyoche ta ayinic'ojan texol. Yaja' xin heyayo isya'tajil yiban̈ naj yaco ismul tu', hac tu' yu heyeniloj ta maẍtaj hunex yin̈ hune' ismul naj iswatx'e tu'.

Yuxin hune' carta intz'ibn̈etojan tu' maẍn̈etaj yu naj oc ismul yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan, maẍn̈etajpaxo yu naj bay oc ismul naj tu', walxinto yun̈e isyenilo isba yul sat Comam Dios ta caw ayon̈icojan̈ yipo hec'ul.
Sunil huntek'an tu' anico yip janmahan̈, maẍn̈etaj yu huntek'an tu', wal xin caw con̈tzalacan̈an̈ yet yalni naj Tito jetan̈ ta caw sak'al yu hechahni naj yeb ta caw yak' tzalaho isc'ul naj texol.
Isyelal walan, yet walnihan tet naj Tito tato caw c'ulex. Heyohtaj tato ist'in̈aniln̈etic'a chiwalan, yebpaxo xin mach lek'ti'alo elico yin̈ tzet walan tet naj teyin̈.
Yuxin ha' tinan̈, caw ec'na xahan chexyil naj, yuto chitit yul isc'ul naj tato caw yijem heyute heba yet isbeyc'o naj texol, yeb xin caw xahan heyil naj yet ay naj tec'atan̈.
¡Caw chintzalahan teyin̈ yuto ayexico yipo wanmahan!
Tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijaltojan̈ teyet yin̈ tzet yu isyeni isba isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ hunun majan ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul ismajul Macedonia ti'.
Waxan̈ca caw ay ilwebal chihul yiban̈ ebnaj, yaja' caw chitzala yanma ebnaj, yeb xin waxan̈ca caw meba' ebnaj, yaja' caw chipalc'on ebnaj yak'ni yofrenda, haca'tan̈e caw k'alom ebnaj.
Haninti'an chiwak' inbahan walnihan ta caw yin̈ sunil yanma ebnaj ch'ak' ebnaj yofrenda, hatatic'a hanta ay yul isk'ab ebnaj, ay bay ti' xin chipalc'on yak'ni ebnaj.
Caw oc ebnaj yala' jetan̈ tato chicochahan̈ yofrenda ebnaj, yuto choche ebnaj chicolwa ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en.
Caw ec'balcano yak' ebnaj yiban̈ haca' conanihan̈. Yuto yin̈ babelal ishin isba ebnaj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios Jahawil, lahwi tu' xin yanipaxico isba ebnaj yijemal jetan̈ haca' choche Comam.
Yuxin xajalan̈ tet naj Tito ta chito naj ilwal teyin̈, cat ischahni naj hecolwal cheyak' yu isc'ulch'anil hec'ul, yuto ha' naj ichico ischahni hecolwal yet babelal.

Haca'ojab ispalc'on iscawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios yeb hehelanil hetzoteli, yeb yitz'atil hewi', yeb yin̈ sunil heyanma chewatx'en hunu tzet ye tu', yeb con̈hexahann̈enpaxojan̈; hacojab tu' ispalc'on heyak'ni heyofrenda tet Comam Dios.

Mach chejbanile hune' chiwalti'an, wal xin ton̈e chiwochehan chiwalan teyet yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj. Haquexpax tu' yet cheyak'ni heyofrenda chohtan̈elo ebnaj bay chiak'lax hune' heyofrenda tu' ta xahan cheyil ebnaj.

Han̈on̈ ti' johtaj ta Comam Jesucristo caw c'ulch'ancano isc'ul. Caw tzetc'a isk'alomal Comam ay bey satcan̈, yaja' yute isba Comam meba'il yuto caw xahan ayon̈ yu yun̈e joc k'alomal yul sat Comam Dios.
Chiwaltojan teyet tzet chiec' yin̈ innabalan yin̈ heyofrenda, yuto yettax hunbi hex babel quexichico heyak'ni heyofrenda, caw xin yin̈ sunil heyanma heyak'a.
Wal tinan̈ xin mach chebej heyak'ni heyofrenda tu'. Wal xin ak'we yin̈ sunil heyanma haca'ojab yu heyichenicoj, hacojab tu' xin cheyute tinan̈, hatatic'a tzet ayex.
Yuto ta yin̈ sunil janma chijak' jofrenda, caw chitzala Comam Dios jin̈, hatatic'a tzet ay yul cok'ab. Wal xin mach chisk'an Comam hunu tzet ye tu' jet ta machi yul cok'ab.
Mach chiwochehan ta chexcan yin̈ man̈tzetal yu heyak'ni hecolwal.

Yaja' chiwochehan tato lahanojab tzet ayon̈ cosunil. Yuxin tinan̈, hex ay tzet ay yul hek'ab colwahan̈we yin̈ ebnaj matzet aya, haxinwal haxa yet matzet ayex haxa ebnaj chicolwa teyin̈. Ta hac tu' lahan chicocolle coba.
Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios, bay chala: "Ha' mac tzetc'a yet isc'utxbacan̈, mach palc'oncan̈ yul isk'ab. Haxa mac hanic'n̈e yet iscutxbacan̈ xin, c'uxann̈e ec' yu," ẍiayoj.
Chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios, yuto ha' Comam anico yul yanma naj Tito quexyanico yin̈ isc'ul, haca'tic'a heyeco yin̈ inc'ulan.
Yuxin hayet walnihan tet naj tato chito naj ilwal teyin̈, caw yin̈ an̈e istak'we naj istohi yuto ayco yin̈ isc'ul naj isto quexyilnoj.

Ay xin hune' naj juẍta ti' chijatojan̈ yetbiho naj Tito. Ha' hune' naj ti' caw c'ul istzotel ebnaj juẍtaj yul huntek'anxa con̈ob yin̈ naj, yuto caw c'ul ismunil naj yin̈ yalnic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.

Ha' naj xin saybil yu ebnaj juẍtaj yu yoc naj jetbiojan̈, cat iscolwa naj jin̈an̈ iscutxbancan̈ ch'en yofrenda ebnaj juẍtaj. Hac tu' xin chi'ilchalo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈, cat yilchapaxilo isc'ulch'anil hec'ul.
Hac tu' chijutehan̈ yun̈e machi hunu mac chihobnican̈ lek'ti'al jin̈an̈ yin̈ ch'en colwal caw ay yelapno chicocutxbacan̈tu'an̈.
Yuxin chijaco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ ta c'ul chijute cobahan̈ yin̈ hune' munil ti'; maẍn̈etaj sata Comam Dios, walxinto c'ul chijutepaxo cobahan̈ sata anma.

Ay xin hune'xa naj juẍta chijatojan̈ yinta ebnaj ti', hune' naj juẍta ti' tx'i'alxa el chijilan̈ tato caw chitzala naj iscolwahi bajxan̈etic'a yin̈ tzet ye tu'. Yuxin tinan̈ caw ec'balto chitzala naj yuto ayexico yipo yanma naj.

Ta ay mac chik'amben teyet tzet ye naj Tito ti', cheyala ta wetbi inbahan yeb naj, yuxin chinchejtojan naj yu iscolwa naj teyin̈. Yeb xin ta ay mac chik'ambenpaxo yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈, cheyala tato chejbilto ebnaj yu ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul huntek'anxa con̈ob ay bey ti'. Ebnaj ti' caw chisyelo ebnaj isc'ulch'anil Comam Cristo yu tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj.
Caw chiwochehan tato c'ul chu hechahni ebnaj, haxinwal chil huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj tato yeli c'ulex, haca' yu walnitojan teyin̈.
Wal yin̈ ch'en colwal cheyak' tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo ay bey Judea, mach yilalo chintz'ibn̈etojan teyet.

Yuto wohtajan tato caw yin̈ sunil heyanma chexcolwahi, caw chitzala inc'ulan chiwalnihan tet ebnaj juẍta ay bey Macedonia ti' tato caw c'ulch'an hec'ul. Xawalan tato hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul ismajul Acaya hunbitax quexichico heyak'ni heyofrenda. Hayet yaben ebnaj ay bey Macedonia hune' tu', caw tx'i'al ebnaj oc yin̈ isc'ul yak'ni yofrenda.
Tinan̈ xin chinchejtojan ebnaj juẍtaj ti' bay ayex tu', haxinwal chexyiptze ebnaj hecutxbancan̈ ch'en colwal tu'. Hac tu' xin mach nabn̈eho walan yin̈ isc'ulch'anil hec'ul.

Yuto c'uxantaxca ay ebnaj ah Macedonia ti' tzujan wintajan yet chinapnihan quexwilnojan, tx'ixobalmi ta maẍto ch'en heyofrenda tu' cutxan heyu, yuto caw sunil janmahan̈ chijalnihan̈ tato caw c'ulch'an hec'ul.

Yuxin chinnahan tato caw yilal isbabito ebnaj juẍta ti' tec'atan̈ yun̈e iscolwa ebnaj teyin̈ hecutxbancan̈ heyofrenda, ch'en tak'ebilxa heyu heyak'ni. Ha' xin heyofrenda chicutxi tu', ha' chalniloj ta caw c'ulch'an hec'ul, machi xin lan̈bilojex heyak'ni.
¿Tom mach cheyohtajo hune' ti' xin?: Ha' mac hanic'n̈e yawal chacoj, hanic'n̈etic'apaxo isn̈al chishatx'paxocan̈. Walpaxo mac niman yawal chacoj caw niman isn̈al chishatx'can̈.

Jak'a'we jofrenda hununon̈, hatatic'a hanta chicotxum jak'ni, machojab yin̈o bisc'ulal chijak'a, machojabpaxo xin yin̈ lan̈bilal, yuto Comam Dios caw chitzala Comam yin̈ mac caw yin̈ tzalahilal chak' yofrenda.
Yuto ay yip Comam yak'ni sunil isyaxil teyet, hac tu' xin machi hunu tzet ye tu' ti' matzet teyet; wal xin chipalc'on yul hek'ab yun̈e hecolwa yin̈ tzet ye tu' c'ul.
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Sak'al yet mac chiak'ni tzet ye tu' tet anma meba', yu hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tu', yuxin mach chito nahul hune' mac tu' yu Comam Dios, ẍiayoj.

Comam Dios chiak'ni ixim hin̈at chitzunlaxi, yebpaxo sunil tzet chilolaxi. Ha' xin Comam chiak'nipaxo teyet tzet cheyak' yin̈ heyofrenda tet Comam. Haca'tic'a hunu tzet ye tu' chetz'uncanoj, chanayo Comam isyaxilal yiban̈, hac tu' xin ye hune' isc'ulch'anil hec'ul tu' caw tzetc'axa chielcanicoj.

Hac tu' xin caw tx'i'al tzet chijechab yun̈e caw tx'i'al tzet cheyak'paxoj, hac tu' xin tzetc'a ebnaj juẍta chiak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yet chischahni ebnaj hune' heyofrenda chijitojan̈ bay ay ebnaj tu'.
Huntek'an colwal cheyak' ti' maẍn̈etaj chicolwa yin̈ tzet ye tu' matzet yul isk'ab ebnaj, wal xin chiiptzelipaxo yin̈ ebnaj yak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios.
Chahnipaxico ebnaj ismay Comam, yuto cheyeloj tato yijemex yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo, yebpaxo chexcolwa yin̈ tx'i'al ebnaj juẍtaj.
Ebnaj juẍta chichahni hecolwal tu', chitxahli ebnaj teyin̈, cat quexisxahann̈en ebnaj yuto hex chexyak'baln̈e Comam Dios yin̈ heyenilo huntek'an isc'ulal isc'ul Comam.
Jak'a'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yu hune' comatan, (ha' ton Comam Jesucristo) ak'bil yu Comam. Caw xin mach chon̈k'oji cotxumni hanta isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam.

Hanin Pablo inti'an yet chink'annihan hunu tzet ye tu' teyet haca' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Cristo hac tu' chu ink'annihan. Tolab chihallaxic'oj tato yet ayinan texol caw echo inxiwan, wal yet machijinan texol xin, tolab caw can̈ chiwute inbahan yalbanil.

Yaja' chiwaltojan teyet ta hayet chinapnihan bey tu' machojab cheyak'tij inhowalan yin̈ ebnaj chalni tato lahan chijute cobahan̈ haca' comon anma, yuto haninti'an caw hinaninan intzotelan yin̈ hune' tu' yeb ebnaj.
Wal xin caw yeli anma on̈an̈, yaj mach haca'o chu yak'ni anma howal, mach haco tu' jak'ni howalan̈.
Maẍtaj tzet ye tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chijak'baln̈e yet chijak'ni howal, walxinto ha' yip Comam Dios ha' chik'oji istan̈tzenilo sunil tzet ye tu' caw ay yip.
Chik'ojipaxo yip Comam yin̈ sunil lolo'al mach chichahni ohtan̈elaxo Comam Dios. Haxa comon nabale xin chijacanico sunil tu' yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, hac tu' xin yijem chute isba.
Hayet caw c'ul hexxa heyijeni, chijayojan̈ isya'tajil yiban̈ mac mach chisje isc'ul isyije'.
Hex ti', han̈ech'an tzet cheyil yu isbak' hesat ha'n̈e chexoc hetxumu'. Ta t'in̈anxa heyehi tato yet hexxa Comam Cristo, yilal heyohtan̈eniloj tato yetpaxo Comam Cristo jehan̈.
Waxan̈ca chiwican̈ hanic' inbahan yin̈ hune' inmunilti'an, yaja' mach chintx'ixwihan, yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yun̈e helin̈ban heba yin̈ Comam, maẍtaj yu quexwetantojan.
Yuxin mach chisje inc'ulan ta chetxumu ta yu quexinxibtenan yuxin hac ti' chiwute walnitojan yul incartati'an, wal xin machoj.
Yuto ay mac chalni haca' ti': "Ha' iscarta naj caw how istzoteli, yeb xin caw ya' chilowi, yaja' haxa yet ayc'o naj coxol xin machi yip tzet chiyal naj yeb xin matzet chal yelapnoj," ẍi ebnaj.
Ha' mac hac tu' yalni, yilal yohtan̈eni tato haca'tic'a intzotelan yul incartati'an, hac tu' chu intzotelpaxojan yet ayinan texol.
Wal xin mach chu colahban cobahan̈ yeb mac chislolo'n̈e isba. Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chischahco ebnaj sucal yin̈ yu ch'oc ebnaj yila' hanta ishelanil hunun ebnaj.

Han̈on̈ti'an̈ mach chon̈palc'onan̈ jinican̈ cobahan̈ bay yebilcano jetan̈, yuto ha' Comam Dios an̈ecanico yechel bay cachan comunlahan̈. Hac tu' xin el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yuxin con̈apnihan̈ texol bey con̈ob Corinto tu'.
K'inalo tato maẍtic'a hunelo con̈apnihan̈ tec'atan̈, machim chon̈munlahan̈ texol tinan̈. Wal xin han̈on̈an̈ con̈apnihan̈ babel texol, jalnihan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo teyet.

Mach chijal cobahan̈ winajil yu ismunil hunuxa anma, yeb xin mach lan̈an copalc'onan̈ comunlahan̈ yiban̈ bay yebilon̈canojan̈ yu Comam. Wal xin caw chito jochehan̈ chon̈munlahan̈ yun̈e isch'ib comuniltu'an̈ bay cachan comunlahan̈ yu Comam Dios, yun̈e cam heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam.

Chijochepaxojan̈ chon̈hitztojan̈ jalnojan̈ Tzoti' yet colbanile yul huntek'anxa con̈ob nahat yehilo yin̈ hecon̈ob tu'. Yaja' xin mach chijochehan̈ chon̈munlahan̈ bay xaichico hunmajanxa ebnaj ismunlahi, yuto machi jochehan̈ cololo'n̈e cobahan̈ yin̈ ismunil hunuxa maca.
Ta ay hunu mac choche yik'a'can̈ isba, yik'abcan̈ isba yaj yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e Comam Dios, machojabtaj yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e.
Yuto maẍtaj anma chiyal isba c'ulal yul yet ischuquil ha' c'ul, machoj, walxinto ha' mac chal Comam c'ulal, ha' ton c'ul.
Hantam sak'al tato chitecha huntek'an tzet chiwaltoti'an heyu, hacojtam mach innabalan, yuxin hac tu' intzotelan, yaja' yilal heyak'ni techahoj.

Caw tz'e' chiwute inbahan teyin̈ yuto xahan ayex wuhan haca' isxahanil chexyil Comam Dios, yuto xawak' tratohan yeb Comam Cristo tato chexwacojan yul isk'ab, haca' hunu ix k'opo maẍto chiyik'le hunu winaj.

Yaja' chinxiwan yuto haca'taxca yu yak'ni subchaho no' laba ix Eva yu iscan̈il yehi, hactaxca tu' chu heyak'lax subchahoj, cat heyinilo heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, yeb xin matxataxca toholo cheyute heba haca' choche Comam.

Hex ti' caw niman cheyute hec'ul heyaben tzet chal ebnaj chiec' halnoc'o huntek'anxa nan cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, mach haca'o yu jalnihan̈ teyet. Lan̈an hechahnipaxo hune' nan esp'iritu, maẍtaj haca' hune' chabilxa heyu. Lan̈an hechahnipaxo hune' nan cuybanile, maẍtaj haca' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile hechah yet jec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ teyet.
Ha' huntek'an ebnaj chal isba ischejabo Comam Jesucristo bay tzujanex tu', mach ec'balo yelapno ebnaj insatajan.
Waxan̈ca mach c'ulo intzotelan, yaja' ha' tzet wohtajan caw niman yelapnoj. Sunil tzet quinec'an inwatx'ehan texol ha' chalniloj tato caw ay inhelanilan.
Hayet wec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile texol machi nich'ano tzet ink'anilojan teyet. ¿Tom waco inmulan yin̈ haca' tu'? Wal xin wiyo inbahan yun̈e heyinican̈ heba.
Hayet inmunlahan texol yet wec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile, ha' huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍta nan con̈obal, ha' ebnaj colwa win̈an yun̈e yec' wuhan texol.

Hayet wec'an texol, ay tiempo ay tzet ye tu' ti' caw ocnico wuhan, yaja' machi hunujex bay ink'anan nich'ano tzet ye tu'. Wal xin ha' ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey Macedonia apni inc'atan̈an, ha' ebnaj ak'ni tzet ocnico wuhan. Caw machi hunujex bay ink'anan hunu tzet ye tu', hactic'apax tu' chiwute inbahan tinan̈.

Ha' isyelal Comam Jesucristo ayco win̈an, yuxin chiwalan tato matzet ink'anan yet wec'an texol hex wuẍta ay yul ismajul Acaya; ha' hune' tu' ayco istzalabalo inc'ulan. Hune' tzalahilal tu' machi mac chiinilo wetan.
¿Tom mach ayoco wanmahan teyin̈ yuxin hac tu' walnihan? ¡Machoj! Wal xin yohta Comam Dios tato caw ayco wanmahan teyin̈.
Yaja' hune'n̈etic'a ha' chiwutehan texol haca' yet yalan̈tocanoj. Chiwutehan haca' tu' yun̈e mach chiwak'an yub ebnaj chihalni tato lahan comunilan̈ yebi, cat yinican̈ isba ebnaj.
Ha' ebnaj tu' ton̈e chisbalico isba ebnaj ischejabo Comam Jesucristo. Chak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma yin̈ tzet chala, chutenico isba ebnaj ischejabo Comam Jesucristo.
Yaja' hune' chiswatx'e ebnaj tu' mach chic'ay coc'ul jilni yuto hac tu' chute naj matzwalil; chuteco isba naj c'ulal haca' ebnaj 'angel.
Yuxin mach chic'ay coc'ul ta chutepaxo isba ebnaj tu' haca' mac chicuyni istoholal, yuto ischejab naj matzwalil ye ebnaj. Yaja' chischah ebnaj tu' isya'tajil haca'tic'a istx'ojal chiswatx'e.

Wal tinan̈ xin chiwalpaxtojan teyet hunelxa, mach locohojinan, yaja' ta ayex chetxumu tato locohinan xin, chahwe heyabe' tzet chiwalti'an. Haca' hunu mac mach chistxumu yin̈ tzet chala, hac tu' chu winican̈ inbahan nich'anoxa, haca' huntek'an ebnaj chican̈ isba ischuquil.
Ha' huntek'an chiwaltojan teyet ti', maẍtaj Comam Dios chiak'ni wala'tojan. Haca'ojtam mach chintxuman yet chiwalnitojan teyet, yuto ton̈e chiwican̈ inbahan chiwalnitojan hune' ti'.
Tzetc'a ebnaj chican̈ isba yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e, haquintu'an chiwican̈ hanic'o inbahan haca' chute ebnaj tu'.
Caw helanex heyalni, yaja' cheyak' techaho tzet chal ebnaj mach c'ulo tzet chiswatx'e teyin̈.

Ay ebnaj chexlan̈ni yu heyak'ni cheja' heba tet, cat yinicanic'o ebnaj sunil tzet ayex. Caw yahawilxa chute isba ebnaj teyin̈, chexyak'nipaxo subchaho ebnaj. Chexisyahni ebnaj, chiocpaxo yin̈ isnabal ebnaj ispak'nilto hesat. Wal hex ti' xin cheyak' techaho sunil tzet chexyute ebnaj tu'.

Wal xin chintx'ixwihan walnitojan teyet yuto han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw tz'on jute cobahan̈ texol, mach haca' yute isba ebnaj tu' teyin̈. Yaja' ta chican̈ isba ebnaj tu', haquinpaxtu'an chiwipaxocan̈ inbahan. Hayet chiwalnihan hune' ti', haca'tan̈e mach tz'ajano yul inwi'an chiwalnihan.
Ebnaj tu' Hebreo ebnaj, haquinpaxtu'an Hebreo inan; Israel ebnaj, haquinpaxtu'an, Israel inan; yin̈ naj Abraham titna ebnaj, haquinpaxtu'an, yin̈ naj Abraham tu' titnajinpaxojan.

Ischejab Comam Cristo ye ebnaj yalni, walinan xin ec'balto ischejab Comam wehan sata ebnaj. Hayet chiwalnitojan huntek'an ti' teyet haca'ojtam mach chintxuman yin̈ tzet chiwalan. Wal haninti'an caw ec'balxa chinmunlahan sata ebnaj, tx'i'alxa el chinalaxictojan yul preso sata ebnaj. Ec'balxapaxo el chinmak'laxan sata ebnaj, tx'i'alxa el xin chielico incaman.
Howel quinismak'an ebnaj wet Israelan, treinta y nueve tz'um wijan yu ebnaj hunta el.

Oxel xin alaxayto te' c'ax win̈an, hunel xin quink'ojlaxcan̈an. Yet wec'an yin̈ inbelan, oxel to te' barco yich hayet ayinicojan yul te'. Ay hunel ti' xin, hune' tz'ayic yeb hune' ak'bal ayinicojan yiban̈ ha ha' yuto tocano te' barco yich ha'.

Mach isbi hayel quinec'an yin̈ inbelan. Ay bay quinelicojan quinyijnitojan ha ha', ay bay quinelicojan incaman yu ebnaj elk'om, yeb yul isk'ab wet con̈oban, yebpaxo yul isk'ab anma nan con̈obal. Aypaxo bay quinelicojan incaman yulaj con̈ob yeb yulaj beh, yeb yiban̈ ha' mar, yeb xin caw quinelicojan incaman yul isk'ab ebnaj ton̈e chisbalico isba juẍtajoj.

Ay bay caw quinsiquihan inmunlahan, wak'lenan isya'tajil. Tx'i'al el mach quinwayan, ay bay wijlehan n̈ohchahilal, yeb tajinti'al. Tx'i'al el mach quinwa'han. Ay bay xin wetapaxo inc'ulan yu chew, yeb tx'i'al el quincancanojan man̈ xilk'apehal.
Mach han̈c'an̈eho huntek'an isya'tajil tu' wak'lenan, wal xin ayn̈etic'aco yin̈ inc'ulan yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con̈ob.

Yuto ta ay hunu mac maẍto chiyik' yip yin̈ yet Comam caw chiwik' bisc'ulalan yin̈, haca'tan̈e maẍto chiwik'paxo wipan chute innanihan. Ta ay ebnaj chietaxto isnabal yu hunuxa maca, caw chitac inc'ulan.
Ta caw yilal chiwican̈ inbahan, chimwican̈ inbahan yin̈ huntek'an lan̈an walniti'an, yuto ha' huntek'an ti' chiyeniloj tato machi bin wipan.
Ha' Comam Dios, Ismam Comam Jesucristo, ha' ay yet yalaxico ismay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, caw yohta Comam tato caw yel chiwalan.

Yet hunel, yet ayinic'ojan yul con̈ob Damasco, ischejni naj gobernador chimunla yinta naj rey Aretas tato chioc ismajomal isti' hunun ispultahil ch'en c'ub hoyanico yin̈ con̈ob tu' yun̈e intzablaxayojan.
Yaja' quinalaxaytojan yul hune' motx yu huntek'an ebnaj juẍtaj, walaxiltijan yul isventanahil ch'en c'ub tu'. Hac tu' yu incolchahan yul isk'ab naj gobernador tu'.
Matzet chiwik'an yin̈ winican̈ inbahan, yaja' yilaltic'a walnihan huntek'an yak' Comam Dios wila'an, yeb tzet yelax wetan yu Comam.

Ay hune' naj ohtabil wuhan, caw ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Cristo. Can̈lan̈ebxa habil tinan̈ yilaxto naj satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios. Yaja' mach wohtajojan ta beyc'o naj yeb isnimanil maca han̈c'an̈e yanma naj, han̈ech'an Comam yohtaj.
Caw wohtajan tato ilaxto hune' naj tu', yaja' ha' hune' mach wohtajojan ta ilaxto naj yeb isnimanil maca machoj, han̈ech'an Comam Dios yohtaj.
Ha' hune' wohtajan to ilaxto naj bey para'iso. Bey tu' yabe naj huntek'an tzoti' machi mac ohtan̈e, yeb xin machi mac chisje yalnic'oj.
Ha' hune' naj tu' chisje winican̈an, wal inti'an xin ha' yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil chiwilan, ha' bay chiwican̈ inbahan.

K'inalo tato chiwochehan chiwican̈ inbahan chitic'am isje yuto ha' isyelal chiwalan, mach sucojinan yin̈ haca' tu'. Yaja' mach chiwican̈ inbahan yuto chiwochehan tato machi hunu mac chinani ta caw ec'bal welapnojan yiban̈ tzet chil anma win̈an, yeb xin tzet chiyabe anma walnihan.

Yaja' yun̈e machi oc lolo'al win̈an yu huntek'an tzet c'ulch'an yelax wila'tu'an, yuxin ak'lax hune' isya'tajil wetan yu naj matzwalil, haca' hunu te' tx'ix alaxico yin̈ innimanilan, hac tu' yu yak'lax hune' isya'tajil ti' win̈an.
Oxelxa chink'anan tet Comam Dios ta chilo Comam hune' isya'tajil ti' win̈an.

Yaja' tak'wi Comam wetan haca' ti': "Ak' tzalaho hac'ul yin̈ isc'ulch'anil inc'ulan xawak'an tawet, yaj yu inhelanilan chitecha hawu. Han̈c'an̈e hune' tu' xin chiocnico hawu yuto caw ec'na caw c'ul isyenilo isba wipan yin̈ isya'tajil," ẍi Comam. Hac tu' xin caw chintzalahan yin̈ isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an, yuto chisyelo isba yip Comam Cristo win̈an.

Yuxin caw chintzalahan yin̈ ej isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an, yuxin waxan̈ca chibuchwa anma win̈an, yeb waxan̈ca matzet ayinan, yeb waxan̈ca chincajlaxan, yeb waxan̈ca chihul isya'tajil wiban̈an, yaj yu chinmunlahan yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo. Yaj caw chitzala wanmahan yuto hayet machi caw wipan chiwabehan, caw chiwik'canocan̈ wipan, yaja' yu Comam.

Haca' hunu mac mach c'ulo ye yul iswi', hac tu' wute inbahan wanicojan inwinajilan, yaja' hex ay hemul win̈an yuto hex wal heyanico inwinajilan, yuto mach ec'balo ebnaj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Jesucristo tu' insatajan, ha' ebnaj cheyabeto tzet chala. Waxan̈ca mach chiyelapno wehan, yaja' mach chu ispalc'on ebnaj wiban̈an.
Hayet wec'an texol caw niman wute inc'ulan teyin̈. Inyehan c'aybalc'ule yeb yechel yip Comam Dios texol; ha' xin chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan.
Hune'xan̈e tzet mach lahano quexwutehan haca' huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con̈ob, yuto mach ink'anan yin̈ tzet ocnico wuhan, yuxin ak'we nimanc'ulal yin̈ hune' inmultu'an.

Tinan̈ xin toxa chintohan quexwila'an yin̈ yet yoxel, yaja' matzet chink'anpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu yec' wuhan bey tu'. Yuto maẍtaj yin̈ tzet ayex bay ayco wanmahan, walxinto hex ayexico yin̈ inc'ulan. Yuto haca' hunu naj mame tinan̈ yilal yak'ni naj tzet chiocnico yu yuninal, maẍtaj yuninal naj tu' chiak'ni tzet chiocnico yu.
Haninti'an, hinaninan inc'aytzenilojan sunil tzet ayinan yeb innimanilti'an yu isc'ulalo teyin̈. Yaja' chiwilan, hayet ec'balto chiwaco wanmahan teyin̈, walex xin ip heyinilo heyanma win̈an.

Yaja' waxan̈ca ay ebnaj yohtaj ta machi hunelo ti' waco inbahan heyijatzo yin̈ tzet chiocnico wuhan, yaja' chal ebnaj tato yu inhelanilan yin̈ istx'ojal yuxin quexwak' subchahojan ink'annihan tzet ye tu' teyet.
¿Tom quexwak' subchahojan yu ebnaj juẍtaj watojan yu isto quexyilnoj?

Ink'anan tet naj Tito tato chito naj quexyila' yeb hunxa naj juẍta to yinta naj. ¿Tom quexyak' subchaho naj Tito tu'? ¡Machoj! Wal xin haca' innabalan yeb isc'ulch'anil inc'ulan, hac tu' yute isba naj texol.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay juhan̈, ham hetxumni tato lan̈an cocolni cobahan̈ yin̈ hesat yet chijalnihan̈ huntek'an ti', ¡machoj! Wal xin yet Comam Cristo jehan̈ yuxin chon̈tzotelan̈ yin̈ ist'in̈anil sata Comam yun̈e hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam Dios.

Chinxiwan c'uxantaxca mach lan̈ano hewatx'en haca' chiwochehan yet chinapnihan ilwal teyin̈, yebpaxo ta mach chischah hewi' yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan. Chinxiwpaxojan wapnihan c'uxantaxca aytoco howal texol, maca ta chi-to-chiwa hec'ul teyin̈ hununex, maca ta ayco chichonc'ulal texol, maca ta ayex lan̈an heyinican̈ heba, maca ayex cheyal tx'oj tzoti' yin̈ hunu ebnaj juẍtaj, maca tato ayex halo k'umal cheyu, maca ta ayex chelolo'n̈e heba, maca ta ayex lan̈an hewatx'en tzet ye tu' mach toholoj.

Yet chinapnihan quexwila'an hunelxa, c'uxantaxca chintx'ixwican̈an sata Comam Dios, cat wocan ok'o teyin̈, hex maẍtic'a chebejcano heyanico hemul, heyixli maca hewinajli, yeb huntek'an istx'ojal k'aynajextic'a hewatx'eni.
Wal xin yin̈xa yoxel chintohan quexwila'an. Hayet chinapnitu'an tzijxan̈e tzet mulehal chioc lahti' yin̈, yaja' yilal yin̈ sat cawan̈ maca oxwan̈o testigo chicowatx'e.

Hayet inbeycanic'ojan quexwilnojan yin̈ iscayel ay huntek'an tzet intak'ecanojan teyet, yaja' chiwalpaxtojan hunelxa, waxan̈ca machijinan texol bey tu' yet chiwalnihan hune' ti' tet mac xayaco ismul yet yalan̈to tu', yeb xin teyet hesunil. Hayet chinapnihan quexwilnotu'an xin mach chiwak' nimanc'ulalan teyin̈.
Hac tu' chu heyohtan̈eliloj tato ha' Comam Cristo chiak'ni wipan intzotelan. Comam Cristo mach tz'ono yak'ni Comam texol, walxinto caw chisyelo yip Comam texol.

Haca' hunu mac machi yip, hac tu' yu yalaxcan̈ Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus, yaja' itzitz Comam tinan̈ yu yip Comam Dios. Hac tu' xin jehan̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈, tz'on chijute cobahan̈, yu hunxa jehan̈ yeb Comam, yaja' yu yip Comam yuxin itzitzon̈an̈ yeb yu comunlahan̈ texol.
Txumwelo hununex tato caw yeli ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Txumwepaxiloj tato lan̈an hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam, mato ton̈e chebalico heba yuninalo Comam Dios.
Yaja' chijochehan̈ ta cheyohtan̈eloj tato c'ul con̈elicojan̈ yet con̈heyilwenan̈, hac tu' chu isyenilo isba tato yetxa Comam Jesucristo jehan̈.
Caw chintxahlihan teyin̈ tet Comam Dios yun̈e hewatx'en isc'ulal, maẍtaj yu cocanan̈ c'ulal yul hesat, machoj, waxan̈ca xin mach c'ulo con̈elicojan̈ yet con̈heyilwenan̈ haca' yallaxi.
Yuto mach chisje cowatx'enan̈ istx'ojal yin̈ hune' cuybanile caw yel chal ti', wal xin ha' jetan̈ caw ayon̈icojan̈ colwal yin̈.
Yuxin chon̈tzalahan̈ yet machi jipan̈, walex xin caw ay heyip, yuxin caw chicolahicojan̈ cotxahlihan̈ teyin̈, yun̈e caw tz'ajan chexelcanico yin̈ yet Comam.

Chiwatojan hune' incartati'an teyet yalan̈to maẍto chintohan quexwila'an, haxinwal hayet chinapnitu'an mach yilalo chincachwahan teyin̈ yu wipan ak'bil yu Comam. Mach yuho quexwetanan yuxin ak'bil wiptu'an, walxinto yun̈e hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam.

Wal tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, ayojabico tzalahilal yul heyanma. Caw watx'eweco henabal yin̈ ist'in̈anil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Iptzewe heba hununex yin̈ yet Comam. Hunxan̈ehojab henabal. Ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol. Ha'ojab Comam caw xahan ayon̈ yu yeb chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal yul janma chioc heyetbihoj.
K'ambewej hanic' heye hununex, ha' xin chiyeniloj tato xahan cheyil heba.
Chi-xin-isk'ambeto ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey ti' hanic' heye bey tu'.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet, yeb xin chexxahann̈e Comam Dios, yeb ha'ojab Comam Esp'iritu Santo chioc heyetbihoj.

Hanin Pablo inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan. Mach anmaho chejn̈einan yeb ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an, to ha' Comam Jesucristo yeb xin Comam Dios Mame, Comam ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom.
Ha' hun ebnaj juẍta ayc'o inc'atan̈an chitz'ibn̈ento hune' carta ti' wintajan teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Galacia.
Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet.
Yaco isba Comam Jesucristo yin̈ camical yu comul, yun̈e con̈iscolni tet istx'ojal hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuto hac tu' yoche isc'ul Comam Dios Mame.
Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!
Caw chic'ay inc'ulan yuto pet heyilo heba yin̈ Comam Dios, Comam quexawten yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo, heyoc tzujno yinta hune'xa cuybanile nan chu yalni yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi.
Wal xin, matolo ay hunoxa cuybanile bay chon̈colchahi, machoj, walxinto ay mac chiak'ni etanoto henabal, chishelni cuybanile yet colbanile chiyak' Comam Jesucristo.

Yaja' xin tato ay hunuxa mac chi'ak'ni hunoxa nan cuybanilehal teyet yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi, mach lahano yeb hune' ak'bilcano teyet juan̈, caw yak'abayo Comam Dios ishowal yiban̈, waxan̈ca han̈on̈an̈, maca hunu naj 'angel ay yul satcan̈.

Wal xin xatic'a walan hune' ti' teyet, yaj chiwalpaxojan hunelxa, tato ay hunu mac chiec' halno hunuxa nan cuybanile texol yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi, mach lahano xin yeb hune' chabilxa heyu, ayojab istz'acti' Comam Dios yiban̈ hune' mac lek'ti' tu'.

Yet chiwalnitojan hune' ti', mach chiwocan yin̈ tato chitzala anma win̈an maca mach xin, walxinto ha' istzala Comam Dios win̈an ha' chinsayan, yuto ta ha' istzala anma win̈an ha' chinsayan, mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan yin̈ haca' tu'.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chiwak'canojan heyohtan̈eloj tato hune' cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan, mach anmaho ay yet.
Mach anmaho ak'n̈e wetan, yeb xin mach yin̈o hunu anma cuybililo wuhan, wal xin ha' Comam Jesucristo ak'n̈e wohtan̈elojan.
Hex ti', heyabemi yallaxi tato yet yalan̈tocanoj, yet ayintocojan yin̈ isreligi'on ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan, caw ec'ya' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios wuhan. Caw xin wak'lenan intan̈tzenilojan.
Yin̈ isreligi'on ebnaj wet con̈obtu'an, haninan caw ec'na ayincan̈an yiban̈ sunil ebnaj wet ch'iboman, yuto caw ec'na chinyijehan sunil tzet iswatx'e ebnaj jichmam.

Yaj xin, ha' sak'alil isc'ul Comam Dios quinsic'nilojan yet yalan̈to maẍto chinpitzc'ahan, quinyawtenicojan Comam munlaho yin̈ ismunil. Haxa yet yapni istiempohal haca'tic'a chal isc'ul Comam, yak'ni Comam isc'ahol wohtan̈elojan yun̈e walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile xol anma mach Israeloj. Yet hunel tu' xin, machi hunu mac tet quinbeyan ink'ambe'an.

Mach quinbeypaxic'ojan bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ink'ambe'an tet ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us babel ocna insatajan. Wal xin caw yin̈ an̈e quintohan yul ismajul tx'otx' Arabia, lahwi tu' xin inpaxtijan yul ismajul tx'otx' Damasco.
Yet lahwi oxeb habil xin, intohan wilnojan naj Pedro yul con̈ob Jerusal'en; holan̈eb tz'ayic ayinan isc'atan̈ naj bey tu'.
Yet hunel tu', machi hunuxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us wilan yin̈, cachann̈ech'an naj Jacobo, naj yuẍta Comam Jes'us.
Yin̈ sat Comam Dios chiwalan teyet tato caw yel tzet chintz'ibn̈etojan teyet ti'.
Lahwi tu' xin, intohan yulaj ismajul tx'otx' Siria yeb yul ismajul tx'otx' Cilicia.
Wal ebnaj juẍta ay yul hunun con̈ob yul ismajul Judea tu', maẍto ohtabilojinan yu ebnaj.

Isk'umalixto chiyabe ebnaj haca' ti': "Hune' naj caw chicajwa jin̈ yet yalan̈tocanoj, tinan̈ chiec' naj yala'c'o cuybanile yin̈ tzet chu janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, hune' yoche isc'ul naj istan̈tzeloj," ẍi ebnaj.
Yu hune' tu' yuxinto caw chitzala isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios wuhan.
Yin̈xa iscan̈lahon̈eb habil intohan bey Jerusal'en yeb juẍta Bernab'e, yebpaxo juẍta Tito.

Quinbeyc'ojan, yuto Comam Dios halni wetan tato chintohan. Hayet ayinan bey Jerusal'en tu', cocutxbanayo cobahan̈ yeb ebnaj chiijbali xol ebnaj juẍtaj, walnihan tet ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan xol anma mach Israeloj. Walan hune' ti' tet ebnaj yun̈e isnanilo ebnaj tato t'in̈an wehicojan, yeb xin ta mach nabn̈eho chinmunlahan.
Ha' hun juẍta Tito tzujan jintajan̈ waxan̈ca griego yic'al naj, yaja' machi hunu mac ischilba yalni tato masan chiyak' circuncidar isba naj.

Waxan̈ca xin ay huntek'an ebnaj ton̈e chal isba yuninalo Comam Dios, oc ebnaj coxolan̈ yun̈e yoc ebnaj yilno hune' cocolbanil yin̈ Comam Jesucristo; yuto yoche ebnaj chon̈meltzohan̈ hunelxa yalan̈ isya'tajil isley naj Mois'es.
Yaj xin, caw maẍtic'a nino jabetojan̈ tzet yal ebnaj yuto caw chijochehan̈ ta ayn̈etic'aco isyelal hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ti' teyin̈.

Yet walnihan sunil cuybanile tu', caw machi hunuxa ac' ak'laxcano incuyu'an yu ebnaj ijbalom tu'. Ha' tzet ye ebnaj yet yalan̈tocanoj, caw machi wocan yin̈, yuto yul sat Comam Dios caw lahanon̈n̈e cosunil.

Machi hunuxa nan cuybanile ahti yul isti' ebnaj, wal xin caw istxum ebnaj tato ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj, haca' yu yalaxico naj Pedro munlaho xol wet con̈ob Israelan.
Ha'tic'a Comam Dios ak'n̈e ishelanil naj Pedro yoc cuywal xol anma Israel, ha'tic'apaxo Comam ak'n̈e inhelanilan wocan cuywal xol anma mach Israeloj.

Yuxin juẍta Jacobo, yeb juẍta Pedro, yeb xin juẍta Juan, ayco ijbalo yin̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam, caw txumchalo yu ebnaj tato Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ weltojan walnoc'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj. Ha' hune' ti' yeniloj tato con̈ischahan̈ ebnaj yetbihoj. Yak'ni ebnaj isk'ab wetan yeb xin tet juẍta Bernab'e, caw xin chitzala isc'ul ebnaj ta chon̈munlahan̈ xol anma mach Israeloj, walpaxo ebnaj xin xol anma Israel cancano ebnaj munil.
Cachan hune' ti' yal ebnaj jetan̈, tato yilal conanitijan̈ ebnaj meba', hune' tu' nabiltic'a wuhan inwatx'enan.
Yet yapni juẍta Pedro yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia, incachan juẍta yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj juẍtaj, yuto maẍtaj istoholal chiswatx'e juẍta tu'.

Yuto yet yalan̈to maẍto chiapni huntek'an ebnaj chejbil yu juẍta Jacobo, juẍta Pedro tu' chiwa' xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios mach Israeloj. Haxa yet yapni ebnaj tu' xin, niẍtejal ishitzilo naj, ispohnilo isba naj xol ebnaj mach Israelo tu' yu xiwcan̈ naj tet ebnaj chalni ta yilal yak'lax circuncidar ebnaj mach Israeloj.
Aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta Israel oc tzujno yinta tzet isbeybaln̈e juẍta Pedro tu', hacpax tu' juẍta Bernab'e isbeybaln̈epaxo naj hune' sucal tu'.

Yuxin hayet wilnihan tato mach chisyije ebnaj haca' yalni Tzoti' yet colbanile, walnihan tet juẍta Pedro yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj cutxanico tu': "Wal hach ti' Israel hach, yaja' chachec' haca' anma mach Israeloj, yaja' tinan̈ xin ¿tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawal tet ebnaj mach Israeloj tato yilal chic'o ebnaj isbeybal anma Israel?" quinchiyan tet juẍta tu'.
Wal han̈on̈ Israel jic'al ti', mach yic'alo huntek'anxa nan con̈obal chihallax mulumal jehi.

Yaj xin johtaj tato machi hunu mac chican c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isley naj Mois'es, wal xin chican anma c'ulal, yaja' cachann̈e yu yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Hacon̈ tu' han̈on̈ ti' xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuxin xacon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, maẍtaj yu coyijen tzet chal ley. Wal xin caw machi hunu mac chican c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal isley naj Mois'es.
Tato chicosay joc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yip Comam Jesucristo, chal yelapnoj ta mulumon̈ haca' anma mach Israeloj. Yaja' ¿tom ha' Comam Jesucristo chon̈anico mulumal? ¡Machoj!
K'inalo tato chinmeltzohan wintajan, lahwi tu' cat wocan inwatx'enpaxojan sunil tzet bejbilcano wuhan yet payxa, han-caw-inan chiwaco inmulan yin̈ haca' tu'.
Wal haninti'an camnajinxalojan yin̈ ley. Ha' hune' ley tu' quinak'ni camojan yun̈e caw witzitzbilojan yin̈ Comam Dios.

Wal tinan̈, ha' yul sat Comam Dios, t'un̈aninxacan̈an yin̈ te' culus, yuxin matxatajinan itzitzinan tinan̈, haxa Comam Jesucristo itzitz win̈an. Ha' tzet chinwatx'ehan tinan̈ xin cachann̈e wanico wanmahan yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios, ha' chiwuhan. Caw isyelo Comam ta xahan ayinan yu, yuto yak' camo isba win̈an.
Mach chicoyah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios. Wal xin ta yu coyijen ley yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, caw nabn̈em cam Comam Jesucristo chal tu'.

Hex ah Galacia hex ti', caw suquex. ¿Mac ak'ni etanoto henabal yuxin mach cheyije cuybanile caw yeli? Han̈on̈ti'an̈ xajalan̈ teyet yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus haca'ojtam caw heyil iscam Comam.
Tinan̈ xin, han̈c'an̈e hune' ti' chink'ambehan teyet: ¿Tom hechah Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yu heyijen isley naj Mois'es, mato yu heyayto hune' cuybanile yet colbanile yul heyanma?
¿Tom caw huneln̈e machi hewi'? Hayet heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ha' oc heyetbihoj. Haxa tinan̈ xin ¿tom cheyoche chetz'ajba hecolbanil yu tzet chewatx'e cheyute heyalni?
Caw tzetc'a isya'tajil heyil yu ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, yaja' etza caw nabn̈e. Hantam sak'al ta mach nabn̈eho heyil isya'tajil tu'.

Yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet, isyenipaxo c'aybalc'ule coxol. Yaja' ¿tzet yu cheyabeco ti'? Mach yuho coyijen isley naj Mois'es; walxinto yu janico janma yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ak'bil jet.
Haca' icham Abraham, yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxinto oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam.
Yuxin tinan̈ yilal heyohtan̈encanilo mac yeli titna yin̈ yuninal icham Abraham, to han̈c'an̈e mac chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios.

Yet payat tiempo tu', tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios tato ebnaj mach Israeloj chican ebnaj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yuto chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam. Yuxinto halbilcano hune' tzoti' ti' tet icham Abraham, bay chala: "Hawu yuxinto caw sunil anma yulajla con̈ob bay chiwak'an isc'ulal inc'ulan," ẍiayoj.
Yuxin macn̈etic'a chichahnayto Istzoti' Comam yul yanma, ha' hun chichahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yinta icham Abraham, yuto ha' icham babel chahnayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam.

Sunil huntek'an anma ayco yanma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es, chitit ishowal Comam Dios yin̈, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala: "Chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ huntek'an anma mach chik'oji isyijen sunil ley tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam," ẍiayoj.

Yuxinto haban cotxumni tato machi huno anma chicancano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal ley, yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti': "Ha' mac xacan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, yin̈n̈e Comam ayco yanma, yuxin ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal," ẍiayoj.

Wal isley naj Mois'es tu', matzet chala tato yilal cochahnayto yul janma yin̈ cat cochahni cok'inal mach istan̈bal. To ha' coyijeni ha' chischilba yalni jet, yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti': "Macn̈etic'a chiyijen sunil tzet chal ley, ay isk'inal," ẍiayoj.

Yaja' xin Comam Jesucristo coln̈ehon̈ilo yalan̈ isya'tajil hune' ley tu', yanico isba Comam yalan̈ isya'tajil coseleloj. Yuxinto chal yul Yum Comam Dios: "Caw tz'acti'n̈ebil mac chiah locno yin̈ hunu te' culus," ẍiayoj.

Hac tu' xin yak'le Comam Jesucristo yun̈e sunil anma mach Israeloj chichahnipaxo isc'ulal isc'ul Comam, hune' haltebil tet icham Abraham. Hac tu' xin cosunil chicochah Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, hune' haltebilcano yu Comam.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, chiwacojan hune' yechel ti' teyet. Haca' yet ay hunu mac chiwatx'en huno istrato, chaco isbi yin̈ yumal hune' trato tu', hac tu' xin caw t'in̈an chucanoj. Caw matxa hunuxa mac chiyu yetantoj, yeb xin machi hunu mac chiyu yanipaxico yak'bil.

Hac tu' yu iswatx'encano Comam Dios hune' istrato tet jichmam Abraham yeb tet isc'ahol. Mach chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Tet sunil hac'ahol," mach ẍioj. Wal xin caw mach tx'i'alo yute yalni, ha' yute yallaxcano tet icham Abraham tu' tato hune'n̈e, chalni haca' ti': "Hac'ahol," ẍicanoj. Hune' tu' yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chitzoteli.

Ha' chal yelapno hune' chiwalti'an, to iswatx'e Comam Dios istrato yeb icham Abraham, caw xin t'in̈an yutecano Comam. Cuatro ciento treinta habilxa iswatx'encano Comam hune' istrato tu' yul isley naj Mois'es, yuxin caw mach chu istan̈tzenilo isley naj Mois'es tu' tzet haltebilcano yu Comam, yeb xin mach chu yinilo yip.
Yaj tato yu coyijen ley, yuxinto yak' Comam Dios hune' haltebil jet, caw machim chiyu jalni tato matanil ye hune' tu'. Wal xin haltebil tet icham Abraham yu Comam yin̈ yak'nicano ismatanoj.

Yuxin ¿tzet chiocnico isley naj Mois'es chal tu'? Wal xin caw tzujanxa ak'lax hune' ley tu' yun̈e isyeniloj tato mach yijemo anma. Ak'lax hune' ley tu' masanto yet ispitzc'a hune' mac titna yin̈ yuninal icham Abraham, hune' mac ay yet ischahni tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios. Hune' ley tu', 'angel ebnaj ak'n̈e tet naj Mois'es yun̈e yalnilto naj tet con̈ob Israel.
Yaja' matxa yilalo ay hunuxa mac chioc xolbal, yuto hune'xan̈e mac yak'cano istrato, ha' ton Comam Dios.

¿Tom xin caw chicajwa isley naj Mois'es yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios chal tu'? ¡Machoj! K'inalo tato chik'oji ley tu' yak'ni cok'inal, ¿chimyu joc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu coyijen tzet chal ley? Wal xin machoj.
Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': "Caw sunil mac ayicto yalan̈ mule, yuxin macta chiyaco yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo chischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios," ẍiayoj.
Yet yalan̈to maẍto chihul hune' mac bay wal janico janma, caw yalan̈ yip ley ayon̈ictoj, yet ayon̈ico jechman isyelax mac bay chijaco janma.

Yuxin ha' hune' ley tu' jilomaln̈e yehi, haca' chu yilni hunu naj chejab hunu nich'an unin, hac tu' con̈isbeytzenti ley tu' isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo, yun̈e janico janma yin̈ Comam, cat xin joccano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios.
Yaj xin xajaco janma yin̈ Comam tinan̈, yuxin matxa ayon̈oco yul isk'ab hune' ley chi-tic'a-con̈ijbani.
Yu xaheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, yuxinto yuninalxa Comam Dios heye tinan̈.
Hayet yahcano ha' hewi' hehunicanico yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, haxa Comam ayco haca' xilk'apehal teyin̈.
Caw xin machi yoc yin̈ tato Israel maca mach Israeloj. Caw matxa yoc yin̈ ta winaj maca ix, yuto caw hunxan̈e je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin tato ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, caw haca' yuninal icham Abraham jehi, ha' hunon̈ chicochah tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios tet icham Abraham tu'.

Ay hunxa yechel chiwalan teyet. K'inalo hunu nich'an unin chischah ismajul tet ismam, caw yahawil chuco yin̈ tzet ay ismam tu', yaj xin yet nich'anto caw maẍto yip yin̈ tzet chiak'lax ismajulo tu', to haca' to chejab yehi.
Yet nich'anto ay mac chitan̈eni, yeb xin ilbiltopaxo hune' ismajul tu' masanto yet ch'apni istiempohal bay halbilcano yu ismam, cat yoccano yahawo yin̈ ismajul tu'.
Caw xin hac tu' je han̈on̈ ti'; yet yalan̈tocanoj ayon̈ayo yalan̈ yip sunil tzet chal anma.
Haxa yet yijni isba yapni istiempohal xin, yaniti Comam Dios Isc'ahol, pitzc'ana yin̈ hune' ix ix yalan̈ yip isley naj Mois'es.
Hul Comam yun̈e con̈yinilo yalan̈ ley, yeb yun̈e con̈ischahni Comam Dios yuninaloj.

Yun̈e isyenilo Comam tato caw yuninalxa Comam jehi, yuxin yati Comam Yesp'iritu Isc'ahol yul janma. Yu Yesp'iritu Comam tu' yuxinto chijal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil janma haca' ti': "Mam," con̈chi, yin̈ caw sunil coc'ul.
Wal tinan̈ xin, matxa chejabo jehi, to caw yuninalxa Comam jehi. Yu hune' tu' xin, caw el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios yak'ni hune' comatan, yaj yu Comam Jesucristo, Isc'ahol Comam tu'.
Yet yalan̈to tu' yet maẍto cheyohtan̈elo Comam Dios, caw chejab heyehico tet huntek'an chal anma diosalil. Wal xin, caw mach dioso huntek'an tu'.

Tinan̈ xin, heyohtaxa Comam Dios sic'lebil, chiwalpaxojan teyet tato caw ohtabilexxapaxo yu Comam. ¿Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chexmeltzopaxto yin̈ huntek'anxa nan cuybanilehal caw mach t'in̈ano yehicoj, cat heyocpaxo ischejabo hunelxa?
Walex hex ti', cheyije k'in̈ chiec'tzelax yin̈ isbi tz'ayic, yeb yin̈ isbi ixahaw, yeb yet chishelni isba tiempo, yeb k'in̈ chiec'tzelax yin̈ hunun habil.
¡Caw chioc yin̈ inc'ulan yet chinnanitijan, wak'a tato caw nabn̈e quinmunlahan texol!

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, caw chiwalan teyet, lahanojab cheyute henabal haca' innabalan, yuto yet wec'an texol wute innabalan haca' hex. Wal xin matolo yu ay hunu istx'ojal heyute win̈an yuxin hac tu' walnitojan teyet, machoj.
Wal xin caw heyohtaxa ta hayet babelal, yet walnic'ojan cuybanile yet colbanile teyet caw ya'ayinan yu hune' yabil.

Ha' hune' yabil tu', caw ilwebal teyin̈, yaja' mach quinhehinc'uln̈ehan, mach xin quinheman̈c'otojan yu hune' yabil tu'. Wal xin caw haca' hunu ischejab Comam Dios satcan̈, hac tu' yu quinhechahnihan, yeb haca' caw Comam Jesucristo.
¿Tzet yin̈ yuxin matxa hune' tzalahilal tu' yul heyanma tinan̈? Chiwalan hune' isc'ulal ti' teyin̈, hex ti' caw heyoche heyilti isbak' hesat heyak'ni wetan yu isc'ulch'anil hec'ul win̈an.
Wal tinan̈ xin, ¿tom ayco inhowalan teyin̈ yet chiwalnitojan isyelal ti' teyet?
Ha' huntek'an anma chexmonten tu', caw ayco yanma ebnaj teyin̈, yaja' xin caw mach c'ulo nabil teyin̈ yu ebnaj. Ton̈e choche ebnaj quexyik'alo coxolan̈ yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈ ebnaj.

Caw c'ul janico anma yin̈ coc'ul, yaja' tan̈e c'ul chiconaco yin̈, yeb tato istoholal nabil ju. Aytam sak'al ta hac tu' chinheyutehan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, maẍn̈etaj yet ayinan tec'atan̈ chinheyanicojan yin̈ hec'ul.

Hex ti' caw haca' wuninalan heyehi, lan̈an yec'ya' wanmahan hunelxa heyu, haca' hunu ix ix chiaben isya'il yet chiwatx'i isc'ul. Yaj mach chisbej wabenan hune' isya'tajil ti' masanto chiwatx'icanico Comam Jesucristo teyin̈.
