Ta cheyije haca' tu', c'ul istzotel anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam teyin̈, yeb mach ya'tajo chi'ec' heyu.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijochehan̈ tato cheyohtan̈elo tzet chiyak'le anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xalecamtoj, haxinwal mach cheyik' bisc'ulal, haca' anma machi bay chicawxi isc'ul.

Haca'tic'a janayto yul janma tato cam Comam Jesucristo, yitzitzbipaxocan̈ xol camom hunelxa, hactic'apax tu' janayto yul janma tato macta ayxaco yul isk'ab yet iscami chati Comam Dios yinta Comam Jesucristo yet chul Comam hunelxa.
Yuxinto chijalan̈ hune' cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo ti' teyet, tato han̈on̈ itzitzon̈ yet chul Comam hunelxa, mach chon̈babito sata anma xalecamtoj.

Yuto hayet ch'awi Comam Jes'us yet chak'ni chejbanile, cat yel yaw naj arc'angel, cat yok' istrompeta Comam Dios, cat istit Comam yul satcan̈; ha' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yet iscami ha' chiitzitzbican̈ babel.
Wal han̈on̈ ayon̈toc'o xin, chon̈ilaxcan̈ yeb anma tu', cat jah xol moyan cochahno Comam xol jak'ek'. Hac tu' chu japni isc'atan̈ Comam yin̈ huneln̈e.
Yuxinto iptzewe heba hununex yu hune' cuybanile ti'.
Wal yin̈ tzet tiempohal yeb tzet orahil chiyu hune' tu', hex wuẍtaj hex wanab mach yilalo walnitojan teyet.
Hex ti' heyohtaxa yin̈ tzet chu yul Comam, lahan haca' yet chihul lemna hunu naj elk'om yet ak'balil, yet tona nahul ay anma, hac tu' xin chiyu yul Comam.

Yuxin hayet chiyalni anma haca' ti': "Wal tinan̈ ak'anc'ulal xaye sunil," ẍi. Ha' ton tu' yet chihul lemna c'ayilal yiban̈ anma, haca' yet chiichiti isya'il isc'ul hunu ix ix, hac tu' chiyak'le anma, matxa chiyu iscolni isba.
Yaj wal hex ti' wuẍtaj wanab, matxa ayexoco xol k'ejholo, yuxin mach tona nahul ayex yet chihul lemna Comam, haca' anma tona nahul aya yet chihul lemna naj elk'om yin̈.
Walex ti', yetxa issajilk'inal heyehi, haca' mac chiec' tz'ayical hac tu' heyehi, yuxin matxa yeto ak'bal yeb k'ejholo heyehi.
Yuxin machojab ayoco cowayan̈ haca' huntek'an anma tu'. Wal xin majwahojon̈we yin̈ yulbal Comam, helanojab chijute coba.
Johtaj ta yet ak'balil chiway anma, yebpaxo ak'balil chiuq'ui anma.

Walon̈paxo han̈on̈ ti' yeton̈xa issajilk'inal, yuxin toholojab chijute conabal. Yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam, yebpaxo xahanojab chijil coba cosunil. Ta hac tu' chijute lahanon̈ haca' ebnaj soldado chiscol isba yu ch'en ch'en pichbilico yin̈ istxam isc'ul. Haca'ojab yehato ch'en c'owi'e yin̈ iswi' ebnaj soldado yu iscolni isba, hacojab tu' iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ cocolbanil.
Maẍtaj yu yaniti Comam Dios ishowal jiban̈ yuxinto con̈issiq'uiloj, walxinto yu cochahni hune' cocolbanil tet Comam Jesucristo.
Yuto Comam Jesucristo cam coseleloj, yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzon̈ maca camomon̈xa yet chihul Comam, hunxan̈e chijucano yeb Comam cosunil.
Yuxin iptzewe heba hununex, cat helin̈ban heba, haca'tic'a lan̈an heyuten tu'.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijaltojan̈ teyet tato yilal heyijen tzet chal ebnaj chimunla texol bey tu', ebnaj chexijban yin̈ yet Comam, yeb chiak'ni hecuybanil.
Nimanojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat, xahanojab cheyil ebnaj, yuto yin̈ yet Comam chimunla ebnaj. Ehan̈we yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, machojab howal texol hununex.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijalpaxtojan̈ teyet tato checach mac mach chisje isc'ul chimunlahi. Iptzewe mac etza chipax yintaj, colwahan̈wepaxo yin̈ mac machi yip yanma yin̈ Comam. Ayojab henimanc'ulal teyin̈ hesunil.
Cam cheyil heba, tajca chepajtze tet macta chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈, wal xin ha' heyet aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal teyin̈ hununex, yaj maẍn̈etaj teyin̈, to yin̈paxo sunil anma.
Tzalahilalojabn̈etic'a heye hunun tz'ayic.
Txahlan̈we tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil, yuto hac tu' choche Comam teyin̈, yuto ayxaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Mach cheyilo yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul heyanma.
Mach cheyah chejbanile chitit tet Comam Dios chiyal ebnaj ischejab Comam.
Caw ocan̈we hetxumu' sunil tzet chihallaxi, cat xin hec'ubancano yul heyanma baytet c'ul.
Pohwelo heba yin̈ sunil istx'ojal.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal, ha' chexpohnicanilo xol istx'ojal, cat isc'uban heyanma, henabal yeb henimanil, yet chul Comam Jesucristo.
Comam con̈awteni, caw tohol Comam, masan chiyij isba sunil ti' yu Comam.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, txahlan̈wepaxo jin̈an̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈.
Halwe tet sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil yin̈ caw tzalahilal, yuto yetxa Comam yehi.
Ha' Comam ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an, yuxin chiwaltojan teyet tato cheyawte hune' te' hum ti' xol sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yetxa Comam Dios.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul texol hesunil. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an yeb juẍta Silvano yebpaxo juẍta Timoteo chijatojan̈ hune' carta ti' teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo bey yul con̈ob Tesal'onica, hex hunxa heye yin̈ Comam Dios yeb yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yak'abayo Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal texol hesunil.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw yilal chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈, haca' caw yehi yuto hunun tz'ayic isch'ib heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yebpaxo xin caw ec'balto chexahann̈e heba hununex.

Yuxin caw chitzala janmahan̈ chijalnihan̈ hec'ulal xol hunun majan macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, yuto caw niman hec'ul, cheyanipaxico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, waxan̈ca xin caw chextzumbelaxic'oj cat heyetalaxi.
Ha' ton ti' chihalniloj tato chil Comam yin̈ caw istoholal yin̈ tzet chielico anma, cat yalni Comam teyet tato ay heyoc yin̈ bay chioc Comam yahawiloj, yuto lan̈an heyetan heyanma tinan̈.
Wal xin caw ha' istoholal chiswatx'e Comam Dios, yuxin yilal yanayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ huntek'an anma chiak'ni ec'oya' heyanma.

Hex lan̈an heyaben isya'tajil tinan̈, chexyik'alo Comam Dios xol isya'tajil tu' jintajan̈ yet chitit Comam Jesucristo yul satcan̈ yeb ebnaj 'angel caw aycano yip. Chul Comam xol k'a k'a' yak'a' isya'tajil tet anma mach chisje yohtan̈elo Comam Dios, anma mach chiyoche yabe' istzoti'al colbanile aycano yu Comam Jesucristo.
Chialaxcanto anma tu' yin̈ isya'tajil yin̈ huneln̈e, cat yilaxilo sata Comam Dios, hac tu' xin matxa bak'inal chiyil anma tu' isc'ulal Comam yeb yip Comam.

Hayet hune' tz'ayical yet chihul Comam tu', caw niman yelapno ye Comam yul sat macta yetxa Comam yehi, yeb mac xayayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam. Xol mac tu' xin ayexico hex ti', yuto heyaco heyanma yin̈ hune' tzoti' halbilcano juhan̈.

Yuxinto caw chon̈txahlihan̈ teyin̈, chicok'annihan̈ tet Comam Dios haxinwal caw c'ulex yul sat, ay heyoc yin̈ yawtebal Comam. Chijalnipaxojan̈ ta chak' Comam yip teyet hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal choche hec'ul, yeb yin̈ munil chewatx'e tet Comam, yuto ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam.
Hac tu' xin chialaxico ismay Comam Jesucristo heyu. Chialaxpaxico hewinajil yu isc'ulal Comam Dios yeb xin Comam Jesucristo.
Tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chijaltojan̈ heyabe' tzet chu yul Comam Jesucristo, yeb yet chon̈iscutxbanicoj.

Chiwaltojan teyet machojab subutajo hexiwcan̈, yeb henani hunuxa tzet ye tu' ta chihallax teyet tato istiempohalxa yulbal Comam Jesucristo. Waxan̈ca chihallax teyet ta ay tzet illax yin̈ haca' wayique, maca hunuxa tzoti', maca hunu carta chiapni teyet hacojtam han̈on̈an̈ chijatojan̈ chihalni tato ayxayo istz'ayical yulbal Comam Jesucristo.

Mach cheyak' subchaho heba, yuto yet yalan̈ato maẍto chihul Comam, ay hune' tiempohal bay tzetc'a mac chipaq'uico yin̈ Comam Dios, cat isyenican̈ isba hune' naj yahawil istx'ojal. Ha' hune' naj tu' yilal yalaxto naj yin̈ isya'tajil xol k'a k'a'.

Ha' ton hune' naj tu' chiyican̈ isba cat yoc naj howal yin̈ huntek'an chihallax diosal, maca huntek'an bay chiyiyo isba anma. Chanic'to isba naj yul yatut Comam Dios cat yalni naj tato ha' naj caw dioscanoj.
¿Tom matxa chitit hune' ti' yul hec'ul xin? Caw walan teyet yet ayinan texol.
Yaja' heyohta mac chioc majno sata naj yun̈e mach chihul naj yalan̈to istiempohal bay halbilcano yu Comam Dios.
Wal xin, chimunla naj yahawil istx'ojal yin̈ ewantajil xol anma tinan̈, cachanxan̈e xin chechma naj yilaxilo hune' mac mach chichahniti naj, cat yul lemna naj.
Ha' to tu' xin chisyecan̈ isba naj yahawil istx'ojal tu', yaja' hayet chihul Comam Jesucristo yeb isk'ak'al yip cat isxuno camo Comam naj yahawil istx'ojal tu'.

Naj Yahawil Istx'ojal tu', ha' yip naj matzwalil ayco yin̈ naj. Can̈ chute isba naj, caw ay tzet chi-la-iswatx'e naj, chic'ay isc'ul anma yilni. Chisyenipaxo naj huntek'an c'aybalc'ule yun̈e issubcha anma yu naj.

Sunil yip ej istx'ojal chimunla yu naj yahawil istx'ojal tu', yun̈e yak'ni subchaho naj anma cat cam yetanto isba, cat istocano yin̈ isya'tajil. Yuto huntek'an anma tu' matxatic'a choche isc'ul ischab isyelal tzet chal Comam Dios, yuxin mach chischah iscolbanil tet Comam.
Yu mach chischah anma isyelal Comam Dios, yuxin ton̈e chil Comam chiak'lax somchahoto isnabal cat yanito isba xol huntek'an lek'ti'al tu'.
Hac tu' chub iscawxico ismul anma tu' yiban̈ yu machi yayto Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma, yu ec'na chocheto sunil istx'ojal.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw xahan ayex yu Comam Jesucristo. Yilal jak'nihan̈ yuch'andiosal teyin̈, yuto yet yalan̈tocanoj quexissic'nilo Comam yun̈e hecolchacano yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo, Comam quexpohnicanilo yeto Comam Dios, yeb yu heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ isyelal.
Yu hune' tu' yuxin quexyawte Comam, yu istzoti'al colbanile con̈ec'an̈ jala'c'ojan̈ teyet yuxin ay heyoc yin̈ issak'alil ayco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, toholojab cheyute heba yin̈ Comam, mach chec'ayto cuybanile halbilcano teyet juhan̈ yeb cuybanile jatojan̈ teyet yul carta.
Caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam Jesucristo, yeb yu Comam Dios Mame, ha' chiak'ni yak'lobal janma yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Chak'nipaxo hune' isc'ulch'anil jet bay chicawxi coc'ul.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni yip heyanma cat quexislin̈bani, haxinwal c'ul tzet chewatx'e yul sat Comam yeb tzet cheyala.

Wal tinan̈, hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, txahlan̈we jin̈an̈, haxinwal yin̈ an̈e chiapni Istzoti' Comam Dios sunil baytajtu'wal, yeb yun̈e istzala isc'ul anma ischahnicanoj, haca' yu istzala hec'ul yet heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam.
Txahlan̈wepaxo yu con̈iscolnilojan̈ Comam Dios yul isk'ab anma machiswalil yeb tx'oj isnabal, yuto mach sunilo anma chichahnayto Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma.
Wal Comam Dios chij isba sunil tzet chala, ha' Comam chexiptzeni, cat quexiscolni yul isk'ab istx'ojal.
Chicawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios tato ayexico heyijen sunil tzet chijalan̈ teyet, yeb ta caw chelahico heyijeni.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chicolwa teyin̈, haxinwal cheyohtan̈e ta xahan ayex yu Comam Dios, cat xin istecha sunil isya'tajil heyu yu yip Comam Jesucristo.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, yin̈ isbi Cocolomal Jesucristo chijaltojan̈ hune' chejbanile ti' teyet tato chepohilo heba yin̈ ebnaj juẍta mach chisje isc'ul munlahoj, yeb mach chisyije cuybanile halbilcano teyet juhan̈.
Yuto heyohtaxatic'a tzet wal heyuni, haca' yebil teyet juhan̈. Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yet ayon̈an̈ texol machi hunu tz'ayical ti' mach con̈munlahan̈.
Heyohtaj tato mach ton̈eho con̈wa'an̈ texol, wal xin con̈munlahan̈ tz'ayical yeb ak'balil yun̈e matzet chicok'anan̈ teyet.
Waxan̈ca xin ay jipan̈ cok'annihan̈ tzet chicolohan̈ teyet, yaj con̈munlahan̈ yun̈e coyenicanojan̈ tato hac tu' cheyutepaxoj.
Yet ayon̈an̈ texol tu', chijalnihan̈ hune' cuybanile ti': "Mac mach chisje isc'ul chimunlahi, machojab chiwa'paxoj," con̈chiyan̈.
Yaj xin xajabepaxojan̈ tato ay mac texol tu' ton̈e chieq'ui, mach chimunlahi; ton̈e chilo istiempo anma.
Ha' tet huntek'an anma tu' chijaltojan̈ yu yip Comam Jesucristo tato munlahojab yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, haxinwal ha' caw chiik'ni tzet chislo.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, machojab chexsiquilo hewatx'en isc'ulal.
Tato ay mac mach chiyijen tzet chijaltojan̈ yul hune' hum ti', ton̈eojab cheyila maca matxa xin chehunba heba yebi haxinwal chitx'ixwican̈.
Yaj xin mach cheyaco hehowal yin̈, wal xin cuywe yin̈ istoholal, yuto juẍtapaxo yehi.
Ha'ojab Comam yahawil ak'anc'ulal chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal teyet hesunil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Tzalahojab hec'ul, waxan̈ca ay bisc'ulal chiay texol. Ayojabn̈etic'aco Comam heyetbiho hesunil.
Wal hanin Pablo inti'an, han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan tato cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil. Inbihan chioc yin̈ hune' hum ti' haca' chu intz'ibn̈entojan sunilej incartahan.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil teyet hesunil. ¡Hacojab tu'!
Hanin Pablo inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan. Ak'bil inmunilan yu Comam Dios Cocolomal, yeb yu Comam Jesucristo, Comam ayco yipo janma.

Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet hach Timoteo. Inc'aholan hawe yin̈ Comam, yuto wuhan yuxinto hachayto isyelal yul hawanma. Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb Jahawil Jesucristo isc'ulal yeb issak'alil isc'ul yeb xin ak'anc'ulal tawet.
Yet inbeyan yul ismajul Macedonia, caw ink'anan tawet tato chaẍcancano yul con̈ob Efeso yun̈e hacachni ebnaj chi'ak'ni huntek'an cuybanile maẍtaj yecoj.

Machojab chischah ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yabe' ic'ti' mach istan̈bal yiban̈ilo ebnaj jichmam. Huntek'an tu', caw comon tzoti' yec'baln̈e tiempo yehi, mach chicolwa jin̈ yin̈ coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, yeb janico janma yin̈ Comam.
Ha' tzet yelapno chejbanile chiwaltoti'an, ha' coxahann̈en coba. Hune' coxahann̈en coba chitit yul janma caw saj, yeb machi nich'ano istx'ojal nabil yu.
Wal xin, ay mac texol tu' xayilo isba yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal tu', haxa yin̈ huntek'an issucal bay chaco isnabal.
Choche ebnaj ch'oc ebnaj cuywawomal yin̈ cuybanile aycano yu naj Mois'es, yaj mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet chala, yebpaxo yin̈ tzet chak' ebnaj iscuyu' anma, caw xin chischilba ebnaj yalni.
Johtaj tato c'ul cuybanile aycano yu naj Mois'es, yaja' ta haca' tzet choche Comam Dios yin̈, ha' chijic'oj.

Txumweloj tato mach ak'lax chejbanile yu naj Mois'es yu iscachwa yin̈ anma c'ul chute isba; walxinto yu iscachwa yin̈ anma man̈c'om yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, yeb mach caw yijemoj, yeb huntek'an machi Dios yul sat, caw mulumpaxoj, huntek'an anma machiswalil yanma, huntek'an chiyahni sunil tzet chitit bay ay Comam Dios, huntek'an chipotx'ni ismam maca ismi', yeb sunil huntek'an anma mak'om.

Chicachwapaxo yin̈ macta ixlom yeb macta winajlom, yeb huntek'an ebnaj cheta isba yeb yet winajil, yeb mac chi'elk'anto yet anmahil, yeb xin mac lek'ti', yeb huntek'an ton̈etic'a chawte isbi Comam Dios xol sucal tzoti' chi-la-yala, hac pax tu' xin sunil huntek'an anma chicajni cuybanile caw yel chala.
Ha' hune' cuybanile caw yel chala, ha' ton Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile caw sak'alcanoj. Hune' yak'cano Comam Dios wetan yun̈e walnic'ojan xol anma; caw niman yelapno Comam Dios.
Chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil, yuto yak' Comam wipan, yu yijeminan chil Comam, yuxinto quinyacojan Comam yin̈ ismunil,

waxan̈ca xin walan tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj, yeb caw caj wilan Comam, yeb inbahan Comam. Yaj xin caw tz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an yuto mach wohtajojan tato machiswalil huntek'an inwatx'e'tu'an, yeb xin maẍto chinchahan Comam Jesucristo yul wanmahan.
Yak'ni Comam sunil isc'ulch'anil isc'ul wetan, yeb wanaytojan yul wanmahan yin̈ Comam, yak'nipaxo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul wetan haca' hune' chak' Comam tet mac hunxa ye yeb Comam Jesucristo.

Hune' chiwalti'an caw yelcanoj. Sunil anma yilal yanayto yul yanma tato hulic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e iscolnicanilo sunil anma mulum. Xol sunil huntek'an anma mulum tu', haninti'an ec'bal mulum inan.

Yuxin tz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an. Hac tu' xin, win̈an isyelo Comam Jesucristo sunil isnimanc'ulal chiyak' tet anma mulum. Yuxinto haninan ayinicojan yechelo sunil anma chichahnayto Comam Jesucristo yul yanma yun̈e ischahnicano k'inale mach istan̈bal.

Yuxin nimanojab yelapno Comam yul cosat, jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Comam tu' machi bak'inal chicamiloj, yahawn̈etic'a yehico sunilbal tiempo mach chijil yin̈ Comam yu cosat, ha'n̈e caw Dios. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hach Timoteo, inc'aholan yin̈ Comam. Chiwaltojan hune' hachejbanil ti', tato chawihti hawanma tawin̈, hapahnito istx'ojal haca' hunu naj soldado mach chixiw yak'ni howal. Hac tu' chawute haba, c'ulojabn̈etic'a hanabal haca' yalni huntek'an ebnaj tawin̈; Comam Esp'iritu ak'ni yala' ebnaj. Aypaxo huntek'anxa ebnaj yu mach c'ulo chiec' yin̈ isnabal yuxinto yilo yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Hac tu' yute isba naj Himeneo yeb naj Alejandro; yuxin wacojan ebnaj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil yun̈e yilni ebnaj tato mach chu jalni tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios.

Wal tinan̈, ha' huntek'an ti' chintak'etojan teyet, tato chek'an tet Comam Dios sunil tzet chi-la-ocnico heyu. Yilal hek'anni tet Comam, cat heyanico sunil tzet cheyoche yul isk'ab Comam, cat heyak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam yin̈ sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Yilal cotxahli tet Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj ayco jahawil, haxinwal mach isya'tajil chihul coxol cat jec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal; haxinwal chu janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios cat yec' yin̈ istoholal.
Huntek'an cotxah tu' caw c'ul, yeb caw sak'al yul sat Comam Dios, Cocolomal.
Chiyoche Comam Dios tato sunil anma chicolchahi, cat yohtan̈enilo isyelal.
Yuto hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios aya, yebpaxo hune'n̈ech'an mac chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo, Comam oc anmahil.
Yaco isba Comam Jesucristo yul isk'ab camical yun̈e istohlan ismul sunil anma. Hune' ti' isyelo isba yet yapni istiempohal.

Yuxinto ak'lax inmunilan wocan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo yun̈e inpujbanic'ojan hune' tu', cat incuynicantojan anma mach Israeloj yin̈ isyelal, yeb yin̈ janico janma yin̈ Comam. Hune' chiwalti'an mach lek'ti'aloj, to caw yeli.

Yuxinto chiwochehan tato chitxahli ebnaj juẍta ay yul hunun con̈ob. Sajojab yanma ebnaj juẍtaj yet chiyahnican̈ isk'ab yet chitxahli. Machojab chichiwa isc'ul, machojabpaxo ishowal yin̈ hunuxa yet anmahil.

Wal ebix janab, yak'abico ebix xil isk'ap haca' caw yehi yin̈ istoholal, machojab lek'ti'o chute isba ebix yanico xil isk'ap. Machojab lolo'o chutepaxo isba ebix yanico yelawil, haca' ch'en oro maca ch'en perla, maca xilk'ape caw aycan̈ istohol.
Machojab haco' tu' chute isba ebix, walxinto ha' isc'ulal ha' chissay ebix iswatx'e', yuto ayxaco ebix yul isk'ab Comam Dios.
Ton̈eojab tucan ebix yaben cuybanile, yijemojab xin chute isba ebix.
Mach chisje inc'ulan tato chicuywa ebix ix xol ebnaj winaj, maca xin chipalc'onpaxo ebix yiban̈ ebnaj. Wal xin ton̈ehojab chishajba istxiquin ebix yin̈ tzet chihallaxi yet ch'ak'lax cuybanile.
Yuto babel iswatx'e Comam Dios naj Ad'an, tzujanxa iswatx'enpaxo Comam ix Eva.
Maẍtaj naj Ad'an subcha yu naj matzwalil, walxinto ha' ix Eva, yayc'ay ix yin̈ man̈c'omal tet Comam Dios.

Yaja' ebix tu', chicolcha ebix yet chilni ebix yin̈ niẍte yunin, yeb ta chaco yanma ebix yin̈ Comam, yeb ta chisxahann̈e ebix yet anmahil, yeb ta toholn̈etic'a yehico ebix yin̈ isyelal Comam Dios, yeb ta chispohilo isba ebix yin̈ istx'ojal.
Yin̈ caw yeli, ta ay hunu mac chioc ijbalomal xol yuninal Comam Dios, hune' munil tu' caw sak'alcanoj.

Yaja' ha' mac chioc ijbalomal tu', machojab nino istx'ojal sata anma, machojab chissay hunuxa ix. Toholojab chiyute isnabal yeb isbeybal, yilal yak'ni ebnaj bay chiway anma chiec' isc'atan̈. Helanojab ebnaj iscuywahi, yeb xin ayojab yelapno yul sat anma.
Machojab uc'um te'oj, machojab ak'om howal, yeb machojab ayco yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu. Wal xin c'ulch'anojab isc'ul yeb xin chewla winaj chute isba.
Yohtajojab yak'ni cuybanile yul yatut haxinwal yijem chielico yuninal, yeb xin chixiw yuninal tet.
Yaja' ta mach chu iscuyni naj yuninal yul yatut, maẍtic'am chu yocpaxo naj ilwal yin̈ mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.

Hune' naj ch'oc ijbalomal xol yuninal Comam Dios tu', machojabtaj hunu naj tolto chahn̈e Comam Jesucristo yul yanma, yuto ta hac tu' subuta islolo'n̈en isba naj, cat yayc'ay naj yin̈ isya'tajil haca' yu yayc'ay naj matzwalil.
Wal xin, c'ulojab isbeybal naj ijbalom tu' sata anma maẍto chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam, haxinwal machi mac chi'inilo ispixan naj, yeb mach chiayc'ay naj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil.
Hacpax tu' ebnaj chioc di'aconohal, ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul sat anma. Machojab nananta tzet chi-la-yala, machojab chiuq'ui ebnaj. Machojab ayoco yanma yin̈ yik'ni ismelyu yu lek'ti'al.
Yilal yanico yanma ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile ak'bilcano jet yu Comam Dios, hune' cuybanile chabilxayto yul janma, yeb xin sajojabn̈etic'a isnabal ebnaj.
Babel yilal yillaxi ta mach ismul ebnaj, lahwi tu' xin cat yak'lax ismunil ebnaj yin̈ di'aconohal.

Hac pax tu' xin ebix janab chioc yin̈ hune' munil ti', c'ulojab isbeybal ebix yul sat anma. Machojab hobom tzoti' ebix. Nanojabn̈etic'a yu ebix yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e. Yijemojab chiyute isba ebix yin̈ sunil.
Ebnaj juẍta chioc di'aconohal, machojab hunoxa ix chissay ebnaj, yohtajojab ebnaj iscuywa yul yatut yeb yin̈ sunil yuninal.
Yin̈ caw yeli ebnaj di'acono c'ul chiyute isba yin̈ ismunil, chioccano iswinajil ebnaj cat yoc yip yanma ebnaj istzotel yin̈ cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, hune' xaheyayto yul heyanma.
Ayco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan cachwilnojan yin̈ lembil, yaja' xin chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' hum ti' tawet,

yun̈e ta chiec' tiempo wapnihan, hawohtaxa tzet chawatx'e xol yuninal Comam Dios. Han̈on̈ ti' yatut Comam Dios itzitz jehi, yuto han̈on̈ caw chijalic'o hune' cuybanile yet isyelal ti', yeb xin han̈on̈ chijaco yip hune' cuybanile ti' yin̈ sat anma.

Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalcanojan, caw aycano yelapno ye hune' cocuybanil chi'ak'lax ti', yuxin chiyal haca' ti': Yaco isba Comam anmahil, yet yulic'o coxol. Haxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeniloj tato tohol isnabal. Ilbil Comam yu ebnaj 'angel. Hallaxic'o Istzoti' Comam xol anma nan con̈obal. Ay anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw yaco yanma yin̈ Comam. Chahlax Comam yin̈ isc'ulch'anil yul satcan̈, ẍi.

Yaj haban yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato yet chihul islahobal tiempo, tx'i'al anma chilo isba yin̈ cuybanile bay ayco yanma, cat isto yinta huntek'an esp'iritu lek'ti'wom chiak'ni subchaho anma, yeb yin̈ cuybanile chitit yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil.
Chabento anma tzet chal ebnaj lek'ti'wom chal isba c'ulal. Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' camnajilo isnabal, matxa chiyabeto tzet chal yanma.

Huntek'an ebnaj tu' chiscach ebnaj ismohyi anma. Aypaxo huntek'an tzet chilolax ti' chiscach ebnaj islolaxi; yaja' xin ha' Comam Dios an̈ecano tzet chilolaxi. Han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam ti', yu coloni yuxin aycano yu Comam. Hayet chicoloni xin chijak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tet Comam Dios, yuto johtaxa isyelal.
Sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios caw c'ul, yuxin mach chu jalni ta ay huno tzet ti' machiswalil. Sunil chu coloni, cachann̈e chijak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tet Comam yet chicoloni.
Yuto ha' Istzoti' Comam Dios chihalni ta sunil tzet iswatx'e Comam caw c'ulcanoj, yebpaxo cotxah chihalni c'ulal sunil tzet chicolo.

Tato chacuycanto ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin̈ huntek'an ti', c'ulach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo chal tu', lan̈an hach'ib yin̈ caw c'ul yin̈ tzet chu janico janma yin̈ Comam, yeb yin̈ cuybanile caw c'ul chi-tic'a-hayije.
Wal xin, mach chachah huntek'an yic'ti'al ebnaj jichmam machi nino isc'ulal chak' jet, yuto sucal tzoti'n̈e yehi. Ha'ojab yet Comam Dios chak'aytze haba yin̈.

Yin̈ caw yeli yet chicok'aytzen coba jak'ni labanbo conimanil yin̈ hunu sajach chicolwa jin̈, yaja' ta chicok'aytze coba yin̈ yet Comam Dios, ec'balto c'ul, yuto chak' isc'ulal jet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb yet ayon̈xa yul satcan̈.
Ha' hune' chiwalti'an caw yeli, sunil anma yilal yanayto yul yanma.
Yuxin ch'ahilo coc'ul jak'ni jip comunla yin̈ yet Comam Dios, yuto ha' Comam itzitz ayco yipo janma. Ha' Comam tu' Iscolomal sunil anma, yuxin ha' mac chichahni yul yanma, chicolchahi.
Huntek'an chiwalti'an, ha' chawak' iscuyu' anma, cat hawalni tet tato chisyije.

Machojab mac chalni tato matzet hawohtaj yuto tzehachto. Wal xin toholojab chawute haba haxinwal chayelo xol ebnaj juẍtaj tato hac tu' chiyutepaxo isba. C'ulojab hatzoteli, toholojab habeybal, yebpaxo xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil, yeb hayenilo yin̈ tzet chu janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, cat hapohnilo haba yin̈ istx'ojal haca' yuninal Comam Dios.
Hayet maẍto chinapnihan, aco yin̈ hac'ul hawilni Istzoti' Comam Dios yabe' ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab. Chawiptzenpaxo ebnaj yin̈ Istzoti' Comam, cat hacuyni ebnaj yin̈.
Caw mach chahinc'uln̈e hune' hahelanil ak'bil tawet yu Comam Dios, hune' hallaxilto yet yanayo isk'ab ebnaj anciano tawiban̈.
Aco hawanma yin̈ sunil huntek'an chiwalti'an, haxinwal sunil mac chi'ilni tato hunun tz'ayic hawik'ni hawip yin̈ yet Comam.
Chawil haba yin̈ tzet chawu yeb xin yin̈ tzet chiyu hacuywahi. Lahico habelwi yin̈ huntek'an ti'. Tato toholn̈etic'a chawute haba yin̈ chaẍcolcha yu, cat iscolcha sunil mac chi'aben tzet chawal tu'.
Yet chachcachwa yin̈ ebnaj ichamtaxa, mach howo chu hatzotel tet ebnaj, wal xin hak'anc'ulal chaẍtzotel tet ebnaj, haca' chiyu hatzotel tet hamam.

Hac pax tu' tet ebix janab ixnamtaj, c'ulch'anojab chiyu hatzotel tet ebix, haca' chawute hatzotel tet hami'. Yebpaxo tet ebix k'opotaj, c'ulojab chiyu hatzotel tet ebix hacojtam tet hunu hawanab chaẍtzoteli. Machojab nino istx'ojal nabil hawu.
Colwahan̈ yin̈ ebix camnaxa yichamil, ebix machi bay chicawxi isc'ul.

Ta ay ebix hun ix tu' ay yunin, maca yunin yunin, ha' huntek'an tu' yet ay iscolwa yin̈ tzet chiocnico yu ebix. Yuto ebnaj uninale yilal isyijen ebnaj iscolwahi, yeb ispajtzen tet ismam maca ismi', yuto caw c'ul hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios, caw chitzala Comam yin̈.

Yaj wal hunu ix hunix caw ischuquilxan̈e matxa mac yin̈ chicawxi isc'ul, cachann̈e yin̈ Comam Dios chicawxi isc'ul, yeb xin mach chisbej ix istxahli tet Comam ch'ec' tz'ayic, ch'ec' ak'bal, chu iscolwa ej yuninal Comam Dios yin̈ ix.
Yaj tato ay huno ix hunix chiec' yin̈ istx'ojal, mach chu iscolwa yuninal Comam yin̈ ix, yuto waxan̈ca itzitz isnimanil ix, yaj wal yul sat Comam Dios camom ix.
Halpax huntek'an cuybanile ti' tet ebnaj juẍtaj, yeb tet ebix janab, haxinwal machi huno istx'ojal chihallaxico yin̈ sat.

Ta ay huno juẍtaj mach chicolwa yin̈ mac ayto yu isba yebi, yeb ta hac tu' chutepaxo yul yatut, hune' mac tu' matxa chu yalni isba yuninalo Comam Dios, yeb ec'na machiswalil sata anma maẍto chichahni Istzoti' Comam yul yanma.
Ha' ix hunix bay wal iscolwa yuninal Comam Dios, ha' ix tz'ajanxa yin̈ sesenta habil yeb xin ta mach issay ix hunuxa winaj yet aytoc'o yichamil.

Yeb tato ohtabil isc'ulal iswatx'e ix yet yalan̈tocanoj, ta c'ul yu yak'ni ch'ibo ix yunin, yeb tato yak' ix bay chiway anma ec' isc'atan̈, yeb tato istx'ah ix yoj yuninal Comam ec' isc'atan̈, yeb xin ta colwa ix yin̈ anma ya'ta yecoj, yeb xin ta isc'ulaln̈etic'a iswatx'e ix; ta hac tu' chu iscolwa yuninal Comam Dios yin̈ ix.

Wal ebix hunix k'opoto mach chu hawanico ebix yin̈ istxolal isbi ebix hunix, yuto ay ebix ha' tzet choche isc'ul ha' chiswatx'e, chisbejnicano ebix hune' munil yet Comam Jesucristo, yuto ha' ismohyi ebix ha' ayco yin̈ isc'ul.
Hac tu' chu iscancano ebix tx'ojal cat isman̈c'oncan̈ hune' munil chabilxa yu tu'.
Yeb istila xan̈e n̈a ch'ec' ebix choche, cat isk'ayilo ebix isahil. Maẍn̈etaj hune' tu', wal xin chik'aypaxilo ebix halo k'umal, chanito isba ebix xol tzettaj ye tu' yeb tzoti' mach chiyoc ebix yin̈.
Yuxinto chiwochehan tato chimohyi ebix hunix k'opoto, ayojab yunin ebix cat yoc ebix yilno yatut; haxinwal machi bay chicawxi anma chon̈cajni yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios.
Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' tawet yu ay ebix hunix ti' xameltzoto yintaj. Haxa tzet chal naj matzwalil lan̈an isyijen ebix tinan̈.

Tato ay huno naj juẍtaj maca huno ix janab ay huno ix hunix yul yatut, yilal iscolwa yin̈ ix. Machojab chioc ix yijatzo yuninal Comam, haxinwal han̈e yin̈ ebix yin̈ caw yeli machi hunu mac bay chicawxi isc'ul, ha' bay chicolwa yuninal Comam.

Ha' ebnaj anciano c'ul yijbali yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj, yilal niman yelapno ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj sunil. Hactic'apax tu' ebnaj anciano chipujbanic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios, yebpaxo ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yilal ischahni ebnaj istohol, yeb nimanojab yelapno ye ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj.
Yuto chal Istzoti' Comam Dios haca' ti': "Mach chub heyak'aco yet isti' no' wacax yet chixan̈wi trigo no'," ẍiayoj. Chalnipaxoj: "Ha' ebnaj munlawom, yilal ischahni ebnaj istohol," ẍiayoj.
Mach ton̈ehojabn̈etic'a chawabeto yin̈ tzet chal hunu mac chioc ak'oc'ule tawet yin̈ hunu naj anciano, wal xin yilal ay cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ testigo chihalni ta yeli.
Tato ay hunu naj juẍtaj maca ix janab mach chisbej yanico ismul, yilal hecachni yin̈ sat sunil yuninal Comam Dios, haxinwal chixiw sunil yuninal Comam yanico ismul.

Yin̈ sat Comam Dios yeb xin yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo yeb xin yin̈ sat ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios, chintak'etojan huntek'an chejbanile ti' tawet tato caw yilal hayijeni. Lahanojabn̈e chawute haba yin̈ ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab; machojab chawato haba yin̈ hunu maca.

Mach comono chawaco ismunil huno naj juẍta yul isk'ab yin̈ an̈e yalan̈to maẍto chawil isbeybal naj, haxataxca ch'elicoj hach hunach chawato haba yin̈ istx'ojal hune' mac tu'. Wal xin, machojab chawato haba xol tzet ye tu' machiswalil.
Chiwaltojan tawet yu hune' ya'c'ul nawn̈e chi'oc tawin̈, mach chiyu hawuc'ni ha ha' ischuquil, wal xin c'ul ta chawuc'paxo niẍtejo te' vino an̈il.
Wal yin̈ isbeybal anma, ay mac ti' ixtan̈ jilni ismul yet yalan̈to maẍto chi'illaxi tzet chielicoj. Ay mac xin hato yet chiillaxi tzet chielicoj catto yiẍtan̈wi ismul.
Hac pax tu' ye anma chiuten isc'ulal, ixtan̈ yillaxi, yaj ay mac ti' mach ixtan̈o isc'ulal lan̈an iswatx'en tinan̈, masantic'a chiixtan̈wiloj cat xin isyenilo isba, mach chicancano yin̈ ewantajil.
Chiwaltojan tawet yin̈ ebnaj lok'bil yu ispatr'on yu yoc chejaboj. Ayojab yelapno yahaw ebnaj tu' yul sat, haxinwal mach chibuchlax isbi Comam Dios yebpaxo xin cuybanile chijalan̈.

Yaj tato ay huno mac ayxaco ispatr'on tu' yul isk'ab Comam Dios, machojabtaj yu tu' yuxin matxa yelapno naj yul sat, wal xin yilal isyijen naj chejab tu' tzet chal ispatr'on yuto yuẍtaxa isba iscawan̈il yin̈ Comam. Caw c'ulojab chiyu ismunla naj chejab yul isk'ab ispatr'on, yuto naj chichahni hune' munil tu' ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam, juẍtaxa yehi, yeb caw xahan ay ju. Ha' huntek'an tu', yilal hawoc hacuyni cat hawalni tato yilal isyijelaxi.
Tato ay anma nan cuybanile chiyalic'oj, mach lahano yeb cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo caw yel chala, yeb mach lahano yeb hune' caw tohol ak'bil cocuyu',

huntek'an anma tu', caw can̈ye yalni, yaj xin caw matzet yohtaj. Huntek'an anma tu' ton̈e chiyoche isteye'co anma yin̈ tzet yelapno ye tzoti'. Ha' ton yin̈ tu' chi'ichico chichonc'ulal, yeb howal, yeb buchwal, hac tu' xin chu yoc cabc'ulal.

Maẍtic'a chisbej anma tu' yak'ni howal, caw matxatic'a c'ulu yul iswi', matxa isyelal Istzoti' Comam Dios ayco yin̈. Ha' hune' nabil yu anma, ha' ton yik'ni niman melyu yin̈ cuybanile chabilxa ju. Mach chahunba haba yeb huntek'an anma tu'.
Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli, niman isc'ulal chicochah yin̈ cuybanil chahbilxa ju tu', yaj xin ta chijak' tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ tzet ay yul cok'ab.
Wal xin, matzet ik'bil ju yet copitzc'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb xin matzet chijipaxto jintaj yet chon̈camtoj.
Yuxin ta ay tzet chicolo yeb xin ta ay xil cok'ap, jak'a' tzalaho coc'ul.

Yuto ha' mac choche chioc k'alomal, subuta yayc'ay yul isk'ab istx'ojal, cat yochento tzettaj ye tu' machi nino isc'ulal chiswatx'e yin̈, cat yochenpaxto ismachiswalilal. Hac tu' chu yetaxcanto isnabal, cat isc'aycantoj.
Yuto ta chijaco janma yin̈ ch'en melyu, ha' ton xe' sunil istx'ojal. Ay ebnaj juẍta ti' yu yaco yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu yilo yanma yin̈ Comam, istitcano niman bisc'ulal yiban̈ ebnaj.

Wal hach ti' wuẍta Timoteo, yet Comam Dios hawehi. Elan̈ tet huntek'an istx'ojal tu', ha' isc'ulal chasayiloj. K'an yip hawanma tet Comam Dios. Tohol chawute habelwi yin̈ Comam yin̈ sat anma. Xahan chawil hawet anmahil, ijle isya'tajil chi'ay tawiban̈. Chewojab chawute haba.

Aco yin̈ hac'ul halahnico hawanico hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios, caw yachyon̈e chawuco yin̈ hune' hasabehal, ha' ton hak'inal mach istan̈bal. Yu hune' tu', yuxin awtebilach yu Comam Dios, yeb xin caw c'ul yu hatak'wen yin̈ sat tx'i'al ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us, ha' Jahawil yehicoj.
Wal tinan̈ yin̈ sat Comam Dios, chi'ak'ni isk'inal sunil tzettaj ye tu', yeb xin yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo, Comam halni isyelal sata naj Poncio Pilato, chiwaltojan hachejbanil.
Yilal hayijen huntek'an cuybanile ti'. Machojab nino tzet chaman̈c'o, haxinwal machi baytet yin̈ chaẍcachlaxi masanto yet chihul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa.

Wal xin chihul hune' tiempohal haca' chiyoche Comam Dios, cat yijni isba huntek'an ti', yuto yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay sunil. Caw sak'al yet Comam, isreyal ebnaj rey ye Comam, yahawilpaxo ebnaj yahawil ye Comam.

Han̈ech'an Comam Dios machi bak'inal chicami. Ay Comam xol hune' issajilk'inal bay machi hunu mac chiyu ishitzico isc'atan̈. Maẍto hunu mac xa'ilni yin̈ Comam, machipaxo mac chu isk'oji yilni Comam. ¡Bitn̈elaxojab isbi Comam yu ishelanil yeb yu yip ay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo! ¡Hacojab tu'!

Ebnaj juẍta ay isk'alomal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', hal tet ebnaj tato mach chislolo'n̈e isba ebnaj. Machojab xin chaco yanma ebnaj yin̈ isk'alomal, yuto hune' k'alomal tu' chitan̈iloj. Wal xin yak'abico yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios. Comam ch'ak'ni sunil tzettaj ye tu' jet yin̈ caw niman yu isc'ulalo jin̈.
Hal tet ebnaj tato caw c'ul chute isc'ul ebnaj. Yak'abico ebnaj yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'en isc'ulal, colwahojab ebnaj yin̈ anma matzet aya, machojab ch'ok' ebnaj yak'ni.
Ta chisbeybaln̈e ebnaj isc'ulal, ay isk'alomal ebnaj lan̈an iscutxban satcan̈, cat xin ischahni hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal.

Hach Timoteo, caw chawil haba yin̈ tzet abebilico yul hak'ab. Mach chawabeto huntek'an tx'oj tzoti' machi nino isc'ulal chak'a. Mach chawabepaxto huntek'an helanile maẍtaj yecoj chal ebnaj chon̈cajni yu chijalic'o isyelal.
Ebnaj oc tzujno yinta huntek'an cuybanile tu', xaisheq'uilo isba ebnaj yin̈ isyelal. Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal tawet. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan, yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios, yu walnic'ojan hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal chiilcha yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, haca' yu yaltencano Comam Dios.

Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an tawet wuẍta Timoteo, caw xahan ayach wuhan, yuto inc'aholan hawe yin̈ Comam. Ha'ojab Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal tawet, cat istz'ay isc'ul tawin̈.

Hayet chaẍinnanitijan yet chintxahlihan hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios tawin̈. Yin̈ istoholal innabalan chinmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, haca' yu ismunla ebnaj wichmaman yet payat.
Chinnatijan yet hawok'i yet hacancano wuhan. Chiwochehan chachwilan hunelxa yun̈e cam yahcanocan̈ tzalahilal yul wanmahan.

Chinnatijan tato yin̈ caw yeli ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Haca' hami' ixnam Loida yeb hami' Eunice, ha' babel yaco yanma yin̈ Comam, caw xin wohtajan tato hac tu' hawanipaxico hawanma yin̈ Comam.
Yuxin chiwaltojan tawet tato ayachojabn̈etic'aco hawanico yip hahelanil yak'cano Comam Dios tawet yet wanayo ink'aban yiban̈ hawi'.
Wal xin, hune' Esp'iritu xayak' Comam Dios jet, mach chiyak' xiwquilal yul janma, walxinto chak' yip janma, yeb coxahann̈en coba, yebpaxo cocachni coba yin̈ej istx'ojal.

Yuxin mach chaẍtx'ixwi hawalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo, yeb xin mach chaẍtx'ixwipaxoj yuto ayinicojan yul preso ti' yu Istzoti' Comam. Wal xin yu hawip chak' Comam Dios yilal hachahni ej isya'tajil chihul tawiban̈ yu chawalic'o Istzoti' Comam chiak'ni colbanile.

Wal tinan̈ colbilon̈xa yu Comam, yeb awtebilon̈xa yu joccano yeto Comam. Yaj maẍtaj yu tzet chicowatx'e yuxin colbilon̈xa, machoj; walxinto yu nabilxatic'a yu Comam yet yalan̈ato maẍto chiswatx'e Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yak'nipaxo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet yu Comam Jesucristo.

Isyelo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tu' yin̈ Comam Jes'us yet yulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yak'nicano tan̈o yip hune' camical jiban̈, yak'ni ohtan̈elaxo hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal yu cuybanile yet colbanile.
Ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e inmunilan walnic'ojan hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ti', quinyanicojan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo, yeb cuywawomal xol anma mach Israeloj.

Yuxin chiwilan huntek'an isya'tajil chiay wiban̈ti'an, yaja' machi nich'ano chintx'ixwihan, yuto wohtajan mac yin̈ ayco wanmahan. Wohtapaxojan ta tzet chiwak'an isc'uba' Comam Dios, ay yip Comam isc'ubani masanto yet ch'ayilo islahobal tz'ayic.

Huntek'an cuybanile ak'bil tawet wuhan, yin̈ caw yeli yet Comam Dios yehi. Ha' huntek'an cuybanile ti' chawilto habeybaln̈eni. Tinan̈ hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo, yuxin aco hawanma yin̈ Comam, yeb xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil.
Wal xin, yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco jin̈ hununon̈, yuxin caw chaya'iln̈e huntek'an cuybanile ak'bil tawet yu Comam Dios.
Hawohtaj tato sunil ebnaj ay bey yul ismajul Asia bejn̈e incanojan, xol ebnaj tu' ayco naj Figelo yeb naj Herm'ogenes.

Ha'ojab Comam Dios chianayo isc'ulal yiban̈ macta ay bey yatut juẍta Ones'iforo, yuto tx'i'al el hulic'o naj yak'a' isnimanbal inc'ulan. Waxan̈ca ayinictijan yul preso ti' yaj xin mach chitx'ixwilo naj win̈an.
Wal xin huln̈e naj yul con̈ob Roma ti', yoc naj quinissaynihan, maẍtic'a xin isbej naj quinissaynihan masan quinilchahan yu naj.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet juẍta Ones'iforo tu' yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic. Hach ti' caw hawohtaj ta colwa naj jin̈ yet ayon̈ yul con̈ob Efeso.
Hach caw inc'aholti'an, caw ak' hawip hawatx'enico haba yin̈ isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios chiyak' jet, yuto caw hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo.
Huntek'an cuybanile hawabe walnic'ojan xol anma, ha' chatak'e tet ebnaj juẍtaj yijem chute isba, yeb tz'ajan chute isc'ul ebnaj iscuyni hunuxa yet anmahil.
Hach ti' xin techahojab isya'tajil hawu haca' hunu naj soldado, yuto ischejab Comam Jesucristo hawehi.
Machi hunu naj soldado ti' ayco soldadohal cat istopaxo iswatx'eno hunuxa nan munilal, yuto yilal isyijen naj tzet chal yahawil.
Hacpax tu' hunu naj chiak'ni an̈e, mach chischah naj ismatan ta mach chisyije naj yin̈ tzet chu istzujcha apno hune' matan tu'.
Haca' hunu naj tz'unum awal, yilal ismunla naj babel cat ischahni naj sat istz'unub tu'.
Aco hawanma yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile chiwalan tawet ti', ha' xin Comam ch'ak'ni cam hatxumu' yin̈ tzet yehi.
Nati Comam Jesucristo, Comam pitzc'acan̈ xol camom, Comam tit yin̈ yuninal naj jichmam David, haca' yalni Tzoti' yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan xol anma.
Yu chiwalic'ojan hune' cuybanile ti', yuxin chiwabehan isya'tajil. Caw xin ayinicojan preso haca' hunu mac caw xiwquilta ismul, yaj wal Ttzoti' yet colbanile xin mach ayoco preso.
Yuxin, sunil chiwak' techahojan yu ayco wanmahan yin̈ macta sic'bilxacan̈ yu Comam, yun̈e ischahni iscolbanil caw c'ulch'ancanoj, mach istan̈bal, hune' chiak'lax jet yu hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo.
Hune' cuybanile ti' caw yel chala: Tato xacon̈cam yeb Comam, chon̈itzitzbipaxocan̈ yeb Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Tato chijabe isya'tajil, chon̈ocpaxo yahawilo yeb Comam. Ta chijala ta mach johtajo Comam, chiyalpaxo Comam ta mach con̈yohtajoj.
Ta mach c'ulo chijute coba, wal Comam Dios c'ul Comam, yuto mach chisman̈c'o Comam yin̈ tzet chala.

Nati huntek'an tzet chiwalti'an tet ebnaj juẍta ink'ana'an. Cam tak'ecano tet ebnaj sata Comam Dios ta mach ch'oc ebnaj isteye'le isba yin̈ej tzoti' matzet chal yelapnoj, yuto matzet c'ul chiswatx'e, ton̈e chetato isnabal macta chiabeni.
Caw hantatic'a chu hawu lahico hawec' yin̈ isc'ulal, haxinwal chitzala Comam Dios tawin̈, haca' hunu munlawom matzet yin̈ wal istx'ixwican̈, hune' mac ha' cuybanile caw yel chalic'oj.
Caw mach chachah hawabe huntek'an tx'ojla tzoti' chal anma, yeb tzoti' matzet c'ul chak'a, yuto ha' mac chihalni huntek'an tzoti' tu' niẍtejal isto sutsun xol istx'ojal.
Haca' hunu tx'ac chik'atoj cat yec' lebohi, hac tu' chiyu yec' lebo huntek'an tzoti' chiyal ebnaj tu'. Hac tu' yute isba naj Himeneo yeb naj Fileto.
Xaisbejcano ebnaj hune' cuybanile caw yel chala, chalni ebnaj tato xapitzc'acan̈ ej camom. Ay xin huntek'an mac ayxaco yanma yin̈ Comam chicabconcan̈ isc'ul yu tzet chal ebnaj.

Yaja' wal Istzoti' Comam Dios yak'cano jet, caw ay yip, lahan haca' hunu xe' n̈a machi nino chibili. Ayco hune' sello yin̈ chalni haca' ti': "Yohta Comam Dios macta yetxa Comam yehi," ẍi. Chalnipaxoj: "Macxan̈etic'a anmahil chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, yilal chisbejcano sunil istx'ojal," ẍi.

K'inalo hunu niman n̈a tinan̈, caw tzetc'a k'uybe ayicto yul; ay munlabal naba oro yeb naba plata ayicto yul. Aypaxo munlabal naba te'n̈e, aypaxo naba tx'otx'n̈e. Huntek'an munlabal tu' ay ec'bal yelapno ismunil, aypaxo xin comontan̈e ismunil.

Lahanon̈ haca' huntek'an munlabal tu'. Tato sunil machiswalilal chicobejcanoj, niman jelapno yul sat Comam Dios. Haxa Comam ayon̈ yet, xacon̈ocnico yu Comam yin̈ ismunil, helanon̈xa cowatx'en sunil isc'ulal.

Elan̈ tet sunil istx'ojal choche ebnaj hawet tzehal iswatx'e; wal xin ocan̈ tzujno yinta istoholal. Cam lahico hawanico hawanma yin̈ Comam, xahan chawil hawet anmahil. Caw ayojab ak'anc'ulal yul hawanma haca' sunil macta chiawten Comam yin̈.
Yaj mach chawabeto tzoti' machiswalil matzet chaliloj, yuto hawohtaj tato howal ch'iti huntek'an tu'.
Yuto hune' ischejab Comam Dios, mach chiyu yanito isba xol howal. Wal xin c'ul chute isba yin̈ sunil anma, helanpaxo iscuywahi, yeb xin niman chute isc'ul.
Ak'anc'ulal xin chiyu iscuywa yin̈ mac mach chischah cuybanile, yuto chalo yanico huntek'an mac tu' Comam Dios yin̈ isc'ul cat ishelni isbeybal, cat yohtan̈enilo hune' cuybanile caw yeli,
yun̈e iscolchalo yul isk'ab naj matzwalil bay preso yeco yu naj; chiswatx'en baytet choche isc'ul naj.
Yilal hawohtan̈eni tato yet islahobal tz'ayic caw ayej isya'tajil chihuli.

Ay anma ti' ha'n̈ech'an chisxahann̈e isba. Chanico yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu, chislolo'n̈en isba cat yinipaxocan̈ isba, cat yoc yalno tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios. Matxa chisyije tzet chal ismam ismi'. Matxa chiyak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tzet chiak'lax tet, matxa tzet chalilo cuybanile yet Comam Dios yul sat.

Mach choche yet anmahil, yeb machi tz'ay isc'ul yin̈ hunuxa yet anmahil. Chisbalcan̈ tzoti' machiswalil yin̈ yet anmahil. Caw mach chu istoholban̈enico isba yin̈ isc'ulal, haca' hunu no nok' caw how hac tu' chute isba, chiscajpaxo isc'ulal.
Chipaq'uico yin̈ yet anmahil, caw mach chixiw iswatx'en istx'ojal, nohna yu tzet ye tu' matzet chaliloj. Ha' tzet ye tu' choche isnimanil ha' chiswatx'e selelo tzet choche Comam Dios.
Chiyalni ebnaj tato ayco isnabal ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios, yaja' isbeybal ebnaj chiyeniloj ta mach ayoco Comam Dios yin̈ isnabal ebnaj. Mach chawaco haba xol huntek'an ebnaj tu'.

Yuto xol ebnaj chiwalti'an, ay ebnaj chiocto yul n̈a, cat yoc ebnaj ismonten ebix ix yun̈e issomchato iswi', yuto machi yip isnabal ebix yu nohna yanma ebix yu istx'ojal, chisyijento ebix tzet choche isc'ul.
Huntek'an ebix tu' xin, ayn̈etic'aco ebix iscuywi, yaja' maẍtic'a chik'oji ebix istxumnilo hune' cuybanile caw c'ul.

Haca' yu iscajwa naj Janes yeb naj Jambres yin̈ naj Mois'es, hac tu' chu iscajwa huntek'an anma ti' yin̈ cuybanile yel chala. Caw etaxnalo isnabal ebnaj tu', mach yeloj caw c'ul yeco yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios.
Wal xin machi nahatli istx'ojal ebnaj tu', yuto chiixtan̈woti issucal ebnaj yu anma, haca' yu yixtan̈wilo ebnaj cajni naj Mois'es.

Yaja' wal hach ti', caw tzujanach yin̈ cuybanile walcanojan, yeb sunil inbeybalan yeb innabalan. Ilbil hawu tzet wute wanico wanmahan yin̈ Comam Dios, yeb innimanc'ulalan, yebpaxo yin̈ inxahann̈enan wet anmahilal. Wak'nipaxo techahojan sunil isya'tajil.

Hawilpaxo yet yak'lax ec'oya' wanmahan, yeb yet yul isya'tajil wiban̈an. Huntek'an wak'lenan yet wec'an yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia, yeb bey con̈ob Iconio, yebpaxo bey con̈ob Listra. Yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil wabetu'an, Comam Dios quincolnilojan xol sunil.
Yin̈ caw yeli, macn̈etic'a choche c'ul chute isbeybal yu ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, caw masan chabe isya'tajil yu yet anmahil.
Wal ebnaj matzwalil chute isba yeb ebnaj subcham anma tu', ip islahnico yanito isba ebnaj xol istx'ojal, chetato ebnaj isnabal yet anmahil cat xin yetanpaxto isba ebnaj.
Yaj wal hach ti', lahico halin̈ban haba yin̈ cuybanil cuybilxa hawu, hune' hawayto yul hawanma. Hawohtaj mac cuyn̈ehach yin̈.
Hach ti' nich'anachto hacuyni cuybanile yet Comam Dios. Hune' cuybanile chiak'ni ishelanil hanabal, caẍyanito yin̈ colbanile yu hawayto yul hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.

Sunilal tzet ayayo yul Yum Comam Dios yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam watx'ina yu ebnaj ischejab. Caw xin ch'ocnico con̈iscuyni yin̈ isyelal cat isyenilo bay mach t'in̈ano jecoj, cat iscachwa jin̈ yin̈ cotx'ojal, yeb con̈iscuyni yin̈ sunil istoholal.
Yun̈e tz'ajan lahan chucano mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi, caw helanxa chielcanico iswatx'en sunil isc'ulal.
Yin̈ sat Comam Dios yeb yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo, Comam chul Jahawiloj, yeb chul ilno ismul macta itzitz yeb macta camomxa, chintak'etojan

ta chawalic'o cuybanile yet Comam xol anma. Ta choche anma yabe', maca mach choche anma yabe', yaja' masan chawalic'oj. Ak' yohtan̈elo yin̈ istx'ojal chiswatx'e, cat xin hacachwa yin̈. Chawiptzenpaxoj, yeb niman chawute hac'ul hacuynipaxo yin̈ cuybanile.

Yuto ay hune' tiempohal chuli bay matxa chischah yabe' anma cuybanile caw yel chala. Haxan̈e comon tzoti' choche yabe'. Yuxin hantan̈e ebnaj cuywawom chiscutxbaco anma, cat yoc cuywal yin̈ anma tu', yaja' cachann̈e tzoti' caw choche isc'ul anma tu' chal ebnaj.
Anma tu' chismajche istxiquin yin̈ cuybanile yel chala, yin̈xan̈e xin comon ic'ti' bay chaco yanma anma tu'.
Yaja' wal hach ti', toholojabn̈etic'a chawute hanabal, techahojab isya'tajil hawu, ec'an̈ hawala'c'o Tzoti' yet colbanile, yije hamunil tzabiloco hawu.
Yaj wal haninti'an toxa chinpotx'laxan haca' huno no nok' chioc yin̈ xahanbalil, caw cawilxa yeti istz'ayical bay chincaman.

Haca' hunu mac chioc yin̈ hunu an̈e, hac tu' yu wak'ni wanmahan inmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios. Tinan̈ xin xaquink'ojihan inlahnihan inmunilan yin̈ caw c'ul, caw inya'iln̈ehan cuybanile bay ayco janma.

Wal tinan̈ c'uwanxa hune' sabehal chiak'lax wetan ispaj selel inmunilan. Hune' chak' Comam wetan yet chiapni istz'ayical bay chul Comam istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e, cat yilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma. Maẍn̈etajinan xin chinchahan inmatanan tet Comam, to chischahpaxo sunil anma yin̈ sunil isc'ul chiechmali yin̈ yulbal Comam yet iscayelal.
Chiwochehan ta chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hawul quinhawilnojan yin̈ an̈e,

yuto naj Demas xaquinisbejcanojan naj, xato naj bey Tesal'onica, yuto ec'bal ayco yanma naj yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Wal juẍta Crescente xin, hata bey Galacia to naj. Walpaxo juẍta Tito xin, hata bey Dalmacia topaxo naj.
Cachanxan̈e naj Lucas ayc'o inc'atan̈an. Wal xin ec'an̈ hawik'a naj Marcos cat hawiniti naj tawintaj, yuto chiwochehan chicolwa naj wintajan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios.
Wal naj juẍta T'iquico, xainchejtojan naj bey Efeso.
Yet chaẍtita, chawiti hune' incapahan wacanojan bey yatut juẍta Carpo, bey con̈ob Troas, yeb huntek'an inlibrohan, yeb huntek'an wuman caw yilal yehi.
Naj Alejandro, naj chac'om ch'en, tzetc'axa ismachiswalilal xaiswatx'e naj win̈an. Ha' Comam Dios chipajtzeno tet naj, haca'tic'a ismachiswalilal naj tu'.
Chawil haba tet naj, yuto caw chiscaj naj cuybanile chijalic'o ti'.
Yet wocan babel sata ebnaj yahaw yu yillaxi ta ay inmulan, caw machi hunu mac quincolnihan. Sunil ebnaj quinbejnicanojan; machojab xin chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ ebnaj yu hune' tu'.

Yaja' wal Comam Dios colwa win̈an, yak'nipaxo wipan yun̈e yijni isba walnic'ojan cuybanile yet colbanile xol sunil anma mach Israeloj, hac tu' yu yabencantoj. Caw colwa Comam win̈an haca'tan̈e quiniscolan Comam yul isk'ab no' balam.
Ha' Comam Dios chincolnihan tet sunil ismachiswalilal, cat xin quinisc'ubanan Comam yun̈e quinyinitojan isc'atan̈ yul satcan̈. ¡Alaxojabico ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo! Hacojab tu'.
Chawal tet ix janab Prisca yeb tet juẍta Aquila ta chil isba. Chawalpaxo tet yuninal juẍta Ones'iforo ta chilpaxo isba.
Wal naj juẍta Erasto wacanojan naj yul con̈ob Corinto, walpaxo juẍta Tr'ofimo yabi ay naj, yuxin wacanojan naj yul con̈ob Mileto.

Chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hatit yin̈ an̈e yalan̈to maẍto chioc ha' n̈ab. Chalto juẍta Eubulo yeb juẍta Pudente yeb juẍta Lino yeb ix janab Claudia ta chawil haba yin̈ hacawil. Yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey ti' chalpaxtoj ta chawil haba.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chioc hawetbihoj, cat xin yak'ni Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet hesunil bey tu'. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an, ismunlawom Comam Dios wehan, yebpaxo ischejab Comam Jesucristo yu winitijan anma sic'bilxalo yu Comam Dios, cat yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, yun̈e yohtan̈enilo isyelal cuybanile chon̈inito cowatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios.

Hac ton tu' inmunilan yun̈e yanico anma tu' yin̈ isc'ul ischahni k'inale mach istan̈bal haltebilcano yu Comam Dios yettax maẍto chiwatx'icano sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; wal xin caw mach chaco Comam lek'ti'al.
Tinan̈ xin, xa'ayilo istiempohal bay isyelo Comam Istzoti' jet. Ha' Comam Dios Cocolomal haln̈e wetan ta yilal inyijenan walnic'ojan Istzoti'.

Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an tawet wuẍta Tito. Yin̈ caw isyelal haca' inc'aholan hawehi, yuto haninan walan Istzoti' Comam hawabe'. Yak'ab Comam Dios yeb xin Cocolomal Jesucristo isc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tawet yebpaxo xin ak'anc'ulal.
Caẍwacanojan bey tx'otx' Creta tu' yun̈e hawatx'en sunil huntek'an ayto iswatx'i, cat hasaynicano mac chi'oc ancianohal xol ebnaj juẍtaj yul hunun con̈ob bey tu', haca' wute walnicanojan tawet.

Ha' ebnaj chioc ancianohal tu', c'ulojab isbeybal ebnaj haxinwal machi mac chalni tzet ye tu' yin̈ ebnaj. Machojab chissay ebnaj hunuxa ix, yeb xin ayojabico yuninal ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios, machojab xin man̈comoj; hac tu' xin machi mac chibuchwa yin̈ yuninal ebnaj tu'.

Yuto ebnaj chioc ijbalomal yin̈ yuninal Comam Dios c'ulojab isbeybal ebnaj, yuto yilomal ismunil Comam Dios ye ebnaj. Mach c'uluj ta han̈e ebnaj ay yoc yin̈ sunil tzet ye tu', yeb machojab ishowal iswi' ebnaj. Machojab chuc'paxo ebnaj te' uq'ue, yebpaxo istzan yin̈ yak'len howal, yebpaxo yik'ni ismelyu yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj.

Wal xin ebnaj chioc ancianohal, yilal yak'ni ebnaj bay chiway macta chiec' isc'atan̈. Ha'n̈ehojab isc'ulal choche ebnaj iswatx'e', toholojab isnabal ebnaj, yeb han̈ehojab istoholal chiswatx'e ebnaj. Han̈c'an̈ehojab yin̈ yet Comam Dios chaco isnabal ebnaj, yeb iscachni isnimanil ebnaj yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj.

Yilalojab yanico isnabal ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala, hune' ak'bil iscuyu'. Hac tu' xin chu yiptzen ebnaj anma yu cuybanile caw yeli, cat yay isc'ul macta ayco ishowal yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yu ebnaj.

Wal xin ay ebnaj mach chischah yabe' istoholal cuybanile, han̈e huntek'an tzoti' matzet chal yelapno chal ebnaj, cat yak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma, ha' ton ebnaj xin chalni ta yilal yak'lax circuncidar macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam.
Yilal chicachlax ebnaj tu', yuto bajxan̈etu'wal ch'ec' ebnaj, cat yak'ni somchahoto ebnaj isnabal anma yu cuybanile maẍtaj ye chal ebnaj. Chute ebnaj haca' tu' yun̈e yik'ni ebnaj ismelyu.

Ay hune' naj ay bey Creta tu', ay isnabal ayco xol yet con̈ob, yal naj haca' ti': "Ha' ebnaj wet con̈obti'an, lek'ti' ebnaj, lahan ebnaj haca' hunu no nok' caw how. Isa ebnaj yebpaxo xin caw pek' iswa'i," ẍi naj.
Yel chal naj yuxin yilal hacachni ebnaj tu' sic'lebil, haxinwal chiyaco ebnaj yin̈ yanma hune' cuybanile yel chala,
yeb yun̈e mach chishajba istxiquin ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an ic'ti' chisnacan̈ ebnaj ah Israel, yeb xin yun̈e mach chisyijeto ebnaj tzet chal anma caw machi yelapno ye sunil isyelal yul sat.

Wal han̈on̈ sajxa ye conabal ti', sunil tzet ye tu' c'ul yul cosat. Walpaxo mac maẍto chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios maẍto sajo ye isnabal, caw mach c'ulo sunil tzet ye tu' yul sat, yuto machiswalil tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj yeb yin̈ yanma ebnaj.

Chal ebnaj tato yohta ebnaj Comam Dios, yaja' tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj chiyeniloj tato mach yohtajo ebnaj Comam. Ton̈etic'a chichiwa isc'ul ebnaj, mach chisyijepaxo ebnaj tzet chal Comam. Machi hunu tzet ye tu' c'ul chiswatx'e ebnaj.
Walach hach ti', ha' baytet lahan yalni yeb cuybanile caw tohol, ha' chawak' iscuyu' anma.

Chawal tet ebnaj juẍta ichamejxa, helanojab chute isnabal. Ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul sat anma, machojab chato isba ebnaj xol istx'ojal. Caw toholojab yeco yanma ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile caw yeli, yeb xin xahanojab chil yet anmahil. Yak'ab yip yanma ebnaj istecha ilwebal yu.

Hactic'apax tu' ebix janab ixnamejxa, c'ulojab chute isba yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e haca' chiyoche Comam Dios. Machojab halom k'umalo ebix, machojab chiuc'wipaxo te'. C'ulojab isbeybal ebix chisye tet anma.
Isyebabilo ebix janab ixnamtaxa tu' tet ebix k'opotaj yin̈ tzet chute isxahann̈en yichamil yeb isya'iln̈en yunin.

Yeb xin c'ulojab tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebix. Toholojab chute isba ebix, cat xin isya'iln̈en ebix yatut. C'ulch'anojab chute isc'ul ebix yin̈ yet anmahil. Yijemojab chute isba ebix tet yichamil, hac tu' xin machi mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios.
Iptze ebnaj juẍta tzehtaj haxinwal toholn̈etic'a isnabal ebnaj.
C'ulojab tzet chawatx'e sata ebnaj juẍtaj, cuywahan̈ yin̈ sunil hawanma, yebpaxo yin̈ ak'anc'ulal.

Ha' tzoti' c'ul ha' chawala, haxinwal mach hunu mac chu yalni tato machiswalil cuybanile chawal tu'. Hac tu' xin chitx'ixwican̈ ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ cuybanile tu', yuto machi hunu tzet tz'aj yala' ebnaj tawin̈ tu'.
Halpaxo tet ebnaj munlawom, yijemojab chute isba ebnaj tet ispatr'on, c'ulch'anojab chute isc'ul ebnaj. Machojab chistak'we ebnaj isti' ebnaj ispatr'on.
Machojab ch'elk'an ebnaj yin̈ ispatr'on. Toholojab chiyute isba ebnaj, hac tu' chu isyenilo ebnaj tet anma tato caw c'ul cuybanile yet Comam Dios Cocolomal.
Yuto Comam Dios xaisyelo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet, ha' ton ik'n̈e iscolbanil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Ha' isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios tu', ak'ni conabaloj tato caw yilal cobejnicano sunil tzet machiswalil, yeb sunil tzet mach c'ulo chijocheco yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Haxa yin̈ istoholal conabal chon̈eq'ui, yeb cowatx'en istoholal, yeb yanico janma yin̈ Comam Dios.
Jechmawe hune' tzet caw nanxa yoc isc'ulal ayco yipo coc'ul, hune' tz'ayic caw c'ulch'an bay chisyecan̈ isba Cocolomal, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo, coDiosal caw helan.
Ha' Comam tu' yak' camo isba coseleloj con̈iscolnilo yin̈ istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Con̈issajn̈e Comam yin̈ comul yun̈e joc iscon̈oboj, yun̈e haxan̈e isc'ulal chijoche cowatx'e'.

Ha' hune' ti', yilal hawak'ni iscuyu' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam, chawanico yip yanma. Tato ay ebnaj machiswalil chute isba, sunil hawanma chacachni. Ha'ojab isc'ulal chawatx'e haxinwal machi mac chiinilo hapixan.
Chanati tet ebnaj juẍtaj, isyije'ab ebnaj yin̈ tzet chal naj jahaw, yebpaxo tet ebnaj yahawil con̈ob. Yijemojab chute isba ebnaj, hinanojab ebnaj iswatx'en isc'ulal.
Yeb xin machojab tx'ojo istzotel ebnaj yin̈ hunu maca, machojab ak'om howal ebnaj, c'ulch'anojab chiyute isc'ul ebnaj, chewchotan̈eojab chute yanma ebnaj yin̈ yet anmahil.

Yuto hayet yalan̈tocanoj ha' hunon̈ ayon̈ico yin̈ issucal, man̈c'omon̈ yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, yeb c'aynajon̈toj, ayon̈ico yalan̈ yec'najil janma yebpaxo tzet choche conimanil. Han̈etic'a istx'ojal cowatx'e yeb ischiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈. Con̈yahlaxi, coyahnipaxo jet anmahil.
Haxa yet isyeni Comam Dios Cocolomal isc'ulch'anil isc'ul, yeb hanta isxahanil ay sunil anma,

hac tu' yu con̈iscolni Comam. Maẍtaj yu isc'ulal cowatx'e yuxin con̈iscol Comam, machoj, to yu tz'ay isc'ul Comam jin̈. Con̈istx'ah Comam yin̈ comachiswalilal, ha' chaliloj tato con̈itzitzbican̈ yin̈ iscayelal yet yak'ni Comam Esp'iritu Santo k'inale ac'to jet.
Yu Cocolomal Jesucristo xin, yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet yin̈ isyaxilal.
C'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam, yaj yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul, yuxin yak' Comam cok'inal ayn̈etic'a yin̈ huneln̈e, hune' ayco yipo janma.

Huntek'an cuybanile ti' caw yeli, yuxin chiwochehan tato maẍtic'a chabej hawalni, haxinwal ha' mac chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, chiyaco yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'en tzet caw c'ul. Huntek'an cuybanile ti' caw c'ul, caw chicolwa jin̈ cosunil.

Yaja' mach chawaco haba xol ebnaj chi-la-isteyele isba yin̈ sucal tzoti', yeb ebnaj chiichenti istzoti'al tzet yelapno ye ebnaj ichmame. Mach chawapaxico haba xol ebnaj comon chi-la-yak'le howal, yeb chi-la-isteyele isba yin̈ isley naj Mois'es. Matzet chal yelapno huntek'an tu', matzet chik' ebnaj yin̈.
Ta ay mac chal pohnoto yuninal Comam Dios yu cuybanile mach yeloj, chachcachwa yin̈ hunel maca cayel, yaj ta mach chabe tzet chawala, chawilo texol.
Ha' mac chiwatx'en haca' tu', hawohtaj tato xayetato isba, ha'tic'a ismul chiswatx'e tu', ha' chianico yin̈ isya'tajil.
Hayet chinchejnitojan juẍta Artemas maca yuẍta T'iquico tac'atan̈, chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hato bey con̈ob Nic'opolis quinhawila'an, yuto chiwochehan ta ha' bey tu' ayinan yet chiec' n̈abil.
Hantatic'a chu hawu chaẍcolwa yin̈ juẍta licenciado Zenas yeb juẍta Apolos islahni isbel, yun̈e mach chitan̈ayo tzet chiocnico yu ebnaj.
Hac tu' xin chik'ayilo ebnaj juẍta tu' iswatx'en isc'ulal, haxinwal yet ay tzet ch'ocnicoj yohtaxa ebnaj iscolwahi, hac tu' xin ay ismunil ebnaj yul sat Comam Dios.

Sunil ebnaj juẍta ayc'o inc'atan̈an bey ti', chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil. Chawal tet sunil ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' ta chil isba ebnaj. Yak'abayo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ bey tu'. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin Pablo inti'an, ayinicojan preso yu walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo. Haninan yeb juẍta Timoteo chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ hune' carta ti' tawet wuẍta Filem'on; xahan ayach juhan̈, jetbipaxo coba yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios.
Chicotz'ibn̈epaxtojan̈ tet ix janab Apia, yebpaxo tet naj juẍta Arquipo, naj caw colwa jin̈an̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, yeb tet sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chiscutxba isba bey hawatut.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios Mame, yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul, yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet.
Yet chintxahlihan tet Comam Dios hunta el, chaẍinnatijan, chiwak'nihan yuch'andiosal tawin̈ tet Comam.
Yuto xawabehan tato caw xahan chawil macta yetxa Comam yehi, yeb ta caw ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us.
Caw chink'anan tet Comam Dios ta ha' anma xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, yu chila ta ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios, caw chistxumiloj tato han̈c'an̈e Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulal jet.
Wuẍtaj, caw chintzalahan yeb xin caw chiyik' yip wanmahan yu isc'ulch'anil hac'ul, yuto hawu yuxin xaischah macta yetxa Comam Dios yak'lobal yanma.
Haninti'an ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan, yuxin chu walnihan tawet baytet caw yilal hawatx'eni.

Yaja' haca' chu yay cosat cok'anni hunu tzet ye tu', hac tu' chu walnitojan tawet, yuto caw xahan ayach wuhan. Hanin Pablo inti'an icham inxahan, caw xin ayinicojan preso yu chiwalic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo.
Caw chinocan ink'ana'an tawet yin̈ naj On'esimo, naj ti' haca'tan̈e inc'aholan ye naj, yuto ischah naj Comam Jesucristo yul yanma yet ayinicojan preso ti'.
Naj On'esimo ti', haca' hunu chejab caw matzet chiocnicoj, hac tu' ye naj hawu yet yalan̈tocanoj, yaja' wal tinan̈ xin caw chiocnoco naj hawu, haca' yu yocnico naj wuhan bey ti'.
Wal tinan̈ chiwatojan naj tac'atan̈ hunelxa, c'ul chu hachahni naj, haca'ojtam haninan chinhachahan.
Wochebalan chicancano naj inc'atan̈an yu inchejnihan naj, ha'ojtam xin hach chachinchejan selelo naj yulbal ayinictijan yul preso ti' yu Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile.
Yaja' mach chisje inc'ulan inwatx'ehan hunu tzet ye tu' yalan̈to maẍto chiwabehan tzet chawute hawalni, haxinwal hune' chink'anan tawet ti' machojab lan̈biloj, wal xin yin̈ojab hawanma chitita.
Naj On'esimo ti', el naj hanic' tiempohal tac'atan̈, yaja' yun̈e ismeltzo naj tac'atan̈ yin̈ huneln̈e.

Yaja' matxa haca'o hunu chejab chuco naj, wal xin caw nimanojab yelapno naj yul hasat, haca' hunu juẍta caw ochebil ju. Walinan caw xahan ay naj wuhan bey ti', walachpaxo xin, ec'nahojab xahan chawil naj. Machn̈eojabtaj yu jet anmahil naj yuxin xahan chawil naj, walxinto yu juẍtaxa naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yuxin ta caw juẍtaxa coba yin̈ Comam chawabe, chah naj hacojtam haninan chinapnihan tac'atan̈.
Tato ay hunu istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tawin̈, maca ta ay isc'as naj tawet, teye wetan.

Hanin Pablo inti'an han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan, tato ay isc'as naj tawet haninan chintohlahan, waxan̈ca xin chinnatijan tawet tato aypaxo hac'as wetan, yuto haninan walan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo tawet yet hachahni Comam yul hawanma.
Hach wuẍtaj yije tzet chink'anan tawet ti', yuto yuninalxa Comam Dios hawehi. Ak' yak'lobal wanmahan, yuto juẍtaxa coba yin̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' tawet yuto wohtajan tato caw yijemach, caw wohtapaxojan tato ec'balto tzet chayije yiban̈ tzet chiwaltoti'an.
Chiwalnipaxtojan tawet, chasay nino bay chinehan yet chinapnihan texol. Caw xin chiwacojan yipo wanmahan ta yu chextxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios, chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam intohan quexwilnojan.
Chalto naj juẍta Epafras ta chawil haba bey tu', ayco naj preso wintajan bey ti' yu yalnipaxic'o naj Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo.
Chalpaxto juẍta Marcos, juẍta Aristarco, juẍta Demas yeb juẍta Lucas ta cheyil heba bey tu'; ebnaj ti' wet munlawomalan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios.
Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ bey tu'.
Yet yalan̈tocanoj tx'i'al el yeb nanantan̈e yu istzotel Comam Dios tet ebnaj jichmam yu ebnaj ischejab Comam.

Yaja' wal yin̈ islahobal tiempo ti' tzotel Comam Dios jet yu Isc'ahol, ha' xin yul isk'ab Isc'ahol tu' yacanico sunil tzettaj ye tu'; yuto yu Isc'ahol tu' yuxin iswatx'e Comam sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Ha' Isc'ahol Comam tu' chiyenilo isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios yeb yechel Comam yehi. Ha' xin yip Istzoti' Isc'ahol tu' ik'n̈e sunil tzettaj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Lahwi con̈issajn̈encano Comam C'ahole yin̈ comul, yoc tz'on̈no yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios yul satcan̈.
Isc'ahol Comam Dios, caw ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ ebnaj 'angel; yuto ha' ismunil Comam ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ ismunil ebnaj.

Wal xin machi hunu ebnaj 'angel bay yal Comam Dios haca' yu yalni Comam tet Comam Cristo: Hach ti', hach Inc'aholan, chiwak'canojan hacawil yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti', ẍi Comam. Maẍtaj yin̈ hunu ebnaj 'angel bay yalpaxo Comam haca' ti': Haninan Ismam naj. Inc'aholan ye naj, ẍi.
Chalnipaxo yin̈ yet yaniti Comam Dios hunpilan Isc'ahol yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti': Yik'abayo isba sunil ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios tet naj, ẍiayoj.
Walpaxo yin̈ ebnaj 'angel chal haca' ti': Chuteco Comam Dios ebnaj 'angel haca' jak'ek' cat yutenpaxico Comam ischejab haca' xaj k'a k'a', ẍi.
Walpaxo yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam tu' chala: Hach Dios, yahaw hach yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Ha' istoholal xin chawatx'e yet ayachico Yahawiloj.
Caw chachtzala yin̈ isc'ulal, wal istx'ojal xin chayaha. Yuxin sic'bilachilo yu Comam Dios haDiosal. Caw ec'bal tzalahilal yak' tawet sata ebnaj hawetbi, ẍi.
Chalnipaxoj: Hach ti' Mam Wahawil yet yichebanil hawatx'e tx'o tx'otx', hawatx'enpaxo satcan̈.
Sunil tzet watx'ebil hawu tu' chitan̈caniloj. Walach ti' xin ayachn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Sunil tzet watx'ebil tu' chiichambiloj haca' chu isxilbilo hunu xilk'ape.

Chapajtzoyo haca' chu ispajtzolaxayo hunu k'ap k'ap, cat hahelni haca' chu ishelni hunu mac xil isk'ap, yaja' walach xin hune'n̈etic'a ha' hach yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, machi bak'inal chachtan̈iloj, ẍiayoj.
Machi hunelo ti' yal Comam Dios tet ebnaj y'angel haca' yu yalni tet Isc'ahol: Ayan̈ tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban masanta chiwak'acojan macta ayco ishowal tawin̈ yalan̈ hawoj, ẍi Comam.
Sunil ebnaj 'angel esp'iritu ebnaj, ayco ebnaj ischejabo Comam Dios yu iscolwa ebnaj yin̈ macta chischah iscolbanil.
Yuxin caw yilal janico conabal yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile abebilxatic'a ju, haxinwal mach chicoheq'uilo coba yin̈.
Yuto ta huntek'an chejbanile yal ebnaj 'angel yet payxa caw ay ismay yucanoj, yuxin ha' mac man̈c'oni ay isya'tajil yiban̈ haca' caw yehi.

Hajxamon̈ chal tu', ¿tzettaxca chu cocolcha tet isya'tajil ta mach chicam coc'ul yin̈ hune' cocolbanil caw niman yelapnoj? Yuto ha' caw Comam Jahawil halni hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ti' yin̈ babelal, haxa ebnaj abeni, ha' ebnaj ak'ni johtan̈elo yin̈ caw isyelal.

Yeb xin ha'tic'a Comam Dios yaco isba testigohal yin̈ hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ti' yu ej yechel yip Comam yeb yu ej c'aybalc'ule, yeb yu tzettaj ak'lax yub ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo haca' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios.
Maẍtaj yalan̈o yip ebnaj 'angel yacto Comam Dios hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal bay lan̈an cotzotel ti', hune' chito huli.
Yuto ay hune' bay chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': ¿Tzet yelapno ye anma yuxin chanatij? ¿Tzet yelapno ye anma yuxin chawaco yin̈ hac'ul?
Txann̈e hanic' ishelanil anma hawak' hanic' tiempohal sata ebnaj 'angel. Lahwi tu' hayenilo ismay yeb xin caw ay yelapno elicoj.

Hawanico sunil tzet watx'ebil hawu yalan̈ yip anma, ẍiayoj. Yet chalni tato sunil tzettaj ye tu' can yalan̈ yip anma, chaliloj tato machi hunu tzet ye tu' ti' mach can yalan̈ yip, yaja' maẍto ixtan̈o jilni ta ayco sunil yalan̈ yip anma.

Yaja' wal Comam Jes'us, Comam txann̈e hanic' yip yak' Comam Dios sata ebnaj 'angel hanic' tiempohal ak'lax ismay yeb caw ay yelapno elicoj yu isya'tajil camical, yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin yak' isba yin̈ camical yu isc'ulalo jin̈.

Comam Dios watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj ye tu', yeb yu Comam yuxin iswatx'e, choche tato sunil yuninal chischah ismajul satcan̈ cat yec' yin̈ isc'ulch'anil Comam, yu yak'le Comam Jesucristo isya'tajil, hac tu' yu istz'ajna isc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jes'us Iscolomal anma.

Sunilon̈ ayon̈xaco yuninalo Comam Dios ti' hune'n̈e Comam yeb hune' mac con̈anico yuninalo Comam tu', ha' ton xin Comam Jesucristo. Yu hune' tu' yuxin ha' Comam Isc'ahol Comam Dios, mach chitx'ixwi con̈yalni yuẍtajoj, yeb ebix janab, mach chitx'ixwi Comam yalni ebix yanaboj.
Haca' yu yalni Comam Jes'us tet Comam Dios bay chala: Chachwalic'ojan tet ebnaj wuẍtajan yeb tet ebix wanaban. Chachinbitn̈epaxojan xol yet chiscutxban isba, ẍi.
Ay hune'xa bay chala: Yin̈ Comam Dios chicawxi inc'ulan, ẍi. Ay hune'xa bay chalpaxoj: Ayinic'ojan bey ti' yeb wuninalan xayak' Comam Dios wetan, ẍi.
Yuxin ha' nimanile ik'bil yu Comam Jesucristo lahan haca' isnimanil ebnaj ayco yul isk'ab Comam. Hayet iscam Comam xin isk'oji yin̈ yahaw camical, ha' ton naj matzwalil.
Hac tu' xin yu iscolni Comam sunil mac ayicto yalan̈ yip xiwquilal camical yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Yuto maẍtaj yin̈ ebnaj 'angel hul Comam colwal, walxinto ha' ebnaj titna yin̈ naj Abraham hul Comam iscolo'.

Yuxin caw yilal yuteco isba Comam haca' han̈on̈ yuẍtajon̈ ti', yu istz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yeb yu yoc tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios, haca' hunu naj yahawil sacerdote caw yijem, yanico isba Comam xahanbalil jin̈ yu yelcano comul jiban̈.
Yuto ec'lena Comam Jesucristo yin̈ isya'tajil yeb yin̈ ilwebal yuxin ha' Comam chicolwa jin̈ yin̈ej ilwebal chul jiban̈.

Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex yet hexxa Comam Dios, awtebilex yu Comam yu heyoc yuninaloj. Caw cam cheyaco henabal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, Comam chejbilti yu Comam Dios yeb chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam haca' hunu naj yahawil sacerdote, ha' yin̈ Comam tu' xin ayco janma.
Comam Jesucristo tu' caw yijem yute isba tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' ismunil ak'lax tet; hacpax tu' naj Mois'es, caw yijem yute isba naj yin̈ ismunil ak'lax xol iscon̈ob Comam Dios.
Yaja' Comam Jes'us, ec'bal yelapno Comam sata naj Mois'es tu'. Haca' hunu naj chianican̈ hunu te' n̈a, ec'bal yelapno naj yiban̈ te' n̈a chiswatx'e tu'.
Haca' hunu te' n̈a tinan̈, yilaltic'a ay hunu mac chianican̈ te', hac tu' xin ye sunil tzettaj ye tu', ha' Comam Dios watx'en̈e.
Hac tu' xin naj Mois'es caw yijem yute isba naj ismunla xol iscon̈ob Comam Dios yuto ischejab Comam Dios ye naj. Ha' xin ismunil naj ha' yalni tet con̈ob yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios.

Wal Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi, caw yijem yin̈ ismunil yul yatut Comam Dios. Hune' yatut Comam tu' xin ha' ton han̈on̈ ti', yaja' ta t'in̈an iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet ayco yipo janma yin̈ caw tzalahilal.
Yuxin yal Comam Esp'iritu yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalti'an hanin Dios inti'an,
mach cheyak' cawxo heyanma haca' yu yoc anma man̈c'omal wetan bey tx'otx' desierto, quinyanicojan yin̈ ilwebal.
Ha' bey tu' quinyacojan heyichmam yin̈ ilwebal, waxan̈ca yil ebnaj huntek'an isc'ulal inwatx'ehan yulbal cawina habil.
Yuxin tit inhowalan yin̈ huntek'an anma tu', walnihan: "Nanantan̈etic'a bay chato huntek'an anma tu' isnabal, maẍtic'a chohtan̈elo inbehan," quinchiyan.
Walnihan yu inhowalan haca' ti': "Huntek'an anma ti' maẍtic'a chischah hune' xewilal chiwak'an," quinchiyan, ẍi Comam yul Yum.
Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, caw cheyil heba, machojab hunujex cheyak' cawxolo heyanma, machojab hunujex chebej heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam, cat heyinilo heba yin̈ Comam Dios itzitz.
Wal xin hununojab tz'ayic heyiptzen heba hununex, yak' isba lan̈an istzotel Comam jet haca' yalni yul Yum, yun̈e machi hunujex chexsubcha yu mule cat iscawbilo heyanma.
Yuxin ta lin̈anon̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yin̈ tzet jaco yipo janma yet yalan̈tocanoj, ay comajul isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo.
Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios: Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalan tinan̈ hanin heDiosal inti'an, mach cheyak' cawbolo heyanma haca' yute anma man̈c'on yin̈ tzet walan, ẍiayoj.
¿Mac xin anmahil huntek'an ebnaj lahwi yaben Istzoti' Comam Dios isman̈c'on yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu'? Ha' ton ebnaj jet con̈ob Israel yilti naj Mois'es yul con̈ob Egipto.
¿Mac yin̈ xin tit ishowal Comam Dios yulbal cawina habil? Ha' ton huntek'an mac yaco ismul tet Comam bey tx'otx' desierto, iscamcano bey tu'.
Yeb xin, ¿mac tet yak' binaho Comam isbi yet yalni tato mach chiocto yul hune' xewbal chak' Comam? Ha' ton tet macta man̈c'on yin̈ tzet yal Comam.
Hac tu' chu cotxumni ta mach octo anma yin̈ hune' xewbal chak' Comam tu', yuto mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.
Yuxin yak' isba chito haltelax joc yin̈ hune' xewilal chak' Comam Dios, hune' haltebilcano yu Comam, yuxin caw yilal cheyil heba, tajca ayex mach chexoc yin̈ hune' xewilal tu'.
Yuto hallaxpaxo Tzoti' yet colbanile jet haca' yu yallax tet ebnaj tu', yaja' xin matzet iswatx'e yin̈ ebnaj yet yaben ebnaj, yuto mach yaco yanma ebnaj yin̈.

Wal han̈on̈ xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam chon̈oc yin̈ hune' xewilal chal Comam tu'. Yu chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti': Walan yin̈ inbihan yu inhowalan tato maẍtic'a chiocto huntek'an anma ti' yul hune' xewbal chiwak'an, ẍi Comam, ẍiayoj. Yin̈ caw yeli hataxtic'a yet iswatx'encano Comam Dios sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isxew Comam yin̈ ismunil,
yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios yin̈ ishuj tz'ayic haca' ti': Xew Comam yin̈ ishuj tz'ayic yin̈ sunil tzet iswatx'e, ẍiayoj.
Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam: Huntek'an anma ti' mach chiocto yin̈ hune' xewbal chiwak'an, ẍiayoj.
Yaja' yilal ayto mac chiocto yin̈ hune' xewilal tu' tinan̈, yuto tet ebnaj Israel bay babel hallax Tzoti' yet colbanile, yaja' mach octo ebnaj yin̈ hune' xewbal tu' yu isman̈c'omal.

Yuxin ay hune' tiempohal yebilcano yu Comam Dios, ha' ton hune' tiempohal bay ayon̈ ti' tinan̈. Payxatax halbilcano yin̈ hune' xewbal ti', yak'nipaxo Comam yala' naj David yul Yum Comam, bay chala: Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalan tinan̈ hanin heDiosal inti'an, mach hipo cheyute heba, ẍiayoj.
K'inalo ta oc ebnaj Israel yin̈ hune' xewbal tu' yu naj Josu'e machim tzotel Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tiempohal bay ayon̈ ti'.
Yuxin ay hune' xewbal chak' Comam tet macta yetxa Comam yehi.
Yuxin macta chiocto yul hune' xewbal chak' Comam ti' chixewcano yin̈ sunil ismunil, haca' yu isxew Comam yet lahwi iswatx'encano hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Yuxin jak'aweco yin̈ coc'ul jocto yin̈ hune' xewbal chak' Comam, yun̈e machi hunujon̈ chicobeybaln̈e isbeybal ebnaj man̈c'om tu'.

Yuto Istzoti' Comam Dios caw itzitz sunil chisje yu, chik'axpon yul janma haca' hunu ch'en espada cabeb yeh. Istzoti' Comam tu' chiapni yin̈ janma yeb yin̈ conabal yeb yin̈ tzet jehi. Chisyenilo tzet chiec' yin̈ conabal yeb yin̈ janma, ta c'ul maca mach c'uloj.
Sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios, machi hunu chu yeban isba sata Comam. Sunil tzet ye tu' haban ye yul sat Comam, Comam bay chijal tzettaj chicowatx'e.
Comam Jes'us Isc'ahol Comam Dios, xameltzo satcan̈, ha' chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios, yuto yahawil sacerdote ye Comam. Yuxin yilal colin̈ban coba yin̈ cuybanil bay ayco janma.

Wal Comam yahawil sacerdote tu' chu istz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yin̈ coya'tajil, yuto hayet yec' Comam yin̈ isnimanil coxol caw tx'i'al ilwebal hul yiban̈ haca' ej ilwebal chul jiban̈, yaja' machi bay yaco ismul Comam.
Yuxin yin̈ sunilojab janma chon̈hitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios Jahawil, Comam caw xahan ayon̈ yu, haxinwal chitz'aypaxo isc'ul jin̈ cat con̈iscolnilo yin̈ej isya'tajil chihul jin̈.
Yuto sunil ebnaj yahawil sacerdote saybililo ebnaj xol anma, yak'lax ismunil ebnaj istzotel yin̈ anma tet Comam Dios, yeb yu yalten ebnaj ofrenda yeb xahanbal tet Comam yin̈ ismul anma.
Ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' lahan ebnaj yeb yet anmahil chihoyxipaxico ilwebal yin̈ ebnaj, yuxin chu istz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ macta machi isnabal yeb yin̈ macta c'aynatoj.
Yuxin yilal yalten ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul babel cat yak'ni ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul anma.
Machi hunu ebnaj ton̈e oc yin̈ hune' munil caw ay yelapno tu', walxinto ha' Comam Dios sayn̈eco ebnaj, haca' yu issaylaxico naj Aar'on.

Hacpax tu' Comam Cristo mach ton̈e yaco isba yahawilo sacerdote ischuquil, wal xin ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' ismunil caw ay yelapno tu', yuto ha' Comam Dios halnicano haca' ti': Hach ti' Inc'aholan, haninan chiwak'an hacawil yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti', ẍiayoj.
Yeb xin ay hune'xa bay halbilcano yu Comam haca' ti': Hach ti' sacerdote yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, haca' naj Melquisedec, ẍiayoj.

Yet yehic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw ok'i yeb caw ip txahli tet Comam Dios, isk'anni tet Comam Dios, Comam ay yip iscolni tet camical; yaben Comam istxah yuto caw yijem yute isba Comam.
Waxan̈ca Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jes'us, yaja' hul isya'tajil yiban̈ caw xin yijem yute isba tet Comam Dios yu ej ilwebal hul yiban̈.
Yu isyijemal Comam tu' yuxin ak'lax ismunil yak'ni colbanil mach istan̈bal tet macta chiyijen tzet chal Comam.
Ha' xin Comam Dios an̈eco Comam Jes'us yahawilo sacerdotehal yu istzotel jin̈ tet Comam, haca' naj Melquisedec yet payat tiempo.
Caw tzetc'ato tzet chiwochehan chiwalan teyet yin̈ huntek'an ti', yaja' ya'ta quexcowatx'enico yin̈ yuto caw lan̈o chitxumcha heyu.

Yuto haca'xa istiempohal yichi heyaben cuybanile ti', cuywawom hexxam tinan̈, yaja' wal xin ayto yilal hecuylax yin̈ yac'tohal yin̈ huntek'an babel cuybanile yet Comam. Caw haca' ye niẍte nene', maẍto chu yak'lax hunu tzet ye tu' islob, to imeto chiak'lax tet, hac tu' heyehi.
Huntek'an babel cuybanile tu' yet mac maẍto chik'oji istxumni yin̈ istoholal, yuto haca' to niẍte unin imeto chiak'lax tet, hac tu' yehi.
Wal huntek'an cuybanile ayxacan̈ xin yet mac ayxa isnabal yin̈ istoholal, xak'oji istxumni baytet c'ul yeb baytet mach c'uloj; ha' mac haca' tu' lahan haca' icham anma, chu isloni cawla tzet ye tu'.

Wal tinan̈ xin, belwojon̈we cosataj, haxinwal caw helan chon̈elicoj. Canojabcano huntek'an babel cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, machojab chon̈oc cocayen̈e huntek'an babel cuybanile jabe tu'; haca' cuybanile chihalni yin̈ cobejnicano cowatx'en huntek'an tzet chiiniti camical jiban̈, yeb yin̈ tzet chu janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios.

Yeb cuybanile yin̈ yah ha' cowi', yeb cuybanil janayo cok'ab yiban̈ iswi' mac chichahni ismunil tet Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ tzet chu yitzitzibican̈ camom, yeb yin̈ isya'tajil mach istan̈bal chak' Comam Dios tet anma.
Wal tinan̈ xin ha' cuybanile ayxacan̈ ha' chiwalan teyet ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios.
Ha' mac xachahni sajilk'inal yul yanma yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios, yeb xaischah isc'ulal Comam Esp'iritu Santo,
yeb xin xayabe ischi'al Istzoti' Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ yip Comam chisye yin̈ huntek'an chihuli.

Huntek'an mac tu' ta chilo isnabal yin̈ Comam Dios, ¿tzettaxca chu ismeltzo yul isk'ab Comam hunelxa? Yuto lahan haca' lan̈an yanican̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios yin̈ culus hunelxa, cat yanico yin̈ tx'ixwilal sata sunil anma.
K'inalo tx'o tx'otx' tinan̈, yet chi-la-yak'ni ha' n̈ab cat yuc'nito tx'otx' ha'; ta c'ul tz'unub chak' tx'otx' tet naj chimunla sat tx'otx', ha' chaliloj ta ayayo isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈.
Yaja' ta tx'ixn̈e te' chak' tx'otx' yeb te' comon telaj, machi nino xin isc'ulal chak' tx'otx', chielto tz'acti' yiban̈ tx'otx' yu Comam, haxa yin̈ islahobal xin cat isn̈uslaxcanto tx'otx'.
Waxan̈ca hac tu' cotzotelan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay juan̈, yaja' caw johtajan̈ tato hex ti' ayxaco isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios teyin̈, ha' xin chalniloj tato ayxa hecolbanil.

Yuto Comam Dios istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e, machi xin chisnahuln̈eto Comam isc'ulal hewatx'e yeb isc'ulch'anil hec'ul heye tet Comam yet hecolwa yin̈ mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi, hune'n̈e ha' xin lan̈an hewatx'enpaxo tinan̈.
Caw xin chijochehan̈ tato hac tu' chewatx'e yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, haxinwal tz'ajan chechah tzet ayco yipo heyanma.

Mach chijochehan̈ ta chexisabilo yin̈ ismunil Comam; walxinto beybaln̈ewe isbeybal ebnaj ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yeb ay isnimanc'ulal. Ebnaj chibeybaln̈en huntek'an tu' chischah ebnaj tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios.

Yet yaltencano Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet naj Abraham yeb ta caw hantan̈e yuninal naj, ha' isbi Comam yak' binahoj yet yaltencanoj, yuto machi hunuxa mac ec'bal yiban̈ Comam, yuxin ha' isbi Comam yak' binahoj.
Yalni Comam haca' ti': "Yin̈ caw isyelal, caw tx'i'al isc'ulal chiwak'an tawet, cat wak'ni pohchahocan̈an hawuninal," ẍi Comam.
Caw xin niman yute isc'ul naj Abraham tu' yechman yin̈ niman tiempo, lahwi tu' ischahni naj tzet halbilcano yu Comam tu'.

Hayet chak'ni binaho anma isbi hunu mac yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu', ha' isbi hunu mac ec'bal yiban̈ ha' chak' binahoj; yuxin hayet chak'ni binaho anma isbi hunu mac yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' t'in̈an chucanoj, matxa hunu mac chu yoc tzotelo yiban̈iloj.
Hac tu' yute Comam Dios, yak' binaho Comam isbi yin̈ tzet yaltecanoj, yun̈e isyenilo Comam tet mac bay yalte tu' tato t'in̈an yucano yu Comam, mach chiec'to yet yijni isba yin̈ tzet yalte tu'.

Hac tu' xin ay cabeb mach chu ishec'ni isba yuto mach chu yanico Comam lek'ti'al; ha' ton istak'wecanico Comam yin̈ yaltenpaxcano Comam yet yak'ni binaho isbi yin̈ tzet yalte. Hac tu' chu con̈yiptzen Comam yun̈e iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet haltebil jet yu, han̈on̈ saybilon̈ yu Comam yu con̈iscolni.

Ha' tzet ayco yipo janma tu', ha' chon̈lin̈bani cat yak'ni ist'in̈anil janma, haca' chu islin̈ban ch'en ancla te' barco yiban̈ ha' mar. Hune' iscawxobal coc'ul xaapni sata Comam Dios haca' ta xak'axponic'to yinta k'ap k'ap aycan̈ yictabal yatut Comam Dios bey satcan̈.

Hac tu' yu isbabicto Comam Jesucristo cosataj, ishajnicano cobeh. Hac tu' xin yu yoccano Comam tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios; yahawil sacerdote yeco Comam jin̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, haca' naj Melquisedec yet payat tiempo.

Naj Melquisedec tu', ha' naj isreyal con̈ob Salem yet payat tiempo, yeb xin issacerdote Comam caw aycano yip ye naj. Yet hunel xin yet isbeyc'o naj Abraham yin̈ hune' howal, isk'oji naj yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj rey. Haxa yet ismeltzo naj Abraham, yul chalaxo naj yul beh yu naj Melquisedec; isk'anni naj isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Abraham tu'.

Yak'ni naj Abraham isdiezmohal sunil tzet yik' naj yin̈ howal tu' tet naj. Hune' bihe Melquisedec chal yelapnoj: Yahawil yin̈ caw istoholal, yeb xin Yahawil yin̈ ak'anc'ulal, yuto naj Melquisedec tu' yahaw con̈ob Salem ye naj, Salem chal yelapnoj: ak'anc'ulal.

Naj Melquisedec tu' mach ohtabilo mac ismam naj yeb mac ismi' naj, yebpaxo mac yichmam naj. Machipaxo mac chalni yin̈ yet ispitzc'a naj yebpaxo yin̈ iscamical naj yuxin yechel yeco naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios, yuto machi isbi bak'in lahwi ismunil naj.
Tinan̈ xin txumweloj ta caw niman yelapno ye naj Melquisedec tu', yuto ha' caw naj jichmam Abraham ak'ni isdiezmo tet naj yin̈ sunil tzet yik' naj yet isbey naj yin̈ howal.

Haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es, ebnaj sacerdote titna yin̈ naj Lev'i, ay yip ebnaj isk'anni tet yet con̈ob isdiezmohal yin̈ sunil tzet aya, waxan̈ca xin yuẍta isba ebnaj, yeb yichmam ebnaj ye naj Abraham.
