Yaja' wal naj Melquisedec tu', mach titnajo naj yin̈ naj Lev'i, yaja' yak' naj Abraham isdiezmo tet naj. Isk'annicano naj isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Abraham tu', naj bay yalte Comam Dios isc'ulal isc'ul.
Caw johtaj tato naj chik'anni isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ hunu maca, ec'bal yelapno naj yiban̈ hune' mac tu'.

Ebnaj yuninal yuninal naj Lev'i k'anni isdiezmohal sunil tzet ye tu' tet yet con̈ob, ebnaj tu' le-camto ebnaj, yaja' wal naj Melquisedec xin chal Yum Comam Dios tato itzitzto naj, yuto machi bay chal yin̈ iscamical naj.
Chu jalni tato ebnaj titna yin̈ naj Lev'i, ebnaj k'anni ch'en diezmo, ha' hun ebnaj ak'ni isdiezmo tet naj Melquisedec yet yak'ni naj Abraham isdiezmo.
Yuto waxan̈ca maẍto naj Lev'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yul chahlaxo naj Abraham yu naj Melquisedec, yaja' ayxatic'a naj Lev'i yin̈ naj Abraham, yuto ichmame ye naj Abraham yin̈ naj Lev'i tu'.

K'inalo tato yu ebnaj sacerdote levita watx'ico anma Israel yul sat Comam Dios yuto ha' ebnaj ak'ni ley tet con̈ob Israel, matxam yilalo oc hune'xa mac tzotelo yin̈ anma, hune' mac haca' naj Melquisedec mach haca'o naj Aar'on, naj titna yin̈ naj Lev'i.
Yuxin hayet chihellax hun majan ebnaj sacerdote, yilal ishellaxpaxo ley.
Comam Jesucristo, Comam bay chitzotel hune' ti', mach yic'alo naj Lev'i ye Comam, walxinto yin̈ hunmajanxa ebnaj Israel bay tit Comam, yin̈ yic'al Comam tu' xin machi hunu mac oclena sacerdotehal.
Caw johtaj tato Comam Jesucristo yin̈ naj Jud'a titna Comam, yaja' xin matzet yalcano naj Mois'es tato ebnaj chitit yin̈ yuninal naj Jud'a tu' ay ebnaj chioc sacerdotehal xol anma Israel.
Yin̈ hune' ti' caw habanto cotxumni ta hune' mac alaxico sacerdotehal jin̈, lahan yeb naj Melquisedec.
Oc sacerdotehal yaja' maẍtaj yu hune' ley chalni tato yilal istit yin̈ hune' majan ic'ale, machoj, to yu yip isk'inal Comam mach istan̈bal.
Yuto yal Comam Dios tet Comam Jes'us: Hach ti' sacerdote, chachoc tzotelo yin̈ anma wetan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo haca' naj Melquisedec, ẍi Comam.
Huntek'an chejbanile ak'lax yu naj Mois'es yet yalan̈tocano tu' xalahwi ismunil yuto machi yip yeb xin matzet iswatx'e.

Huntek'an chejbanile tu' machi hunu mac oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu, yaja' ay hune'xa caw c'ul occano seleloj, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo hune' ayco yipo janma, yu hune' tu' yuxin chon̈hitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios.
Hune' ayco yipo janma ti', yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yin̈ yet yaltencano Comam. Ebnaj sacerdote Israel mach yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yet yak'laxcano ismunil ebnaj yu Comam.

Wal Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yet yak'nicano Comam ismunil Comam, haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: Yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi, machi xin chishel isba tzet chala yet yalni haca' ti': "Hach ti' sacerdote hach, chachoc tzotelo yin̈ anma wetan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, haca' naj Melquisedec," ẍiayoj.
Yuxin ha' Comam Jes'us t'in̈bancano hune' iscab trato caw ec'bal c'ul sata hune' babel.
Ebnaj sacerdote yet yalan̈tocano tu' machi yu iscancano ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yin̈ huneln̈e yuto chi-la-camto ebnaj, yuxin caw tx'i'al ebnaj ec'lena yin̈ hune' munil tu'.
Walpaxo Comam Jesucristo machi bak'inal chicami, yuxin mach chiec'to ismunil tu' tet hunuxa maca, wal xin sacerdote Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Yuxin ch'ak' Comam colbanile mach istan̈bal tet macta chihitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yu Comam Jes'us. Ha' Comam xin chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yu mach chicam Comam.

Ha' Comam Jesucristo tu' ha'n̈ech'an Comam chu yoc tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios; yahawil sacerdote Comam, caw c'ulcano Comam, machi nino istx'ojal ayco yin̈, machi nich'ano ismul, pohbililo isba xol anma mulum. Ilaxto Comam isc'atan̈ Comam Dios satato satcan̈.

Mach lahano Comam haca' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote, titna yin̈ yuninal naj Lev'i yuto ebnaj tu' hunun tz'ayic yalten ebnaj no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil. Yin̈ babelal chak' ebnaj isxahanbal yin̈ ismul, lahwi tu' cat yalten ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul anma. Wal Comam Jes'us hunelch'an yaco isba Comam xahanbalil yu comul.

Ebnaj ak'lax ismunil yoc yahawil sacerdote yu isley naj Mois'es masantic'a ay istx'ojal ebnaj, yaja' wal Isc'ahol Comam Dios, hune' mac bay yak' binaho Comam isbi yet yak'ni ismunil yoc yahawil sacerdote yet tzujanilxa, hune' mac tu' maẍtic'a nich'ano istx'ojal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Ha' hune' caw yilal yin̈ huntek'an chijal ti' to ay hune' mac yahawil sacerdote jin̈, tz'on̈an yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios yul satcan̈.
Tinan̈ xin lan̈an istzotel Comam jin̈ yul yatut Comam Dios ay satcan̈, hune' n̈a tu' ha' caw Comam Dios watx'en̈e, mach anmahoj.
Sunil ebnaj yahawil sacerdote ak'bil ismunil ebnaj yalten sabehal yeb xahanbal tet Comam Dios, hacpax tu' Comam Jes'us yilaltic'a ay tzet chalte Comam tet Comam Dios.
Ta aytoc'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' matxam yilalo chioc Comam sacerdotehal, yuto ay ebnaj sacerdote ak'bil ismunil yak'ni xahanbal haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es.

Ismunil ebnaj sacerdote yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yecheln̈e ye yin̈ tzettaj ay yul satcan̈. Caw johtaj tato yecheln̈e yehi yuto hayet yalan̈to maẍto chiswatx'e naj Mois'es yatut Comam Dios, yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti': "Abe tzet chiwalti'an, caw haca' yechel inyehan tawet bey iswi' witz, hac tu' chawute," ẍi Comam.

Yaja' wal tinan̈ ayxaco Comam Jes'us yin̈ hune' munil ec'bal isc'ulal sata ismunil ebnaj sacerdote, yuto ha' Comam chitzotel yin̈ anma tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' iscab trato ec'bal isc'ulal sata hune' yet babelal. Hune' iscab trato tu' caw ec'bal isc'ulal chalte Comam Dios jet ik'bil yu.
K'inalo ta can anma c'ulal yu hune' babel trato matxam yilalo yak' Comam hune' iscab trato ti'.

Yaja' yil Comam Dios ta mach c'ulu elico huntek'an anma tu' yul sat, yuxin yalcano Comam yul Yum: Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil, chalni haca' ti': Chul hune' tiempohal bay chiwak'an hune' iscab trato tet anma Israel yeb tet anma Jud'a.

Ha' hune' iscab trato ti' mach lahano yeb haca' hune' wak'an tet yichmam ebnaj yet winilojan yul tx'otx' Egipto, haca'tan̈e xin inxequiltijan ebnaj. Yaja' yu mach isyije ebnaj intratotu'an, yuxin inbejcanojan ebnaj.

Ha' xin hune' trato chiwak'an tet anma Israel yin̈ tzujanilxa tu', ha' ton hune' ti': Chiwacojan inchejbanilan yin̈ isnabal ebnaj cat intz'ibn̈enicojan yin̈ yanma ebnaj. Haninan xin chinocan isDiosalo ebnaj cat yoc ebnaj incon̈obojan.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu', matxa yilalo chiscuy hunu mac yet con̈obal, maca hunu mac ayto yu isba yebi yu quinyohtan̈enan. Wal xin sunil mac chinohtan̈enan, sunil niẍte unin yeb ichamta anma.
Chiwak'nicanojan nimanc'ulal yin̈ istx'ojal, matxa xin chinnatijan ismul, ẍi Comam.
Hayet chalni Comam ac' yin̈ hune' iscab trato lan̈an yalni tato ichamxa hune' babel trato, yuto sunil tzet xaichambiloj chilahwi ismunil, hanic'xan̈e xin cat istan̈iloj.
Hune' babel trato tu' ay chejbanile chihalni yin̈ tzet chu isyijen ebnaj sacerdote ismunil tet Comam Dios, yaja' yul hune' yatut Comam sat tx'otx'al ti'.

Hune' yatut Comam tu', hac ti' yehi: Cabeb cuarto yul, pohbilayo yu hune' k'ap k'ap litx'ancan̈ yictabal. Hune' babel cuarto chihallax Txahulal, ha' tu' ayicto ch'en l'ampara yeb te' meẍa, yeb ixim pan chihaltelax tet Comam Dios.
Haxa hune' cuarto yintac'to k'ap litx'ancan̈ tu' caw Ec'na txahul chihallax yin̈.

Ha' bey tu' ay hune' altar naba oro bay chin̈uslax pom, yulicto cuarto tu' aypaxicto te' caẍa yet istrato Comam Dios, sunil yin̈ te' ayco ch'en oro. Yul te' caẍa tu' ayayto hune' ẍalu naba oro bay ayayto man'a, aypaxayto isk'ojoch naj Aar'on, hune' te' k'ojoch elilo iswol; aypaxayto ch'en ch'en pak'an yehi bay tz'ibn̈ebiloco ley.

Yiban̈ te' caẍa tu' ayahto yechel cawan̈ ebnaj 'angel chiyij querub'in, ha' chaliloj ta ayayo Comam Dios bey tu', leyanilto xic' ebnaj yiban̈ ismajil te' caẍa tu'. Yaja' wal tinan̈, mach caw yilalo chon̈oc jala' yin̈ tzet caw ye huntek'an tu'.
Hac ton tu' ye iswatx'ebanil yatut Comam Dios tu'. Yul hune' babel cuarto hunun tz'ayic yocto ebnaj sacerdote isyijeno ismunil tet Comam.

Wal yul hune' cuarto caw ec'na txahul xin, han̈c'an̈e naj yahawil sacerdote chiocto yul, yaja' xin huneln̈ech'an chiocto naj yulbal habil. Hayet chiocto naj, ik'bil ischiq'uil no nok' yu naj yu yalten naj yin̈ ismul, yeb yin̈ ismul sunil anma mach nano yu chanic'o ismul.
Hac tu' chu yak'ni Comam Esp'iritu johtan̈eloj ta hayet yocnico hune' babel cuarto tu' maẍto chihajlax beh japni yin̈ sat Comam Dios.
Hune' babel cuarto tu' yecheln̈e yin̈ hune' tiempo bay ayon̈ ti', yuto huntek'an sabehal yeb xahanbal chihaltelaxi, mach chiswatx'eco isnabal anma chiyiyo isba bey tu' yin̈ istoholal.

Huntek'an chejbanile tu' yin̈n̈e tzet chilolaxi yeb tzet chiuc'lax bay chitzoteli, yin̈ issajn̈elax tzettaj ye tu'; huntek'an tu' yetn̈e conimanil yehi. Ocnico huntek'an chejbanil tu' yin̈ ismunil masanto yet yapni istiempohal ishelni Comam tzettaj ye tu'.

Yaja' xahulic'o Comam Cristo, ha' Comam Yahawil sacerdote xayak' isc'ulal jet, huntek'an yilaltic'a yuli. Haxa hune' yatut Comam Dios bay ayco Comam Jes'us sacerdotehal caw ec'bal isc'ulal yeb tz'ajan yehi, maẍtaj ebnaj winaj watx'en̈e, mach yeto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi.

Xaapni Comam Jes'us sata Comam Dios satcan̈, yaja' maẍtaj ischiq'uil no' chiw maca ischiq'uil no' niẍte wacax yalte Comam, walxinto ha' caw ischiq'uil Comam yalte. Xaapni Comam sata Comam Dios yin̈ huneln̈e yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, hac tu' yu isk'oji Comam yak'nicano colbanil mach istan̈bal.
Yin̈ caw yeli ischiq'uil no' winaj wacax yeb ischiq'uil no' chiw yeb istan̈il no' k'opo wacax chitxihlaxico yiban̈ anma mulum, ay yip issajn̈encano isnimanil anma yet payxa tu'.

Hajxam ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo to caw ec'balto ay yip issajn̈en janma yin̈ istx'ojal, yun̈e coyijen yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, Comam itzitzn̈etic'a, yuto yu Comam Esp'iritu mach istan̈bal, yuxin yaco isba Comam Cristo xahanbalil tet Comam Dios, caw xin machi nino istx'ojal Comam.

Ha' iscamical Comam Jesucristo ak'ni tan̈o sunil mule alaxico yalan̈ hune' babel istrato Comam Dios, yuxin tinan̈ ha' Comam Jes'us chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' iscab trato ti', yun̈e han̈on̈ awtebilon̈ yu Comam chicochah comajul mach istan̈bal haltebilcano yu Comam.
Haca' hunu testamento watx'ebilcanoj, machi yip te' tato maẍto chicam naj an̈ecano te'.
Machi yip hune' testamento tu' tato itzitzto naj an̈ecanoj, wal ta xacam naj wal tu' ay yip.
Yuxin ha' hune' babel istrato Comam Dios yilal malto ischiq'uil no nok' yijnicano isba.

Yuto hayet lahwi yawten naj Mois'es chejbanil chal ley tet anma Israel, issomni naj ischiq'ul no' tzehla wacax yeb ischiq'uil no' chiw xol ha ha', yanico naj no' lana caj yin̈ iswi' isk'ab te' hisopo islahbanayto naj xol chic' tu', istxihnico naj yin̈ yumal ley yeb yiban̈ sunil anma Israel.
Yalni naj Mois'es tu' xin: "Ha' chic' ti' chit'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios chak' teyet. Yilal xin heyijen tzet chala," ẍi naj.
Istxihnipaxico naj Mois'es chic' yin̈ yatut Comam tu', yeb yin̈ sunil munlabal chiocnico yu ebnaj sacerdote yul yatut Comam tu'.
Haca' yalni ley ta sunil tzettaj ye tu' masanto chic' chisajn̈eni, machi xin nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma ta machi chic' chimaltoj.
Huntek'an yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ tzet ay yul satcan̈ yilal issajn̈elax yu xahanbal, yaja' wal tzet ay satcan̈ choche xahanbal ec'na c'ul sata huntek'an tu'.

Yuto Comam Cristo maẍtaj yul hune' yatut Comam Dios watx'ebil yu ebnaj winaj bay octoj, hune' yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ yatut Comam ay yul satcan̈, walxinto caw apni Comam sata Comam Dios yul satcan̈, ha' xin Comam chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios tinan̈.

Comam Jesucristo mach hayelta yaco isba xahanbalil haca' yute ebnaj yahawil sacerdote, yet yanico ebnaj ischiq'uil no nok' xahanbalil. Ebnaj tu' hunun habil yocto ebnaj yul yatut Comam Dios yalteno ischiq'uil no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil, maẍtaj ischiq'uil ebnaj chalte.

Ta hac tu', tx'i'alxam el chicam Comam yichitax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Wal xin ha' caw yehi to ha' yin̈ islahobal tiempo ti' ha' caw Comam hul yak'aco isba xahanbalil yin̈ huneln̈e yu yinilo Comam comul.
Yuto sunil anma yilal hunelch'an chicami, lahwi tu' cat yillaxi yin̈ tzet chielico yul sat Comam Dios.

Hac tu' xin Comam Jesucristo huneln̈ech'an yak' isba xahanbalil yu yinilo Comam ismul tzetc'a anma. Wal xin chul Comam yin̈ iscayelal, yaja' matxataj yu yinilo ismul anma, to yu iscolni Comam macta chiechmani.

Yuto ha' huntek'an xahanbal chal isley naj Mois'es maẍtaj ha' tzet caw ay yul satcan̈, wal xin yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal yilal yuli. Huntek'an xahanbal chalte ebnaj hunun habil mach chu istz'ajban isc'ul anma choche ishitzaco isba isc'atan̈ Comam Dios.
Yuto ta huntek'an xahanbal chal isley naj Mois'es tu' chu issajn̈encano anma yin̈ ismul, chimisbej yalten xahanbal, yuto matxa ismul chabe.
Wal xin ha' isxahanbal anma chi-la-yak' hunun habil tu', ha' chak'ni isnab anma isnaniti ismul.
Yuto ischiq'uil no' winaj wacax yeb no' chiw, mach chik'oji yinilo ismul anma.

Yuxin yet yul Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yalni tet Comam Dios haca' ti': Matxa chisje hac'ul ch'ak'lax xahanbal yeb sabehal tawet, yuxin ak'bil innimanilan hawu, ha' chiwak'an yin̈ xahanbalil tawet.
Mach chitzala hac'ul yin̈ xahanbal chin̈uslaxi yeb sabehal chiak'lax tawet yu yinilo mule.
Yuxinto chiwalan tawet: Mamin, hach inDiosalan, ayinan lah yu inyijenan tzet chawala, haca' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcano win̈an yul Hawum. ẍi Comam.
Yin̈ babelal, yal Comam Cristo ta mach isje isc'ul yeb mach chitzala Comam Dios tato chiak'lax xahanbal yeb sabehal tet, yeb no nok' chin̈uslaxi yu yel ismul anma, waxan̈ca xin hac tu' yalni ley.
Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam: "Mamin, hach inDiosalan, ayinan lah yu inyijenan tzet chawala," ẍi Comam. Chal yelapno tu' ta chilo huntek'an babel xahanbal tu' cat yanico hune' ac'.
Xacon̈yaco Comam Dios yetoj yuto isyije Comam Jesucristo tzet yal isc'ul Comam Dios yet yalten isba yin̈ xahanbalil yin̈ huneln̈e.
Sunil ebnaj sacerdote Israel hununn̈etic'a tz'ayic ayco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yalten xahanbal yeb xin hune'n̈etic'a ha' xahanbal chalte ebnaj, waxan̈ca xin mach chu yinilo mule.
Yaja' wal Comam Cristo huneln̈ech'an yaco isba xahanbalil yin̈ comul yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, lahwi tu' yoc tz'on̈no Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios.
Ha' tu' ay Comam yechman yalaxico sunil mac ayco ishowal yin̈ yalan̈ yoj.
Yuto hune'n̈e xahanbal yak' Comam con̈yanico yin̈ istoholal yin̈ huneln̈e han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam ti'.
Chak'paxo isba Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ huntek'an ti' yet chalni:
Hune' intratohan chiwak'an tet anma Israel yet tzujanilxa, ha' ton hune' ti': Chiwacojan inchejbanilan yul yanma yeb yin̈ isnabal, ẍi.
Lahwi tu' yalnipaxoj: Matxa bak'inal xin chinnatijan ismul yeb istx'ojal, ẍi Comam.
Yuxinto ayxa nimanc'ulal yin̈ mule, matxa yilalo chiak'lax xahanbal hunelxa.
Yuxin tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, yin̈xa sunil janma chon̈apni yin̈ sat Comam Dios bay ay yehobal caw ay yelapnoj, yaj yu ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo.
Chu japni yu hune' ac' beh chiak'ni k'inale iswatx'e Comam yet istzilmoyo k'ap k'ap aycan̈ yul yatut Comam Dios yet iscam Comam Jes'us.
Ha' Comam Jes'us ha' yahawil sacerdote, chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios, ha' caw ay yelapnoj, chimunla yul yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈.

Yuxin hitzojon̈weco yin̈ sunil janma sata Comam Dios, jak'aweyto yul janma yin̈ caw isyelal yuto sajxa ye janma yu ischiq'uil Comam, matxa istx'ojal chietanto conabal; yeb xin sajxa ye conimanil yu ha ha' caw saj.
Colin̈bawe coba yin̈ cuybanile xajabe ti', machojab chicabcon coc'ul yin̈ tzet ayco yipo janma, hune' bay tzujanon̈icoj, yuto chij isba tzet haltebil jet yu Comam Dios.
Cosaya'we yin̈ tzet chu cocolwa jin̈ hununon̈, haxinwal chicolahico coxahann̈en coba cat cowatx'en isc'ulal jin̈ hununon̈.
Machojab chicobej cocutxban coba yin̈ culto, haca' chute huntek'an ebnaj, wal xin jiptzewe coba hununon̈, yuto lan̈an isyenilo isba tato lan̈an ishitzti tiempo bay chihul Comam Jesucristo.
Yuto ta lahwi johtan̈enilo isyelal hune'n̈etic'a ha' xin janico comul, matxa hunuxa xahanbal chu yak'ni tan̈o comul chijaco tu'.
Ta hac tu' toxan̈e chijechma yul hune' niman isya'tajil jiban̈ yeb k'a k'a' chitan̈tzenilo sunil macta ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Dios.
Yet chisman̈c'on hunu mac isley naj Mois'es, ta ay xin cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ mac chalni tato yeli man̈c'om hune' mac tu', mak'bil ismak'lax camoj, matxa nimanc'ulal yin̈.

Hajxam mac chiyahni Isc'ahol Comam Dios yeb matzet chalilo ischiq'uil Comam yul sat, chinilo ispixan Comam Esp'iritu Santo, Comam chon̈ocheni. Huntek'an mac tu' caw ec'balto isya'tajil chiay yiban̈, yuto ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo t'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios, con̈yanipaxico yeto Comam.

Caw johtaj tato halbilcano yu Comam Dios, haca' ti': "Haninn̈ehan chiwilan yin̈ tzet chielico anma, haninan chiwak'an ispaj selel tet," ẍi Comam. Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam: "Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil chiilni yin̈ tzet chielico iscon̈ob," ẍiayoj.
¡Caw ay ismay yet chanayo Comam Dios itzitz isya'tajil jiban̈!
Naweti yet yalan̈tocanoj yet hechahni issajilk'inal yul heyanma caw heyak' techaho isya'tajil hul teyiban̈.
Hex ti' quexbahlaxi, heyetalax sata anma, ayex xin hul isya'tajil teyiban̈ yu quexcolwa yin̈ mac ak'lax ec'oya' yanma tu'.

Caw tz'aypaxo hec'ul yin̈ ebnaj alaxicto yul preso, machi xin oc bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yet yilaxilo tzet ayex yuto heyohtaj ta ec'balto isc'ulal chiak'lax teyet yul satcan̈, huntek'an machi bak'inal chilahwi.
Yuxin machojab chebej iscawxi hec'ul, yuto niman ispaj selel chak'lax teyet.
Niman cheyute hec'ul heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil, haxinwal chu hewatx'en tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios cat hechahnipaxo tzet haltebilcano yul Yum Comam,
yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios: Caw hanic'xan̈e bay chul Comam, Comam yilal yuli, caw mach chiec'to yet yuli.
Ha' mac xacan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios ha' ton mac maẍtic'a chisbej iscawxi isc'ul yin̈ Comam, yaja' wal mac chimeltzo yintaj mach chitzala isc'ul Comam yin̈, ẍi yul Yum Comam.
Yaja' wal han̈on̈ ti' mach chon̈meltzo jintaj haca' ebnaj chimeltzo yintaj cat istocano yin̈ isya'tajil. Wal han̈on̈ ti' chicochah cocolbanil yuto xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam.
Hayet chijanayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, ha' chal yelapnoj ta ayco yin̈ janma cochahni tzet echmabil ju, yeb xin t'in̈an jecoj ta chijil yin̈ huntek'an tzet maẍto chijilico yin̈.
Ebnaj ischejab Comam ec'lena yet payxa can ebnaj c'ulal yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.

Yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin t'in̈an jecoj ta yu Istzoti' Comam xin iswatx'e sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb satcan̈. Yuxin sunil tzet watx'ebil chijil tinan̈, mach yin̈o tzet watx'ebilxa titnaj.

Yu yayto naj Abel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin yalte naj hune' xahanbal ec'bal c'ul sata yet naj Ca'in. Hac tu' yu iscancano naj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, ischahni Comam isxahanbal naj. Waxan̈ca camnaxa naj Abel tu', yaja' yexn̈e istzotel naj jet yu yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios.

Yu yayto naj Enoc yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin ilaxto naj satcan̈ yu Comam, mach yil naj camical, matxa xin hunu mac ilni naj. Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato yet yalan̈to maẍto chiilaxto naj satcan̈ tu' caw tzala Comam Dios yin̈ tzet iswatx'e naj.

Yuto ta machi jayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios mach chitzala Comam yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e, yuto ha' mac choche chihitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yilal yanayto yul yanma tato ay Comam Dios yeb ta chak' Comam ispaj tet macta yin̈ sunil yanma chisayni Comam.

Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet yalni Comam ta chak' hune' niman yaxn̈ab isyijen naj tzet yal Comam, yoc naj iswatx'eno hune' barco bay chicolcha naj yeb yixal yeb oxwan̈ isc'ahol yeb ebix alibe, waxan̈ca xin maẍto ixtan̈o hune' n̈ab tu'. Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin colcha naj, wal anma xin tan̈ilo sunil. Iscancano naj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios, yu yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam.

Yu yayto naj Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet yawtenilo Comam naj, caw yijem yute isba naj, isto naj sat hune' tx'o tx'otx' halbilcano yu Comam Dios ta chak'lax ismajulo naj. Waxan̈ca xin mach yohtajo naj bay ay tx'otx', yaja' isbejcano naj iscon̈ob, isto naj.

Caw yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, isto naj ehoyo sat tx'o tx'otx' yalte Comam Dios; yaja' haca' wayan̈bal yu yec' naj sat tx'otx', iswatx'en naj k'ap mantiado yatutoj. Hacpax tu' xin ebnaj c'ahole, naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob, ha' hun ebnaj yin̈ tzet yalte Comam tu' tet naj Abraham.
Yuto naj Abraham tu' ha' hune' con̈ob caw c'ul yehayto isxe', ha' echmabil yu naj. Hune' con̈ob tu', ha' caw Comam Dios anayo ismalil, ha'tic'a xin Comam watx'eni.

Hacpax tu' ix Sara yayto ix yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin waxan̈ca caw ixnamxa ix yeb xin maẍtic'a hunu yunin ix, yaja' ak'lax yip ix yuninwi. Ispitzc'a nich'an yunin ix yeb yichamil yuto yayto ix yul yanma ta ha' tzet chalte Comam Dios masan chiyij isba.
Waxan̈ca caw ichamxa naj Abraham, yaj caw hantan̈e anma pohchacan̈ yin̈. Caw haca' isbisil tx'umel yeb arena ay isti' ha' mar, machi hunu mac chu isbisni.

Sunil huntek'an ebnaj tu' mach ischah ebnaj tzet haltebil yu Comam yet iscamto ebnaj; yaja' yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam yuxinto haca'tan̈e yilto ebnaj yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam tu' yin̈ nahat, caw xin tzala ebnaj yin̈. Istxumnilo ebnaj tato ton̈e chiec' ebnaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Yuxin ha' mac chitxumni haca' tu', chisyeloj ta lan̈an issayni hune' yehobal bay chiehi.
Yaja' ta ha' bay titna ebnaj ha' bay ayco isnabal ebnaj, meltzomi ebnaj yintaj.

Yaja' wal xin, ha' hune' ehobal ec'na c'ul ay yul satcan̈, ha' ayco yin̈ isnabal ebnaj. Yuxin mach chitx'ixwi Comam Dios yet chalni ebnaj Comam isDiosaloj, yuto ay hune' iscon̈ob ebnaj watx'ebil yu Comam.
Yu yayto naj Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin isyije naj yak'ni hunpilan isc'ahol yin̈ xahanbalil yet yilwelax naj yu Comam Dios; waxan̈ca xin halbil tet naj yu Comam haca' ti':
"Yin̈ naj Isaac chipohcha hawuninal," ẍi Comam.
Yuto yohta naj Abraham tu' ta chu ispitzc'ancan̈ Comam Dios camom, yuxin haca'tic'a ak'bil itzitzbocan̈ naj Isaac, yak'lax naj tet ismam.
Yu yayto naj Isaac yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin yalan̈to yalni naj yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal chischah naj Jacob yeb naj Esa'u yu Comam Dios.

Yu yayto icham Jacob yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet toxa chicam icham, yalnicano icham yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal chischah isc'ahol, ha' ton naj Jos'e, yay xulno icham yiban̈ iswi' isk'ojoch, yak'ni tzalaho isc'ul icham yin̈ Comam Dios.

Yu yayto naj Jos'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin yet yalan̈to maẍto chicam naj, yalnicano naj tato ay hune' tz'ayical ti' bay chiel ebnaj Israel sat tx'otx' Egipto. Yalnipaxo naj tato chito ebnaj Israel tu' isbajil isnimanil naj yet chiel ebnaj sat tx'otx' Egipto tu'.

Yu yayto ismam yeb ismi' naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin hayet ispitzc'a naj yebalaxilo naj oxeb ixahaw, yuto caw c'ulch'an jilni naj. Mach xin xiw ismam naj yeb ismi' naj tet chejbanile yak' naj isreyal Egipto tato chipotx'lax niẍte winaj unin.
Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet icham tzeh naj matxa yoche naj oco yunino ix iscutz'in naj rey Egipto tu'.
Walxinto ha' yec'ya' yanma naj yinta iscon̈ob Comam Dios, ha' issayilo naj sata yak'ni tzalaho yanma naj yin̈ huntek'an tzalahilal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', huntek'an pet chitan̈iloj.
Istxumnilo naj tato ec'balto c'ul yec'ya' yanma naj yu Comam Cristo sata yochen naj isk'alomal tx'otx' Egipto tu', yuto ha' yin̈ tzet chak' Comam ispajo tet naj, ha' bay ayco yanma naj.

Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin el naj yeb ebnaj Israel sat tx'otx' Egipto, machi xin xiw naj ta chitit ishowal naj rey tu' yin̈ naj. Caw yin̈n̈e Comam Dios yaco isnabal naj, haca'tan̈e caw yilico naj yin̈ Comam, Comam machi jilico yin̈.

Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin yec'tze naj k'in̈ Pascua, ischejni naj txihlaxoco ischiq'uil no' me' yin̈ iswi' yeb yin̈ isc'ul ispultahil yatut ebnaj Israel, yun̈e mach ispotx' naj 'angel ak'om camo anma isbabel c'ahol ebnaj Israel tu'.

Yu yayto ebnaj Israel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin ispoh isba ha' mar Rojo, yec'to ebnaj yictabal ha', caw xin tajin bay ec'to ebnaj. Haxa yet yec'to ebnaj Egipto yalni, ishunban isba ha', ishik'nito ebnaj ha', iscamilo ebnaj.
Yu yayto ebnaj Israel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin hayet lahwi hujeb tz'ayic yec' hoyon ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob Jeric'o yay buyna isc'ubal hune' con̈ob tu'.
Yu yayto ix Rahab, ix tx'oj ye iswi', yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin mach cam ix yinta macta man̈c'om, yuto c'ul yu ischahni ix ebnaj Israel beyc'o ilwal yin̈ con̈ob tu'.
¿Mactaxca hunuxa chiwalan tinan̈? Caw matxam tiempo ta chinocan tzotelo yin̈ naj Gede'on, naj Barac, naj Sans'on, naj Jeft'e, naj David yeb naj Samuel yebpaxo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat.

Yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin ay ebnaj k'oji yin̈ nimeta con̈ob, aypaxo ebnaj watx'en istoholal yet yoc yahawil, ay ebnaj ischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios, ay ebnaj majchen isti' no' balam.

Ay ebnaj k'oji isbutni nimeta k'a', ay ebnaj colcha tet ch'en espada, ay ebnaj machi yip yaj hul yip ebnaj, caw xin c'ul elcanico ebnaj yin̈ howal, isk'oji ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj ak'om howal tit yul hune'xa nan con̈obal.

Aypaxo ebix ix itzitzbican̈ yunin yu yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios. Ay ebnaj caw ya'ta yu iscami, yu mach chisje ebnaj isman̈c'o' tzet chal Comam Dios yuto choche ebnaj chiak'lax itzitzbocan̈ yin̈ hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal.
Ay ebnaj ec'ya' isbahlaxi ishatelaxpaxoj, ay ebnaj c'albalax yu ch'en cadena, ay ebnaj alaxicto yul preso.

Aypaxo ebnaj k'ojlax camoj, ay ebnaj c'uplaxayo yicta yu ch'en serrucho, ay ebnaj alaxico yin̈ ilwebal, aypaxo ebnaj ak'lax camo yu ch'en espada. Ay ebnaj nananta bay ec'le, xil no' me' yeb xil no' chiw ayco xilo isk'ap ebnaj, yak'len ebnaj meba'il yeb isya'tajil, isbahlaxpaxo ebnaj.

Anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach yeto ay ebnaj yec' xol, machi hunu bay caw ehayo ebnaj, walxinto ha' sat tx'otx' desierto ec' ebnaj yeb iswi'la witz yeb yulaj ch'en n̈ach'en, yeb yulaj tx'o tx'otx' holan ec' ebnaj.
Sunil ebnaj ti', waxan̈ca caw c'ul isbeybal ebnaj yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yaja' machi hunu ebnaj chahni tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios.
Yuto ayon̈ico yin̈ isnabal Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tzet ec'bal c'ul tu', yuxin mach yij isba tzet nabil yu Comam yin̈ ebnaj ischuquil, walxinto chihunico ebnaj jinta yin̈ istoholal.

Yuxin cotxumuloj ta haca' hoybilon̈ yu sunil macta yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin cobeja'wecano sunil tzet chon̈etantoj yeb mule chon̈ak'ni ayc'ayoj; cat jak'ni janma colahnico yin̈ hune' an̈e bay ayon̈icoj.

Jak'aweco conabal yin̈ Comam Jes'us, yuto ha' Comam ak'ni pitzc'aho janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, ha' Comam xin chitz'ajbancanoj. Yaco isba Comam yul isk'ab camical yin̈ te' culus, machi xin yoc yin̈ waxan̈ca caw tx'ixobal hune' camical tu', yuto yohta Comam ta lahwi yec'ya' yanma tu' cat ischahni tzalahilal. Tinan̈ xin tz'on̈an Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios.
Yuxin txumwe yin̈ tzet yu yak'ni techaho Comam Jes'us isya'tajil yu anma mulum, haxinwal mach chitibayo heyu yeb xin mach chexpax teyintaj.
Waxan̈ca ayco ip heyu hek'oji yin̈ istx'ojal, yaja' maẍto hunujex ti' cheyabe isya'il camical.

Yaja' xin xato nahul heyu yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios jet yul Yum han̈on̈ con̈yuninal, bay chala: C'ahol, machojab chiscaj hawi' yet chachiscuyni Comam Dios Jahawil. Machojab xin chaẍmeltzo tawintaj yet chaẍiscachni Comam.
Yuto ha' mac xahan ay yu Comam chaco Comam yin̈ istoholal. Haxa mac chischah Comam yuninaloj chayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ yu iscuychahi, ẍi yul Yum Comam.
Chahwe isya'tajil chati Comam Dios teyiban̈ yu hecuychahi, yuto quexyuninalxa Comam yuxin hac tu' chexyute. ¿Tom ay hunu naj c'ahole ti' mach chicuylax yu ismam?
Yaja' ta mach chayo Comam isya'tajil yu hecuychahi haca' chu Comam yin̈ macta yuninalxa, chal yelapno chal tu' ta mach quexyuninaloj, lahanex haca' niẍte unin machi ismam.
Conabawetij haca' yet niẍte uninon̈ ak'lax cocachbanil yu comam yeb yu comi' caw xin jabe yin̈ tzet yala, ¿hatom xin tzet chal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈, mach chicoyije yun̈e cochahni cok'inal?
Comam comi' tu' con̈iscach hanic' tiempohal haca' yoche isc'ul, hajxam Comam Dios chon̈iscach Comam yu isc'ulalo jin̈, yun̈e jelcanico haca' Comam, Comam machi nino istx'ojal yin̈.

Yin̈ caw yeli yet chihul isya'tajil jiban̈ yu cocuychahi, mach chitzala coc'ul yet chihul jiban̈, walxinto bisc'ulal chulo coc'ul, yaja' lahwi tu' chak'ni istoholal jet yeb ak'anc'ulal macon̈ bay chialaxayo isya'tajil tu'.
Walex haca'tan̈e paxna yip hek'ab yeb heyoj, ak'we heyanma yoc yip hek'ab yeb heyoj tu'.
Saywelo hune' beybale caw tohol haxinwal chian̈cha heyoj, hac tu' xin matxa caw chiahcan̈ iscotxk'ahi.
Aweco yin̈ hec'ul heyec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb sunil anma, machojab chebeybaln̈e istx'ojal, yuto ha' mac chibeybaln̈en istx'ojal mach chiyil yin̈ Comam Dios.
Caw cheyil heba, tajca ayex chebej hechahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chak' jet, yuto ta hac tu' tx'i'al mac chietaxto heyu, lahan haca' te' howla telaj chicam anma yu.
Machojab hunujex ti' chexec' yin̈ ixloj, yeb xin machojab hunujex cheyah isc'ulal chak' Comam Dios teyet haca' yute naj Esa'u; ishelto naj issabehal yet babel c'ahole yin̈ hune' sec' itah.

Caw heyohtaj ta haxa yet tzujanilxa yet yochen naj ischab ismajul yeb isc'ulal Comam Dios, haca' chiak'lax tet ebnaj babel c'ahole, matxa ak'lax tet naj, waxan̈ca caw ok' naj sic'lebil, yaja' matxa tzet tz'aj yute' isba naj.

Hex ti' mach hitzanojexico yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' chisje cotzabni, haca' yu ishitzico ebnaj jichmam Israel yin̈ witz Sina'i, hune' witz bay caw ah xaj k'a k'a' yin̈, bay caw k'ejholiloj yeb bay caw n̈irla c'uh.
Machi xin heyabe yok' ch'en trompeta yeb istzotelpaxo Comam Dios. Hayet yaben ebnaj istzotel Comam tu', yalni ebnaj ta matxa chitzotel Comam,
yuto machi techa hune' chejbanile yu ebnaj, hune' chalni haca' ti': "Tato ay hunu mac chayo yoj yiban̈ witz ti' maca hunu no nok', yilal isk'ojlaxcamoj maca chitejlaxcamo yu ch'en lanza," ẍi.
Caw xiwquilta tzet yil ebnaj tu', yuxin ha' hun naj Mois'es halni haca' ti': "Caw chinluyluncan̈an yu xiwquilal," ẍi naj.
Walex ti' xaquexhitzico yin̈ witz Si'on, ha' iscon̈ob Comam Dios itzitz, ha' ton hune' Jerusal'en ay satcan̈. Xaquexhitzico isc'atan̈ ismilal ebnaj 'angel cutxanico yanico ismay Comam Dios,

yeb isc'atan̈ macta babel yuninal Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebil isbi yul satcan̈. Xaquexhitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios, Comam juez yeco yin̈ sunil anma, yeb bay ay yanma anma c'ulxa yeb tz'ajanxa ye yu Comam Dios.

Xaquexhitzico yin̈ Comam Jes'us, Comam watx'en̈eyo iscab trato Comam Dios. Ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jes'us tu' con̈sajn̈en yin̈ comul, ha' chik'anni nimanc'ulal jin̈ tet Comam Dios. Mach haca'ho ischiq'uil naj Abel, to ha' yanayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ mac potx'ni naj, ha' isk'ana.

Yuxin nann̈e heyu tajca cheman̈c'oto Comam Dios chitzotel jet, yuto ta huntek'an mac man̈c'onto Comam Dios yet istzotel tet sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' mach colchahi, ¿ha' tom xin han̈on̈ chon̈colchahi ta chicoman̈c'oto Comam Dios chitzotel jet yul satcan̈? Machoj.

Yet istzotel Comam Dios yet payxa tu' caw bili tx'o tx'otx', yaja' tinan̈ xin chal Comam haca' ti': "Hunelxan̈ech'an chintzotelan maẍn̈etaj xin tx'o tx'otx' ti' chiwak'bilojan, wal xin ha' hun satcan̈ chibilipaxoj," ẍi Comam.

Hayet chalni Comam, hunelxan̈ech'an, chal yelapnoj tato huntek'an tzet chu ishec'lax yul yehobal watx'ebil yu Comam Dios, chihec'laxiloj cat istan̈tzelaxiloj, yun̈e iscancano huntek'an tzet mach chu ishec'laxi.

Hac tu' tzet ak'bil jet yu Comam Dios, hune' yet joc yul isk'ab, mach chu ishec'laxi. Yuxin jak'awe yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tu', cat jinayo coba tet Comam yin̈ sunil janma, haca' caw choche Comam. Xiwojon̈wepaxo tet Comam.
Yuto Comam Dios lahan haca' k'a k'a' chisje istan̈ilo sunil tzet ye tu' yu.
Machojab chebej hexahann̈en heba hununex, yuto heyuẍtaxa heba yin̈ Comam, hacpax tu' ebix ix xachahni Comam heyanabxapaxo ebix.
Machojab chenahuln̈eto heyak'ni bay chiway mac chiec' tec'atan̈, yuto ay mac ti' ak'ni bay chiway yet anmahil, machi xin yohtajoj tato 'angel ebnaj ec' isc'atan̈.
Machojab chenahuln̈epaxto ebnaj ayicto yul preso, hacojtam ha' hunex ayexico preso yinta ebnaj. Nawepaxti macta chiak'len isya'tajil, yuto hexxataxcapaxo cheyak'le isya'tajil.

Hayet cheyik'ni heyetbi, ayojab yelapno mohyilal yul hesat; yin̈n̈eojab heyetbi cheyaco heyanma, yuto ha' mac chiixli yeb chiwinajli, chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios. Yebpaxo ha' mac maẍto chimohyi cat issayni ismul, chiaypaxo isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios.
Machojab cheyaco heyanma yin̈ ch'en melyu. Ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ tzet ay yul hek'ab, yuto chal Comam Dios yul Yum: "Machi bak'inal chexinnahuln̈etojan yeb chexinbejcanojan," ẍi Comam.
Yuxin sunil janma chijalni haca' ti': Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil chicolwa win̈an, yuxin mach chinxiwan yin̈ istx'ojal choche anma iswatx'e win̈an, con̈chi.

Machojab chenahuln̈eto ebnaj chiijbali teyin̈ yeb ebnaj halni Istzoti' Comam Dios teyet. Txumwec'anab yin̈ isbeybal ebnaj masanto yet iscamto ebnaj. Haca'ojab yanico yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios hacojab tu' heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam.
Comam Jesucristo hune'n̈etic'a ha' Comam, ha' Comam yet payxa, ha' Comam tinan̈, ha'paxo Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.

Yuxin mach cheyak' subchaho heba tet huntek'an nan cuybanile mach ohtabilo ju. Ha'ojab yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chiyik' yip janma, maẍtaj yin̈ huntek'an chejbanile yin̈ tzet chilolaxi, yuto huntek'an tu' matzet chijik' yin̈.
Han̈on̈ ti' nanxa hune' coxahanbal; ebnaj sacerdote ayco yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es, machi yoc ebnaj yin̈ isc'uxni hune' xahanbal ti'.
Ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' chicto ebnaj ischiq'uil no nok' yul cuarto ec'bal txahul isbi, ha' chak'baln̈e ebnaj yin̈ ismul anma; yaja' wal isnimanil no nok' tu' istxam con̈ob chin̈uslaxi.
Hacpax tu' yu Comam Jes'us, cam Comam istxam con̈ob Jerusal'en yun̈e issajn̈encano Comam yanma anma yu ischiq'uil.
Yuxin elojon̈weto haca' bay ilaxilto Comam istxam con̈ob tu', ha' chal yelapnoj ha' hunon̈ chiak'lax elo cotxixobal yinta Comam.
Yuto maẍtaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ay hune' cocon̈ob ay yin̈ huneln̈e, wal xin ha' hune' cocon̈ob ay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ha' bay ayto janma.
Yuxin jala'we c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios sunilbal tiempo yu Comam Jesucristo. Ha' hune' coxahanbal chijak' tet Comam, ha' ton cobitn̈en Comam yu coti'.
Machojab chenahuln̈eto hewatx'en isc'ulal yeb hecolwa yin̈ tzet ayex yin̈ heyet anmahil, yuto hapaxo huntek'an tu' coxahanbal tet Comam Dios, caw xin chitzala Comam yin̈.

Yijewe yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj chiijbali texol, watx'ewe tzet chal ebnaj yuto ha' ebnaj chexiptzeni, yeb xin ha' ebnaj chihalni tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chewatx'e. Yuxin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal, haxinwal yin̈ tzalahilal chitak'wi ebnaj teyin̈ tet Comam, mach yin̈o bisc'ulal, ta mach xin mach chechah isc'ulal.
Han̈on̈ti'an̈ c'ul cobeybalan̈, machi istx'ojal nabil juhan̈. Txahlan̈we jin̈an̈ yuto chijochehan̈ chon̈ec'an̈ yin̈ sunil isc'ulal.
Ha' hune' caw yilal chink'anpaxojan teyet ta chextxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios, haxinwal ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam, chinapnihan quexwila'an yin̈ an̈e.
Ha'ojab Comam Dios yahawil ak'anc'ulal yeb ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jes'us xol camom, Comam cotan̈emal yeb xin t'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios mach istan̈bal yu ischiq'uil.

Ha'ojab Comam Dios tu' chiak'ni hehelanil hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal, haxinwal chewatx'e tzet chal isc'ul Comam cat iswatx'en Comam tzet choche isc'ul jin̈ yu Comam Jesucristo. ¡Jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo! Hacojab tu'.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, chink'anan teyet niman cheyute hec'ul yuto hanic'n̈e hecuybanil chiwatojan teyet yul hune' incartati'an.
Chiwaltojan teyet ta xabejtzolax juẍta Timoteo. Ta pet chul naj inc'atan̈an chito naj wintajan yet chintohan quexwilnojan.
Halwe tet ebnaj chiijbali teyin̈ ta chil isba ebnaj yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ay yul ismajul Italia ti' chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil.
Yak'abayo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil. ¡Hacojab tu'!
Hanin Santiago inti'an, ischejab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo wehan. Chiwaltojan teyet cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil, hex cablahon̈eb majan wet con̈ob Israel, hex pujanexto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hayet chihul sunil ilwebal teyiban̈, caw ak'we tzalaho hec'ul sic'lebil.
Heyohtaj ta hayet chul ilwebal teyiban̈ yu yillaxi ta ayco Comam Dios yipo heyanma, hac tu' chu hecuyni istecha ilwebal heyu.

Yilal helahnico heyak'ni heyanma istecha heyu, hac tu' chu hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam Dios, yeb xin tz'ajan chexelcanico yin̈ isc'ulal Comam, hac tu' xin matxa nich'ano tzet mach tz'ajanojex yin̈ yet Comam.

Tato ay hunujex maẍto tz'ajano hehelanil, k'anwe tet Comam Dios, cat yak'ni Comam teyet, yuto mach chismale Comam yak'ni tet macta chik'anni. Chak' Comam tet, yaj mach chalico Comam yin̈ sat mac bay chak' Comam hune' tu'.
Hayet chicok'anni cohelanil tet Comam, cok'anawe yin̈ sunil janma. Machojab chicabcon janma, yuto ha' mac chicabcon yanma, lahan haca' ha' mar ch'ec' jobla yu jak'ek'; nanantaxan̈e bay chitocanicoj.
Ha' mac hac tu' yecoj, tajca ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal ta ay tzet chischah tet Comam Dios Jahawil.
Yuto nan ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal tinan̈, nanxapaxo ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal hecal, hac tu' xin mach t'in̈ano yeco yin̈ isbeybal.
Tato ay hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab ya'ta yehi, yilal yak'ni tzalaho yanma yin̈ Comam, yuto ay yelapno ye yul sat Comam Dios.
Hacpax tu' ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab k'alom, tzalahojabi yet chiilaxayo yu Comam Dios, yuto ha' mac k'alom lahan haca' isxumaquil te' telaj machi nahatli.

Yuto hayet chi'ahilo tz'ayic cat ispohcan̈ yip k'a', chitajilo te' telaj, cat yay hona isxumaquil te', hac tu' xin matxa c'ulch'ano jilni te'. Haca' ishowayo isxumaquil te' telaj tu', hac tu' isc'ayayo ebnaj k'alom yet chiscutxban ebnaj isk'alomal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Sak'al yet mac chitecha ilwebal yu, yuto hayet chilahwi istecha ilwebal yu hune' mac tu', chak' Comam hune' ispaj selel tet, ha' ton hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal, ha' ton hune' corona haltebil yu Comam tet mac chitzala yin̈ Comam.

Hayet chon̈montelax cowatx'en hunu istx'ojal, machojab chijala ta ha' Comam Dios chon̈monten cowatx'en hune' tu', yuto Comam mach chu con̈ismonten cowatx'en hunu istx'ojal, machipaxo tzet chimonten Comam yu yanico ismul.
Wal xin, ha' istx'ojal ayco jin̈ ha' chon̈monteni, cat con̈yinito yin̈ istx'ojal.
Ta chijaco janma yin̈ istx'ojal aytic'aco jin̈, yin̈ chipitzc'ati comul. Haxa yet chich'ib hune' istx'ojal yul janma tu', cat yul hune' camical jin̈.
Wuẍtaj wanab, hex caw xahan ay wuhan, mach cheyak' subchaho heba.
Sunil tzet c'ul yeb sunil tzet tz'ajan yehi tet Comam Dios chicochah. Ha' Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzet chimujli yul satcan̈. Ha' huntek'an tu' xin chishel isba, wal Comam Dios, hune'n̈etic'a ha' Comam.
Yuto el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal yu Istzoti' caw yeli, hune' yak' jet yet cochahni yul janma. Yu hune' tu' xin, han̈on̈ caw babelon̈ sata sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios.
Wuẍtaj wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, naweti huntek'an chiwalti'an. Hajbawe hetxiquin heyabeni; mach comono cheyal hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ an̈e, mach comono chitit hehowal.
Yuto yet chitit cohowal, maẍtaj tzet choche Comam chicowatx'e.

Yuxin bejwecano sunil istx'ojal yeb sunil ismachiswalilal caw chipoh yul yiban̈k'inal ti'. C'ulch'anojab chu hechahni Istzoti' Comam Dios challax teyet, hune' tz'unbilxa yul heyanma yu Comam, yuto ha' chexcolni tet sunil istx'ojal.
Machojab ton̈e chijabe Istzoti' Comam, wal xin yilal coyijeni. Yaj tato ton̈e chijabe tzet chala, mach chicoyijepaxoj, han̈-caw-on̈ chijak' subchaho coba.
Ha' mac chi'aben Istzoti' Comam Dios, mach chiswatx'epaxo tzet chala, lahan haca' hunu mac chiyil sat yul ch'en espejo,
yaja' lahwi yilni sat tu', caw yin̈ an̈e chito nahul yu tzet yillax sat.
Wal mac mach chito nahul Istzoti' Comam Dios yu, to caw chaco yin̈ isc'ul yin̈ hune' tzet chabe tu' cat isyijeni, caw sak'al yet; ha' Istzoti' Comam tu' chon̈bejtzonilo yul isk'ab ismachiswalilal.

Ta ay hunu mac yijem yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios yalni, yaj ta mach chak' cacha' isti' yin̈ istx'ojal, ha' hune' anma tu' chiyak' subchaho isba ischuquil. Hac tu' xin naban̈e chala tato yijem yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios.

Yaj ta chon̈colwa yin̈ niẍte unin mach ismam, mach ismi', yeb yin̈ ebix camnaxa yichamil, cat xin copohnilo coba yin̈ istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', wal tu' caw lan̈an coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios Mame.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hex xahechah Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma, Comam caw ay yelapno yehi, lahann̈ehojab hexahann̈en heba hesunil.

K'inalo ta cutxanexicoj cat yapni hunu naj k'alom, caw c'ul yehico xil isk'ap yeb xin ayco hunu isjolk'ab naba oro. Caw xin c'ul chu hechahni naj, cat heyalni tet naj: "Tz'on̈yan̈ yiban̈ hune' ẍila caw c'ul ti'," ta quexchi. Lahwi tu' xin cat yocpaxapno hunu naj caw meba', caw xilxa xil isk'ap aycoj, cat xin heyalni tet naj:
"Wal halin̈i bey tu'," maca "Ayan̈ tz'on̈no sat tx'otx'," ta quexchi.
Ta hac tu' cheyute, mach lahano chexahann̈e ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab. Ha' xin chalniloj ta tx'oj chenaco yin̈ heyet anmahil.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, txumweloj tato ha' Comam Dios sic'nican̈ anma meba' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu yak'ni Comam isk'alomal tet yin̈ yanayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam, cat ischahnipaxo yehobal bay ch'oc Comam Yahawil, hune' yalte Comam tet mac ch'ocheni.
Walexpaxo xin cheyah ebnaj meba', machi yelapno ebnaj yul hesat. ¿Mac anmahil chexetani, cat quexyinito sata naj alcal? Ha' ton ebnaj k'alom.
¿Tom mach heyohtajoj tato ha' ebnaj tu' tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ayxaco yul janma?
Ta caw yeli cheyije isley Comam Dios haca' yalni Yum Comam bay chala: "Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil haca' heya'iln̈en heba," ẍicanoj. Ta hac tu' cheyute caw c'ul heyecoj.
Yaj ta mach lahano chexahann̈e heba, cheyaco hemul, cat hecanpaxcano tx'ojal tet isley Comam Dios.
Ta chijala ta sunil ley chicoyije, yaja' ta ay hunuxa chejbanile mach chicoyije, chijaco comul yin̈ sunil ley haca' tu'.
Yuto ha'tic'a Comam Dios halni: "Mach chexixli, mach chexpotx'wipaxo camo anma," ẍi Comam. Yuxin ta ay mac mach chiec' ixloj, yaja' ta chispotx' camo yet anmahil, chiyaco ismul tet ley haca' tu'.
Yuxin nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet cheyala', yeb yin̈ tzet chewatx'e, yuto yilal yixtan̈witi yu hune' ley yet Comam Jesucristo. Hune' ley xacon̈bejtzonico yin̈ cowatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios.

Ta mach chitz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil, mach chitz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam jin̈ yin̈ hune' tz'ayic yet chiyilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma. Yaj tato chitz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil, chitz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam jin̈.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, tzet chaliloj ta ay mac ayco yanma yin̈ Comam yalni, yaj ta machi nich'ano isc'ulal tzet chiswatx'e, ¿tom xin chicolchahi yu ayxa yanma yin̈ Comam yalni? ¡Machoj!
K'inalo ta ay hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab machi xil isk'ap, maca matzet chislo,
cat heyalni tet: "Chawil haba, c'ul chawute hak'uxni haba, wa'an yin̈ caw c'ul," ta quexchi. Matzet xin cheyak'paxo tet, ¿tzettaxca chalilo hune' tu'?
Yuxin ta ayex cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam, machi xin chewatx'e isc'ulal, nabn̈e cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios. Ha' xin chalniloj ta camomex yul sat Comam.

K'inalo ta ay hunu mac chihalni: "Ayco wanmahan yin̈ Comam." Haxa hunxa mac xin chalpaxoj: "Isc'ulaln̈e chinwatx'e'an." Chiwalan teyet, mach ayoco Comam Dios yipo heyanma ta mach chewatx'e isc'ulal. Wal xin chinyehan teyet ta ayco Comam Dios yipo wanmahan yu chinwatx'ehan isc'ulal.

Hex ti', cheyayto yul heyanma tato hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios. Caw c'ul hune' tu', yaj maẍn̈etaj hune' tu' yilal yehi. Hacpax tu' ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil, yohta ebnaj tato hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios. Caw xin chiluyluncan̈ ebnaj xiwquilal yet chisnaniti ebnaj Comam.
¡Tzet hesucal! Cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam, machi xin chebeybaln̈e tzet choche Comam. Ha' xin chalniloj ta machi heyanma yin̈ Comam.
Naweti yin̈ jichmam Abraham; isyije icham yinito isc'ahol yin̈ xahanbalil. Yu tzet iswatx'e icham tu', yuxin occano icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios.
Hac tu' xin chu johtan̈eniloj ta yaco yanma icham Abraham yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto isyije icham tzet ak'lax iswatx'e, hac tu' xin yu isyenicanilo isba ta ayco yanma icham yin̈ Comam Dios.

Hac tu' yu yijni isba yin̈ tzet halbilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala: "Caw yaco yanma icham Abraham yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios, yu hune' tu' xin cancano icham c'ulal yul sat Comam," ẍicanoj. Yuxin yacanico Comam icham Abraham tu' yamigohoj.
Yuxin nachaojabilo heyu tato chon̈cancano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu tzet chicowatx'e, maẍn̈etaj yu janico janma yin̈.

Hac tu' yupaxo hune' ix ix tx'oj ye iswi', Rahab isbi. Cancano ix c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yak' ix bay way ebnaj ischejab Comam, yeb xin nanxa behal bay ischejto ix ebnaj yun̈e mach chitzabcha ebnaj.
Haca' hunu nimanile matxa yanma ayictoj, camomxa, hac tu' ye hunu mac chihalni ta ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, mach chisyijepaxo tzet chal Comam, naban̈e hune' tu'.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, mach comono cheyocheco heyoc cuywawomal, yuto heyohtaj ta han̈on̈ chon̈cuywahi caw ec'balto chiilax yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e.
Cosunil ayto niẍtexa cotx'ojal yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e, yaja' ta ay mac mach ch'aycay yin̈ istzoteli, ha' hune' mac tu' caw c'ul, yuto chupaxo isk'oji iscachni sunil isnimanil yin̈ej istx'ojal.
Chijacto ch'en freno yul isti' no' cheh yun̈e isyijen no' tzet chijoche. Hac tu' xin sunil isnimanil no' chito bay chal coc'ul.
Hactic'apax tu' te' barco caw nimej te' yaj waxan̈ca chul tin̈na jak'ek' yin̈ te' yaj han̈ech'an nich'an tim'on chisbak'o naj piloto ha' bay chisyije te', cat isto te' bay chal isc'ul naj.
Hac tu' ye nich'an jak' ti', caw nich'anch'an yaj caw can̈ye sic'lebil, haca' hunu nich'an tz'it k'a' chu isn̈usnilo huno niman k'eptalaj.

Hac tu' ye jak' ti', lahan yeb k'a k'a', mach isbi hanta istx'ojal ayco yin̈; yetbi conimanil yehi yuxin sunil conimanil chu yetaxto yu. Hune' k'a k'a' tu', haca'tic'a yul hune' niman k'a' mach istan̈bal chitit isk'ak'al, hac tu' xin chu yetaxcanto sunil cobeybal.
Han̈on̈ anma hon̈ ti' chon̈k'oji cocuyni sunilej no' xol telajil nok'; no' ch'ic, no' laba yebej no nok' ay xol ha' mar.
Yaja' wal jak' ti' xin, mach chon̈k'oji cocuyni. Lahan yeb huno istx'ojal mach chak' cacha' isba, lahan haca' veneno chon̈ak'ni camoj.
Ha'tic'a jak' ti' xin, chalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios Mame, ha'tic'a xin chihalni tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ jet anmahil watx'ebil yu Comam Dios. Ha' anma tu' xin, yechel Comam yehi.
Yul coti' ch'elti tzoti' c'ul, yultic'apaxo coti', ch'elpaxti tzoti' tx'oj. Wal xin wuẍtaj, wanab, mach cheyute heba haca' tu'.
Haca' hunu isnuk' ha ha' tinan̈, mach chiahilo ha ha' chi' yeb xin ha ha' c'ah.

Hacpax tu' hunu yoj te' higo, mach chu yak'ni te' sat te' aceituna, yeb hunu yoj te' uva mach chu yak'ni te' sat te' higo. Hac tu' ye isnuk' hunu ha ha', mach chu yahilo ha ha' chi' yeb xin ha' c'achi'.
Ta ay hunu mac texol caw ay isnabal yeb xin caw ay ishelanil, isyebabilo yin̈ isc'ulal chiswatx'e, yik'abayo isba yu hune' ishelanil tu'.
Yaj ta ayn̈etic'aco chichonc'ulal caw c'ah yul heyanma, yeb xin chewatx'e istx'ojal yin̈ heyet anmahil, cat xin heyalnipaxo heba c'ulal, wal xin caw lek'ti' hex.
Matxa taj tet Comam Dios chitit hune' yitz'atil wi'e tu', to yetxa sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi, yetxa anma ye hune' yitz'atil hewi' tu', yin̈ naj matzwalil chitita.
Ta aytoco chichonc'ulal jin̈, yeb xin ta han̈on̈n̈e chijoche ch'oc cowinajil, ta hac tu' mach lan̈ano cobelwi yin̈ istxolal, caw xin ayto sunil istx'ojal jin̈.

Ta tet Comam Dios chitit cohelanil, matxa chon̈ec' yin̈ istx'ojal, wal xin chon̈ec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal. C'ulch'an chijute coc'ul, cat istz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil, lahanpaxo jet anmahil yul cosat, yeb xin ist'in̈aniln̈etic'a chijala.
Ta ak'anc'ulal chicowatx'e, chicochah ispaj, ha' ton istoholal.
¿Bay chititico nimeta howal yeb xin niẍte howal texol? Wal xin yu huntek'an istx'ojal chimunla yul heyanma yuxin cheyak'le howal.

Hex ti' tzijxan̈e tzet ye tu' cheyochecoj, yaj mach chexk'oji yin̈, yu hune' tu' xin chiec' yul hewi' hepotx'wahi, yeb xin chichiwaco hec'ul yin̈ mac ay tzet aya. Yu mach chu yoc heyetoj, yuxin ch'ah howal texol. Wal xin mach ch'ak'lax teyet tzet cheyoche tu' yu mach chek'an tet Comam Dios.
Waxan̈ca chek'ana, yaj mach ch'ak'lax teyet yuto mach c'ulo chu hek'anni, yuto yu heyetanto yin̈ istx'ojal cheyoche.
Hex ti', caw mach yijemojex, yuto caw cheyocheto heyoc hewatx'en tzet ye tu' tx'oj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yu hune' tu' xin, chexoccano howal yin̈ Comam Dios.

Tajca ch'ec' yin̈ henabal tato machi nich'ano tzet yelapno ye Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Hum, bay chala: "Ha' Comam Dios an̈ecanico Comam Esp'iritu Santo jin̈, Comam Esp'iritu tu' xahan ayon̈ yu, yuxin choche Comam ta han̈e Comam chicoxahann̈e," ẍiayoj.

Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam, yuxin chicolwa Comam jin̈. Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam haca' ti': "Chitit ishowal Comam yin̈ anma caw lek'ti' chute isba. Walpaxo mac chiyo isba xin, caw chitzala Comam Dios yin̈," ẍiayoj.
Yuxin yijemojab chijute coba tet Comam Dios, cat copahnito naj matzwalil, hac tu' xin ch'elcan̈ naj jet.

Hitzojon̈weco isc'atan̈ Comam Dios, haxinwal chihitzico Comam coc'atan̈. Hex mulum, tacojab hec'ul teyin̈ yu istx'ojal chewatx'e, yuto caw yilal hesajn̈en heyanma yul sat Comam Dios. Haca' hex chito heyocheto yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', cat hexahann̈enpaxo Comam heyalni.

Ocojab bisc'ulal yin̈ heyanma, tacojab hec'ul yet chenanitij. Ok'an̈we sic'lebil yu hemul hex caw xaquextzebi yu heyochen istx'ojal. Ocan̈we yin̈ ok'il hex caw chextzala sic'lebil yin̈ tzet chak' hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', meltzan̈weco yin̈ bisc'ulal.
Iweyo heba tet Comam Dios, hac tu' xin chexilaxcan̈ yu Comam.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, mach cheyalle hek'umal hunujex, yuto ta ay mac chihalni isk'umal yuẍtaj maca yanab, lan̈an yalni isk'umal chejbanile yet Comam Dios. Maca ta cheyala ta mach c'ulo yeco hunu heyuẍtaj maca heyanab, lan̈an heyalni tato chejbanile yet Comam mach c'uloj. Hac tu' xin lan̈an heyanico heba juezal yin̈ chejbanile yet Comam tu', mach xin lan̈ano heyijeni.

Ha' hune' mac ak'n̈e chejbanile tu', ha'tic'a xin ayco juezal. Ha' xin chu yak'ni colbanile yeb xin chu con̈yanico yin̈ isya'tajil. Wal hunujon̈ xin machi yu joc jilno tzet chielico hunu juẍtaj maca janab, yuto han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios chu yilni tzet chielicoj.

Abewecanojex cheyal haca' ti': "Yet hecal maca yet cabe chon̈to munil yul hune' niman con̈ob yin̈ hunu habil. Ha' bey tu' xin chijaco hunu niman cotxon̈, hac tu' xin caw niman comelyu chicocutxba," quexchi.
Yaja' mach heyohta tzet heyeco yet hecal maca cabe. Sak'al heyalni, yaja' cocawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', lahan yeb niẍte moyan, ton̈e chisye isba hunep cat isc'aycan̈.
Ha' hune' wal heyalni: "Ta chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios Jahawil, ayn̈etic'a cocawil, chicowatx'e hune' ti' maca hune'xa tu'," ha' hune' tu' wal heyalni.

Yaja' hex ti', mach haco tu' heyalni, to ha' hune' cheyala: "Chicowatx'e hune' ti', cat cowatx'en hune'xa tu'," quexchi yul heyet hechuquil. Ha' xin chalniloj ta mach cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios. Caw xin tx'oj hune' tu' yul sat Comam.
Ta johtaj ta c'ul cowatx'en hunu tzet ye tu', tzujan tu' xin mach chicowatx'epaxoj, chijaco comul yul sat Comam Dios.
Hex k'alom hex ti', abewecanoj. ¡Ok'an̈we yin̈ caw ip teyin̈ yuto lan̈an yul istiempohal bay ch'ec'oya' heyanma!
Sunil hek'alomal lan̈an isk'atoj yeb xin xil hek'ap holquiẍtaxan̈e yu no' ih.

Sunil hemelyu tenbabilxato tu' xin, ayxa isk'uxewal ch'en, ha' chin̈uswaho teyin̈ yul sat Comam Dios cat quexistan̈tzeniloj, haca' istz'ato hunu tzet ye tu' yul k'a'. Ha' hek'alomal tenbabil heyu tu', ha' ch'oco ak'oc'ule teyin̈ yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic.
Hanta istohol ebnaj hemunlawom mach heyak' yin̈ hemunil. Ha' hune' tu' xin chitit istz'acti'al teyiban̈, yuto xayabe Comam Dios yel yaw ebnaj munlawom tu', Comam yahawil yin̈ ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈.
Hex k'alomex ti', caw xaheyak' yoche heyanma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yin̈ sunil tzet cheyoche, yuxin caw bak'ichexxa. Haca' no' wacax caw bak'ich, lan̈anxa yapni istiempohal ispotx'laxi.
Hex k'alomex ti' checawxeco ismul anma yiban̈, huntek'an isc'ulaln̈e chiswatx'e. Cheyak'nipaxo camo ebnaj yu mach chu iscolni isba ebnaj teyet.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, niman cheyute hec'ul masanto yet chul Comam Jesucristo, haca' chu hunu naj munlawom niman isc'ul naj yechman yoc ha' n̈ab. Nimanpaxo chute isc'ul naj yechman yelilo sat istz'unub.
Hacojab tu' cheyute, nimanojab cheyute hec'ul. Lin̈bawe heba yin̈ Comam, yuto toxa chul Comam.
Wuẍtaj, wanab, mach chexoc ak'oc'ule teyin̈ hununex, haxinwal yet ch'apni istz'ayical yillaxi tzet chexelicoj, mach hemul ch'ilcha yu Comam. Yuto ha' Comam alcal yecoj, cawilxa yeti Comam.
Wuẍtaj, wanab ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios halni Istzoti' Comam yet payat techa yu ebnaj yijlen isya'tajil, caw aypaxo isnimanil isc'ul ebnaj; yuxin techahojab heyu haca' yak'le ebnaj tu'.

Ha' mac ay isnimanil isc'ul istecha isya'tajil yu, caw sak'al yet yul cosatan̈. Hex ti' xaheyabe yin̈ tzet yu istecha isya'tajil yu naj Job, heyabenpaxoj tzet yu iscolwa Comam Dios yin̈ naj yet tzujanxa, yuto caw c'ul Comam Dios yeb xin chitz'ay isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma.

Wal xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, ay hune' caw yilal yehi, ta ay tzet choche hec'ul cheyala mach cheyak' binaho satcan̈ maca tx'o tx'otx' maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' yak'ni isba yin̈ tzet cheyala. Hayet cheyalni ho' yelojab cheyala. Hayet cheyalni machoj, machojabi; haxinwal mach chexyato Comam yin̈ isya'tajil.
Ta ay hunujex bisc'ulal heyehi, ocan̈we txahloj. Taca tzalahilal heye xin, bitn̈ewe Comam Dios.
Ta ay mac ya'ay, yawtehab ebnaj anciano yet iglesia. Haxa ebnaj anciano tu' xin, chitxahli yin̈, cat ismasnico ebnaj aceite yin̈ mac ya'ay tu' yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.
Hayet chextxahli yin̈ sunil heyanma xin, chicawxican̈ hune' mac ya'ay tu'. Ta ay ismul hune' mac ya'ay tu' xin, chak'cano nimanc'ulal Comam yin̈.

Yuxin yilal heyallenati hemul teyet hununex, cat hetxahli yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab tet Comam, cat heyan̈chacanoj. Yuto ebnaj c'ul yul sat Comam Dios, hayet chitxahli ebnaj yin̈ sunil yanma, caw niman isyaxil ch'aycano yiban̈ yu Comam.

Haca' naj El'ias ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, anma naj haca' han̈on̈ ti', yaja' yin̈ sunil yanma naj txahli naj tet Comam Dios yun̈e mach chak' ha' n̈ab. Yuxin mach yak' ha' n̈ab yicta iscan̈ habil.
Hato yet istxahlipaxo naj hunelxa yichipaxico yak'ni n̈ab. Hac tu' xin yak'ni sat tz'unub hunelxa.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, ta ay hunu mac texol chisheq'uilo isba yin̈ Istzoti' Comam, aypaxo xin hunujex chexoc tzotelo tet yin̈ yet Comam, cat ismeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam hunelxa.

Ohtan̈ewecaniloj tato ha' hune' mac chinilo hunu naj mulum yin̈ istx'ojal bay aycoj, lan̈an iscolchalo hune' mac mulum tu' yul isk'ab camical. Hac tu' xin tx'i'alpaxo ismul hune' mac tu' chitan̈cano yul sat Comam Dios.

Hanin Pedro inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan. Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam pujanilto yul ismajul Ponto, yeb Galacia, yeb Capadocia, yeb Asia, yeb yul ismajul Bitinia.

Hex ti' sic'bilexxa yu Comam Dios Mame haca'tic'a yu istxumni Comam yet caw payat. Yu Yesp'iritu Comam, yuxin quexyacanico yetoj, yun̈e heyijen tzet chal Comam Jesucristo, cat hesajbicano yu isch'iquil Comam. Yak'ab Comam tx'i'al isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet.

Jalawe c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios, ismam Comam Jesucristo. Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈, yuxin yak' Comam hune' cok'inal caw ac'to; ha' hune' tu' ayco yipo janma. Hune' ti' xatzujcha ju yuto itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom yu yip Comam Dios.
Xayak' Comam Dios cok'inal yu cochahni tzet c'ubabil jet yu Comam yul satcan̈. Hune' tu', mach chi'etaxtoj, machi tz'il chihitzico yin̈, yebpaxo xin maẍtic'a chitan̈iloj.
Yuto xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin chon̈isc'uba Comam yu yip yun̈e istzujcha apno cocolbanil t'in̈anxa ye yu Comam, hune' chiyelax yet ch'apni islahobal tz'ayic.
Yu hune' ti', yuxin caw chon̈tzalahi, waxan̈ca yilal jec' yin̈ej isya'tajil hanic'oxa tiempohal.

Haca' ch'en oro, caw yilal chi'ilwelax ch'en xol k'a k'a' yun̈e yilchaloj ta caw c'ul ch'en maca ta mach c'ulo ch'en. Hacon̈pax tu', caw yilal chon̈ilwelaxi, cat yilchaloj tato caw yeli ayco janma yin̈ Comam Dios maca mach xin. Hayet chitecha ilwebal ju xin yu ayco janma yin̈ Comam, ec'bal yelapno hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios sata ch'en oro chiilwelax tu', waxan̈ca xin chitan̈ilo ch'en. Yaj ta chitecha ilwebal ju, caw chitzala Comam Jesucristo jin̈ yet chihul Comam, cat yak'ni Comam issak'alil isc'ul jet, yeb caw ay yelapno chon̈elcanico yul sat.

Waxan̈ca matxa heyil Comam Jesucristo, yaja' xahan ay Comam heyu. Waxan̈ca mach lan̈ano heyilni, yaja' cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam, yuxin caw chextzalacanoj. Ha' hune' hetzalahilal tu', caw c'ulch'ancanoj, machi tzoti' chik'oji yalnilo isc'ulch'anil teyet.
Yuto xatzujcha apno hecolbanil heyu yu heyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam.
Ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payxa, tzotel ebnaj yin̈ hanta isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios chak' jet. Issayni ebnaj yin̈ nanc'ulal yin̈ caw tzet yelapno ye colbanile ti'.

Ha' Yesp'iritu Comam Cristo ayco yin̈ ebnaj, ha' ak'ni yohtan̈elo ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu yec'ya' yanma Comam Cristo, yeb xin isc'ulch'anil chihul yet chiyijni isba tu'. Ha' ebnaj tu' issay ebnaj yila' mac hune' chal Yesp'iritu tu' yeb yin̈ tzet tiempohal chu huntek'an tu'.

Yaja' yak' Comam Dios yohtan̈elo ebnaj tato ha' huntek'an cuybanil yal ebnaj tu', mach yeto ebnaj yehi; to jet ye han̈on̈ ti'. Tinan̈ xin, xaak'lax heyohtan̈elo yu ebnaj pujbanic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile yu ishelanil Comam Esp'iritu Santo alaxti yul satcan̈. ¡Ha' huntek'an tu' xin, caw yoche ebnaj 'angel yila'!
Yuxin helanojab cheyute heba, txumwe yin̈ tzet chewatx'e, cawxojab hec'ul yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chak' jet yet chul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa.
Hex ti', yuninalxa Comam Dios heyehi caw yijemex tet Comam yuxin matxa chexec' yin̈ heyochento tzettaj tx'oj hewatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj, yet maẍto cheyohtan̈elo Comam Dios.
Wal xin ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal, machojab nino istx'ojal chewatx'e, yuto Comam Dios quexawten̈eni, caw machi nich'ano istx'ojal yin̈ Comam.
Yuto chal Comam yul Yum haca' ti': "Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal, machojab nino istx'ojal teyin̈ yuto haninti'an machi nich'ano intx'ojal win̈an," ẍi Comam.

Ha' Comam Dios tu', chi'ilni tzet chielico hunun anma hatatic'a tzet chiswatx'e. Caw lahan chi'ilchati anma yu Comam, machi hunu ti' cheba'to Comam ismul. Yuxin tato chijal Comam Dios Comamoj, ayojab yelapno Comam yul cosat yulbal ayon̈toc'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Comam Dios xacon̈iscolilo yin̈ hune' cobeybal matzet chaliloj, hune' cochah tet comam comi'. Johtaj ta cocolbanil mach lok'bilo yu tzet chitan̈iloj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' haca' ch'en oro yeb ch'en plata.
Wal xin ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo caw niman yelapnoj, ha' k'oji islok'ni cocolbanil. Ak'lax camo Comam yu yoc xahanbalil, haca' hunu no' me' machi nich'ano isya'bil, machipaxo istzaca'il.

Nabilxatic'a hune' ti' yin̈ Comam yet maẍto chiwatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios. Yaj wal tinan̈ xin xaisyecan̈ isba Comam Jesucristo yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic ti' yu yak'lax isc'ulal jet.

Yu Comam Jesucristo, yuxin xajaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios. Ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol anma camom, yak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet. Yu Comam Jes'us tu', yuxin chijaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios, cat xin iscawxipaxo coc'ul yin̈ Comam.

Wal tinan̈ xin yu xacoyije hune' cuybanil caw yel chala, yuxin sajxa ye janma yu Comam Dios. Hac tu' xin xahan chijil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab, yuxin caw yilal coxahann̈en coba yin̈ sunil janma yeb xin yin̈ sunil jip.
Yuto pitzc'anajon̈xa yet iscayel yaj mach yin̈o comam comi' cambehal yehi, wal xin yu Istzoti' Comam Dios pitzc'anajon̈xa. Yuto ha' Istzoti' Comam caw itzitz, ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Yuto chiyal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Sunil anma lahan haca' te' telaj, haxa iscan̈il ye xin, lahan haca' isxumaquil te' telaj tu', chitajilo te' cat ishowayo isxumaquil te'.
Yaj wal Istzoti' Comam Dios Jahawil, ayn̈etic'ac'o yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ẍiayoj. Ha' ton xin hune' ti' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile halbilxa jabe'.
Yuxin awecano sunil istx'ojal; sunil etal, yeb xin lek'ti'al, yeb ischiwa hec'ul, yeb hehobnican̈ tzoti'.

Ta caw yeli xaheyohtan̈elo sic'lebil ta c'ul Comam Dios jin̈, haca'ojab yochen huno nich'an nene' yim ismi', hacojab tu' heyochen hune' cuybanile yet Comam Dios mach sombiloj, hac tu' xin cheyik' heyip yin̈ hecolbanil.

Hitzojon̈weco isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo, caw itzitz Comam. Comam Cristo tu' lahan haca' hunu ch'en ch'en caw niman yelapnoj ayayto xe'o n̈a. Yaja' xin k'ojbilcanilo ch'en yu ebnaj watx'emcan̈ n̈a, yaj wal xin Comam Dios sic'nicanicoj yeb caw niman yelapno ye yul sat.

Wal xin itzitz Comam Cristo, yuxin itzitzon̈paxoj yin̈ Comam, xin jak'a'we hamanil tet Comam Dios cohunico yin̈ Comam Cristo yatutoj, yeb xin con̈yapaxico Comam sacerdotehal, yetxa Comam jehi. Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chu jak'ni coba xahanbalil tet Comam yet chicoyijen tzet chala. Ha' hune' tu', caw c'ul yul sat Comam Dios.

Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Yul con̈ob Si'on wacojan hune' mac haca' ch'en ch'en ch'ayto xe'o yipo n̈a. Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en tu' sic'bililo ch'en wuhan, caw niman yelapno ye ch'en. Ha' mac chaco yanma yin̈ hune' mac tu', mach chican yin̈ tx'ixwilal, ẍiayoj.

Han̈on̈ chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Cristo, caw niman yelapno ye Comam yul cosat, yaj wal mac mach chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam, ha' yin̈ huntek'an tu' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam bay chal haca' ti': Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en k'ojbilcanilo yin̈ ismunil yu ebnaj watx'em n̈a, ha' ch'en caw c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a, ẍiayoj.

Chalpaxo yul Yum Comam haca' ti': Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en ti', ha' bay chitxak'mo anma cat yayc'ayi, ẍiayoj. Chitxak'mo anma yuto machi isyije tzet chal Istzoti' Comam Dios; halbilcanoj xin tato hac tu' chiyu anma tu'.

Walon̈ ti' iscon̈obxa Comam jehi sic'bilon̈xalo yu Comam, sacerdoteon̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios Jahawil, hune' niman con̈ob nanxa yehiloj yu Comam. Sic'bilon̈xa yu Comam yu joc yeto Comam yun̈e joc copujbanic'o isc'ulch'anil Comam. Xacon̈yilo Comam Dios xol k'ejholo, con̈yanico xol hune' issajilk'inal caw c'ulcanoj.
Yet payat mach iscon̈obo Comam Dios heyehi, yaj wal tinan̈ iscon̈obxa Comam heyehi. Yet payat tu', machi mac chitz'ay isc'ul teyin̈, yaja' tinan̈ chitz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios teyin̈.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuti'an, han̈on̈ ti' mach cocon̈obo hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ton̈e chon̈eq'ui; yuxin chintak'ecantojan teyet, mach chebeybaln̈e huntek'an tzet chiyoche henimanil, yuto ha' huntek'an istx'ojal tu' chiyak'le howal yeb janma.

C'ulojab cheyute hebeybal xol anma maẍto ohtan̈eo Comam Dios, waxan̈ca xin chexhallax tx'ojal tinan̈ haca'tan̈e caw ay hemul, yaja' yu isc'ulal cheye, yuxin chal ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yet chi'ilchati sunil anma yin̈ hune' tz'ayic yet chul Comam.
Yun̈e mach chiel ispixan Comam Dios heyu yijemojab cheyute heba tet ebnaj ayicto yul capil, hactic'apax tu' tet naj jahaw, yuto ec'na aycan̈ yip ismunil naj.
Cat heyijenpaxo tzet chal ebnaj yahaw ak'bil ismunil yu naj yanico anma yin̈ isya'tajil yet chiyanico ismul, cat yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ mac c'ul tzet chiswatx'e.
Choche Comam Dios ta caw c'ul cheyute hebeybal, ha' xin wal matzet tz'aj yala' anma tx'oj isnabal teyin̈ yeb anma ayco yin̈ issucal.
Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal yuto colbilexxa. Yaja' matolo yu xahechah hecolbanil tu' yuxin chexoc hewatx'e' istx'ojal, ¡machoj! To ischejabxa Comam Dios heyehi.
Xiwan̈we tet Comam Dios, cat xin hexahann̈enpaxo anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam. Ayojab yelapno ye heyet anmahil yul hesat, yebpaxo naj jahaw, ayojab yelapno ye naj yul hesat.
Hex chejab heyehi, ayojab yelapno heyahaw yul hesat, yijewe tzet chiyal ebnaj. Yaj maẍn̈etaj tet ebnaj c'ul isnabal, yeb ebnaj caw c'ul isc'ul, wal xin yijewepaxo tet ebnaj ton̈e chichichon yanma.
Yuxin ta yu ayco conabal yin̈ Comam Dios, yuxin ton̈e chon̈etalaxi, machi xin comul, yaj ta chitecha ju, caw chitzala Comam Dios jin̈.

Yaja' ta yu hunu istx'ojal chiju yuxin chon̈oc yin̈ isya'tajil cat xin jak'ni techahoj, caw matzet chaliloj yuto comultic'a yehi. Yaj ta yu hunu isc'ulal chicowatx'e, cat yak'lax isya'tajil jila', cat jak'ni techahoj, wal hune' tu' caw niman tzet chalilo yul sat Comam Dios.
Yu hune' tu' yuxin con̈yawte Comam. Hayet yec'ya' yanma Comam Cristo ju, isyenicano Comam yin̈ tzet chu cobeybaln̈eni.
Machi nino ismul Comam yacoj, machipaxo lek'ti'al yala.

Hayet isbuchlax Comam, machi ispajtze. Hayet yalaxico Comam yin̈ isya'tajil yu ebnaj, machi yalpaxo Comam howalil. Ha' hune' yute Comam, ton̈e yaben̈eto isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yuto yohta Comam tato ha' Comam Dios ch'ilni tzet ch'elico yin̈ istoholal.

Ha' Comam Jesucristo ijnicanocan̈ comul yin̈ isnimanil yet iscam yin̈ te' culus. Hac tu' xin matxa chu yak'ni cabo isba istx'ojal jin̈, yuto camnajon̈xalo yin̈ mule, hac tu' utebilon̈cano yu Comam, yuxin chu cowatx'enico cobeybal yin̈ istoholal. Caw yabe Comam isya'tajil yin̈ isnimanil ju yun̈e cocolcha yul isk'ab hune' yabil ayco yin̈ janma, ha' ton comul.
Hayet yalan̈to tu', lahanex haca' no' me' c'aynatoj, wal tinan̈ xin xaquexmeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo, yuxin haxa Comam chextan̈eni yeb xin ha' ch'ilni heyanma.

Hacpax tu' ex ixale hex ti', yijem cheyute heba tet heyichamil, haxinwal ta ayex ti' maẍto chaco yanma heyichamil yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios, chistxum isba ebnaj heyu, mach yechto tx'i'al tzet cheyal tet ebnaj.
Yuto chiyil ebnaj tato caw tohol hebeybal, yeb ta caw yijemex.

C'ulojab cheyute heba, maẍtaj hetzanten heba yin̈ lolo'al haca' hemamen xil hewi' yin̈ caw nanxa islowi, maca heyanico heyanma yin̈ ch'en ome maca ch'en uwe caw aycan̈ istohol haca' ch'en oro, yebpaxo yin̈ xilk'ape caw aycan̈ istohol, yuto maẍtaj huntek'an tu' cheẍwatx'enico yul sat Comam Dios.

Wal xin ha'ojab isc'ulch'anil heyanma ha' cheyil hewatx'e', haxinwal caw c'ulch'anex yul sat Comam Dios. Ha' hune' hec'ulch'anil tu', ha' ton isc'ulal hec'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma, ha' hune' tu' machi bak'inal chietaxtoj, caw ay yelapno ye yul sat Comam Dios.
Hacpax tu' huntek'an ebix ix yet Comam Dios yet payat, caw c'ulch'an yanma ebix yul sat Comam Dios yuto han̈ech'an Comam yaco ebix yipo yanma, yeb xin caw yijem yute isba ebix tet yichamil.

Haca' ix Sara, caw yijem yute isba ix tet naj Abraham. Yalni ix yin̈ naj haca' ti': "Mam," ẍi ix yin̈ naj. Yuxin c'ul cheyute henabal hex ixale hex ti'. Machojab hunu tzet ye tu' bay chexxiwi. Ta chewatx'e haca' tu' lahan henabal haca' ix Sara.

Haquexpax tu' hex ichamile hex ti', c'ul cheyute heyanma yin̈ heyixal. Ohtan̈eweloj ta lahan ebix haca' hunu vaso nab ispohi. Ayojab yelapno ye ebix yul hesat yuto lahan cok'inal chicochah tet Comam yeb ebix. Yuxin c'ul cheyute heba yin̈ ebix yun̈e matzet ch'oc hexolbal yet chexoc txahlo tet Comam.

Yebpaxo xin chiwaltojan hunxa ti' teyet, hunxan̈ehojab cheyute henabal hesunil. C'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul, xahanojab cheyil heba hununex yuto heyuẍtaxa heba, heyanabxapaxo ebix ix yin̈ Comam. Tz'ayojab hec'ul teyin̈ hununex, chewchotan̈e cheyute heba.

Mach chepajtze tx'oj tet mac tx'oj chiswatx'e teyin̈. Machica chexpohli yin̈ mac chipohli teyin̈, ha' heyet c'ulch'an cheyute heyak'ni ispaj tet anma, yuto awtebilexxa yu Comam yu hechahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul.

Yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti': Tato ay mac choche isxahann̈e hune' iscawil, yeb ta choche tzalahilaln̈etic'a ch'ec' hunun tz'ayic yila', caw yilal iscachni isti', machojab chal tzoti' tx'oj yeb xin lek'ti'al.
Caw yilal ispohnilo isba xol istx'ojal, c'ulojab tzet chiswatx'e, issaya'bilo ak'anc'ulal ha'ojabn̈etic'a xin chiswatx'e.
Yuto Comam Dios Jahawil, chitan̈en mac caw c'ul isbeybal, cat xin yabenpaxo Comam istxah. Walpaxo anma machiswalil chiyute isba xin, chiscaj Comam, ẍiayoj.
Ta han̈e isc'ulal chesaya, cat hebelwi yin̈ caw c'ul, ¿mactic'a chiutenico istx'ojal teyin̈? Machi maca.
Yaj tato cheyabe isya'tajil yu isc'ulal chebeybaln̈e ¡caw sak'al heyet! yuxin mach chexxiw tet hunuxa mac anmahil. Mach cheyak' cabconocan̈ heyanma.

Wal xin ak'awe tzalaho heyanma yin̈ Comam Cristo Jahawil. Ayojab yelapno Comam yul hesat. Helan cheyute heba hetak'wi tet mac chik'amben teyet yin̈ cuybanile bay ayco heyanma. Chewchotan̈eojab chu heyalni tet anma tu' yeb yin̈ ak'anc'ulal.

Yuxin c'ul cheyute heba, hac tu' xin ak'anc'ulaln̈etic'a ye henabal, haxinwal macta tx'oj istzotel teyin̈ yu isc'ulal chewatx'e yu ayexxaco yin̈ Comam Cristo, chitx'ixwican̈ yin̈ lek'ti'al chal teyin̈.
Caw c'ul ta yu cowatx'en isc'ulal yuxin chiec'ya' janma yaj ta hac tu' ch'el yin̈ yanma Comam Dios, sata ta chec'ya' janma yu cowatx'en istx'ojal, nabn̈e hune' tu'.

Yuto hac tu' yu iscam Comam Cristo istohlan comul yin̈ huneln̈e. Caw c'ul Comam yaj ec'ya' yanma ju han̈on̈ mulumon̈ ti' yu con̈yinito Comam tet Comam Dios. Ha' isnimanil Comam cami, yaja' yanma Comam machi cami.
Hayet camom Comam tu', beyc'o yanma Comam yala' Istzoti' Comam Dios tet anma camom majan xol isya'tajil.

Ha' huntek'an anma tu', man̈c'on tzet yal Comam Dios yet payxa yulbal istiempohal yet iswatx'en naj No'e te' barco. Yet hune' tiempohal tu' caw niman yute isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma yet yechman iswatx'i te' barco tu', yaj xin waxajwan̈n̈e anma colchalo xol ha ha' yul te' barco.

Ha' hune' ha ha' tu' yecheln̈e ik'bil yu ha' tato chon̈colchahi. Ha' yelapno ye hun tu', chon̈colchahi, maẍtaj yu yel istz'ilal conimanil yu ha', to hayet chiahcano ha' cowi' chicoyeniloj tato c'ulxa conabal sata Comam yuto xaitzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo.
To Comam yul satcan̈, tinan̈ ayco Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios. Ha' Comam xin ch'ijban ebnaj 'angel yeb xin huntek'anxa ay ismunil caw ay yelapno ye bey satcan̈ tu'.
Yuxin haca' yu yaben Comam Cristo isya'tajil yin̈ isnimanil yet iscami, hac tu' xin chu jaben isya'tajil, yuto xacon̈cam yinta Comam han̈on̈ ti'; ha' ebnaj camnaxa, matxa chaco ismul ebnaj.
Hacojab tu' chijute coba, coyijewe tzet choche Comam Dios yulbal yet ayon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Matxaojab chicowatx'e haca' tzet chiyoche conimanil.

Hayet yalan̈to, niman tiempo quexec' hewatx'e' tzet chiswatx'e anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios. Wal xin canojab huntek'an tu' tinan̈ yuto yet yalan̈to tu', han̈ech'an istx'ojal chewatx'e, cheyak'ni yub tzet yoche heyanma, chexec'paxo yin̈ uc'u te', cheyec'tzen nimeta k'in̈ nanxa islowi, caw niman uq'ue cheyuc'canoj. Cheyinipaxayo heba tetej tioẍ yahbil yu Comam Dios.
Ha' ebnaj mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios tu', chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj yuto matxa chebeybaln̈e huntek'an istx'ojal chiswatx'e ebnaj, yuxin chibuchwa ebnaj teyin̈.
Yaj wal huntek'an anma tu', yilal istak'wican̈ yin̈ ismul yet chiilchati yu Comam ak'bilxa ismunil yilni tzet ch'elico mac itzitz yeb mac camnaxa.

Wal xin hallax istzoti'al colbanile tet anma camnaxa tu'. Waxan̈ca xacam anma tu' haca' iscam anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yilchati yu Comam Dios, yaja' yet yaben anma tu' hune' colbanile, ischahnicano anma tu' isk'inal haca'tic'a isk'inal Comam Dios.
Lan̈anxa yul istiempohal bay chitan̈ilo sunil tzet ye tu', yuxin helanojab cheyute heba, itz'atn̈eojab henani hetxahli.
Yeb xin ay hunxa caw yilal yehi, ha' hexahann̈en heba yin̈ sunil heyanma, yuto yet xahan chijil coba chiconahuln̈eto tx'i'al ismul jet anmahil.
Hayet ch'apni hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab isk'ana' bay chiwayi, sunilojab heyanma chechahni, yaja' machojab chexoctzotelo yin̈.
Ak'we cheja' heba teyet hununex hatatic'a tzet munilal ak'bilxa teyet yu Comam Dios. C'ul cheyute heba yin̈ hemunil ak'bilxa teyet yuto nananta hemunil ak'lax yu Comam.

Ha' mac chalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma, yilalojab ha' caw ist'in̈anil Istzoti' Comam chiyala, yeb xin ha' mac chak' cheja' isba texol, iswatx'eojab yin̈ sunil yip ak'bil yu Comam. Hac tu' xin chihallax c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios heyu yu tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo. ¡Hallaxojabi ta caw niman yelapno ye Comam Jesucristo! Han̈e Comam yet ay yalaxico ismay yeb yip yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Acojab tu'!
Wuẍtaj wanab hex xahan ay wuhan, mach chic'ay hec'ul yu huntek'an isya'tajil xahul teyiban̈, tajcato chena tato machi bay wal istitico huntek'an tu'.
Wal xin, caw tzalahan̈wej, yuto ha' hunex cheyabe isya'tajil haca' yak'le Comam Cristo. Yuxin hayet chul Comam xol isk'ak'al yip, caw chiyik'canocan̈ yip tzalahilal yul heyanma.

Ta chibuchwa anma teyin̈ yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo, caw c'ul heyet, yuto Yesp'iritu Comam Dios caw niman yelapno ayxaco teyin̈. Ha' anma tu', chal tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam, wal hexpaxo xin cheyal c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam.
Ta ayex ch'ec'ya' heyanma, yaja' tan̈e mach yuho huno potx'wal, maca xin yu elek', macato yu hunu mule caw tx'oj, maca yu heyanico heba xol huno tzet ye tu' mach cheyoc yin̈;
wal ta cheyil isya'tajil yu ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo, mach chextx'ixwi. Halwe c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yuto yetxa Cristo heyehi.

Yuto xaichico istiempohal bay chiillax tzet chielico sunil anma, yaja' to jin̈ han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chiichico babel, yuxin ta jin̈ chiichicoj, ¿tzettaxca xin ch'elpaxico anma mach chiyijen Istzoti' Comam yet colbanile?
Han̈on̈ c'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam Dios ti' tx'i'al isya'tajil chul jiban̈ cat cocolchahi, hajxam anma caw machi yelapno Comam yul sat, yeb anma caw tx'oj isbeybal.

Yuxin hayet chihul isya'tajil jiban̈, yaj ta hac tu' ch'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios, caw yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam, machojab chicobej cowatx'en isc'ulal, yuto ha' Comam tu' watx'en̈ehon̈, caw xin chiyij isba yin̈ tzet chiyala.

Tinan̈ xin chiwaltojan huntek'an chejbanile ti' teyet hex anciano hex xol ebnaj uẍtaje yul hunun con̈ob, yuto haninti'an anciano inpaxojan haca' hex tu'. Caw wilan yak'len Comam Cristo isya'tajil, yuxin ay wak'ni cabo inbahan inchahnihan isc'ulch'anil teyintaj, hune' chito isyebalo isba.

Haca' hunu naj tan̈em me', hacojab tu' cheyute hetan̈en macta ak'bilxa yul hek'ab yuto haca' isme' Comam Dios yehi. Munlahan̈we yin̈ sunil heyanma, haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios, machojab yin̈ lan̈bilal, yeb mach yun̈e ch'en melyu yuxin chexmunlahi. Munlahan̈we yin̈ tzalahilal, elojab yin̈ heyanma hewatx'eni.
Mach yahawo cheyute heba yin̈ macta chi'ak'lax hetan̈e. Wal xin yewe c'ulla beybale tet, haxinwal caw c'ul chutepaxo isbeybal.
Hac tu' xin hayet chihul Comam iswi'ehal jin̈ han̈on̈ tan̈em anma hon̈ ti', cat cochahni ispaj hune' caw nanxa yoc isc'ulch'anil, hune' tu' machi bak'inal chilahwi.

Haquex pax tu' hex tzehtaj, yijem cheyute heba tet ebnaj anciano. Chewchotan̈eojab cheyute heba yet chexcolwa teyin̈ hununex, yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti': Chispahto Comam macta nime winaj chute isba, walpaxo mac chiyo isba xin, chak' Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet, ẍiayoj.
Wal xin iweyo heba yalan̈ yip Comam Dios, hac tu' xin chexyican̈ Comam yet ch'apni istiempohal.
Sunil hebisc'ulal ch'oc yachno yin̈ heyanma, aweco yul isk'ab Comam yuto Comam ayn̈etic'aco yin̈ isc'ul con̈yilni.
Caw helan cheyute heba, majwahan̈wej yuto ha' naj matzwalil, naj ayco ishowal jin̈, lahan naj haca' hunu no' balam caw ch'el yaw yet ch'ec' saywal yin̈ no' me' yu chisc'uxaytoj.
Pahweto naj, lin̈bawe heba yin̈ Comam. Heyohtaj tato ha' ebnaj heyuẍta yin̈ Comam pujanto sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', lahan yilni ebnaj isya'tajil haca' hex tu'.

Yaja' hayet chilahwi jaben isya'tajil hanic' tiempohal ti', caw tz'ajan chon̈elcanico yu Comam Dios, cat xin yak'ni Comam jip yeb colin̈ban coba, yeb caw t'in̈an chon̈yute Comam awten̈eon̈ yetbihoj; yak'nicano isc'ulal isc'ul jet yin̈ huneln̈e, yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo.
Hallaxojabi ta caw niman yelapno isbi Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hune' incartahan chiwatojan teyet ti', ha' juẍta Silvano chiinitoj. Naj juẍta ti' caw yijem naj sic'lebil yul insatan. Hayeb tzoti' chiwaltoti'an ha' chexibtzeni, yeb xin chiwaltojan teyet tato xahechah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios. Lin̈bawe heba yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam.

Yeb ebnaj juẍta ay yul ismajul Babilonia sic'bilxalo yu Comam Dios, haca' yu quexissic'niloj, chisk'ambepaxo ebnaj hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil. Yebpaxo naj Marcos, naj inc'aholan yin̈ isbi Comam, chisk'ambepaxo naj hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil.
K'ambewe hanic' heye hununex yuto heyuẍtaxa heba. Ayojab ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo. ¡Acojab tu'!

Hanin Sim'on Pedro inti'an, ismunlawom Comam Jesucristo yeb xin ischejabpaxo Comam wehan. Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet, hex xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios haca' han̈on̈ti'an̈. Ha' heyanma yin̈ Comam tu' caw c'ulch'ancanoj haca' janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam, yuto caw han̈c'an̈e istoholal chiswatx'e Comam Dios yeb Cocolomal Jesucristo.
Ak'laxojab tx'i'al isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yeb ak'anc'ulal texol yuto heyohtaxa Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.

Yu ishelanil yip Comam Dios, yuxin xayak' Comam sunil tzet chi'ocnico ju yun̈e ay cok'inal mach istan̈bal, yeb xin yu coyijen tzet chal Comam. Yak' Comam hune' tu' jet yet johtan̈en̈ Comam Jesucristo, Comam con̈awten yu ishelanil yeb yu isc'ulch'anil isye Comam jet.

Hac tu' xin yu yak'ni Comam hune' yalte jet, huntek'an tzet caw c'ulch'ancanoj yeb caw ay yelapno yehi. Yun̈e huntek'an tzet yalte Comam tu', yuxin chicochah cok'inal yin̈ isk'inal Comam, hac tu' xin yu cocolchalo yul isk'ab isyahbetajil ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu istx'ojal yanma anma.
Yuxin maẍn̈eojabtaj janico janma yin̈ Comam, wal xin caw yilal janico yin̈ coc'ul cowatx'en cobeybal. Caw yilalpaxo coch'ib yin̈ ishelanil conabal yin̈ Comam Dios,
yeb cocachni coba yin̈ tzet mach c'uloj, yeb niman chijute coc'ul jak'ni techaho isya'tajil, yeb coyijen tet Comam Dios.
Chicoye isc'ulch'anil coc'ul yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yeb xin coxahann̈en anma sunil.
Ta chiilchalo huntek'an ti' jin̈, yeb ta lan̈an coch'ib yin̈, ay chon̈ocnico yul sat Comam Dios chal tu', mach nabn̈eho johtan̈elo Comam Jesucristo Jahawil.
Yaj wal mac mach chi'ilchalo huntek'an ti' yin̈ xin, lahan haca'tic'a mach chu ismujlito nahat, maca xin mach chu yilni. Xaisnahuln̈etoj tato tx'ahbilxalo hanta ismul ayco yin̈ yet yalan̈to tu'.
Yuxin wal tinan̈ wuẍtaj, wanab, xaquexyawte Comam Dios, yeb xaquexsiq'uilo Comam yetoj, yuxin lahweco helin̈ban heba yin̈ huntek'an ti'. Ta hac tu' chewatx'e, maẍtic'a chexayc'ayi.
Hac tu' xin ch'ak'lax sunil isc'ulch'anil Comam jet, cat joccano yin̈ huneln̈e yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil, Cocolomalpaxoj.
Yuxin ayinn̈etic'acojan walnihan teyet yun̈e henaniti huntek'an cuybanile ti', waxan̈ca caw yeli heyohtaj yeb xin lin̈anex yin̈ ist'in̈anil.
Yak' isba itzitz intohan, ha' hune' chintxuman tinan̈, caw yilal quexwiptzencanojan yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile ti', yun̈e mach chic'ayto heyu.
Yuto xayak' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil intxumulojan tato matxa nimano tiempo ayinic'ojan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Yuxin chiwaco yin̈ inc'ulan intz'ibn̈encantojan huntek'an cuybanile ti' teyet, hac tu' xin chenati yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yetxa quinelan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Hune' cuybanile ak'bilxa teyet juhan̈ yin̈ tzet yelapno ye yip Comam Jesucristo, yeb xin yin̈ tzet chu yul Comam hunelxa, caw mach ic'ti'oj, mach ton̈e nabilcan̈ juhan̈. Wal xin ha' caw han̈on̈an̈ jilan̈ yu isbak' cosatan̈ isk'ak'al yip Comam.

Jilan̈ yet yanico Comam Dios Mame ismay Comam Jesucristo, ishelni isba, yillax yin̈ Comam yet yelayti yaw xol moyan, yalni haca' ti': "Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan, caw xahan ay wuhan, caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj," ẍi Comam.
Han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jabehan̈ huntek'an tzoti' ayilo yul satcan̈ tu' yet ayon̈an̈ yeb Comam Jes'us iswi' hune' witz caw txahul.

Ha' hune' tu' xin, caw cam ch'ak'ni ist'in̈anil Istzoti' Comam tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payxa. Yuxin caw c'ul yuto cheyaco heyanma hecuyni huntek'an tzoti' tu', yuto haca' hunu lampara sak'al ismujli xol k'ejholo masanto yet lan̈anxa issajbiloj yet ch'ahilo sajbes, hac tu' xin yehi. Ha' hune' tu' chimujli yin̈ heyanma masanto chisajbilo yet ch'ahilo tz'ayic. Ha' chal yelapno hune' tz'ayic tu', ha' ton yet chul Comam Cristo.

Ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yalan̈tocanoj istz'ibn̈encano ebnaj yul Yum Comam yin̈ huntek'an tzet caw yilal yuli. Yaj caw yilal johtan̈eniloj tato machi hunu mac chisje istxumni yul yet ischuquil yin̈ tzet chiyal yelapno huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu'.
