Yuto ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam tu' caw machi hunu tzet ye tu' isnati ebnaj yul yet ischuquil yet istz'ibn̈encanoj, wal xin ha' Comam Dios ak'ni yohtan̈elo ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo.

Xol anma Israel ec'le ebnaj lek'ti'wom isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios, hactic'apax tu' texol hex ti', ay ebnaj lek'ti' cuywawom. Ha' ebnaj tu', niẍtejal quexiscuyni ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile maẍtaj ha' yecoj yun̈e yetaxto henabal yu cuybanil chak' ebnaj. Hac tu' chu ispaq'uico ebnaj isman̈c'on yin̈ tzet chal Comam, Comam coln̈ehon̈ yin̈ isya'tajil. Caw hac tu' xin yu yiniti ebnaj c'ayilal yiban̈ yin̈ an̈e.
Tzetc'a anma ch'oc tzujno yinta istx'ojal ebnaj tu', hac tu' xin caw tx'oj tzoti' challax yin̈ cuybanile yet Comam, hune' caw isyelal.

Yu ayco yanma ebnaj yin̈ ch'en melyu, yuxin chexyak' subchaho ebnaj yu cuybanile maẍtaj ha' yehi. Wal xin payxa ichi yechmalax ebnaj yalaxcanto yin̈ isya'tajil, mach ch'ec'to yet istan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj.

Conabaweti yin̈ tzet elico ebnaj 'angel yaco ismul sata Comam Dios. Wal xin mach yak' nimanc'ulal Comam yin̈ ebnaj. Ha' hune' utelax ebnaj, k'ojlaxto ebnaj bey hune' yehobal xol k'ejholo bay alaxico cadena yin̈ masanto yet chi'apni istz'ayical yet chilni Comam tzet chielico ebnaj.

Mach chiyak'paxo Comam Dios nimanc'ulal yin̈ anma yet payxa yet yanayo Comam hune' niman yaxn̈ab yiban̈ sunil anma caw tx'oj yute isba. Han̈ech'an naj No'e colchahi yebpaxo hujwan̈ yetbi. Naj No'e tu', yalic'o naj tet anma yet yalan̈to tato c'ul chute isba, cat iswatx'enpaxico isnabal.

Yebpaxo xin, yati Comam Dios isya'tajil yiban̈ anma ay bey Sodoma yeb anma ay bey Gomorra, isn̈usilo Comam cabeb con̈ob tu' yin̈ huneln̈e, caw tan̈xan̈e elcanico anma sunil. Cancano hune' tu' cuybanilehal tet anma machiswalil chute isba yin̈ tz'ujaniloxa.
Wal xin han̈ech'an naj Lot colchalo xol anma tu', yuto ha' istoholal iswatx'e naj. Naj Lot tu' caw oc isya'il yin̈ yanma naj yilni istx'ojal huntek'an anma tu'.
Wal naj Lot tu' xin, caw c'ul isbeybal naj, yaja' hunun tz'ayic hac'n̈etic'a tu' yilni naj yeb xin yaben naj istx'ojal chiswatx'e anma tu'. Yuxin bisc'ulaln̈etic'a ye naj yu anma.

Hactic'apax tu' tinan̈, yohta Comam Dios iscolni yin̈ ilwebal macta ayco yanma yin̈ Comam, wal mac mach c'ulo isnabal chialaxayo isya'tajil yiban̈ yet chihul istz'ayical yet chilni Comam tzet ch'elico anma.

Chayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ macta chisyijeto iswatx'en istx'ojal chiyoche isnimanil, yeb caw machi nich'ano yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil yul sat. Huntek'an ebnaj tu' caw lut'cano ebnaj, yeb caw can̈ye chute isba ebnaj. Machi nino chixiw ebnaj isbahwa yin̈ huntek'an caw ay yelapno ye ay satcan̈.

Wal ebnaj 'angel waxan̈ca caw ec'na ay ishelanil, yeb xin caw ak'bil yip ebnaj yul isk'ab, yaja' yet ayco huntek'an mac ay ismul yin̈ sat Comam Dios Jahawil, mach mak'bilo yoc ebnaj isk'anni isya'tajil yiban̈.

Huntek'an ebnaj lek'ti' tu' lahan ebnaj haca' no nok', caw machi nino isnabal ebnaj, han̈ech'an tzet chiyoche isc'ul ebnaj, ha' chiswatx'e. Haca' no nok' haxan̈c'an̈e istzablaxayoj, cat yalaxico ch'en yin̈ cat iscami, hac tu' ye ebnaj. Ton̈etic'a chibuchwa ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' mach yohtajoj. Chitan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj haca' no nok' tu' yuto machiswalil chiyute isba ebnaj.

Ch'ec'oya' yanma ebnaj haca' chu yak'ni ec'o ebnaj ya' yanma hunuxa maca. Caw xin chitzala ebnaj chak'ni ebnaj tzet choche yanma. Hac tu' xin chu yinilo ebnaj hepixan, chiniti ebnaj tx'ixwilal texol yet chak'ni tzalaho yanma ebnaj yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e yet chehunban heba hewa'i.

Ya'xan̈e yilnito ebnaj ebix ix, cat yochenico ebnaj ebix. Caw maẍtic'a chitibayo yu ebnaj yanico ismul. Chak' subchaho ebnaj macta maẍto caw yip yin̈ yet Comam; k'ayna ebnaj yochenico tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj. Caw xin tz'acti'n̈ebilxa ebnaj tu'.

C'aynato ebnaj yuto xaisheq'uilo isba ebnaj yul hune' beh caw tohol. Ha' isbeybal naj Balaam ik'bil yu ebnaj, hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, isc'ahol icham Beor. Naj Balaam tu' yaco naj ismul yuto caw yocheco naj ch'en melyu haltelax tet, yaj yu iswatx'en naj istx'ojal.

Yaja' maylax naj yu hune' no' burro yu hune' istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tu'. Wal xin maẍtic'a bay chijabe istzotel hunu no nok', yaj tzotelcan̈ no' tu' haca' anma. Ha' no' xin cachwahi yun̈e mach chiswatx'e naj hune' istx'ojal tu'.

Ha' huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom machiswalil chute isba tu', lahan ebnaj haca' hunu c'uh machi ha' ayayto yul, yeb xin haca' moyan nanann̈e bay chi-caw-yilaxto yu jak'ek', hac tu' ye ebnaj. Wal xin caw t'in̈anxa yeco yiban̈ ebnaj isto xol k'ejholo, ha' tu' xin chiec' ebnaj yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Ch'oc ebnaj yala' tzoti' machi yelapno yehi. Chismontento ebnaj anma iswatx'en istx'ojal haca' yin̈ ixloj; anma lan̈anto iscolchalo xol macta aytoco yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach t'in̈ano yehi.

Chal ebnaj tato chicolcha macta chioc tzujno yinta ebnaj, yaja' ha' hun ebnaj maẍto chicolchalo yul isk'ab istx'ojal, yuto aytoco ebnaj yak'ni cheja' isba yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uluj. Yuto ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal chejab yeco yin̈ istx'ojal tu'.

Yuto ha' mac xatic'a colcha tet istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ohtabilxa Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yu, Comam Cocolomal, yaj ta tzujanxa ch'ayc'ayi, chicancano yul isk'ab istx'ojal tu' hunelxa; hac tu' xin yelaxa, caw machiswalil chielico sata yet yalan̈tocanoj.
Ha' mac hac tu', ec'balto c'ul mach yohtan̈elo hune' beh caw tohol, sata lahwi yohtan̈eniloj cat isbejnicano chejbanile yet Comam Dios ak'bilxa tet.

Ha' yin̈ ebnaj chij isba hune' tzoti' chal anma haca' ti': "Metx tx'i' chilahwi isxabi metx, cat isto metx islonocan̈ isxaw hunelxa," yeb hunxa ti': "No' txitam, lahwi yaẍn̈elax no', cat istopaxo no' yin̈ an̈e issomnoto isba xol tz'otz'ew hunelxa," ẍi.

Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuhan, ch'apni iscayel intz'ibn̈entojan incartahan teyet. Chinnatijan teyet, cat quexwiptzenan heyanico henabal yin̈ istoholal, haca' walnitojan yin̈ babel incartahan.
Naweti tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat, yeb chejbanile yal Comam Jesucristo Jahawil, Cocolomal, huntek'an ak'bilxacano teyet juhan̈ han̈on̈ ischejab Comam jeti'an̈.
Caw yilal heyohtan̈enilo hune' ti'; yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic caw ay anma ch'oc tzebo yin̈ baytet yet Comam Dios yehi. Ha' huntek'an anma tu' ch'ec'o yin̈ istx'ojal choche yanma,

cat xin yoc anma tu' isk'ambeni: "¿Tzet tan̈cano hune' halbilcanoj tato chihul Comam Cristo hunelxa? Wal xin xalecamto ebnaj jichmam, yaj hune'n̈etic'a ha' xin ye haca' yet iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'," ẍi ebnaj.

Yaj mach isje isc'ul ebnaj tu' istxumulo yin̈ tzet yu iswatx'en Comam Dios satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' yu Istzoti' yet payat. Yu Istzoti' Comam tu' isyecan̈ isba tx'o tx'otx' xol ha ha', yoccano hoyno ha' yin̈ tx'otx'.
Ha'tic'a ha ha' tu' xin, tan̈tzenilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yaniti Comam hune' niman yaxn̈ab yet payxa yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e.

Yaj wal satcan̈ yeb xin tx'o tx'otx' ay tinan̈, yu Istzoti' Comam Dios lan̈an yechman isn̈uslaxto yu k'a k'a'. Yet chul tz'ayic yet chiillax tzet ch'elico anma, cat xin istan̈tzenilo Comam Dios anma machi yelapno Comam Dios yul sat, yin̈ huneln̈e.

Yuxin hex xahan ay wuti'an, tajca chito nahul hune' ti' heyu, yuto hune' tz'ayic lahan haca' hune' mil habil yul sat Comam Dios Jahawil, hune' mil habil tu' xin haca'n̈e hune' tz'ayic ye yul sat Comam.

Matolo ch'ec'to yet yijni isba yin̈ tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios haca' isnani hun majan anma tu', ¡machoj! Wal xin niman isc'ul Comam yechmali yuto mach chisje isc'ul Comam ta ay mac chic'aycantoj; yuxin chechma Comam ta ayto mac chisbejcano istx'ojal cat iscolchahi.

Yaj wal yet chul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil hunelxa xin, haca' chu yul hunu naj elk'om yet tona nahul ayon̈, hac tu' chu yul lemna Comam yet hune' tz'ayic tu'. Caw ay yip isn̈irla yet chitan̈ilo satcan̈ yeb tzet ik'bil yu sat yiban̈k'inal chitan̈ilo yu k'a k'a', yeb xin chitan̈paxilo tx'o tx'otx' yeb sunil tzet ay sat tx'otx'.
Yuxin tato hac tu' chu istan̈ilo sunil, ayxic'a jec' yin̈ isc'ulal tzet chal Comam, cat cam janico conabal yin̈ Comam.

Jechmawe yul hune' tz'ayic bay chul Comam tu'. Jak'aweco jip comunla yin̈ yet Comam, hac tu' xin chu yul Comam yin̈ an̈e. Ha' yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' chitan̈ilo satcan̈ yu k'a k'a', yeb xin sunil tzet ay satcan̈ tu' chi'ulican̈, cat istz'acantoj.
Yaja' han̈on̈ ti', lan̈an jechman hune' ac' satcan̈ yeb hune'xa tx'o tx'otx' caw ac' haltebilcano yu Comam Dios. Ha' bey tu' xin, sunil xan̈e caw tohol yeb caw c'ul.

Yuxin hex xahan ay wuhan, yulbal ayexico heyechman huntek'an tzet ye tu' chihuli, aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal, haxinwal hayet chul Comam ayexico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal machi nino hemul yeb istx'ojal chilchalo teyin̈.

Nachaojabilo heyu tato ayto isnimanc'ulal Comam Dios, yuxin maẍto chul Comam, hac tu' xin ay hamanil tet anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam. Chisje conaniti yin̈ juẍta Pablo, naj caw xahan ay ju, yuto hactic'apax tu' yu istz'ibn̈ento naj teyet yu ishelanil naj ak'lax yu Comam Dios.

Yul hunun iscarta naj hactic'a tu' yu istz'ibn̈ento naj teyet. Caw yeli, ay tzet ya'ta cotxumnilo yul iscarta naj, yuxin ha' anma mach isnabal yeb maẍto caw yip yanma yin̈ Comam, ha' ton xin chihec'ni tzet chal te'. Chishec'nipaxo ebnaj huntek'an tzet chal Yum Comam Dios. Yu hune' istx'ojal chiswatx'e ebnaj tu', yuxin chic'ayc'anto ebnaj.

Yuxin hex xahan ay wuhan, yalan̈tocanoj cheyabencano huntek'an ti', caw cheyil heba tajca chexhatxlaxto yu islek'ti'al ebnaj istx'ojaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e, cat heyinilo heba yin̈ ist'in̈anil bay ayexicoj.

Wal xin cam ohtan̈ewelo Comam Jesucristo, Cocolomal. Ipojab xin hech'ib yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam hunun tz'ayic. Yuxin caw nimanojab yelapno ye Comam Cocolomal yul hesat tinan̈, yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet yun̈e heyohtan̈en tzet caw yelapno ye Comam Tzoti' chiak'ni cok'inal. Comam ayxatic'a yet maẍto hunu tzet ye tu' chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Wal xin han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jabehan̈ tzet caw yal Comam tu', jilnipaxicojan̈ yin̈ Comam. Nahatil jil cobahan̈ yeb Comam, cotzabnipaxojan̈ Comam. Comam chiak'ni k'inale ti' isye isba jetan̈, yuxin chijaco cobahan̈ jalnilojan̈. Tinan̈ xin chijalan̈ teyet ta ha' Comam chiak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal. Isc'atan̈ Comam Dios ay Comam, yaj xin hulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isyeni isba jet.
Yuxin Comam jiltu'an̈ yeb jabehan̈ tzet yala, ha' chijaltojan̈ teyet yun̈e heyoc jetbihojan̈, hac tu' xin hunxan̈e chijucano yin̈ Comam Dios Mame.
Yuxin chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ huntek'an tzoti' ti' teyet yun̈e caw tz'ajan chiyucanico tzalahilal yin̈ janma.
Wal tinan̈ xin, chijaltojan̈ teyet yin̈ cuybanile yalcano Comam Jesucristo jetan̈. Yal Comam Jes'us tato Comam Dios caw issajilk'inal yehi, machi nich'ano k'ejholo yin̈.
Tato chijala ta hunxa je yeb Comam Dios, yaj tato chito cowatx'e istx'ojal, chaliloj tato ayon̈toco xol k'ejholo, yuxin yin̈ haca' tu' caw lek'ti'on̈, mach c'ulo cobeybal.

Comam Dios issajilk'inal yehi, yuxinto yin̈ issajilk'inal Comam Dios tu' chon̈belwi, caw jetbixa coba hununon̈. Ha' xin ischiq'uil Comam Jes'us, Isc'ahol Comam Dios, ha' chon̈sajn̈en yin̈ sunil comul.
Tato chijala tato machi comul, han̈-caw-on̈ chijak' subchaho coba cochuquil, mach xin ayon̈ico yin̈ isyelal.

Tato chijalati comul tet Comam Dios, chiyak'cano tan̈o Comam comul jiban̈. Sunil comachiswalilal chiyicanilo Comam jin̈, yuto istoholal chiswatx'e Comam, yeb xin sunil tzet chal Comam masan chij isba.
Tato chijala ta machi comul chijacoj, lan̈an jalni ta lek'ti' Comam Dios, caw machi Istzoti' Comam yin̈ janma haca' tu'.

Walex caw xahan ay wuti'an, chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet, yun̈e mach cheyaco hemul. Yaja' tato ay hunujon̈ chijaco comul, ay hune' mac chak' isba jin̈ tet Comam Dios. Hune' mac tu', ha' ton Comam Jesucristo. Wal Comam tu', caw istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e Comam.
Ha' iscamical, ha' tohlancano sunilal comul. Maẍn̈etaj xin comul han̈on̈ ti' istohlacanto Comam, to ha' hun ismul sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Ta chicoyije cuybanile ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios, chal yelapnoj hune' tu' ta xajohtan̈elo Comam.
Yaj tato chijala ta caw johtaxa Comam Dios, yaj ta mach chicoyije cuybanile ak'bilcano jet yu Comam, caw lek'ti'on̈ chal tu', hac tu' xin caw mach c'ulo jehicoj.
Wal tato caw chicoyije tzet chal Comam tu' xin, caw yeli chijoche Comam Dios. Hac tu' xin chiyu johtan̈eniloj tato caw hunxa je yeb Comam.
Ta chijala tato caw hunxa je yeb Comam Dios, caw yilal cobeybaln̈en haca' tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo yet yec' Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Wuẍtaj, wanab, hune' chejbanile chiwaltojan teyet ti', caw mach ac'to heyabeni. Caw xatic'a hallax heyabe' yettaxtic'a heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Caw xin heyohtaxa hune' chejbanile ti', hune' chihalni tato caw yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈.

Walca xin payxa ak'bilcano hune' chejbanile ti', yaj haca' hunu caw ac'to chiwute walnitojan teyet, yuto ha' Comam Jesucristo hul watx'enocano yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil. Lan̈anpaxo xin isyenilo isba hune' cuybanile ti' texol, yuxin haxa hune' issajilk'inal, ha'xa chimujli yin̈ heyanma, hac tu' xin chu yelcano k'ejholo teyin̈.
Tato chijala ta caw ayxaco issajilk'inal Comam Dios yin̈ janma, yaj ta chito chiwa coc'ul yin̈ hunu juẍtaj maca janab, caw aytoco k'ejholo yin̈ janma.
Wal tato caw xahan chijil juẍtaj yeb janab, caw ayxaco issajilk'inal yul janma, matxa tzet chon̈ak'ni ayc'ayoj.
Yaja' ta chichiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈, chaliloj ta ayon̈toco xol k'ejholo, yeb ta lan̈an cobelwi xol k'ejholo tu', mach johtajo bay caw cotocoj yuto k'ejholo tu' chiak'ni tan̈o comujlubal.
Hex xahan ay wuti'an, caw chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet, yuto xa'el hemul teyiban̈ yu Comam Jesucristo.

Hex mame mi'e, caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' ti' teyet, yuto caw heyohtaxa hune' Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocano maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Hac pax tu' xin hex tzehtaj, caw chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet, yuto caw xaquexk'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil.

Walex ac'to hex yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios, caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' ti' teyet, yuto heyohtaxa Comam ay bey yul satcan̈. Hex mame mi'e, chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet, yuto caw heyohtaxatic'a Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈to maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Hex tzehtaj, caw chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet yuto caw ay heyip heyanico Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ heyanma. Yu hune' tu' xin, quexk'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil.
Wal xin mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ hune' sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb sunil tzet ay sat. Tato cheyaco heyanma yin̈ tzet ay sat yiban̈k'inal ti', mach ayoco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios, chal tu'.

Yuto istx'ojal chiyak' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yettic'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi, maẍtaj yin̈ Comam Dios chitita. Ha' huntek'an ti' xin chiyalte yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti': istx'ojal tzet choche conimanil, ha' tzet chijila chijochecoj yaj mach chitzala Comam yin̈, yebpaxo cololo'n̈en coba yin̈ tzettaj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; sunil ti' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi.
Hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb sunil istx'ojal chak'a, chiapni istiempohal bay chitan̈iloj, yaj tato ha' tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios chicowatx'e, wal tu' ay cok'inal mach istan̈bal.

Hex caw xahan ay wuti'an chiwalan teyet, caw ayon̈xaco yin̈ islahobal tiempo. Hex ti' xaheyabe ta chihul naj Anticristo, naj ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo. Yaja' tinan̈ xin tx'i'alxa ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam xaisyelo isba, yuxin chiconaloj tato caw yin̈ xaislahobal tiempo ayon̈.

Caw coxol elna huntek'an ebnaj tu', yaj yin̈ caw yeli mach jetbiho coba yeb ebnaj. K'inalo tato jetbi coba yeb ebnaj, caw machim ispohilo isba ebnaj coxol, caw jetbimi coba yeb ebnaj tinan̈. Yaj caw ispohilo isba ebnaj coxol yun̈e isyenilo isba tato caw mach jetbiho coba yeb ebnaj.
Wal xin xayak' Comam Jesucristo Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet, yuxin caw cosunil johtaxa isyelal Comam Dios.

Caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an teyet, maẍtaj yu mach heyohtajoj baytet caw isyelal Comam Dios, to caw heyohtaxa; caw heyohtaxapaxoj tato machi hunu lek'ti'al chiilcha xol cuybanile caw t'in̈an yecoj.

Chiwalan teyet macta caw lek'ti'wom tu', ha' ton mac chihalni tato Comam Jes'us mach Cristohoj. Ha' ton mac tu' ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam, yuto mach chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam.

Ha' mac chihalni tato mach Isc'aholo Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo, caw mach ayayto Comam yul yanma. Walpaxo mac chihalni tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo, ha' hune' mac tu' yet Comam yehi.

Ha' hune' cuybanile ti' jabe yettax janico coba yul isk'ab Comam Dios, caw xin yilal wal yeco yul janma. Tato caw wal yeco hune' cuybanile tu' yul janma, wal tu' huneln̈e jeco yin̈ Comam Dios, yebpaxo yul isk'ab Isc'ahol.
Ha' hune' k'inal mach istan̈bal, ha' haltebilcano yu Comam Jesucristo tato chiyak' jet.
Caw chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet, yuto ay mac choche quexyak'a subchahoj.

Walex hex ti', ak'bilxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet yu Comam Jesucristo, yuxinto mach yechelto ay mac chexcuyni; yuto ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chexcuyni yin̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu'. Ha' xin cuybanile chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo caw yeli, machi nino lek'ti'al ayco yin̈. Yuxin caw huneln̈ehojab cheyutecanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, haca' chute yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet.
Tinan̈ xin hex caw xahan ay wuti'an, caw huneln̈ehojab jeco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yun̈e mach chon̈xiw tet Comam yet chihul hunelxa yeb mach chon̈tx'ixwican̈.
Wal xin johtaxa tato istoholaln̈etic'a tzet chiswatx'e Comam, yuxin tato caw yin̈ istoholal chon̈belwi, ha' chiyeniloj ta yuninal Comam jehi.

Wal xin txumweloj yin̈ ta mach isbi hanta caw isxahanil ayon̈ yu Comam Dios, yuxin chon̈yal Comam Dios yuninaloj, caw xin yeli con̈ yuninalon̈xa Comam. Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw mach chik'oji istxumniloj tato yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi. Hacpax tu' yak'le Comam Jesucristo, maẍtic'a txumchalo yu anma tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, hex caw xahan ay wuti'an, caw yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi, yaj maẍto chisyelo isba sunil isc'ulal Comam chiyak' jet. Caw johtaj tato yet chihul Comam Jesucristo tu', caw lahanxa chon̈elico yebi, yuto chijila' yin̈ Comam haca' caw yehi.
Sunilon̈ ayco hune' ti' yipo coc'ul chicosajn̈e janma yin̈ istx'ojal, haca' Comam Jesucristo caw machi nino istx'ojal yin̈.
Ha' mac chaco ismul chisman̈c'o cuybanile yet Comam Dios, yuto yet chijanico comul, chicoman̈c'o cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam.
Johtaxa ta yu yinilo Comam Jesucristo mule, yuxin hulic'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', machi xin nino ismul Comam.
Yuxin han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam matxa chicowatx'e istx'ojal. Wal mac chito watx'en istx'ojal, maẍto yohtajo Comam, maẍto chitxumchapaxo Comam yu.
Hex xahan ay wuti'an, mach cheyak' subchaho heba tet hunuxa maca. Tato ha' istoholal chicowatx'e, caw c'ulon̈paxo haca' Comam Jesucristo, yuto han̈c'an̈e caw istoholal iswatx'e Comam.

Wal mac chito watx'en istx'ojal, caw yet naj matzwalil yehi, yuto caw mulumtic'a naj matzwalil tu' yettax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Wal Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios, hulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal yun̈e yetanto ismunil naj matzwalil tu'.
Han̈on̈ pitzc'anajon̈xa yin̈ Comam Dios, matxa chicowatx'e istx'ojal, yuto ayxa isk'inal Comam yul janma, matxa xin chicowatx'epaxo istx'ojal yuto yuninalxa Comam jehi.
Hac tu' xin, chiyu isyenilo isba mac yuninal Comam Dios, yeb xin mac yuninal naj matzwalil, yuto ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal yeb xin mach xahano chil yet anmahil, caw mach yeto Comam Dios yehi.
Hune' cuybanile ti' heyabe yettax heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios tato yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈.

Mach chijutewe coba haca' yute isba naj Ca'in, naj tu' yet naj matzwalil ye naj, yuto ismak' camo naj yuẍtaj. ¿Tzet yin̈ ismak' camo naj yuẍta tu'? Yuto caw isc'ulal iswatx'e yuẍta naj, wal naj Ca'in tu' machiswalil tzet iswatx'e naj.
Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, mach cheyak' c'ayo hec'ul ta chichiwaco isc'ul anma yet sat yiban̈k'inal ti' teyin̈.

Yet yalan̈to, ayon̈ico yul isk'ab camical mach istan̈bal. Wal tinan̈ xin, caw xa'ak'lax hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal. Caw johta hune' tu' yuto caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈. Tato mach xahano chijil coba hununon̈, caw ayon̈toco yul isk'ab camical.
Tato chichiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈, caw lahan yeb mak'omon̈. Walex hex ti' xin, caw heyohtaj ta mach hunu naj mak'om camo anma chischah isk'inal tet Comam Dios.
Johtaxa tzet chalilo coxahann̈en coba, yuto yak' camo isba Comam Jesucristo jin̈; hacon̈pax tu' hinanojabon̈ jak'ni camo coba yin̈ hunu juẍtaj.
Yaja' k'inalo ta ay hunu mac ay tzet aya, ton̈e xin chil yec' yuẍta yin̈ man̈tzetal, machi xin chicolwa yin̈, chal yelapnoj tato caw machi isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios yul yanma.
Hex caw xahan ayex wuti'an, caw machn̈eojabtaj coti' chalni ta xahan chijil juẍtaj, caw yilal cocolwa yin̈, hac tu' xin chiyu coyeniloj tato caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈ yin̈ caw isyelal.

Hac ton tu' xin, chiyu johtan̈eniloj tato caw yin̈ ist'in̈anil ayon̈icoj, yuxin matxa con̈xiw yin̈ sat Comam Dios. Wal xin ta chitzotel janma tato ay hunu istx'ojal ayco jin̈, mach chon̈xiwi yuto ec'bal Comam cosataj, yohta Comam sunil tzet chiec' yul janma.
Yaja' xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuti'an, tato caw ak'anc'ulal ye janma, ta caw machi cotx'ojal chijabe, caw mach chon̈xiw yul sat Comam Dios.
Hac tu' xin chak' Comam sunil tzet chicok'an tet, yuto chicoyije sunil ischejbanil Comam, yeb chicowatx'e tzet choche isc'ul.
Ha' chejbanile halbilcano jet yu Comam Dios, ha' janayto yul janma tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo, yeb xin coxahann̈en coba hununon̈, haca' yute yalnicano Comam jet.
Tato chicoyije tzet chal Comam, caw ayxaco Comam jetbiho chal tu', yeb ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam. Caw xin johtaj tato ayco Comam Dios jin̈, yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo xayak' Comam jet.

Wuẍtaj wanab, tato ay ebnaj chiec' halnoj tato caw ischejab Comam Dios yehi, caw mach ton̈eo cheyayto tzet chal ebnaj tu' yul heyanma. Caw babel cheyabe istzotel ebnaj tato Istzoti' Comam Dios chal ebnaj, yuto caw tx'i'al ebnaj lek'ti'wom chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios yehi.

Hac ti' chu hetxumniloj tato ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj, ta chal ebnaj haca' ti': "Caw anma yute isba Comam Jesucristo yet yulic'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'," ta ẍi ebnaj, wal tu' ayco Yesp'iritu Comam yin̈ ebnaj.

Wal mac mach chihalni yin̈ Comam Jes'us haca' tu' xin, caw mach ayoco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈, ha' yesp'iritu naj chicajni Comam Jesucristo ayco yin̈. Hune' esp'iritu tu' xaheyabe tato chihuli, mach yetto bak'in chihul hun tu', wal xin ayxac'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' tinan̈.

Hex xahan ay wuhan, caw yetxa Comam Dios je tinan̈. Wal xin xacon̈k'oji yin̈ ebnaj lek'ti'wom tu', yuto ec'na caw ay yip Comam ayayto yul janma satapaxo naj ayco yul yanma anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Caw yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye ebnaj, yuxinto han̈c'an̈e tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw chiyalobtan̈e ebnaj. Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw sak'al yabento tzet chal ebnaj.

Yaj walon̈ ti' xin, yetxa Comam Dios jehi, yuxin ha' mac ohtan̈enxa Comam Dios, ha' chiyabeto tzet chijala, wal anma mach yeto Comam Dios xin, caw mach chiyoche yabe' tzet chijala. Hac tu' xin, chiyu johtan̈enilo macta ayco isyelal Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈, yeb xin mac ayco yesp'iritu naj yahawil lek'ti'al yin̈.

Hex xahan ay wuti'an, xahanojab chijil coba hununon̈ yuto yin̈ Comam Dios chitit hune' coxahann̈en coba ti'. Tato caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈, chal yelapnoj tato ayon̈xaco yuninalo Comam Dios, johtaxa Comam.
Yaja' tato mach xahano chijil coba, caw maẍto johtajo Comam Dios chal tu', yuto wal Comam Dios caw xahan ay anma yu.
Isyelo Comam tato caw xahan ayon̈ yu, yuto yati hunpilan Isc'ahol yul say yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e yak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal.

Ha' xin chiyenilo tzet caw yu con̈yochen Comam Dios. Wal xin, caw maẍtajon̈ babel coyelo jochen Comam Dios, to ha' Comam con̈ochen babel, yuxin yati Comam Isc'ahol yak'ni isba yin̈ xahanbalil, yak'nicano tan̈o comul.
Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab, hex xahan ay wuti'an, yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈, yuto hac tu' yu con̈isxahann̈en Comam.
Waxan̈ca maẍto hunu mac chi'ilni Comam tu' huneloj, yaja' tato xahan chijil coba hununon̈, caw ayco Comam yul yanma. Hac tu' chu isyenilo isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈ yin̈ istoholal.
Hac tu' chu johtan̈eniloj ta ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios, yeb ta aypaxico Comam yul janma, yuto xayak' Comam Yesp'iritu jet.
Yuto han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jilan̈ yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios, yuxinto chijalan̈ tato ha' Comam Dios an̈eti Isc'ahol iscolno anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Macn̈etic'a chalni tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo, ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chal tu', yeb ayxapaxico Comam yul yanma.
Hac tu' xin chu johtan̈eniloj cat janipaxayto yul janma ta caw chon̈yoche Comam Dios. Wal Comam Dios, caw chiyoche Comam anma, yuxinto ha' mac chixahann̈e yet anmahil, caw ayco Comam Dios yul yanma.
Hac tu' chu isch'ib coxahann̈en coba hununon̈, yun̈e yet chiapni istz'ayical hune' isya'tajil chihuli, mach chon̈xiwcan̈, yuto caw haca' ye Comam Jesucristo, hac tu' jehic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Hayet chijochen Comam Dios yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil, wal tu' machi bay chalti isba xiwquilal, yuto yet chon̈xiwi chon̈nanon tet isya'tajil. Yuxin ta ay mac chixiwi, mach xahano ay Comam Dios yu.
Walon̈ han̈on̈ ti' chijoche Comam Dios, yuto ha' Comam babel con̈ocheni.

Yaja' tato ay hunujon̈ chijal haca' ti': "Wal haninti'an caw chiwochehan Comam Dios," ta con̈chi, yaj caw caj chijilpaxo juẍtaj, yin̈ haca' tu' lek'ti'on̈. Yuxin tato mach chicoxahann̈e hunu juẍta chijilico yin̈, ¿tzet xin chiyu jochen Comam Dios mach chijilico yin̈?
Comam Jesucristo ak'n̈ecano hune' cuybanile ti' jet: "Ha' mac chiochen Comam Dios, caw yilal isxahann̈enpaxo yuẍtaj," ẍi Comam.
Mac chianayto yul yanma tato ha' Comam Jes'us, ha' Cristo Cocolomal, caw yuninal Comam Dios yehi. Tato chijoche Comam Dios chijochepaxo Isc'ahol Comam.
Hayet chijochen Comam Dios, cat xin coyijen tzet chala, caw johtaj tato caw chicoxahann̈e sunil yuninal Comam.
Tato chicoyije cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam, ha' chalniloj ta chijoche Comam. Sunil cuybanile yet Comam tu' mach ya'tajo coyijeni.
Yuxin sunil yuninal Comam Dios, chik'oji yin̈ sunil istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yuto yet chijanico janma yin̈ Comam Dios chon̈k'oji yin̈ istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Ha' mac chianayto yul yanma tato ha' Comam Jesucristo caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi, chik'oji yin̈ sunil istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Yet yulic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ah ha' iswi', yelpaxo ischiq'uil, ha' ton xin chiyeniloj tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi. Mach ton̈eho hulic'o yak'a' aho ha' iswi', to elpaxo ischiq'uil yet iscami.

Ay ox majan chak' isba yin̈ ta ha' Comam Jesucristo caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi; ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ay yiban̈ yet yah ha' iswi' Comam, istzotelayti Comam Dios yiban̈, istzotelpaxo Comam Dios yet lan̈an iscam Comam yin̈ culus.
Haca'tic'a yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ Comam Jesucristo, hac tu' xin yu isyenipaxo ha ha', yeb chic'.
Chijabeto yin̈ tzet chal comon anma, hajxam xin yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, to caw ec'balto ay yelapno ye tzet chal Comam, wal xin ha' caw Comam Dios chitzotel yin̈ Isc'ahol.

Mac chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios, lan̈an yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul yanma tato yel chal Comam yin̈ Isc'ahol. Wal mac mach chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios xin, caw lek'ti' Comam yul sat, yuto mach chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chiyal Comam Dios yin̈ Isc'ahol.
Hune' tzet chal Comam Dios, ha' ton cok'inal mach istan̈bal chak' Comam; caw xin yin̈n̈e Isc'ahol Comam ay hune' k'inale tu'.
Yuxin ha' mac xaischah Isc'ahol Comam Dios yul yanma, caw ay hune' isk'inal mach chitan̈i. Yaj wal mac machi Isc'ahol Comam yul yanma xin, machi hune' isk'inal tu'.
Hex chahbilxa Isc'ahol Comam heyu, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet yun̈e heyohtan̈eniloj tato ay hek'inal mach istan̈bal.
Yuxin chicawxi inc'ulan yin̈ Comam Dios, yuto johtaj ta chicok'an hunu tzet ye tu' tet Comam haca' tzet choche isc'ul Comam, caw chabe Comam tzet chicok'ana.
Yuxin ta caw johtaj tato caw chabe Comam Dios tzet chijala yet chon̈txahli tet Comam, caw johtapaxoj tato chiyak' Comam tzet chicok'ana.

Tato chijila ta ay hunu juẍta ayco yin̈ mule, yaj mule mach chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal, cok'anawe isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ naj, cat xin yak'ni Comam iscawil naj. Wal xin ay hune'xa mule chon̈inito yul isk'ab hune' camical mach istan̈bal. Tato yin̈ hune' mule tu' bay ayco juẍtaj maca janab, caw chiwalan teyet mach chek'an isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈, mach chiwalan teyet ta chextxahli yin̈.
Sunil ismachiswalilal ha' ton mule, yaj ay mule mach chon̈inito yin̈ camical.
Caw johtaj ta macta yuninalxa Comam Dios yehi, matxa chaco ismul, yuto haxa Isc'ahol Comam Dios chitan̈eni. Yuxin caw matxa chu yoc naj matzwalil yetanoj.
Caw johtaj ta yeton̈xa Comam Dios. Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw ayayo yalan̈ yip naj matzwalil.

Caw johtapaxoj tato xahulic'o Isc'ahol Comam Dios, ha' Comam ak'n̈e conabal johtan̈enilo Comam Dios yin̈ caw isyelal. Yuxinto hunxa je yin̈ Comam caw yel chala, ha' ton Comam Jesucristo, Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi, ha' Comam Dios yin̈ caw isyelal, ha' Comam chiak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal.
Hex xahan ay wuti'an, caw nann̈e heyu, mach chexoc tzujno yinta tioẍ yeb sunil huntek'an bay chiay jahno anma. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Hanin icham winaj inti'an, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet wanab, hach saybilxa yu Comam Dios, yeb tetej hawuninal. Yin̈ caw yeli caw xahan ayex wuhan, yaj maẍn̈etajinan to ha' hunpaxo ebnaj juẍtaj, yeb ebix janab caw xaohtan̈en cuybanile caw yeli.
Caw xahan ayex wuhan, yu hune' caw isyelal ayco yin̈ janma. Ayc'o coc'atan̈ hune' isyelal ti' sunilbal tiempo.

Ha'ojab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo, Isc'ahol Comam Dios chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈, cat istz'ay isc'ul teyin̈, cat yak'nipaxo ak'anc'ulal teyet yin̈ isyelal, cat quexisxahann̈en Comam.
Caw tzalacan̈ inc'ulan yet wilnihan haywan̈ hawunin caw yijem yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala, haca' yute yak'nicano Comam Dios jet.

Wal tinan̈ xin, caw chiwalan teyet tato caw yilal xahan chijil coba hununon̈. Hune' chejbanile chiwak'an teyet ti', caw mach babelto heyabeni, caw hataxtic'a yet joc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, hatax tu' yichi jabeni.
Tato chicoyije chejbanile chal Comam Dios, chaliloj ta caw chijoche tzet chal Comam. Hune' chejbanile xajabe yettax joc yul isk'ab Comam Dios, ha' ton coxahann̈en coba hununon̈.

Wal tinan̈ xin, caw tx'i'alxa ebnaj lek'ti'wom chiec' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Chilan xin yalni ebnaj ta mach hulic'o Comam Jesucristo yin̈ anmahil yin̈ caw isyelal. Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chiak'ni subchaho anma. Caw xin ayco ishowal ebnaj yin̈ Comam.
Caw nann̈e heyu xin, tajca caw nabn̈e cheyu yin̈ hemunil yin̈ yet Comam. Wal xin caw tz'ajanojab chu hechahni ispaj selel hemunil tet Comam Dios.

Macn̈etic'a chipalc'oncan̈ yiban̈ cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam Jesucristo cat isbejnicanoj, chalilo chal tu' ta machi Comam Dios yul yanma. Wal taca tzujan yinta cuybanile ak'bilcano yu Comam xin, wal tu' caw ayayto Comam Dios yeb Isc'ahol Comam yul yanma.
Tato ay hunu mac chiapni tec'atan̈, nan xin cuybanile ik'bil yu, mach chechah yul heyatut, yeb xin mach chek'ambe hanic' ye isc'ul.
Tato chexoc hek'ambe' hanic' ye isc'ul, chalilo chal tu' ta ha' hunex yin̈ hune' istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu'.

Caw hantan̈e tzet chiwochehan chiwaltojan teyet, yaj mach chiwochehan chintz'ibn̈etojan yin̈ hum ti', yuto toxan̈e chiwechmahan intohan quexintuclenojan cat xin cotzoteli, hac tu' caw chitz'ajna tzalahilal yul janma.
Ha' ej yuninal hanoh ay bey ti', sic'bililo yu Comam Dios, chik'ambeni hanic' hawe bey tu'. ¡Hacojab tu'!
Hanin icham winaj inti'an, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet, wuẍta Gayo, yin̈ caw yeli xahan ayach wuhan.
Wuẍtaj, caw chink'anan tet Comam Dios tato caw haca' isc'ulal hawehico yin̈ tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios, hac tu' xin isc'ulal chi'ec'paxo hawu. Chink'annipaxojan ta caw hachn̈etic'apaxoj.
Caw quintzalahan yet wabenan yalni huntek'an ebnaj juẍta hulic'oj tato caw yijem ach yin̈ isc'ulal Comam, yebpaxo xin tzujan ach yin̈ isyelal.
Caw ec'na chitzalacano wanmahan yet chiwabenan tato caw yijem wuninalan.
Wuẍtaj, caw c'uln̈e hayijen munil yin̈ hacolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj, hacpax tu' xin yin̈ ebnaj juẍta nan con̈obal chi'ec' tac'atan̈.

Yet cutxanon̈icojan̈ bey ti' yin̈ culto, yalni ebnaj hulico tu' tzet isxahanil ay ebnaj hawu. Wal tinan̈ xin, caw chiwalan tawet ta chalahico hacolwa yin̈ ebnaj yet chito ebnaj yin̈ isbel, haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios ha' chawatx'e.
Ebnaj juẍta tu', ha' Istzoti' Comam Jes'us chi'ec' ebnaj yala'c'oj yuxin mach chu isk'anni ebnaj colwal tet anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam.
Walxinto caw yilal cocolwa yin̈ ebnaj. Tato chon̈colwa yin̈ ebnaj, hacojtam caw ha' hunon̈ lan̈an comunla yinta ebnaj yet chi'ec' ebnaj cuywal tu'.

Wuẍtaj, xatic'a watojan hune' wuman teyet maquex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey tu'. Yaj wal naj Di'otrefes xin, caw chaco isba naj iswi'ehalo yalni. Waxan̈ca hanta tzet chiwaltojan yul hum, yaj caw machi yelapno ye yul sat naj yin̈ tzet chiwaltojan.

Yuxin hayet chinapnihan bey tu', caw chiwalicojan istx'ojal naj yin̈ sat, yuto caw chi'ec' naj yalac'o cok'umalan̈ teyet bey tu', yeb lek'ti'al chal naj jin̈an̈. Maẍn̈etaj tu', to caw mach chischahpaxo naj ebnaj jetbihan̈ chi'apni bey tu', yaj tato ay ebnaj juẍta bey tu' chichahni ebnaj xin, caw chicachwa naj yin̈, cat xin yinilo naj ebnaj texol.

Hach wuẍtaj caw xahan ayach wuhan, mach chawute haba haca' chute isba anma caw machiswalil chiswatx'e. Hachcachan haca' chute isba ebnaj juẍta caw c'ul isbeybal, hac tu' chawute haba. Yuto ta han̈c'an̈e isc'ulal chiswatx'e hunu mac, ha' chalniloj tato yetxa Comam Dios yehi. Wal mac machiswalil chiswatx'e xin, ha' chalniloj ta maẍto ohtabilo Comam Dios yu.

Wal naj juẍta Demetrio, caw c'ul chiyute isba naj xol anma, yuto caw haban cotxumni. Caw xin sunil ebnaj juẍta chihalnipaxoj tato caw yijem chiyute isba naj yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala, hac tu' xin walnipaxojan. Caw heyohtaj tato yet chiwalnihan huno tzet ye tu' caw yel chiwalan.
Caw hantan̈eto tzet caw chiwoche wala'tojan tawet, yaj caw mach chiwochehan chintz'ibn̈etojan yul hum ti'.
Yuto caw ayxaco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan cachintuclenojan, cat cotzotel ninoj.

Caw chawil haba bey tu'. Chisk'amben ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey ti' hanic' hawe bey tu' yin̈ hacawil, cat xin hawalnipaxo tet ebnaj juẍta bey tu' ta chil isba ebnaj. Hal tet ebnaj yin̈ hununtajil ink'ana'an.

Hanin Judas inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan, yeb xin wuẍta inbahan yeb naj Jacobo, chiwatojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex wuẍtaj yeb hex wanab. Caw awtebilexxa yu Comam, yeb caw xahan ayex yu Comam Dios Mame, yeb xin caw tan̈ebilex yu Comam Jesucristo.
Tz'ayojab isc'ul Comam teyin̈, yak'ab Comam ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet yin̈ caw niman.

Hex wuẍtaj, hex wanab, caw xahan ayex wuhan. Caw tx'i'alxa el chiwochehan chiwa'tojan hune' incartati'an teyet yin̈ tzet ye cocolbanil xacochah tet Comam Dios. Yaj wal tinan̈ xin, chitit yin̈ wanmahan ta yilal wanitojan hune' carta ti' teyet, yu quexyiptzen yin̈ heyinahti heyanma heya'iln̈en hune' cuybanil bay ayco janma han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam.

Caw yilal wanitojan hune' carta ti' yuto ay huntek'an mac lek'ti'aln̈e yu yoc texol. Huntek'an ebnaj tu' istx'ojaln̈e chiswatx'e ebnaj; chal ebnaj ta yu ayon̈xaco yin̈ isc'ulch'anil Comam xaisje cowatx'en sunil istx'ojal. Chiyintan̈ecanilto ebnaj tu' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chon̈ijbani. Ha' ton yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj ti' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios yet payat ta yilal istocano ebnaj yin̈ isya'tajil.

Waxan̈ca heyohtaxa hune' chiwalti'an yaja' chinnapaxtijan teyet yin̈ ebnaj Israel, iscon̈ob Comam Dios. Lahwi iscolnilo Comam ebnaj yul con̈ob Egipto, istan̈tzenilo Comam macta mach yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal Comam.

Yebpaxo xin, naweti tzet elico huntek'an ebnaj 'angel nime winaj yute isba, isbejnicano ebnaj hune' yehobal ak'bil tet yu Comam Dios. Wal tinan̈ xin, c'alan ebnaj sic'lebil yu ch'en cadena, majan ebnaj xol k'ejholo yu Comam Dios yechman istz'ayical bay chul isya'tajil yiban̈ ebnaj yu Comam yin̈ huneln̈e.

Hactic'apax tu' xin anma ay bey Sodoma yeb anma ay bey Gomorra yeb huntek'anxa con̈ob ayco yin̈la ishoyanil cabeb con̈ob tu', oc ebnaj winaj ixloj, yocpaxo ebix ix winajloj; chiswatx'en tzet mach yeto ay isnimanil. Huntek'an anma tu' ischah isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' yin̈ huneln̈e. Sunil tu', cancano yechelo tet sunil anma yun̈e istxumnilo tzet elico anma watx'en istx'ojal.

Waxan̈ca hac tu' yute Comam Dios, yak'ni isya'tajil tet huntek'an anma yet payat tu', yaja' huntek'an ebnaj ayco texol tinan̈, chisman̈c'o ebnaj cuybanile aycano yu Comam Dios. Yu isyijen ebnaj tzet chal iswayic, chetan ebnaj isnimanil. Chalnipaxo ebnaj tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ ebnaj 'angel.

Yaj conabati yin̈ naj arc'angel Miguel, yet yak'len howal naj yeb naj matzwalil yin̈ isnimanil naj Mois'es, waxan̈ca caw aycan̈ yip naj Miguel tu', yaj machi yal naj tzoti' tx'oj chitz'acti'n̈en naj matzwalil tu', cachann̈e yal naj haca' ti': --Ha'ojab Comam Dios chaẍmaynoj, ẍi naj tet naj.

Wal ebnaj chiwalti'an, ton̈etic'a chibuchwa ebnaj yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' mach yohtajoj. Lahan isnabal ebnaj haca' no nok', ha' tzet yohta ebnaj mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj, ton̈etic'a chiswatx'e ebnaj tzet choche isc'ul. Ha' huntek'an tu' chi'etanto yanma ebnaj sata Comam Dios, cat ischahni ebnaj isya'tajil.

Caw c'anch'ancano huntek'an ebnaj tu', yuto lahan tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj haca' tzet iswatx'e naj Ca'in. Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' tzet yute naj Balaam, yu ch'en melyu iswatx'e naj istx'ojal. Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' iswatx'e naj Cor'e, cam naj yu mach isyije naj tzet yal Comam Dios; hac tu' xin chu istan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj ti' yu isman̈c'omal.

Tx'ixobal chuco ebnaj texol yet checutxban heba wa'o yin̈ yet Comam. Maẍtic'a nino tzet chal isc'ul ebnaj yet ch'oc ebnaj wa'o texol yeb machi nino chixiw ebnaj. Lahan ebnaj haca' hunu naj tan̈em me', ha'n̈e ayco yin̈ isc'ul istan̈en isba. Lahanpaxo ebnaj haca' hunu moyan machi n̈ab ik'bil yu, ton̈e chi'ec' ijon yu jak'ek'. Lahanpaxo ebnaj haca' hunu te te' machi satni; ton̈e chitajayoj yeb sunil xe' yin̈ huneln̈e.

Lahan ebnaj haca' yet ch'ah pok'la ha' mar cat yanilo ha' ishujuyal, hac tu' chu jilni k'alem ayco xol ha', hac tu' xin chu isyenilo ebnaj tzettaj tx'ixobal chiswatx'e. Lahanpaxo ebnaj yeb tx'umel xaisheq'uilo isba yul yehobal, ha' istx'ojal ebnaj tu' chicawxento isto yin̈ huneln̈e xol k'ejholo; hune' k'ejholo tu' caw xapalc'oncano isk'ejholohal.
Naj Enoc, naj ishuj mame yinta naj Ad'an, yet payat tiempo, tzotel naj yu yip Comam Dios yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj ti': --¡Abewej! Chihul Comam Dios Jahawil yeb ismilalxa y'angel yintaj.

Chul Comam yila' yin̈ tzet iswatx'e sunil anma, cat yanocanico isya'tajil yiban̈ mac caw tx'oj chiswatx'e yin̈ Comam; macta machi Comam yul sat yeb hanta istx'ojal tzoti' chalico yin̈ Comam, ẍi naj Enoc tu'.

Ha' ebnaj ayco texol tu', ak'omc'ule ebnaj, buchwawompaxo ebnaj. Han̈ech'an yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil ebnaj chaco isnabal. Nime winaj chute isba istzoteli. Caw c'ulch'an chutepaxo istzotel ebnaj tet anma, yaja' cabeb isnabal ebnaj. Hac tu' chute ebnaj yun̈e c'ul ch'ec' yila' ebnaj.
Hex xahan ay wuti'an, tijab yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet halbil yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesucristo,
yet yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --Hayet toxa chul islahobal tz'ayic, ay anma chitzebi yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios, cat iswatx'en istx'ojal choche isc'ul, ẍicano ebnaj.
Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chi'anico pohlebahil texol. Han̈ech'an yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil ebnaj ayco isnabal; machipaxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ yanma ebnaj.
Yaja' hex caw xahan ay wuti'an, lin̈bawe heba yin̈ cuybanile xaheyayto yul heyanma titna tet Comam Dios. Txahlan̈we yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo.
Huneln̈ehojabn̈etic'a heyeco yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios. Hac tu' chu heyechman istz'ayical bay chak' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam.
Tz'ayojab hec'ul yin̈ anma chicapcon yanma yin̈ Comam, ak'we meltzoho isnabal yin̈ Comam.

Yebpaxo anma haca'tan̈e ayxato xol k'a k'a', tzacweltij, hac tu' chu hecolni xol k'a'. Caw yilal istz'ay hec'ul yin̈ anma, yaja' nann̈eojab heyu yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e yuto ay ismay heyetaxto yu. Yahwe huntek'an istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu', haca' chiyu coyahni hunu xilk'ape bacbilico yal tx'ac yin̈.
Ha' Comam Dios chu con̈isc'ubani yun̈e machi bay chon̈lectahi. Aypaxo yip Comam con̈yanico yin̈ isc'ulch'anil bay aya yin̈ tzalahilal, yuto matxa comul yul sat, yu sajxa je yu Comam.

¡Hallaxojab c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios, hune'n̈ech'an Comam Cocolomal! Jalawej ta caw ay yelapno ye Comam, caw ay yip Comam, yeb xin sunil tzet aya, ayco yul isk'ab Comam yet payat, yeb tinan̈, yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Ha' hune' ti' yak' Comam Dios, isyeb Comam Jesucristo tet ebnaj ischejab yin̈ huntek'an tzet yilal yuni yeb toxa chiyuhi. Ischejniti Comam Jesucristo y'angel yak'ni wohtan̈elojan, hanin Juan inti'an, ischejab Comam Jesucristo.
Haninti'an chiwalan isyelal yin̈ tzet wilan, testigo inpaxojan yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yij isba yu Comam Jesucristo.
Sak'al yet mac chiilni yeb mac chiaben huntek'an tzet halbilcano yu Comam yul hune' Hum ti', cat isyijen huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti', yuto toxa chij isba.

Hanin Juan inti'an, chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex huj majan ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo. Chawe ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios; Comam ay tinan̈, Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj, Comam chihuli. Chahwepaxo ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil tet hujeb esp'iritu ayco sata bay tz'on̈an Comam.

Chawepaxo ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo, Comam testigo caw yijem. Comam Jesucristo ti' babel itzitzbican̈ xol camom, aypaxo yip Comam yiban̈ ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam, caw yicanilo Comam comul yu ischiq'uil malto yin̈ te' culus.
Con̈yanico Comam yahawil yeb sacerdotehal yu jocnico yu Comam Dios, ismam Comam Jesucristo. Hallaxojab tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam, yeb xin ta caw ay yip Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'!

Chul Comam Jesucristo tu' xol moyan. Sunil mac chiilni yul Comam, ha' hunpaxo ebnaj potx'ni camo Comam chiilni yuli. Hayet chilni anma ay yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yul Comam chioc yin̈ bisc'ulal, cat yoc ok'o yu bisc'ulal. Ho', hac tu' chuhi.
Yalni Comam: --Haninan babelinan yeb islahobal, haca' tz'ib A yeb Z, ẍi Comam; Comam chisje iswatx'en sunil tzet ye tu', Comam ay tinan̈, yeb ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj, yeb chihuli.

Hanin Juan inti'an, heyuẍta wehan, han-hun-inan chiwabehan isya'tajil yeb hex, yeb xin han-hun-inan chinchahan isnimanbal inc'ulal teyintaj. Hune'n̈e xin chon̈eh yeb Comam Dios yu ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo. Yet hunel, yet ayinan yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Patmos, hune' con̈ob ay xol ha' mar, quinalaxicojan preso yu chiwalic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios yeb tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo.
Yet hunel tu', yin̈ tz'ayic yet Comam, quinocan yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam Esp'iritu Santo, wabenan hune' yul nuk'e wintajan awi yin̈ caw ip haca' yok' ch'en trompeta.

Yalni wetan haca' ti': --Tz'ibn̈eyo huntek'an chawil ti' yul hum, cat hawanito tet hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul ismajul Asia: tet Efeso, Esmirna, P'ergamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia yeb tet Laodicea, ẍi wetan.
Inmeltzon inbahan, int'an̈xitojan yun̈e wilnihan mac chitzotel wetan. Wilnihan hujeb candelero naba oro bay chialaxato cantil.

Xolbal hujeb candelero tu' wilan hune' mac haca' anma jilni. Caw nimajal ishojayo istel xil isk'ap ayicoj, masanta chiayilo yin̈ yoj. Aypaxico hune' iscincho naba oro, nimajal ispak'i sat chiah apno istxam isc'ul.
Wal xil iswi' caw saj jilni haca' no' saj lana yeb haca' jilni ch'en chew. Haxa isbak'sat lahan jilni haca' xaj k'a k'a'.
Wal yoj xin chitzejtzoni, haca' jilni ch'en bronce n̈ijbilxalo istz'ilal, n̈usbilxa yul horno. Wal yul isnuk' xin caw ay yip haca' jaben isbili ha' nimeta ha'.

Yin̈ iswatx'k'ab ayco hujeb tx'umel. Chi-xin-elti hune' ch'en espada caw xixi' iswi' yul isti'. Hune' ch'en espada tu' aypaxati' yeh yichin̈ ch'en. Wal issat lahan jilni haca' yet chitzejla tz'ayic yet caw hajan.
Yet wilnihan huntek'an tu', wayc'ayan yich yoj, haca' camom wucanilojan. Yanayo iswatx'k'ab wiban̈an, yalni wetan: --Mach chachxiwi, haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal.
Haninti'an itzitzinan, quincaman yaja' tinan̈ xin itzitzinan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Haninti'an yahaw inan yin̈ camical yebpaxo yin̈ bay chiapni yanma anma chicami.
Tz'ibn̈ecano huntek'an maxawil ti', yeb huntek'an chawil tinan̈, yeb huntek'an chawila' yet tzujaniloxa.

Ha' hujeb tx'umel hawil yin̈ inwatx'k'aban yeb hujeb candelero naba oro, hac ti' chal yelapnoj: Ha' hujeb tx'umel tu', yechel hujwan̈ inchejaban chiilni hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'aban, walpaxo hujeb candelero naba oro yechel hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'ab tu'an, ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban yul con̈ob Efeso: "Comam ik'n̈e hujeb tx'umel yin̈ iswatx'k'ab, Comam chiec' xol hujeb ch'en candelero naba oro bay chiahto cantil, ha' chalni haca' ti':

Caw wohtajan sunil tzet chewatx'e, caw wohtajan hanta isya'tajil cheyak'le yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios, niman cheyutepaxo hec'ul heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil, mach xin chextzala yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal. Wohtapaxojan tato xaheyilwe ebnaj chisbalico isba inchejabojan, yayc'ay ebnaj yin̈ lek'ti'al, hac tu' yu heyohtan̈eniloj tato lek'ti' ebnaj.
Wohtajan ta caw chexec'ya' yu ayexico yul ink'aban, yaj xin caw ay henimanc'ulal, mach chitibayo heyu.
Yaja' ay hanic' mach chischah inwi'an, yuto matxa ayoco heyanma win̈an haca' yet heyichicoj.

Yuxin nawetij baytet yin̈ quexayc'ayi, meltzoweco henabal yin̈ Comam Dios, cat hewatx'en baytettic'a chewatx'e yet yichebanil. Ta mach xin chintohan quexwila'an yin̈ an̈e cat winilojan hecandelero yul yehobal.
Yaja' xin ay hune'xa hec'ulal yul insatan, yuto cheyah tzettaj chiswatx'e ebnaj nicola'ita, haquinpaxtu'an chinyahan tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj.

Maquex cheyabe hune' ti', caw ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tet ej macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios. Ha' mac chik'oji, chiwak'an sat te' lobehal chiak'ni k'inale islob, te' ay yul yictabal ispara'iso Comam Dios," ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Esmirna: "Comam yichebanil yeb Comam islahobal, Comam cami yaja' itzitzbican̈, ha' chalni haca' ti':

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e. Wohtajan hanta ch'ec'ya' heyanma yeb hemeba'il, yaja' yin̈ caw yeli yul sat Comam Dios caw k'alomex. Caw wohtajan tato tx'oj istzotel ebnaj chal isba Israelal teyin̈, yaja' huntek'an ebnaj tu' yet naj matzwalil ye ebnaj.

Mach chexxiw yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil chul teyiban̈. Ayex ti' chexalaxoco preso yu naj matzwalil yun̈e heyilwelaxi. Yulbal lahon̈eb tz'ayic cheyil isya'tajil, wal xin caw lin̈bawe heba waxan̈ca chexak'lax camoj, hac tu' xin chiwak'an k'inale mach istan̈bal ispaj selelo teyet haca' hunu corona.

¡Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam! Ha' mac chik'oji mach chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma yin̈ hune' iscab camical," ẍi Comam.
Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob P'ergamo: "Comam ik'n̈e ch'en espada cabeb yeh yeb caw xixi' iswi', ha' chalni haca' ti':

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e. Caw wohtajan tato ayexayo bay caw ay yip naj matzwalil, yaja' hune'n̈etic'a ha' heyijen wetan. Machi xin chebej heyanayto yul heyanma win̈an waxan̈ca heyil isya'tajil yet iscam naj Antipas, naj caw yijem yute isba yalnic'o intzoti'an bay caw ay yip naj matzwalil.

Yaja' xin ay hanic' mach chischah inwi'an, yuto ayex ti' cheyaco henabal yin̈ iscuybanil naj Balaam, naj oc ak'oc'ule tet naj rey Balac, yoc naj yak'no ayc'ayo ebnaj Israel. Isc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe chiak'lax xahanbalil tetej tioẍ, yocpaxo ebnaj ixloj.
Yeb xin ayex cheyaco henabal yin̈ iscuybanil ebnaj nicola'ita, huntek'an yahbil wuhan.
Yuxin nawe heba, bejwecano huntek'an tu', ta mach xin chinapnihan yin̈ an̈e, cat wocan howal teyin̈ yu ch'en espada chielti' yul inti'an.

¡Maquex cheyabe huntek'an ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumni yin̈ tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam! Ha' mac chik'oji, chiwak'an man'a islob, hune' ewan yehi, cat wak'nihan hune' ch'en ch'en caw sajhopon̈e tet bay tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe caw ac'to; machi mac ohtan̈e, cachann̈e hune' mac chichahni tu' chiohtan̈eniloj," ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay bey con̈ob Tiatira: "Comam Isc'ahol Comam Dios, Comam lahan isbak'sat haca' xaj k'a k'a', yeb yoj haca' ch'en bronce chitzejlahi, ha' chalni haca' ti':

Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzettaj chewatx'e, wohtajan tato ayco heyanma win̈an. Wohtapaxojan hanta chexmunlahi, yeb caw ay isnimanil hec'ul istecha isya'tajil heyu. Wohtapaxojan tato ec'balto hemunil tinan̈ sata yet heyichicoj.

Yaja' xin ay huntek'an tzet mach chischah inwi'an, yuto hex ti' maẍtic'a nino tzet cheyal yin̈ ix Jezabel, ix isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios. Chak'ni subcha ix ebnaj inchejaban yu iscuybanil, chistubtento ix ebnaj ixloj, yeb isc'uxni no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil.
Caw wak'an tiempo tet ix yun̈e isnani isba ix cat isbejnicano istx'ojal, yaja' mach isbej ix iswinajli.

Yaja' xin chiwak' ec'ojan ya' yanma ix, haca' hunu mac chito hilno sat tx'at yu yabil; cat wanipaxayojan isya'tajil yiban̈ ebnaj chiuten mule yeb ix, ta mach chisna isba ebnaj isbejnicano istx'ojal, haca' istx'ojal chiswatx'e ix,

cat wak'ni camojan yunin ix. Hac tu' xin chu yohtan̈enilo sunil mac ayxaco yul ink'aban tato haninti'an wohtajan tzet chiec' yul heyanma yeb yin̈ henabal. Chiwak'an ispaj selel teyet hatatic'a tzet chewatx'e hununex.

Yaja' wal hun majanexxa ay bey Tiatira tu', hex mach heyaco henabal yin̈ iscuywabal ix tu', yeb xin mach heyabeto hune' chihallax cuybanile yet naj matzwalil ewan yehi, chiwalan tato machi hunuxa chejbanile chiwaltojan teyet,
cachann̈e hune' ti', lin̈bawe heba yin̈ tzet xatzujcha apno heyu masanto yet chinhulan.
Ha' mac chik'oji yeb xin maẍtic'a chisbej iswatx'en tzet chiwalan, chiwak'an yip yoc yahawo yiban̈ ej con̈ob,
haca' yu yak'ni Inmaman wipan, caw ay yip chu yak'ni yahawil. Haca' ismak'lax poho hunu tx'otx' xi yu ch'en vara naba hierro, hac tu' chu yak'lax isya'tajil tet anma man̈c'om,
cat wak'nipaxojan tx'umel sajbes tet.
¡Maquex cheyabe hune' ti', ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul ink'aban!" ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Sardis: "Comam ayco hujeb Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈, yeb ik'bilcan̈ hujeb tx'umel yu, ha' chalni haca' ti': Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e. Caw itzitzex yalbanil, yaja' wal yul insatan camomex.
Tinan̈ xin, iwelo hewayan̈ cat heyocpaxo hewatx'en huntek'an tzet etza lan̈an istan̈iloj. Yuto chiwilan ta ha' tzet chewatx'e mach c'ulo sata Comam Dios.

Naweti huntek'an cuybanile chabil heyu, lahweco heyijeni. Nawe heba, bejwecano hetx'ojal yuto ta mach helano cheyute heba, chinapni lemnahan quexwila'an yet tona nahul ayex, haca' chu yapni hunu naj elk'om yin̈ hunu mac tona nahul aya.
Yaja' ay haywan̈ mac texol bey Sardis tu' mach yetato isba, haca' hunu mac mach istz'iln̈eto xil isk'ap, yuxin huntek'an mac tu' yet ay yec' wintajan, sajhopon̈e xil isk'ap.
Ha' mac chik'oji, chialaxico xil isk'ap caw sajhopon̈e yeb xin mach chinhocan̈an isbi yul hum yet k'inale; cat walnihan sata Inmaman yeb sata ebnaj 'angel ta wetan yehi.
¡Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumni tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul ink'aban!" ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Filadelfia: "Comam machi nino istx'ojal yin̈, yeb isyelaln̈etic'a chala, Comam ik'n̈e islawe naj rey David. Comam hayet chishajni pulta machi hunu mac chu ispebani, hayet chispeban pulta, mach mac chu ishajni, chihalni haca' ti':

Haninti'an wohtajan tzettaj chewatx'e. Ay hune' pulta hajan teyet wuhan, machi hunu mac chu ispebani. Waxan̈ca machi heyip yaja' caw yijem cheyute heba yin̈ intzoti'an. Machi xin chextx'ixwilo win̈an.
Ha' huntek'an ebnaj chiyijen yin̈ tzet chal naj matzwalil, ebnaj chisbalico isba Israelal chinchejtojan ebnaj tec'atan̈ cat yay jahno ebnaj tesataj, cat yohtan̈enilo ebnaj ta xahan ayex wuhan.
Caw heyije inchejbanilan, nimanpaxo hec'ul heyak'ni techaho ilwebal, yu hune' tu' yuxin chexincolan yul isk'ab hune' isya'tajil chihul sat yiban̈k'inal yun̈e yilwelax anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti'.
Toxa chinhullemnahan, machojab chebej hewatx'en tzet chi-tic'a-hewatx'e, haxinwal machi hunu mac chiinilo ispaj selel chiak'lax teyet.

Ha' mac chik'oji, chiwacojan haca' yoyal yatut Inmaman, machi xin bak'in chiilaxiloj; chintz'ibn̈enicojan isbi Inmaman yin̈ yeb isbi iscon̈ob Inmaman, hune' ac' Jerusal'en chitit yul satcan̈ bay ay inDiosalan, cat intz'ibn̈enicojan inbihan ac' yin̈.
¡Mac chiaben huntek'an ti' yak'ab yanma istxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tet macta ayxaco yul ink'aban!" ẍi Comam.

Yalnipaxo Comam: --Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban bey con̈ob Laodicea: "Comam ist'in̈anil chala, Comam testigo caw yijem yeb chalni isyelal, Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj ye tu' yeb Comam Dios, ha' chalni haca' ti':
Wohtajan tzet chewatx'e, wohtajan ta lahanex haca' hunu tzet chiuc'laxi mach chewoj, mach xin cajopaxoj, ayxic'a chew hex maca caj hex.
Yaja' yu namanex, mach chewojex mach cajohexpaxoj, yuxin chexinpuch'iltijan yul inti'an.
Hex ti' cheyala ta caw k'alomex, caw c'ul heyin̈bal yeb caw sunil ay yul hek'ab heyalni. Mach xin heyohtajoj tato caw c'anch'anex yeb caw ya'ta heyehi. Caw meba' hex, mach chu heyilni, t'ilanexpaxoj.

Wal xin chiwalan teyet lok'we heoro wetan, ch'en caw c'ul watx'ebilxalo xol k'a k'a'. Hac tu' xin chexoc k'alomal yin̈ caw isyelal, cat xin helok'ni xil hek'ap caw sajhopon̈e wetan, cat heyanico teyin̈ yun̈e mach chiel hetx'ixobal yuto t'ilanex. Chelok'nipaxo yan̈al isbak' hesat wetan yun̈e chu heyilni.
Haninti'an chincachan yeb chiwak'an isya'tajil yiban̈ mac xahan ay wuhan. Wal xin aweco heyanma yin̈ Comam, nawe heba, bejwecano istx'ojal.
Haninti'an lin̈an inicojan sat pulta cat wawictojan, ha' mac chiaben yul innuk'an cat ishajni yatut wetan, chinoctojan isc'atan̈ cat inwa'an yebi.
Ha' mac chik'oji isyijeni chiwak'an hune' yehobal bay tz'on̈aninan, haca' yu ink'ojihan, woc tz'on̈nojan isc'atan̈ Inmaman bay ay istz'on̈obal.
¡Maquex cheyabe hune' ti', ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej macta ayxaco yul ink'aban!" ẍi Comam.

Lahwi tu', wilnihan hune' pulta hajan yul satcan̈, ha' xin hune' yul nuk'e wabehan yet babelal, hune' haca' yok' ch'en trompeta halni wetan: --Ahan̈ti bey ti' cat inyenihan huntek'an chiyub yintajilo ti', ẍi wetan.
Yin̈n̈ena tu' wocan yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu, wilnihan hune' tz'on̈obal yul satcan̈, yul hune' tz'on̈obal tu' tz'on̈an hune' mac.
Comam tz'on̈an tu', lahan yilni istzejla haca' ch'en jaspe yeb haca' jilni ch'en cornalina. Yin̈ ishoyanil istz'on̈obal Comam tu' aycan̈ hune' no' ch'er chitzejla haca' ch'en esmeralda.

Wilnipaxojan veinticuatro tz'on̈obal yin̈la ishoyanil istz'on̈obal Comam, yul huntek'an tz'on̈obal tu' tz'on̈anayo veinticuatro ebnaj anciano, saj xil isk'ap ayco yeb ayahto corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' ebnaj.
Yul istz'on̈obal Comam tu' chielti jepla yoj c'uh, caw ay yip isn̈irlahi. Haxa sata tz'on̈obal tu' caw chiah xaj k'a' yin̈ hujeb antorcha, ha' ton hujeb Yesp'iritu Comam Dios.

Sata tz'on̈obal tu' aypaxo hune' haca' ha' mar jilni, chik'axpon comujlubal yul haca' ch'en vidrio. Haxa yictabal bay ay tz'on̈obal tu' yeb yin̈ ishoyanil ay can̈wan̈ ebnaj querub'in. Caw tx'i'alcano isbak'sat ebnaj, ay isbak'sat ayco sataj, aypaxo isbak'sat ebnaj yintaj.

Naj babel querub'in lahan jilni naj haca' no' balam, naj iscab haca' no' toro, naj yox haca' sat anma, hac tu' jilni sat naj, haxa naj iscan̈ haca' no' aguila leyanilto xic' chiec' satcan̈, hac tu' jilni naj.

Ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in tu' wajata xic' hunun ebnaj, nohnaco bak'sate yalan̈ yeb yiban̈ isxic' ebnaj. Tz'ayical yeb ak'balil maẍtic'a chisbej ebnaj yalni haca' ti': Mach istx'ojal Comam Dios Jahawil, mach istx'ojal, mach istx'ojal Comam; Comam caw ayco yip, Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj, yeb ay tinan̈, yeb chihuli, ẍi ebnaj.
Chalni ebnaj querub'in tu' ta caw ay ismay, yeb ta caw ay yelapno Comam, Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal, yeb xin chak'ni ebnaj yuch'andiosal tet Comam ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Hunta el yet chalni ebnaj haca' tu' chiay jahno ebnaj veinticuatro anciano sata Comam, chanayo ebnaj iscorona sata Comam, chalni ebnaj:

Mam Dios Jahawil, hatzan yallaxi ta caw ay hamay, yeb ta caw ay yelapno hawehi, yeb ta caw ay hawip, yuto hach watx'en̈e sunil tzet ye tu', yuto hac tu' el yin̈ hac'ul yuxin aya; hach xin watx'en̈ecanoj, ẍi ebnaj.
Wilnihan Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal tu', ayco hune' te' hum yul isk'ab, ayayo tz'ib yul te' yeb yinta te'. Caw chulbilayo te', ayico hujeb sello yin̈ te'.
Wilnihan hune' naj 'angel caw aycano yip, isk'amben naj yin̈ caw ip: --¿Mactaxca ay yelapno yoc yinilo issellohal te' hum ti', cat isholnito te'? ẍi naj.
Yaja' nitam satcan̈ yeb yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb yalan̈ tx'o tx'otx' ilcha hunu mac chu isholnito te', nitam yilni tzet ayayo yul te'.
Caw xin chinok'an yuto mach ilcha mac ay yelapno yoc ishajni te', nitam yilni tzet chal te'.

Yalni hune' naj anciano wetan: --Mach chach'ok'i, ay hune' mac xak'oji, Balam isbi, titna yin̈ naj Jud'a, titnapaxo yin̈ naj rey David. Ha' naj chu istzilnilo hujeb sello tu', cat isholnito te', ẍi naj wetan.

Wilnihan hune' mac haca' me' lin̈ancan̈ yictabal tz'on̈obal, yeb yictabal ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in, yeb xolbal ebnaj anciano. Hune' mac tu' haca'tan̈e xaalaxico yin̈ xahanbalil, hujeb yuc'a' yeb hujeb isbak'sat, ha' ton hujwan̈ Yesp'iritu Comam Dios alaxti yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Comam Me' isbi, ha' inilo te' hum ayco yul iswatx'k'ab Comam tz'on̈anayo yul istz'on̈obal.

Hayet yinilo Comam te', yay jahno ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in yeb ebnaj veinticuatro anciano sata Comam Me' isbi tu'. Sunil ebnaj ik'bil yarpa, yeb isvaso naba oro nohna yu pom. Ha' pom tu' yechel istxah anma yetxa Comam yehi.

Yanico ebnaj hune' ac' bit, chalni haca' ti': Mamin, hachn̈ech'an chu hachahni hune' te' hum ti', cat hatzilnilo issellohal te', yuto hach ti' cachoc xahanbalil, ismalto hachiq'uil, yu halok'ni anma yeto Comam Dios, tzijxan̈e anmahil, nananta yabxubal, niẍte con̈ob yeb nimeta con̈ob.
Hawanico anma tu' reyalil yeb sacerdotehal yu isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios, cat yoc yahawilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi ebnaj.
Lahwi tu', wilnihan hayebtam mill'on ebnaj 'angel hoyanico yin̈ istz'on̈obal Comam yeb yin̈ ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in yeb ebnaj anciano. Wabenan yul isnuk' ebnaj 'angel tu',

chalni ebnaj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti': Comam Me' isbi, Comam oc xahanbalil, yet ay yallax yin̈ ta Yahawil, ta ay isk'alomal, ta ay ishelanil, ta ay yip, ta ay yelapnoj, ta ay ismay yeb yallax tzoti' c'ul yin̈, ẍi ebnaj.

Wabenpaxojan yalni tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios yul satcan̈ yeb tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb yalan̈ tx'o tx'otx', yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar, chalni haca' ti': Hallaxojab tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam tz'on̈anayo yul istz'on̈obal, yeb yin̈ Comam Me' isbi. Hallaxojabi ta caw ay yelapnoj, ta caw ay ismay, ta caw ay yip yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ẍi.
Yalnipaxo ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in: --Hacojab tu', ẍi ebnaj. Haxa ebnaj veinticuatro anciano ay jahno ebnaj, yalni ebnaj tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam.
Lahwi tu', wilnihan istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil hune' babel sello, wabenan yalni naj babel querub'in yin̈ caw ip haca' isbili c'uh, yalni naj: --¡Cata! ẍi naj.
Hayet inhacxitojan wilnihan hune' no' cheh sajin̈ ayato hune' naj yiban̈ no', ik'bil xin hune' te' lit' yu naj, yak'lax hune' corona tet naj. Isto naj yin̈ howal, chilann̈etic'a xin isk'oji naj.
Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iscab sello, wabenan yalni naj iscab querub'in: --¡Cata! ẍi naj.
Wilnipaxojan hune' no' cheh cajin̈, yak'lax yip naj ayahto yiban̈ no' yinilo ak'anc'ulal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yun̈e yoc anma ispotx'leno isba; yak'lax hune' niman espada tet naj.

Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil isyox sello, wabenan yalni naj yox querub'in haca' ti': --¡Cata! ẍi naj. Wilnihan hune' no' cheh k'ejin̈, ha' naj ayahto yiban̈ no' ik'bil hune' ch'en libra malbal yu naj.
Xol ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in tu' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni: --Cabn̈e libra trigo maca wajeb libra cebada chik' naj munlawom yin̈ tz'ayic. Mach xin cheyetato te' aceite yeb te' vino, ẍi.
Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iscan̈ sello, wabenan yalni naj iscan̈ querub'in: --¡Cata! ẍi naj.

Wilnipaxojan hune' no' cheh k'anin̈, ha' xin naj ayahto yiban̈ no', camical isbi naj, yinta naj xin tzujan naj yahawil bay ay camom. Yak'lax yip ebnaj istan̈tzenilo hune' iscan̈ majan anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu ej howal, wahil, yebej yabil yebpaxo yu ej no' howla nok' ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti'.

Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil isho' sello, wilnihan hune' meẍa bay chak'lax xahanbal, yalan̈ hune' meẍa tu' wilan yanma ebnaj potx'bil camo yu yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios, yeb yu yak' isba ebnaj testigohal yin̈.

Chalni ebnaj yin̈ caw ip: --Mam Jahawil, Mam mach istx'ojal ayco tawin̈, wal xin isyelaln̈etic'a chawala. ¿Bak'in chawil yin̈ tzet ch'elico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal cat hawak'ni ispaj tet mac con̈potx'nicamojan̈? ẍi.

Yak'lax huntek'an xil isk'ap ebnaj caw saj jilni, yallax tet ebnaj ta chi-to-xew ebnaj hanic'oxa tiempo masanto chitz'ajna isbisil ebnaj juẍta yilal yak'lax camoj, yu chak' cheja' isba tet Comam Cristo.
Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iswaj sello, yec' hune' nimam chixcab, isk'ejholilo tz'ayic haca' hunu k'ap k'ap k'ej, iscajpon̈ilo ixahaw haca' chic'.
Yayc'ayejti tx'umel satcan̈ haca' yay hona sat te' higuera yu hunu niman jak'ek' yet yaxto te'.
Isc'aycan̈ satcan̈, haca' chu ischullaxayo hunu xaj hum. Sunil witz yebej tx'o tx'otx' ay xol ha' mar isheq'uilo isba yul yehobal.

Sunil ebnaj rey yul yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb ebnaj winaj caw ay yelapnoj, yeb ebnaj k'alom, yeb ebnaj yahawil soldado, yeb ebnaj caw aycano yip, yeb ebnaj chejab, yeb ebnaj yet isba ischuquil, yebato isba ebnaj yulaj n̈ach'en yeb yichla ch'en ch'en ay iswi'la witz.
Chalni ebnaj tet ej witz yeb tet ch'en nimeta ch'en haca' ti': --¡Titan̈we wuyna jiban̈an̈, cat con̈heyebantojan̈ yin̈ sat Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal, yeb tet ishowal Comam oc xahanbalil,
yuto mahul istz'ayical bay chihul isya'tajil yu Comam Dios, mach xin mac chik'oji istecha hune' isya'tajil ti' yu! ẍi ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' xin, wilnihan can̈wan̈ ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yin̈la iscan̈ebal istxiquin tx'o tx'otx'. Chispahnito ebnaj jak'ek' yun̈e mach ch'ec' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' yeb yiban̈ ha' mar, yeb yiban̈ ej te' k'ebtaj.

Wilnihan yahilo hune'xa naj 'angel bay chiahilo tz'ayic, ik'bil xin issello Comam Dios yu naj, Comam itzitzn̈etic'a. Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet ebnaj can̈wan̈ ak'lax yip yetanto tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar, yebej te' k'ebtaj, yalni naj haca' ti':
¡Maẍton̈e cheyetato tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar, yebej te' k'ebtaj masanto chioc yechel Comam Dios yin̈ ispalan̈ ebnaj ischejab coDiosal! ẍi naj.
Wabenan ta xol ebnaj cablahon̈eb majan Israel ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil ebnaj alaxico yechel.
Yin̈ ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Jud'a cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj alaxico yechel, yeb cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Rub'en, yeb cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Gad.
Cablahon̈eb milpaxo ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Aser, cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Neftal'i, cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Manas'es.
Cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Sime'on, cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Lev'i, cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Isacar.
Cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Zabul'on, cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Jos'e, yeb xin cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Benjam'in.

Lahwi tu', wilnihan caw hantan̈e anma ayco sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios, yeb sata Comam oc xahanbalil. Xol anma tu' ay anma nananta con̈obal, nananta yichmam, nananta yabxubal, caw xin hantan̈ecano anma tu', machi mac chik'oji isbisni, caw saj xil isk'ap anma aycoj, ik'bil xin xaj te' ch'ib yu.
Chalni anma tu' yin̈ caw yip: ¡Comam Dios tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal yeb Comam oc xahanbalil, ha' ak'ni cocolbanil! ẍi anma.

Sunil ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yin̈ ishoyanil bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ ebnaj anciano yeb yin̈ ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in, ay jahno ebnaj, yay xulno sat tx'otx' sata Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal; yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam.

Yalni ebnaj haca' ti': --¡Hacojab tu'! Ha'n̈ehojab yin̈ Comam Dios challax tzoti' c'ul, yeb ta caw ay ismay, yeb ta caw ay yitz'atil iswi'. Ha'n̈e'ojab tet Comam Dios chiak'lax yuch'andiosal, han̈e Comam caw ay yelapnoj yeb caw ay yip, yeb caw ay ishelanil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. ¡Hacojab tu'! ẍi anma.
Isk'amben hune' naj anciano wetan: --¿Mac anmahil huntek'an saj xil isk'ap ti' yeb bay titnacoj? ẍi naj wetan.

Intak'wihan tet naj: --Mamin, hach hawohtaj, walinan mach wohtajojan, quinchiyan. Yalni naj wetan: --Ha' anma chawil ti' ispeto xol hune' niman isya'tajil, xatx'ahlaxilo ismul yu ischiq'uil Comam oc xahanbalil, haca' ta xaistx'ah anma xil isk'ap, caw xin saj elcanicoj.
Yuxin ayco anma tu' sata Comam ayco yul istz'on̈obal, chi-xin-munla yul yatut Comam tz'ayical ak'balil. Ha' xin Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal chitan̈en anma tu' yuto ayco Comam Dios yetbiho anma.
Matxa xin chak'le anma wahil yeb tajinti'al, yeb matxa chak'le anma k'a' nitam chitz'ato yu yoj tz'ayic.

Yuto Comam oc xahanbalil ayco yictabal bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios, ha' Comam chitan̈eni, haca' chu istan̈elax no' me' cat yilaxto no' uc'u' ha', hac tu' xin chu yinito Comam anma tu' yin̈ hune' ha ha' chiak'ni k'inale. Haxa Comam tu' chisunilo yal sat anma, ẍi naj.
Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil ishuj sello ayco yin̈ te' hum tu', aymi yictajo hora matxa tzet bili yul satcan̈.
Lahwi tu' wilnihan hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ sata Comam Dios, yak'lax hujeb ch'en trompeta tet ebnaj.

Lahwi tu' yul hune'xa naj 'angel ik'bil hune' ch'en lesen naba oro yu naj, yoc lin̈no naj sata meẍa ayco sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios, caw xin tx'i'al pom ak'lax tet naj. Yoc naj isn̈usno yiban̈ meẍa naba oro, yalten naj tet Comam Dios yeb istxah anma yetxa Comam yehi.
Chi-xin-ah topton isn̈ubal pom yul isk'ab naj, yapni isxuk'al sam sata Comam Dios yeb istxah anma yetxa Comam.
Lahwi tu', isnotzen naj 'angel ch'en lesen yu tzak'ak' ayato yiban̈ meẍa, isk'ojnayti naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; yin̈n̈ena tu' xin isbili c'uh, isn̈irlahi isjepla c'uh yec'paxo chixcab.
Iswatx'en isba ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel yun̈e yok'tzen ebnaj istrompeta.

Hayet yok'tzen naj babel 'angel istrompeta, yalaxti ch'en sajbat yeb k'a k'a' soman ye yeb chic' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx', istz'ato hune' isyox majan tx'o tx'otx' yeb hune' isyox majan te te', istz'apaxcanto sunilej te' telaj caw yax.
Haxa yet yok'tzen naj iscab 'angel istrompeta, isk'ojlaxayto hune' haca' witz ayco k'a' yin̈ xol ha' mar; hac tu' xin hune' yox majan ha' mar tu' meltzoco chic'al.
Hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo no nok' ay xol ha' mar tu' camiloj. Hanic'xan̈epaxo mach yictajo te' barco etaxtoj.

Haxa yet yok'tzen naj yox 'angel istrompeta, yayc'ayti hune' niman tx'umel yul satcan̈, ayco k'a' yin̈ haca' hunu antorcha. Hune' tx'umel tu', hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ha ha' bay ayc'ayi yebpaxo yiban̈ isnuk' ha ha'.
Hune' tx'umel tu' C'ah isbi, hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ha' c'ahbilo yu, caw xin hantan̈e anma camilo yu ha' yuto c'ahbilo ha'.

Haxa yet yok'tzen naj iscan̈ 'angel istrompeta, caw etza hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ismujlubal tz'ayic tan̈iloj yebpaxo xin ixahaw yebej tx'umel. Hac tu' xin hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo tz'ayical mujli tz'ayic, yebpaxo xin etza yictaxan̈e ak'balil mujli ixahaw yebej tx'umel.

Lahwi tu' wilnihan yec' hune' naj 'angel haca' no' t'iw satcan̈, wabenan yel yaw yin̈ caw ip: --¡C'anch'an anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal yuto oxebto isya'tajil chihuli yet chiyok'tzen ebnaj oxwan̈ 'angel istrompeta! ẍi.
Haxa yet yok'tzen naj isho' 'angel istrompeta, wilnihan yayc'ayti hune' tx'umel satcan̈, yak'lax islahwehal hune' niman xab tet tx'umel tu'.
Ishajni hune' tx'umel tu' isti' hune' niman xab tu', yichico yahti topton n̈ub yeb jak'ek' yul, haca' yelti n̈ub yul hunu horno, isk'ejholilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.
Xol n̈ub tu' xin ahilo huntek'an no nok' haca' no' k'ul, ispujnato no' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yak'lax yip no' ischiwa yin̈ anma; haca' istzawal no' c'olotx, hac tu' istzawal no'.
Yallax tet no' ta mach chetato no' te' telaj ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yebej yaxla tz'unub, yebej te te'. Cachann̈e anma machi yechel Comam Dios yin̈ ispalan̈, ha' cheta no'.
Yaja' hallax tet no' ta mach mak'bil ispotx'ni no' anma, to ton̈e ch'ak'lax ec'oya' yanma anma yulbal howeb ixahaw; ha' xin isya'il chichiwa no' lahan isya'il haca' bay chitzahwa no' c'olotx.
Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' chissay anma yin̈ tzet chu iscami, yaja' matxa naj camical, yeb waxan̈ca caw choche anma chicami yaja' matxatic'a chicami.
Huntek'an no' k'ul tu', lahan jilni no' haca' no' cheh istoxa yin̈ howal, ayahto hunun corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' no', lahan xin jilni sat no' yeb anma.
Haxa xil iswi' no' lahan jilni haca' xil iswi' ebix ix, haxa yeh no' lahan haca' yeh no' balam.
Ayco huntek'an ch'en ch'en naba hierro yet howal yin̈ istxam isc'ul no'. Haca' xin isn̈irn̈on tx'i'al te' caret ik'bil yu no' cheh yet chito no' yin̈ howal, hac tu' isbili isxic' no'.
Wal isn̈e no' lahan jilni haca' isn̈e no' c'olotx, nohnaco istzahwal no' yin̈. Ha' xin isn̈e no' tu' ay yip yak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma yulbal howeb ixahaw.
Ha' naj ayco yahawilo yin̈ hune' niman xab tu', ha' naj yahawilpaxo yin̈ huntek'an no nok' tu'. Abad'on isbi naj yin̈ abxubal hebreo, haxa yin̈ abxubal griego Apoli'on isbi naj.
Ec'to hune' babel isya'tajil, yaja' ayto cabebxa.
Hayet yok'tzen naj iswaj 'angel istrompeta, wabenan yahwi xolbal can̈eb yuc'a' hune' meẍa naba oro ayco sata Comam Dios.
Yalni hune' yul nuk'e tet naj iswaj 'angel yok'tze istrompeta tu': --As puhilo ebnaj can̈wan̈ 'angel c'alan bey isti' ha' Eufrates, ẍi.

Ispuhlaxilo ebnaj can̈wan̈ 'angel tu' yun̈e istan̈tzenilo ebnaj hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. T'in̈anxatic'a ye ebnaj iswatx'en hune' tu' yin̈ hune' hora tu', yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu', yin̈ hune' ixahaw tu', yeb yin̈ hune' habilal tu'.
Wabenan yallaxi tato cab cien mill'on isbisil ebnaj ak'om howal ayahto yiban̈ cheh.

Wilnihan no' cheh tu'. Ha' xin ebnaj ayahto yiban̈ no' ayco huntek'an ch'en xilk'ape yet howal yin̈ istxam isc'ul ebnaj. Ha' ch'en tu' caj jilni ch'en haca' k'a k'a', yaxmutz'mun̈e jilnipaxo ch'en haca' ch'en azufre, k'an jilnipaxo ch'en haca' ch'en bronce. Wal no' cheh tu', lahan jilni iswi' no' haca' iswi' no' balam, chi-xin-elti k'a k'a' yeb n̈ub yeb azufre yul isti' no'.
Caw xin hune' yox majan anma camilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu oxeb isya'tajil ti', ha' ton k'a k'a', yeb n̈ub, yeb azufre chielti yul isti' no' cheh.
Yuto yin̈ isti' no' yeb yin̈ isn̈e no' ak'bil yip, yuto isn̈e no' ay iswi' haca' iswi' laba, ha' xin isn̈e no' chiak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma.

Yaja' huntek'an anma mach cam yu huntek'an isya'tajil tu', maẍtic'a isbejcano istx'ojal, yeb maẍtic'a xin isbej yinayo isba tet ischejab naj matzwalil, yeb tetej tioẍ watx'ebil yin̈ ch'en oro, ch'en plata, ch'en bronce, yeb yin̈ej ch'en ch'en yeb yin̈ te te'. Huntek'an tioẍ tu' mach chu yilni, mach chabe, yeb mach chu yeq'ui.
Maẍtic'a xin isbejpaxcano anma ispotx'wahi, iscunli, yixli yeb iswinajli, yeb xin yelk'awi.

Lahwi tu', wilnihan hune' naj 'angel caw ay yip, tit yul satcan̈ xol moyan, aycan̈ xin hune' no' ch'er yiban̈ iswi' naj. Caw xin chitzejla sat naj haca' istzejla tz'ayic, haxa yoj naj xin haca' xaj k'a k'a' chiah joplahi, hac tu' jilni.
Ay xin hune' te' nich'an hum ik'bil yu naj, leyanto te'; yanayo naj hune' yoj yin̈ iswatx'k'ab yiban̈ ha' mar, haxa hunxa yoj naj yin̈ ismeck'ab yayo yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx'.
Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip haca' yel yaw no' balam. Hayet yawi naj isn̈irla hujeb c'uh, yalni tzoti'.

Hayet lahwi istzotel hujeb c'uh tu', wocan intz'ibn̈enojan walnihan. Yaja' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈ halni haca' ti': --Ton̈e chac'ubacano huntek'an maxawabe ti', mach chatz'ibn̈ecanoj, ẍi wetan.
Naj 'angel ayayo yoj yiban̈ ha' mar yeb yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' wiltu'an, yican̈ naj iswatx'k'ab satcan̈,

yanico naj Comam testigohal, Comam itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tz'ayic, Comam watx'en̈e satcan̈ yeb sunil tzet ay satcan̈, Comam watx'en̈e tx'o tx'otx' yeb sunil tzet ay sat tx'otx', Comam watx'en̈e ha' mar yeb sunil tzet ay xol ha', yalni naj haca' ti': --Tinan̈ matxa chiec' tiempo,
yuto hayet ch'ok'tzeno naj ishuj 'angel istrompeta cat yijnocano isba tzet ewan yehi, huntek'an nabiltic'a yu Comam Dios, haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam tet ebnaj ischejab yet payat, ẍi naj.
Hune' yul nuk'e wabetic'ahan yul satcan̈, tzotelpaxayti wetan, yalni haca' ti': --As ilo hune' nich'an hum leyanayo yul isk'ab naj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ ha' mar yeb yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx', ẍi wetan.

Intohan ink'annolojan hune' nich'an hum tu' tet naj, istak'wi naj wetan: --Ay te' lah, loto te', hayet chalono te' caw chi' chieloco yul hati' yu te', haca' ischi'al no' cab, wal yul hac'ul xin caw c'ah chielicoj, ẍi naj wetan.
Inchahnilojan te' tet naj 'angel tu', inlonitojan te', caw xin chi' elico yul inti'an yu te', wal yul inc'ulan xin caw c'ah elicoj yet lahwi inlonihan te'.
Lahwi tu' yallaxpaxo wetan: --Caw yilal hawalni hunelxa yin̈ tzet chute yalni Comam Dios yin̈ tx'i'alej niẍte con̈ob yeb nimeta con̈ob, yeb tx'i'al abxubal yeb yin̈ ebnaj rey, ẍi wetan.

Lahwi tu' yak'lax hune' malbal wetan, haca' te' ah. Yallax wetan haca' ti': --Ahan̈wanoj cat hawoc hamalen yatut Comam Dios yebpaxo meẍa yet xahanbal, cat habisni hanta mac ayicto yinoyo isba tet Comam.
Yaja' wal yamak'il yeb yin̈la ishoyanil mach chamale yuto chiak'lax tet ebnaj nan con̈obal, cat isxan̈nayo ebnaj iscon̈ob Comam Dios yulbal cuarenta y dos ixahaw.
Chiwatijan cawan̈ inchejaban chak' isba yalnilo intzoti'an yulbal mil doscientos sesenta tz'ayic. Ayco huntek'an xilk'ape yet bisc'ulal yin̈ ebnaj, ẍi wetan.
Yechel ebnaj cawan̈ ti' ye te' cabeb yoj olivo yeb ch'en cabeb candelero bay chiahto cantil ayco sata Comam Dios, Comam yahaw tx'o tx'otx'.

Ta ay mac choche chioc etloco yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ ti' chielti k'a' yul isti' ebnaj, cat isn̈usnicanto ebnaj mac chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ ebnaj. Hac tu' chu iscamcanilo macta chiwatx'en istx'ojal yin̈ ebnaj.

Aypaxo yip ebnaj ismajchen satcan̈ yun̈e matxa chak' ha' n̈ab yulbal tz'ayic bay chal ebnaj Istzoti' Comam. Aypaxo yip ebnaj yanico ha ha' chic'al, yebpaxo xin ay yip ebnaj yak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yu ej isya'tajil, hantatic'a el choche isc'ul ebnaj.

Hayet chilahwi yalnic'o ebnaj cawan̈ tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios, ay hune' naj Nok' isbi chiahilo yul hune' niman xab; chaco naj howal yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' cat isk'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj, cat ispotx'lax ebnaj yu naj Nok' isbi tu'. Yanico naj Nok' isbi howal yin̈ ebnaj, chiahilo yul hune' niman xab. Chik'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu'

Chicancano pac'no isnimanil ebnaj yul iscallehal hune' niman con̈ob bay alaxcan̈ Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus, Comam Yahawil ebnaj. Hune' con̈ob tu' challax Sodoma yeb Egipto yin̈, ha' chalniloj ta tx'oj tzet chiswatx'e.
Sunil anma nananta con̈obal, nananta anmahil, nananta yabxubal, nananta nime con̈obal chiilni isnimanil ebnaj yulbal yicta iscan̈ tz'ayic; mach chisje anma ta chimujlax ebnaj.

Yuxin sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw oc yin̈ tzalahilal yu iscamical ebnaj. Yak'ni anma sabehal tet hunun yu tzalahilal, yuto ebnaj cawan̈ ischejab Comam tu' caw yak' ebnaj ec'oya' yanma anma.
Lahwin̈e yicta iscan̈ tz'ayic tu', yulcan̈ isc'ul ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yu Comam Dios, yahwano ebnaj. Ha' xin sunil anma ilni hune' tu' caw occano xiwquilal yin̈.

Yaben ebnaj cawan̈ tu' hune' yul nuk'e awi yin̈ caw ip yul satcan̈, yalni haca' ti': --Ahan̈weti bey ti', ẍi tet ebnaj. Isto ebnaj satcan̈ xol hune' moyan, sunil ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ ebnaj ilni hune' tu'.

Yin̈ena tu' yec' hune' niman chixcab istan̈ilo hune' islahon̈eb majan te' n̈a yul hune' niman con̈ob tu', hujeb mil anma cam yu hune' chixcab tu'. Wal anma mach cami caw xiwi, yanico ismay Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈.
Hac tu' yu yec'to iscab isya'tajil, tinan̈ xin yichixapaxico hune' isyox isya'tajil.

Hayet yok'tzen naj ishuj 'angel istrompeta yabelax hune' yul nuk'e awi yin̈ caw ip yul satcan̈, yalni: Sunil tzet ay yip yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chioccano yul isk'ab Comam Dios Jahawil yeb yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo, cat yoccano yahawil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo, ẍi.
Wal ebnaj veinticuatro anciano tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal sata Comam Dios ay jahno ebnaj, yay xulno ebnaj, yanico ebnaj ismay Comam.

Yalni ebnaj: Mam Jahawil, hach ti' coDiosalan̈, caw aycano hawip. Ayach tinan̈, ayach yet yalan̈tocanoj yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tawet yuto chachoc hay'ebaloj ta caw aycano hawip, yeb xin cachichico hawoc yahawil.

Caw tit ishowal ej con̈ob tawin̈, yaja' maapni istiempohal hawanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ anma. Maapnipaxo istiempohal hawilni yin̈ tzet chielico ej camom, cat hawak'ni ispaj selel tet ebnaj hachejab yet payat, ebnaj chihalnic'o Hatzoti'. Chawak'nipaxo ispaj selel tet sunil mac hawetxa yehi yeb macta chixiw tawet, macta ay yelapnoj, yeb macta mach yelapnoj, cat hatan̈tzencanilo macta chietanto anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx', ẍi ebnaj.

Lahwi tu', ishajni isba yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈, chi-xin-jilicto hune' caẍa yet istrato Comam ayicto yul yatut tu'. Yichico isjepla c'uh, isk'an̈i satcan̈, isn̈irlapaxoj, yec' hune' chixcab, yak'nipaxo hune' niman sajbat.

Lahwi tu' xin, isyeni isba hune' niman yechel yul satcan̈. Wilnihan hune' ix ix hoyanico isk'ak'al tz'ayic yin̈ haca' xilk'ape, ayayo ixahaw yalan̈ yoj ix, ayco xin cablahon̈eb tx'umel iscoronaho ix yin̈ iswi'.
Hune' ix tu' ayxa tzet ye ix, caw xin chiawi ix yu isya'il yuto iswatx'ixa isc'ul ix.
Isyenipaxocan̈ isba hune'xa yechel yul satcan̈, wilnihan hune' mac haca' no' nimeta drag'on cajin̈, hujeb iswi' yeb xin lahon̈eb yuc'a', ayahto xin corona yin̈ hunun iswi' no'.

Hune' xin isyox majan tx'umel isn̈ic'ti no' yu isn̈e, isk'ojnayti no' sat tx'o tx'otx' ti'. Islin̈bacan̈ isba no' sata ix iswatx'ixa isc'ul tu' yun̈e isc'uxnayto no' nich'an unin tu' yet chipitzc'ahi.

Lahwi tu' ispitzc'a nich'an iswinaj unin ix. Ha' naj tu' xin chioc yahawilo sunilej con̈ob, ayco xin hune' isvara naj naba hierro yul isk'ab, yaj ilaxilo nich'an yunin ix tu', yilaxto tet Comam Dios bay ay istz'on̈obal.
Wal ix tu' elcan̈ ix, isto ix bey tx'otx' desierto. Ha' bey tu' c'ulxa ye hune' yehobal ix yu Comam, yak'lax tzet chislo ix yulbal mil doscientos sesenta tz'ayic.
Lahwi tu' yoc hune' niman howal yul satcan̈. Naj 'angel Miguel yeb ebnaj y'angel tzujan yintaj, yak'le ebnaj howal yeb no' drag'on yeb y'angel no'.
Yaja' xin mach k'oji no' drag'on tu' yeb y'angel, matxa xin hamanil tet no' yeb y'angel yul satcan̈.

Hac tu' xin yu yilaxilti no' drag'on tu' yul satcan̈. Ha' ton hune' mac tu' yuteco isba labahil yet payat, chihallax diablohal yeb Satan'as, ha' xin ch'ak'ni subchaho anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. K'ojlaxayti no' drag'on tu' yeb y'angel sat tx'o tx'otx'.

Lahwi tu', wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ yin̈ caw ip, yalni haca' ti': Wal tinan̈ mahul colbanile, chisyelo Comam Dios yip cat yoc yahawil, cat isyelaxpaxilo yip Comam Cristo, yuto xak'ojlaxayto naj ak'omc'ule yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb yin̈ ebix janab, naj aytic'aco ak'oc'ule hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal tet Comam Dios.
Xak'oji ebnaj juẍta yin̈ naj yu ischiq'uil Comam oc xahanbalil, yeb yu yak' isba ebnaj yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam. Mach xiw ebnaj yanico isba yul isk'ab camical, to caw ishin isba ebnaj iscami.
