¡Yuxin tzalahojab satcan̈ yeb mac ay yul satcan̈! Yaja' c'anch'anex hex ayex sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar, yuto sunil ishowal naj matzwalil maayapno texol, yuto yohta naj ta hanic'xan̈e tiempo ayc'o naj, ẍiaytij.
Hayet yilni no' drag'on tu' ta k'ojlaxayti no' sat tx'otx', yoc no' istzumbenoc'o ix pitzc'a nich'an iswinaj unin tu'.

Yaja' xin ak'lax cabeb isxic' ix caw nimej haca' xic' no' t'iw, yah ix satcan̈, isto ix bey tx'otx' desierto bay ay hune' yehobal ix yu Comam, yun̈e nahat chielcano ix tet no' drag'on tu'. Ha' tu' xin ak'lax tzet chislo ix yulbal yicta iscan̈ habil.
Wal no' drag'on tu' yalti no' hune' niman ha' yul isti' yun̈e yijlaxto ix yu ha' niman ha' tu'.
Yaja' xin colwa tx'o tx'otx' yin̈ ix, yuto yuc'to tx'otx' ha' yalti no' yul isti'.
Caw tit ishowal no' drag'on tu' yin̈ ix, isto no' yanoco howal yin̈ huntek'an yunin ix, ha' ton mac chiyijen ischejbanil Comam Dios yeb ebnaj chibeybaln̈e iscuybanil Comam Jesucristo.

Lahwi tu' isto no' drag'on islin̈banocan̈ isba xol arena isti' ha' mar. Wilnihan yahilo hune' mac Nok' isbi xol ha' mar tu', hujeb iswi', lahon̈eb xin yuc'a'. Ayahto hunun iscorona hunun yuc'a' yin̈ hunun iswi' mac Nok' isbi tu'. Yin̈ hunun iswi' tu' tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe, tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Dios.

Hune' mac Nok' isbi wiltu'an, lahan jilni yeb no' nime tz'ibin̈ balam, wal yoj xin lahan jilni yeb yoj no' oso, haxa isti' lahan jilni haca' isti' no' balam. Yak'ni no' drag'on tu' sunil yip yeb istz'on̈obal, yeb iscan̈il ye tet hune' mac Nok' isbi tu'.

Ay xin hune' iswi' mac Nok' isbi tu', ayco hune' islahwilal chiak'ni camoj, yaja' xin an̈cha islahwilal. Caw xin c'ayilo isc'ul sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu hune' tu'. Yoc tzujno anma yinta hune' mac Nok' isbi tu'.

Yoc anma yinoyo isba tet no' drag'on yuto ha' ak'n̈e yip naj Nok' isbi. Yocpaxo anma yinoyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi tu', chalni anma haca' ti': --¿Mac hunu chu islahban isba yeb hune' mac Nok' isbi ti', yeb mactaxca chu yak'len howal yebi? ẍi anma.
Hune' mac Nok' isbi tu' chahlax tzoteloj, islolo'n̈en isba yalni nimeta tzoti', yalnipaxo tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios. Yak'laxpaxo yip yoc yahawilo yulbal cuarenta y dos ixahaw.
Yoc yalno tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios, isbahwapaxo yin̈ isbi Comam, yeb yin̈ yatut Comam, yeb yin̈ mac ay yul satcan̈.

Ischahlaxpaxo yanico naj howal yin̈ sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios, isk'oji naj yin̈. Yak'laxpaxo yip naj yiban̈ sunil anma, yiban̈ ej con̈ob, yiban̈ ej anma nananta yabxubal, yeb yiban̈ ej nime con̈ob.
Yinayo isba sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' tet naj Nok' isbi tu', ha' ton mac yettaxtic'a iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach ayoyo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale yet Comam oc xahanbalil.
Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we hayanma hetxumniloj:

Mac yetxatic'a isto preso, chiilaxto preso, mac yetxatic'a ispotxlax yu ch'en espada, chipotx'lax yu ch'en espada. Yuxin han̈on̈ yuninal Comam Dios hon̈ ti', caw yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam, yeb niman chijute coc'ul jak'ni techaho isya'tajil.

Lahwi tu' xin wilnihan yahilo hune'xa mac haca' hunu no' niman nok' yul tx'otx'. Hune' no nok' tu' ay cabeb yuc'a' no' lahan jilni yeb yuc'a' no' Me'. Haca' xin istzotel no' drag'on hac tu' istzotel no'.
Caw xin lahan yip no' yeb no' babel, chisyenilo no' yip yun̈e isyijelax tet no' babel tu'. Hac tu' xin sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiyo isba tet no' babel tu', no' an̈cha hune' islahwilal.
Chisyeni no' iscab tu' huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule yeb chu yinayti no' k'a k'a' satcan̈ yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' yin̈ sat sunil anma.

Hac tu' xin chu yak'ni subchaho no' anma yu huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax iswatx'e' no' yin̈ sat no' babel tu'. Ischejni no' iscab tu' sunil anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' iswatx'eno hune' yechel no' lahwina yu ch'en espada, yaj itzitztopaxoj.
Yak'lax yip no' iscab tu' yak'ni isk'inal yechel no' babel tu' yun̈e istzoteli yeb yu yak'ni camo macta mach chiyo isba tet yechel no' babel tu'.
Ischejni no' yalaxoco yechel anma yin̈ iswatx'k'ab maca yin̈ ispalan̈. Caw sunil anma occano yechel, niẍte unin yeb ichamta anma, anma k'alom yeb anma meba', anma chejab yeb anma yet isba ischuquil.
Machi xin hunu mac chu islok'wi yeb istxon̈wi ta mach ayoco yechel no' yin̈, hune' yechel tu' ha' ton isbi no', maca isnumerohal isbi no'.
Hune' ti' choche yitz'atil wi'e. Ha' mac ay yitz'atil iswi', istxumabilo yin̈ tzet yelapno isnumerohal mac Nok' isbi. Hune' numero tu' isnumero anma yehi, ha' ton numero seis cientos sesenta y seis.

Lahwi tu' wilnihan Comam oc xahanbalil lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ iswi' witz Si'on; ayco ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil anma isc'atan̈. Tz'ibn̈ebilico isbi Comam oc xahanbalil yeb isbi Ismam Comam oc xahanbalil tu' yin̈ ispalan̈ huntek'an anma tu'.
Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ haca' isbili ha' nime ha', yeb haca' isn̈irla c'uh, yeb haca' yet caw tx'i'al mac chianico te' arpa.

Chanic'o hune' ac' bit sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios, yeb sata ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in, yeb sata ebnaj anciano. Caw xin machi hunu mac chu iscuyni hune' bit tu', cachann̈e ebnaj ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil colchalo xol anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Huntek'an ebnaj tu', maẍtic'a hunu ix yik' ebnaj, machi hunu mule iswatx'e ebnaj yeb hunu ix. Caw tzujann̈etic'a ebnaj yinta Comam oc xahanbalil bayxan̈etu'wal ch'ec' Comam. Ebnaj tu' colchalo ebnaj xol anma, yuxin lahan ebnaj haca' babel sat tz'unub chiak'lax tet Comam Dios yeb tet Comam oc xahanbalil.
Caw machi nich'ano lek'ti'al ilchalo yin̈ ebnaj, caw machi nich'ano ismul ebnaj sata Comam Dios.

Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune'xa naj 'angel chiec' yictabal satcan̈, ik'bil Tzoti' yet colbanile mach istan̈bal yu naj yu yalnic'o naj tet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'; tzijxan̈e nime con̈obal, tzijxan̈e anmahil, tzijxan̈e abxubal chala, yeb tzijxan̈e niẍte con̈obal.

Chalni naj 'angel tu' yin̈ caw ip: --Xiwan̈we tet Comam Dios cat heyanico ismay, yuto maapni yorahil yilni Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma. Iweyo heba tet Comam watx'en̈e satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' yeb ha' mar yebej isnuk' ha ha', ẍi naj.

Tzujan hune'xa naj 'angel yinta naj babel tu', yalni naj iscab tu': Wal tinan̈ maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia, yuto ha' oc uc'tzenocan̈ sunilej con̈ob yu istx'ojal iswi' yin̈ ixloj yeb yin̈ winajloj, ẍi naj.
Tzujanxa xin yalni naj yox 'angel yin̈ caw ip: --Ta ay mac chiyiyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi yeb tet yechel naj, cat ischahnico yechel isbi naj yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab,

chitit hune' niman isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios. Haca' vino caw how chiuc'laxi caw machi nino issomil ayayto xol, hac tu' ishowal Comam Dios chiay yiban̈ huntek'an anma tu'. Chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma xol k'a k'a' yeb azufre yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios, yeb yin̈ sat Comam oc xahanbalil.

Hune' bay chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj tu' ayn̈etic'aco yah isn̈ubal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo. Tz'ayic, ak'bal machi nino xewilal chiak'lax tet macta chiyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi tu' yeb chiyo isba tet yechel naj, yeb chichahni yechel isbi naj yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab, ẍi naj.
Yuxin sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi, macta chiyijen ischejbanil Comam yeb chaco yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us, yilal niman chute isc'ul yak'ni techahoj.

Lahwi tu' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e awi yul satcan̈, yalni wetan haca' ti': --Tz'ibn̈ecano hune' ti': "Sak'al yet mac chicam yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yin̈ tz'ayic chihul cosata ti'," ẍi. Yalnipaxo Comam Esp'iritu haca' ti': "Ho' caw yeli, huntek'an anma chicam tu' chixew yin̈ sunil ismunil. Sunil isc'ulal iswatx'e yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiak'lax ispaj selel tet yu Comam," ẍi Comam Esp'iritu, ẍi yul satcan̈.
Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune' moyan caw saj, tz'on̈anayo hune' mac haca' anma jilni yiban̈ hune' moyan tu'. Ayahto hune' corona naba oro yin̈ iswi', ik'bil hune' ch'en c'upbal trigo yu, caw ayahti yeh.

Lahwi tu' yelti hune'xa naj 'angel yul yatut Comam Dios, yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet mac tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ hune' moyan tu' haca' ti': --Ocan̈ hac'upucan̈ ixim trigo, yuto k'anxa ixim, istiempohalxa isc'uplaxcan̈ ixim sat tx'o tx'otx', ẍi naj.
Yin̈n̈ena tu' yanicto hune' mac tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ moyan tu' isc'upom trigo xol ixim, isc'upnican̈ naj ixim trigo sat tx'o tx'otx' ti'.
Lahwi tu' yelilo hune'xa naj 'angel yul yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈, yetbipaxo naj hune' ch'en c'upbal uva caw ay yeh.

Yelpaxilo hune'xa naj 'angel bay ay meẍa yet xahanbal, hune' naj 'angel tu' ay yip naj yiban̈ k'a k'a'. Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet naj ik'n̈e ch'en c'upom uva: --Acto ha' c'upom uva xol te' uva ay sat tx'o tx'otx' cat hac'upnilo te', yuto k'anxa te', ẍi naj.
Yoc naj 'angel tu' isc'upno sunil te' uva ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti', yanayto naj te' yul hune' niman bay chixan̈laxilti yal te'. Hune' ti' chal yelapno yin̈ hune' niman isya'tajil chitit yu Comam Dios.

Ha' xin istxam con̈ob xan̈laxilti yal te' uva tu', yelilo chic' bay yatz'lax yal te', isto lehno chic' tu', caw nahat ah ispimal, ah apno yin̈ isti' no' cheh bay cachan yec' isfreno no', wal bay to lehno chic' tu' aymi hunu ochenta legua yucoj.

Wilnihan hune'xa yechel yul satcan̈, caw ay yelapnoj yeb caw c'aybalc'ule jilni. Wilan hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel ik'n̈e hujeb majan islahobal isya'tajil, ha' yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil tu' bay chiyijcano isba ishowal Comam Dios.

Wilnipaxojan hune' haca' ha' mar leyantoj, haca' ch'en vidrio jilni, soman ye yeb k'a k'a'. Ay xin huntek'an anma lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ hune' haca' ha' mar tu', ik'bil yarpa ak'bil yu Comam Dios. Huntek'an anma tu' ha' ton sunil mac k'oji yin̈ naj Nok' isbi yeb yin̈ yechel naj, yeb yin̈ isnumerohal isbi naj.

Chanic'o anma tu' isbit naj Mois'es ischejab Comam Dios, yeb isbit Comam oc xahanbalil, chalni anma tu': Hach Jahawil, yeb hach coDiosalan̈ caw sunil tzettaj ye tu' chu hawatx'eni. Caw aycano yelapno sunil tzet ye tu' watx'ebil hawu yeb chic'ay coc'ul jilni. Istoholal yeb isyelal chawala. Hach ti' yahawilach yin̈ sunilej con̈ob.

Mam Jahawil, caw sunil anma chixiw tawet cat yanico hamay, yuto hachn̈ech'an caw c'ulach, machi nich'ano istx'ojal tawin̈. Chitit anma yul hunun con̈ob cat yinayo isba tasataj, yuto maxawil yin̈ istoholal yin̈ tzet chielico anma, ẍi anma tu'.
Lahwi tu' wilnihan ishajni isba yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈, hune' bay c'uwan istrato Comam Dios.

Yul yatut Comam tu' elilo hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel yeb hujeb majan isya'tajil. Ayco huntek'an k'ap lino caw saj xilo isk'ap ebnaj, caw xin chitzejtzoni, yeb xin naba oro issincho ebnaj aycoj, nime ispak'o sat chiah apno yalan̈ istxam isc'ul ebnaj.
Hune' naj xol ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in ak'ni hunun vaso naba oro tet hunun ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel tu'. Huntek'an vaso tu' nohna yu ishowal Comam Dios, Comam itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.
Caw nohilo yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yu n̈ub yu isk'ak'al yip Comam. Machi xin hunu mac chu yocto bey tu' masanta chijcano isba hujeb majan isya'tajil ik'bil yu ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel tu'.
Lahwi tu' wabenan yelilti yaw hune' yul nuk'e yin̈ caw ip yul yatut Comam Dios, yalni tet ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel: --As jobweyo ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul hunun vaso ti' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx', ẍi naj.

Isto naj babel 'angel isjobnoyo ishowal Comam ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx'. Yelilo huntek'an yabil caw how yeb caw tx'oj yin̈ isnimanil anma ayco yechel naj Nok' isbi yin̈, yeb macta yiyo isba tet yechel naj.

Lahwi tu' isjobnayo naj iscab 'angel ishowal Comam ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ha' mar yin̈n̈ena tu' xin, iscajpon̈ilo ha' haca' ischiq'uil hunu mac chipotx'lax camoj. Iscamilo sunil no nok' itzitz ay xol ha'.
Lahwi tu' isjobnayo naj yox 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ej ha' nimeta ha', yeb yiban̈ isnuk' ha ha', ismeltzoco ha' chic'al.

Wabenan yalni naj yahawil ha ha': Mamin, hach ti' Dios ach, machi nino istx'ojal ayco tawin̈. Ayach tinan̈ yeb xin ayachxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj. Hach ti' caw istoholal chawatx'e, yuto maxawil yin̈ tzet chielico anma ti'.
Yuto ha' huntek'an anma ti' malnito ischiq'uil huntek'an mac hawetxa yehi yeb ebnaj hachejab yet payat. Tinan̈ xin yet ay anma ti' hawak'ni chic' yuc'u', ẍi naj.
Wabenpaxojan yallax bay ay ismeẍahil xahanbal haca' ti': --Ho' Mamin, sunil chu hawu. Hach ti' xin chawil yin̈ istoholal yeb isyelal yin̈ tzet chielico anma, ẍi.
Isjobnayo naj iscan̈ 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ tz'ayic, yak'lax yip yoj tz'ayic tu' isn̈usnito anma.
Caw tz'ato anma yu isk'ak'al tz'ayic tu', yaja' maẍtic'a isna isba, yeb maẍtic'a yiyo isba tet Comam Dios. Wal xin oc anma buchwal yin̈ Comam, Comam ay yip yiban̈ huntek'an isya'tajil ti'.
Isjobnayo naj isho' 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ bay tz'on̈an naj Nok' isbi, iscan sunil tzet ayco yalan̈ yip naj yin̈ k'ejholo. Caw xin chiscach' yak' anma yu isya'tajil;
yaja' maẍtic'a isbejcano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal. Wal xin oc anma yala' tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios yu isya'il isya'tajil, yeb yu huntek'an howla yabil elilo yin̈.
Isjobnayo naj iswaj 'angel ishowal Comam Dios yayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ha' niman Eufrates. Istajcan̈ ha' yun̈e iscancano isbeh ha' isbeho ebnaj rey chitit bay chiahilo tz'ayic.

Wilnihan oxwan̈ esp'iritu caw machiswalil haca' jilni no' pahtza'. Hune' elti yul isti' naj chiyij drag'on, hune'xa elti yul isti' naj Nok' isbi, hune'xa xin elti yul isti' naj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios.

Huntek'an esp'iritu tu' yet naj matzwalil yehi, chisye huntek'an c'aybalc'ule. Isto huntek'an esp'iritu tu' yul sat yiban̈k'inal, yoc iscutxbanico sunil ebnaj rey yin̈ howal yin̈ hune' tz'ayic caw ay yelapno yet Comam Dios, Comam caw aycano yip.

Yalni Comam oc xahanbalil haca' ti': --Abewe tzet chiwalan, chinapni lemnahan haca' chiyu yapni hunu elk'om. Sak'al yet mac chimajwahi yeb chisya'iln̈e xil isk'ap yun̈e mach chiec' t'ilt'oni cat yel istx'ixobal sata anma, ẍi Comam.
Huntek'an esp'iritu machiswalil tu' ha' cutxbanico ebnaj rey sat hune' tx'o tx'otx' chiyij Armaged'on yin̈ abxubal hebreo.

Isjobnayo naj ishuj 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso xol jak'ek'. Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yin̈ caw ip elti yul yatut Comam Dios bay ay istz'on̈obal, yalni haca' ti': --Wal tinan̈ mayijcano isba sunil, ẍi.
Lahwi tu' isjeplahi, isn̈irlapaxoj, isk'an̈ipaxoj, isbili tx'o tx'otx' yu hune' niman chixcab. Maẍtotic'a xin hunu chixcab chiec' haca' hune' tu' yichitax ispitzc'a anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'.

Wal hune' niman con̈ob caw oxeb ayicoj, yayc'ay sunilej con̈ob ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Isnaniti Comam Dios niman con̈ob Babilonia istit ishowal Comam yin̈, yaniti Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ haca'tan̈e ak'lax vino caw how yuc'u'.
Sunil con̈ob ayayo xol ha' mar yeb xin ej witz c'aycanocan̈.
Istit nimeta sajbat yul satcan̈ yiban̈ anma, aymi hunu quintal yalil hunun ch'en. Yoc anma istz'acti'n̈en Comam Dios yu ch'en sajbat tu', yuto caw ak'lax ec'oya' yanma anma.

Lahwi tu' yul hune' naj 'angel inc'atan̈an, hune' naj yetbi ebnaj hujwan̈ ik'bil isvaso, yalni naj wetan: --Cata chinyehan isya'tajil chialaxayo yiban̈ ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' tawet, ix tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ ej ha ha'.
Sunil ebnaj yahawil con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yeb ix, haxa anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xin, haca'tan̈e xayuc'tzecan̈ ix yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal iswi', ẍi naj.

Yin̈ hune' isye Comam Esp'iritu wettu'an, wilan quinyinitojan naj 'angel tu' bey tx'otx' desierto. Wilnihan hune' ix ix ayahto yiban̈ hune' no' niman nok'. Hune' no nok' tu' cajin̈ yin̈ no', hantan̈e xin huntek'an bihe tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Dios ayco yin̈ no', hujeb xin iswi' no', yeb lahon̈eb yuc'a' no'.

Hune' ix ix tu' cajwuk'wun̈e yeb cajyolyon̈e jilni xil isk'ap ix, hantan̈e xin yelawil aycoj; ayco ch'en oro yeb ch'en perla yelawiloj, yeb huntek'an ch'en ch'en c'ulch'an jilni. Ik'bil xin hune' ch'en vaso naba oro yu ix, nohna yu sunil ismachiswalilal yeb mule chiswatx'e ix.

Tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe yin̈ ispalan̈ ix, machi mac ohtan̈e, chalni haca' ti': "Hune' niman con̈ob Babilonia, mi'e yin̈ sunil ebix tx'oj ye iswi' yeb sunil tzet machiswalil ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'," ẍicoj.
Haxa wilnihan xin caw uc'um ix yu ischiq'uil ebnaj yetxa Comam Dios potx'bil camoj, yeb yu ischiq'uil ebnaj yak' isba testigohal yin̈ Comam Jes'us. Caw xin c'ayilo inc'ulan yet wilnihan ix.
Yalni naj 'angel wetan: --¿Tzet yin̈ xin caw chic'ayilo hac'ul hawilni ix? Wal xin chiwalan tawet yin̈ tzet yelapno ye hune' ix ti' yeb no nok' hujeb iswi' yeb lahon̈eb yuc'a' ayicto yalan̈ ix.

No nok' maxawil tu', ha' ton hune' naj aytic'a yet payxa, yaja' matxa naj ayc'o tinan̈, yaj chiahilo naj yul hune' niman xab yet yalan̈to maẍto chitocano naj yin̈ isya'tajil. Haxa anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti', huntek'an mach ayayo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale mach istan̈bal yettaxtic'a iswatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw chic'ay isc'ul yilni naj Nok' isbi tu', naj aytic'a payxa, yaja' machi naj tinan̈, yaja' xin chihulupaxoj.
Mac ay yitz'atil iswi', istxumabilo hune' ti': Ha' hujeb iswi' no' tu', yechel hujeb witz bay tz'on̈an ix ix tu', yechelpaxo hujwan̈ ebnaj yahawil con̈ob yehi.
Howan̈ ebnaj yahawil tu' xatan̈iloj, hune' naj xin ayco yahawil tinan̈, hunxa naj xin chioc naj yahawilo tzujanilxa, yaja' xin hanic'xan̈e tiempohal.

Haxa hune' naj Nok' isbi, naj aytic'a payxa, yaja' machi tinan̈, yet chihul naj tu' ha' naj chioc yahawilo yin̈xa iswaxan̈wan̈, yuto yetbi isba naj yeb ebnaj hujwan̈. Hayet chioc naj yahawilo tu' behxa isto naj yin̈ isya'tajil yin̈ huneln̈e.
Haxa lahon̈eb yuc'a' no' hawil tu', yechel yin̈ lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj rey maẍto chioc yahawiloj, yaj xin hun chu yak'lax yip ebnaj yeb naj Nok' isbi yoc yahawil yin̈ hanic' tiempohal.
Ebnaj lahon̈wan̈ tu', hunlahanxan̈e chute ebnaj isnabal cat yak'ni ebnaj yip yeb yahawilal tet naj Nok' isbi,

cat yanico ebnaj howal yin̈ Comam oc xahanbalil. Yaja' chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj, yuto ha' Comam tu' yahawil yin̈ ebnaj rey yeb yahaw Comam yin̈ ebnaj yahawil. Wal macta awtebil yu Comam yeb mac sic'bililoj, yeb macta yijem tet Comam, ayco isc'atan̈ yet chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj tu', ẍi naj 'angel.
Yalnipaxo naj 'angel tu' wetan: --Wal huntek'an ha ha' hawil bay tz'on̈anayo ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' tu', yechelej anma, yebej nime con̈ob yeb niẍte con̈ob, yebej anma nananta yabxubal.

Ha' lahon̈eb yuc'a' naj Nok' isbi hawil tu' yechel ebnaj rey, ha' ebnaj chiyahnican̈ ix tx'oj ye iswi' tu' cat ist'ilbalax ix cat isbejlaxcano ix. Chic'uxlaxto isnimanil ix cat isn̈uslaxto xol k'a k'a'.

Comam Dios anico yin̈ isc'ul ebnaj rey tu' iswatx'en haca' tzet choche Comam yuxin hunlahan yute ebnaj isnabal, yak'ni ebnaj sunil yip tet naj Nok' isbi masanta chij isba tzet halbilxatic'a yu Comam Dios.
Wal hune' ix ix hawil tu', yechel hune' niman con̈ob ay yip yiban̈ sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye ix, ẍi naj 'angel.
Lahwi tu' xin wilnihan yayilo hune' naj 'angel yul satcan̈ caw ay yip. Caw xin sajbilo sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' yu isk'ak'al naj.

Yalni naj yin̈ caw ip: ¡Maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia, wal tinan̈ maayc'aycanoj! Maoc yatuto ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yeb yehobalo esp'iritu tx'oj, yeb yatuto no' ch'ic caw yahbeta jilni, yeb caw machiswalil.

Yuto sunilej con̈ob xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal hune' con̈ob tu', haca'tan̈e caw xaiscamtzecanilo iswi' huntek'an con̈ob tu' yu istx'ojal. Haxa ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xaayc'ay ebnaj yin̈ ixlo yu hune' con̈ob tu'. Sunil ebnaj txon̈wom ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', xaoc ebnaj k'alomal yu istxon̈ni tzettaj ye tu' caw ay istohol, yuto hune' con̈ob tu' caw lolo' isk'aptzen isba yeb yec'tzen k'in̈, ẍi naj 'angel tu'.

Lahwi tu' wabenpaxojan hune'xa yul nuk'e satcan̈, halni haca' ti': Hex wetxahan, elan̈we yul hune' con̈ob ti' yun̈e mach cheyilto hewatx'en istx'ojal chiswatx'e, yeb yun̈e maẍtaj hunex chechah isya'tajil chul yiban̈.
Hune' con̈ob ti' caw xaah tenno ismul, caw xaahilo satcan̈, yaja' wal tinan̈ xin manalaxti ismul yu Comam Dios.

Haca'tic'a yute yak'ni tet anma, hac tu' chu heyak'ni tet, cayelto ec'bal ispaj selel cheyak' tet. Huntek'an howla tzet ye tu' ayayto yul isvaso yak' yuc'u' anma, pajtzewe tet, yaj cayelto ec'na caw how cheyute.

Haca'tic'a yu islolo'n̈en isba yeb yak'ni tzet choche yanma, hac tu' chu heyak'ni ec'oya' yanma cat heyak'ni isya'tajil tet, yuto chal hune' con̈ob Babilonia tu' haca' ti': "Haninti'an caw reinainan, tz'on̈aninan yul intz'on̈obalan, man hunixojan, mach bak'inal chiec'ya' wanmahan," ẍi ix.

Yuxinto hune'n̈e tz'ayical chihul sunil isya'tajil yiban̈, chihul camical, ok'il, wahil, cat isn̈uslaxto xol k'a k'a', yuto ay yip Comam Dios Jahawil yanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ hune' con̈ob tu', ẍiayoj.

Wal sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yaco ebnaj ismul yeb yak' yoche tzet chal isnimanil yeb hune' con̈ob tu', caw ch'ok' ebnaj yeb caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yilni yah isn̈ubal yet chitz'atoj.

Nahat xin chicancano lin̈no ebnaj yu xiwquilal yilni isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ con̈ob tu', chalni ebnaj: ¡Ay, caw c'anch'an niman con̈ob Babilonia, hune' con̈ob caw aycano yip! Yuto caw yin̈ an̈e mahul isya'tajil yiban̈, ẍi ebnaj.
Hacpax tu' ebnaj txon̈wom ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj, yeb caw chiok' ebnaj yuto matxa mac chilok'ni tzet chistxon̈ ebnaj.

Yuto caw yijatzilxa chistxon̈ ebnaj ch'en oro, ch'en plata, yebej ch'en ch'en c'ulejch'an jilni, yeb ch'en perla. Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj k'ap lino caw ay istohol, k'ap k'ap morado jilni, yeb k'ap seda, yeb k'ap k'ap caj jilni. Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj sunilej te te' xuk' sam, yeb tzettaj ye tu' watx'ebil yin̈ istx'i'eh no' elefante, yeb yin̈ej te te' caw ay istohol, yeb yin̈ ch'en bronce, yin̈ ch'en hierro yeb yin̈ ch'en m'armol.

Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj te' canela yeb yan̈al itah caw xuk' sam, yeb te' pom, yeb mirra, yeb an̈ caw xuk' sam, yeb te' vino, yeb te' aceite, yeb ixim harina caw ay istohol, yeb ixim trigo. Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj no' wacax, no' me' yeb no' cheh, yeb te' caret chistaric'o no' cheh. Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj anma chejabo tet hune' con̈ob tu'.
Chalni ebnaj txon̈wom tet hune' con̈ob tu': ¡Matxa chiapni te' lobehal tawet tinan̈, huntek'an te' caw chawoche halob. Caw mac'aycanilo halolo'al yeb hak'alomal, matxa bak'inal chawil yin̈! ẍi ebnaj.
Ebnaj txon̈wom caw occano k'alomal yu hune' con̈ob tu', nahat can lin̈no ebnaj yu xiwquilal yilni isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ con̈ob tu', caw xin chiok' ebnaj yeb chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob tu'.

Chalni ebnaj: ¡Ay, caw c'anch'an hune' niman con̈ob ti'! Hune' con̈ob ti' lahantic'a haca' hunu ix ix chianico k'ap lino caw ay istohol xilo isk'ap, yeb huntek'an xilk'ape morado yeb caj jilni, aypaxico ch'en oro yeb ch'en perla yeb ch'en ch'en caw ay istohol yelawiloj,

yaja' xin yin̈ caw hunepn̈e matan̈canilo isk'alomal, ẍi ebnaj. Sunil ebnaj yahaw barco yeb anma ayicto yul barco tu', yeb ebnaj chibak'on te', yeb huntek'anxa mac chimunla yiban̈ ha' mar nahat cancano lin̈noj.
Yet yilni ebnaj yah isn̈ubal hune' con̈ob tu' yah yaw ebnaj, yalni ebnaj: Caw machi hunuxa con̈ob haca' hune' niman con̈ob ti', ẍi ebnaj.

Yanahto ebnaj pojoj xol xil iswi' yu bisc'ulal, caw xin ch'ok' ebnaj, yeb caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob tu', chalni ebnaj: ¡Ay, caw c'anch'an hune' niman con̈ob! Yu isk'alomal yuxin k'alombican̈ ebnaj ay isbarco xol ha' mar. ¡Yaja' xin yin̈ caw hunepn̈ech'an matan̈iloj! ẍi ebnaj.

Yuxin tzalahan̈we hex ayex yul satcan̈ yu maayc'ay hune' con̈ob tu'. Tzalahan̈wepaxo hex yetexxa Comam Dios, hex ischejab Comam yet payat yeb hex ischejab Comam Jes'us, yuto haca' yu yak'ni hune' con̈ob tu' ec'oya' heyanma, hac tu' yu yak'lax ec'oya' yanma yu Comam Dios.

Lahwi tu' wilnihan yinican̈ hune' naj 'angel caw ay yip, hune' ch'en niman ch'en haca' ch'en molino yet trigo, isk'ojnayto naj ch'en xol ha' mar, yalni naj: Hac ti' chu isk'ojlaxayto hune' niman con̈ob Babilonia, matxa bak'inal xin chiillaxi.

Matxa bak'inal chiabelax yoc te' arpa, yeb te' su' yeb ch'en trompeta yulaj iscallehal con̈ob tu'. Matxa xin hunu naj munlawom chiillax ismunla yin̈ tzettaj munilal, yeb matxa chiabelax yoc ch'en molino yul con̈ob tu'.

Matxa xin chiillax isk'ak'al hunu cantil, matxa xin chiabelax iswejcha anma yin̈ mohyilal. Matxa xin chiillax ebnaj txon̈wom yul con̈ob tu' waxan̈ca xin caw ay yelapno ye ebnaj sata anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti'. Yak'nipaxo subchaho hune' con̈ob tu' sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu isnawalil.

Alaxpaxayo hune' niman isya'tajil yiban̈ con̈ob Babilonia tu' yuto ha' bey tu' ilcha ischiq'uil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios potx'bilcamoj, yeb ischiq'uil macta yetxa Comam yehi, yeb ischiq'uil ebnaj potx'lax yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', ẍi naj.
Lahwi tu' wabenan yel yaw tx'i'al yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ yalni yin̈ caw ip: ¡Caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil, Comam bay chitit colbanile! Han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios ay ismay yeb caw ay yip.

Yuto yin̈ caw isyelal yeb yin̈ caw istoholal chil Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma. Mayayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ ix tx'oj ye iswi', ix ayco yechelo con̈ob Babilonia, ix etanto anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e, yeb yak' Comam Dios ispaj selel tet ix yu ebnaj ischejab Comam potx'bil yu ix, ẍi.
Yalnipaxo huntek'an yul nuk'e tu' haca' ti': Caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil. Hune' ix ix tu' maẍtic'a chisbej yah isn̈ubal, ẍi.

Wal ebnaj veinticuatro anciano yeb ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in ay jahno ebnaj, yay xulno ebnaj, yanico ebnaj ismay Comam Dios, Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal. Yalni ebnaj: --Hacojab tu', caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil, ẍi ebnaj.
Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e elti bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios, yalni haca' ti': Aweco ismay Comam Dios sunilex yijemex tet Comam yeb hex chexxiw tet Comam, walca ay heyelapnoj maca machi heyelapnoj, ẍi.
Wabenpaxojan hantan̈e yul nuk'e haca' ishaxon tx'i'al ej ha ha' yeb haca' isn̈irla c'uh, chalni haca' ti': Caw niman yelapno isbi Comam Dios Jahawil, yuto Comam caw aycano yip maschahco yoc yahawil.
Tzalajon̈wej, caw jak'awe tzala coc'ul, cat janico ismay Comam Dios yuto maapni istz'ayical ismohyi Comam oc xahanbalil. Ha' mac chioc yixalo Comam tu' caw watx'ebilxa isba.
Yuto xahallaxi ta chaco ix xil isk'ap, k'ap lino caw aycan̈ istohol yeb caw saj yehi, yeb caw chitzejtzoni. Hune' xilk'ape tu' yechel istoholal chisbeybaln̈e macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi.

Yalni hune' naj 'angel wetan: --Tz'ibn̈e hune' ti': "Sak'al yet macta awtebil yin̈ ismohyilal Comam oc xahanbalil," ẍi naj. Yalnipaxo naj: --Huntek'an tzoti' ti' yet Comam Dios yehi, isyelal chala, ẍi naj.

Lahwi tu' way jahnojan sata naj 'angel tu' yu winayo inbahan sata naj walnihan, yaja' xin yal naj wetan: --Mach chachay jahno yin̈ insatan yuto ischejab Comam Dios wehan haca' hach ti', yeb haca' ebnaj hawuẍta chak' isba yalnilo Istzoti' Comam Jes'us. Wal xin cachann̈e tet Comam Dios bay chawiyo haba, ẍi naj. Ha' xin Istzoti' Comam Jes'us, ha' chiiptzen ebnaj ischejab Comam.

Lahwi tu' ishajni isba satcan̈, wilnihan hune' no' cheh sajin̈, ayahto hune' mac yiban̈ no'. Hune' mac tu' xin Yijem yeb Isyelal isbi, yuto yin̈ caw istoholal chil yin̈ tzet chielico anma, chak'nipaxo howal yin̈ istoholal.
Wal isbak'sat lahan haca' xaj k'a k'a', hantan̈e xin corona ayahto yin̈ iswi'. Tz'ibn̈ebilico xin hune' bihe yin̈, hune' bihe tu' han̈c'an̈e hune' mac tu' ohtan̈e.
Wal xil isk'ap xin bacbilico chic' yin̈. Hune' mac tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios isbi.
Tzujan xin ebnaj 'angel ak'om howal yintaj, ayco k'ap lino caw ay istohol xilo isk'ap ebnaj, yeb caw saj jilni, machi nich'ano tz'il ayco yin̈. Ayahto ebnaj yiban̈ hunun no' cheh sajin̈.

Chi-xin-elti hune' ch'en espada caw ay yeh yul isti', ha' ch'en xin chak'baln̈e yin̈ej con̈ob. Ch'oc naj Yahawiloj yeb sunil yip, yeb hune' isvara naba hierro. Haca' chu isxan̈laxilti yal te' uva yun̈e yoc te' vinohal, hac tu' chu yanayo naj isya'tajil yiban̈ ej con̈ob yu ishowal Comam Dios, Comam caw aycano yip.
Wal yin̈ xil isk'ap yeb yin̈ isbul tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe haca' ti': Yahawil yin̈ ebnaj yahaw, Iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj ayco iswi'ehaloj, ẍicoj.
Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune' naj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ tz'ayic, yalni naj tetej no' ch'ic chiec' yictabal satcan̈ haca' ti': --Catawej, cutxbaweti heba, cat hec'uxni chibe chak' Comam Dios teyet.

C'uxwe ischibehal ebnaj rey, yeb ebnaj yahawil soldado, yeb ischibehal ebnaj caw can̈ yehi, yeb ischibehal ej no' cheh yeb ebnaj chiahto yiban̈ no'. C'uxwe ischibehal tzijxan̈e anmahil, anma yet isba ischuquil, anma chejab, anma machi yelapnoj, yeb anma ay yelapnoj, ẍi naj.

Wilnihan naj Nok' isbi yeb sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti', yeb sunil issoldado, cutxanxaco ebnaj yu yanico howal yin̈ hune' mac ayahto yiban̈ no' cheh yeb yin̈ ebnaj ak'om howal tzujan yintaj.

Istzablaxayo naj Nok' isbi yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios, naj yeni nimeta c'aybalc'ule sata naj Nok' isbi. Yu huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule isye naj yak' subchaho naj anma yun̈e yalaxico yechel naj Nok' isbi tu' yin̈, yinipaxayo isba anma tet yechel naj. Caw xin itzitz naj Nok' isbi, yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios isk'ojlaxto ebnaj xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre.
Wal sunilxa ebnaj xin potx'lax ebnaj yu ch'en espada chielti yul isti' naj ayahto yiban̈ no' cheh tu', caw xin sunil no' ch'ic tu' caw nohcano isc'ul isc'uxnito ischibehal sunil anma tu'.
Lahwi tu', wilnihan yayilo hune' naj 'angel yul satcan̈, ik'bil islawehal hune' niman xab yu naj, ik'bilpaxo hune' niman cadena yu naj.
Istzabnayo naj hune' mac chiyij drag'on, ha' ton no' payat laba chihallax diablohal yeb Satan'as, isc'albanayo naj 'angel tu' naj yulbal mil habil.

Isk'ojlaxto naj yul hune' niman xab, ismajchencano naj 'angel tu' isti'. Yanico naj issellohal yun̈e mach ch'ahti naj drag'on tu' yak'a subchaho ej con̈ob. Haxa yet chiec'to mil habil tu' cat isbejtzolax naj hanic'xa tiempohal.

Lahwi tu' wilnihan huntek'an tz'on̈obal bay tz'on̈an ebnaj ak'lax yip yu yilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma. Wilnipaxojan yanma ebnaj ilaxilo iswi' yu yak' isba testigohal yin̈ Comam Jes'us, yeb yu yalic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios. Ha' ton ebnaj tu' mach yiyo isba tet mac Nok' isbi, mach xin aypaxo jahno tet yechel. Mach xin ischahpaxico ebnaj yechel mac Nok' isbi tu' yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab. Wilnihan yitzitzbican̈ ebnaj tu', yoc ebnaj yahawilo yinta Comam yulbal mil habil.
Ha' ton huntek'an ebnaj tu' babel pitzc'acan̈, wal huntek'anxa camom xin mach pitzc'acan̈ masanto chielto mil habil tu', cat ispitzc'acan̈.

¡Sak'al yet mac babel chipitzc'acan̈ tu' yuto yetxa Comam Dios yehi! Matxa xin chik'oji iscab camical yin̈, wal xin chioc sacerdotehal yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo, chiocpaxo yahawilo yinta Comam yulbal mil habil.
Lahwi yec'to mil habil xin cat isbejtzolax naj matzwalil bay majan,

cat xin yahti naj yak'no subchaho anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yebpaxo xin Gog yeb Magog cat iscutxbanico naj yin̈ howal. Ha' xin isbisil ebnaj ak'om howal chicutxico tu' lahan haca' yarenahil isti' ha' mar.

Yet chito ebnaj yin̈ howal tu' chismajto ebnaj sunil sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' cat ishoynoyo ebnaj iscampamento ebnaj yetxa Comam Dios yehi yeb hune' niman con̈ob xahan ay yu Comam; yaja' chati Comam k'a k'a' yiban̈ ebnaj cat istz'ahcanto ebnaj sunil.

Wal naj matzwalil ak'ni subchaho huntek'an anma tu' k'ojlaxayto naj xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre, hune' bay k'ojlaxayto mac Nok' isbi yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios. Ha' bey tu' xin chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj tz'ayic ak'bal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.

Lahwi tu', wilnihan hune' niman tz'on̈obal saj jilni yeb hune' mac tz'on̈anayo yul hune' tz'on̈obal tu'. Yin̈n̈ena tu' isc'aycan̈ tx'o tx'otx' yeb satcan̈ sata mac tz'on̈an tu', wiyom xin isc'aycaniloj.

Wilnihan anma camnaj lin̈ancan̈ sata Comam, anma niman yelapnoj yeb anma mach yelapnoj. Ishajlax huntek'an te' hum, yillax yin̈ tzet chielico anma camom tu' hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e hunun, haca' yehayo yul huntek'an te' hum tu'. Ishajlaxpaxo te' hum bay ayayo isbi anma ayxa isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e.
Yanico ha' mar sunil mac camna yul ha' tet Comam, hacpax tu' naj camical yeb cambal yapaxico sunil camom tet Comam. Yilni Comam yin̈ tzet elicoj hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e hunun.
Lahwi tu' isk'ojlaxayto naj camical yeb cambal xol hune' niman k'a'. Hune' k'a k'a' tu', ha' ton iscab camical.
Haxa mac mach ayayo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale k'ojlaxayto xol hune' niman k'a' tu'.
Lahwi tu' xin, wilnihan hune' ac' satcan̈ yeb hune' tx'o tx'otx' ac', yuto ha' babel satcan̈ yeb tx'otx' babel tx'otx' caycan̈, hacpax tu' xin ha' mar caycan̈ ha'.

Hanin Juan inti'an wilan iscon̈ob Comam Dios, ha' ton ac' Jerusal'en, wilan istit yul satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios. Caw c'ul yehi, haca' hunu ix ix watx'ebilxa isba yuto yocxa yin̈ mohyilal yeb naj chiik'ni.

Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e elti bay tz'on̈an Comam, yalni yin̈ caw ip: --Wal tinan̈ ayxaco Comam Dios xol anma, chi-xin-cancano Comam xol, iscon̈obxa Comam chucanicoj. Chiehayo Comam xol anma, cat yoccano Comam isDiosaloj.
Ha' Comam xin chisunilo yal sat anma, matxa camical, matxa ok'il, matxa mac chiah isc'ul, matxa isya'tajil, yuto sunil tzet aytic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj, xatan̈iloj, ẍi.

Yalni Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal wetan: --Haninti'an chiwak' ac'bojan sunil tzettaj ye tu', ẍi Comam. Yalnipaxo Comam wetan: --Tz'ibn̈ecano huntek'an tzoti' ti' yuto isyelal yehi, yeb chu iscawxi isc'ul anma yin̈, ẍi.
Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam wetan: --Sunil watx'ebilxa. Haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal, haca' tz'ib A yeb Z. Macta chitaj isti', chiwak'an ha ha' matanil yuc'u', hune' ha ha' chiak'ni k'inale.
Ha' mac chik'oji, chiwak'an sunil huntek'an tu' ismajuloj. Haninan xin chinocan isDiosaloj, cat yoc wuninalojan.

Yaja' wal mac chixiw yanico isba yul ink'aban, yeb mac mach chayto yul yanma win̈an, yeb mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil, yeb macta potx'om anma, yeb macta chiixli yeb chiwinajli, yeb macta chicunn̈en yet anmahil, yeb macta chiay jahno sata tioẍ, yeb sunil macta lek'ti'wom, ha' huntek'an mac tu' chialaxto xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre, ha' ton iscab camical.
Lahwi tu' yul naj ishuj 'angel inc'atan̈an, naj ik'n̈e ch'en ishuj vaso bay ayayto islahobal isya'tajil, yalni naj wetan: --Cata, chinyehan tawet mac chioc yixalo Comam oc xahanbalil, ẍi naj.

Yin̈ hune' isye Comam Esp'iritu wettu'an wilan quinyinitojan naj 'angel tu' yin̈ iswi' hune' niman witz caw nahat yecan̈. Isyeni naj niman con̈ob Jerusal'en wetan, iscon̈ob Comam Dios. Hune' con̈ob tu' wilan istit yul satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios.
Caw xin chitzejlaco isk'ak'al Comam yin̈ con̈ob tu', lahan haca' istzejla ch'en ch'en c'ulch'an jilni yeb haca' istzejla ch'en jaspe, chik'axpon cosat yul haca' ch'en cristal.

Hune' con̈ob tu' hoyanico hune' niman c'ub yin̈ caw xin nahat yecan̈, cablahon̈eb ispultahil aycoj, cablahon̈wan̈ ebnaj 'angel ayco istan̈enoj, hunun ebnaj yin̈ isti' hunun pulta tu'. Yin̈ hunun pulta tu' tz'ibn̈ebilico hunun isbi ebnaj cablahon̈eb majan Israel.
Oxeb ispultahil ayco yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic, oxebpaxo xin ayco yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chito tz'ayic, oxeb xin ayco yin̈ norte, oxebpaxo xin ayco yin̈ sur.
Hune' niman c'ub tu' ayco cablahon̈eb ch'en ch'en isxe'oj, ayco xin isbi hunun ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ischejab Comam oc xahanbalil yin̈ hunun ch'en.
Naj 'angel tzotel wettu'an ik'bil hune' vara naba oro yu naj yun̈e ismalen naj hune' con̈ob tu' yeb ispultahil yebpaxo isc'ubal.

Hune' niman con̈ob tu' can̈eb istxiquin, lahan xin yeco ismalil hunun istxiquin tu'. Hayet ismalen naj 'angel hune' con̈ob tu' wajeb ciento legua yecoj. Hune' con̈ob tu' haca' yeco ismalil ispac'ul hac tu' yeco ismalil istxiquin, hac tu' yepaxocan̈ istel.
Haxa yet ismalen naj isc'ubal con̈ob tu' sesenta y cinco metro elicoj. Hune' malbal yaco naj tu' lahan haca' ismalbal anma.
Hune' c'ub tu', ch'en jaspe ayco isch'enaloj. Wal hune' con̈ob tu' caw naba oro, haca' istzejla ch'en vidrio hac tu' istzejlahi.
Ch'en ch'en ayco isxe'alo isc'ubal con̈ob tu' sunilej ch'en ch'en caw c'ulch'an jilni ayco yelawiloj. Ch'en babel jaspe ch'en, ch'en iscab zafiro, ch'en isyox 'agata, ch'en iscan̈ esmeralda.

Ch'en isho' 'onice, ch'en iswaj cornalina, ch'en ishuj cris'olito, ch'en iswaxaj berilo, ch'en isbalon̈eb topacio, ch'en islahon̈eb crisoprasa, ch'en ishunlahon̈eb jacinto, haxa ch'en iscan̈lahon̈eb xin amatista; ha' sunil ch'en ti' ayco yelawiloj.

Cablahon̈eb ispultahil isc'ubal con̈ob tu', ha' ton cablahon̈eb ch'en perla, hunun pulta tu' hunun ch'en perla ayco yin̈. Wal hune' niman calle chiec'to yictabal con̈ob tu' naba oron̈e, chik'axpon cosat yul haca' vidrio.
Machi xin yatut Comam Dios wilan yul hune' con̈ob tu', yuto ha' Comam Dios caw aycano yip, yeb Comam oc xahanbalil, ayco xol anma tu'.
Hune' con̈ob tu' matxa chiocnico yoj tz'ayic yeb yoj ixahaw yu, walxinto ha' isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios ha' ayayo xol anma, yeb xin Comam oc xahanbalil sajilk'inal Comam.
Yin̈xa issajilk'inal hune' con̈ob tu' chibelwi ej con̈ob colbilxa. Sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chato isk'alomal tet hune' con̈ob tu'.
Maẍtic'a chipebalax ispultahil hunun tz'ayic yuto matxa ak'bal bey tu'.
Ha' tet hune' con̈ob tu' chialaxto sunil isk'alomal yeb yip sunilej con̈ob.

Maẍtic'a nino istx'ojal chiocto bey tu', mach hunu mac chiwatx'en tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios chiapni yul hune' con̈ob tu', yeb matxa lek'ti'al. Wal xin han̈c'an̈e mac tz'unbilayo isbi yul hum yet k'inale yet Comam oc xahanbalil, ha' chiocto yul hune' con̈ob tu'.

Lahwi tu' isyeni naj 'angel hune' ha ha' caw saj wetan, ha' chiak'ni k'inale. Caw xin chik'axpon cosat yul ha' haca' vidrio. Hune' ha ha' tu', ha' bay ay istz'on̈obal Comam Dios yeb Comam oc xahanbalil, ha' tu' chitit ha'.

Yictabal hune' niman calle yul hune' niman con̈ob tu' chiec' ha'. Ha' xin isk'axk'epal isti'la ha' aycan̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale, hunun ixahaw xin yak'ni sat te', cablahon̈el chisatni te' yulbal habil. Wal xaj te' xin ha' chiocnico an̈il yu anma ay yulej tx'otx' con̈ob.
Sunil tzettaj ay bey tu' matxa chiay ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈. Yul hune' con̈ob tu' ay istz'on̈obal Comam Dios yeb Comam oc xahanbalil. Sunil ischejab Comam xin chiyiyo isba tet,
cat yilnico yin̈ Comam, cat yinic'o isbi Comam yin̈ ispalan̈.
Bey tu' matxa ak'bal, matxa yilalo chiocnico cantil yeb yoj tz'ayic, yuto haxa isk'ak'al Comam chitzejn̈eni, cat yoc yahawilo yin̈ sunilbal tiempo.

Yalnipaxo naj 'angel wetan: --Huntek'an tzoti' ti' caw yeli, iscawxobal isc'ul anma yehi. Comam Dios Jahawil, Comam chiiptzen ischejab yalnic'o Istzoti', ha' chejniti y'angel yalno tet ischejab yin̈ huntek'an tzet toxa chiyuhi, ẍi naj.
Chal Comam Jes'us haca' ti': --¡Caw toxa chinhulan! ¡Sak'al yet mac chiyijen Istzoti' Comam Dios halbilcano yul hune' hum ti'! ẍi Comam.
Hanin Juan inti'an, haninan caw wilan yeb wabenan huntek'an ti'. Hayet wilnihan yeb yet wabenan way jahnojan sata naj 'angel yeni huntek'an tu' wetan.

Yaja' yal naj 'angel tu' wetan: --Mach chachay jahno insatajan yuto ischejab Comam Dios wehan haca' hach ti', yeb haca' ebnaj hawuẍta chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam, yebpaxo sunil macta chiyijen tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yul hune' hum ti'. Wal xin ha'ojabn̈e tet Comam Dios chawiyo haba, ẍi naj.
Yalnipaxo naj wetan: --Mach chawebato tzettaj tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti', yuto toxa chiyij isba yin̈ tzettaj tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti'.

Ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal islahabico iswatx'en istx'ojal, haxa mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil xin, islahabico iswatx'en isyahbetajil tu'. Ha' mac chiwatx'en istoholal islahabico iswatx'en istoholal. Ha' mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi islahabico isyijen tzet chal Comam, ẍi naj 'angel.
Chalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Yin̈ caw yeli toxa chinhulan, ik'bil ispaj selel tzettaj iswatx'e hunun mac wuhan, hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e.
Haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal, haca' tz'ib A yeb Z, ẍi Comam.
Sak'al yet mac tx'ahbilxa ismul, haca'tan̈e xaistx'ah xil isk'ap yuto ay yoc yin̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale, yeb xin chu yocto yul ispultahil hune' con̈ob tu'.

Yaja' wal mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil chicancano yintalto hune' con̈ob tu', yeb macta cunlum, yeb macta ixlom yeb winajlom, yeb macta potx'wawom, yeb macta chisjahba isba sata tioẍ, yebpaxo sunil mac choche yala' lek'ti'al.

Chalnipaxo Comam Jes'us: --Haninti'an inchejtijan w'angelan yalno sunil huntek'an ti' tet sunil mac ayxaco yul ink'aban. Haninti'an titnajinan yin̈ yuninal naj rey David, haca' hunu te' xe' te' xawolni, hac tu' wehan. Lahaninpaxojan haca' tx'umel sajbes chiahilo yin̈ sac'ayalil, ẍi Comam.

Chal Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeb yixal Comam oc xahanbalil haca' ti': --¡Hulan̈! ẍi. Ha' mac chiaben hune' ti' yalabpaxoj: --¡Hulan̈! Ha' mac chitaj isti', tijabi cat yuc'ni ha ha' yin̈ matanil, ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal.

Sunil mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti', caw chintak'ecanojan huntek'an ti' tet: Ta ay mac chianico yak'bil huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti', chati Comam Dios huntek'an isya'tajil tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti' yiban̈.

Yeb ta ay mac chiinilo yak'bil tzet halbilcano yul hune' hum ti', chilo Comam Dios ismajul yin̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale, yeb ismajul yul hune' con̈ob yet Comam Dios yehi, haca' yalni yul hune' hum ti'.
Comam chalni tzettaj ayayo yul hune' Hum ti', ha' chalni haca' ti': --Ho' toxa chinhulan, ẍi Comam. Hacojab tu'. ¡Hulan̈ Mam Jes'us Jahawil!
Yak'abayo Comam Jes'us isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil.
